Travels the world to∠improve his swordsmanship."},{"id":3002000030,"text":"The 27 True Runes"},{"id":3002000031,"text":"\"The Birth of∠  the 27 True Runes\"∠∠In the beginning there was∠Darkness, and Darkness lived∠for eons in a rift in time."},{"id":3002000032,"text":"Eventually, having suffered in∠solitude for so long, Darkness∠shed a tear.∠∠From this tear were born∠two brothers:∠∠Sword and Shield."},{"id":3002000033,"text":"Sword bragged that he could∠cut anything to pieces, and∠to that Shield answered that∠nothing could ever harm∠him.∠∠And so, the two fought."},{"id":3002000034,"text":"The battle raged for seven∠days and seven nights.∠∠Sword tore apart Shield.∠∠Shield shattered Sword."},{"id":3002000035,"text":"The fragments of Sword∠rained down and formed∠the sky.∠∠The fragments of Shield∠rained down and formed∠the earth.∠∠The sparks from their battle∠became the stars."},{"id":3002000036,"text":"And the 27 jewels that∠adorned Sword and Shield∠were turned into the 27 True ∠Runes, and so the world∠began."},{"id":3002000037,"text":"A Guide to Trading"},{"id":3002000038,"text":"\"A Guide to Trading\"∠∠Always gather information∠before trading. Check the∠prices of goods at the trading∠posts in each area."},{"id":3002000039,"text":"When you find items with∠price differences, buy low and∠sell high. That's the basis of∠all trade."},{"id":3002000040,"text":"Trading posts have limited∠stock. If you buy all of the∠trade items from a certain∠location, it will take some∠time for them to be∠restocked."},{"id":3002000041,"text":"So it wouldn't be a bad idea∠to find a route where you can∠visit 3 trading posts in a row."},{"id":3002000042,"text":"For example, buy salt in∠South Window. Then sell the∠salt in Forest Village and buy∠sugar. Sell the sugar in∠Kobold Village and buy∠mayonnaise. Then head∠back to South Window."},{"id":3002000043,"text":"Inexpensive items don't bring∠much profit, so leave your∠items in your warehouse so that∠you can trade many items∠at one time."},{"id":3002000044,"text":"There is a lot of false∠information going around,∠so try to find reliable people∠to take advice from."},{"id":3002000045,"text":"The Gate Rune War"},{"id":3002000046,"text":"\"The Gate Rune War\"∠∠The war in which the Toran∠Republic defeated the Scarlet∠Moon Empire is known as∠the Gate Rune War, or∠alternatively, as the Toran∠Liberation War."},{"id":3002000047,"text":"The first leader of the∠victorious Liberation Army∠was a woman named Odessa∠Silverberg.∠∠She was part of the imperial∠nobility, but after her lover∠was killed by the Empire,"},{"id":3002000048,"text":"she joined the Resistance and∠formed the Liberation Army.∠∠Its original members were∠Flik, Humphrey, and∠Sanchez, but according to∠another member, Viktor,"},{"id":3002000049,"text":"their later victories can more∠or less be accorded to∠♂⑩, son of one of the∠six imperial generals. During∠the war, Odessa was killed∠and ♂⑩ took over∠as leader of the Liberation∠Army."},{"id":3002000050,"text":"Following the advice of the∠military strategist, Mathiu,∠♂⑩ set up∠♂■ Castle as the∠headquarters of the New∠Liberation Army. He must∠have a good reason, I guess."},{"id":3005000004,"text":"He's headed for Kobold Village. Something about becoming a∠true warrior."},{"id":3005000005,"text":"She never leaves Hix's side... Actually, it's more like she∠pulls him around wherever she goes. She's headed for Kobold∠Village."},{"id":3005000006,"text":"He's going to the Crystal Valley in Harmonia, but right now∠it seems he's in a town somewhere in the Matilda Knightdom."},{"id":3005000007,"text":"If you want this guy, you'll have to get more companions∠and make some improvements to the castle, I think."},{"id":3005000008,"text":"If you fix up this old castle as good as it'll get and then∠go find the guy waiting in the Cave of the Wind, it should∠work out okay."},{"id":3005000009,"text":"Looks like you'll have to fix up this castle a bit. You∠probably also have to find some guy named Killey too..."},{"id":3005000010,"text":"He's layin' on the ground in Coronet Town. Passed out like∠a wino, he is."},{"id":3005000011,"text":"Get the castle a little bigger and then head for Tsai's∠house."},{"id":3005000012,"text":"I heard she still hangs out in Toto Village... Looks like∠she doesn't want to leave..."},{"id":3005000013,"text":"She's looking for her pet, \"Bonaparte.\" She's just a little∠girl, so ya gotta be nice to her."},{"id":3005000014,"text":"She's one hell of a dancer and she's looking for a partner.∠Maybe it could be you, ♂㈱, if you're lucky."},{"id":3005000015,"text":"That dog'll go anywhere Kinnison goes, he will."},{"id":3005000016,"text":"He's famous in South Window. Granted, he complains a lot,∠but if he's half as good as they say he is…"},{"id":3005000017,"text":"Maybe if there were another Kobold with you he might come.∠Also, the castle'll have to be a little bigger."},{"id":3005000018,"text":"He seems to be somewhere in the forest near Ryube..."},{"id":3005000019,"text":"Ha ha. That guy likes a good challenge, I hear."},{"id":3005000020,"text":"He's got a lot of confidence in his own strength. I'll bet∠ya could use that against him."},{"id":3005000021,"text":"He's a fun-loving guy, but he's got a real weakness for∠Chinchirorin, he does."},{"id":3005000022,"text":"Hmmm, to get a woman like that, you have to work real hard.∠Maybe you're still a little too young, eh?"},{"id":3005000023,"text":"He doesn't trust humans one bit. You need to bring along∠someone he'll trust if ya want him to come along."},{"id":3005000024,"text":"I heard that some girl learning the art of gadgetry is∠traveling around the Muse-Greenhill checkpoint."},{"id":3005000025,"text":"It looks like that thing follows Meg around wherever she∠goes."},{"id":3005000026,"text":"I heard she lives in the woods somewhere near Forest∠Village..."},{"id":3005000027,"text":"He's devoted to solving the riddle of the Sindar, but∠there's someone else who already found the treasure of the∠Sindar ruins."},{"id":3005000028,"text":"I heard something about a female bodyguard who's hunting∠for the group of thieves who are preying on all-female∠parties..."},{"id":3005000029,"text":"That guy's totally obsessed with swords and other weapons.∠He only talks to folks with high-level weapons..."},{"id":3005000030,"text":"If someone wanders around the Greenhill and Muse∠checkpoint..."},{"id":3005000031,"text":"I talked to a guy who heard strange noises coming from the∠mines in Tinto."},{"id":3005000032,"text":"Apparently, griffins sometimes show up in Forest Village."},{"id":3005000033,"text":"He's a beastmaster, so humans just don't interest him if ya∠know what I mean."},{"id":3005000034,"text":"I heard that he hung around with Chaco a lot when they were∠both little kids."},{"id":3005000035,"text":"Everyone in Radat talks about what a happy couple Freed and∠Yoshino are."},{"id":3005000036,"text":"Mazus is real prideful. I don't think he'll join up with ya∠unless you've got lots more companions."},{"id":3005000037,"text":"I heard Rokkaku Hamlet is on the mountain path on the way∠to Toran. A ninja named Kasumi is in charge there."},{"id":3005000038,"text":"Rokkaku Hamlet seems to be on the mountain path on the∠way to Toran. If you're not havin' any luck, it's probably∠cause ya don't have enough companions yet."},{"id":3005000039,"text":"He's an old friend of Simone's. I guess he was once a∠nobleman from the Scarlet Moon Empire."},{"id":3005000040,"text":"If yer looking for a rose brooch, they sell 'em in Banner∠Village."},{"id":3005000041,"text":"I don't know who it is, but someone's after that guy....∠He better watch his back..."},{"id":3005000042,"text":"He's always bragging about how fast he is. If you could∠show him how fast you are, he might just..."},{"id":3005000043,"text":"She won't bother hanging around with weaklings. Ya got to∠be at a high-enough level to interest that one..."},{"id":3005000044,"text":"Well, Long Chan-Chan is Wakaba's master, so maybe..."},{"id":3005000045,"text":"He's proud of his strength, so maybe if ya can show him your∠own strength, he'll join you."},{"id":3005000046,"text":"He's still hanging around Radat Town, but I'm not sure∠how…"},{"id":3005000047,"text":"Legends say that unicorns will only talk to fair maidens...∠But you know how hard it is to find one of those these∠days..."},{"id":3005000048,"text":"It looks like there are still a lot of weird noises coming∠from the mines in Tinto City."},{"id":3005000049,"text":"If someone walks around between Greenhill and Two River..."},{"id":3005000050,"text":"If someone walks around between Greenhill and Forest∠Village..."},{"id":3005000051,"text":"If someone walks around the path to the Matilda∠Knightdom..."},{"id":3005000052,"text":"If someone walks around the Forest Village..."},{"id":3005000053,"text":"I hear he only shows up when he needs to alter his∠maps... Maybe the mercenary fortress..."},{"id":3005000054,"text":"Tetsu is just crazy about baths. He trusts folks who look∠nice and toasty like they just came out of a bath."},{"id":3005000055,"text":"She never leaves Alex's side. They look like a real happy∠couple, they do."},{"id":3005000056,"text":"After he was forced to leave the White Deer Inn, I hear he∠went to South Window."},{"id":3005000057,"text":"She may look hard to approach, but it's best to just be∠direct with that type of woman."},{"id":3005000058,"text":"Tenkou is a master window maker. Maybe if ya could bring∠him even one Window Set....."},{"id":3005000059,"text":"Well, he's Tai Ho's little brother, so..."},{"id":3005000060,"text":"She lost her sheep in Kobold Village. It might not be a bad∠idea to help her find 'em."},{"id":3005000061,"text":"Well, you know old folks... They're happy just to have∠people listen to 'em talk."},{"id":3005000062,"text":"Poor guy lost his farm. Right now, he's hanging out in the∠mayor's house in Forest Village and making a nuisance of∠himself."},{"id":3005000063,"text":"That crazy old man... I don't know how far you're willing∠to go to get him to join yer group, but...."},{"id":3005000064,"text":"Well, it wouldn't hurt to try trading for yerself, y'know.∠With yer luck, you should be able to turn a nice profit."},{"id":3005000065,"text":"That guy is dying to open his own shop. As leader of the∠♂② Army, you should be able to help him out,∠no?"},{"id":3005000066,"text":"Only someone with acoustical training can use those Sound∠Sets, y'know."},{"id":3005000067,"text":"I hear he's a big collector of antiques. It's the Celadon∠Urn he wants, I hear flying squirrels sometimes carry 'em∠around."},{"id":3005000068,"text":"He's back in Kuskus Town and he's always saying how he∠wants to sharpen a famous sword, like maybe the Celestial∠Sword..."},{"id":3005000069,"text":"Raura is hanging around Tinto. I hear she's old friends∠with Jeane, but y'know there's a reason people∠become \"old friends\"..."},{"id":3005000070,"text":"Poor girl's got nowhere to go cause of the war, but she's∠toughin' it out in South Window right now. Be extra nice to∠her."},{"id":3005000071,"text":"He's a friend of Annallee's, but it looks like he's messing∠around in Greenhill right now...."},{"id":3005000072,"text":"He's friends with Annallee. I heard he's in Tinto right now."},{"id":3005000073,"text":"Well, I hear there's a place near Forest Village that has∠real nice clay."},{"id":3005000074,"text":"She was teaching the art of runemastery in Greenhill, but∠I heard she's back in Two River now."},{"id":3005000075,"text":"I heard there's an old man in South Window who's telling∠everyone who'll listen about his old days as a knight."},{"id":3005000076,"text":"He was last seen at the battle outside Muse, but no one∠seems to know where he is now, or even if he's still alive."},{"id":3005000077,"text":"What kinda info do ya need?∠ A companion's secret∠ How to recruit someone∠ Quit"},{"id":3005000078,"text":"The investigation fee is ♂金 potch. ∠What'll ya do?∠ Do it∠ Quit"},{"id":3005000079,"text":"Who do you want to recruit?"},{"id":3005000080,"text":"I finished the investigation."},{"id":3005000081,"text":"Just ask this here hard-boiled investigator, Richmond.∠No secret's safe from me."},{"id":3005000082,"text":"Looks like there's nobody in line."},{"id":3005000083,"text":"The investigation fee is ♂金 potch.∠Oops, looks like you're a little short."},{"id":3005000086,"text":"Secret #1"},{"id":3005000087,"text":"Secret #2"},{"id":3005000088,"text":"Secret #3"},{"id":3005000089,"text":"Secret #4"},{"id":3005000091,"text":"Well, here's what I found out."},{"id":3005000092,"text":"I told ya to leave it to me, didn't I?"},{"id":3005000093,"text":"Sorry, it looks like I was a little late."},{"id":3005000094,"text":"First, the results of the basic investigation."},{"id":3005000095,"text":"That's all I could find out..."},{"id":3005000096,"text":"Sorry..."},{"id":3005000097,"text":"You should know better than me, right?"},{"id":3005000099,"text":"Sorry..."},{"id":3005000100,"text":"Damn... Wait a minute!!!!"},{"id":1001020005,"text":"Seems natural to me."},{"id":1001020006,"text":"The normal ending ∠is about to start."},{"id":1001020007,"text":"The best ending is ∠about to start."},{"id":1001020008,"text":"You're wrong, brother Mukumuku. ∠I heard that it's not done yet."},{"id":1001020009,"text":"Erp....."},{"id":1001030001,"text":"We finally made it home, ♂㈱."},{"id":1001030002,"text":"Wow, so this is your hometown, huh? Know your place, you insolent wretch..."},{"id":1001030072,"text":"It's all right.◎1 Let him speak.◎3 After all, he hasn't∠long to live..."},{"id":1001030073,"text":"For your crimes in colluding with the foul City-States of∠Jowston and besmirching the honor of the proud Unicorn∠Brigade and the Highland military, I hereby sentence you∠both to death by hanging.∨Do you have any last words?"},{"id":1001030074,"text":"No, I don't."},{"id":1001030075,"text":"Rot in hell."},{"id":1001030076,"text":"......"},{"id":1001030077,"text":"Good. There's nothing here for you anymore."},{"id":1001030188,"text":"I travel around and collect old tales from people I meet.∨I heard that a hero once lived in this town, but nobody∠will tell me any more than that."},{"id":1001030189,"text":"Welco... ♂㈱! What are you doing here?! You're a wanted∠man now!∨I don't believe you're a spy, but everyone else says they're∠going to make sure you hang if they catch you.∨Nanami should be at your home. Move along now and go see∠her."},{"id":1001030192,"text":"Hurry home and speak to her. Poor Nanami... Since the∠attack, she has been shunned by pretty much everyone in∠town. She must be feeling pretty low..."},{"id":1001030193,"text":"What do you... Hey! It's ♂㈱! Traitorous∠villain! My son is dead because of you!∨I'll see you hanged for this!"},{"id":1001030194,"text":"Eeek! Wh-What are you doing here?!"},{"id":1001030195,"text":"I-It's ♂㈱! Stop!"},{"id":1001030196,"text":"Oh, big brother... Is that you? Huh... It's not? Oh, it's∠you, ♂㈱.∨Hey, listen to this... My eyes are going to get better.∨My big brother said that when he gets rich, he'll take me∠to a famous doctor in the Toran Republic to have my eyes∠fixed.∨Hehe, I can't wait. I want to see what you look like,∠♂㈱. I bet you look cool."},{"id":1001030197,"text":"Hehe, I can hardly wait."},{"id":1001030198,"text":"Go on, shoo! Get out of here! We've got an important guest!∠Don't cause trouble!"},{"id":1001030199,"text":"Say, that girl was really cute... Oops, I got to be∠careful. I don't want to get another scolding."},{"id":1001030200,"text":"Hey! Did you hear? They arrested that Atreides boy. Rumor∠is it was his own father that turned him in...∨But what else was he supposed to do? The kid was a spy∠after all... ◎2And some people even say he's not even a∠true Atreides."},{"id":1001030201,"text":"Eeek. I can't believe it!"},{"id":1001030202,"text":"...This part is always sad."},{"id":1001030203,"text":"Hey, you kids... Haven't I seen you before? Are you from∠here?"},{"id":1001030204,"text":"I hope my big brother comes home soon... He promised he'd∠play with me..."},{"id":1001030205,"text":"♂㈱! Jowy! Didn't they catch you guys?"},{"id":1001030206,"text":"I heard they caught the spies, so I feel a little better∠now... Huh? ◎1You're those guys from before..."},{"id":1001030207,"text":"Oh, I'm sick of it already... All this talk of war..."},{"id":1001030208,"text":"Captain Rowd did it again! He caught those cowardly spies!∠He's the pride of this town!"},{"id":1001030211,"text":"Ah! ◎1♂㈱! Jowy! What are you doing here? You∠need to get out of here at once."},{"id":1001030212,"text":"Hey! You're the ones they led away earlier. How did you∠manage to escape?"},{"id":1001030213,"text":"♂㈱, Jowy! You're okay? Oh, what a relief...∠Listen, buy what you need and then leave this place, fast."},{"id":1001030214,"text":"♂㈱, Jowy! How did you escape?◎4 Well, no∠matter. You need to get away from here at once.∨I'm sure you'll be okay. You boys are both very resilient."},{"id":1001030215,"text":"It's ♂㈱! I thought they caught you!"},{"id":1001030216,"text":"Oh... familiar smell."},{"id":1001120199,"text":"☆0∠           Nanami's Bed"},{"id":1001120200,"text":"☆0∠          Grandpa's Bed∠      Not slept in recently."},{"id":1001140001,"text":"Pilika, where are you going?! You're not safe on your own!"},{"id":1001140002,"text":"Pilika?"},{"id":1001140003,"text":"Hey!∨Let's go after her, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1001140004,"text":"So, here you are, Pilika. Why did you...∨Huh? What is it? Is something there?"},{"id":1001140005,"text":"......"},{"id":1001140006,"text":"Oh yeah, now I remember. Marx, Pilika's father... His job∠was taking care of some shrine...∨This must be the place."},{"id":1001140007,"text":"...What's this? Something's inscribed here.∨Hey, ♂㈱, come take a look."},{"id":1001140008,"text":"This writing, it says...∨\"My friend and I seal our wishes here. We deeply regret that∠we could not unify them. -Han and Genkaku\"∨This Genkaku... Could it be Master Genkaku? What does this∠mean?"},{"id":1001140009,"text":"...!"},{"id":1001140010,"text":"Wh-What is this place?"},{"id":1001140011,"text":"Are we inside the shrine? But how did we get in here?"},{"id":1001140012,"text":"You who follow the Path of Fate... Heralds who summon the∠Stars of Destiny... Go forward.∨If you are to weave your fates, you must first obtain that∠which lies within."},{"id":1001140013,"text":"Huh? What was that?∨W-We're supposed to go forward?"},{"id":1001140014,"text":"Who are you?"},{"id":1001140015,"text":"I-I'm Jowy."},{"id":1001140016,"text":"Nya nya nya nya nya nya! Hey, adopted kid! Hey, coward's son!∠Your daddy's dojo is a dump!"},{"id":1001140017,"text":"Stay away, ♂㈱. You might spread coward cooties∠on us!"},{"id":1001140019,"text":"Stop it! If you're gonna make fun of ♂㈱,∠you better be ready to take me on!"},{"id":1001140020,"text":"Now you won't talk so big! You're just a rich little wimp∠and a castaway taken in by an old chicken!∨Hahahahaha!"},{"id":1001140021,"text":"Hey! Get back here, you little creeps!"},{"id":1001140022,"text":"...Are you okay, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1001140023,"text":"Hurry up! My hands are getting tired!"},{"id":1001140024,"text":"J-Just a little more..."},{"id":1001140025,"text":"Can you see her? Isn't she cute?"},{"id":1001140026,"text":"Huh? Huh?"},{"id":1001140027,"text":"Hurry up!"},{"id":1001140028,"text":"J-Just a little more..."},{"id":1001140029,"text":"Hey! What are you up to?!"},{"id":1001140030,"text":"Uh-oh! Let's scram!"},{"id":1001140031,"text":"Stop right there, you little snots! Wait!"},{"id":1001140032,"text":"Okay, good. Remember, it's our secret."},{"id":1001140033,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1001140034,"text":"Hey, hey, what were you doing? C'mon, tell me!"},{"id":1001140035,"text":"Well, you see..."},{"id":1001140036,"text":"Hey! You just promised not to tell!"},{"id":1001140037,"text":"Wait, what? Oh, c'mon, just tell me."},{"id":1001140038,"text":"No. It's a secret between boys."},{"id":1001140039,"text":"Bleh."},{"id":1001140040,"text":"From today, you're all members of the Royal Highland Army's∠illustrious Unicorn Brigade. Hold your heads high and∠serve with pride!"},{"id":1001140041,"text":"Huh? What was that...a hallucination? ♂㈱,∠did you see it too?∨What the heck is going on?"},{"id":1001140042,"text":"Young weavers of destiny... ∠You have shown us you are worthy."},{"id":1001140043,"text":"You're the one from before! Who are you?!"},{"id":1001140044,"text":"I am the inheritor of the Gate Rune. The keeper of the∠gates between worlds. The one who watches the great scales∠of Fate.∨Here begins the gathering of the Stars of Destiny.∠Fate wavers in the balance,∠and the future cannot be seen.∨One of the 27 True Runes has found you both worthy.∠O weavers of destiny, the path is now open to you."},{"id":1001140045,"text":"Found us worthy? Is that what that vision was?"},{"id":1001140046,"text":"Yes. The rune found you both worthy. In order to fulfill∠your destiny, you need the power of the Rune of Beginning,∠which rests beyond here.∨Stand before the rune and hold forth your right hands.∠You will be granted power to alter fate.∨Think well, then decide.∨Power will not grant you peace.∨The storms of fate cause misery for many, and few will be∠able to calm them once they start.∨If you do not desire power, return now to the world outside."},{"id":1001140047,"text":"Power... Rune... The power of the 27 True Runes..."},{"id":1001140048,"text":"...◎3What do you think, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1001140049,"text":"If we need power..."},{"id":1001140050,"text":"I have no need for power."},{"id":1001140051,"text":"......∨Back when Pilika lost her voice...I realized just how∠weak I truly am.∨Even though I had promised myself and her dead parents that∠I would protect her...∨There are people in my life I want to keep safe...∠You, Nanami, Pilika, Mother, and all the other∠good-hearted souls I know.∨That's why I need power, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1001140052,"text":"I've heard that those who hold one of the 27 True Runes∠gain incredible abilities and eternal life.∨If that's true...∨I'm powerless right now... But if I could obtain the∠strength to protect all those I love, then...∨Please, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1001140053,"text":"I don't care how I get the power, as long as it gives me∠what I want.∨Please, ♂㈱... Please understand."},{"id":1001140054,"text":"Sometimes power hurts people, and fate plays with people's∠lives. Still, this is what the world demands now."},{"id":1001140055,"text":"You're strong, ♂㈱. But I... I'm...∨Please, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1001140056,"text":"♂㈱...∨Let's take a look. I just want to see what kind of \"power\"∠it is..."},{"id":1001140057,"text":"Thanks, ♂㈱. I'm sorry..."},{"id":1001140058,"text":"♂㈱. I'll take the cave to the right.∠You go to the left."},{"id":1001140059,"text":"This must be it.∨♂㈱! Can you hear me? Are you ready?"},{"id":1001140060,"text":"(Raise your right hand)"},{"id":1001140061,"text":"Wait a minute."},{"id":1001140062,"text":"I...∨There are people I want to protect, and so I need power."},{"id":1001140063,"text":"The Bright Shield Rune appears∠on your right hand."},{"id":1001140064,"text":"The Dark Sword Rune appears∠on Jowy's right hand."},{"id":1001140065,"text":"Now, I have power... The power of the rune...∨......∨No, now I have a chance..."},{"id":1001140066,"text":"Okay. Let's go back."},{"id":1001140067,"text":"You have been granted with power.∨♂㈱, you bear the Bright Shield Rune.∨And Jowy, you now carry the Dark Sword Rune.∨They are the two sides of the Rune of Beginning. Go now.∠Go forth and weave your own fates."},{"id":1001140068,"text":"Yikes! Wh-Wh-What happened? Are you guys okay?"},{"id":1001140069,"text":"You just disappeared. We didn't know what happened. ∠Anyway, I'm glad you're both back in one piece."},{"id":1001140070,"text":"Was it a dream? No, I don't think so.∠♂㈱, show me your right hand."},{"id":1001140071,"text":"So, it really did happen."},{"id":1001140072,"text":"Big flash. Gengen surprised. Eyes hurt! You okay, friends?"},{"id":1001140073,"text":"Yeah... we're okay."},{"id":1001140075,"text":"We're okay, Pilika.∨Right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1001140076,"text":"Let's go. We don't know when the Highland Army will come∠this way.∨And we have to press onward..."},{"id":1001150001,"text":"Before this latest conflict started, fightin' between∠Highland and the City-States was mostly limited to minor∠border skirmishes.∨But maybe 30 years or so ago, Highland and Jowston fought∠a great war with both of their fates on the line."},{"id":1001150002,"text":"There's all kindsa theories about how it all sparked off,∠but the smart money's on it bein' the City-States's fault.∨Anabelle's old man, Mayor Darell of Muse, led the Jowston∠forces, and the Highland Army was headed up by the famous∠general, Han Cunningham."},{"id":1001150003,"text":"Now, Darell apparently didn't know left from right when it∠came to war, so pretty much everyone assumed it'd be an easy∠win for Highland."},{"id":1001150004,"text":"But then a hero appeared... I'm talkin' about your adopted∠father, Genkaku.∨Genkaku led a unit on a raid that hit the Royal Army right∠in the provisions and bought enough time for Jowston to∠bounce back on the offensive."},{"id":1001150005,"text":"Suddenly, it was anyone's fight. Turns out Genkaku and Han∠were also from the same village in the borderlands, and∠pretty much best friends to boot.∨Guess they had a simpler way of doin' things back then,∠because word has it those two would even have drinks∠together in between battles.∨They were also both well aware of how stupid and pointless∠the whole war was."},{"id":1001150006,"text":"And so Genkaku and Han worked together to draw up a peace∠treaty. The citizens of both lands were sick of war and∠backed the accord wholeheartedly.∨All except one man, that is... The Mayor of Muse City."},{"id":1001150007,"text":"There was one city by the border, your hometown of Kyaro,∠that Darell refused to give over to Highland.∨And so negotiations broke down, and the conflict began anew."},{"id":1001150008,"text":"That's when the King of Highland, Agares Blight, made a∠suggestion. It's a pretty hardcore way of doin' things if ya∠ask me, but his idea was to stake everything on a duel∠between two champions.∨Darell agreed to the idea, as did Han and Genkaku, who∠wished only that the war would finally come to an end. ∠And so the stage was set for the two heroes to face each∠other."},{"id":1001150009,"text":"The time came for the duel to begin. King Agares gave his∠sword to Han, and Mayor Darell gave his sword to Genkaku.∨This was meant to show that each champion was fighting as∠a representative of their respective nation."},{"id":1001150010,"text":"But then somethin' happened. Genkaku wouldn't raise his∠sword. Darell yelled at him to fight over and over, but∠Genkaku wouldn't budge.∨Time passed, and soon the spectators became furious at∠Genkaku for spoiling the otherwise honorable duel."},{"id":1001150011,"text":"With no other choice, Han knocked away Genkaku's blade, put∠his own sword to Genkaku's neck, and declared victory."},{"id":1001150012,"text":"That's how your town of Kyaro came to be Highland territory."},{"id":1001150013,"text":"Genkaku was labeled a traitor and ordered into exile by∠Mayor Darell.∨He left the City-States without ever revealing his true∠reason for not fighting."},{"id":1001150014,"text":"Many years passed, and once Darell stepped down as mayor,∠the truth of why Genkaku refused to lift his blade finally∠came to light."},{"id":1001150015,"text":"Darell had secretly coated the sword he gave to Genkaku∠for the duel with poison."},{"id":1001150016,"text":"Genkaku was damned whether he won or lost. If he did lose,∠fine. And if he won, Darell was planning to exile him for∠his \"underhanded treachery.\"∨Once Genkaku realized all of this, he couldn't bring himself∠to swing his sword."},{"id":1001150017,"text":"Though his name was cleared at long last, Genkaku never∠once set foot in the City-States of Jowston again.∨As for what happened after... Well, you kids know about all∠that better than I do."},{"id":1001150018,"text":"Guess livin' a peaceful life with you and Nanami meant more∠to Genkaku than reclaimin' his good name back in Jowston.∨Anyway, that's about all I know."},{"id":1001220002,"text":"This is where our journey began. You and I started out∠walking the same path, but ended up going our separate ways∠at some point..."},{"id":1001220003,"text":"Even so...I have no regrets.∨If I were to regret my actions, I would've done so already∠when I betrayed the City-States and assassinated Lady∠Anabelle."},{"id":1001220004,"text":"You and I were a lot alike...◎1 We were both aiming for∠the same thing. But I just...∨At the Highland camp, after I helped you both escape, I was∠captured and brought before Luca Blight again.∨I hated his brutal ways, it's true, but I can't deny that∠I admired his strength a little bit at the same time...∨I thought if I was that strong, I could protect everyone,∠that I could create a gentle world where no one would ever∠be hurt again.∨But..."},{"id":1001220005,"text":"No... Forget about it.∨This is a battle between the King of Highland and the∠leader of the ♂② Army. ∠This is truly...the final battle."},{"id":1001220006,"text":"I guess you're right..."},{"id":1001220007,"text":"We don't need to fight."},{"id":1001220008,"text":"Yeah..."},{"id":1001220009,"text":"Yes...we do, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1001220010,"text":"That's right, ♂㈱... Good.◎1 Now this long war∠will finally end.∨♂㈱... Hold up your right hand."},{"id":1001220011,"text":"I was watching you, always... Remember, these two runes∠were once as one..."},{"id":1001220012,"text":"Peace is a beautiful thing... Even if it comes at the end of∠a long, vicious conflict...∨Even when you think you've lost everything, some things∠still stay with you...∨Forgive me, ♂㈱... I caused so many deaths.∠No one knows the pain of that more than I do..."},{"id":1001220013,"text":"But this is how it should be... You had to defeat me.∨A courageous hero toppling an evil king...∨The tale of your brave deeds will bring the people respite,∠help them forget the horrors of war and violence.∨Even the defeated soldiers will take comfort in knowing∠that they had been deceived by a villain from the outset..."},{"id":1001220014,"text":"♂㈱, become a great leader for me...∨Stand guard over this peace...that we fought so hard for.∠The rune will lend you its power, I'm sure of it...∨Farewell...◎1♂㈱... ◎2My friend..."},{"id":1001220015,"text":"♂㈱... Why? Why won't you do it...∨I'm the King of Highland... I fought the ♂②∠Army and killed many of your friends... ◎1And Nanami...∨♂㈱, you have to... You have to fight...∠Do it for your fallen comrades... For all the people..."},{"id":1001220016,"text":"...I know."},{"id":1001220017,"text":"Even so, I can't..."},{"id":1001220018,"text":"Yes... Let this be the final battle..."},{"id":1001220019,"text":"Are you going to betray all those who've placed their hopes∠in you?!∨Not to mention the dreams of your sister, Nanami, who kept∠you safe?"},{"id":1001220020,"text":"Why? Why have you come all this way... Only to now∠decide not to fight?"},{"id":1001220021,"text":"There's no reason we must fight."},{"id":1001220022,"text":"......"},{"id":1001220023,"text":"Oh, but there is... To remove any trace of the Highland∠Kingdom from this land...∨Agares and Luca are already dead, and I put Jillia to rest∠with my own hands, which makes me the last living Blight...∨And you are the hero that will defeat me.∨Extinguish the Blight bloodline once and for all, or there∠will always be fanatics who seek to revive the Highland∠Kingdom...∨After all, sometimes hope can drive people to madness...∠Let's make our war the last to ever plague this land..."},{"id":1001220024,"text":"♂㈱...◎1 I always envied you. ∠Even in this moment, you're kind.∨I think that's why I betrayed you...∨You're loved by so many people... So I..."},{"id":1001220025,"text":"Jowy!!!"},{"id":1001220026,"text":"..............."},{"id":1001220027,"text":"I-I used too much power... The Beast Rune that Luca tried to∠free...∨I had to...use my...Dark Sword Rune to stop it...∨Our two runes... Together they make a True Rune...∨But when used alone...they draw upon our vital energy...∨♂㈱... At this rate we'll both die...∨So...I give you my life, so that the two can become∠one again.◎7∠♂㈱... Give me your right hand..."},{"id":1001220028,"text":"I understand, Jowy..."},{"id":1001220029,"text":"I can't do that."},{"id":1001220030,"text":"Both of us... We fought for what we believed... For the∠peace that is to come..."},{"id":1001220031,"text":"You defeated me and ended the Blight Family bloodline...∨The Kingdom of Highland is no more...∨Soon, history will tell the tale of how a triumphant hero∠brought low the wicked King of Highland.∨The tale of your brave deeds will bring the people respite,∠help them forget the horrors of war and violence.∨Even the defeated soldiers will take comfort in knowing∠that they had been deceived by a villain from the outset..."},{"id":1001220032,"text":"♂㈱, become a great leader for me...∨Stand guard over this peace...that we fought so hard for.∠The rune will lend you its power, I'm sure of it...∨Farewell...◎1♂㈱... ◎2My friend..."},{"id":1001220033,"text":"♂㈱... I-I'm sorry... I can't endure it any∠more... All the lives that I stole...∨All the people I hurt..."},{"id":1001220034,"text":"Please... Our dream... Please don't let it all be in vain...∨If people know I...an heir to the Blight name...lives...∠fanatics will emerge...seeking to revive...the royal line...∨After all...sometimes hope...drives people mad..."},{"id":1001220035,"text":"Please...I beg of you... Don't let our dream...have been∠for nothing..."},{"id":1001220036,"text":"♂㈱... There's no...time. Please...∠I'm already..."},{"id":1001220037,"text":"♂㈱... There's no...time. Please...∠I'm already..."},{"id":1001220038,"text":"I understand."},{"id":1001220039,"text":"I still can't..."},{"id":1001220040,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1001220041,"text":"Wh-What's happening..."},{"id":1001220042,"text":"The rune..."},{"id":1001220043,"text":"This power... It's healing my body..."},{"id":1001220044,"text":"The Rune of Beginning... Its power to judge conflicts∠appears only once the bearers of the two runes that comprise∠it have faced each other in battle...∨...a battle much like that which birthed our world.∨Despite all this, ♂㈱, you chose not to fight.∠Your spirit, and those of the 108 Stars of Destiny...∨They are stronger than even the power of the True Rune...∠The Rune of Beginning...∨Just as I thought, you possess great strength...∨Go forth, ♂㈱ and Jowy. The world still holds∠so much for you. It is full of the unknown...∨There's no reason for you to stay in these lands."},{"id":1001220046,"text":"But... I-I murdered people with my own two hands... ∠Lady Anabelle, Luca Blight, countless soldiers...∨My sins are too great..."},{"id":1001220047,"text":"And they cannot be erased... But I believe that you...∠the two of you...have the strength to bear this burden and∠go on."},{"id":1001220049,"text":"The man called Jowy Blight has no place in this world∠anymore...∨But if I leave this land and the name Jowy behind, will I...∠Will I still be me...?"},{"id":1001220050,"text":"Of course!"},{"id":1001220051,"text":"You know the answer to that."},{"id":1001220052,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1001220053,"text":"This is the place where our journey began... How long∠has it been since we were first here?∨Let's go, ♂㈱... Let's make this place the∠ beginning of our next journey..."},{"id":1001220054,"text":"If we hadn't run away then..."},{"id":1001220055,"text":"Then we'd have problems, because without you two,∠peace would never have come to this land."},{"id":1001220056,"text":"♂㈱, so you're leaving after all.∨I had hoped that you would stay and lead this still-unstable∠country. You're the right man to do it.∨But I won't try to stop you. You've certainly paid a heavy∠price and then some. We can ask no more of you.∨Go out and see the world with your own eyes. It still∠holds so much for you.∨And I hope that one day when you've finished with your∠journey, you'll come back."},{"id":1001220057,"text":"There's just one thing I have left to report. Keeping secrets∠isn't loyal behavior as a subordinate, but I was explicitly told∠not to tell you. ∨...When Nanami fell in the Matilda Knightdom..."},{"id":1001220058,"text":"And so, that's it... I'm Viktor, leader of∠a group of mercenaries allied with the City-States of∠Jowston."},{"id":1002010012,"text":"No, I'm not."},{"id":1002010013,"text":"Hmmm... So where ARE you from then? Lie and I'll cut out∠your tongue."},{"id":1002010014,"text":"...I'm from Highland."},{"id":1002010016,"text":"The silent treatment, huh? I'd never do that...∠I may not look it, but I'm a very nice guy.∠But anyway, what happened to the other one?"},{"id":1002010019,"text":"It's no good. Lost sight of him. I hope he made it..."},{"id":1002010020,"text":"Too bad...∨Okay, listen up. Whoever you are, you're gonna be my∠prisoner for a while.∨You may not find the accommodations too comfortable,∠though.∨Don't look so worried. It's small and∠none too comfy, but you'll just have to live with it since∠you're a prisoner."},{"id":1002020002,"text":"It gets pretty cold at night, so try to bundle up."},{"id":1002020003,"text":"Hey, good morning! I appreciate it."},{"id":1002020008,"text":"Haha, well said! Anyway, it's time for supper."},{"id":1002020009,"text":"I'm pretty tired."},{"id":1002020010,"text":"Can't say I'm surprised since you did it all yourself.∠After you've eaten, go get some sleep."},{"id":1002020011,"text":"Sorry, but this is all we've got. Rations have been tight∠lately."},{"id":1002020012,"text":"Here's today's task. See that oil spilled all over the∠floor?∨Wipe it up with a rag like this..."},{"id":1002020013,"text":"There are still a few stains. About that oily rag...∠Well, just put it away somewhere. C'mon, let's grab∠some dinner."},{"id":1002020017,"text":"This kind of talent is..."},{"id":1002020018,"text":"Hahaha, I'm just teasing. You're a funny kid. I like you.∨Okay, that's all for today. About that oily rag...∠Well, just put it away somewhere. C'mon, let's grab∠some dinner."},{"id":1002020019,"text":"How do you like your food today? I told the cook to give∠you extra. You've been working really hard."},{"id":1002020020,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱. How many bags do you want?"},{"id":1002020033,"text":"One bag is fine."},{"id":1002020034,"text":"Two bags, please."},{"id":1002020035,"text":"Three bags...please..."},{"id":1002020036,"text":"Here ya go. I'll come around for the money later, so don't∠worry about it."},{"id":1002020037,"text":"Okay, let's see... Oops. Not enough boots. Go back for more."},{"id":1002020038,"text":"Okay, let's see... Good job."},{"id":1002020042,"text":"Great job, you must be pretty tired.◎1 Haha, you know, you∠make this job more fun."},{"id":1002020043,"text":"Hey, it looks like somebody snuck in here!"},{"id":1002020044,"text":"♂㈱! If you're there, answer me!∠♂㈱!"},{"id":1002020046,"text":"Are you there, ♂㈱? If you can't call out, make∠some noise."},{"id":1002020047,"text":"H-He couldn't be... No! It can't be! ♂㈱!∠Where are you?!"},{"id":1002020048,"text":"I'm over here, Jowy!"},{"id":1002020049,"text":"♂㈱... Thank goodness. I'm getting you out of∠here right now."},{"id":1002020050,"text":"Are you okay? I'm so relieved. Let's get out of here before∠the soldiers come."},{"id":1002020051,"text":"Okay, kiddos, that's far enough. Give yourselves up before∠you make us adults mad."},{"id":1002020052,"text":"W-We're outnumbered..."},{"id":1002020053,"text":"Let's smash our way through!"},{"id":1002020054,"text":"Are you okay, ♂㈱?!"},{"id":1002020055,"text":"...Fine."},{"id":1002020056,"text":"Now, how 'bout you tell us who you are?"},{"id":1002020057,"text":"Let's start with your name."},{"id":1002020058,"text":"Jowy... Jowy Atreides."},{"id":1002020059,"text":"Jowy. Okay. Since you came to rescue ♂㈱,∠can I assume you're also from Highland?"},{"id":1002020060,"text":"I am."},{"id":1002020061,"text":"I see... That makes you the other kid we lost in the river."},{"id":1002020062,"text":"Now that you mention it, I never did hear how you boys∠managed to wind up in that mess."},{"id":1002020063,"text":"Well, that's..."},{"id":1002020064,"text":"♂㈱ said somethin' about a \"Jowston ambush,\"∠but the City-States' army hasn't moved since the peace∠treaty was signed.∨So, what the hell happened?"},{"id":1002020065,"text":"I can't say."},{"id":1002020066,"text":"So, that's how it is, huh? Well, you two can get reacquainted∠tonight. You'll both be staying in the same prison cell."},{"id":1002020067,"text":"The truth is..."},{"id":1002020068,"text":"Oh boy, this doesn't sound good. Luca Blight, eh?∠I've heard of the name, but...∨Anyway, what were ya planning to do after ya rescued∠♂㈱?"},{"id":1002020069,"text":"After rescuing ♂㈱, I was planning to go back∠to Kyaro Town with him."},{"id":1002020070,"text":"So you're still planning on trying to escape?"},{"id":1002020071,"text":"Yes."},{"id":1002020072,"text":"Hmph, you kids. Anyway, you can stay put here for a spell.∠Your accommodations'll be a cell, but we'll give ya food∠and a place to sleep."},{"id":1002020073,"text":"Sorry, looks like my rescue failed.◎2 After we got separated,∠I woke up in a village called Toto.∨I'd been found by a little girl who brought me back to her∠home where they tended to my wounds.∨I heard a rumor that a young man was being held prisoner∠here, and so I came to try and save you...◎1 Sorry."},{"id":1002020074,"text":"Sorry, but the extra mouth to feed means we had to spread∠rations even thinner. I hope it's enough.∨♂㈱, I don't blame you for trying to escape,∠but please don't do it again. The boss will let you out of∠here soon enough."},{"id":1002020075,"text":"Excuse me. Could I please have a spoon?"},{"id":1002020076,"text":"A spoon? For your soup? Aren't we the fine nobleman.◎1∠Wait a minute. I'll go get you one."},{"id":1002020077,"text":"♂㈱... Do you ◎1want my carrots?"},{"id":1002020078,"text":"This'll do.∨♂㈱, let me see what you have on you."},{"id":1002020079,"text":"Are you going to try to escape?"},{"id":1002020080,"text":"Of course. But first we have to get∠out of this cell."},{"id":1002020083,"text":"Now we just bend this spoon like this and..."},{"id":1002020084,"text":"There, it's open! They won't catch us this time."},{"id":1002020085,"text":"*yawn*∠All that ruckus earlier really wiped me out..."},{"id":1002020086,"text":"The door is locked...∨Hey, give me that rag and flint. I'll just light this..."},{"id":1002020087,"text":"Huh... What's that smell? ∠Aah!!"},{"id":1002020088,"text":"Okay, now's our chance! Let's go, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1002020089,"text":"♂㈱, give me that rope.∨Okay...good. I'll go first."},{"id":1002020090,"text":"♂㈱... That's where we grew up. We can't forget it so easily."},{"id":1002020093,"text":"It's too dangerous to go back."},{"id":1002020094,"text":"But..."},{"id":1002020095,"text":"There they are!"},{"id":1002020096,"text":"Run for it, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1002020097,"text":"What? Kind Kobold warrior."},{"id":1002020114,"text":"...Okay! Just leave it to Gengen!"},{"id":1002020115,"text":"Yay!!!"},{"id":1002020116,"text":"So, you're going with Gengen and Tuta? Gengen is leader of this∠group. So now you call me \"Captain Gengen.\""},{"id":1002020122,"text":"Yessir, Captain Gengen."},{"id":1002020123,"text":"Yes, Captain Gengen."},{"id":1002020125,"text":"Okay, everyone, here we go. Stay with the Captain!"},{"id":1002020126,"text":"♂㈱, what's wrong? Speak up! Be strong!∠Let's go!"},{"id":1002020127,"text":"Hey, did you hear? My friend is missing... I wonder if∠he's okay. I'm worried."},{"id":1002020128,"text":"Okay, we here. ♂㈱, Tuta."},{"id":1002020129,"text":"After we get the flour from the item store, let's have some∠fun."},{"id":1002020130,"text":"Welcome! Hey... I know you."},{"id":1002020131,"text":"Right. Me Kobold warrior, Gengen! Now Captain Gengen!"},{"id":1002020132,"text":"What can I do for you today?"},{"id":1002020133,"text":"Huh? What? She finally cried herself to sleep...∠Poor girl..."},{"id":1002020223,"text":"♂㈱... I just don't know what side I'm on∠anymore...∨I always considered Highland my home and then they∠chased us here. I just don't know who to trust∠anymore."},{"id":1002020224,"text":"You can trust me."},{"id":1002020225,"text":"Yeah. I know I can... Jowy and ♂㈱ are back!"},{"id":1002020233,"text":"Pilika..."},{"id":1002020234,"text":"A man who looks like a bear was worried about you.∠But I knew you would come back."},{"id":1002020235,"text":"So ya made it back safe, eh, ♂㈱, Jowy."},{"id":1002020236,"text":"We got worried when we heard that Ryube was attacked."},{"id":1002020237,"text":"So, are you Tsai?"},{"id":1002020238,"text":"I am. Just gettin'∠Tsai for us was plenty."},{"id":1002020240,"text":"Understood."},{"id":1002020241,"text":"I want to fight too."},{"id":1002020242,"text":"These parts aren't exactly safe anymore, so watch your∠backs out there. Do you need somethin'?"},{"id":1002020245,"text":"What the?! ♂㈱, Jowy! I thought you guys were∠makin' a run for Muse!"},{"id":1002020246,"text":"You what? That's all."},{"id":1002020269,"text":"Everyone got that? Good! Now, get yourselves ready to fight!∠Fill your stomachs while you can!"},{"id":1002020270,"text":"Are you two ready?"},{"id":1002020271,"text":"We're ready anytime."},{"id":1002020272,"text":"We still need more time..."},{"id":1002020273,"text":"Good. It's the Highland Army!"},{"id":1002020276,"text":"Alright, let's go!"},{"id":1002020277,"text":"It looks like our first battle was a victory. Don't worry!"},{"id":1002020350,"text":"♂㈱, you're welcome here anytime, too."},{"id":1002020351,"text":"It looks like Pilika asked you to do something..."},{"id":1002020352,"text":"It's okay. Let's go find Pilika!"},{"id":1002020357,"text":"Mmm... *soft snoring*"},{"id":1002020358,"text":"...◎1She's sleeping well.◎1 She looks so happy..."},{"id":1002020359,"text":"Let me join group!"},{"id":1002020360,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1002020361,"text":"No way."},{"id":1002020362,"text":"Hurray!"},{"id":1002020363,"text":"What? Hahaha!"},{"id":1002020385,"text":"What with the war over and all, you'd think we wouldn't need∠all these weapons... "},{"id":1002020410,"text":"Oh, I just forgot something."},{"id":1002020411,"text":"Be careful. Just cause you're kids doesn't mean the∠Highland Army will let you go."},{"id":1002020412,"text":"Thanks for helping us out. Please be careful."},{"id":1002020413,"text":"Don't take too long. Right,∠♂㈱, right, Jowy?"},{"id":1003010070,"text":"Beyond here sits Jowston Hill. Visitors are only allowed∠here on special occasions.◎0 Sorry."},{"id":1003010071,"text":"Sorry, all closed now. You're lying!"},{"id":1003010126,"text":"Don't lump my acting skills in with Nanami's..."},{"id":1003010127,"text":"Shut the hell up in there, you idiots! Go to sleep!"},{"id":1003010128,"text":"Can't sleep?"},{"id":1003010130,"text":"Take a look, ♂㈱. You can see the moon through∠that window...∨It's a full moon tonight."},{"id":1003010131,"text":"A lot has happened since we left Highland, huh?"},{"id":1003010132,"text":"That vision... The one we saw of ourselves in the cave∠in Toto Village when we were little...∨Back then I was...I was jealous of you.∨See, in the home I was born into, we had everything.∠I could get anything I wanted. Do you remember the day you and I met?∨I didn't know what I should say to you, so I just stared at∠you and Nanami until you spoke to me first..."},{"id":1003010134,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱... Do you think we'll ever make it∠back to Kyaro?"},{"id":1003010135,"text":"Don't worry, we will."},{"id":1003010137,"text":"Yeah, you're right. I'm fine∠with anything as long as I never have to join the army∠again."},{"id":1003010138,"text":"We'll be okay... I'm sure we will. I'm fine∠with anything as long as I never have to join the army∠again."},{"id":1003010139,"text":"♂㈱, I...∨I spent several days with Pilika, Marx, and Joanna after∠they saved me near Toto Village...∨That's when I first realized...realized what was important∠to me. I have a dream, a dream to make this∠land kind and peaceful again.∨That way, children like Pilika can grow up surrounded by∠the warmth of people that love them... I want to go back to∠a time like that.∨For that, I'd fight with every last bit of what little∠strength I possess."},{"id":1003010143,"text":"Thanks, ♂㈱... Thank you.∨♂㈱... C'mon, hurry!"},{"id":1003010150,"text":"Ohhh? And just who is this old man you speak of?"},{"id":1003010151,"text":"I'll vouch for them. Let 'em outta there."},{"id":1003010152,"text":"Yes, sir. I∠was so worried."},{"id":1003010169,"text":"Well, please take care of Pilika."},{"id":1003010170,"text":"Sure, leave it to me. But you'd better hurry. Keep that∠guy waiting and you'll never hear the end of it."},{"id":1003010171,"text":"The city hall is straight north at the end of the street.∠Go on now, get a move on."},{"id":1003010173,"text":"Hey, the old guy is waiting for us at the city hall.∠Shouldn't we go?"},{"id":1003010174,"text":"Old guy? His name's Viktor..."},{"id":1003010175,"text":"Hold on, ♂㈱. Let's leave Pilika with Leona∠before we meet Viktor.◎1 She looks tired."},{"id":1003010176,"text":"Do you want to change party members?"},{"id":1003010177,"text":"Please."},{"id":1003010178,"text":"No, just trying to get your attention."},{"id":1003010179,"text":"Don't be such a child."},{"id":1003010180,"text":"Go on, get moving. And hurry back."},{"id":1003010182,"text":"Listen, Pilika...we'll be back soon, okay?"},{"id":1003010183,"text":"Hang in there."},{"id":1003010184,"text":"Be careful, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010185,"text":"You ready, ♂㈱? Hey, don't be so nervous."},{"id":1003010186,"text":"Hey ♂㈱, you're still too young to drink,∠you know."},{"id":1003010187,"text":"Tell them to hurry and decide. Those guys over in Tinto are∠always like this. As for the messenger, let's send...∠Fitcher. He's never let us down."},{"id":1003010188,"text":"Y-Yes, a-at once. As always, Lady Anabelle, your judgment∠is beyond reproach..."},{"id":1003010189,"text":"Spare me the brown-nosing and get to work. I don't have time∠for people whose mouths are faster than their feet."},{"id":1003010190,"text":"Y-Yes, ma'am!"},{"id":1003010191,"text":"Whew... Oh, there you are, Viktor."},{"id":1003010192,"text":"I've seen ya at work a hundred times, but ya still never∠cease to amaze me."},{"id":1003010193,"text":"Yeah, well. Anyway, is it true you lost your fort?"},{"id":1003010194,"text":"Yeah, I'm ashamed to say."},{"id":1003010195,"text":"Still...it certainly didn't take them long to break the∠cease-fire... Having Luca Blight at the helm of their army∠now is a real disaster.∨I'm starting to fear the fighting won't end until either∠we or Highland lay in ruins."},{"id":1003010196,"text":"The bastard's insane. He's a wolf that craves the scent of∠blood and fire. There'll be no negotiatin' with him."},{"id":1003010197,"text":"So, what brings you here today? I see you've got three kids∠in tow instead of your usual friend with the bandana."},{"id":1003010198,"text":"Yeah... So it's these three plus another little one∠named Pilika. Think you got room for four more?∨I'd keep 'em with me, but I never know when I'm gonna have∠to go join the fight..."},{"id":1003010201,"text":"True, you can't very well drag kids into battle with you...∠But wait..."},{"id":1003010202,"text":"Jowy... As in Jowy Atreides?"},{"id":1003010203,"text":"How do you know my name?"},{"id":1003010204,"text":"There's a country nobleman in Kyaro Town with a son by that∠name. Isn't that correct, Jess?"},{"id":1003010205,"text":"Yes, the older of two sons. He's currently a fugitive from∠Highland, charged with high treason."},{"id":1003010206,"text":"And then we have ♂㈱ and Nanami...∨♂㈱, was the man who raised you named∠Genkaku?"},{"id":1003010208,"text":"What? No way! How did you know? ∠How do you know about Grandpa Genkaku?"},{"id":1003010209,"text":"I heard once that Master Genkaku adopted two children.∠And that their names were ♂㈱ and Nanami..."},{"id":1003010210,"text":"\"Master\" Genkaku?"},{"id":1003010211,"text":"Wait, you don't mean..."},{"id":1003010212,"text":"Viktor... I'll tell them all about it when I'm ready.∠But until then...∨♂㈱, Nanami, is Master Genkaku in good health?"},{"id":1003010213,"text":"Grandpa Genkaku died the year before last..."},{"id":1003010214,"text":"I see... So we will never be able to atone for our sins,∠it seems..."},{"id":1003010215,"text":"Atone for your sins?"},{"id":1003010217,"text":"Yes, well... Let's speak of that when we have more time.∠Right now I've got the Highland Army to worry about.∨Jess, I'm leaving these three in your care."},{"id":1003010218,"text":"Let's speak of that when we have more time. Right now I've∠got the Highland Army to worry about.∨Jess, I'm leaving these three in your care."},{"id":1003010219,"text":"Understood, my lady."},{"id":1003010220,"text":"Well, see ya later. You kids go have a∠look around and come back when ya get tired.∠See ya."},{"id":1003010223,"text":"Well then, ♂㈱, Jowy, Nanami. Feel free to walk∠around the city hall. Okay, why don't we explore a little?"},{"id":1003010225,"text":"Explore... You're going to get us in trouble."},{"id":1003010226,"text":"Oh, whatever, don't worry. He said it's okay to walk around."},{"id":1003010227,"text":"But this is the only size we've got..."},{"id":1003010228,"text":"Are you serious? Will you hear me∠out?"},{"id":1003010232,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1003010233,"text":"The truth is, Luca Blight's army is camped near the∠Highland-Muse border. They're going to attack us next.∨I'd like to know how much provisions they have with∠them. As it happens, the uniforms we procured to sneak in∠are for the Youth Brigade...∨♂㈱, Jowy, you belonged to that very same unit,∠correct? As we don't have any way to get more uniforms,∠would you be willing to help us?"},{"id":1003010234,"text":"So, basically, you want us to sneak into the Highland Army∠camp and find out how much provisions they have...∠Correct?"},{"id":1003010235,"text":"What?! That sounds really dangerous!"},{"id":1003010236,"text":"W-Well, yes, a little... But figuring out how provisioned∠they are would be an enormous help for Muse.∨It would tell us whether they're planning a long siege or∠a quick, all-out attack."},{"id":1003010237,"text":"......∨What do you think, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1003010238,"text":"We're in."},{"id":1003010239,"text":"Sorry, but no way."},{"id":1003010240,"text":"It'll be okay. The Highland Army isn't expecting anything∠like this, and all you have to do is peek into their supply∠tent."},{"id":1003010241,"text":"If it's for Muse...no, if it's to defeat Luca...∠I think we should do it."},{"id":1003010242,"text":"I see. I won't force you, but if you change your mind,∠come back and speak to me."},{"id":1003010243,"text":"What? Viktor and Flik? They're out trying to assemble more∠soldiers since they got beaten so bad in the last battle."},{"id":1003010244,"text":"So? Can we count on you?"},{"id":1003010245,"text":"What?! B-But it's so dangerous..."},{"id":1003010246,"text":"Really?! Thank you. You're the pride of Muse."},{"id":1003010247,"text":"Hey."},{"id":1003010248,"text":"Here are the uniforms. I guess you know how to put them on.∠To get to the Highland border, follow the road to the∠northeast.∨I'll notify the guards at the checkpoint. Good luck."},{"id":1003010249,"text":"You acquired Highland Army Uniforms."},{"id":1003010250,"text":"Well, looks like I've got no choice. If things go south, you∠have to run for it right away, Jowy."},{"id":1003010253,"text":"♂㈱, we need more people than this. Let's stop∠by Leona's tavern before we go.∨Besides, I want to say goodbye to Pilika too."},{"id":1003010254,"text":"Well, look who's back. If you're looking for Viktor and∠Flik, they're out rounding up soldiers."},{"id":1003010255,"text":"Actually..."},{"id":1003010256,"text":"Hmmm... Don't you think that's a little reckless?"},{"id":1003010257,"text":"Even if it's just a little, we'd still like to do what we∠can to help out..."},{"id":1003010258,"text":"...Well, go try your best, I suppose.∨But remember, there is such a thing as trying too hard. ∠I want you to take some friends with you to∠the Highland camp."},{"id":1003010259,"text":"Thank you."},{"id":1003010260,"text":"Okay, good luck and come back safe. I'll tell Viktor and∠Flik when I see them."},{"id":1003010262,"text":"Pilika, ♂㈱ and I are going to go out for a∠little while. Don't worry, we'll be back soon."},{"id":1003010265,"text":"I'm not the best with kids, but I'll manage."},{"id":1003010266,"text":"♂㈱, let's stop by Leona's tavern first. I∠need to ask her to take care of Pilika."},{"id":1003010267,"text":"I think it will be okay..."},{"id":1003010268,"text":"You're right."},{"id":1003010269,"text":"Be a good girl and don't worry, okay?∨♂▼0Leona, thanks for watching her for me."},{"id":1003010270,"text":"Hold on, ♂㈱. I can understand you wanting to∠rest, but I think we should report to Jess first."},{"id":1003010271,"text":"Hey, not that way. You feelin' okay, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1003010272,"text":"♂㈱... You sure this is where you want to be?◎4∠...You should go to her."},{"id":1003010273,"text":"Don't worry... I'll look after this little one, so you go on∠and have some fun.∨You can get to Jowston Hill from the northwest part of town."},{"id":1003010274,"text":"Hey? Aren't we going to Jowston Hill? C'mon, let's go!∠Please."},{"id":1003010275,"text":"What's the matter, ♂㈱? Is there somewhere else∠you want to be?"},{"id":1003010276,"text":"First order of business—let's head over to Leona's and grab∠a drink."},{"id":1003010277,"text":"As usual, that's all you ever think about."},{"id":1003010278,"text":"Psh, you're one to talk."},{"id":1003010279,"text":"The Highland Army's vanguard is almost here, so it's∠too dangerous to leave town now. Please go back."},{"id":1003010280,"text":"The Highland Army is gathering just north of Muse."},{"id":1003010281,"text":"You want somethin' to drink?"},{"id":1003010283,"text":"Word to the wise. Haven't seen him since."},{"id":1003010288,"text":"So...Jowy never did catch up with us... What should we do?∠Go see Jess?"},{"id":1003010289,"text":"Well, both Jess and Anabelle are unavailable, so what next?∠Maybe Viktor and the others are here?"},{"id":1003010290,"text":"♂㈱. You guys okay? Leona told us what's∠going on. We've been very worried."},{"id":1003010291,"text":"Y-Yeah, we're fine. But Jowy..."},{"id":1003010292,"text":"Yeah, now that ya mention it, I don't see him. Where is he?"},{"id":1003010293,"text":"Well, you see..."},{"id":1003010294,"text":"What?! You tellin' me Jowy's been captured?"},{"id":1003010295,"text":"Huh? O-Oh, um, well...I'm not sure... Jowy said that he'd be∠right behind us and then..."},{"id":1003010296,"text":"Hey, scaring them isn't going to help anything. Let's go see∠Jess and get to the bottom of this.∨That moron! I can't believe he'd send ♂㈱ and∠Jowy off on such a dangerous mission..."},{"id":1003010297,"text":"Um, but Jess wasn't there and we weren't allowed in to see∠Anabelle..."},{"id":1003010298,"text":"Don't you worry. I know a good trick."},{"id":1003010299,"text":"What's your business here? Lady Anabelle is preparing for∠a meeting with..."},{"id":1003010300,"text":"E-Eek..."},{"id":1003010301,"text":"A \"good trick,\" huh?"},{"id":1003010302,"text":"There's no better way of dealin' with government officials.∠Anyway, let's go in."},{"id":1003010303,"text":"What is the meaning of this?!"},{"id":1003010304,"text":"Ah, Viktor and Flik. Why are you so flustered?"},{"id":1003010305,"text":"Hey! You! Is it true that you sent ♂㈱ and∠Jowy to sneak into the Highland camp?!"},{"id":1003010306,"text":"H-Hold on, now. There's no need to get angry..."},{"id":1003010307,"text":"Yes, I asked them to do it. Now, please let go of me."},{"id":1003010308,"text":"Anabelle, I don't know you that well, but is Jowston really∠so desperate that we have to stoop to using children as∠spies?"},{"id":1003010309,"text":"Jess..."},{"id":1003010310,"text":"I asked them because knowing how much provisions the∠Highland Army has will play a crucial role in our strategy∠to defeat them.∨Speaking of which, ♂㈱, how much provisions∠did they have?"},{"id":1003010311,"text":"About two weeks' worth..."},{"id":1003010313,"text":"You! Is that all you care about..."},{"id":1003010314,"text":"But what really matters is Jowy... He..."},{"id":1003010315,"text":"You said about 2 weeks, right, ♂㈱?∨But what really matters is Jowy... He..."},{"id":1003010316,"text":"He's been captured by Highland. Well, I don't know if he∠was captured, but he didn't come back.∨So please, please save Jowy..."},{"id":1003010317,"text":"♂㈱, Nanami, we thank you for obtaining this∠vital information for us. Furthermore, we apologize for∠putting you in such danger.∨But I'm afraid we can't save Jowy. We have our hands full∠just protecting the city as it is. Forgive us."},{"id":1003010318,"text":"But, but..."},{"id":1003010319,"text":"♂㈱, Nanami... Standing around talking like∠this isn't going to bring Jowy back safe."},{"id":1003010320,"text":"Two weeks means they're planning a swift assault.∠Now we can plan our strategy at the Hilltop Conference. ∠Thank you, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010321,"text":"Why you!"},{"id":1003010322,"text":"P-Please, no violence! No violence!"},{"id":1003010323,"text":"How dare you, mercenary! We needed information to save∠Muse! Besides, it's their fault that Lady Anabelle is∠suffering..."},{"id":1003010324,"text":"What'd you say?!"},{"id":1003010325,"text":"Stop it, Jess!"},{"id":1003010326,"text":"Enough, Viktor. I guess mercs like us don't have any say in∠what goes on here. Let's get out of here."},{"id":1003010327,"text":"Dammit!"},{"id":1003010328,"text":"I'm sorry, ♂㈱. If only we'd been there..."},{"id":1003010329,"text":"I wonder if Jowy's okay... No, I'm sure he's fine. He'll∠come back."},{"id":1003010330,"text":"It's Jowy. He'll be fine."},{"id":1003010331,"text":"I'm not so sure..."},{"id":1003010332,"text":"You're right. Well, I'm going to wait for him out by the∠gate."},{"id":1003010333,"text":"Yeah... But he'll be fine.∨Okay, I'm going to wait for him out by the gate."},{"id":1003010335,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. *sigh* Jowy's not back yet.∨I'm going to wait a little longer for him, so why don't you∠go back to Leona's and get some rest. It'll seem faster that way... Or maybe∠not, huh..."},{"id":1003010339,"text":"It's getting late... ♂㈱, you should go wait at∠Leona's."},{"id":1003010341,"text":"Pilika?"},{"id":1003010342,"text":"*pant* *pant* *pant*"},{"id":1003010343,"text":"A-Are you okay, Pilika?"},{"id":1003010344,"text":"Waaah..."},{"id":1003010345,"text":"It'll be okay, honey. Jowy will come back."},{"id":1003010347,"text":"...Would you wait in my place?"},{"id":1003010349,"text":"Yeah, good idea, ♂㈱. When Jowy comes back∠we'll tell you right away."},{"id":1003010350,"text":"He'll come back. He promised..."},{"id":1003010352,"text":"Hey, remember the time you got lost in Lude Woods?∨Jowy and I waited just like this while Grandpa Genkaku was∠out looking for you.∨You made it back safe, and I just know Jowy will too."},{"id":1003010353,"text":"I think you should wait at Leona's after all. You'll catch∠a cold."},{"id":1003010355,"text":"Why won't you ever listen to what your big sister tells∠you?∨.........∨I guess we can wait a little longer."},{"id":1003010356,"text":"Well, to finish the story...∨While we were waiting for you just like this, guess what∠Jowy did, haha. He cried the whole time.∨Can you believe it?∠Our Jowy, bawling just like a little baby.∨Oh, and this conversation is our little secret, okay?∠I promised Jowy I would never tell a soul."},{"id":1003010357,"text":"ZZZZZZZZZ........."},{"id":1003010358,"text":"Looks like Pilika was pretty tired.∨Jowy sure is taking his time."},{"id":1003010359,"text":"Hey ♂㈱... You know what I think? When Jowy∠gets back, let's go far away from here..."},{"id":1003010360,"text":"Ah!"},{"id":1003010361,"text":"Hey! Omigosh! Look! Over there! Is that Jowy? Let's go,∠♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1003010362,"text":"...!!!"},{"id":1003010363,"text":"♂㈱, Nanami...∨You waited for me?"},{"id":1003010364,"text":"You came back! You really came back!!!"},{"id":1003010365,"text":"♂㈱, Nanami... I kept my promise."},{"id":1003010366,"text":"Welcome home."},{"id":1003010367,"text":"I was getting sick of waiting."},{"id":1003010368,"text":"Thanks, ♂㈱. It's nice having people who will∠wait for you..."},{"id":1003010369,"text":"Sorry... You must have been worried."},{"id":1003010371,"text":"Oh, Pilika, you waited too? Thanks..."},{"id":1003010372,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱, like I said, everything's gonna be∠okay. Anyway, you must be tired. Go on and get some rest."},{"id":1003010373,"text":"♂㈱, you still waiting up? You should get some∠rest like Viktor suggested."},{"id":1003010374,"text":"I understand how you feel... Waiting is hard work.∨But you know what? It's better to just think that he's∠alive and fine out there. Things usually work out in the∠end, you'll see.∨So yeah, he'll come back..."},{"id":1003010375,"text":"♂㈱! ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1003010376,"text":"Hey! There he is! He's back! He came back like he said!!!"},{"id":1003010377,"text":"Hey, don't get so excited..."},{"id":1003010378,"text":"!!!"},{"id":1003010379,"text":"I'm back. I came back like I promised..."},{"id":1003010381,"text":"Thanks...♂㈱."},{"id":1003010382,"text":"I was getting sick of waiting."},{"id":1003010383,"text":"Sorry... You must have been worried."},{"id":1003010384,"text":"See, what'd I tell you? I knew it would be okay."},{"id":1003010385,"text":"There's an important meeting today, so you can't enter."},{"id":1003010386,"text":"Hey, scaring them isn't going to help anything. ♂▼0Let's go∠see Jess and get to the bottom of this."},{"id":1003010387,"text":"I asked them because knowing how much provisions the∠Highland Army has will play a crucial role in our strategy∠to defeat them.∨♂▼0Speaking of which, ♂㈱, how much provisions∠did they have?"},{"id":1003010388,"text":"It looks like now is a bad time, so let's come back this∠evening."},{"id":1003010389,"text":"Huh? A wooden amulet?∨Oh yeah... You must mean this. Thing is, it's not for sale.∠See, a customer left it as collateral a few months ago.∨But business is business, so if you really want it I'll∠sell it to you...∨How does 500 potch sound?"},{"id":1003010390,"text":"500 potch?!"},{"id":1003010391,"text":"Well if ya don't want it, fine."},{"id":1003010392,"text":"500 potch... What should we do, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1003010393,"text":"Let's forget about it."},{"id":1003010394,"text":"Let's go earn some money."},{"id":1003010395,"text":"Wait a minute, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010396,"text":"This signet ring... How much will you give me for it?"},{"id":1003010397,"text":"Hm? Lessee here... Wow! This is pretty valuable! I'll buy it∠for 2,000 potch."},{"id":1003010398,"text":"Give us the wooden amulet and we'll call it even."},{"id":1003010399,"text":"Sure thing. Why, I'd almost be willing to throw in some∠freebies. Anyhow, here's the amulet.∨Say, do you know someone from Highland? This seal is∠in that style. Did it belong to some nobleman?"},{"id":1003010400,"text":"No... Let's go ♂㈱. Pilika is waiting for us."},{"id":1003010402,"text":"I'll pay, of course."},{"id":1003010404,"text":"Thanks a lot. I'll pay you back sometime."},{"id":1003010405,"text":"Okay. But I don't know why anyone would want this thing."},{"id":1003010406,"text":"I see...∨Can you wait a minute, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1003010409,"text":"Then I'll use that to pay for the wooden amulet."},{"id":1003010410,"text":"Sure thing. Anyhow, here's the amulet and your change,∠1,500 potch.∨Say, do you know someone from Highland? This seal is∠in that style. Did it belong to some nobleman?"},{"id":1003010412,"text":"Hey! How long are you two gonna sleep?"},{"id":1003010413,"text":"Oh, Nanami... Just a little longer... You know how much I∠hate...mornings..."},{"id":1003010414,"text":"Ugh... Look, I know you went through some tough times,∠but it's already been a week. Snap out of it!"},{"id":1003010415,"text":"C'mon, up and at 'em. Let's go."},{"id":1003010416,"text":"Let's go? Where to?"},{"id":1003010417,"text":"Something's about to start on Jowston Hill.∨People are coming in from all over the place. Maybe it's∠some kind of festival. Now, c'mon, let's go have a look."},{"id":1003010418,"text":"Alright, alright... Shall we go, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1003010419,"text":"Oh, you here to watch too?"},{"id":1003010420,"text":"Viktor, what is all this?"},{"id":1003010421,"text":"Why, it's a meetin' of the bigwigs of the City-States of∠Jowston. This is Jowston Hill, so they call it the Hilltop∠Conference.∨Leaders of the five city-states and the knightdom will be∠here, so you got Muse, South Window, Greenhill, the Matilda∠Knights, and... ∨Ah, I forget. Anyway, there's gonna be some∠real interesting stuff goin' on inside."},{"id":1003010422,"text":"Interesting?"},{"id":1003010423,"text":"Look, don't sweat it. You can get in if you stick with me.∠Trust me, you won't wanna miss this. You'll be tellin' your∠grandkids about it years from now."},{"id":1003010424,"text":"Only participants are allowed beyond this point."},{"id":1003010425,"text":"I'm Viktor, mercenary captain under contract with Muse City.∠The others are with me. Let us in."},{"id":1003010426,"text":"Just a moment. Please show me some proof of identity."},{"id":1003010427,"text":"Hey, you don't recognize my face? My face is my proof of∠identity."},{"id":1003010428,"text":"Sorry, sir, but I cannot let you in."},{"id":1003010429,"text":"Oh, of all the..."},{"id":1003010430,"text":"Hope you aren't planning to use your \"good trick\" again."},{"id":1003010431,"text":"Who the...?"},{"id":1003010432,"text":"Oh! M-Might... Might you be Sir Flik?"},{"id":1003010433,"text":"Huh? I am, but..."},{"id":1003010434,"text":"Y-You're the mercenary... Th-The one they call \"Blue Lightning∠Flik\"..."},{"id":1003010436,"text":"P-Please, go right inside."},{"id":1003010437,"text":"Hey, how come everyone recognizes you and not me?"},{"id":1003010438,"text":"How should I know?"},{"id":1003010439,"text":"The Mayor of Muse City, Lady Anabelle!"},{"id":1003010440,"text":"We can watch from over there."},{"id":1003010441,"text":"Out of the way, girl!"},{"id":1003010442,"text":"Jerk! What the heck?!"},{"id":1003010443,"text":"Pardon us, my lady. I believe he was but overeager to begin∠the proceedings. May we have your forgiveness?"},{"id":1003010444,"text":"Oh, uh, well..."},{"id":1003010445,"text":"What are you doing, Camus?"},{"id":1003010446,"text":"Simply what my status as a knight requires of me."},{"id":1003010447,"text":"Um, ah... I-It's okay."},{"id":1003010448,"text":"Wonderful. Now then, if you'll excuse us."},{"id":1003010449,"text":"Let's hurry, Camus. It's also a knight's duty to be on time."},{"id":1003010450,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱, Jowy, did you hear that? ∠He called me \"lady\"!"},{"id":1003010452,"text":"Leader of the Matilda Knights and the White Knights, Lord∠Gordeau!"},{"id":1003010453,"text":"Hey, enough goofing around. Let's take our seats."},{"id":1003010454,"text":"Ambassador plenipotentiary of Two River City, Lord Makai!"},{"id":1003010455,"text":"Acting mayor of Greenhill City, Lady Teresa!"},{"id":1003010456,"text":"Mayor of Tinto City, Lord Gustav!"},{"id":1003010457,"text":"Mayor of South Window City, Lord Granmeyer!"},{"id":1003010458,"text":"Commander of the Muse City Army, Lord Hauser!"},{"id":1003010459,"text":"In accordance with the Jowston Covenant, I hereby convene∠the Hilltop Conference."},{"id":1003010460,"text":"The Highland Army is amassed at our border. They have only∠two weeks provisions with them. We believe they'll attack∠soon."},{"id":1003010461,"text":"Just a moment. Are they not still in compliance with∠the cease-fire agreement?"},{"id":1003010462,"text":"The Highland Army has already invaded the eastern part of∠Muse and burned several villages to the ground along the∠way."},{"id":1003010463,"text":"Yes, and wasn't Highland's response that it was ∠\"the work of mountain bandits\"?"},{"id":1003010464,"text":"I cannot believe that Viktor's mercenary forces could be∠crushed by mere bandits."},{"id":1003010465,"text":"It is an undeniable fact that the Highland Army is gathering∠at the border, and that this represents a threat to the∠City-States."},{"id":1003010466,"text":"The Highland Army has approached the border before and∠they've never truly attacked. Why should this be any∠different?"},{"id":1003010467,"text":"Command of the Highland Army has passed from Agares∠Blight to his son, Prince Luca. That's why things are∠different."},{"id":1003010468,"text":"Ha, for someone who has not paid her contributions to the∠alliance for the past three years, you certainly know∠how to offer your opinion."},{"id":1003010469,"text":"I..."},{"id":1003010470,"text":"It is just as Lord Gustav said. They'll run at the first∠sign of battle. I'm certainly not going to muster my∠knights for this."},{"id":1003010471,"text":"The people of Two River are also weary from the long war..."},{"id":1003010472,"text":"Luca Blight is more demon than man. If he breaks through∠Muse's defenses, we'll all be cut off from each other.∨As leader of this alliance, I order you to hold true to your∠oaths and provide troops to protect Muse City, capital of∠the City-States of Jowston."},{"id":1003010473,"text":"There is no reason to fear. After all, what good is it if∠I protect Muse and my people, the people of Tinto, starve?"},{"id":1003010474,"text":"This is an order in the name of the alliance. You should∠watch how you speak, Lord Gustav."},{"id":1003010475,"text":"Pardon the intrusion."},{"id":1003010476,"text":"I have urgent news. The Highland Army has begun to advance.∠They've already wiped out our border guards and are likely∠headed here, to Muse City."},{"id":1003010477,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1003010478,"text":"I still say they will turn back."},{"id":1003010479,"text":"You all heard that. I hereby order you to assemble your∠armies."},{"id":1003010480,"text":"Hmph..."},{"id":1003010481,"text":"Okay, let's head back."},{"id":1003010482,"text":"So how about it? Pretty interesting, huh?"},{"id":1003010483,"text":"You think so? Looked like just a bunch of old grumps arguing∠to me."},{"id":1003010484,"text":"Wahahahahaha! Well, ya definitely got that part right.∨Man, all that sittin' around really wears a guy out.∠Let's head back to Leona's place."},{"id":1003010486,"text":"Hey, what a surprise. I saw the meeting. As usual, it looks∠like it was rough going."},{"id":1003010487,"text":"Yeah, well, it's all part of the job. Nobody's giving their∠cooperation, but nobody wants to get destroyed by Highland∠either."},{"id":1003010488,"text":"So, what is it? You didn't come here to make small talk."},{"id":1003010489,"text":"Viktor, I need you to slow down the Highland Army∠somehow. It will take seven days to assemble forces from∠the rest of the alliance.∨But the Highland Army will arrive here in five days. ∠All we need is two days. I need you to buy us that time."},{"id":1003010490,"text":"Two days... If we battle outside Muse and maybe bloody their∠noses a little, it should be possible."},{"id":1003010491,"text":"You never change. You ask for crazy things like they're∠nothing. Takin' on Luca Blight with only what we have here∠is a pretty tall order."},{"id":1003010492,"text":"I'm counting on you, Viktor. Also, we're expecting∠reinforcements from the Matilda Knights to arrive early."},{"id":1003010493,"text":"Well, if we're only trying to slow them down, we should be∠able to manage."},{"id":1003010494,"text":"Thanks, handsome."},{"id":1003010495,"text":"Okay, alright, I get it. But, well, this is my line of work∠after all, and it's not like I could ever say no to you."},{"id":1003010497,"text":"Um... Please let us fight with you."},{"id":1003010498,"text":"Jowy, ♂㈱... It was wrong of me to get you∠guys involved in this whole mess. Forgive me.∨You don't need to do any more than you already have.∠This is a problem for us adults."},{"id":1003010499,"text":"No...we want to fight. We'll help you slow down the∠Highland Army.∠♂㈱, you'll fight too, won't you?"},{"id":1003010500,"text":"Of course."},{"id":1003010501,"text":"Well, I..."},{"id":1003010502,"text":"♂㈱, please."},{"id":1003010503,"text":"Join the fight,∠♂㈱...∠That Luca Blight, I need to..."},{"id":1003010504,"text":"Please, ♂㈱... I have to make sure..."},{"id":1003010505,"text":"...Okay."},{"id":1003010506,"text":"♂㈱, Jowy, Nanami... Don't die out there.∨Come see me once the battle's over. I'll tell you about∠Master Genkaku."},{"id":1003010507,"text":"Huh? Oh, y-yes!"},{"id":1003010508,"text":"Well, I've got to get back. Viktor, do a good job for us.∠I know you will."},{"id":1003010509,"text":"Yeah, you can count on us."},{"id":1003010510,"text":"Hey! C'mon, wake up, you guys! Everyone's gathered outside."},{"id":1003010511,"text":"I'm already awake, Nanami. Or more like, I couldn't sleep..."},{"id":1003010512,"text":"Highland's advance forces are almost here. Beat them, ∠and we'll have done our job."},{"id":1003010513,"text":"Our role isn't to defeat the entire Highland Army. All we∠gotta do is slow 'em down for a couple o' days.∨But remember, if we don't protect Muse and the city falls∠to Highland, it's all over. So give it all you've got!"},{"id":1003010514,"text":"Everyone, ready yourselves for battle. We'll take the field∠once preparations are complete."},{"id":1003010516,"text":"You don't have to worry, Pilika. We'll come back safe and∠sound."},{"id":1003010517,"text":"Hey, are you guys ready?"},{"id":1003010518,"text":"Yes."},{"id":1003010519,"text":"Not yet."},{"id":1003010520,"text":"Good, I think we're all set."},{"id":1003010521,"text":"Okay, but don't forget anything. And get something to eat."},{"id":1003010522,"text":"Good job, everyone. Now go get some rest."},{"id":1003010523,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱... Can I tell you something?"},{"id":1003010524,"text":"Sure."},{"id":1003010525,"text":"I'm kind of tired."},{"id":1003010526,"text":"Thanks."},{"id":1003010527,"text":"You know, ♂㈱...∨About this battle..."},{"id":1003010528,"text":"No...forget about it. We have no choice but to fight, ∠I guess... This is about protecting our own lives too.∨Goodnight, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010529,"text":"Oh, I see...∨Yeah, it's been a long day, hasn't it?∨Well, goodnight...♂㈱."},{"id":1003010530,"text":"...Tell it to them just as I said."},{"id":1003010531,"text":"Understood. And with that, I bid you farewell."},{"id":1003010532,"text":"...?"},{"id":1003010533,"text":"Oh, Pilika.∨Don't worry... It was just the wind."},{"id":1003010535,"text":"Okay, Pilika, back to sleep with you."},{"id":1003010536,"text":"I...I hope I'm taking the right path..."},{"id":1003010537,"text":"Hey, it's morning! Everyone's waiting downstairs."},{"id":1003010538,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010539,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱ and Jowy, you're both awake."},{"id":1003010540,"text":"I'm here too."},{"id":1003010541,"text":"Oh yeah, sorry. You're goin' to see Anabelle today, right?∠Make sure to tell her how great I was out there."},{"id":1003010542,"text":"How great who was out there?"},{"id":1003010543,"text":"Hahahahaha, she's got you there. Anyway, don't go leaving∠the city. The Highland Army is bearing down on us."},{"id":1003010544,"text":"Okay, let's go, ♂㈱. Don't you want to hear∠about Master Genkaku?"},{"id":1003010545,"text":"Anabelle... I wonder what she knows about Grandpa∠Genkaku."},{"id":1003010546,"text":"Lord Gustav, are you saying that Tinto City will not∠cooperate?"},{"id":1003010547,"text":"That's not what I'm saying at all. What I mean is that until∠we know what the Highland Army is really after, I'm not∠going to commit my troops."},{"id":1003010548,"text":"I think their intentions are clear.
