Perhaps you're just∠frightened?"},{"id":1003010550,"text":"You're a fool. War isn't a game of chance..."},{"id":1003010551,"text":"Stop it, the both of you. This is pathetic."},{"id":1003010552,"text":"In any case, we're not ready to commit troops. That's my∠decision."},{"id":1003010553,"text":"Whew..."},{"id":1003010554,"text":"Forgive me, ♂㈱, Nanami. As you can see, ∠we're in the middle of negotiations. ∠Could you come back this evening?"},{"id":1003010555,"text":"Yes, of course. Let's go, ♂㈱, Jowy."},{"id":1003010556,"text":"Lady Anabelle... Um...may I ask you something?"},{"id":1003010557,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1003010558,"text":"Why do you fight? What do you hope to gain from this war?"},{"id":1003010559,"text":"I gain nothing from it. I simply fight so we won't lose.∨I was born and raised in Muse. It's natural that∠I want to protect my home."},{"id":1003010561,"text":"Wow, they're really going at it...∠Anyway, she's busy, so let's head back."},{"id":1003010562,"text":"That was fast. Did you not get to see Anabelle?"},{"id":1003010563,"text":"We saw her, but she told us to come back at night. She was∠really busy. It looked like she was arguing about something."},{"id":1003010564,"text":"Yeah... I guess that makes sense. None of them have seen∠with their own eyes just how scary Luca Blight is."},{"id":1003010565,"text":"...?"},{"id":1003010566,"text":"Sorry, Pilika. Nanami, could you watch her for a little∠while?"},{"id":1003010567,"text":"Huh? Me? Sure...but what's up?"},{"id":1003010569,"text":"Over here, Pilika. Come play with me."},{"id":1003010570,"text":"I'm sorry, Pilika..."},{"id":1003010571,"text":"♂㈱... There's still time before evening. ∠Why don't you get some rest?"},{"id":1003010572,"text":"Actually...I'm kind of worried about Jowy."},{"id":1003010573,"text":"Yeah... Good idea."},{"id":1003010574,"text":"I know... Oh, Jowy... I wonder what's bothering him."},{"id":1003010575,"text":"Oh, Jowy... I wonder what's on his mind..."},{"id":1003010577,"text":"It's okay, Pilika. Listen... Jowy isn't mad at you, okay?∨Everything is fine... Don't you worry."},{"id":1003010579,"text":"...Farewell."},{"id":1003010582,"text":"What are you doing?"},{"id":1003010583,"text":"Who was that person?"},{"id":1003010584,"text":"Oh yeah..."},{"id":1003010585,"text":"Sorry, ♂㈱...but I can't say right now..."},{"id":1003010586,"text":"♂㈱... This war isn't going to end for a very∠long time. You and Nanami would be better off running far∠away..."},{"id":1003010587,"text":"And what about you?"},{"id":1003010588,"text":"I know..."},{"id":1003010590,"text":"If... If I were ever to be killed...I want you to take care∠of Pilika."},{"id":1003010591,"text":"Another thing... I don't want either of you to feel sad..."},{"id":1003010592,"text":"Who is it? You got some nerve to come knocking at this hour."},{"id":1003010593,"text":"Hey there, you still up?"},{"id":1003010594,"text":"I don't have the luxury of going to sleep early, unlike you."},{"id":1003010595,"text":"In that case, what say we have a little drink?"},{"id":1003010596,"text":"Hehe, why not?"},{"id":1003010597,"text":"I think you'll like this. It's from Kanakan to the south.∠I saved it just to drink with you.∨Well, truth be told, this one bottle was all I managed to∠carry out with me when my fort burned down."},{"id":1003010598,"text":"Mm, I like the aroma."},{"id":1003010599,"text":"So, how is it?"},{"id":1003010600,"text":"Would you quit staring at me? It feels like you're reading∠my mind or something."},{"id":1003010601,"text":"Sorry. It's a bad habit of mine."},{"id":1003010602,"text":"Yes, it is."},{"id":1003010603,"text":"...You're a tough one."},{"id":1003010604,"text":"Whew...∨The people of this city are sleeping peacefully now.∠But the flames of war will be here soon.∨Even if we gather troops from all the city-states, I have to∠wonder what our chances will be when we come face-to-face∠with Luca Blight's forces..."},{"id":1003010605,"text":"Eh, I'd put 'em at about fifty-fifty, I guess."},{"id":1003010606,"text":"I...I mean...\"we\" can't afford to lose. If we do, we lose∠everything, all of those lives...∨Just the thought of it makes me so sad that, sometimes,∠I even find myself thinking it'd be best to surrender∠quietly..."},{"id":1003010607,"text":"A leader can't think that way. Everyone's fightin' as hard∠as they can. They all have somethin' they want to defend.∠You do too.∨Even if it's in the interest of survival, there are some∠things you just don't do. At least that's the way I see it."},{"id":1003010608,"text":"Tomorrow is going to need all your strength.∠After this drink, you should go to bed. ∠Lack of sleep dulls the mind, ya know."},{"id":1003010609,"text":"Heh, if I was born in a different time, a different place,∨and if I was a little shorter, I might have made a good∠girlfriend for you, huh?"},{"id":1003010610,"text":"Hahaha, well, you're just fine the way you are if ya ask∠me. I ain't a good match for you, though."},{"id":1003010611,"text":"You're a bigshot now. Me? You don't wanna be seen∠with the likes of me. Anyway, catch ya tomorrow."},{"id":1003010612,"text":"Welcome back, ♂㈱.∠We've been waiting for you.∠I think it's about time we go see Anabelle."},{"id":1003010614,"text":"What is it, Pilika? Huh? What? Oh, Jowy? That is strange...∠I don't see him anywhere."},{"id":1003010615,"text":"But don't you worry. He's always come home before like he∠promised, right?∨Besides, ♂㈱ and I will be back soon too, so be∠a good girl while we're gone, okay?"},{"id":1003010616,"text":"...Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010617,"text":"Um, we came to see Lady Anabelle."},{"id":1003010618,"text":"Yes, I heard. Lady Anabelle is in her private room down the∠hall.∨Your friend is already back there."},{"id":1003010619,"text":"Our friend?"},{"id":1003010620,"text":"Is that you, ♂㈱? Come in."},{"id":1003010621,"text":"Excuse me, Lady Anabelle. May I speak with you?"},{"id":1003010622,"text":"Of course... But what do you want at this hour, Jowy?"},{"id":1003010623,"text":"Your life... I've come to take it."},{"id":1003010624,"text":"You're not joking, are you?"},{"id":1003010625,"text":"Please. Don't scream."},{"id":1003010626,"text":"I don't want to believe you mean it, but..."},{"id":1003010627,"text":"Forgive me."},{"id":1003010628,"text":"Safeguard Muse and all the city-states...and in doing so∠allow the people here to lead rich, full lives... ∠That has been my mission.∨Do you have something like that?∠Something you're willing to do no matter the cost?"},{"id":1003010629,"text":"Yes... I also have something I must do."},{"id":1003010630,"text":"Can you bear the burden, Jowy? Do you really have the∠resolve to see it through?"},{"id":1003010631,"text":"Yes, I have a reason to bear that burden...and I will."},{"id":1003010632,"text":".........∨Even if I call for help, I suppose there's no stopping that∠knife, is there?"},{"id":1003010633,"text":"Well, will you at least let me finish this glass?∨It's from a close friend... It would be a shame to waste it."},{"id":1003010634,"text":"...I'm sorry."},{"id":1003010635,"text":"You dropped your guard, boy!"},{"id":1003010636,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1003010637,"text":"Ah! Wait, what? No! What happened?! A-Anabelle is..."},{"id":1003010638,"text":"Jowy! What happened here?!"},{"id":1003010639,"text":"Jowy... Tell me you didn't..."},{"id":1003010640,"text":"Forgive me...♂㈱."},{"id":1003010641,"text":"W-Wait! Jowy..."},{"id":1003010642,"text":"U-Unh..."},{"id":1003010643,"text":"Lady Anabelle! The Highland Army has launched a surprise∠attack in the night! Lady Anabelle!!!∨What the...?"},{"id":1003010644,"text":"You! What have you done?! What the hell have you done?!∠Explain yourselves!"},{"id":1003010645,"text":"Chamberlain Jess, the Highland Army has entered the city!"},{"id":1003010646,"text":"What?! How did they manage to so quickly?!"},{"id":1003010647,"text":"The gates were opened from the inside. Someone must be∠working with them!"},{"id":1003010648,"text":"Wh-What?! Okay, ♂㈱, just stay where you are.∨Hey! Someone call a doctor!!!"},{"id":1003010650,"text":"Try not to talk."},{"id":1003010651,"text":"Lady Anabelle, are you okay?"},{"id":1003010652,"text":"Tell Jess...I don't need...a doctor...∨♂㈱...Genkaku's child... I-I meant to...∠apologize...to you...∨Apologize for what...Jowston...and my father...did to...∠Master Genkaku..."},{"id":1003010653,"text":"Lady A-Anabelle... You mustn't speak..."},{"id":1003010654,"text":"♂㈱... Nanami... W-Were you...were you∠happy...with your life with Genkaku?"},{"id":1003010655,"text":"Yes..."},{"id":1003010656,"text":"Why do you ask?"},{"id":1003010657,"text":"Y-Yes, of course we were..."},{"id":1003010658,"text":"Is that so... Th-Then at least...I can rest...a little∠easier...∨Hurry... Hurry and escape... The Highland Army... ∠They'll come here first... H-Hurry..."},{"id":1003010659,"text":"B-But..."},{"id":1003010660,"text":"I have...a last request... Don't die...♂㈱...∠You too...Nanami...∨Live...∨N-Now hurry... You must run!!!"},{"id":1003010661,"text":"............∨Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010662,"text":"♂㈱... I think...it was...fate...fate that...∠sent...you...here..."},{"id":1003010663,"text":"♂㈱!!! Run for it!!!"},{"id":1003010664,"text":"Oh right! Pilika! We have to save Pilika!!!"},{"id":1003010665,"text":"Wait! We have to save Pilika first!"},{"id":1003010666,"text":"Viktor and Flik went to gather some forces to buy us a∠little time.∨We're all going to rendezvous in South Window later. ∠I'm leaving right away, and you should too.∨If you head south you'll reach the town of Coronet, and from∠there you can take a boat straight to South Window.∨Well, what are you waiting for? Go on and get running!"},{"id":1003010667,"text":"Y-Yes, ma'am!"},{"id":1003010668,"text":"Whew... If we made it this far we should be fine.∨How many times have we run like this now?"},{"id":1003010670,"text":"Wait, Pilika! We can't go back!"},{"id":1003010671,"text":"W-Waaah..."},{"id":1003010672,"text":"It's okay... It's okay, Pilika honey... Jowy will be fine.∠We just can't go back..."},{"id":1003010673,"text":"Pilika... She finally fell asleep.∨.........∨Hey, ♂㈱...∨Is it true? Did Jowy really...kill Anabelle?"},{"id":1003010674,"text":"......∨...Nah, he would never do such a thing."},{"id":1003010675,"text":"Hey, so what are we going to do now?∨Oh, I know. How about we go someplace far away from war?∨Deep in the mountains where we could hunt∠or something.∨Plus have a little farm,∠and the three of us could make it work..."},{"id":1003010676,"text":"That would be nice..."},{"id":1003010677,"text":"I can't."},{"id":1003010678,"text":"Wouldn't it? Wouldn't it?"},{"id":1003010679,"text":"...No.∨I'm sorry... It's impossible, isn't it?∠We can't abandon Jowy...∨Ah, I'm so tired... I'm going to sleep."},{"id":1003010680,"text":"You're right...∨It's impossible, isn't it?∠We can't abandon Jowy...∨Sorry...∨Ah, I'm so tired... I'm going to sleep."},{"id":1003010681,"text":"Goodnight, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010682,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱. Leona... She said to go to∠Coronet, right?"},{"id":1003010684,"text":"Good morning, Pilika. We'll go after you wash your face."},{"id":1003010685,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱, you go wash your face in the stream∠too."},{"id":1003010686,"text":"Bwahahahahahaha, look at how beautiful it is! Watch their∠filthy souls get sucked into oblivion!"},{"id":1003010688,"text":"What's wrong? Don't you feel the same?∨Weren't you also born without any legitimate blood from∠your father?"},{"id":1003010689,"text":"Why do you know..."},{"id":1003010690,"text":"Because you interest me. Your eyes are different from the∠eyes of those other pigs.∨Hatred courses just beneath the surface of my skin,∠and I can sense a bit of the same in you."},{"id":1003010691,"text":"But I...∨I am grateful to my father for taking me in."},{"id":1003010692,"text":"Bwahahahahahahaha! Sacrifice their souls!∠Unleash the beast of hatred!∨Cleanse this foul land!!!"},{"id":1003010694,"text":"I know it took us some time, but...∠...There's no sign of life here."},{"id":1003010695,"text":"A-Ahh! H-Help me..."},{"id":1003010696,"text":"Stop! Wait, who the hell are you?!"},{"id":1003010697,"text":"We have no names to offer to the likes of you!"},{"id":1003010698,"text":"Oh, think you're clever, huh! Seize them!!!"},{"id":1003010699,"text":"D-Damn, who are these guys?!"},{"id":1003010700,"text":"Are you okay? What happened here?"},{"id":1003010701,"text":"A m-monster... A silver monster. I-It ate everyone alive...∠M-My wife... My kids... Father... Mother...∨All of them...taken. All of them...eaten...alive..."},{"id":1003010702,"text":"Hey, hey! Stay with us...∨Damn! Luca Blight! You bastard! I cannot allow this villainy∠to go unpunished!!!"},{"id":1003010703,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'm going back to Rockaxe. ∠I'll send those Highlanders back where they came from!"},{"id":1003010704,"text":"There they are!"},{"id":1003010705,"text":"Hurry! We mustn't be captured!"},{"id":1003010706,"text":"Oh, hey, it's ♂㈱! Long time no see. How have∠you been? I heard that the fort burned down..."},{"id":1003010707,"text":"I'm fine."},{"id":1003010708,"text":"It was horrible."},{"id":1003010709,"text":"Thank goodness. It looks like Captain Gengen is okay too."},{"id":1003010710,"text":"Are you hurt anywhere? I can ask Dr. Huan and he'll fix it∠for you right away."},{"id":1003010711,"text":"♂㈱. I heard everything. It must have been∠terrible."},{"id":1003010712,"text":"Tuta, listen to me. There's going to be another big war.∠Though this is part of our calling as doctors, it will not∠be easy."},{"id":1003010713,"text":"I understand, Dr. Huan."},{"id":1003010714,"text":"Tuta, go to Viktor and help him out."},{"id":1003010715,"text":"Huh, but I'm still just a..."},{"id":1003010716,"text":"It's all right. You simply need a little more experience.∠Good luck."},{"id":1003010718,"text":"♂㈱. Please look after Tuta."},{"id":1003010719,"text":"Okay, I'll be over at Leona's place."},{"id":1003010720,"text":"Hey you. Sorry, but could you spare a dose of antitoxin?"},{"id":1003010721,"text":"Sure."},{"id":1003010722,"text":"No way."},{"id":1003010723,"text":"Talk about cold-hearted. Oh well."},{"id":1003010724,"text":"I was bitten by a spider outside. I'd be okay if I could get∠to an item store, but I'm feeling feverish.∨Times like this remind me just how hard it is to travel all∠on my lonesome."},{"id":1003010725,"text":"Huh? What's wrong? You don't have any? I see, well thanks∠anyway. I appreciate the thought."},{"id":1003010726,"text":"Oh dear, my glass is empty. Sorry, but could you pour∠me a cup?"},{"id":1003010727,"text":"Don't let me down, okay?"},{"id":1003010728,"text":"Wine? Sure, but ♂㈱, just so we're clear, this∠isn't for you, right?"},{"id":1003010729,"text":"Thanks. It's important for a man to be kind, heheh..."},{"id":1003010730,"text":"What's the matter? Is it really so rare to see a female∠swordsman?"},{"id":1003010731,"text":"They really have."},{"id":1003010732,"text":"It's just that I've never seen one so beautiful."},{"id":1003010734,"text":"War is coming. Everyone who wants peace has fled, everyone∠who wants to make a name for themselves has gathered.∠That's the way it works."},{"id":1003010735,"text":"Hehe, you're a strange boy. But thanks for the compliment."},{"id":1003010736,"text":"What, so nervous you can't talk? Hehe, you're kinda cute."},{"id":1003010737,"text":"What do you want? You interested in me or something?"},{"id":1003010738,"text":"I'm supposed to be on a journey of training, but I can't∠find any worthy opponents. At this rate, that woman∠is going to leave me in the dust."},{"id":1003010739,"text":"Maybe I could work for Toran too. But again, that woman's..."},{"id":1003010740,"text":"Things are heating up here. If I stick around here, I bet∠I'll have a chance to use my sword after all."},{"id":1003010741,"text":"I gotta say, you're quite the attentive one. So what gives?∠You want something?"},{"id":1003010742,"text":"P-Please, join us."},{"id":1003010743,"text":"Uh, um, how about a date?"},{"id":1003010744,"text":"Not really..."},{"id":1003010745,"text":"Maybe I should... After all, I'm not gonna improve my∠swordsmanship sitting around in a tavern.∨Okay, I'll join...but only because it's you asking."},{"id":1003010746,"text":"If you need me, call me anytime. Until then, I'll be∠enjoying myself here."},{"id":1003010747,"text":"......◎3Hahaha!!! You're a funny kid. Okay, a date it is.∨So when we go on our date, are you going to do something∠nice for me?"},{"id":1003010748,"text":"Heheh, hey there, cutie... Wanna go on a date?"},{"id":1003010749,"text":"You put up with all my demands and didn't expect anything∠in return? Well, at least you're honest."},{"id":1003010750,"text":"My, my, it seems going on the road to hone one's skills∠involves a lot of sitting around drinking."},{"id":1003010751,"text":"V-Valeria?! What are you doing here? I thought you were∠working for the Toran Republic."},{"id":1003010752,"text":"I'm currently on assignment helping Commander∠♂㈱ of the ♂② Army."},{"id":1003010753,"text":"Huh... Well, unlike you, following the path of the sword∠isn't my only concern. I'm too busy enjoying life.∨So, have you finally found yourself a man?"},{"id":1003010754,"text":"Wh-What?! Don't be ridiculous..."},{"id":1003010755,"text":"Heh, judging by that response you're probably still single,∠huh?"},{"id":1003010756,"text":"Why you..."},{"id":1003010757,"text":"Uh... Could we not fight here?"},{"id":1003010758,"text":"Um, wanna join us..."},{"id":1003010759,"text":"At least I'm not stupid enough to show up late for a match∠because I was off fooling around with a man. Where is old∠Gary or Edward or whatever his name was now?"},{"id":1003010760,"text":"Shut up! I'm the one who broke things off, not him."},{"id":1003010761,"text":"Oh really? Are you sure it wasn't actually he who got sick∠of you?"},{"id":1003010762,"text":"Whatever. I won't let myself be talked down to by someone∠whose only experience with romance is having crushes on∠childhood friends when she was a little girl."},{"id":1003010763,"text":"Well, maybe that's true, but at least you don't see me∠taking up with any man I meet."},{"id":1003010764,"text":"And who says I'll take up with any man I meet?!"},{"id":1003010765,"text":"Quiet, kid. I'm in the middle of something here."},{"id":1003010766,"text":"Oh, can't take it, huh? Old age, I guess. That's scary."},{"id":1003010767,"text":"What did you say?!"},{"id":1003010768,"text":"*huff* *huff* So you were just..."},{"id":1003010769,"text":"*huff* *huff* Yeah, and so were you... *huff* *huff*"},{"id":1003010770,"text":"Whew... This is never going to end..."},{"id":1003010771,"text":"Like it ever does..."},{"id":1003010772,"text":"What? Join up, you said?"},{"id":1003010773,"text":"This is Commander ♂㈱, leader of the∠♂② Army.∨So how about it, Anita? There's no point in you sticking∠around here. Why not come with us?"},{"id":1003010774,"text":"...Should I, though?"},{"id":1003010775,"text":"What's the point in being stubborn about this?"},{"id":1003010776,"text":"No, it's okay. After all, I think you're lonely∠without me around."},{"id":1003010777,"text":"Hmph... I just want someone to spar with, that's all."},{"id":1003010778,"text":"Heh...heheh... Ahahahahaha!"},{"id":1003010779,"text":"Wh-What's so funny...?"},{"id":1003010780,"text":"Okay, I'll go on ahead.∠See ya later, ♂㈱. Come pay me a visit if you∠ever get lonely..."},{"id":1003010781,"text":"That girl..."},{"id":1003010782,"text":"Why hello, young man. Can I assist you with something?∠However, I'm afraid to say that I am in the throes of∠despair just now. Yes, a despair most deep indeed.∨You see, I've lost a certain rose brooch given to me by a∠dear friend.∨Is there any greater misery than the loss of a token of∠esteem from a bosom companion? How ever will I apologize?"},{"id":1003010783,"text":"*sigh* My dear friend, to think that we cannot meet though∠fate has brought us to the same land...∨If only I had the rose brooch..."},{"id":1003010784,"text":"You mean this?"},{"id":1003010786,"text":"*sigh* Life can be so tragic..."},{"id":1003010787,"text":"Wh-Why, that's it! Young man, wherever did you find this?∠No, more importantly, will you let me have it?∨I can pay you...but no, money is no fair exchange for such∠a prize. If there is something else I might offer you∠instead, you need only ask."},{"id":1003010788,"text":"Join us."},{"id":1003010789,"text":"I just want money."},{"id":1003010790,"text":"Run around and bark like a dog!"},{"id":1003010791,"text":"Ngh... I, Simone, will do no such thing, even for a dear∠friend. A-And yet..."},{"id":1003010792,"text":"Bah, I can see that you intend to mock me after all...∠S-Still..."},{"id":1003010793,"text":"Oh... No, I must! For the sake of my dear friend..."},{"id":1003010794,"text":"Arf! Arf! Aroo!!"},{"id":1003010795,"text":"Grr... I shall bear this humiliation to the end of my days.∠At any rate...◎2are you satisfied now, young man?"},{"id":1003010797,"text":"No."},{"id":1003010798,"text":"You have my gratitude... Now my heart is free.∨Oh, Vincent, my dear friend, I shall see you shortly."},{"id":1003010799,"text":"That's awful... I, Simone, cannot remain here any longer."},{"id":1003010800,"text":"What?! In that case, here. 60,000 potch. I offer you the∠entirety of it. Surely this will suffice?"},{"id":1003010801,"text":"You acquired 60,000 potch."},{"id":1003010802,"text":"Oh, my dear friend, Vincent, now I can greet you, my head∠held high. Please wait for me."},{"id":1003010803,"text":"Join you? As one of your companions? But of course. Yes,∠of course. Oh young man, already I feel you are my friend.∨Of course I will join you. For my friends, I, Simone, will∠pay any price. I would be honored to accompany you."},{"id":1003010804,"text":"Now then, my friend... Commander ♂㈱, was it?∠Shall we be off?"},{"id":1003010805,"text":"Oh, well if it isn't Commander ♂㈱. Of course∠I know who you are. There isn't a soul in this land that∠doesn't know of you.∨I, too, wish to assist you in your endeavors."},{"id":1003010806,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. We meet again."},{"id":1003010807,"text":"Join us."},{"id":1003010809,"text":"Well, I'm currently searching for my friend, so I'm afraid∠I must be going. Bon voyage."},{"id":1003010811,"text":"*gasp* Oh, Simone!!! I have been looking for you, Simone!!!"},{"id":1003010812,"text":"Oh, Vincent, my friend!!! It makes my heart soar like an∠eagle to see your face again. I am overflowing with joy."},{"id":1003010813,"text":"I've been so worried, Simone. Oh, whatever is the matter?"},{"id":1003010814,"text":"I am sorry, Vincent, my friend. I cannot bear to look you in∠the face..."},{"id":1003010815,"text":"What are you saying, Simone?"},{"id":1003010816,"text":"The rose brooch that you gave me as a sign of our∠friendship... I'm afraid I lost it.∨Though ♂㈱ found it for me, I still feel as if∠I've betrayed our friendship..."},{"id":1003010817,"text":"Non, non, non, what are you saying, mon ami? Please, look∠this way."},{"id":1003010818,"text":"I cannot do that, Vincent. I'm so..."},{"id":1003010819,"text":"Simone, the rose brooch is just a trinket. It is our∠friendship that is truly precious, non?"},{"id":1003010820,"text":"Vincent, you... You are the greatest friend I have ever∠known, and shall ever know..."},{"id":1003010821,"text":"But of course I am, Simone."},{"id":1003010822,"text":"Vincent, my friend, allow me to introduce you to another ∠friend, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003010823,"text":"A pleasure, ♂㈱. Any friend of Simone's is a∠friend of mine."},{"id":1003010824,"text":"Vincent, I'm assisting the ♂② Army now. Of∠course, if you, too, were so inclined, you could as well..."},{"id":1003010825,"text":"Say no more, Simone. Well, ♂㈱, shall we∠set forth? The path of glory lies before us."},{"id":1003010826,"text":"Vincent, I shall show you around ♂① Castle.∠It's simply filled with the most wonderful of people."},{"id":1003010827,"text":"I would be delighted."},{"id":1003010829,"text":"■"},{"id":1003010830,"text":"Hi there. You're not from here, are you? This is Muse City.∠It's the biggest city-state in the alliance, it is."},{"id":1003010831,"text":"The war is finally over and everyone's come home. The city∠is starting to get nice and lively again."},{"id":1003010832,"text":"Hey, you havin' a good time? Thanks to Anabelle signin'∠that peace treaty, us merchants are cleanin' up."},{"id":1003010833,"text":"Our mayor, Lady Anabelle, she's really great. Thanks to∠her, we can all live in peace."},{"id":1003010834,"text":"Muse City is the center of all trade in Jowston. Of∠course we owe it all to Lady Anabelle."},{"id":1003010835,"text":"Jess, the chamberlain, is as clever as he is handsome. I∠wonder if he'd be willing to marry me someday."},{"id":1003010836,"text":"Dr. Huan is the finest doctor this city has to offer. Just∠look at how healthy I am."},{"id":1003010837,"text":"Heya, mister. I'm gonna be a doctor when I grow up. Really!"},{"id":1003010838,"text":"These days I can't even give away my armor. I'm not sure if∠I'm happy or sad that the fighting is over..."},{"id":1003010839,"text":"Hey, is it really true that the Highland Army is coming?∨My mommy said the scary soldiers are gonna come get me if I∠don't eat my carrots.◎1 Is it true? Huh? Is it?"},{"id":1003010840,"text":"I saw something great in the rare finds section at this∠item store, but when I came back later, it was gone."},{"id":1003010841,"text":"Guess what? My big brother's coming home! Mommy said so.∠It's true!"},{"id":1003010842,"text":"The local rune sage is on the grumpy side, but also an∠expert at getting hold of rare orbs."},{"id":1003010843,"text":"I'm going to see the rune sage now. I'm not an adventurer∠or anything, I just want some personal protection."},{"id":1003010844,"text":"*yawn* I always get sleepy when the weather is nice."},{"id":1003010845,"text":"Hehehe, I'm gonna have this \"? urn\" I found appraised.∠I'll bet my last potch it's Fine China."},{"id":1003010846,"text":"This kid wants to have his filthy old jar appraised. I tell∠ya, it's a total waste of money."},{"id":1003010847,"text":"Man, what the heck. The boss is so fickle."},{"id":1003010848,"text":"Well, now that the war's over, he probably just wanted to∠take some time off."},{"id":1003010849,"text":"Still, you'd think he'd at least leave us a note or∠something."},{"id":1003010850,"text":"Guess what? Tuta is my friend."},{"id":1003010851,"text":"Finally, at long last, the war is over...or so I thought∠'til I started hearin' talk of some border incident..."},{"id":1003010852,"text":"Hi there, lad. Oh, are you a foreigner? You have an odd∠accent."},{"id":1003010853,"text":"I'm glad that Lady Anabelle signed a peace treaty, but can∠we really trust those Highlanders?"},{"id":1003010854,"text":"Nice weather, eh? Days like this are made for long walks."},{"id":1003010855,"text":"Up ahead is Jowston Hill. But you can only go there on∠special occasions."},{"id":1003010856,"text":"Why hello there, kiddo. Aren't you just adorable."},{"id":1003010857,"text":"This is Dr. Huan's house."},{"id":1003010858,"text":"General Hauser is the strongest general in all Jowston. I∠want to join the army and fight by his side someday."},{"id":1003010859,"text":"Are you a traveler? We've got everything here in Muse.∠Everything except a trading post, that is."},{"id":1003010860,"text":"Hello there. How do you like Muse?"},{"id":1003010861,"text":"Every day the armorer bangs away, clank-a-clank-a-clank.∠The truth is...I really love that sound."},{"id":1003010862,"text":"Huh? Oh, hello. What is it? If you want the item store,∠it's just up ahead. Huh? That's not it?"},{"id":1003010871,"text":"■"},{"id":1003010880,"text":"Hohohoho, the Highland Army can come as close as they∠want, but they always pull back in the end. ∠No need to worry."},{"id":1003010881,"text":"Is there really going to be war again..."},{"id":1003010882,"text":"Hey! Is it true that Toto and Ryube were destroyed?"},{"id":1003010883,"text":"Everyone else is really worried, but I trust Lady Anabelle.∠Everything will be fine. I have faith in her."},{"id":1003010884,"text":"Business is starting to stagnate. I guess war is really∠coming after all..."},{"id":1003010885,"text":"Jess came this way a moment ago. He really is handsome."},{"id":1003010886,"text":"Dr. Huan is the best doctor in the land. Just look at how∠healthy I am."},{"id":1003010887,"text":"Is it true that lots and lots of hurt people came here?∠If I were a doctor, I'd be working really, really hard."},{"id":1003010888,"text":"It's great and all that armor is selling like hotcakes∠again, but if Muse falls I can kiss it all goodbye..."},{"id":1003010889,"text":"Hey, mister! It'll be okay, right? I ate all my carrots so∠the Highland Army wouldn't come for me."},{"id":1003010890,"text":"When you come across a rare find in a store, you should∠buy it. Otherwise you might regret it like me..."},{"id":1003010891,"text":"My big brother... I guess he's not coming home after all.∠I'm so sad..."},{"id":1003010892,"text":"Have you gone to our rune sage yet? He sometimes has some∠nice \"rare finds,\" as he calls them."},{"id":1003010893,"text":"Heheh, lucky me. I found a Prosperity Orb. I'm gonna make∠a fortune with this..."},{"id":1003010894,"text":"The weather is good, but my mood is all wrong. I can't even∠work up a decent yawn..."},{"id":1003010895,"text":"I had that \"? urn\" appraised and it turned out to be a∠\"Defective Urn.\" I lost a ton of potch."},{"id":1003010896,"text":"Hahahaha, I knew it. You're never going to just stumble∠onto an urn that's actually worth money!"},{"id":1003010897,"text":"Not needed."},{"id":1003010900,"text":"Tuta is my friend. I mean it."},{"id":1003010901,"text":"How dreadful... The rumor was true after all."},{"id":1003010903,"text":"I knew it. I knew we couldn't trust those Highlanders! Even∠a child would know better than to believe the likes of them!"},{"id":1003010904,"text":"*sigh* Everyone looks so glum and depressed."},{"id":1003010905,"text":"The Jowston Alliance was born on Jowston Hill just beyond∠here. That's where it gets its name."},{"id":1003010906,"text":"*sigh* So it's war again, eh, sonny? You young folk may not∠remember, but a great hero once lived here in Muse..."},{"id":1003010907,"text":"This is Dr. Huan's house. And I'm going to be Dr. Huan's∠wife."},{"id":1003010908,"text":"General Hauser is the strongest general in all Jowston. I∠want to be his squire someday."},{"id":1003010909,"text":"If only Muse had a trading post, I could become rich too."},{"id":1003010910,"text":"Oh, you're worried about the war? It'll be okay. Lord Hauser∠will protect our fair city."},{"id":1003010911,"text":"The armorer is so busy! Clank-a-clank-a-clank, all day and∠all night long."},{"id":1003010912,"text":"Huh? Oh, hello. What is it? The city hall is just past here.∠Oh, that's not it?"},{"id":1003010929,"text":"☆0∠        Barrel of Stones"},{"id":1003010932,"text":"☆0∠           Polished Vase"},{"id":1003010933,"text":"☆0∠          Sealed Clay Jar"},{"id":1003010934,"text":"☆0∠          Barrel of Junk"},{"id":1003010935,"text":"☆0∠     Barrel Half-Filled with Water"},{"id":1003010936,"text":"☆0∠       Container for Metal Scraps"},{"id":1003010937,"text":"☆0∠               Vase"},{"id":1003010938,"text":"☆0∠             Gauntlets"},{"id":1003010940,"text":"☆0∠          Barrel of Oil"},{"id":1003010941,"text":"☆0∠          Barrel of Fish"},{"id":1003010942,"text":"☆0∠    Barrel of Salted Beef"},{"id":1003010944,"text":"☆0∠         Boots Drying in the Sun"},{"id":1003010945,"text":"☆0∠        Plant with White Flowers"},{"id":1003010946,"text":"☆0∠      Basket of Sugarcane"},{"id":1003010948,"text":"☆0∠           Lush Green Plant"},{"id":1003010950,"text":"☆0∠         Basket of Straw"},{"id":1003010951,"text":"☆0∠   Barrel of Black Stones"},{"id":1003010952,"text":"☆0∠    Barrel of Faintly-Glowing Stones"},{"id":1003010953,"text":"☆0∠         Barrel of Red Stones"},{"id":1003010954,"text":"☆0∠            Wilted Plant"},{"id":1003010955,"text":"☆0∠       Wooden Box Used as a Bench"},{"id":1003010956,"text":"☆0∠             Clay Vase"},{"id":1003010959,"text":"☆0∠           Shield Hung out to Dry"},{"id":1003010960,"text":"☆0∠       Well-Tended Plant"},{"id":1003010964,"text":"☆0∠            Bundled Hay"},{"id":1003010967,"text":"☆0∠         Statue of a Stern Faced Man"},{"id":1003011029,"text":"Psst. Hey, kid, can I ask a favor of you?"},{"id":1003011030,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1003011032,"text":"Don't worry. I just need you to hold on to these for∠a while. Please."},{"id":1003011033,"text":"Thanks. A bad man is chasing me. Would you hold on to these∠for me? I'll come get them later, okay?"},{"id":1003011034,"text":"Where are they? Sturm senses them... Mond and Stern are∠somewhere nearby..."},{"id":1003011035,"text":"You, did you see a tall woman with blonde hair around here?"},{"id":1003011036,"text":"Nope. Haven't seen her."},{"id":1003011037,"text":"I, err..."},{"id":1003011038,"text":"I see. Damn, where could she be?"},{"id":1003011039,"text":"No, I guess you wouldn't have... But I haven't chased her∠this far just for her to escape me now!"},{"id":1003011040,"text":"Thanks, kid. Here, take this."},{"id":1003011041,"text":"There you are...Elza."},{"id":1003011042,"text":"Clive..."},{"id":1003011043,"text":"Finally...I've caught you at last. As an officer of the∠Howling Voice Guild, I'll see that you pay for your crimes."},{"id":1003011044,"text":"...Do you have the guts to shoot, gunner?"},{"id":1003011045,"text":"Out of the way, boy!"},{"id":1003011046,"text":"Don't move, kid."},{"id":1003011047,"text":"Dammit! You won't get away!"},{"id":1003011048,"text":"You sayin' we're spies?"},{"id":1003011049,"text":"We're not spies. Just go ask Dr. Huan..."},{"id":1003011050,"text":"Oh, of all the stupid..."},{"id":1003011051,"text":"What?! I'd never be a S P Y!"},{"id":1003011052,"text":"Me, a spy? Come on..."},{"id":1003011053,"text":"Grrr..."},{"id":1003011054,"text":"You're saying we're spies? Come now, don't be absurd..."},{"id":1003011055,"text":"Gengen and friends not spies, ruff!"},{"id":1003011056,"text":"Mumu!!!"},{"id":1003020075,"text":"Oh, you're finally awake.∨I've been waiting, heehee.◎1 By the way, I think it's time∠we go see Anabelle."},{"id":1003020076,"text":"What is it, Pilika? Huh?◎1What?◎1 Oh?◎0 Jowy?◎4∠It doesn't look like he's come back yet, huh..."},{"id":1003020078,"text":"You're going to see Anabelle, right? I'll keep the lamps∠lit. Go on, you'd better hurry. Get moving."},{"id":1003020079,"text":"Safeguard Muse, and all the city-states...and in doing so∠allow the people here to lead rich, full lives... That is∠my mission.∨♂▼1Do you have something like that? Something you're willing∠to do no matter the cost?"},{"id":1003020080,"text":".........∨♂▼2Even if I call for help, I suppose there's no stopping that∠knife, is there?"},{"id":1003020081,"text":"Well, will you at least let me finish this glass?∨♂▼3It's from a close friend... It would be a shame to waste it."},{"id":1003020082,"text":"Lady Anabelle! The Highland Army has launched a surprise∠attack in the night! Lady Anabelle!!!∨♂▼0What the..."},{"id":1003020083,"text":"Wh-What?! ♂▼1Okay, ♂㈱, just stay where you are.∨♂▼2Hey! Someone call a doctor!!!"},{"id":1003020084,"text":"The town of Coronet is south of here. Take a boat from there∠to South Window. We'll rendezvous there."},{"id":1003040001,"text":"Hello! Welcome to the White Deer Inn. Oh, there's so many∠of you. Well, our beds are clean, and breakfast is included."},{"id":1003040002,"text":"You sure picked a strange place to open an inn."},{"id":1003040003,"text":"Oh, well, yes, we did. But you'd be surprised how many∠people stay here.∨Well then, shall I show you to your room?"},{"id":1003040004,"text":"Hey, Hilda! Hilda!"},{"id":1003040005,"text":"Wh-What're you so excited about, dear?"},{"id":1003040006,"text":"I did it, Hilda! Rejoice! I finally found the way to the∠treasure.∨It's just like I thought. I knew there was something funny∠about those ruins."},{"id":1003040007,"text":"What? I thought you'd be pleased. We can finally say goodbye∠to this failure of an inn!"},{"id":1003040008,"text":"W-Wait, Alex..."},{"id":1003040009,"text":"I've gotta go get some help. It's pretty dangerous in there,∠you see. But I bet I can find some city people to help out.∨Just you wait! I'll find you a jewel so big you won't even∠be able to carry it. We're gonna be rich, Hilda!"},{"id":1003040010,"text":"Alex, please. Don't do anything dangerous...∠The treasure may all be just a rumor.∨Please, I..."},{"id":1003040011,"text":"What're you talking about, Hilda? I'm doing this for you!∠Anyway, I'm going to find some people to help."},{"id":1003040012,"text":"That man... Oh, pardon me."},{"id":1003040013,"text":"That's okay. Is he your husband?"},{"id":1003040014,"text":"Yes, and he's obsessed with finding treasure...∠I don't know what to do.∨Well, shall I show you to your room?"},{"id":1003040015,"text":"*yawn* I slept so well. We've been camping for so long."},{"id":1003040016,"text":"ZZZZZZZ......."},{"id":1003040017,"text":"Jowy is oversleeping again. When's he gonna wake up?∠♂㈱, should we throw water on him like we∠used to?"},{"id":1003040018,"text":"Huh? *yawn*∠Oh, is it morning already?"},{"id":1003040019,"text":"Did you sleep well, everyone?"},{"id":1003040020,"text":"Yes, and dinner was wonderful too. We're very thankful."},{"id":1003040021,"text":"Well, we hope you'll come stay with us again soon."},{"id":1003040022,"text":"We'd love to. Okay, let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003040024,"text":"Oh, Alex."},{"id":1003040025,"text":"What's wrong?"},{"id":1003040026,"text":"Damn those bastards in the city!∠Not a single one of them believed me!∨They even called me a liar... Dammit!"},{"id":1003040027,"text":"Alex...∨Come now, we don't really need treasures, do we?"},{"id":1003040028,"text":"What're you saying, Hilda? This time I've really found the∠way to the treasure.∨I want to give you a good life, not one out in the backwoods∠like this. We could even open an inn in Muse."},{"id":1003040029,"text":"Excuse me, when you said, \"those bastards in the city,\" ∠did you mean the citizens of Muse?"},{"id":1003040030,"text":"Yeah, so what?"},{"id":1003040031,"text":"So, does that mean you have an entry permit?"},{"id":1003040032,"text":"Yeah. These days you can't get in the city without one."},{"id":1003040033,"text":"So, um...do you think you could maybe lend it to us?∠We need to get into Muse and the guard is being a real∠stickler for the rules..."},{"id":1003040034,"text":"Hmm..."},{"id":1003040035,"text":"Okay, I'll make you an offer. You guys help me look for∠treasure, and I'll lend you my entry permit. Deal?"},{"id":1003040036,"text":"Sounds interesting. We'll help."},{"id":1003040037,"text":"What? No way, that sounds dangerous."},{"id":1003040038,"text":"Huh? Don't worry. It's not dangerous at all. I just need∠help carrying the treasure out."},{"id":1003040039,"text":"What? C'mon, I don't think there's any other way."},{"id":1003040040,"text":"Damn, guess you aren't interested. Well, come back if you∠change your mind."},{"id":1003040041,"text":"Oh? Have you decided to help?"},{"id":1003040042,"text":"Yay! Treasure hunt! Treasure hunt!"},{"id":1003040044,"text":"Okay, let's move out right away!∨But before that..."},{"id":1003040046,"text":"We can't take the little girl. Hilda, can you watch her for∠a bit? Maybe she can play with Pete."},{"id":1003040047,"text":"Oh... Well, I don't mind, but dear, I really wish you∠wouldn't do this..."},{"id":1003040048,"text":"Don't worry. It'll be fine."},{"id":1003040049,"text":"Please, just...be careful."},{"id":1003040050,"text":"Pilika, be a good girl. ♂㈱ and I will be back∠soon."},{"id":1003040052,"text":"Okay, now we're ready. The ruins are around back of this∠inn. That's our first stop."},{"id":1003040053,"text":"Dear... Please, be careful."},{"id":1003040054,"text":"This is the spot. Take a look at this stone relief."},{"id":1003040055,"text":"Is it of Sindar design?"},{"id":1003040056,"text":"Yep. These ruins were left behind by that very same lost∠race."},{"id":1003040057,"text":"Wow, Jowy, you're so smart! How did you know that?"},{"id":1003040058,"text":"Oh, uh... It's just something I saw in some books in my∠father's study."},{"id":1003040059,"text":"I've been researching this spot for years, but yesterday∠I finally learned the secret of these ruins."},{"id":1003040060,"text":"Here we go. I knew these ruins were special.∨Listen, there might be monsters in there, so let's proceed∠with caution."},{"id":1003040061,"text":"Looks like this is the place."},{"id":1003040062,"text":"This is where the treasure is?"},{"id":1003040063,"text":"Yeah, that's right. There's Sindar writing here."},{"id":1003040064,"text":"\"O opener of doors, all thy desires, all thy wishes,∠all that is most dear to thee lies here. ∠But beware...\""},{"id":1003040065,"text":"\"All that is most dear,\" huh?∠Wonder what that means.∨I guess for me, it'd be ♂㈱, Jowy...∠and Grandpa Genkaku, but he's dead."},{"id":1003040066,"text":"Yeah... I guess there aren't so many things I would consider∠\"most dear\"..."},{"id":1003040067,"text":"My friends."},{"id":1003040068,"text":"Fame."},{"id":1003040069,"text":"Fortune."},{"id":1003040070,"text":"You too, ♂㈱? Yeah, I guess that'd be number∠one... Maybe."},{"id":1003040071,"text":"Seriously, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1003040073,"text":"Hey, are you crazy? It said \"most dear.\" It's gotta be∠treasure, right? What else?"},{"id":1003040074,"text":"Finally, I'll find all the riches I've dreamed of."},{"id":1003040075,"text":"Alex! Wait!∨♂㈱! Nanami! Be careful! Something's here!"},{"id":1003040076,"text":"Phew... What was that? The guardian of the treasure?"},{"id":1003040077,"text":"I guess maybe it was something the Sindar left behind along∠with the ruins."},{"id":1003040078,"text":"But we took care of it, so everything's a-okay now."},{"id":1003040079,"text":"Here it is... The treasure... At last..."},{"id":1003040080,"text":"Huh? What? Hey, c'mon, I want a peek too!"},{"id":1003040081,"text":"Now... Now I can finally buy Hilda some nice clothes...∠We'll buy something good for Pete to eat too..."},{"id":1003040082,"text":"Hey! Come on, just open it already!"},{"id":1003040083,"text":"Okay! Here goes..."},{"id":1003040084,"text":"...What is this?"},{"id":1003040085,"text":"Huh? What is it? Well? I can't see!"},{"id":1003040086,"text":"You found Healing Herbs."},{"id":1003040087,"text":"What the hell is this?!∨What's \"most dear\" about this? I can't believe it!∠Damn it all...∨I thought I'd finally struck it rich..."},{"id":1003040088,"text":"Alex...∨Forget the treasure. Let's go back. Maybe...there never was∠any treasure to begin with."},{"id":1003040089,"text":"That's right, cheer up. Hilda's waiting for you."},{"id":1003040090,"text":"......∨You're right. Well, at least this will make a good story..."},{"id":1003040091,"text":"You acquired the Healing Herbs."},{"id":1003040092,"text":"Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003040093,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1003040094,"text":"Let's look a little more. Maybe we'll find something..."},{"id":1003040095,"text":"Okay, let's go!"},{"id":1003040096,"text":"Whaaa?∨But I'm tired. C'mon, let's head back."},{"id":1003040097,"text":"I promised Hilda all those things, and all I got was a bunch∠of healing herbs... I'm too embarrassed to go home."},{"id":1003040098,"text":"Hilda's gonna be furious..."},{"id":1003040099,"text":"Hey, don't worry. I don't think that's true at all.∠Now, come on, let's go back."},{"id":1003040100,"text":"Okay..."},{"id":1003040101,"text":"Oh, and since we did help you hunt for treasure,∠don't forget your end of the bargain."},{"id":1003040102,"text":"Oh, y-yeah..."},{"id":1003040103,"text":"Hilda, I'm home..."},{"id":1003040105,"text":"Mommy... Mommy is..."},{"id":1003040106,"text":"What is it, Pete?∨Hilda!!!"},{"id":1003040107,"text":"H-Hilda! C'mon, Hilda! What's wrong?!"},{"id":1003040108,"text":"Step aside."},{"id":1003040109,"text":"Oh no! Get a bed ready! Alex, help me carry her!∨♂㈱, I need you to get some water! And Jowy,∠go fetch a doctor! Now!!!"},{"id":1003040110,"text":"U-Uh... Huh? O-Okay, I'm on it!"},{"id":1003040111,"text":"Hurry and carry her to the bed!"},{"id":1003040112,"text":"I-Is Hilda going to be all right?"},{"id":1003040113,"text":"She's burning up. I've never seen anyone so hot.∠She must have overexerted herself."},{"id":1003040114,"text":"S-So what do we do?"},{"id":1003040115,"text":"We've got to get her fever down."},{"id":1003040116,"text":"Mommy..."},{"id":1003040117,"text":"Where's Jowy? C'mon, hurry..."},{"id":1003040118,"text":"Well, there are no doctors around here. We usually go to∠Toto, but... Damn... Why is this happening?"},{"id":1003040119,"text":"What should we do..."},{"id":1003040120,"text":"Where did you go, ♂㈱?∨Huh? What? The healing herbs?∨That's right! Those healing herbs from before!"},{"id":1003040121,"text":"...Healing herbs? You don't mean the ones from the ruins,∠do you? Think they'll really work?"},{"id":1003040122,"text":"I don't know... But they just might. The Sindar did consider∠them a treasure, after all."},{"id":1003040123,"text":"Hilda... Here's some medicine. You've gotta drink it so you∠can get better...∨Please, Hilda..."},{"id":1003040126,"text":"M-Mommyyy..."},{"id":1003040127,"text":"Unh..."},{"id":1003040128,"text":"H-Hilda?"},{"id":1003040129,"text":"Mm...∨...Alex?"},{"id":1003040130,"text":"Hilda! Oh, Hilda!"},{"id":1003040131,"text":"W-Welcome back, Alex... I'm glad you're...safe..."},{"id":1003040132,"text":"Mommy!!!"},{"id":1003040133,"text":"Hilda... I'm so sorry."},{"id":1003040134,"text":"Let's take a look...∨Wow! It really worked. She seems fine now.∠Her fever is totally gone."},{"id":1003040135,"text":"Hilda, I'm sorry... You were right. There was no treasure∠in the end."},{"id":1003040136,"text":"Oh... But you can still keep looking, right?"},{"id":1003040137,"text":"But..."},{"id":1003040138,"text":"Oh, that's too bad... I've dreamt of you coming∠home with your hands full of treasure.∨But waiting for you to come home safe wasn't so bad either.∨Just please...don't do anything dangerous again."},{"id":1003040139,"text":"Hilda..."},{"id":1003040140,"text":"Now, now, dry those tears. A grown man shouldn't cry."},{"id":1003040141,"text":"*pant* *pant* *pant* *pant*∨I-I'm sorry...∠*pant* *pant*∨I looked all over... ∠*pant*∨...But I couldn't find a doctor..."},{"id":1003040142,"text":"...Huh?"},{"id":1003040144,"text":"It looks like...◎3she's all better."},{"id":1003040146,"text":"Thank you so much."},{"id":1003040147,"text":"Hilda, it looks like you're feeling well again."},{"id":1003040148,"text":"Yes, completely."},{"id":1003040149,"text":"Here's the entry permit. You can return it anytime."},{"id":1003040150,"text":"Okay, I guess we'll be on our way."},{"id":1003040151,"text":"Come and stay anytime. Free of charge."},{"id":1003040152,"text":"Thanks!∠Let's go, ♂㈱, Jowy. Now we can get into Muse."},{"id":1003040153,"text":"But is it really going to work? I mean...this is Alex's,∠right?"},{"id":1003040154,"text":"Oh, c'mon, don't worry about it. Now, off we go!"},{"id":1003040155,"text":"I wonder when that man is going to come back."},{"id":1003040157,"text":"Oh, well, yes, we did.∨But you'd be surprised how many people stay here.∨♂▼0Well then, shall I show you to your room?"},{"id":1003040158,"text":"I did it, Hilda! Rejoice! I finally found the way to the∠treasure.∨♂▼1It's just like I thought. I knew there was something funny∠about those ruins."},{"id":1003040159,"text":"I've gotta go get some help. It's pretty dangerous in there,∠you see. But I bet I can find some city people to help out.∨♂▼2Just you wait! I'll find you a jewel so big you won't even∠be able to carry it. We're gonna be rich, Hilda!"},{"id":1003040160,"text":"What're you talking about, Hilda? I'm doing this for you!∨♂▼3Anyway, I'm going to find some people to help."},{"id":1003040161,"text":"That man...∨♂▼4Oh, pardon me."},{"id":1003040162,"text":"Yes, and he's obsessed with finding treasure... I don't know∠what to do.∨♂▼5Well, shall I show you to your room?"},{"id":1003040163,"text":"Huh?∨♂▼6*yawn* Oh, is it morning already?"},{"id":1003040164,"text":"We'd love to.∨♂▼7Okay, let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003040165,"text":"We hope you'll come again soon."},{"id":1003040166,"text":"Damn! ∠Not a single one of those bastards in the city believed me!∨They even called me a liar...♂▼0 Dammit!"},{"id":1003040167,"text":"So, um...do you think you could maybe lend it to us?∨♂▼1We need to get into Muse and the guard is being a real∠stickler for the rules..."},{"id":1003040168,"text":"We can't take the little girl.∨♂▼2Hilda, can you watch her for a bit? Maybe she can play with∠Pete."},{"id":1003040169,"text":"Pilika left the party."},{"id":1003040171,"text":"Don't do anything crazy, dear."},{"id":1003040173,"text":"If we don't get this fever down..."},{"id":1003040174,"text":"Hilda... This's all my fault..."},{"id":1003040175,"text":"Mommy..."},{"id":1003040176,"text":"Hey, wait. Where're you going? The treasure is this way.◎1∠♂▼1See? Over there."},{"id":1003040177,"text":"Yes! I did it! Finally, the treasure of my dreams!"},{"id":1003040178,"text":"Good. With this, I'll finally find that treasure."},{"id":1003040179,"text":"Lemme see here..."},{"id":1003040180,"text":"It looks like we need to put something in this opening∠here."},{"id":1003040181,"text":"We've gotta find a stone plate that fits into this opening."},{"id":1003040182,"text":"Okay, now if we use this..."},{"id":1003040183,"text":"This is quite the elaborate mechanism. The water is draining∠out. There might be more places we can investigate now."},{"id":1003040185,"text":"Alex! Wait!∨♂▼0♂㈱! Nanami! Be careful! Something's here!"},{"id":1003040186,"text":"I promised Hilda all those things, and all I got was a bunch∠of healing herbs...∨♂▼0I'm too embarrassed to go home."},{"id":1003040187,"text":"What is it, Pete?∨♂▼0Hilda!!!"},{"id":1003040188,"text":"Oh no!∨♂▼1Get a bed ready! Alex, you carry Hilda over!∨♂▼2♂㈱, I need you to get some water!∨♂▼3And Jowy, go fetch a doctor!∨♂▼4Now!!!"},{"id":1003040189,"text":"Well, there are no doctors around here... We usually go to∠Toto, but...∨♂▼5Damn... Why is this happening?"},{"id":1003040191,"text":"Where did you go, ♂㈱?∨Huh? What? The healing herbs?∨♂▼0That's right! Those healing herbs from before!"},{"id":1003040192,"text":"Mm...∨♂▼1...Alex?"},{"id":1003040193,"text":"Let's take a look...∨♂▼2Wow! It really worked. She seems fine now. Her fever is∠totally gone."},{"id":1003040194,"text":"Oh, that's too bad... I've always dreamt of you coming∠home with your hands full of treasure.∨♂▼3Waiting for you to come home wasn't all that bad either.∨♂▼4Just please...don't do anything dangerous again."},{"id":1003040195,"text":"Thanks!∨♂▼5Let's go, ♂㈱, Jowy. Now we can get into Muse."},{"id":1003040196,"text":"Welcome, everyone. Please stay as long as you like."},{"id":1003040197,"text":"Aha. This iron plate must fit into something."},{"id":1003040198,"text":"Hello. Welcome to the White Deer Inn."},{"id":1003040199,"text":"Please... Don't pay him any mind."},{"id":1003040200,"text":"Leave me alone. I quit being a rune sage, so go away."},{"id":1003040201,"text":"Yes, yes, welcome. Please come inside."},{"id":1003040202,"text":"Welcome to Coronet's item store. I even stock a few pieces∠of armor, so take a look."},{"id":1003040203,"text":"Got work for me?"},{"id":1003040204,"text":"Welcome to Muse. Will you be staying the night?"},{"id":1003040206,"text":"Hey there, come on in."},{"id":1003040207,"text":"Hello and welcome to Millian's Armor Emporium. ∠What can I do for you?"},{"id":1003040208,"text":"Welcome."},{"id":1003040209,"text":"Hey there. Will you be staying for the night?"},{"id":1003040210,"text":"Yes? Got something for me? If you want it appraised, it'll∠cost you 100 potch."},{"id":1003040211,"text":"Hey, I got the goods."},{"id":1003040212,"text":"...What do you wish of me, child?"},{"id":1003040213,"text":"Hi. Where'd ya come from, mister?"},{"id":1003040214,"text":"Hey, are you going to Muse? I used to live there when I was∠real little."},{"id":1003040215,"text":"Mom has been really tired lately, so I've been helping out."},{"id":1003040216,"text":"Hey, you're back! Welcome!"},{"id":1003040217,"text":"■"},{"id":1003040218,"text":"■"},{"id":1003040219,"text":"■"},{"id":1003040224,"text":"「とうめい当たりセリフ００」"},{"id":1003040225,"text":"☆0∠              Bowl"},{"id":1003040226,"text":"☆0∠             Pitcher"},{"id":1003040229,"text":"☆0∠    Beautiful Dishes on Display"},{"id":1003040231,"text":"☆0∠    Barrel of Salted Fish"},{"id":1003040232,"text":"☆0∠       Barrel of Sugar"},{"id":1003040233,"text":"☆0∠         Wooden Dresser"},{"id":1003040237,"text":"☆0∠        Assorted Vegetables"},{"id":1003040238,"text":"☆0∠         Bubbling Stew"},{"id":1003040239,"text":"☆0∠         Boiling Potatoes"},{"id":1003040240,"text":"☆0∠         Special Meat Pies"},{"id":1003040247,"text":"☆0∠            Marguerite Daisies"},{"id":1003040249,"text":"☆0∠          Stacked Firewood"},{"id":1003040255,"text":"☆0∠        Strange Stone Statue"},{"id":1003040324,"text":"「とうめい当たりセリフ１００」"},{"id":1003040325,"text":"Never mind about the money. Please rest well."},{"id":1003040326,"text":"Goodnight."},{"id":1003040328,"text":"Feel free to come by anytime."},{"id":1003040331,"text":"It's 30 potch a night per person, so ♂③ potch total."},{"id":1003040337,"text":"Whaddaya want?"},{"id":1003040338,"text":"Anythin' else?"},{"id":1003040339,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1003040340,"text":"Wanna equip it now?"},{"id":1003040341,"text":"Thanks!"},{"id":1003040342,"text":"Who?"},{"id":1003040343,"text":"Where?"},{"id":1003040344,"text":"Sell which?"},{"id":1003040345,"text":"Can't equip that."},{"id":1003040346,"text":"Come back again."},{"id":1003040347,"text":"What do you want me to do?"},{"id":1003040348,"text":"You still need somethin'?"},{"id":1003040349,"text":"Hurry up and decide."},{"id":1003040350,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1003040351,"text":"Bah, what a pain."},{"id":1003040352,"text":"On who?"},{"id":1003040353,"text":"Where?"},{"id":1003040354,"text":"Seal what?"},{"id":1003040355,"text":"Can't do that!"},{"id":1003040356,"text":"Don't you get familiar with me, sonny."},{"id":1003040357,"text":"Oh man..."},{"id":1003040358,"text":"I can't return it to an orb!"},{"id":1003050024,"text":"Pilika... She finally fell asleep.∨♂▼0......∨Hey, ♂㈱...∨♂▼1Is it true? Did Jowy really...kill Anabelle?"},{"id":1003060001,"text":"You must be Commander ♂㈱. ∠King Jowy told us to expect you. Please, pass in peace."},{"id":1003060002,"text":"Well, that was quite the polite reception."},{"id":1003060003,"text":"If we take a boat from here to Kuskus on the other shore,∠we should be able to reach South Window.∨A cute young mapmaker I met in Muse told me that."},{"id":1003060005,"text":"What's wrong, Pilika? Are you tired?"},{"id":1003060006,"text":"Not so fast. Where do you think you're going?"},{"id":1003060007,"text":"Oh, err, w-we were hoping to book passage on one of the∠boats..."},{"id":1003060008,"text":"Not gonna happen. We have orders from Luca Blight himself∠that no ships are to leave port, so get outta here, kids!"},{"id":1003060009,"text":"*groan*∠But we can't get to Kuskus without a boat..."},{"id":1003060010,"text":"Ha! What a bunch of cowards. And you call yourselves proud∠Highland soldiers! Isn't there even one of you that knows∠how to act like a man?"},{"id":1003060011,"text":"Give it up, Eilie. It's no use. If only there was a∠handsome young man willing to help poor little me out..."},{"id":1003060012,"text":"I don't think that's gonna work either, sis."},{"id":1003060013,"text":"♂㈱! What are you doing here? I thought you∠went back to your hometown..."},{"id":1003060014,"text":"A-And just who are you?"},{"id":1003060015,"text":"I could ask you the same thing. I'm Eilie. Oh, and I'm the∠person who saved ♂㈱'s life."},{"id":1003060016,"text":"Long time no see."},{"id":1003060017,"text":"Saved my life?"},{"id":1003060018,"text":"It's true. Anyway, come join us. You must have lots of∠stories to tell."},{"id":1003060019,"text":"Well, anyway, come join us. You must have lots of stories to∠tell."},{"id":1003060020,"text":"It's been a while, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003060021,"text":"How have you been?"},{"id":1003060022,"text":"Oh, so you've got a girlfriend now?"},{"id":1003060023,"text":"You've got it all wrong. I'm his big sister."},{"id":1003060024,"text":"Is that so... Good news, eh, Eilie?"},{"id":1003060025,"text":"And just what's that supposed to mean?!"},{"id":1003060026,"text":"Hehehe... By the way, what brings you to these parts,∠♂㈱?"},{"id":1003060027,"text":"Hmm, it seems you've been through a lot too. Our story is∠pretty much the same. Business was no good in Highland,∠so we decided to change locations.∨We made it this far, but..."},{"id":1003060028,"text":"Huh? Were you on your way to South Window too?"},{"id":1003060029,"text":"Yes."},{"id":1003060030,"text":"So that means..."},{"id":1003060031,"text":"The thing is...the Highland Army has made it known that∠they'll punish anyone who takes their boat out, so everyone∠is too scared to sail."},{"id":1003060033,"text":"Oh no... What should we do, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1003060034,"text":"Tai Ho, you dummy!∠You should be happy to take your boat out for a friend.∨What's all this \"whichever way the wind blows,∠wherever my spirit wills me, however the dice fall\" garbage∠anyway?∨I'm never gonna get across this stupid lake."},{"id":1003060035,"text":"Hey, that guy was talking about crossing the lake."},{"id":1003060036,"text":"Sheena, I'm not taking the boat out. Give up and go home."},{"id":1003060037,"text":"Hey, brother, these are some different folks."},{"id":1003060038,"text":"Huh? Who're you guys?"},{"id":1003060039,"text":"Um... We want to go to South Window."},{"id":1003060040,"text":"Gah, not again. Sorry, but I don't feel like it. Now scram."},{"id":1003060041,"text":"We've got to cross the lake!"},{"id":1003060044,"text":"Huh? You're back?"},{"id":1003060045,"text":"Hmm... Hey, you, come here a minute."},{"id":1003060046,"text":"Hmm, you got the look of someone on a mission.∨Okay, here's what we'll do. We'll roll the dice for it. You∠win, I take the boat out. I win, you give me all your potch."},{"id":1003060047,"text":"Okay, you're on."},{"id":1003060048,"text":"Forget about it."},{"id":1003060049,"text":"Okay, it's a deal."},{"id":1003060050,"text":"Okay, it's a deal...∨Or so I'd like to say, but you don't have enough potch. ∠The minimum bet is 2,000 potch. Come back when you∠have more."},{"id":1003060051,"text":"Now we're talkin'. The bet is on!"},{"id":1003060052,"text":"Smart choice, kid. You do that."},{"id":1003060053,"text":"Huh? What's up? You decided to take the wager?"},{"id":1003060054,"text":"Aw, too bad. Well, ya win some, ya lose some."},{"id":1003060055,"text":"Oh, you wanna go again? Not one to give up, are ya?"},{"id":1003060056,"text":"Hey, what a surprise. You're pretty lucky, kid."},{"id":1003060057,"text":"Boss... You're not actually taking the boat out are you?∠The Highland soldiers mean business."},{"id":1003060058,"text":"Yam Koo, get the boat ready. The dice never lie. We're∠takin' him across the lake. The fates're tellin' me that we∠gotta do it."},{"id":1003060059,"text":"Omigosh, really? You'll take us? Okay, can you give us a∠second?"},{"id":1003060061,"text":"...What'd ya say, missy?"},{"id":1003060062,"text":"O-Oh, I just said you're doing us a real favor! But could∠you just wait a little bit? We have some other friends we∠want to bring along.∨Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003060063,"text":"Okay, but make it fast. If those Highland goons get wind∠of this we'll be in big trouble."},{"id":1003060064,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. Thought of something clever yet?"},{"id":1003060065,"text":"Listen to this."},{"id":1003060066,"text":"I see... Great going, ♂㈱. ∠You gambled us a boat ride, eh?"},{"id":1003060067,"text":"But I wonder if it's okay... They may be pirates."},{"id":1003060068,"text":"It's not like we have any other option. Besides, we should∠be okay with this many people in our crew."},{"id":1003060069,"text":"Yeah, it's gonna be fine."},{"id":1003060070,"text":"...I suppose you're right. Well, ♂㈱, it seems∠we're traveling companions once again."},{"id":1003060071,"text":"Okay, let's go!"},{"id":1003060072,"text":"Oh, there you are... Whoa, that's a lot of friends you got∠there!"},{"id":1003060073,"text":"We're so grateful to you for letting us board your fine∠ship."},{"id":1003060074,"text":"Huh? Oh sure, leave it to me, missy. Now then, all aboard."},{"id":1003060075,"text":"My brother just can't say no to a beautiful woman..."},{"id":1003060076,"text":"Dammit, this time, I swear...∨Huh? Wait, is that..."},{"id":1003060153,"text":"00"},{"id":1003060154,"text":"Hey kid. This is the port town of Coronet. There are some∠rough people around here, so watch yourself."},{"id":1003060155,"text":"From here, you can go north to Muse or cross the lake to∠Kuskus. If you go further south still, you'll get to South∠Window."},{"id":1003060156,"text":"We catch lots of delicious fish from Dunan Lake here."},{"id":1003060157,"text":"This is a nice place to live...if you don't mind the smell∠of fish, that is."},{"id":1003060158,"text":"Hey, guess what? I like meat more than fish..."},{"id":1003060159,"text":"So where ya headin'? Over to Kuskus 'cross the lake?"},{"id":1003060160,"text":"The port is up ahead. You be careful, though. There are lots∠of goons hangin' around there."},{"id":1003060161,"text":"My dad is a great blacksmith. If you need your weapons∠sharpened, come by our place."},{"id":1003060162,"text":"So something happened at the border, eh? I wonder how∠things will pan out..."},{"id":1003060163,"text":"Off with you. I'm busy fixing supper and you're in the way."},{"id":1003060164,"text":"Hi there. Where're you from, mister?"},{"id":1003060165,"text":"Hmm, get medicine from Toto, then..."},{"id":1003060166,"text":"We were planning to go from Kuskus to South Window, but∠all the ships are grounded. What should we do?"},{"id":1003060167,"text":"Boy, I really love this town. The fish is just the best∠here."},{"id":1003060168,"text":"I've got the day off today. What good is work if you can't ∠enjoy your time off too?"},{"id":1003060169,"text":"Welcome. Please sample some of our delicious fish cuisine."},{"id":1003060170,"text":"Hello there. Where did you come from? Matilda? Or maybe∠Greenhill?"},{"id":1003060171,"text":"Hey there, c'mon in! Take a load off!"},{"id":1003060172,"text":"Oh, a customer? My husband is an excellent craftsman."},{"id":1003060173,"text":"I'm an apprentice blacksmith. I'm studying under my master."},{"id":1003060174,"text":"Welcome. Are you a customer?"},{"id":1003060175,"text":"Oh? Have you got business here?"},{"id":1003060176,"text":"Say, you're from Highland, right?◎1 I knew it cause I've∠got a friend from there and you talk just like him."},{"id":1003060177,"text":"It's hard to have a big family. Laundry, cleaning,∠chores... It's like a war sometimes."},{"id":1003060178,"text":"Take a look at those branches. I trimmed and shaped them∠meticulously. What a success!"},{"id":1003060179,"text":"２６"},{"id":1003060180,"text":"２７"},{"id":1003060181,"text":"２８"},{"id":1003060182,"text":"２９"},{"id":1003060183,"text":"Hey, kid. What're you doin' here? Don't wander around too ∠much or ya might get hurt!"},{"id":1003060184,"text":"Whaddaya want? You from around here?"},{"id":1003060185,"text":"３２"},{"id":1003060186,"text":"３３"},{"id":1003060187,"text":"３４"},{"id":1003060188,"text":"３５"},{"id":1003060189,"text":"３６"},{"id":1003060190,"text":"３７"},{"id":1003060191,"text":"３８"},{"id":1003060192,"text":"３９"},{"id":1003060193,"text":"In this port, we've got fishing boats and boats that'll∠ferry you across the lake to Kuskus."},{"id":1003060194,"text":"Listen up, kid. Mess around with a fisherman's boat and∠you're likely to get a real thrashing."},{"id":1003060195,"text":"The fish are nice and fat this time of year. In fact they're∠so tasty it makes a fella want to dive right in the lake∠and catch some more."},{"id":1003060196,"text":"Hohohoho, peering at the water's surface is good for one's∠soul but bad for one's back."},{"id":1003060197,"text":"Sometimes a trader named Shu comes here. He's so smart and∠handsome, it's impossible not to admire him."},{"id":1003060198,"text":"My job is unloading the ships each day. see, you fled from Muse, eh.◎0 Sorry, but the boats∠ain't goin' anywhere right now."},{"id":1003060311,"text":"If you cross the lake to Kuskus and keep goin' south, you'll∠eventually reach South Window."},{"id":1003060312,"text":"How the hell are we supposed to catch fish if those Highland∠dirtbags won't let us take our boats out?"},{"id":1003060314,"text":"Instead of just fish all the time, I'd like to have some∠other meat once in a while..."},{"id":1003060316,"text":"The port is up ahead.
