Hey, mister, are you...from Highland?"},{"id":1003060321,"text":"We can't get medicine from Toto or goods from Muse either.∠We'll run out of things to sell."},{"id":1003060322,"text":"We were all ready to go and then the Highland Army came...∠How will I get to South Window now?"},{"id":1003060323,"text":"I've got friends living in Muse. I wonder if they're∠okay..."},{"id":1003060324,"text":"The Jowston forces lost... This is no time to be working."},{"id":1003060325,"text":"This is awful! There's no fish coming in, so I can't cook∠my special fish dishes."},{"id":1003060326,"text":"A traveler, are you? Be wary of Highland soldiers."},{"id":1003060327,"text":"Hey there, c'mon in! Relax and take a load off!"},{"id":1003060330,"text":"My dad told me not to go outside. I wonder what's going on."},{"id":1003060331,"text":"Are you a Highland soldier too?"},{"id":1003060352,"text":"Muse... I can't believe it. If only there were a hero∠like Genkaku around these days..."},{"id":1003060354,"text":"Without any boats coming in, I'm all out of work..."},{"id":1003060355,"text":"What? You wanna go south to Kuskus? Sorry, but... Well, you∠can see how those Highland jerks are."},{"id":1003060356,"text":"Sorry, but I'm busy organizin'...◎1∠Huh? Who the hell are you?"},{"id":1003060357,"text":"Hehehe, my cat Myu loves to cuddle. So I always have to∠hold her like this."},{"id":1003060359,"text":"First Muse fell, then we took over this little town of∠Coronet. Hahahahaha!"},{"id":1003060360,"text":"The Jowston Army is nothing! It's just like Prince Luca∠says—we could take them anytime!"},{"id":1003060361,"text":"Anabelle was a fool to get killed by a spy like that..."},{"id":1003060362,"text":"Who are you? Where do you snots think you're going?"},{"id":1003060363,"text":"Boat?◎0 Not happening! Prince Luca has ordered that absolutely∠no ships are to leave the port!"},{"id":1003060365,"text":"Hey kid...◎1 Huh? Is that a Matilda Knight?"},{"id":1003060366,"text":"*sigh* I wonder when these Highlander goons are going to∠leave..."},{"id":1003060367,"text":"I haven't heard anything good coming out of Muse."},{"id":1003060369,"text":"It's terrible. The Highland soldiers ate up all the meat∠themselves."},{"id":1003060371,"text":"The port is up ahead. There're Highland soldiers hangin'∠around, so watch yourself."},{"id":1003060372,"text":"My dad... They're forcing him to work for the Highland∠Army. He's really depressed..."},{"id":1003060373,"text":"The Highland folks ain't bad people...once ya get used to∠'em, that is."},{"id":1003060375,"text":"H-Hello..."},{"id":1003060376,"text":"Highland taxes are high, but it beats not being able to∠get any supplies due to the war."},{"id":1003060378,"text":"Hunting refugees in Muse, eh? What're they playing at..."},{"id":1003060379,"text":"I think something terrible is happening in Muse.∠This is no time to work."},{"id":1003060380,"text":"Welcome."},{"id":1003060382,"text":"H-Hello there...◎1 Oh, you're not one of those∠Highland guys..."},{"id":1003060383,"text":"Are you a customer? I'm sorry. My husband... He isn't∠feeling very well..."},{"id":1003060384,"text":"Master... I wonder if he's alright. His wife is worried too."},{"id":1003060385,"text":"Staying home is boring. I want to go out and∠play."},{"id":1003060386,"text":"Are you one of the Highlanders too?"},{"id":1003060387,"text":"Hey, there are kids in the Highland Army? But where are∠your uniforms?"},{"id":1003060389,"text":"With the state our town's in, I don't have time to care for∠my bonsai the way I want."},{"id":1003060394,"text":"Those Highland scum! Acting like they're better than us!"},{"id":1003060395,"text":"Hey, if ya ain't careful, you're gonna have the Highland∠goons comin' after ya."},{"id":1003060404,"text":"In this port, we've got fishing boats and boats that'll∠ferry you across the lake to Kuskus. But now, due to the∠Highland Army..."},{"id":1003060406,"text":"What do those Highland idiots mean we can't take our boats∠out?! The fish are out there waitin' to be caught!"},{"id":1003060407,"text":"It was terrible. Those Highlanders treated me like I was a∠spy..."},{"id":1003060408,"text":"Hey, is it true that Shu is the strategist for the∠♂② Army? I'm not surprised."},{"id":1003060409,"text":"Why do I have to unload cargo for these Highland thugs?"},{"id":1003060410,"text":"Business is terrible thanks to the Highland soldiers..."},{"id":1003060411,"text":"Sorry. No boats will be leaving for a while."},{"id":1003060412,"text":"Myu is afraid of Highland soldiers, even though∠she's got nothing to fear with me holding her tight."},{"id":1003060414,"text":"I'm starting to get sick of patrolling this place... *yawn*"},{"id":1003060415,"text":"Ha! The people here are weak. Just threaten 'em with your∠sword a little and they'll do anything."},{"id":1003060416,"text":"Hey! Haven't seen you before. Where did you come from?"},{"id":1003060417,"text":"Keep loitering and we'll throw your scroungy butt in jail!"},{"id":1003060418,"text":"Prince Luca is gathering up all the leftover Jowston scum∠in Muse... I wonder what he's got planned there."},{"id":1003060420,"text":"Hey, kid. Wait... Are you with the ♂② Army?"},{"id":1003060421,"text":"Is it true that the war is really over?"},{"id":1003060422,"text":"We can't trust a cease fire with the Highland Army!"},{"id":1003060424,"text":"Hey, when the war is over, will I be able to eat lots of∠meat?"},{"id":1003060425,"text":"Oh!◎0 You're...◎1 Aren't you Lady Teresa?!◎1 Please! Please!∠I beg of you! Help us!"},{"id":1003060426,"text":"I heard that some important people were in town. Could it∠be you all?"},{"id":1003060428,"text":"As long as there's peace, I don't care if I live under∠Highland or Jowston."},{"id":1003060430,"text":"H-Hello... Are you from the ♂② Army?"},{"id":1003060433,"text":"I wonder if this means the war is finally over..."},{"id":1003060434,"text":"The war is over! Time to celebrate! How could I work on a∠day like this?!"},{"id":1003060435,"text":"Welcome! Would you like to eat?"},{"id":1003060436,"text":"Do you know why everyone is so happy? ∠King Jowy of Highland and Commander ♂㈱ of∠the ♂② Army have made peace."},{"id":1003060441,"text":"Are you working with the Highlanders too?"},{"id":1003060464,"text":"Y-You're ♂㈱, right? I'm rooting for you."},{"id":1003060465,"text":"You're the famed ♂㈱, eh? Hurry up and take∠care of the Highland Army, okay?"},{"id":1003060467,"text":"Good luck! Myu and I will be cheering you on."},{"id":1003060469,"text":"Ha, this peace treaty won't last. You guys are pushovers!"},{"id":1003060470,"text":"I can't believe what happened to King Luca..."},{"id":1003060471,"text":"The new King is apparently quite young..."},{"id":1003060472,"text":"You know...I really just want to go back to Highland."},{"id":1003060473,"text":"I absolutely oppose this peace accord!"},{"id":1003060475,"text":"Yeah! The Highland Army finally fled!"},{"id":1003060476,"text":"Yay! We did it! Those dirtbags finally left the city!"},{"id":1003060477,"text":"Now that the Highland soldiers are gone, I can finally take∠my boat out."},{"id":1003060479,"text":"Fish, fish, always fish... I'm just sick of fish."},{"id":1003060480,"text":"We're finally saved..."},{"id":1003060481,"text":"I heard that Highland lost! Serves 'em right!"},{"id":1003060482,"text":"Now that those Highland jerks are gone, my dad is starting∠to feel like his old self."},{"id":1003060483,"text":"I heard there was another big battle... When, oh when will∠it all end? *sigh*"},{"id":1003060486,"text":"*groan* Once again our shipments have stopped coming in..."},{"id":1003060488,"text":"The citizens of Muse were massacred, I hear... How dreadful."},{"id":1003060489,"text":"Commander ♂㈱ wiped out the Highland Army!∠I'm so busy celebrating, who has time for work?"},{"id":1003060490,"text":"Welcome! You want to eat, or... It's still too early∠to start drinking."},{"id":1003060491,"text":"There may still be some Highland soldiers skulking around,∠so be careful."},{"id":1003060493,"text":"Are you a customer? My husband is finally feeling better.∠I'm so happy!"},{"id":1003060494,"text":"My master is feeling a little better, so I'm quite relieved."},{"id":1003060495,"text":"I asked my dad if it's okay to play outside..."},{"id":1003060496,"text":"Did the Highlanders really run away? I wonder if they'll be∠back soon."},{"id":1003060497,"text":"You're a Highlander aren't you? Why didn't you run away∠like the rest of them?"},{"id":1003060504,"text":"Psh, those Highland dogs! Good riddance!"},{"id":1003060505,"text":"Hey you, why the long face? Those Highland dopes are gone!∠You should be happier!"},{"id":1003060514,"text":"In this port, we've got fishing boats and boats that'll∠ferry you across the lake to Kuskus."},{"id":1003060516,"text":"I can finally take my boat out. I'm ready and eager to go."},{"id":1003060517,"text":"Hohohohoho, so the leader of the ♂② Army∠turned out to be Genkaku's boy, eh..."},{"id":1003060518,"text":"Hahaha. Master Shu came and saved this city. I'm so happy."},{"id":1003060519,"text":"With the Highlanders gone, boats can finally come to∠port again."},{"id":1003060520,"text":"Hahahaha, those Highland soldiers ran away with their∠tails between their legs!"},{"id":1003060521,"text":"Soon I'll finally be able to clear out all the stuff piled∠up in the storehouses."},{"id":1003060522,"text":"I think Myu really likes you."},{"id":1003060530,"text":"So you're Genkaku's boy, eh? Guess the apple doesn't fall∠far from the tree when it comes to heroes!"},{"id":1003060531,"text":"This is the first peace this town has known since the∠Highland Army attacked."},{"id":1003060532,"text":"Now that our boats can come and go freely, we have plenty∠of delicious fish to eat."},{"id":1003060534,"text":"Mom said that we're having meat for dinner tonight! I can't∠wait!!!"},{"id":1003060535,"text":"Oh! Why if it isn't Commander ♂㈱! You're our∠true savior!"},{"id":1003060536,"text":"Those lowlifes still think this port belongs to them!"},{"id":1003060537,"text":"My dad is working hard again, just like before."},{"id":1003060538,"text":"Finally! Finally, the war is over! It actually is!!!"},{"id":1003060539,"text":"Off with you. I'm busy fixing supper.◎1∠War? I wouldn't know anything about that."},{"id":1003060540,"text":"Hi there mister..."},{"id":1003060541,"text":"Finally... Now I can relax and get on with my business."},{"id":1003060543,"text":"It's a new beginning for us."},{"id":1003060544,"text":"Whew, it's all over, eh? Guess I should get back to work∠soon..."},{"id":1003060545,"text":"Welcome. Try our delicious Coronet fish cuisine!"},{"id":1003060546,"text":"Hehehe, finally our town is bright and happy again."},{"id":1003060548,"text":"Welcome! Watch my husband work. He's really very good at∠his job!"},{"id":1003060549,"text":"My master is the greatest in all of Muse. If I say it, you∠better believe it."},{"id":1003060550,"text":"Heheh, my father said that I can play outside now. I'm so∠excited!"},{"id":1003060551,"text":"Wait a minute...◎1 Haven't I seen you before?"},{"id":1003060553,"text":"It's hard to have a big family. Laundry, cleaning,∠chores... It's like a war sometimes...◎1 But I'm glad∠everyone's safe and sound."},{"id":1003060554,"text":"Now I can finally devote some time to my precious bonsai.∠Thank you."},{"id":1003060559,"text":"With the Highlanders gone, things are back to normal. Now∠I can be top dog around here again."},{"id":1003060560,"text":"Come, everyone, celebrate! Those Highland scum are gone!∠It's time to party!"},{"id":1003060572,"text":"So the leader of the ♂② Army turned out to be∠the second coming of Genkaku, eh?"},{"id":1003060573,"text":"I knew that Master Shu was someone special. If only I could∠have met him a little earlier..."},{"id":1003060574,"text":"The town is back to normal. Work is back to normal. Lift∠this, carry that... Same old story."},{"id":1003060575,"text":"What? You want to go to Kuskus?"},{"id":1003060576,"text":"Ho-hum. Another day, another potch, am I right?"},{"id":1003060577,"text":"Listen! My cat, Myu, is gonna have kittens soon! I can't∠wait!"},{"id":1003060584,"text":"Coronet is under Highland rule. No one can pass through∠here. Go home. Get lost!"},{"id":1003060585,"text":"I'm sorry, sir. We're fixing the stairs. Please go around∠outside."},{"id":1003060586,"text":"I can't believe we got stuck here. Are we unlucky or what?"},{"id":1003060587,"text":"Want me to read your fortune?"},{"id":1003060588,"text":"Me wouldn't mind staying here a while."},{"id":1003060589,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. Let's get Rina and the others before∠he changes his mind."},{"id":1003060590,"text":"Please, go on through."},{"id":1003060591,"text":"Hello there, which will it be? Buy or sell?"},{"id":1003060592,"text":"Okay! Is there anything else?"},{"id":1003060593,"text":"Which one would you like?"},{"id":1003060594,"text":"Want to equip it?"},{"id":1003060599,"text":"Sorry, it doesn't look like you can."},{"id":1003060600,"text":"Right then, see you next time."},{"id":1003060601,"text":"It's 90 potch per person, so ♂③ potch in total."},{"id":1003060602,"text":"Goodnight, sir."},{"id":1003060605,"text":"Good morning sir. Did the sound of the waves disturb you?"},{"id":1003060606,"text":"Excuse me sir, but this won't cover your stay..."},{"id":1003060607,"text":"Which one you want to upgrade?"},{"id":1003060608,"text":"So, what'll it be?"},{"id":1003060609,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1003060610,"text":"Embed which one?"},{"id":1003060611,"text":"There ya go."},{"id":1003060612,"text":"......"},{"id":1003060613,"text":"Where do ya want it?"},{"id":1003060614,"text":"Remove which one?"},{"id":1003060615,"text":"Be seein' ya..."},{"id":1003070001,"text":"Beyond here is the neutral zone with Highland.∠No one can enter without permission."},{"id":1003070002,"text":"We're here on orders from Chamberlain Jess. You should have∠received word of us."},{"id":1003070003,"text":"Just a moment, please..."},{"id":1003070004,"text":"I'm starting to get pretty excited, ♂㈱, Jowy.∠It's like we're real spies or something."},{"id":1003070006,"text":"You're cleared. If you take a shortcut through the woods,∠you should be able to approach the Highland camp without∠being seen.∨Follow me, I'll show you the way."},{"id":1003070007,"text":"If you go through these woods, you'll find the Highland∠camp. Godspeed."},{"id":1003070008,"text":"Well, I guess this is where we split up..."},{"id":1003070009,"text":"Don't worry. We'll go along with you until we get to the∠enemy camp. C'mon, let's get moving!"},{"id":1003070010,"text":"♂㈱ and I will go alone from here. The rest of∠you stay put and wait for us.∨Okay, we have to change into our uniforms now, so..."},{"id":1003070011,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1003070012,"text":"Um...could you look the other way?"},{"id":1003070013,"text":"Huh? It's kinda big. But it'll have to do.∠Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003070014,"text":"You two just don't look right in those uniforms."},{"id":1003070015,"text":"R-Really?"},{"id":1003070016,"text":"♂㈱, Jowy, be careful. If things go wrong,∠just run for it, okay?"},{"id":1003070017,"text":"We haven't located their provisions yet."},{"id":1003070018,"text":"We should go find the tent with their provisions first. It's∠probably that big one over there..."},{"id":1003070019,"text":"It looks like that's where they're storing their supplies.∠But that guard..."},{"id":1003070020,"text":"What the?! Who the hell are you two?"},{"id":1003070021,"text":"Uh-oh..."},{"id":1003070022,"text":"Those are Youth Brigade uniforms... What are you doing here?"},{"id":1003070023,"text":"Well, you see... Um, w-we were in the Unicorn Brigade.∨Jowston soldiers ambushed us and everyone... ∠We barely made it out alive, but the rest of our unit was..."},{"id":1003070024,"text":"O-Oh... You kids are lucky to be alive. Those Jowston∠bastards! They're pure evil!"},{"id":1003070025,"text":"You're right."},{"id":1003070026,"text":"Are they though..."},{"id":1003070027,"text":"Damn right they are! Don't worry though! We'll take∠revenge on them for what they did to you boys!"},{"id":1003070028,"text":"Thank you. Um...our captain told us to come here and get∠some butter..."},{"id":1003070029,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1003070030,"text":"Um... Oh, I almost forgot. Our captain told us to come here∠and get some butter..."},{"id":1003070031,"text":"What? Really? Okay, follow me."},{"id":1003070032,"text":"Hey, let these guys in. They came to get some butter."},{"id":1003070033,"text":"Be quick about it then. My shift's almost over."},{"id":1003070034,"text":"Yes."},{"id":1003070035,"text":"Hey... You two!"},{"id":1003070036,"text":"Yes?"},{"id":1003070037,"text":"What do you want?"},{"id":1003070038,"text":"...Eh, what was I thinking? You couldn't be spies with faces∠like that.∨Right then, boys, keep your chins up, okay?"},{"id":1003070039,"text":"O-Okay, thank you, sir."},{"id":1003070040,"text":"What's the name of your captain?"},{"id":1003070042,"text":"...Captain Rowd."},{"id":1003070043,"text":"What's wrong? Don't know your captain's name?"},{"id":1003070044,"text":"That's weird... What's wrong, did you forget or something?"},{"id":1003070045,"text":"U-Umm... It's Captain Rowd."},{"id":1003070046,"text":"Okay, understood.∨Right then, boys, keep your chins up."},{"id":1003070048,"text":"Whew... Looks like we bluffed our way in."},{"id":1003070049,"text":"So this is where they're keeping their provisions.∠Let's take a look around."},{"id":1003070050,"text":"It's about two weeks' worth. I guess the Highland Army is∠planning to end things fast...∨Okay, let's go before we're caught."},{"id":1003070051,"text":"H-Hey, it's ♂㈱ and Jowy! What are you doing ∠here..."},{"id":1003070052,"text":"Captain Rowd..."},{"id":1003070053,"text":"Aha, so you really have become Jowston spies!∨Intruders!!!"},{"id":1003070054,"text":"Run for it!"},{"id":1003070055,"text":"You scum... Trampling all over my goodwill like that! I was∠going to ask them to show you some kindness, and you...∠You traitors!"},{"id":1003070056,"text":"You underhanded rats!∠Get those Jowston spies! Seize them!!!"},{"id":1003070058,"text":"Who are you two men? This tent is for the Royal Family."},{"id":1003070059,"text":"I guess we've got no choice..."},{"id":1003070060,"text":"Princess Jillia, my name is Rowd. I've been assigned to∠security here.∨Two Jowston spies have infiltrated the camp. Forgive me,∠but I'd like you to allow me to search this tent..."},{"id":1003070061,"text":"That will not be necessary. Please leave."},{"id":1003070062,"text":"I assure you it won't take but a moment..."},{"id":1003070063,"text":"I appreciate your diligence, soldier, but I wish to be∠alone."},{"id":1003070064,"text":"B-But, if by some chance..."},{"id":1003070065,"text":"I am asking you to leave. Or do you wish to intrude into∠a lady's private bedchamber?"},{"id":1003070066,"text":"Ah... N-No, my lady, I would never...∨P-Please forgive me for disturbing your rest, Princess."},{"id":1003070067,"text":"Was that good enough, Mr. Spy?"},{"id":1003070068,"text":"We threatened you... Forgive us."},{"id":1003070069,"text":"It's fine."},{"id":1003070070,"text":"What are you..."},{"id":1003070071,"text":"Please, don't be so frightened. I thought I'd serve some∠tea since you can't leave for awhile. It's the Highland way."},{"id":1003070072,"text":"Also, would you please put away that knife in your hand?∠Or perhaps that's acceptable behavior in the City-States?"},{"id":1003070074,"text":"We met once before in Kyaro Town, did we not?∨I remember you said something to the effect of \"This kingdom∠has betrayed us. And I won't let this stand.\"∨So? Do you think you can exact your revenge?"},{"id":1003070075,"text":"Well..."},{"id":1003070076,"text":"I will... Someday, I will."},{"id":1003070078,"text":"I see..."},{"id":1003070079,"text":"Oh, what happened to that feisty spirit you had back then?"},{"id":1003070080,"text":"Jillia... I mean, Your Highness.∠What are you doing here of all places?"},{"id":1003070081,"text":"Do you know of my brother?∠Luca Blight?"},{"id":1003070082,"text":"I do."},{"id":1003070083,"text":"...He's a fiendish monster."},{"id":1003070084,"text":"My brother is trying to fan the flames of this conflict,∠though the majority of Highland's people grow weary of it.∨Also...my brother is considering something truly horrendous.∠I came here thinking I could dissuade him somehow, but...∨It appears my efforts were in vain... He would not hear me∠out, and in fact, viewed even me as an \"enemy.\""},{"id":1003070085,"text":"♂㈱!"},{"id":1003070086,"text":"No... He may be exactly right. I'm Luca's younger sister,∠and sometimes even I don't understand him.∨My brother is trying to fan the flames of this conflict,∠though the majority of Highland's people grow weary of it.∨Also...my brother is considering something truly horrendous.∠I came here thinking I could dissuade him somehow, but...∨It appears my efforts were in vain... He would not hear me∠out, and in fact, viewed even me as an \"enemy.\""},{"id":1003070087,"text":"It appears I lack the power to stop my brother. This was∠merely a reminder of that...∨This is the extent of my influence as a woman..."},{"id":1003070088,"text":"Oh, I spoke so long that the tea has grown cold...∨Things seem to have quieted down outside. Perhaps you'd like∠to leave now?"},{"id":1003070089,"text":"You're right."},{"id":1003070090,"text":"The tea was delicious."},{"id":1003070091,"text":"Farewell. I do not think we will meet again..."},{"id":1003070092,"text":"...Thank you."},{"id":1003070093,"text":"Just as I thought.∠That princess is acting against Prince Luca, you see.∨So I kept on the lookout, and as suspected, look who pops∠out of her tent. Prepare to die, Jowston spies!"},{"id":1003070094,"text":"Crap."},{"id":1003070095,"text":"You won't get away this time. Kill them!"},{"id":1003070096,"text":"Damn... ♂㈱, I'll figure out a way to hold∠them off here.∨I want you to make a run for it. If they get both of us,∠Nanami and the others waiting for us will be in trouble too."},{"id":1003070097,"text":"I can't do that."},{"id":1003070098,"text":"Got it."},{"id":1003070099,"text":"We don't have time to argue! Hurry!!!"},{"id":1003070100,"text":"Then hurry and run. You don't have to wait for me!"},{"id":1003070101,"text":"What are you doing?! Go!!!"},{"id":1003070102,"text":"We're out of time, ♂㈱! Go!!!"},{"id":1003070103,"text":"I promise I'll catch up to you! They're not going to get∠me! Now get moving!!!"},{"id":1003070104,"text":"Oh, trying to buy some time so your friend can get away?∠That's very sweet of you, but it's meaningless."},{"id":1003070105,"text":"Shut your mouth! Saving my friends has plenty of meaning∠for me!"},{"id":1003070106,"text":"Empty talk! We'll capture you, ♂㈱, and your∠other little friends too."},{"id":1003070107,"text":"O Dark Sword Rune, if you really are one of the true∠runes...∨If you can grant me the power that I need..."},{"id":1003070108,"text":"Oh, there you are! You're back! Come here! Are you okay?∠I heard a lot of yelling, so I thought they had captured∠you.∨Huh? Where's Jowy? Don't tell me he..."},{"id":1003070109,"text":"There they are! Over here! Hurry!!!"},{"id":1003070110,"text":"Huh? Wait, what happened?"},{"id":1003070111,"text":"Whew... B-But what is all this? Hey, tell me,∠♂㈱! Where's Jowy? When we were∠all together..."},{"id":1003211058,"text":"I...I'm a rune sage...but I couldn't do anything..."},{"id":1003211092,"text":"It's just me and my sister now...◎1 But we won't give up..."},{"id":1003211100,"text":"I survived, but my brother..."},{"id":1003211106,"text":"I...just sit here and drink like I always did, so the others∠won't get lonely..."},{"id":1003211108,"text":"I'm going on a journey... to seek power...∠The power to save people..."},{"id":1003211141,"text":"I think you'll like this. It's from Kanakan to the south.∠I saved it just to drink with you.∨♂▼0Well, truth be told this one bottle was all I managed to∠carry out with me when my fort burned down."},{"id":1003211142,"text":"Whew...∨The people of this city are sleeping peacefully now. But∠the flames of war will be here soon.∨♂▼1Even if we gather troops from all the city-states, I have to∠wonder what our chances will be when we come face-to-face∠with Luca Blight's forces..."},{"id":1003211143,"text":"I...I mean \"we\"...can't afford to lose. If we do, we lose∠everything, all of those lives...∨♂▼2Just the thought of it makes me so sad that sometimes I even∠find myself thinking it'd be best to surrender quietly..."},{"id":1003211144,"text":"A leader can't think that way. Everyone's fightin' as hard∠as they can. They all have somethin' they want to defend.∠You do too.∨♂▼3Even if it's in the interest of survival, there are some∠things you just don't do. At least that's the way I see it."},{"id":1003211145,"text":"You're a bigshot now. Me? You don't wanna be seen∠with the likes of me.∨♂▼4Anyway, catch ya tomorrow."},{"id":1003211146,"text":"Sorry, Pilika.∨♂▼0Nanami, could you watch her for a little while?"},{"id":1003211147,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. We've kept this hidden,∠waiting for this day to come. Please, it's from all of us."},{"id":1003211158,"text":"It's 100 potch a night per person, so ♂③ potch total."},{"id":1003211161,"text":"Please come again!"},{"id":1003211162,"text":"Good morning. Would you like some breakfast?"},{"id":1003211163,"text":"You don't have enough money."},{"id":1003211164,"text":"What would you like to buy?"},{"id":1003211165,"text":"Anything else?"},{"id":1003211168,"text":"Thanks."},{"id":1003211172,"text":"You can't equip that."},{"id":1003211173,"text":"Thank you very much."},{"id":1003211194,"text":"Hey, take a close look at our lineup."},{"id":1003211195,"text":"Anything else? Please don't hesitate to ask."},{"id":1003211203,"text":"Thank you. We look forward to your next visit."},{"id":1003211224,"text":"Can I help you?"},{"id":1003211227,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1003211229,"text":"On who?"},{"id":1003211230,"text":"Where?"},{"id":1003211231,"text":"Seal what?"},{"id":1003211232,"text":"That can't be attached."},{"id":1003211233,"text":"Farewell..."},{"id":1003211235,"text":"That can't be returned to an orb."},{"id":1003211260,"text":"Yes, yes. Which one shall I appraise?"},{"id":1003211261,"text":"Anything else you want me to look at?"},{"id":1003211262,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1003211263,"text":"Hmm, this is a..."},{"id":1003211264,"text":"Thanks."},{"id":1003211265,"text":"■"},{"id":1003211269,"text":"Please come back again."},{"id":1003211270,"text":"Which one do you want me to upgrade?"},{"id":1003211271,"text":"Wanna upgrade it more?"},{"id":1003211275,"text":"Hah! Hah! Hah! Hah!"},{"id":1003220034,"text":"Please rest at least a little bit."},{"id":1003220038,"text":"Do you feel refreshed?"},{"id":1003240009,"text":"Don't worry, he's old enough not to get lost. Anyway, let's∠head for the meeting hall."},{"id":1003250001,"text":"Heheheheh, they ran away with their tails tucked between∠their legs!"},{"id":1003250002,"text":"Can we be so sure of that? Something seems odd..."},{"id":1003250003,"text":"True..."},{"id":1003250004,"text":"You the worryin' type too, Klaus?"},{"id":1003250006,"text":"Now c'mon, let's enter Muse and take a look."},{"id":1003250007,"text":"Be careful. There might still be some Highland soldiers∠in hiding."},{"id":1003250008,"text":"Yeah, yeah."},{"id":1003250009,"text":"Man... It's a real ghost town. Maybe all the people are off∠at a ceremony like the one Miklotov mentioned?"},{"id":1003250010,"text":"C-Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1003250011,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1003250012,"text":"It's just...I thought I saw something inside...like shadows∠moving."},{"id":1003250013,"text":"Hmmm, what should we do? Wanna take a peek inside? Our∠strategist did warn us, but...∨I've never been one to ignore this kinda stuff."},{"id":1003250014,"text":"A-A monster!"},{"id":1003250015,"text":"H-H-Help!!!"},{"id":1003250016,"text":"What is it?!"},{"id":1003250017,"text":"Wh-What the hell was that thing...?"},{"id":1003250018,"text":"Aaagh!!!"},{"id":1003250019,"text":"Wh-What the hell...?"},{"id":1003250020,"text":"Wh-What the...?"},{"id":1003250021,"text":"Damn! We gotta get outta here!!!"},{"id":1003250022,"text":"Are you okay, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1003250023,"text":"Yes, we're fine. But what were those things?"},{"id":1003250024,"text":"Spawn of the Beast Rune... Its servants, so to say."},{"id":1003250025,"text":"\"Beast Rune\"?"},{"id":1003250027,"text":"So...Luca Blight really did sacrifice all of the people of∠Muse..."},{"id":1003250028,"text":"The presence of those things would certainly suggest so.∠The Beast Rune probably needed blood sacrifices to∠be awakened."},{"id":1003250029,"text":"And what exactly happens when it does wake up?"},{"id":1003250030,"text":"Who knows?∠But if it was indeed awakened with human blood,∠my guess is that the rune's power would manifest∠as a huge beast that thirsts for more of the same.∨Anyhow, I think the rune itself has been moved∠someplace else. I don't sense its power here."},{"id":1003250031,"text":"Commander! Commander ♂㈱! We've got trouble!∠The Highland soldiers are back!!!"},{"id":1003250032,"text":"Dammit! They couldn't have picked a worse time!"},{"id":1003250033,"text":"It looks like they were waiting for this moment..."},{"id":1003250034,"text":"*huff* *huff*∠They're coming from the north and east.∠If we want to escape, we'll have to go west."},{"id":1003250035,"text":"Okay, let's hurry..."},{"id":1003250036,"text":"Wait! It's a trick. They're trying to throw us into a panic.∠If they're attacking in small numbers, they probably have∠soldiers lying in ambush to the west and south.∨General Hauser, rally the troops and head north. Break∠through the center of the attackers' ranks and then retreat.∨There won't be any soldiers waiting to ambush you there."},{"id":1003250037,"text":"Understood."},{"id":1003250038,"text":"Let's get outta here, ♂㈱."},{"id":1003250040,"text":"Hey, c'mon. We may as well have a look around. It's been∠forever since we were here last."},{"id":1003250041,"text":"It looks like there's something inside, so..."},{"id":1003250042,"text":"This is bad! Run for it, ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1003250043,"text":"Commander, please choose the rest of your party."},{"id":1003260125,"text":"Everyone... They're all gone..."},{"id":1003260148,"text":"I got lucky and they didn't find me..."},{"id":1003260150,"text":"*sob*"},{"id":1003260175,"text":"I was too late... I'll never see any of them again..."},{"id":1003260198,"text":"We're the survivors... It's our responsibility to restore∠this city."},{"id":1003260200,"text":"I-I..."},{"id":1003270026,"text":"Yeah, I heard once that High Priest Hikusaak gave it to the∠Blight Clan when Highland split away from the Holy Kingdom∠of Harmonia.∨Those things are under the rune's control."},{"id":1003310018,"text":"You guys grew up in that filthy courtyard... You got∠brainwashed by all the guns and codes.∨But I put an end to all that, ♂▼0with my friends Mond and∠Stern here."},{"id":1003310019,"text":"So why didn't you kill me back then too?! ♂▼1Let's see if you∠can do it now, you witch!!!"},{"id":1004010001,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. Good timing. Everyone's all∠worked up because a ship just arrived from Highland. It's∠over this way."},{"id":1004010002,"text":"What should we do? Wanna go take a look?"},{"id":1004010003,"text":"Hey, it's Commander ♂㈱!!!!"},{"id":1004010004,"text":"Yeah! You're right! I've never seen him this close."},{"id":1004010005,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, over here. This guy says he's a∠messenger from Highland, but I'm not so sure. Should we∠tie him up?"},{"id":1004010006,"text":"Ah, wonderful. I thought I was going to have to come to you."},{"id":1004010007,"text":"Wh-What?"},{"id":1004010008,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I've seen you on the∠battlefield, but never face to face like this.∨I'm Culgan, General of the 3rd Royal Highland Army under the∠command of King Jowy Blight. Pleased to meet you."},{"id":1004010009,"text":"Jowy Blight? Do you mean the Jowy we know?"},{"id":1004010010,"text":"Yes. With Luca Blight fallen in battle, Lady Jillia, now∠sole surviving heir to the royal family, has officially wed∠Lord Jowy.∨Thus he has now become King Jowy, successor to the Blight∠royal family and ruler of Highland."},{"id":1004010011,"text":"Huh? No way! Whaaat?! J-Jowy is...married?!"},{"id":1004010012,"text":"You two are friends of his. He had hoped you would attend∠the ceremony, but unfortunately it was impossible."},{"id":1004010013,"text":"Huh? Wait? So what do you want? Some kind of wedding∠gift?"},{"id":1004010014,"text":".........◎2∨No, the reason I am here today is to deliver an offer of∠peace between Highland and the City-States...∨I bear a letter addressed to Commander ♂㈱,∠leader of the ♂② Army."},{"id":1004010015,"text":"Peace? You mean...the war is over?"},{"id":1004010016,"text":"Yes...if negotiations go smoothly, that is."},{"id":1004010017,"text":"Wow, really? That's great, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004010018,"text":"It may seem brash of me to ask this of the leader of the∠♂② Army, but could you take me to∠♂① Castle?∨I could deliver the letter here, but to prove that this is∠a formal peace offer, I'd prefer to do it there."},{"id":1004010019,"text":"G-General Culgan! You mustn't go alone..."},{"id":1004010020,"text":"Don't worry. I want you to wait here. Commander∠♂㈱ isn't that kind of person.∨Now then, if you'd please."},{"id":1004010021,"text":"Of course. If it means ending the war, no problem at all!"},{"id":1004010022,"text":"Hey, did you hear? The war is ending!"},{"id":1004010023,"text":"Finally, we can live in peace."},{"id":1004010024,"text":"You don't know that! We can't believe a thing those∠Highlanders say!"},{"id":1004010049,"text":"Heh... Hey there, buddy. You must be quite the lucky fella,∠havin' so many pretty ladies at your side."},{"id":1004010050,"text":"Yeah, ya know, I'm actually kinda jealous. Say, big guy, how∠'bout sharin' a few of your fine friends with us poor,∠unlucky types?"},{"id":1004010051,"text":"No way! Stop! I'll have Bonaparte eat you!"},{"id":1004010052,"text":"Hehe, be a good girl!"},{"id":1004010053,"text":"Stop that!!!"},{"id":1004010054,"text":"Do whatever you like."},{"id":1004010055,"text":"We're gonna take your women, and all your potch too."},{"id":1004010056,"text":"Wuh-ho, look at this guy, actin' brave for the ladies."},{"id":1004010057,"text":"Heh, too bad, lover-boy."},{"id":1004010058,"text":"No! Get away! Wake up, Bonaparte!!!"},{"id":1004010059,"text":"Now just quiet down and quit fightin'..."},{"id":1004010060,"text":"Get your hands off her, scum."},{"id":1004010061,"text":"Wh-Who the hell're you?!"},{"id":1004010062,"text":"You still have something to say?"},{"id":1004010063,"text":"E-Eep..."},{"id":1004010064,"text":"You back with us?"},{"id":1004010065,"text":"Wh-What happened?"},{"id":1004010067,"text":"I know it's tough because you can't fight very well, but∠girls need to be kept safe. Am I right?"},{"id":1004010068,"text":"You are."},{"id":1004010069,"text":"I-I'll do my best."},{"id":1004010070,"text":"Okay, good answer. And your name is...♂㈱?∨I'm Oulan. I was a bodyguard for hire, but now I'm out of∠work.∨So, think you can walk? I'll get you where you need to be."},{"id":1004010072,"text":"No, don't worry about it."},{"id":1004010073,"text":"I see. Well, be careful. And make sure you protect your∠friends better next time."},{"id":1004010074,"text":"Hmm... Okay. But first I want to hear about your situation."},{"id":1004010075,"text":"So, you're fighting Highland, eh? I thought you were just a∠kid, but I guess I was wrong...∨Okay, I'll do it."},{"id":1004010076,"text":"You seem to be well worth protecting. Glad to join you,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1004010077,"text":"What's up, kid?"},{"id":1004010080,"text":"Really? Well, see ya around."},{"id":1004010081,"text":"Join you? Hmm... What to do... Whaddaya think, Yam Koo?"},{"id":1004010082,"text":"It's not like you haven't already made up your mind."},{"id":1004010083,"text":"Yeah, well. Hey kid, I suppose I could join your team.∨Thing is, I make a rule of never linkin' up with guys who∠have bad luck. So how about it? Wanna test your luck?"},{"id":1004010085,"text":"N-No thanks."},{"id":1004010086,"text":"That might be wise. If you lost your shirt to my brother, I∠couldn't do a thing about it."},{"id":1004010087,"text":"As if I'd even want a shirt like that."},{"id":1004010088,"text":"Oh, feel like trying your luck now?"},{"id":1004010089,"text":"Hey, that's the spirit. We'll roll some dice. If ya win∠5,000 potch or more, I'm all yours!"},{"id":1004010090,"text":"...Wait, ya don't have enough potch. Come see me once you've∠saved up some more. I'll be waitin'."},{"id":1004010091,"text":"Haha, looks like you're outta luck, kid. But maybe you'll∠do better tomorrow, so don't let it get ya down."},{"id":1004010092,"text":"Hey, not bad. I'm not surprised though. I always had ya∠pegged for a winner."},{"id":1004010093,"text":"Uh-oh, here we go again with the half-baked reasoning."},{"id":1004010094,"text":"Quiet, you. It's fine, I'd already made up my mind anyway.∠Well alright, kid. Count me in."},{"id":1004010095,"text":"*groan* And so it begins once more..."},{"id":1004010096,"text":"Aw, stop complainin' and just go with it, Yam Koo."},{"id":1004010097,"text":"Yeah, yeah."},{"id":1004010098,"text":"Hey, it's been a while, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004010099,"text":"Hmm... Is there nothing to fulfill me? No blade that will∠seize my soul and compel me to hone it?∨I dare not ask for the Celestial Sword or the Dragon King∠Sword, but surely there is something..."},{"id":1004010100,"text":"Hm? Y-You... That sword!"},{"id":1004010101,"text":"Wh-Whoa, what's gotten into you, gramps?"},{"id":1004010102,"text":"That blade you hold... Could it be the Celestial Sword?"},{"id":1004010103,"text":"Ah, so you know of me?"},{"id":1004010104,"text":"But of course I do. It is my honor to meet such a legendary∠blade as yourself.∨Why, magnificent to behold as you are, your edge must be so∠keen as to slice through nearly anything."},{"id":1004010105,"text":"That goes without saying."},{"id":1004010107,"text":"Celestial Sword, no, Great Celestial Sword, please allow me∠to sharpen you. It would rekindle the flame of passion∠within me. Please, I beg of you."},{"id":1004010108,"text":"Hmm, now what should I do...?"},{"id":1004010109,"text":"Cut it out, old fella. It's just a cruddy old sword. No need∠for all that bowin' and scrapin'."},{"id":1004010110,"text":"What was that, Viktor?! You dare to call me a cruddy old∠sword?!"},{"id":1004010111,"text":"If the scabbard fits, wear it!"},{"id":1004010112,"text":"Wh-Why you..."},{"id":1004010113,"text":"Ah! Oh, please, Great Celestial Sword, surely there is no∠need to use your awe-inspiring might here?"},{"id":1004010114,"text":"Hmph... I suppose you're right. Consider your life spared∠this time, Viktor."},{"id":1004010115,"text":"Yeah, big talk, tin man."},{"id":1004010116,"text":"You just don't know when to shut your mouth."},{"id":1004010117,"text":"U-Um...may I sharpen...I mean, may I join you?"},{"id":1004010120,"text":"B-But... What of my passion?"},{"id":1004010121,"text":"Have you changed your mind? Please, let me join you..."},{"id":1004010122,"text":"Thank you very much. I swear I will repay this debt."},{"id":1004010123,"text":"You swing me too violently."},{"id":1004010124,"text":"Yeah right! If I don't whack the baddies hard enough, they∠don't drop. So if anything, it's your fault, got that?!"},{"id":1004010125,"text":"Wh-Whack? Your buffoonery never ceases to amaze me. ∠To think you would liken a storied blade like myself to∠a club..."},{"id":1004010127,"text":"Oh, I'm sorry... I'm busy preparing the stage..."},{"id":1004010128,"text":"What...what do you want?"},{"id":1004010130,"text":"You're beautiful."},{"id":1004010131,"text":"Oh, nothing."},{"id":1004010132,"text":"Oh...I see."},{"id":1004010133,"text":"Oh, please... That isn't true..."},{"id":1004010134,"text":"You want me to join your group? But...I wouldn't be of any∠use to you..."},{"id":1004010135,"text":"That's not true."},{"id":1004010136,"text":"You're right."},{"id":1004010137,"text":"Yes, I suppose so..."},{"id":1004010138,"text":"Really? W-Well..."},{"id":1004010139,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1004010140,"text":"Do you have a complaint?"},{"id":1004010141,"text":"Umm... Just one thing. If you can keep up with my dancing,∠I'll join you... Does that sound fair?"},{"id":1004010142,"text":"Umm. W-Well it's not exactly a complaint, but...∨Um... If you can keep up with my dancing, I'll join you.∠Does that sound fair?"},{"id":1004010143,"text":"Okay, you're on!"},{"id":1004010144,"text":"Nah, forget about it."},{"id":1004010145,"text":"Okay, let me go get ready... I'll be right back..."},{"id":1004010146,"text":"O-Oh, I see..."},{"id":1004010147,"text":"...I-Is there something else?"},{"id":1004010148,"text":"I really do want you to join us."},{"id":1004010150,"text":"Okay...let's dance then. If you can keep up with me, I'll∠join you."},{"id":1004010151,"text":"Really... Okay..."},{"id":1004010152,"text":"Hahaha, too bad! Promise me you'll come back and∠dance with me again, though."},{"id":1004010153,"text":"Hahaha, that was fun. Thanks, ♂㈱. Well, a∠promise is a promise. Consider me a part of the team."},{"id":1004010154,"text":"Okay, I'll head to ♂① Castle after I finish∠getting ready."},{"id":1004010213,"text":"Say, you look like you've got potch to spare.
