Let's go to that sluice gate up ahead."},{"id":1004020022,"text":"Wait, ♂㈱.♂◆∨Is that really a promise?"},{"id":1004020023,"text":"Whaddaya want? This is no place for a buncha landlubbers∠like you."},{"id":1004020024,"text":"Could you please close the watergate?"},{"id":1004020025,"text":"Fine, I get it."},{"id":1004020026,"text":"Well, whaddaya know, a squirt who knows his place. Now get∠on outta here."},{"id":1004020027,"text":"The watergate? That's a funny joke, kid. This gate only∠gets closed a couple times a year for special reasons.∨Why in the hell should I do that for you?∠Just shut up, turn around, and get outta my face."},{"id":1004020028,"text":"Please. It's very important."},{"id":1004020029,"text":"You don't hear too well, do ya, princess? I ain't playin'∠around here. Am I gonna have to get rough?"},{"id":1004020030,"text":"You can do whatever you want, but please, close the∠watergate..."},{"id":1004020031,"text":"A-Apple, let's just give up."},{"id":1004020032,"text":"See? I'd listen to that little cutie's advice if I were you."},{"id":1004020033,"text":"What's up, Gin? Got some trouble?"},{"id":1004020034,"text":"Hey, Amada, I dunno what the hell's goin' on, but these∠crazy kids won't get off my case about closin' the∠watergate."},{"id":1004020035,"text":"Huh, that is pretty weird. But if they're givin' you∠trouble, I'll take care of it."},{"id":1004020036,"text":"Thanks, yer a lifesaver."},{"id":1004020037,"text":"So what's the big fuss?∠I take it the watergate is that thing over there?"},{"id":1004020038,"text":"Yes. Can't you close it for one day, no, even just a night?"},{"id":1004020039,"text":"Hmm, I see. But sorry, little lady, we can't just go around∠openin' and closin' the gate for no good reason.∨Now if someone's life was in danger or there was some other∠emergency, things might be different."},{"id":1004020040,"text":"Many people's lives do depend on it. We need it closed to∠defeat the Highland Army."},{"id":1004020041,"text":"Huh?∨Does a watergate have somethin' to do with the war?∨I mean, I am from down south and all, so I dunno∠how you folks do things up here, but I can't see∠how a sluice is gonna change things."},{"id":1004020043,"text":"Forget about it."},{"id":1004020044,"text":"Did I get through to ya? Whew, thanks for seein' reason,∠kid. I didn't want this to get any rougher than it had to."},{"id":1004020045,"text":"Huh, okay then. Hmm...I got a soft spot for folks who got∠real steel in their eyes like you do.∨So here's how it's gonna be: I'll fight ya for it. You win,∠and I'll accept that ya really mean business and close the∠gate.∨So, you in?"},{"id":1004020046,"text":"I'm in."},{"id":1004020047,"text":"No thanks."},{"id":1004020048,"text":"Aw, seriously? Maybe I read you wrong. Ya look like a pretty∠tough kid, so I thought ya'd be up for it."},{"id":1004020049,"text":"I knew ya'd be up for it. I got a good eye for character,∠and you got a tough look about ya.∨Anyway, you're a man in my book. Okay, let's do this!∠Here I come!"},{"id":1004020050,"text":"I knew ya'd be up for it. I got a good eye for character,∠so this makes ya a man in my book. Okay, let's do this!∠Here I come!"},{"id":1004020051,"text":"Hahaha! Well, they do say part of winning is luck. Come back∠anytime ya want. I'll be ready."},{"id":1004020052,"text":"Whoa, ouch... Ease up there, slugger. No need to knock my∠block off for real.∨Man, I didn't expect that... But a promise is a promise.∠We'll close the sluice, but only for one night, got it?"},{"id":1004020053,"text":"O-Okay. Thank you so much."},{"id":1004020054,"text":"Hey, Amada, you sure about this?"},{"id":1004020055,"text":"Huh? Yeah, these guys have a good reason, and a pretty∠important one at that. I'll take the blame if anything comes∠up, so help 'em out, Gin."},{"id":1004020056,"text":"S-Sure, you got it. Gotta say, though, this is pretty odd."},{"id":1004020057,"text":"Are you okay? You're not hurt?"},{"id":1004020058,"text":"Oh yeah, he's fine. ♂㈱ is a lot tougher∠than he looks."},{"id":1004020059,"text":"...I'm sorry.∨We don't have much time, so let's hurry and get back∠below the bridge."},{"id":1004020060,"text":"O-Okay..."},{"id":1004020061,"text":"Th-This water looks really cold..."},{"id":1004020062,"text":"We have to hurry or we'll be out of daylight. We have to get∠in as soon as the water level drops..."},{"id":1004020063,"text":"Hey, are you okay? It's starting to get cold."},{"id":1004020064,"text":"I'm fine. You all can go back to the inn if you want."},{"id":1004020065,"text":"I'll help too."},{"id":1004020066,"text":"Okay, we'll see you later..."},{"id":1004020067,"text":"What are you talking about?! Don't be stupid!"},{"id":1004020068,"text":"Hey, c'mon, enough already! We're never gonna find it..."},{"id":1004020070,"text":"...Hey, listen. We're not meant to find it! I saw the whole∠thing!"},{"id":1004020071,"text":"What did you see?!"},{"id":1004020072,"text":"What happened when Shu threw the coin.∨He switched it out for a pebble just before the throw.∠It happened so fast that I wasn't sure what I saw...∨But that's why...that's why we'll never be able to find it."},{"id":1004020073,"text":"...He would never do that. I'm going to keep searching."},{"id":1004020075,"text":"...It's fine."},{"id":1004020076,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1004020077,"text":"You can go back, it's fine. I...knew it as well. That Shu∠wasn't even willing to give me a fair chance...∨It's just...I didn't want to believe it. That's why...∨Please, go on back to the inn..."},{"id":1004020078,"text":"Don't say that..."},{"id":1004020079,"text":"...Hey!"},{"id":1004020080,"text":"What's that?!"},{"id":1004020081,"text":"Huh, really? Could it be?"},{"id":1004020082,"text":"It is! It really is the coin!!!"},{"id":1004020083,"text":"R-Really?"},{"id":1004020084,"text":"Good job, ♂㈱! Yay! You're the best!"},{"id":1004020085,"text":"The coin... N-Now Shu will..."},{"id":1004020087,"text":"Shu!"},{"id":1004020088,"text":"You promised."},{"id":1004020089,"text":"Yes, I did."},{"id":1004020090,"text":"You're freezing... Why did you have to do that?"},{"id":1004020091,"text":"It was necessary."},{"id":1004020092,"text":"......∨You're a strong girl. I may have inherited Master Mathiu's∠talent, but you inherited his resolve, it would seem."},{"id":1004020093,"text":"S-So then..."},{"id":1004020094,"text":"Yes, leave it to me. You now have a mind worth more than∠a million soldiers on your side."},{"id":1004020095,"text":"Th-Thank you."},{"id":1004020096,"text":"Can I see that coin?"},{"id":1004020097,"text":"Th-That rune on your right hand..."},{"id":1004020098,"text":"♂㈱, was it? You wouldn't happen to be Master∠Genkaku's adopted son, would you?"},{"id":1004020099,"text":"How do you know about Grandpa Genkaku?"},{"id":1004020100,"text":"Hmm...∨There aren't many left who remember now, but the name of∠Master Genkaku has a special meaning for the City-States of∠Jowston."},{"id":1004020101,"text":"Wh-Wh-What do you mean?"},{"id":1004020102,"text":"We'll talk about it after the battle. Right now, our main∠priority is defeating Solon Jhee and his troops.∨♂㈱... I want to thank you for helping Apple.∨Between you and that rune on your hand, we might just have∠a chance of winning this war."},{"id":1004020103,"text":"But this coin..."},{"id":1004020104,"text":"Heh... Another job well done."},{"id":1004020105,"text":"How did it go?"},{"id":1004020106,"text":"Well, it could take some time since it was all so sudden.∠He needs to dismiss his workers and wrap up a few things.∠He said we should head back first without him, so let's go."},{"id":1004020107,"text":"Are you sure? He might be trying to trick us again..."},{"id":1004020108,"text":"Don't worry. Shu isn't that kind of person. ∠Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004020109,"text":"Why, Master Freed! What a pleasant surprise. Are you a∠member of the ♂② Army now?"},{"id":1004020110,"text":"Yes, that's right. And in order to win the war, it is∠crucial that we get to a village downriver. Will you take∠out your boat for us?"},{"id":1004020111,"text":"Of course."},{"id":1004020112,"text":"Hey, how've ya been since last time? Did ya come to see me?"},{"id":1004020113,"text":"Haha, what gives? Did ya really miss my face that much?"},{"id":1004020115,"text":"Yeah, how have you been?"},{"id":1004020116,"text":"You're askin' how I've been? Well, as ya can see, I'm as∠healthy as a horse."},{"id":1004020117,"text":"Join ya... Lessee... Oh, so you're sayin' ya want to sign on∠with me and hit the open sea together, right?◎2 Huh? No?"},{"id":1004020118,"text":"Huh, so you've started your own crew and are fightin' the∠Man, that's great! Really somethin'! You're movin' me to∠tears of pride here.∨Okay, I'll tell ya what: Lets's have a rematch and settle∠the matter for real this time!∨You and me, one on one! And if ya win, I'll join your crew!"},{"id":1004020119,"text":"Okay!"},{"id":1004020120,"text":"W-Wait a minute."},{"id":1004020121,"text":"What? I was all ready and rarin' to go. Well, go do what ya∠need to do and come back."},{"id":1004020122,"text":"Hey, that's the spirit. A leader's gotta be decisive. Now,∠time to honor my word as a man!"},{"id":1004020123,"text":"Okay, let's go, uh...♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1004020124,"text":"Hey, hang in there. I got faith in ya. Take a breather and∠come try me again!"},{"id":1004020125,"text":"Alright, I take it you're ready now! Here goes nothin'!!!"},{"id":1004020126,"text":"Hey, good luck out there."},{"id":1004020127,"text":"Yo, long time no see. I know you. You're the leader of the∠♂② Army now, right? Go knock 'em dead, kid."},{"id":1004020128,"text":"Haha, it's ♂② Army bossman. You workin' hard?"},{"id":1004020129,"text":"Richmond, please join us."},{"id":1004020130,"text":"Yeah, I'm working hard."},{"id":1004020131,"text":"No, I'm hardly working."},{"id":1004020132,"text":"That's the spirit. Go get 'em, kid."},{"id":1004020133,"text":"Aw, c'mon. Keep your chin up."},{"id":1004020134,"text":"I had a feelin' you were gonna ask that. In fact, I knew ya∠would. Sure, I got no problem with joinin' your team, but...∨I can't hardly do it for nothin', now can I? Okay, here's∠what I'll do. See this coin? I'm gonna flip it, and if ya∠can call what it lands on, I'll join ya.∨Whaddaya say?"},{"id":1004020135,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1004020136,"text":"I don't know..."},{"id":1004020137,"text":"Okay, then forget about havin' me join ya."},{"id":1004020138,"text":"Haha, here to take me up on my challenge? I knew it."},{"id":1004020139,"text":"Here goes!"},{"id":1004020140,"text":"Heads!"},{"id":1004020141,"text":"Tails!"},{"id":1004020142,"text":"Haha, too bad. It's tails."},{"id":1004020143,"text":"Aw, so close. It's heads."},{"id":1004020144,"text":"One more time!"},{"id":1004020145,"text":"I give up..."},{"id":1004020146,"text":"Haha, no problem."},{"id":1004020147,"text":"Oh well, if ya change your mind, c'mon back."},{"id":1004020148,"text":"Hahahaha! You made a bet with Richmond? ∠That guy's a cheat!∨He uses a trick coin. It's heavier on one side, see, so he∠can tell whether it's heads or tails in his hand. Then he∠just does a quick maneuver when he opens his hand and...∨Well, you get the picture. Here, kid, I got somethin' for ya.∠Use this coin next time you challenge him."},{"id":1004020149,"text":"You acquired a coin."},{"id":1004020150,"text":"Here for another go? Maybe ya can win this time."},{"id":1004020151,"text":"Here, use this coin."},{"id":1004020152,"text":"Okay, you're on."},{"id":1004020153,"text":"Haha! Finally figured it out, eh? Sorry for trickin' ya.∨But the thing is, ♂㈱, a leader needs to be∠able to see through cheap cons like that, ya get me?∨Okay, a promise is a promise. I'll join your team."},{"id":1004020154,"text":"Well, goodbye Radat, hello ♂① Castle.∠Oh, don't worry. I know the way, of course."},{"id":1004020155,"text":"Hello there. Um, pardon me, but do I know you? Are you a∠friend of my husband?"},{"id":1004020157,"text":"Huh? Oh, no, it's nothing! Work comes first right now. Let's∠get moving, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004020159,"text":"Whew, maybe I'll take a short rest..."},{"id":1004020160,"text":"Oh, hello there. Pardon me, but I didn't notice that I had∠visitors..."},{"id":1004020161,"text":"Freed!!!"},{"id":1004020162,"text":"How are you? Are you unhurt? ∠I've been so worried about you."},{"id":1004020163,"text":"Yoshino, please forgive me..."},{"id":1004020164,"text":"Why? If you were okay, why didn't you tell me?∨South Window surrendered, and Lord Granmeyer was killed...∨I was so very worried... Why didn't you send word?"},{"id":1004020165,"text":"Yoshino, with Lord Granmeyer dead, it is my duty as∠assistant to the late mayor to do whatever I can for the∠people of South Window.∨Now is the time to fight, not the time for me to worry about∠my personal affairs."},{"id":1004020166,"text":"You have always been this way... And yet, you came back.∠To your home. To me."},{"id":1004020167,"text":"Yoshino, I'm so sorry...∨But I'm here on business with Commander ♂㈱.∠Once our task is done, I must leave again."},{"id":1004020168,"text":"Freed..."},{"id":1004020169,"text":"Yoshino, please wait a little longer... Until this war, and∠all that comes with it, ends..."},{"id":1004020170,"text":"I won't."},{"id":1004020171,"text":"What?! What did you say?"},{"id":1004020172,"text":"I said I won't wait any longer."},{"id":1004020173,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please take me along with you.∠The only skills I possess are the naginata and laundry.∨Nevertheless, I wish to fight alongside my husband, Freed.∠I plead of you."},{"id":1004020175,"text":"No."},{"id":1004020176,"text":"Really?! Oh, thank you so much!"},{"id":1004020177,"text":"Commander!!!∨N-No, forgive me, it is your decision to make as our leader.∠I won't interfere..."},{"id":1004020178,"text":"Dear, I don't want to be apart from you. I don't want to∠worry about you each day.∨Even if it is dangerous, I'd rather face that danger by your∠side than be alone..."},{"id":1004020179,"text":"Yoshino... It is dangerous, but I will never let any harm∠befall you!∨I swear this on my life!"},{"id":1004020181,"text":"Well then, once I'm ready, I'll move our things to∠♂① Castle."},{"id":1004020182,"text":"I know that I may slow you down, but I promise I'll do my∠best not to be in the way. So if you please..."},{"id":1004020183,"text":"I beg of you. I want to be with my husband, my Freed!"},{"id":1004020184,"text":"Stop it, Yoshino. I don't want you getting involved in this∠war!∨I don't want to put you in harm's way! So please..."},{"id":1004020186,"text":"Okay, I understand... But promise me. Promise me you'll∠come home to me."},{"id":1004020187,"text":"Of course, Yoshino dear. I swear that I will return∠to you when my work is finished!"},{"id":1004020188,"text":"Thank you, my love."},{"id":1004020189,"text":"Commander, I understand now... Even though we're apart,∠I know that Freed is always thinking of me."},{"id":1004020191,"text":"Yeah, I guess so..."},{"id":1004020192,"text":"What?!◎1 R-Really? Now I can be with Freed..."},{"id":1004020193,"text":"I'm so happy."},{"id":1004020194,"text":"I'll be there soon, my love. Your Yoshino is coming to you."},{"id":1004020195,"text":"Yes!"},{"id":1004020196,"text":"Welcome. If you want something appraised, just leave it to∠me. I know everything there is to know about antiques.∠Ah, forgive me. That was rather boastful."},{"id":1004020197,"text":"Welcome. What can I do for you today? Would you like∠something appraised?"},{"id":1004020198,"text":"We need your help."},{"id":1004020199,"text":"We want an appraisal."},{"id":1004020200,"text":"Well then, let us get to it at once."},{"id":1004020201,"text":"My help you say? What do you mean?"},{"id":1004020202,"text":"Why, to think you are the leader of the ♂②∠Army... My eye for antiques is impeccable, but it would seem∠my eye for people could use some work.∨I still cannot believe it…"},{"id":1004020203,"text":"War is a tragic thing. It makes men into beasts, robs their∠minds of the ability to appreciate even the small joy of∠antiques.∨Many irreplaceable works of art have been lost to the fires∠of war. That is no less of a tragedy...∨I understand. I'll help you. But I have just one condition.∠There is a certain antique that I want you to find for me.∨I want to test your ability to discern the true nature of∠things, you see.∨Find me a Celadon Urn. Bring me one, and I will join you."},{"id":1004020204,"text":"Welcome, Commander ♂㈱. Have you found the∠Celadon Urn yet?"},{"id":1004020205,"text":"Welcome, Commander ♂㈱. O-Oh... That urn!"},{"id":1004020206,"text":"This is indeed a Celadon Urn. I knew you could do it,∠Commander ♂㈱. Now, I'll lend you my services∠as I promised."},{"id":1004020207,"text":"Well, I guess I'll close this shop now and head for∠♂① Castle."},{"id":1004020208,"text":"I won't be able to travel along with you, so please excuse∠me."},{"id":1004020209,"text":"It'll be hard to fill Lebrante's shoes, but I'll do my best."},{"id":1004020210,"text":"Gah, nobody will take me seriously! I tell you it was tough∠shaking off the Highland Army like I did!"},{"id":1004020211,"text":"Huh? What is it? Never seen ears like mine before? Oh yeah,∠I guess there aren't any other elves around here.∨Me? My name is Stallion. I'm the fastest elf alive. When∠I'm running away, that is.∨When Greenhill was attacked by Highland, I was the only one∠that was able to zip past the enemy soldiers.∨I wove right through them ran all the way here. Oh, by the∠way...what do you want?"},{"id":1004020212,"text":"Yo, we meet again. Good to see ya."},{"id":1004020214,"text":"Well, being seeing you."},{"id":1004020215,"text":"Yeah, maybe you will. Never can tell when or where you'll∠meet someone again."},{"id":1004020216,"text":"Hmm, well I AM in training..."},{"id":1004020217,"text":"Okay, then, it's a race. Are you ready?"},{"id":1004020219,"text":"*pant* *pant* Wow... I thought I was the fastest elf ever,∠but here I find a human who puts even me to shame."},{"id":1004020220,"text":"Right, well that settles it. I've made up my mind. Consider∠me a member of the ♂② Army.∨Just so we're clear, I'm only joining so I can study your∠running technique."},{"id":1004020221,"text":"Heheh! That's right! I gave him this angry scowl∨And then Kiba just knelt down in front of me and begged me∠to let him join my army! I have that effect on people!"},{"id":1004020222,"text":"W-Wow...and then?"},{"id":1004020223,"text":"Well, you know I've got a big heart, so I took Kiba by the∠hand and brought him back up to his feet.∨Then I said, \"Lift up your head, General Kiba. I can't kill∠a fine soldier like you, enemy or no.\"∨Kiba was so moved, he said, \"Commander ♂㈱,∠from this day onward, my life is yours to do as you wish.\""},{"id":1004020224,"text":"You're..."},{"id":1004020225,"text":"Hey, you..."},{"id":1004020226,"text":"So anyway, that's how my ♂② Army beat the∠Highland Army and got General Kiba to join us.∨That's why you've got me and only me to thank for saving∠this town of Radat here!"},{"id":1004020227,"text":"O-Of course I know that, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1004020228,"text":"Uh, um..."},{"id":1004020229,"text":"Stop it..."},{"id":1004020230,"text":"Well, as long as you know. After all, the leader of the∠♂② Army has got a big heart.∨Oh, I'd like a refill. Some fresh fish wouldn't be bad∠either..."},{"id":1004020231,"text":"Oh, yes, please. Order as much as you like, Commander. Even∠the fish will be happy to be eaten by such a great hero!"},{"id":1004020232,"text":"Ha, you've got a golden tongue! Hahahahahaha! Yup! That's∠right! I'm the great hero, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1004020233,"text":"H-Hey..."},{"id":1004020234,"text":"Listen..."},{"id":1004020235,"text":"Excuse me, Commander, can we see the Bright Shield Rune on∠your hand?"},{"id":1004020236,"text":"Eh? Oh, um, yeah! Sure, I'll show you. But first bring me∠that drink."},{"id":1004020237,"text":"Y-Yes, sir, I'll bring it right away."},{"id":1004020238,"text":"Good. Well okay, take a look."},{"id":1004020239,"text":"Huh? That's the Bright Shield Rune? It looks different than∠I expected..."},{"id":1004020240,"text":"Huh? What the? It's smearing..."},{"id":1004020241,"text":"Aha!!! You fake! You just drew it on there! You're an∠impostor!"},{"id":1004020242,"text":"Uh..."},{"id":1004020243,"text":"I knew something wasn't right! Commander∠♂㈱ wouldn't be so short!"},{"id":1004020244,"text":"W-Wait... Wait a minute..."},{"id":1004020245,"text":"I finally found you! You're the one using Commander∠♂㈱'s name to eat and drink for free!∨You pulled the same trick in South Window, Two River, and∠Rockaxe! Give it up, you little creep!"},{"id":1004020246,"text":"H-Hold on now... I-I've never even been to Rockaxe..."},{"id":1004020247,"text":"Still trying to make excuses, huh?"},{"id":1004020248,"text":"Let's just calm down now."},{"id":1004020249,"text":"I guess you reap what you sow."},{"id":1004020250,"text":"C-C'mon, bro, please help me!"},{"id":1004020251,"text":"What, are you friends with him?!"},{"id":1004020252,"text":"That guy has tonfa too! They must be together! Let's teach∠'em a lesson!"},{"id":1004020253,"text":"Now if you've learned your lesson, don't do it anymore!"},{"id":1004020254,"text":"*pant* *pant* H-Hey, bro, you okay?"},{"id":1004020255,"text":"Bummer... But, hey, I guess it's fate! Let's join forces, eh?∠C'mon, bro!"},{"id":1004020256,"text":"Okay, it's decided! You and me are gonna be best buds, bro!"},{"id":1004020548,"text":"■"},{"id":1004020550,"text":"What is it? What's your business in Radat?"},{"id":1004020551,"text":"Hey, where are ya from? That mercenary fort east of here?"},{"id":1004020552,"text":"They're adjusting the watergate, so they won't let me∠pass. They say it's too dangerous. Now I can't get home."},{"id":1004020553,"text":"Hey, we're fixin' the watergate, so ya can't cross the∠bridge into Radat right now."},{"id":1004020648,"text":"「とうめい当たりセリフ０１」"},{"id":1004020747,"text":"We're in the middle of moving the watergate.∠It's too dangerous to use the bridge."},{"id":1004020748,"text":"Whoa there, don't even think of tryin' to force your way∠across. Now go on, get."},{"id":1004020749,"text":"We're busy right now, got it?"},{"id":1004020750,"text":"Go on, get outta here. Don't come cryin' to me if you get∠hurt."},{"id":1004020751,"text":"We'll let ya past once we're done openin' the watergates.∠But...I think it's gonna take a while."},{"id":1004020752,"text":"No one gets through. General Kiba's orders."},{"id":1004020753,"text":"Hey, quit getting in the way and go home like a good boy."},{"id":1004020754,"text":"None may pass. General Kiba's orders."},{"id":1004020755,"text":"Hey, keep runnin' around like that and we're gonna throw you∠in a cell, got it kid. Get lost. "},{"id":1004020757,"text":"Huh?! How?"},{"id":1004020758,"text":"Prince Luca has ordered that none may pass."},{"id":1004020759,"text":"Nope. You can't pass. Go home."},{"id":1004020760,"text":"C'mon now, just turn around and leave."},{"id":1004020761,"text":"Hey, what're you doing loitering around here?"},{"id":1004020762,"text":"You may be just a kid, but don't think I'll cut you any∠slack! Now get your butt outta here!"},{"id":1004020763,"text":"Hold it right there! How'd you even get here?"},{"id":1004020764,"text":"Yeah? Banner Village is past here. You need a boat ride?"},{"id":1004020765,"text":"Please."},{"id":1004020766,"text":"No thanks."},{"id":1004020767,"text":"We're the boatsmen who run this river. We go upriver and∠downriver, haulin' cargo here and there... It's an easy∠life."},{"id":1004020768,"text":"This river, the Dunan, runs to Lake Toran and from there∠empties out into the Great Sea."},{"id":1004020769,"text":"Master Shu is our most important customer. He handles all∠the business here himself."},{"id":1004020770,"text":"What, you need a boat? I got no plans to set sail right now."},{"id":1004020771,"text":"Hey, I came all the way here with my dad."},{"id":1004020772,"text":"Guess what? There's some village at the end of this river.∠And guess what again? Past the village is a place called the∠\"Something Republic.\""},{"id":1004020773,"text":"There's a burnt-down old fort east of here, but there are∠Highland soldiers too, so watch yourself if you go there.∨Come to mention it, there was another kid who went that∠way a while ago..."},{"id":1004020969,"text":"Now that Master Shu no longer comes around, business just∠isn't what it used to be."},{"id":1004020971,"text":"I came all the way here with my dad. I was born in the∠Island Nations south of here."},{"id":1004021067,"text":"There's a place downstream called Banner Village. It ain't∠the liveliest place, but the people that live there are some∠good-hearted folks."},{"id":1004021069,"text":"It sounds like Shu is doing well, huh?"},{"id":1004021073,"text":"The Mercenary Fort, Toto, Ryube... Everything east of here∠is just burnt ruins now."},{"id":1004021167,"text":"Damn, what next? At this rate I'd be better off getting∠everyone together to start a rebellion."},{"id":1004021170,"text":"Everyone says that General Kiba is a mighty warrior."},{"id":1004021270,"text":"With the Highland Army gone, we can take our boats to∠Banner again. And from there, you can get to the Toran∠Republic, see?"},{"id":1004021271,"text":"I wanna go back home soon."},{"id":1004021272,"text":"Oh! I finally remember. The name of the place is the∠\"Toran Republic\"!"},{"id":1004021370,"text":"Hey, what is it this time?"},{"id":1004021569,"text":"I wonder if Master Shu plans on coming back once the war is∠over?"},{"id":1004021570,"text":"We just aren't made for livin' on dry land."},{"id":1004021571,"text":"■"},{"id":1004021669,"text":"Now that the war is over, Master Shu should come back∠home."},{"id":1004021673,"text":"People are starting to move back to Toto and Ryube. That's∠toughness right there."},{"id":1004021890,"text":"Why hello, young man. Can I assist you with something?∨However, I'm afraid to say that I am in the throes of∠despair just now. ♂▼0Yes, a despair most deep indeed.∨♂▼1You see, I've lost a certain rose brooch given to me by a∠dear friend.∨Is there any greater misery than the loss of a token of∠esteem from a bosom companion? ♂▼2How ever will I apologize?"},{"id":1004021891,"text":"Wh-Why, that's it! Young man, wherever did you find this?∠No, more importantly, will you let me have it?∨♂▼3I can pay you...but no, money is no fair exchange for such∠a prize. ♂▼4If there is something else I might offer you∠instead, you need only ask."},{"id":1004021892,"text":"Join you? As one of your companions? ♂▼5But of course. Yes,∠of course. Oh, young man, I already feel I can call you friend.∨Of course I will join you. For my friends, I, Simone, will∠pay any price. ♂▼6I would be honored to accompany you."},{"id":1004021893,"text":"Grr... I shall bear this humiliation to the ends of my days.∠ At any rate...◎2♂▼7are you satisfied now, young man?"},{"id":1004021894,"text":"I've been so worried, Simone. ♂▼0Oh, whatever is the matter?"},{"id":1004021895,"text":"Non, non, please forgive me. I'm searching for my friend∠and, although it would be an honor to assist you, I cannot∠betray the bonds of friendship.∨♂▼0Farewell."},{"id":1004021896,"text":"Liquor? Okay, here ya go. But tell her not to drink too∠much, okay?"},{"id":1004030001,"text":"Aha, there they are! Over here, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1004030002,"text":"Hey, who's that guy yelling at you? Some friend of yours,∠♂㈱?"},{"id":1004030003,"text":"I guess..."},{"id":1004030004,"text":"That's Viktor."},{"id":1004030005,"text":"That's Mister Bear."},{"id":1004030006,"text":"Oh really? Well, he's coming this way."},{"id":1004030007,"text":"Hahahahaha!∠Glad to see y'all in one piece.∨Everybody scattered to the winds gettin' out of Muse,∠so I'm havin' a hell of a time trackin' 'em down."},{"id":1004030008,"text":"I heard that, ♂㈱. Who're you callin' a bear?"},{"id":1004030009,"text":"Hahahahaha, ah, whatever.∠Anyway, glad to see y'all in one piece.∨Everybody scattered to the winds gettin' out of Muse,∠so I'm havin' a hell of a time trackin' 'em down."},{"id":1004030010,"text":"Hey, hey, hey! ♂㈱! When did you become friends∠with such beautiful ladies? Never knew you were such a∠smooth player."},{"id":1004030011,"text":"Hey, watch it!"},{"id":1004030012,"text":"Hehehe..."},{"id":1004030013,"text":"Huh? What? Beautiful? Me?"},{"id":1004030014,"text":".........∨Huh? Where's Jowy?"},{"id":1004030016,"text":"Actually..."},{"id":1004030018,"text":"I see... I did hear that Anabelle was assassinated, but...∨I never woulda suspected that's how it went down."},{"id":1004030019,"text":"...Well, I'm sure there's some explanation.∨Anyway, let's hit the tavern. Flik's there too. We'll have∠a little reunion."},{"id":1004030020,"text":".........∨If it's too hard to talk about, that's fine.∨Anyway, let's hit the tavern. Flik's there too.∠We'll have ourselves a little reunion."},{"id":1004030021,"text":"Glad to see you're still alive, ♂㈱.∠That goes for you too, Nanami, Pilika."},{"id":1004030022,"text":"Sorry to be abrupt, but we need to talk.∠Come over here."},{"id":1004030023,"text":"Anyway, just listen to what I have to say."},{"id":1004030024,"text":"...So, a lot has happened to us, too. In fact, we just got here∠yesterday."},{"id":1004030025,"text":"Yeah, because someone wanted to make a lot of detours."},{"id":1004030026,"text":"Hey, we got here eventually, didn't we? Anyway, we've just∠been waitin' for the rest of the gang to arrive since."},{"id":1004030027,"text":"What about Leona and the others?"},{"id":1004030028,"text":"Nope, no sign of 'em. We were the first and then you showed∠up."},{"id":1004030029,"text":"They'll probably be here soon enough, though."},{"id":1004030030,"text":"I hope they're all okay."},{"id":1004030031,"text":"Me too."},{"id":1004030032,"text":"Well, it's just about time. We've got a meetin' with∠Granmeyer, the mayor of the city. You should tag along,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1004030033,"text":"You're planning on making the mayor your patron?"},{"id":1004030034,"text":"Yeah, pretty much. I've got people out tryin' to reassemble∠our forces that got scattered.∨We're gonna need a place to keep 'em once they're all back.∠We'll also need money to feed 'em all."},{"id":1004030035,"text":"I'm going too!"},{"id":1004030036,"text":"I'll be here enjoying my tea."},{"id":1004030037,"text":"I'm not one for formal stuff..."},{"id":1004030039,"text":"Come back soon."},{"id":1004030040,"text":"The city hall is east of here. Just walk a bit, you'll find∠it."},{"id":1004030041,"text":"You must be Viktor and Flik. We've been expecting you.∠Please, go inside."},{"id":1004030042,"text":"You did well to survive such a horrendous defeat, Viktor."},{"id":1004030043,"text":"Glad to see you're also unharmed, Lord Granmeyer."},{"id":1004030044,"text":"Muse has fallen to Highland and South Window is now in∠peril. Your reputation precedes you, so I'd like to retain∠your services."},{"id":1004030045,"text":"But of course, my lord. I'd be proud to help. I'm in the∠process of regrouping my lost colleagues who fled from Muse."},{"id":1004030046,"text":"Good, I'm counting on you.∨By the way, you were born in North Window, correct?"},{"id":1004030047,"text":"Yes, I was."},{"id":1004030048,"text":"Freed."},{"id":1004030049,"text":"Yes, sir. Recently there have been several incidents ∠involving young girls disappearing near North Window.∨The troops we've sent to investigate report that some type∠of monster has made its home there."},{"id":1004030050,"text":"Viktor, you must know North Window very well.∨I know it will be hard for you, but would you go and∠investigate the village for us?"},{"id":1004030051,"text":"............∨*sigh* ∠◎1I, uh...◎1I suppose I can do that."},{"id":1004030052,"text":"My assistant Freed will accompany you. Please find out∠what happened to those poor girls."},{"id":1004030053,"text":"I'm Freed. Viktor, thank you for agreeing to help the city∠of South Window.∨I look forward to working alongside you."},{"id":1004030054,"text":"Y-Yeah... Well, guess it could be worse."},{"id":1004030055,"text":"Hey, c'mon, what gives? If you're from North Window,∠why is it going to be \"hard for you\" to go there?"},{"id":1004030056,"text":"You'll understand once we get there. Anyway, let's head∠back."},{"id":1004030057,"text":"How did it go?"},{"id":1004030058,"text":"Well, looks like he's willin' to part with some potch,∠but I gotta do him a favor first."},{"id":1004030059,"text":"And who is this?"},{"id":1004030060,"text":"Pardon me, I'm Lord Granmeyer's assistant, Freed.∨I've been tasked with accompanying you to North Window.∠It is a pleasure to meet you all!"},{"id":1004030061,"text":"Well, aren't you the energetic one."},{"id":1004030062,"text":"Anyway, I gotta go to North Window. Are you gonna come∠along, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1004030063,"text":"I'm going too. I'm interested to see what kind of place∠this North Window is."},{"id":1004030064,"text":"I'm kind of interested too."},{"id":1004030065,"text":"Yeah, I'll bet you are, hehe. I'll wait here. Someone has to∠watch this little one."},{"id":1004030067,"text":"Okay, Pilika, me and you are stayin' here."},{"id":1004030068,"text":"Well, be seeing—"},{"id":1004030069,"text":"Say, won't you have some tea with me? I'm going to be so∠bored by myself."},{"id":1004030070,"text":"Huh? M-Me? But you aren't alone..."},{"id":1004030073,"text":"Well, we'll leave him behind, so have your way with him."},{"id":1004030074,"text":"Wait, why do I—"},{"id":1004030075,"text":"Oh? You don't want to stay with me?"},{"id":1004030076,"text":"No, no, it's not that, it's just—"},{"id":1004030077,"text":"Alright there, Flik, I'm countin' on you, buddy."},{"id":1004030078,"text":"Now, let us be off. North Window is northwest of here.∠Is that correct, Viktor?"},{"id":1004030079,"text":"Yeah, that's right.∨But if ya know that much, I don't think ya need me."},{"id":1004030080,"text":"Commander ♂㈱...∨Lord Granmeyer agreed to surrender when South Window∠fell... and that's when they took his head and mounted it∠in front of the city hall.∨He was a gentle man. Three years ago, when he retreated∠from a border skirmish with the Toran Republic, all of Tinto∠called him a coward.∨As it turned out, surrendering to Highland also brought∠suffering upon his people in the end.∨If we had lived in a peaceful world, Lord Grandmeyer would∠have been deemed a wise ruler. But we may now be living∠in a world where gentleness has become a sin."},{"id":1004030081,"text":"Despite this, I'm still proud of Lord Granmeyer. And I will∠do everything in my power to save the city of South∠Window.∨To get to the Toran Republic, we need to take a boat from∠Radat, and cross the mountain trail from the small village∠downstream. Let's set forth for Radat."},{"id":1004030100,"text":"Hey, it's those guys from before. Hi there!"},{"id":1004030101,"text":"Ah, Pilika!!! How are you?"},{"id":1004030103,"text":"Ah, so it looks like you're doing well."},{"id":1004030104,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱. It's been a while. How have you been?"},{"id":1004030105,"text":"Hey! It's ♂㈱! Long time no see!"},{"id":1004030106,"text":"Hey, let's ask him about that thing."},{"id":1004030107,"text":"Oh, uh, okay. But don't forget. If I win, you have to do∠one thing I ask, no matter what it is."},{"id":1004030108,"text":"Haha, that's fine. But if I win, you have to do the same∠for me. Understand?"},{"id":1004030109,"text":"Yeah, of course!"},{"id":1004030110,"text":"♂㈱, we heard that the leader of the∠♂② Army is also named ♂㈱. Could∠that be you?!∨Hilda says you're one and the same, but that's not true,∠is it?"},{"id":1004030111,"text":"What?! Seriously?! Did you really become the leader of the∠♂② Army?"},{"id":1004030112,"text":"See, just like I told you. The first time I saw∠♂㈱'s eyes, I knew it.∨I knew that he would touch the lives of many people."},{"id":1004030113,"text":"Damn, yeah well I guess I'm not that good at sizing people∠up."},{"id":1004030114,"text":"Pouting doesn't suit you."},{"id":1004030115,"text":"Eh, forget it. Anyway, what're you up to now,∠♂㈱?∨I'm thinking about maybe doing some more treasure∠hunting..."},{"id":1004030116,"text":"We made you a promise, ♂㈱. ∠A promise that we'd try to help...∨We aren't soldiers and won't be of much use against the∠Highland Army, but I think surely there must be something∠we can do. Please, let us try..."},{"id":1004030118,"text":"No, we're fine without you."},{"id":1004030119,"text":"I don't want to get you all mixed up in this war..."},{"id":1004030120,"text":"Huh? But...I was gonna go treasure hunting..."},{"id":1004030121,"text":"Remember, I won the bet. You have to do one thing I say.∠Right, Alex?"},{"id":1004030122,"text":"But I... Aw, Hilda... Okay, okay, I get it.∨♂㈱, I'm not sure how I can help out, but I'll∠do whatever I can."},{"id":1004030123,"text":"Thanks for having us, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004030124,"text":"Anyhow, we'll head to ♂① Castle right away."},{"id":1004030125,"text":"Come now, no need to be in such a rush. But we are happy∠that we'll be able to help others by helping you. Let's∠start packing at once."},{"id":1004030126,"text":"Yay! Yahoo! Let's go now! I wanna see the castle!!!"},{"id":1004030127,"text":"I see..."},{"id":1004030128,"text":"Oh well... Guess it's out of our hands. Maybe I'll do some∠more treasure hunting. I heard about this place called the∠Cave of the Wind west of here.∨People are saying they heard a strange voice coming from∠deep inside, casting curses at somebody..."},{"id":1004030129,"text":"That's all you ever talk about. But don't you dare do∠anything dangerous."},{"id":1004030130,"text":"Of course not, Hilda."},{"id":1004030131,"text":"♂㈱... You're very kind.∨But if we decide to join your group, it's our∠responsibility, not yours.∨It's our decision. You mustn't blame yourself every time∠something bad happens."},{"id":1004030132,"text":"That's right, we want to help. That's our decision. If you∠change your mind, come back. Until then, I'll be treasure∠hunting."},{"id":1004030135,"text":"♂㈱, you wanna go treasure hunting with me?"},{"id":1004030137,"text":"Yes."},{"id":1004030138,"text":"No."},{"id":1004030139,"text":"Hahaha, I'm just joking. I've decided to hunt for treasure∠alone from now on."},{"id":1004030140,"text":"Who the hell're you guys?"},{"id":1004030142,"text":"Would you mind joining us?"},{"id":1004030143,"text":"Oh, nobody special."},{"id":1004030144,"text":"Bah, it doesn't matter. Go get me a Sacrificial Jizo. And∠make it snappy!"},{"id":1004030145,"text":"Can you hurry it up with that Sacrificial Jizo?"},{"id":1004030146,"text":"You handed over the Sacrificial Jizo."},{"id":1004030147,"text":"Eh? What's this? A Sacrificial Jizo? Did I ask for this?∠I don't recall. What I need is a Wooden Shield."},{"id":1004030148,"text":"A wooden shield. Don't mess it up."},{"id":1004030149,"text":"What?! What am I supposed to do with this piece of junk?∠Anyway, where's that Wind Orb that I told you to get?"},{"id":1004030150,"text":"A Wind Orb! Don't make me tell you again!"},{"id":1004030151,"text":"Hand over the Wind Orb."},{"id":1004030152,"text":"Throw the Wind Orb at him."},{"id":1004030153,"text":"Hmm, this is a Wind Orb. But why did you bring me∠this? A Sacrificial Jizo... It's a Sacrificial Jizo that I∠need."},{"id":1004030154,"text":"Ouch! What are you doing, you little idiot?!∨Eh? Eh? Hmm... Wahahahahahaha!∨I've just got a great idea! Nicely done, ♂㈱!∠Come, we're off to ♂① Castle! Follow me!"},{"id":1004030155,"text":"What? You're wondering how I knew your name? ∠Did you think the great Professor Adlai would be so∠ignorant? Now come on, hop to it!"},{"id":1004030156,"text":"Behold! I call this the \"elevator\"! I, the great inventor∠Adlai, have at long last once again struck creative gold!∠Use it wisely!"},{"id":1004030157,"text":"I am Gantetsu, a great priest!!!"},{"id":1004030158,"text":"I am Gantetsu, a great priest!!! Tell me your troubles,∠anything at all."},{"id":1004030159,"text":"Back again, boy? Tell me your troubles then."},{"id":1004030160,"text":"Please join us..."},{"id":1004030161,"text":"The truth is...I am deeply troubled."},{"id":1004030162,"text":"G-Goodbye..."},{"id":1004030163,"text":"Hmm... How does this sound? All of you pit your strength∠against mine. If I lose, then I shall join your cause. Let's∠begin!"},{"id":1004030164,"text":"Hmm, not ready for me yet, eh? You must better yourself!!"},{"id":1004030165,"text":"Ha, amazing! I didn't think you capable of besting the great∠Gantetsu! Very well, I shall join you as promised."},{"id":1004030166,"text":"Let us waste no time, boy. With me at your side, you have∠the strength of 100 men! Gahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1004030167,"text":"Hmm, tell me everything."},{"id":1004030168,"text":"Gahahahahaha! That's nothing! Nothing at all! Your troubles∠are nothing! Gahahahahaha!"},{"id":1004030169,"text":"Yes, we will meet again!"},{"id":1004030170,"text":"No way! Absolutely not! I'm running a business here! It's∠hard enough with this damn war going on!"},{"id":1004030171,"text":"I-I'm sorry... But I don't have any money... And I'm not∠strong enough to do manual labor...∨P-Perhaps, I could sing..."},{"id":1004030172,"text":"Gah, ever since Muse fell, we've been plagued by beggars∠like you! You refugees should be grateful we even let you∠in here!∨And another thing, who the hell wants to hear a song at a∠time like this anyway?!"},{"id":1004030173,"text":"B-But...but singing is all I know..."},{"id":1004030174,"text":"Not my problem, so get lost! I got no food for people who∠can't pay for it!"},{"id":1004030175,"text":"I-I understand... I'm sorry..."},{"id":1004030176,"text":"Oh, excuse me... May I pass?"},{"id":1004030177,"text":"Thank you..."},{"id":1004030178,"text":"Oh, you're the one from the inn... Hello."},{"id":1004030179,"text":"What are you doing?"},{"id":1004030180,"text":"Are you out of money?"},{"id":1004030181,"text":"I was just looking at the sky... I wonder if Muse is that∠way over there..."},{"id":1004030182,"text":"Um, ah... Oh, you mean before... Y-Yes, I am... But don't∠worry, I'll be okay..."},{"id":1004030183,"text":"Uh, I... Oh no..."},{"id":1004030184,"text":"You overheard all that, I take it...∨I was singing in a band in Muse...along with Pico and∠Alberto...∨But then the war came and we got split up..."},{"id":1004030185,"text":"I-I... It's true... I can't do anything by myself, and I∠don't have any money left...∨But after talking to you...I feel just a tiny bit∠better...∨Say, would you like to hear me sing?"},{"id":1004030186,"text":"Yeah... Let's hear it."},{"id":1004030187,"text":"I won't pay you for it."},{"id":1004030188,"text":"Huh? Oh, I-I'm sorry... I didn't mean it like that..."},{"id":1004030189,"text":"U-Um... Would like to hear me sing?"},{"id":1004030191,"text":"No... I'd rather not."},{"id":1004030192,"text":"Oh...I see."},{"id":1004030193,"text":"Th-Thank you..."},{"id":1004030194,"text":"It's been a while, so I was worried I wouldn't sound good...∠Thank you for listening until the end..."},{"id":1004030195,"text":"I'd...like to hear you sing some more."},{"id":1004030196,"text":"Here. It's not much, but...please take it."},{"id":1004030197,"text":"Huh? B-But I..."},{"id":1004030198,"text":"Thank you... I...I..."},{"id":1004030199,"text":"The only thing I know how to do is sing...∨But if my singing can bring even a little joy to the people∠who've suffered during this war...then I'll do my best."},{"id":1004030200,"text":"Thank you, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1004030201,"text":"Huh? But that wasn't why I..."},{"id":1004030202,"text":"Thank you... I'll spend it carefully..."},{"id":1004030203,"text":"Um... If there's anything I can do for you...please, just∠tell me... I'll do my best to help."},{"id":1004030204,"text":"Oh, hello, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1004030205,"text":"Annallee... Come join us at our castle."},{"id":1004030206,"text":"How have you been?"},{"id":1004030207,"text":"Oh, um... Just fine, thanks."},{"id":1004030208,"text":"I'm Killey. I'm following the trail of the Sindar... Have∠you heard any rumors about them?"},{"id":1004030209,"text":"Alex knows a lot about Sindar ruins..."},{"id":1004030210,"text":"Never heard of it."},{"id":1004030211,"text":"Alex... Oh yeah, from the inn. Thanks, I owe you one."},{"id":1004030212,"text":"I see. Well, sorry to have bothered you."},{"id":1004030213,"text":"Did you maybe remember something?"},{"id":1004030215,"text":"Why did you do that?"},{"id":1004030216,"text":"Don't come here anymore."},{"id":1004030217,"text":"I'm not at liberty to tell you much, but the relics left∠by the Sindar should not fall into the hands of common men.∠That's all.∨You can relax. That man wasn't lying, so I won't go anywhere∠near him anymore."},{"id":1004030218,"text":"Relax. That man wasn't lying, so I won't go anywhere∠near him anymore."},{"id":1004030219,"text":"Is there something else?"},{"id":1004030220,"text":"Um... Would you care to join us?"},{"id":1004030222,"text":"............∨I'm sorry about earlier... About hurting your friend."},{"id":1004030223,"text":"Join you? I don't think you'd want that... Besides, it's not∠my style."},{"id":1004030224,"text":"There's no reason for me to get involved in your war."},{"id":1004030225,"text":"............∨While I was here, asking around about the Sindar, I heard∠a lot about you and the ♂② army...∨And I wondered what kind of man you were..."},{"id":1004030226,"text":"I accept your offer... But if I come across any clues about∠the Sindar, I want out."},{"id":1004030227,"text":"Until then...however brief it may be...I'll throw my lot∠in with you."},{"id":1004030228,"text":"That Alex... He's a lucky man. There aren't many who get∠involved with the Sindar that find something truly valuable."},{"id":1004030229,"text":"Yes! That's it! That is it!"},{"id":1004030230,"text":"You must be the hero, ♂㈱, who defeated that∠vile demon, Luca Blight.∨I'm sorry to have missed the action, but I am Maximillian,∠onetime commander of the Maximillian Knights. I have come∠to offer you my services.∨Commander ♂㈱, I beg of you. Accept my pledge∠of knightly fealty!"},{"id":1004030231,"text":"I accept your pledge."},{"id":1004030232,"text":"You don't have to do this, old man."},{"id":1004030233,"text":"Th-Thank you. I, Maximilian, will fight for you while∠there is still breath in my body!"},{"id":1004030234,"text":"Well then, I shall depart for the castle at once. We must∠bolster our defenses.∨After all, a knight must be ready to ride into battle∠whenever his lord calls!"},{"id":1004030235,"text":"Wh-What did you say? Did I hear you right?∨You...you called me...an old man?"},{"id":1004030236,"text":"So, my life as a knight is over... *sniffle*∠Very well, I shall take my leave..."},{"id":1004030237,"text":"Hi there. Welcome to South Window. We're an open, friendly∠city under the leadership of Lord Granmeyer."},{"id":1004030238,"text":"Hello there. Where did you come from?"},{"id":1004030239,"text":"Hey, did ya hear the rumor about the monster in North∠Window to the northwest of here? It's even∠older than I am, and that's saying somethin'."},{"id":1004030245,"text":"Um, I heard the boys saying they're going to the Cave of the∠Wind west of here to test their bravery, even though they∠know they'll get in trouble."},{"id":1004030246,"text":"Hi there! You'll make a tidy∠sum of potch."},{"id":1004030252,"text":"It's not very sunny here, but it's nice and cool. I like it."},{"id":1004030253,"text":"That Adlai is such a headache.
