I've got no time to fool around with you guys."},{"id":1004030456,"text":"☆0∠       Well-Tended Plant◎3∠       Huh?"},{"id":1004030457,"text":"☆0∠       Well-Tended Plant◎3"},{"id":1004030556,"text":"How could such a thing have happened to Lord Granmeyer..."},{"id":1004030559,"text":"What do you want? I'm on my way to dance lessons."},{"id":1004030567,"text":"Heheh, just like I told ya, right? I knew something was∠funny."},{"id":1004030568,"text":"Everyone was gathered at the gate, but my mama said I∠couldn't go."},{"id":1004030572,"text":"Strange, it's been so quiet lately..."},{"id":1004030573,"text":"Lately, a young girl with a lovely voice has been singing∠around here. Such beautiful, beautiful songs."},{"id":1004030574,"text":"That girl... I wonder where she's from..."},{"id":1004030656,"text":"The Highland Army is gone, but Lord Granmeyer..."},{"id":1004030657,"text":"Oh, are you that \"miracle boy\" that beat the Highland Army?"},{"id":1004030658,"text":"Ah! I know you! You're Commander ♂㈱, the guy∠who singlehandedly defeated the Highland Army, right?!"},{"id":1004030661,"text":"I was laid off by Shu, but he gave us all lots of money,∠so I'm gonna head back to the countryside and start my own∠business."},{"id":1004030662,"text":"Some man named Alex is staying at the inn here.◎1 He's got∠his wife with him, a real beauty. He's a lucky man."},{"id":1004030663,"text":"What will become of South Window now that Lord∠Granmeyer is gone..."},{"id":1004030664,"text":"The boys went to the Cave of the Wind and got into big, big∠trouble. Heeheehee."},{"id":1004030665,"text":"Hey, how ya doin'? Me? I'm doin' good. Well, take care,∠buddy."},{"id":1004030669,"text":"They said there's no bonsai contest this year. Grandpa was∠so disappointed."},{"id":1004030673,"text":"Is that girl with the lovely voice really staying at∠♂① Castle now? Maybe I'll go hear her sing∠again."},{"id":1004030674,"text":"*sigh* I'd sure like to hear that song again."},{"id":1004030756,"text":"Thank you for coming, Commander ♂㈱.◎1∠Eh? But of course I know you."},{"id":1004030757,"text":"Ah! Commander ♂㈱. Keep up the good work."},{"id":1004030758,"text":"My, it's the commander of the ♂② Army. What∠can I do for you today?"},{"id":1004030759,"text":"What do you want? I'm on my way to tea ceremony lessons."},{"id":1004030761,"text":"I was laid off by Shu, but he gave us all lots of money,∠so I'm gonna open my own business here."},{"id":1004030762,"text":"Dang, I wonder where Hilda went..."},{"id":1004030763,"text":"Say, did you know this city used to be called the Kingdom∠of Dunan?"},{"id":1004030766,"text":"I'll beat him with this bonsai next time. Just you wait."},{"id":1004030768,"text":"Lord Granmeyer doesn't come see me anymore. Why? Is it∠because I'm not a good girl now?"},{"id":1004030770,"text":"Buy salt from the trading post here and bring it to Forest∠Village. You should be able to make a decent profit."},{"id":1004030773,"text":"■"},{"id":1004030774,"text":"■"},{"id":1004030856,"text":"Please be safe, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1004030956,"text":"Welcome to South Window, hero."},{"id":1004030957,"text":"You beat General Kiba... You really are a \"miracle boy.\""},{"id":1004030958,"text":"Oh great leader of the ♂② Army, we∠celebrate your victory!"},{"id":1004030959,"text":"What do you want? I'm on my way to cooking lessons."},{"id":1004030963,"text":"The Dunan Monarchy? It existed long, long ago. In fact, it∠was the only country in these parts back then."},{"id":1004030965,"text":"Ugh, I swear. One of those Highland jerks asked me if I was∠\"really a woman,\" so I just snapped and worked him over."},{"id":1004030966,"text":"My bonsai rival is across the lake in Coronet. I wish I∠could go and settle the score."},{"id":1004031055,"text":"Commander ♂㈱ will never lose to Luca Blight,∠I tell you. Never!"},{"id":1004031056,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you mustn't let that fiend win."},{"id":1004031057,"text":"Good luck, Commander ♂㈱. ∠You're our only hope."},{"id":1004031067,"text":"Hahaha. Hi there, mister."},{"id":1004031068,"text":"The boys say there's a great hero now named Commander∠♂㈱!"},{"id":1004031155,"text":"You are always welcome here, our hero. Enjoy your stay."},{"id":1004031156,"text":"Congratulations, Commander ♂㈱. The Highland∠Army surely learned their lesson this time."},{"id":1004031157,"text":"I knew it, I knew it! I knew you were a great man. Ah, it∠brings tears to my eyes..."},{"id":1004031164,"text":"What?◎1 A battle, you say?◎0 Huh, guess you got a tough job∠ahead. Anyway, I'll be cheering for ya."},{"id":1004031256,"text":"Just a little bit more and this war will be over. Good∠luck, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1004031257,"text":"Those Highland scumbags are on their last legs."},{"id":1004031258,"text":"What do you want? I'm on my way to singing lessons."},{"id":1004031262,"text":"Eventually the Dunan Monarchy became South Window ∠City, and then sometime later we joined the City-States of∠Jowston."},{"id":1004031263,"text":"You're a \"he-row\"? What's a \"he-row\"?"},{"id":1004031268,"text":"I wonder what that hero the boys keep talking about is like.∠Maybe I'll see him someday too."},{"id":1004031269,"text":"You should buy a \"Peeing Boy\" at the trading post here and∠take it to Rockaxe Castle. I bet you turn a nice profit."},{"id":1004031355,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, your name has been engraved∠in the hearts of all the people of this land. Just like Master∠Genkaku before you."},{"id":1004031356,"text":"The king is defeated and Highland is no more... Will we∠finally have peace now?"},{"id":1004031357,"text":"Congratulations! I heard that the Jowston Alliance is going∠to become the ♂② Republic now."},{"id":1004031358,"text":"What do you want? I'm on my way to poetry reading lessons."},{"id":1004031362,"text":"As Highland and Jowston fade into history, a new country is∠born. That, my friend, is how the times change."},{"id":1004031364,"text":"What's up? Something bothering you? Go ahead and tell me.∠We're friends, right?"},{"id":1004031365,"text":"I'm going to take this bonsai to his place and show him∠what a real bonsai is supposed to look like."},{"id":1004031368,"text":"That hero the boys are talking about, I wonder what he's∠like. I bet he's handsome, tall, and kind."},{"id":1004031370,"text":"It's not very sunny here, but it's nice and cool. I like∠it. Nothing ever changes around here."},{"id":1004031466,"text":"My apologies, but we're not currently admitting members of∠the general public. Please leave."},{"id":1004031467,"text":"I'm sorry, but you can't enter at this time."},{"id":1004031468,"text":"Please understand, we're in a state of emergency right now."},{"id":1004040001,"text":"So...this is North Window? Viktor's hometown?∨I'm sorry... I shouldn't have asked that earlier..."},{"id":1004040002,"text":"Hahaha, as you can see, it's a real ghost town."},{"id":1004040003,"text":"A ghost town? But what happened here? What are all these∠graves?"},{"id":1004040004,"text":"They belong to the villagers who once lived here. Years ago,∠this place was attacked by a vampire named Neclord.∨He killed everyone for fun, then sucked out all their blood∠and left.∨I'm only alive now because I happened to be away from the∠village at the time. As the sole survivor, it fell on me to∠dig all the graves as best I could...∨But anyway, that was a long time ago. It all ended when∠I destroyed Neclord with my own two hands."},{"id":1004040005,"text":"Oh my, are you certain of that?"},{"id":1004040006,"text":"Y-You!!! But how?!"},{"id":1004040007,"text":"Did you really believe you could slay an immortal∠vampire so easily?∨Hmmm, I quite like this place, actually. And thanks to∠you, Viktor, the corpses were very well preserved, as you∠can see."},{"id":1004040008,"text":"Oh dear, you look as pale as a ghost. Whatever could be the∠matter? Oh, could you have seen a familiar face? ∠Ah ha ha..."},{"id":1004040009,"text":"Y-You bastard!!!"},{"id":1004040010,"text":"Bwahaha!!! You deserve this for daring to harm me.∠Consider it...revenge."},{"id":1004040011,"text":"I don't know what you're on about, but I do know it's wrong∠to desecrate the dead!"},{"id":1004040012,"text":"That's right! You're in big trouble now! ∠♂㈱ is gonna take you out!"},{"id":1004040013,"text":"My, my, such spirit. I like that. I find brave young women∠most...delicious.∨Perhaps I shall take you both to be my brides."},{"id":1004040014,"text":"I won't let you."},{"id":1004040015,"text":"Let's get out of here."},{"id":1004040016,"text":"Stop, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1004040017,"text":"So, shall we engage in battle?"},{"id":1004040018,"text":"It's no good. To destroy him, we need..."},{"id":1004040019,"text":"The Celestial Sword, was it? Please, go and fetch it. ∠This time I'll destroy that sword. It caused me great∠pain...∨Now then, I shall be residing in the castle here,∠so if you wish to find me again I would be happy to receive∠you there."},{"id":1004040020,"text":"Oh, are you fleeing? A wise decision."},{"id":1004040021,"text":"Dammit, just you wait..."},{"id":1004040023,"text":"Who the hell was that dirty old lech?!"},{"id":1004040024,"text":"Grr, damn the Night Rune!∠That Neclord bastard is alive and kicking!"},{"id":1004040025,"text":"So he's the reason little girls have been disappearing...∠We can't just ignore this!"},{"id":1004040026,"text":"What's this \"Celesital Sword\" the vampire was talking about?"},{"id":1004040027,"text":"Neclord is immune to normal swords and magic, apparently∠because of some rune... The only thing that can seal off its∠power is the Celestial Sword.∨I used it the last time I fought Neclord, and that sword∠called himself a manifestation of the Night Rune, one of the∠27 True Runes..."},{"id":1004040028,"text":"Wait, \"himself\"?"},{"id":1004040029,"text":"Eh, it's hard to explain... Anyway, let's go get the∠Celestial Sword. Okay, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1004040030,"text":"You can't just decide on your own."},{"id":1004040032,"text":"Oh, sorry about that. But there's no other way. ∠Just hear me out.∨South of here is a place called the Cave of the Wind.∠And deep inside the cave, the Celestial Sword is...∨Well, I'm not sure whether I should say sleepin' or sealed∠or hidden..."},{"id":1004040033,"text":"South of here is a place called the Cave of the Wind. And∠deep inside the cave, the Celestial Sword is... ∨Well, I'm not sure whether I should say sleepin' or sealed∠or hidden..."},{"id":1004040034,"text":"What? What is it that you're not telling us?"},{"id":1004040035,"text":"A-Anyway, let's go to the Cave of the Wind."},{"id":1004040036,"text":"Then let's hurry. Before more people lose their lives."},{"id":1004040037,"text":"Okay, time for some vampire slayin'. And don't screw it up∠this time, Celestial Sword."},{"id":1004040038,"text":"You cretin..."},{"id":1004040039,"text":"First, let's go to Neclord's lair. I know how to nullify his∠power."},{"id":1004040040,"text":"Let's head in, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004040041,"text":"Oh, there you are. I've been waiting...Viktor, Celestial∠Sword, and...oh? Is that the Marley boy? How nice of you to∠save me all that trouble by arriving together."},{"id":1004040042,"text":"Laugh while you can. Between the Celestial Sword and the∠vampire-hunting skills of the Marley family, there will be∠no more escape for you, fiend."},{"id":1004040043,"text":"That's right! Get ready to die!!!"},{"id":1004040044,"text":"Come now, don't be in such a rush. Of course, I understand∠that... But I have my own ideas as well. ∠That's why I lured you all here.∨I have something I'd like to show you."},{"id":1004040045,"text":"Tell me, do you remember her?∠Her name is...∠Daisy, is it not?"},{"id":1004040046,"text":"Y-You bastard..."},{"id":1004040047,"text":"Well? Care to strike a bargain? Give me the Celestial Sword∠and I'll let you have the girl. Sound fair?"},{"id":1004040048,"text":"V-Viktor..."},{"id":1004040049,"text":"Damn..."},{"id":1004040050,"text":"Don't give him the sword."},{"id":1004040052,"text":"Viktor! If we lose the Night Rune, we'll never be able∠to defeat Neclord!"},{"id":1004040053,"text":"Ah ha ha ha..."},{"id":1004040054,"text":"V-Viktor... H-Help me..."},{"id":1004040056,"text":"What's the matter? Hand that sword over to me."},{"id":1004040057,"text":"Celestial Sword..."},{"id":1004040058,"text":"Do whatever you like."},{"id":1004040060,"text":"Let's go, partner!"},{"id":1004040061,"text":"Watch how you speak to me."},{"id":1004040062,"text":"Let's get him, ♂㈱! He has to pay!"},{"id":1004040063,"text":"Yeah!"},{"id":1004040064,"text":"Watch how you speak to me."},{"id":1004040065,"text":"Y-You pesky little... But no matter, I have another opponent∠for you. Now, if you will excuse me..."},{"id":1004040066,"text":"Wait!"},{"id":1004040067,"text":"Until we meet again."},{"id":1004040068,"text":"Dammit!!!"},{"id":1004040069,"text":"Something's coming for us, Viktor."},{"id":1004040070,"text":"Damn! He got away!!! Damn, damn, damn!"},{"id":1004040072,"text":"............∨At any rate, we have solved the disappearances and Neclord∠has fled, so we should return to South Window and give our∠report."},{"id":1004040073,"text":"...Yeah, guess you're right."},{"id":1004040074,"text":"Well, I'm going to pursue Neclord, so this is where we part∠ways for now. When I find him, I'll send word to you."},{"id":1004040075,"text":"Okay, thanks."},{"id":1004040076,"text":"Huh? Hey, what're you all doing here?"},{"id":1004040077,"text":"South Window has fallen to Highland..."},{"id":1004040078,"text":"What?! I-Is this true? Then what of Lord Granmeyer?"},{"id":1004040079,"text":"Murdered, by Solon Jhee..."},{"id":1004040080,"text":"No... No, it can't be... Lord Granmeyer..."},{"id":1004040081,"text":"T-Tell me exactly what happened."},{"id":1004040082,"text":"Okay...∨As soon as you all left South Window, a Highland force led∠by Solon Jhee descended upon the city.∨He must have judged us easy pickings. At any rate, Lord∠Granmeyer surrendered unconditionally to avoid any∠bloodshed.∨But the very next morning, the mayor's head was hanging∠from the castle gates...∨I was with women and children, so I managed to get away∠without anyone realizing my true identity."},{"id":1004040083,"text":"Hehehe, and just who do you have to thank for that?"},{"id":1004040084,"text":"Hey, no need to bring that up!"},{"id":1004040085,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1004040086,"text":"A-Anyway, we managed to get out of the city and came after∠you guys. We ran into Apple, Tsai, and Leona along the way."},{"id":1004040087,"text":"My dear South Window..."},{"id":1004040088,"text":"In order to prevent uprisings, Highland is arresting former∠soldiers of Muse and South Window all over the place."},{"id":1004040089,"text":"Which means it's only a matter of time before the Highland∠Army turns their attention here.∨But...we won't put up much of a fight with just a handful of∠people and this old run-down castle. What should we do?"},{"id":1004040093,"text":"There must be something we can do."},{"id":1004040094,"text":"Let's run for it."},{"id":1004040095,"text":"Yeah, I guess that's best... But we're gonna draw a lot of∠attention with this many people, so we'd better secure an∠escape route first."},{"id":1004040096,"text":"Right. Our only options are probably to flee by boat from∠Kuskus or run west to Two River..."},{"id":1004040097,"text":"Okay, me and ♂㈱ will go take a look.∠Right? Good idea, right?"},{"id":1004040098,"text":"How'd it go, ♂㈱?∨Ah... So there's no escape, eh?"},{"id":1004040099,"text":"Yeah... But how?"},{"id":1004040101,"text":"There has to be something else we can try..."},{"id":1004040103,"text":"Oh boy... This doesn't look good for us."},{"id":1004040104,"text":"Bad. Very bad."},{"id":1004040106,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1004040107,"text":"I hear ya, ♂㈱, but..."},{"id":1004040108,"text":"I don't like our chances against the Highland Army..."},{"id":1004040109,"text":".........∨What's wrong with all of you?! Is running away all that any∠of you can think of? I thought we were better than this!∨♂㈱ is right! There must be a way! There must∠be!"},{"id":1004040110,"text":"But what's the point of fighting a battle we have no chance∠of winning?"},{"id":1004040111,"text":"We do have a chance!!!"},{"id":1004040112,"text":"Care to fill us in, Apple?"},{"id":1004040113,"text":"For a small force to defeat a larger force, strategy is∠needed. We can win as long as we have the right plan..."},{"id":1004040114,"text":"And I take it you have a brilliant strategy in mind?"},{"id":1004040115,"text":"No, I'm not up to the task. I've learned that the hard way.∨But I know someone who is.∨In Radat Town, there is a man named Shu.∨He and I were both students under Master Mathiu. ∠Though Shu was later expelled by Mathiu, he still has one∠of the finest strategic minds I've ever known.∨If we can get him to join us, I'm sure he'll be able to∠think up a way we can win this!"},{"id":1004040116,"text":"I guess you're right... We can't very well keep running to∠the edge of the world."},{"id":1004040117,"text":"Uh-huh, yeah. Yeah."},{"id":1004040118,"text":"...Okay, guess all we can do is give it a shot.∨Flik, me and you are gonna try to scare up as many troops as∠we can. There should be plenty of guys from South Window∠around here.∨As for this Shu guy, that's all you, ♂㈱. Make∠sure you bring him back, huh?"},{"id":1004040119,"text":"This is important, ♂㈱. Radat Town is east of∠South Window. I'll go along with you."},{"id":1004040120,"text":"Don't worry about Pilika. I'll look after her."},{"id":1004040121,"text":"Thanks, Leona. Okay, let's go, ♂㈱.∨Hey, hey, Apple... Is this Shu person handsome?"},{"id":1004040122,"text":"What?! D-Don't ask me..."},{"id":1004040123,"text":"H-Hey, now, I'm countin' on you..."},{"id":1004050001,"text":"So, this is where Shu is..."},{"id":1004050002,"text":"Hey, hey, ♂㈱. Seems like Apple and this Shu∠have some history, huh?"},{"id":1004050003,"text":"Let's go inside."},{"id":1004050004,"text":"Huh? Oh, okay."},{"id":1004050005,"text":"I'll go call the master. Please wait here."},{"id":1004050006,"text":"Hmm, he sure does live in a nice house."},{"id":1004050007,"text":"It's been a long time, Apple."},{"id":1004050008,"text":"Shu..."},{"id":1004050009,"text":"I already know what you want, but go ahead and tell me∠anyway."},{"id":1004050010,"text":"I want only one thing. I want you to join us. You must know∠what Luca Blight is planning.∨If Highland takes over this country, a great many people∠will suffer.∨Please, Shu, please lend us your strength."},{"id":1004050011,"text":"Well, what you say is true. Luca Blight is a curse upon∠this world. He intends to reduce the City-States to ashes."},{"id":1004050012,"text":"And that's why we must stop him. Please, join our side."},{"id":1004050013,"text":"I can't."},{"id":1004050014,"text":"What?!∨B-But why? You know Luca's intentions and yet you decline?"},{"id":1004050015,"text":"Yes, I know. But to be honest, I don't really care which∠side is destroyed."},{"id":1004050016,"text":"H-How can you say that..."},{"id":1004050017,"text":"I'm a trader now. I use my knowledge to predict shifts in∠the world's economy. It's the greatest way to get rich.∨Rulers change, borders change, countries change, but money∠is a constant. In fact, there's nothing better for business than∠a good war."},{"id":1004050018,"text":"So, Shu, are you saying that even though you know what a∠monster Luca is, you're just going to sit by and watch?"},{"id":1004050019,"text":"In a word...yes."},{"id":1004050020,"text":"N-No..."},{"id":1004050021,"text":"I-I'm disappointed in you! You didn't learn anything from∠Master Mathiu, did you?∨He would've..."},{"id":1004050022,"text":"He expelled me.∨Well, it's time you were off. Someone show them the way out."},{"id":1004050024,"text":"A-Apple... This Shu person..."},{"id":1004050025,"text":"Shu and I studied strategy together under Master Mathiu. ∠He thought of me as a younger sister...∨But despite being warned by Master Mathiu not to use his∠talents for unjust goals, Shu could not resist and was∠eventually expelled.∨Master Mathiu and Shu were both so important to me,∠but they just couldn't see eye to eye..."},{"id":1004050026,"text":"There's nothing we can do. Let's give up."},{"id":1004050027,"text":"Maybe there's something we can do."},{"id":1004050028,"text":"...But without Shu's help, we have no hope against Solon∠Jhee. I hate to admit it, but I'm not good enough...∨Let's gather some more information."},{"id":1004050029,"text":"Yes, but without Shu's help, we have no hope against Solon∠Jhee. I hate to admit it, but I'm not good enough...∨Let's gather some more information."},{"id":1004050030,"text":"Sorry, folks. I'm busy. Come back later."},{"id":1004050031,"text":"Apple, you're still here? I'm sure you're aware,∠but Highland will be here in force sooner than later."},{"id":1004050032,"text":"I know that. But we're not leaving until you agree to help∠us."},{"id":1004050033,"text":"...So what are you going to do? Are you willing to get down∠on your knees and beg?"},{"id":1004050034,"text":"............∨If that's what it takes."},{"id":1004050036,"text":"Stop it, Apple."},{"id":1004050037,"text":"It's okay. I don't mind..."},{"id":1004050038,"text":"I beg of you. Please help us. We need you."},{"id":1004050039,"text":"Apple...∨You..."},{"id":1004050040,"text":"Please. Please. I'm begging you.∨We need your help, Shu."},{"id":1004050041,"text":"Ugh...∨I'm leaving. I'm not thirsty anymore."},{"id":1004050042,"text":"Apple...∠Have you lost your pride as one of Master Mathiu's∠disciples?∨You should be ashamed..."},{"id":1004050043,"text":"Of course I don't like to dirty myself on the ground before∠you, begging like a dog for all to see...∨But if necessary, I can cast aside what little pride I have.∠That's what I learned from Master Mathiu."},{"id":1004050044,"text":".........∨...Let's go."},{"id":1004050046,"text":"C-C'mon, Apple, that's enough."},{"id":1004050047,"text":"No, if there's even the faintest glimmer of hope...∠Please bear with me just a little longer, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004050048,"text":"It's no use. Let's go back."},{"id":1004050049,"text":"Okay, I understand."},{"id":1004050050,"text":"No, as things are, we don't have a chance against Highland.∠We need Shu, believe me."},{"id":1004050051,"text":"Please listen to me. This is a fight too. The fight to∠persuade Shu to join us."},{"id":1004050052,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. If it's this important to her,∠let's hang around a little longer."},{"id":1004050053,"text":"Thanks.∨But from the look of things, Shu is going to avoid us from∠this point on... What should we do?"},{"id":1004050054,"text":"*whistle* ∠I know about the three of you.∨You're ♂㈱, that's your adopted sister, Nanami,∠and that's Apple, student of Mathiu the strategist. ∠Am I right?"},{"id":1004050055,"text":"No, you're wrong."},{"id":1004050056,"text":"Yes, you're right."},{"id":1004050057,"text":"Tsk, tsk, tsk. Ya didn't think you could pull one over on∠old Richmond, the greatest private eye in Radat, did ya?∨Once I'm on the case, I can find out anything."},{"id":1004050058,"text":"I knew it. I mean, once the greatest private eye in Radat∠is on the case, I can find out anything."},{"id":1004050059,"text":"So, you came here to get Shu the trader to join you, right?∠Yeah, I know all about the scene in the tavern too.∨How 'bout it? You wanna hire me to help? ∠Gimme 1,500 potch up front and I'll dig up all the dirt you∠need on Shu."},{"id":1004050061,"text":"That's a little pricey."},{"id":1004050062,"text":"Okay, it's a deal. You folks head on back to the inn, fluff∠up your pillows, and get some shut-eye while I handle the∠rest.∨Old Richmond here always gets the job done, so don't worry.∠I'll come find ya when I have the goods.∨You're stayin' at...oh yeah, the ♂■ Inn.∠What, of course I knew that. They have great soup. Try it."},{"id":1004050063,"text":"Hey, you don't have 1,500 potch in your pocket, do ya?∠And yeah, I already know that too. Come see me after ya∠save up some coin."},{"id":1004050064,"text":"I thought you'd say that. But believe me, you're gonna need∠me soon enough. I know that too, of course."},{"id":1004050065,"text":"Well, that detective is on the case, so let's get some rest.∠I'm beat from all that walking today."},{"id":1004050066,"text":"Good idea."},{"id":1004050067,"text":"It was a success!"},{"id":1004050068,"text":"Ack! Wh-Who's there?!"},{"id":1004050069,"text":"Hey! You're the guy from before! How did you get in here?!"},{"id":1004050070,"text":"Whoa, easy there. I just came to deliver my report."},{"id":1004050071,"text":"Really? You really haven't done anything creepy?"},{"id":1004050072,"text":"Ya think a hard-boiled dandy like old Richmond here would∠do something like that, missy?"},{"id":1004050073,"text":"Hm......?∠What's going on? Please don't make a fuss..."},{"id":1004050074,"text":"Ya see, I'm the type who likes to work fast.∨Now, it looks like this Shu person is tryin' to give you all∠a wide berth. But he has a big trade goin' down tomorrow∠night that he has to attend.∨They're makin' the deal at the port east of here. So, if ya∠wait at the bridge, you'll be able to get the jump on him.∨Well, that's a wrap for me. The rest is up to you."},{"id":1004050075,"text":"Be seein' ya."},{"id":1004050076,"text":"Tomorrow night, eh..."},{"id":1004050077,"text":"*yawn* ∠I slept well. Okay, let's go. We're gonna wait for∠Shu on the bridge to the east."},{"id":1004050078,"text":"Wait? On the bridge? What do you mean?"},{"id":1004050079,"text":"...Wait, you don't remember?"},{"id":1004050081,"text":"U-Uh, anyway, it sounds like we should go to the bridge over∠to the east of here."},{"id":1004050168,"text":"Don't worry. Shu isn't that kind of person. ♂▼0∠Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004050169,"text":"Whoa, get a load of all these Highland soldiers. They sure∠locked things down quick. Guess there wasn't any uprising."},{"id":1004050170,"text":"Let's go inside."},{"id":1004050171,"text":"Let's go back."},{"id":1004050172,"text":"Huh? Really? Well, guess you're right. I did promise Shu∠that I wouldn't put you in any danger."},{"id":1004050173,"text":"Uh-oh, yeah this doesn't look good at all."},{"id":1004050174,"text":"Heh, I knew you'd wanna take a peek at who we're gonna be∠fightin'. Okay, let's go have a look-see."},{"id":1004050175,"text":"Let's go."},{"id":1004050176,"text":"We should go back."},{"id":1004050177,"text":"Aw, c'mon... Oh well."},{"id":1004050178,"text":"Alright, that's the spirit. If things get hairy, just let me∠handle it. So, which way?"},{"id":1004050179,"text":"Huh? What the hell's that?"},{"id":1004050180,"text":"Attention, from this day forth, this city is under rule of∠the Highland Kingdom. Any who disturb the peace, be they∠citizen or soldier, shall be punished to the fullest extent∠of Highland law."},{"id":1004050181,"text":"S-So...does that mean our lives will be spared?"},{"id":1004050182,"text":"They say the people of Muse were devoured by a monster..."},{"id":1004050183,"text":"Nothing but baseless rumors! I, Kiba, promise in the name of∠King Agares that no such thing will happen."},{"id":1004050184,"text":"Th-Thank you..."},{"id":1004050185,"text":"I don't care if we're dealing with Highland or the∠♂② Army, just so long as the fighting ends."},{"id":1004050186,"text":"Pssh, what law?! That's rich comin' from them.∠Well, at least now we know we're up against Kiba∠and his son. That's more than enough.∠Let's head back, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004050187,"text":"Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1004050188,"text":"Uh-oh, did they spot us?"},{"id":1004050191,"text":"Phew, that was close... Let's get back to ♂①∠Castle.∨If we're gonna be tanglin' with Kiba, we've got lots of work∠to do if we wanna win this thing."},{"id":1004050192,"text":"So we meet again, Commander ♂㈱. ∠I'm sad to say that Lord Jowy isn't here.∨He's back in the capital, L'Renouille. In fact, I believe∠he's attending his engagement party to Jillia Blight even as ∠we speak..."},{"id":1004050193,"text":"♂㈱, you may have beaten us at Two River, but∠this time things will not go so easily.∨Now, if you'll excuse me. We too have much to do before the∠coming battle."},{"id":1004050194,"text":"So it's Kiba and Klaus, eh? But about Jowy...∨Well, anyway, let's head back. Those guys mean business. We∠gotta be ready for 'em."},{"id":1004050640,"text":"☆0∠    Bed of Four O'Clock Flowers"},{"id":1004050642,"text":"☆0∠             Bronze Pot"},{"id":1004050643,"text":"☆0∠         Pitcher of Water"},{"id":1004050645,"text":"☆0∠              Tall Plant"},{"id":1004050646,"text":"☆0∠         Well-Used Pitcher"},{"id":1004050647,"text":"☆0∠              Sealed Jar"},{"id":1004050649,"text":"☆0∠            Sturdy Bench"},{"id":1004050650,"text":"☆0∠       Barrel of Gunpowder"},{"id":1004050653,"text":"☆0∠    Barrel of Vegetable Scraps"},{"id":1004050655,"text":"☆0∠       Half-Full Barrel of Salt"},{"id":1004050675,"text":"Hey, mister, wanna buy a piglet? It's cheap. Only 5,000∠potch."},{"id":1004050676,"text":"I'll buy it."},{"id":1004050677,"text":"I don't want it."},{"id":1004050678,"text":"☆0∠       You bought a piglet.∠      You paid 5,000 potch."},{"id":1004050679,"text":"Oh, okay..."},{"id":1004050680,"text":"Hey, you don't have enough cash. Go and save some up.∠It's 5,000 potch, remember."},{"id":1004050681,"text":"Oink, oink..."},{"id":1004050682,"text":"Sorry, I'm all sold out.◎1 This guy? Oh, he's not for sale."},{"id":1004050683,"text":"Hey, innkeep."},{"id":1004050684,"text":"Y-Yes? What can I do for you?"},{"id":1004050685,"text":"Do you know a woman named Elza? ∠She's tall with blonde hair."},{"id":1004050686,"text":"Um, err, I... You see..."},{"id":1004050687,"text":"Do you know her?!"},{"id":1004050688,"text":"Umm... Well, maybe...∨She was here about♂③ days ago..."},{"id":1004050689,"text":"Where did she go?"},{"id":1004050690,"text":"Now how the heck should I know that?"},{"id":1004050691,"text":"Damn, I'm too late... I guess the chase ends here..."},{"id":1004050697,"text":"Uh...well, it could be..."},{"id":1004050698,"text":"What?"},{"id":1004050699,"text":"That person over there..."},{"id":1004050700,"text":"So, you finally came, boy. I was just thinking about going∠to another city soon."},{"id":1004050701,"text":"You... It's time to finally end this."},{"id":1004050702,"text":"Here? You'll hit the customers. The guild won't like their∠reputation being damaged like that, you know."},{"id":1004050703,"text":"...Listen up, you criminal.∨For the murder of my fellow Gunner and guild member,∠Kelley...and in the name of my gun, Sturm, I sentence you∠to death."},{"id":1004050704,"text":"Come on, Clive... We used to be more than friends. Couldn't∠you just let me go?"},{"id":1004050705,"text":"Just stop...∨Murdering a Guild Gunner, stealing a gun and fleeing...∠According to Harmonian law, both crimes are punishable by∠death."},{"id":1004050706,"text":"Hmph... Laws mean nothing.∨Do you really think there's anything to believe in other∠than the weight of this gun?"},{"id":1004050707,"text":"I'll kill you...to restore my belief."},{"id":1004050708,"text":"...◎4Fine then. Let's go. A duel between Gunners."},{"id":1004050709,"text":"Wrong! You're the criminal and I'm the executioner!"},{"id":1004050710,"text":"Whatever you say!"},{"id":1004050711,"text":"Sturm... Why?"},{"id":1004050712,"text":"See you again, handsome..."},{"id":1004050713,"text":"You paid 1,500 potch."},{"id":1004050714,"text":"Richmond told me about you. Please go up to the 2nd floor."},{"id":1004050715,"text":"I'm sorry, please leave."},{"id":1004050716,"text":"Tsk, tsk, tsk. Ya didn't think you could pull one over on∠old Richmond, the greatest private eye in Radat, did ya?∨♂▼0Once I'm on the case,♂▼1 I can find out anything."},{"id":1004050717,"text":"What's wrong? Aren't you gonna take him on? Don't worry,∠with that coin, you got this in the bag."},{"id":1004050718,"text":"News of the fall of Muse City has reached us even here.∠What's gonna happen to the Jowston Army without its leader?"},{"id":1004050719,"text":"That big mansion to the east belongs to Shu. How the does∠someone so young get so wealthy?"},{"id":1004050720,"text":"I heard that Master Shu used to study under a world-famous∠military strategist. I knew there was something special∠about him."},{"id":1004050721,"text":"Hi there, mister. Where ya goin'?∨The watergate?◎1 It's east of here.◎2 Isn't it?"},{"id":1004050722,"text":"Where'd you guys come from? Ya ain't from Two River, huh.◎1∠I can tell just by looking at ya."},{"id":1004050723,"text":"That Richmond is something all right. I guess there's some∠truth to his claim that he knows everything."},{"id":1004050724,"text":"Master Shu is nice to us, too. For a young man, he certainly∠is thoughtful."},{"id":1004050725,"text":"My grandson was at that mercenary fort east of here. I∠wonder whatever happened to him..."},{"id":1004050726,"text":"Hey, you! Is it true?! Was Muse really beaten? What's gonna∠happen to us now?"},{"id":1004050727,"text":"Guess what? Sometimes a person who sells piglets comes∠through here. Those piglets sure are cute."},{"id":1004050818,"text":"First Muse City and now our own South Window..."},{"id":1004050823,"text":"I haven't seen Richmond around here lately."},{"id":1004050826,"text":"Lord Granmeyer... It's so horrible. What will become of us?"},{"id":1004050918,"text":"There's a rumor that those guys that took over the old∠castle in North Window sent Highland running.∨I don't buy it, but come to think of it, I haven't seen the∠Highland Army around lately either..."},{"id":1004050919,"text":"All the servants at Shu's mansion were dismissed. I wonder∠what happened..."},{"id":1004050923,"text":"■"},{"id":1004050924,"text":"Master Shu has left town. I sure miss him."},{"id":1004050926,"text":"Even though the Highland Army left this town, the war is∠still raging..."},{"id":1004051018,"text":"The ♂② Army saved Two River! Maybe there's a∠chance after all."},{"id":1004051020,"text":"I sure hope thieves don't target Shu's mansion."},{"id":1004051021,"text":"There's lots of scary guys around the watergate."},{"id":1004051022,"text":"Hey! I know you! You're the leader of the ♂②∠Army! I saw you once from a long way off!"},{"id":1004051118,"text":"*sigh* We're doomed..."},{"id":1004051119,"text":"Th-The Highland Army are coming for us now..."},{"id":1004051120,"text":"Th-They're gonna kill us all, just the way they killed∠all the people of Muse..."},{"id":1004051121,"text":"I-I'm scared, mister... Everyone looks so mean..."},{"id":1004051122,"text":"Is it really okay for the leader of the ♂②∠Army to be hanging around here?"},{"id":1004051124,"text":"Well, looks like we'll all be killed too..."},{"id":1004051125,"text":"What about us old folk..."},{"id":1004051126,"text":"Wh-What does the Highland Army intend to do with us?"},{"id":1004051218,"text":"The ♂② Army is the real deal!"},{"id":1004051219,"text":"I had no idea that Shu was acting as the ♂②∠Army's strategist."},{"id":1004051221,"text":"The bad guys are gone...right?"},{"id":1004051222,"text":"You did it! You were really great. I was a little bit∠scared, but I went and watched the battle anyway."},{"id":1004051224,"text":"I saw Master Shu standing right there next to Commander∠♂㈱. So he was in the ♂② Army∠all this time, eh?"},{"id":1004051226,"text":"I-It was dreaful. There was a rumor that we were all going∠to be slaughtered..."},{"id":1004051318,"text":"It'll be okay. Commander ♂㈱ and the∠♂② Army will save us."},{"id":1004051320,"text":"It looks like Shu's mansion has been abandoned. I wonder∠if everything is okay..."},{"id":1004051321,"text":"*sob* *sniffle*"},{"id":1004051322,"text":"Be careful, okay."},{"id":1004051324,"text":"Not again..."},{"id":1004051326,"text":"E-Enough already..."},{"id":1004051418,"text":"That Commander ♂㈱... He's a miracle worker."},{"id":1004051422,"text":"He did it! That's our ♂㈱! He beat the∠Mad Prince, Luca Blight!!!"},{"id":1004051424,"text":"It...it was so frightening..."},{"id":1004051426,"text":"I-I've had enough of war... If this is how it was going to∠be, we should've just surrendered right away."},{"id":1004051519,"text":"With Commander ♂㈱ and Shu as his strategist,∠we can even beat the Highland Army, huh?"},{"id":1004051520,"text":"A traveler told me this war would be over soon. I pray∠that he's right."},{"id":1004051521,"text":"My mommy...she said it'll all be okay. She said Commander∠♂㈱ is gonna protect me..."},{"id":1004051522,"text":"Guess all that's left now is to give Highland a proper∠thrashing, right, Commander?"},{"id":1004051524,"text":"I wonder if I'll be able to see the ♂② Army∠beat the Highland Army with these old eyes of mine..."},{"id":1004051525,"text":"I heard from my grandson. He's in the ♂② Army∠now. He says he'll come home when the war is over."},{"id":1004051619,"text":"I wonder if the new country, the ♂② Republic,∠will be a peaceful one?"},{"id":1004051620,"text":"Is Shu going to stay on as strategist in the∠♂② Republic too? I hope he comes back here∠instead."},{"id":1004051622,"text":"Congratulations, Commander. I assume you'll be leading∠the ♂② Republic too?"},{"id":1004051624,"text":"I never thought this day would come so soon."},{"id":1004051625,"text":"I can't wait to see my grandson's face."},{"id":1004051626,"text":"Finally, it's over..."},{"id":1004051718,"text":"Ah! Hey you!!!"},{"id":1004051719,"text":"Halt!!!"},{"id":1004051720,"text":"Huh? If we don't hurry, we're gonna miss General Kiba's∠speech."},{"id":1004051721,"text":"We're guarding this area. Wait, are you... Nah, I must be∠seeing things."},{"id":1004060001,"text":"Hey, this is the place. The cave's behind these boulders.∨There's always a wind blowing through it, so they call it∠the Cave of the Wind.∨When I was a kid, we used to come here to test our bravery.∠It's infested by monsters now, though, so watch your backs."},{"id":1004060002,"text":"And the Celestial Sword is inside?"},{"id":1004060003,"text":"Um, yeah... It's probably waitin' for me."},{"id":1004060004,"text":"Hold on, you're acting really weird. What're you hiding?"},{"id":1004060005,"text":"Who're you? This ain't the best place to wait for friends."},{"id":1004060006,"text":"But it was you I was waiting for...Viktor."},{"id":1004060007,"text":"How do you know my name?! You one of Neclord's cronies?"},{"id":1004060008,"text":"Please, there's no need to be alarmed.∠I do understand your wariness though.∨As for Neclord... Let us just say that you're not the only∠one who has a grudge against him."},{"id":1004060009,"text":"So ya want a piece of the bastard too, eh?"},{"id":1004060010,"text":"Yes...∨The Marley family has been hunting vampires for∠generations. My father and his father before him both∠hunted Neclord...∨And both lost their lives to the fiend.∨I have studied my father's trade ever since I was a small∠boy, and so I will slay Neclord, both as revenge for my∠father, and for my own pride."},{"id":1004060011,"text":"So, where do I come into the picture?"},{"id":1004060012,"text":"My business isn't with you per se... It's with the Celestial∠Sword, the Night Rune.∨Neclord used the \"Doppelganger Secret\" to make a duplicate∠of himself. The Neclord that you defeated previously wasn't∠the true Neclord."},{"id":1004060013,"text":"Doppelganger... You mean it was a fake?"},{"id":1004060014,"text":"He's a vampire who's lived for hundreds of years, so one∠must assume he's learned a few tricks in that time.∨But if we use the Night Rune to cast his spirit out and∠entrap it, we should be able to capture his soul."},{"id":1004060015,"text":"Damn that stupid Celestial Sword and all his big talk about∠bein' the \"manifestation of the Night Rune\"...∨He's the reason we didn't finish Neclord in the first place!"},{"id":1004060016,"text":"Maybe so... But one thing is certain: without the Celestial∠Sword, our chances of defeating Neclord are nonexistent.∨That's why I was waiting for you. I knew you'd be coming to∠claim the sword within this cave."},{"id":1004060017,"text":"If ya knew where it was, then why didn't ya just take it?"},{"id":1004060018,"text":"No, that sword was not meant for my hands, you see. And in∠any case, it doesn't appear very willing..."},{"id":1004060019,"text":"I was afraid of that..."},{"id":1004060020,"text":"So may I accompany you? After all, we share the same goal."},{"id":1004060021,"text":"No way."},{"id":1004060023,"text":"Hey, hold on now. We need all the help we can get.∨Besides, things're about to get pretty rough..."},{"id":1004060024,"text":"Hmm, well he did spend all this time waiting for us in the∠dark, so why not?"},{"id":1004060025,"text":"We must face a very dangerous enemy. I too agree that he∠should accompany us."},{"id":1004060026,"text":"Thank you. Now then, shall we retrieve the Celestial Sword?"},{"id":1004060027,"text":"...Is this the Celestial Sword?"},{"id":1004060028,"text":"Hey, how ya doin', pal?"},{"id":1004060030,"text":"Huh? What's wrong? You still with us?∠Wait... Don't tell me you're mad?"},{"id":1004060031,"text":"First, you keep referring to a sword as \"he\" and \"him,\"∠and now you actually try and talk to it?!"},{"id":1004060032,"text":"Curse you, Viktor... You have some nerve returning to the∠place where you abandoned me."},{"id":1004060033,"text":"No way!!!"},{"id":1004060034,"text":"Aw, c-c'mon, I didn't \"abandon\" you... I-I just figured a∠nice, quiet place like this might do ya good."},{"id":1004060035,"text":"Th-That sword is talking... So, Viktor's \"partner\" is..."},{"id":1004060036,"text":"Stupid girl. I am a manifestation of the Night Rune. I'm not∠\"partners\" with him or anyone else.∨This oaf is nothing more than my servant."},{"id":1004060037,"text":"What did you say, you overgrown butter knife?! Who're you∠calling a servant?!"},{"id":1004060038,"text":"You had the gall to deceive me, and now you..."},{"id":1004060039,"text":"Shut up! All your constant grumblin' and moanin' and∠complainin' makes my head hurt..."},{"id":1004060040,"text":"Huh?∨H-Hey... Hey! L-Let's not be hasty here!"},{"id":1004060041,"text":"Ah, oh boy. Looks like he's really mad.∠Grab your weapons, everybody!"},{"id":1004060042,"text":"It's high time I teach you a lesson!"},{"id":1004060043,"text":"*pant* *pant* *pant* ∠Y-Ya simmered down yet?∠There's no need to be so c-cranky..."},{"id":1004060044,"text":"Fool! Once I get this angry, I fight until my foes are∠utterly—"},{"id":1004060045,"text":"Yikes!!! Okay, I'm sorry! I apologize! Forgive me!∠Mercy, O powerful deity!∨Please stay your wrath, great Celestial Sword!!!"},{"id":1004060046,"text":"............∨Hmph... Very well. But tell me, servant, why did you come∠back here?"},{"id":1004060047,"text":"A-Alright, my bad. Forgive me. No, please excuse my∠behavior. I apologize, so please!"},{"id":1004060048,"text":"Hmph... Very well. But tell me, servant, why did you come∠back here?"},{"id":1004060049,"text":"Neclord is still alive. Or wait, he's a vampire, so I guess∠maybe I should say, he's \"undead\"? Anyway, he's back."},{"id":1004060050,"text":"I fail to understand why that miserable vampire would be∠\"back,\" so why..."},{"id":1004060051,"text":"Neclord is using the Doppelganger Secret. Suffice to say,∠he's a vampire with a powerful rune."},{"id":1004060052,"text":"Hmph, the impudent little wretch. If that's true, then I∠suppose there is cause for me go with you."},{"id":1004060053,"text":"Alright, I'm countin' on you!"},{"id":1004060055,"text":"Uh, I mean...please grant us your strength!"},{"id":1004060056,"text":"Very well then."},{"id":1004060057,"text":"Okay, now we're set. Normal attacks don't work on Neclord,∠but if we can strip his defenses with this guy, then..."},{"id":1004060058,"text":"\"This guy\"?"},{"id":1004060059,"text":"I, uh...that is to say, if we can strip his defenses by∠the power of the almighty Celestial Sword, perhaps we can∠beat him."},{"id":1004060060,"text":"Hahahaha..."},{"id":1004060061,"text":"Well, now that we're all friends again, let's go back to∠North Window. I can finally complete my mission."},{"id":1004060062,"text":"Huh? What's wrong? You still with us?∠♂▼0 ♂◆Wait... Don't tell me you're mad?"},{"id":1004060063,"text":"You acquired 3,000 potch."},{"id":1004060064,"text":"A strong wind is blowing!"},{"id":1004060065,"text":"There it is! This is it, right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1004060066,"text":"It seems that way..."},{"id":1004060067,"text":"This wasn't here before."},{"id":1004060068,"text":"Okay, we got the red flower now. Now we just need the∠green bell."},{"id":1004060069,"text":"Damn him... He's not here either. Yuber, you damn... But∠he must be close..."},{"id":1004060070,"text":"Who are you? The ♂② Army...◎4 I see, so you∠must be ♂㈱."},{"id":1004060071,"text":"Um, would you join us?"},{"id":1004060072,"text":"Who's Yuber?"},{"id":1004060073,"text":"Well... My true goal is to find Yuber. But I suppose I can∠assist you in the meantime. I trust that is acceptable."},{"id":1004060074,"text":"So, shall I accompany you straight away?"},{"id":1004060076,"text":"Please go to ♂① Castle."},{"id":1004060077,"text":"Understood."},{"id":1004060078,"text":"Very well... Farewell then."},{"id":1004060079,"text":"How do I put it? A devil, a shadow, my arch-nemesis...∠Something along those lines, perhaps?∨He is...difficult to describe."},{"id":1004060080,"text":"Um, will you join us?"},{"id":1004060081,"text":"Oh, I see..."},{"id":1004060084,"text":"I'd like you to join us after all."},{"id":1004060085,"text":"Oh, um, nothing."},{"id":1004060086,"text":"I see."},{"id":1004060098,"text":"Mysterious Old Man"},{"id":1004060099,"text":"Hmm... Wanna take it with you?◎2 Good, good, I don't need it∠any longer.∨Say, it's a long walk back from here. Want me to help you to∠the exit?"},{"id":1004060101,"text":"No thanks."},{"id":1004060102,"text":"Okay, here we go..."},{"id":1004070001,"text":"Look, the torches in ♂① Castle are burning.∠They're probably in there trying to figure out how to run∠away."},{"id":1004070002,"text":"I have a report! Our advance forces are under attack by∠the ♂② Army!"},{"id":1004070003,"text":"King Luca! The ♂② Army has appeared behind us!"},{"id":1004070004,"text":"What?! They were hiding in the woods?! These stupid worms∠don't know when to quit squirming!!!"},{"id":1004070005,"text":"K-King Luca!!!"},{"id":1004070006,"text":"Protect the king!!!"},{"id":1004070007,"text":"Aaagh!!!"},{"id":1004070008,"text":"Bastards... How did you...know about...the night raid?"},{"id":1004070009,"text":"Luca Blight! We've come for your head!!!"},{"id":1004070010,"text":"Fools! As if you pathetic weaklings could ever kill me!!!"},{"id":1004070011,"text":"Damn, time to pull back! The rest is up to you!"},{"id":1004070012,"text":"Leave it to us! Let's get him!!!"},{"id":1004070013,"text":"Annoying little fleas!!!"},{"id":1004070014,"text":"Grr... Beaten by the likes of you..."},{"id":1004070015,"text":"This time I'll pay you back for sure, Luca Blight!!!"},{"id":1004070016,"text":"Miserable maggots..."},{"id":1004070017,"text":"Dammit..."},{"id":1004070018,"text":"It's futile! Futile! Bwahahahahahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1004070019,"text":"...I won't be defeated here!!!"},{"id":1004070020,"text":"He's headed your way, ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1004070021,"text":"Luca Blight, your life is at an end. You have no soldiers∠and you're heavily wounded. You can't break out of our∠trap!!!"},{"id":1004070022,"text":"Your \"trap\"?◎1∨Bwahahahahahahaha!!! All I can see is a bunch of squealing∠pigs lost in the woods!!!∨♂㈱, right here, right now...I'll separate∠your puny head from your pitiful body!!"},{"id":1004070023,"text":"Commander ♂㈱! Be careful!!!"},{"id":1004070024,"text":"D-Damn you... Wh-Why... How could I lose?!∨You filthy swine... Who do you think you are?!∨Why?! ♂㈱!!! Why is it you who has won?! Why∠must I lose?! Is that my fate?!∨I refuse to die until I cleanse the last of you filth from∠the face of this world!!!"},{"id":1004070025,"text":"After him, ♂㈱! We've come too far to let him∠escape now!"},{"id":1004070026,"text":"Luca Blight...◎1∨Assemble our archers. We're heading to the prearranged∠position."},{"id":1004070027,"text":"Y-Yes, sir!"},{"id":1004070028,"text":"We can't let him escape! Let's go, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1004070029,"text":"You Jowston scum won't get King Luca!!!"},{"id":1004070030,"text":"Ungh... Y-You little...∨I-I can't die...here..."},{"id":1004070031,"text":"Have I...◎1really...◎0lost?◎1∨Dammit! I-Is this fear I feel?! Am I in fear of death?!∨What a stupid, worthless emotion."},{"id":1004070032,"text":"Huh?∨What is this?"},{"id":1004070033,"text":"A wooden amulet... What's it doing here?∨And what's this light...∨Huh? This is the cap?"},{"id":1004070034,"text":"These are fireflies...∨There were fireflies inside? Hmph, what joke this is...∠...I'll crush them."},{"id":1004070035,"text":"Worthless... These insects aren't even worth killing..."},{"id":1004070036,"text":"Worthless... This world as well..."},{"id":1004070037,"text":"Light! There! Let loose!!!"},{"id":1004070038,"text":"Gyaaagh!!!"},{"id":1004070039,"text":"We've got you now, Luca Blight! This is where it ends!"},{"id":1004070040,"text":"Ends...you say?◎1∨Ha...haha...◎0 Wahahahahahahaha!!! What are you raving∠about, maggot?! What are you squealing about, pigs?!∨I have the right to take your lives!"},{"id":1004070041,"text":"King Luca!!!"},{"id":1004070042,"text":"King Luca! H-Hurry, you must escape!!!"},{"id":1004070043,"text":"King Luca..."},{"id":1004070044,"text":"Arrows away!"},{"id":1004070045,"text":"My holy war... Don't interfere...you filth...∨I'm coming for you, ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1004070047,"text":"Are you okay, ♂㈱?!"},{"id":1004070048,"text":"So, I've lost the strength to even lift this broken sword...◎4∨♂㈱... Why do you fight?! What do you think∠killing me will bring?!"},{"id":1004070049,"text":"An end to this war."},{"id":1004070051,"text":"An end to this war? That's a fairy tale...∠A foolish child's dream.∨Even if you kill me and defeat Highland, you won't have∠peace! A wasteland echoing of hate will be all that's left!"},{"id":1004070052,"text":"What is war to you?! How does it make you feel?!∨If it fills your very soul with hatred and loathing,∠then it's all the same!∨Even if you kill me and defeat Highland, you won't have∠peace! A wasteland echoing of hate will be all that's left!"},{"id":1004070053,"text":"Heh... Bwahahahahaha!∨Bwahahahahahahahaha!!!∨Yes! Yes!!! The aching that wracked my body! The thirst that∠scorched my flesh! It is fading!∨Bwahahahahaha!∨Hear me, ♂㈱! It took thousands to kill me,∠but I killed many times that and more of your people, all∠by myself!∨Look at me! I do as I wish, as I please! I am the true face∠of evil!!!"},{"id":1004070054,"text":"So...◎0is it finally over? Did we...◎1 Did we win?"},{"id":1004070056,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, let's go back. We have won, and∠there are many people waiting to hear news of our victory."},{"id":1004070057,"text":"Is this what you wanted?"},{"id":1004070058,"text":"Yes...∨It's what I'd always hoped for, and I want to believe I'm∠brave enough to accept this fate."},{"id":1004070059,"text":"What're you doin', ♂㈱? He'll get away!!!"},{"id":1004070060,"text":"Heh... Bwahahahahaha!∨Bwahahahahahahahaha!!!∨♂▼0Yes! Yes!!! The aching that wracked my body!∠The thirst that scorched my flesh! First we report back to∠Lord Granmeyer in South Window."},{"id":1004100056,"text":"Daisy"},{"id":1004150001,"text":"Heehee, a fish, a fish, I wish to catch a fish."},{"id":1004150002,"text":"Those Muse folks are too buddy-buddy with Highland. They∠betrayed us. That's why things are like this."},{"id":1004150003,"text":"I wonder when Tai Ho and his brother Yam Koo are gonna∠come back."},{"id":1004150004,"text":"Okay, I'll catch lots of fish for your dinner."},{"id":1004150005,"text":"Hahaha, my daughter's very eager too."},{"id":1004150102,"text":"That Granmeyer is a weakling. He's the reason we're in this∠mess."},{"id":1004150103,"text":"I heard Tai Ho and his brother, Yam Koo, are back. I gotta∠go see 'em."},{"id":1004150202,"text":"The ♂② Army? They got lucky, that's all. It∠won't last, believe me."},{"id":1004150203,"text":"Tai Ho and his brother Yam Koo sure are eccentric."},{"id":1004150204,"text":"Heehee, I'm catching lots of fish today."},{"id":1004150205,"text":"Grrr, nothin' but nibbles all day..."},{"id":1004150402,"text":"*sigh* We're done for..."},{"id":1004150404,"text":"What am I to do? I'm going to catch more fish than I can∠carry."},{"id":1004150501,"text":"Do you like fishing too?"},{"id":1004150502,"text":"I swear, those ♂② Army guys are so lucky."},{"id":1004150601,"text":""},{"id":1004150602,"text":""},{"id":1004150702,"text":"The ♂② Army... Wait a minute..."},{"id":1004150704,"text":"Heehee, I'm a much better fisherman than Papa now."},{"id":1004150705,"text":"My daughter is quite a fisherman. It's because I'm such a∠great teacher, see?"},{"id":1004150801,"text":"☆0∠          Small Boat"},{"id":1004150812,"text":"☆0∠         Barrel of Oil"},{"id":1004150814,"text":"Yay! Yay! Fish! I love fish!"},{"id":1004150815,"text":"Haha, that's great. I think the ♂② Army∠can win..."},{"id":1004150915,"text":"I can't believe it. A rag-tag bunch like that beating the∠Highland Army..."},{"id":1004150917,"text":"It's okay, I'm going to divide up the fish I caught with∠Papa. We won't tell Mama either."},{"id":1004150918,"text":"Hehehe, she's a sweet girl."},{"id":1004160001,"text":"See? I kept my promise."},{"id":1004160002,"text":"Thank you very much."},{"id":1004160003,"text":"Okay, let's head for South Window, which is... Um..."},{"id":1004160004,"text":"South Window is just south of here."},{"id":1004160005,"text":"South! South!"},{"id":1004160006,"text":"Okay..."},{"id":1004160007,"text":"Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1004160008,"text":"Grr..."},{"id":1004160033,"text":"This town is under Highland rule. Outsiders aren't allowed."},{"id":1004160034,"text":"Who knows how many Jowston soldiers might be lurking∠out there."},{"id":1004160035,"text":"By the decree of Prince Luca, none may enter this town."},{"id":1004160036,"text":"You... look familiar... Ah, just get out of here!"},{"id":1004160037,"text":"What? Need a boat?"},{"id":1004160041,"text":"Ahoy there. Yer not a sailor, are ya? Me? I'm in charge of∠managin' the cargo."},{"id":1004160042,"text":"Hey, did ya hear there's a monster living in North Window,∠northwest of here? I wonder if it's really true."},{"id":1004160043,"text":"Eh? South Window? Just head south from here. You'll find it∠easy enough."},{"id":1004160044,"text":"My grandpa told me to watch the boat. I hope he pays∠me for it."},{"id":1004160045,"text":"A monster in North Window? Some drunken old fool was∠probably just seeing things."},{"id":1004160140,"text":"I don't want any of those Highland pukes messing with the∠boat."},{"id":1004160141,"text":"Thanks to them damn Highlanders, our cargo is all messed up."},{"id":1004160144,"text":"Who are those guys? They're so big and scary..."},{"id":1004160240,"text":"Whew, it's not easy keeping watch on a boat."},{"id":1004160241,"text":"Managing cargo is tough work, ya know."},{"id":1004160242,"text":"Lately I haven't heard anything about that monster in North∠Window."},{"id":1004160244,"text":"I'm watching the boat like my grandpa told me to."},{"id":1004160345,"text":"I knew that gossip about a monster in North Window was just∠a bunch of rubbish."},{"id":1004160444,"text":"I'm watching the boat like my grandpa told me, but I'm∠gettin' a little sick of it."},{"id":1004160540,"text":"☆0∠             Iron Door"},{"id":1004160541,"text":"☆0∠        Crate of Apples∠           Smells good."},{"id":1004160542,"text":"None"},{"id":1004160543,"text":"☆0∠       Crate of Radishes"},{"id":1004160545,"text":"☆0∠      Small Wooden Boat∠           For fishing."},{"id":1004160546,"text":"☆0∠  Large Ship for Ferrying People"},{"id":1004160549,"text":"☆0∠                Boat"},{"id":1004160555,"text":"☆0∠               Pitcher"},{"id":1004160556,"text":"☆0∠         Lots of Barrels"},{"id":1004160557,"text":"☆0∠           Small Barrel"},{"id":1004160558,"text":"☆0∠      Lots of Wooden Crates"},{"id":1004160559,"text":"☆0∠          Lots of Boxes"},{"id":1004160663,"text":"I heard that Commander ♂㈱ killed that monster∠holed up in North Window. He's really something."},{"id":1004160665,"text":"(They're gone.)"},{"id":1004160666,"text":"Is ♂㈱ of the ♂② Army really as∠strong as they say? He must be some giant with muscles on∠his muscles."},{"id":1004160762,"text":"Hey, where ya going? Take care, okay?"},{"id":1004160861,"text":"Huh? A war? Are we winning?"},{"id":1004160862,"text":"This ain't easy work, but it's mine all the same."},{"id":1004160863,"text":"Looks like Commander ♂㈱ is gonna finish off∠those Highland brutes for us."},{"id":1004160963,"text":"That Commander ♂㈱... He's the new hero of∠Jowston."},{"id":1004160965,"text":"I stopped watching the boat and went to play with my∠friends, then Grandpa yelled at me."},{"id":1004170092,"text":"We have everything, so buy as much as you can!"},{"id":1004170093,"text":"Yes, sir, we'll handle any request."},{"id":1004170099,"text":"Which one will you sell?"},{"id":1004170100,"text":"Sorry, that can't be equipped."},{"id":1004170101,"text":"Okay, come back anytime. I'll be waiting."},{"id":1004170112,"text":"What'll it be?"},{"id":1004170113,"text":"Anything else?"},{"id":1004170114,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1004170115,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1004170116,"text":"All right."},{"id":1004170117,"text":"Who?"},{"id":1004170118,"text":"Where?"},{"id":1004170119,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1004170120,"text":"Can't attach that."},{"id":1004170121,"text":"Be seein' ya."},{"id":1004170123,"text":"Can't remove it."},{"id":1004170136,"text":"Hello there, what would you like? A Pointed∠Hat? A Circlet?"},{"id":1004170137,"text":"Is there anything else I can do for you?"},{"id":1004170140,"text":"Thank you!"},{"id":1004170141,"text":"Who will equip it?"},{"id":1004170145,"text":"Very well. We look forward to your next visit."},{"id":1004170156,"text":"It's 80 potch a person, which makes your total ♂③ potch."},{"id":1004170157,"text":"Okay, I'll show you to your room."},{"id":1004170160,"text":"Good morning. The weather is great outside."},{"id":1004170161,"text":"You don't have enough. Sorry, but this is a business..."},{"id":1004170324,"text":"You handed over the Wooden Shield."},{"id":1004170325,"text":"Give him the Sacrificial Jizo."},{"id":1004170326,"text":"Throw the Sacrificial Jizo at him."},{"id":1004170327,"text":"Hand him the Wooden Shield."},{"id":1004170328,"text":"Throw the Wooden Shield at him."},{"id":1004170329,"text":"This store has been here since this land was called the∠Dunan Monarchy, young man. Ohohohoho."},{"id":1004170330,"text":"Greetings. Have a look around. Maybe I could interest you∠in some throat drops?"},{"id":1004170331,"text":"You came from Muse?!◎2 Did ya hear anything about my papa?∠He's got this real big mustache...◎1 Oh, well...I guess not,∠huh..."},{"id":1004170332,"text":"This kid's dad is a soldier. He went to Muse to fight, but∠after what happened there..."},{"id":1004170333,"text":"Oh? Looking to stay? Well, our sheets are clean and the food∠is to die for."},{"id":1004170334,"text":"This place is dangerous. First it's the rumors about North∠Window and now this."},{"id":1004170335,"text":"A while ago, I saw a Half Plate in this armorer's rare∠finds section. I knew I should have bought it."},{"id":1004170336,"text":"Well, it's about time to get ready for supper."},{"id":1004170337,"text":"Now then, what to do for the side dish?"},{"id":1004170338,"text":"Hmm, what story should I tell today?∨Oh yeah, I'll tell ya 'bout the monster of North Window.∠It used to be a nice little town with a beautiful view of∠the lake.∨If only things hadn't happened the way they did..."},{"id":1004170339,"text":"The Cave of the Wind west of here is haunted. I heard∠there's a scary voice coming from inside."},{"id":1004170340,"text":"We're goin' to the cave. We've gotta show everyone how brave∠we are."},{"id":1004170341,"text":"Oh, a new trader, eh? Hehehe, better be careful. An amateur∠like you could get burned."},{"id":1004170342,"text":"I'm the security. There's lots of expensive stuff here, see."},{"id":1004170343,"text":"Hmm...◎1 What is it, kid? Ya wanna start trading?◎2 Forget∠about it."},{"id":1004170344,"text":"I haul the goods around here. Stuff comes in from all over∠the place, so I pretty much never get a break."},{"id":1004170345,"text":"Hey, whaddaya want? If you're lookin' to trade, then head∠downstairs."},{"id":1004170346,"text":"Welcome. But we don't have anything for sale here."},{"id":1004170347,"text":"Huh, who're you? ♂㈱? That's a funny name.∠Me? I'm an armorer."},{"id":1004170348,"text":"Hello there. Oh this? Teehee... it's a present for my beau."},{"id":1004170359,"text":"Welcome to South Window. You'll be staying with us, right?"},{"id":1004170360,"text":"Yessir, we're the oldest general store in South Window!"},{"id":1004170361,"text":"Yes, sorry to keep you waiting. Welcome, dear customer."},{"id":1004170362,"text":"Now this is a rare sight... What's your business?"},{"id":1004170363,"text":"You've come a long way. Come, please take a good look∠at our wares."},{"id":1004170429,"text":"☆0∠       Full Pitcher of Water"},{"id":1004170430,"text":"☆0∠     Half-Full Pitcher of Water"},{"id":1004170431,"text":"☆0∠                 Vase"},{"id":1004170433,"text":"☆0∠  Pitcher of What Looks Like Water"},{"id":1004170434,"text":"☆0∠         Crate Full of Food"},{"id":1004170435,"text":"☆0∠    Well-Built Wooden Dresser"},{"id":1004170439,"text":"☆0∠     Lots of Stacked Firewood∠  Do they really need so much?"},{"id":1004170440,"text":"☆0∠        Crate Used as a Chair"},{"id":1004170444,"text":"☆0∠  Pitcher of Strange Sticky Liquid"},{"id":1004170445,"text":"☆0∠           Crate of Potatoes"},{"id":1004170446,"text":"☆0       Local Specialties:∠Forest Village: Fur∠Kobold Village: Wood-Carved Amulet∠Rokkaku Hamlet: Flute"},{"id":1004170447,"text":"☆0∠    Shelf of Sample Trade Goods"},{"id":1004170448,"text":"☆0∠        Book of Home Medicine"},{"id":1004170449,"text":"☆0∠         South Window History"},{"id":1004170450,"text":"☆0∠           Fun with Chemistry"},{"id":1004170452,"text":"☆0∠         Shelf Lined with Tools"},{"id":1004170453,"text":"☆0∠        Shelf of Everyday Items"},{"id":1004170454,"text":"☆0∠  Shelf of Strange-Smelling Medicine"},{"id":1004170455,"text":"☆0∠  Shelf with Strangely-Shaped Plants"},{"id":1004170456,"text":"☆0∠        Shelf with Strange Tools"},{"id":1004170458,"text":"☆0∠       Wooden Crate Full of Fish"},{"id":1004170460,"text":"☆0∠               Potted Plant"},{"id":1004170461,"text":"☆0∠          Flower Arrangement"},{"id":1004170469,"text":"☆0∠          Flower Arrangement"},{"id":1004170529,"text":"Hiya, welcome."},{"id":1004170530,"text":"Um... Do you have a blue stone?"},{"id":1004170531,"text":"Huh?! Already? Ah, I mean, yes, we have it. Right here."},{"id":1004170532,"text":"Great... I'll pay,  ♂㈱.∠Um, how much is it?"},{"id":1004170533,"text":"Uh, let's see... How about 50 potch?◎1 No, 30 potch."},{"id":1004170534,"text":"Huh? Really? Okay...there you go."},{"id":1004170535,"text":"30 potch in full. Thanks!"},{"id":1004170536,"text":"Okay, that's one down... Let's hurry back to the Chief of∠the Kobold Village."},{"id":1004170537,"text":"So, what'll it be? Candles? Fur? Or maybe some crystal∠balls?"},{"id":1004170538,"text":"Oh, you done already?"},{"id":1004170539,"text":"They're all priced to move."},{"id":1004170540,"text":"Buy it while it's cheap."},{"id":1004170541,"text":"Go make a killin' out there."},{"id":1004170542,"text":"This what you want?"},{"id":1004170544,"text":"Here's the rates."},{"id":1004170546,"text":"Well, stop by when you have somethin' nice."},{"id":1004170558,"text":"Thank you for coming from so far away."},{"id":1004170571,"text":"Huh? You want a tip?◎2 Oh, well, okay. ∨Go to the Kobold Village south of Two River and buy ∠mayonnaise. Bring it back here and you'll make a good profit."},{"id":1004170573,"text":"What is it, kid? Wanna start tradin'?◎2 Well, okay. All ya∠gotta do is find cheap trade goods and buy 'em. Then sell∠'em elsewhere for as much as ya can.∨That's the gist of it, but each trading post has different∠rates and only deals in certain things, so ya gotta watch∠out or you could end up losin' money."},{"id":1004170660,"text":"Greetings. We have everything under the sun. Perhaps I can∠interest you in a \"Clay Guardian\" scroll?"},{"id":1004170661,"text":"I'm waiting for my papa to come back. He went to Muse City∠to protect us all from Highland."},{"id":1004170662,"text":"I heard that after Muse fell, the soldiers scattered all∠over the place. I hope this kid's dad is okay too..."},{"id":1004170664,"text":"The Highland Army may be gone, but we can't relax yet."},{"id":1004170667,"text":"Those boys! Going to the Cave of the Wind without∠telling anyone...∨What if something had happened?◎2 Anyway, I'm glad they're∠okay."},{"id":1004170668,"text":"Y'see, North Window used to be just a peaceful little∠village filled with happy people.∨But one night, many years ago, a vampire turned all of the∠townsfolk into zombies..."},{"id":1004170669,"text":"*shiver* All I did was go up to the front of the cave...∠but then I was so scared, I had to turn back."},{"id":1004170670,"text":"Hmph... My stupid little brother started crying on the∠way..."},{"id":1004170672,"text":"I'm the security. There's lots of expensive stuff here, see.∠What, you don't believe me? Don't blame me if you get∠burned."},{"id":1004170677,"text":"Huh, who're you? Leader of the ♂② Army? Never∠heard of it.∠Me? I'm an armorer."},{"id":1004170759,"text":"Seeing the ♂② Army makes me remember my∠youth, back when I fought under Lord Genkaku..."},{"id":1004170760,"text":"Greetings. We have everything under the sun. Perhaps I can∠interest you in a \"Wind of Sleep\" scroll?"},{"id":1004170761,"text":"My papa is really, really strong.◎1 That's how I know he'll∠be okay."},{"id":1004170762,"text":"I want to believe his dad will come back too, but..."},{"id":1004170766,"text":"That guy downstairs! He's all grumpy and hardly ever talks,∠but when he does, it's only to complain about the food."},{"id":1004170775,"text":"That's strange... The number of trade goods here∠doesn't quite match up lately."},{"id":1004170776,"text":"I don't know what to say. He's even suspicious of me."},{"id":1004170778,"text":"Teeheehee, I hope he likes it."},{"id":1004170860,"text":"Hello, young man. It's been hard to get merchandise lately,∠but I recommend...◎2these Cheek Guards. How about it?"},{"id":1004170863,"text":"Well, I think it's about time to do the shopping."},{"id":1004170864,"text":"That Highland Army never gives up, huh? "},{"id":1004170865,"text":"Is it true that there was a Deep Crimson Cape in the rare∠finds section?"},{"id":1004170867,"text":"The Highland Army is here, right? What should we do? I hope∠nothing happens to my boys."},{"id":1004170869,"text":"Do ya think the Highland Army will be mean to us? ∠Our mama is really worried..."},{"id":1004170870,"text":"I'm not scared of those Highland soldiers. I won't let them∠hurt my momma, my grandpa, or my little brother!"},{"id":1004170872,"text":"I'm not gonna let those Highland scum lay one finger on∠this place!"},{"id":1004170873,"text":"Well, kid, have ya gotten used to tradin' yet?◎2 Oh yeah, be∠careful of people who tell rumors. Sometimes the info is∠great, but sometimes it's just hearsay. ∨By the way, I wouldn't trust the gossip here if I were you."},{"id":1004170874,"text":"Well, they found out I was \"borrowing\" some of the trade∠goods here and I got in big, big trouble."},{"id":1004170875,"text":"That dirty thief! How dare he!"},{"id":1004170876,"text":"It's terrible. He's even suspicious of me."},{"id":1004170960,"text":"Hello, young man. It's been hard to get merchandise lately,∠but I recommend...these Cheek Guards. How about it?"},{"id":1004170961,"text":"I used to come here a lot with Papa. He loved drinking here."},{"id":1004170962,"text":"That man was one of the best warriors in South Window. He∠fought valiantly during the invasion of the Scarlet Moon∠Empire three years ago."},{"id":1004170967,"text":"The Highland Army is here, right? What should we do? I hope∠nothing happens to my boys."},{"id":1004170972,"text":"I won't let those Highlanders lay one finger on this∠place!◎2 Even if I have to fight Luca Blight all by myself!"},{"id":1004170978,"text":"*humming*"},{"id":1004171060,"text":"Long time no see, young man. Almost time for the final∠battle, eh? Why not stock up on Medicine?"},{"id":1004171061,"text":"Are you going to fight too, ♂㈱?◎1 Please∠take care of yourself."},{"id":1004171062,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I believe in my heart that you∠can win."},{"id":1004171063,"text":"War is coming, so we don't have very many customers."},{"id":1004171064,"text":"Is it true that the Mad Prince is coming? W-We've got to∠get out of here..."},{"id":1004171067,"text":"I'm so frightened. I heard that someone they call a \"demon\"∠or \"Mad Prince\" is coming..."},{"id":1004171068,"text":"They say that when the vampire attacked North Window,∠there was a young man who survived solely because he had∠left town on an errand.∨Rumor has it he then set out on a journey to get his revenge∠on the vampire. I wonder where he could be now..."},{"id":1004171071,"text":"A long time ago when I was young, I made a fortune by∠bringing crystal balls to the Kobold Village south of Two∠River."},{"id":1004171074,"text":"Hey kid, you look pretty strong. Looks like everything worked out okay."},{"id":1004171167,"text":"I wonder when we'll ever be able to live in peace again."},{"id":1004171169,"text":"Okay, this time I'm not coming back until I see the master∠of the Cave of the Wind."},{"id":1004171170,"text":"What should I do? Maybe I'll just sneak off and go by∠myself next time."},{"id":1004171172,"text":"So you beat Luca Blight, huh? Hehehe, I don't know what I∠would have done if he actually came here."},{"id":1004171177,"text":"Huh, who're you? Leader of the ♂② Army?∠You say you beat Luca Blight? Hang in there."},{"id":1004171266,"text":"So the war is over?◎1 Well, guess it's gonna be tough for us∠armorers to fill our bellies."},{"id":1004171272,"text":"Lately the flow of trade has improved a lot."},{"id":1004171274,"text":"Well, guess I'll be getting to work soon."},{"id":1004171278,"text":"Teeheehee..."},{"id":1004171359,"text":"So...the fighting is at an end, is it?"},{"id":1004171360,"text":"Hmm, lemme see here... How about some Greaves? Nah... I∠guess you won't need those anymore."},{"id":1004171361,"text":"Hey, look! My papa! He came home! He's home! He's home!!!"},{"id":1004171362,"text":"That's wonderful... Really, really wonderful."},{"id":1004171363,"text":"Hello, sir. Why not stay here for the night?"},{"id":1004171364,"text":"Now we can finally live in peace with no need for armor."},{"id":1004171365,"text":"Well, no more rare finds, it seems. Tell me I'm right."},{"id":1004171368,"text":"Lately there's talk that the young man went back and got his∠revenge on the vampire that destroyed North Window.∨I can hardly believe it, but it's probably just a rumor∠anyway..."},{"id":1004171369,"text":"I got scared again and came back."},{"id":1004171370,"text":"He started crying again, so what could I do? But next∠time..."},{"id":1004171372,"text":"I'm gonna give it my best today too. After all, that's my∠job, right?"},{"id":1004171373,"text":"Well, kid, did ya make a lot of money? Lemme see...◎6∨Wow! You made ♂③ potch!!!"},{"id":1004171375,"text":"Hmm, what do people need in a new republic?∠We'll stock up on that and make a ton of..."},{"id":1004171376,"text":"Even now, all he can think about is making money."},{"id":1004171377,"text":"Huh, who're you? Leader of the ♂② Army?∠Damn, you put me out of a job..."},{"id":1004171378,"text":"Teehee, he really liked it.◎2∠Huh? This?◎1 It's for the baby that we'll have together∠someday. Teehee."},{"id":1004171379,"text":"You're Commander ♂㈱? ∠My son told me all about you. Now that the war is over, ∠he finally came home. I think he's∠looking for something..."},{"id":1004190605,"text":"The hostess here treats me so well. Ah well..."},{"id":1004190608,"text":"Oh! Hey! Don't you go snitching about how I'm slacking off,∠okay?!"},{"id":1004190609,"text":"Hahaha, you found out I've been sleeping since lunch, huh?∠How embarrassing..."},{"id":1004190610,"text":"What's this \"Sound Set\" that I saw in the rare finds∠section? I want to help fight too..."},{"id":1004190811,"text":"■"},{"id":1004190896,"text":"I thought it odd that Master Shu hasn't been coming around∠here lately, now I hear he's working as strategist for the∠♂② Army. Wow..."},{"id":1004190899,"text":"I heard the leader of the ♂② Army is a giant∠of a man..."},{"id":1004190902,"text":"Um, the order is...fried clams, grilled prawns, miso soup∠with mackerel, and rabbit stew..."},{"id":1004190904,"text":"Whew... I wonder what's going on with those two?"},{"id":1004190992,"text":"Well, at times like this all you can do is drink, I guess."},{"id":1004190995,"text":"At times like this, the least we can do is treat everyone..."},{"id":1004191000,"text":"Maybe if I drink enough, I can forget about the Highland∠Army..."},{"id":1004191001,"text":"When will that stew be ready? I just want a mouthful before∠I die..."},{"id":1004191002,"text":"The order is, um...fried clams, grilled rabbit, miso soup∠with prawns, and mackerel stew..."},{"id":1004191004,"text":"■"},{"id":1004191005,"text":"The boss says at times like this it's important to follow∠your normal routine. If only my body weren't such a wreck..."},{"id":1004191100,"text":"Without booze, life would be so boring."},{"id":1004191106,"text":"They say that the leader of the ♂② Army is∠the adopted son of the old hero, Genkaku."},{"id":1004191107,"text":"I've given it thought... We need another order of stew please!"},{"id":1004191306,"text":"They say that the leader of the ♂② Army is∠the child of the old hero, Genkaku."},{"id":1004191402,"text":"Um, the order is...fried rabbit, grilled clams, mackerel∠prawn miso soup stew..."},{"id":1004191406,"text":"Commander ♂㈱ of the ♂② Army∠must be right in the middle of battle right now."},{"id":1004191407,"text":"I'm praying for ♂② to come out victorious."},{"id":1004191408,"text":"Welcome. You're Commander ♂㈱ of the∠♂② Army, right?"},{"id":1004191493,"text":"Alrighty! We need another order of stew, please! I hear it's free today..."},{"id":1004191502,"text":"C'mon, order whatever you want! We're celebrating today!"},{"id":1004191506,"text":"I wonder what Commander ♂㈱ of the∠♂② Army is doing now. Is he celebrating?"},{"id":1004191507,"text":"Good luck to the ♂② Army...no, I mean∠the ♂② Republic..."},{"id":1004191508,"text":"Welcome. You're ♂㈱, leader of the ∠♂② Republic, right? Huh? Anyway, don't go∠up to the 2nd floor anymore!"},{"id":1004191594,"text":"Now then, what can I do for you?"},{"id":1004191595,"text":"Will there be anything else?"},{"id":1004191596,"text":"Which one would you like?"},{"id":1004191600,"text":"Who will equip it?"},{"id":1004191601,"text":"Which one are you selling?"},{"id":1004191603,"text":"We await your next visit."},{"id":1004191604,"text":"It's 50 potch a night per person, for a total of ♂③ potch."},{"id":1004191605,"text":"Goodnight, and pleasant dreams."},{"id":1004191607,"text":"Please visit us when you need a place to stay."},{"id":1004191608,"text":"Good morning. Have a wonderful day."},{"id":1004191609,"text":"Oh, you don't have enough money. But our prices aren't∠that high..."},{"id":1004191610,"text":"Welcome. What do you want to appraise?"},{"id":1004191611,"text":"Anything else you want me to appraise?"},{"id":1004191612,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1004191615,"text":"Please come see us again."},{"id":1005010001,"text":"Commander, I made it just in time.∨Sir Flik, these are enrollment papers for the Academy.∨They're three years out-of-date, so please tell the guards∠you were held up by the war."},{"id":1005010002,"text":"Uh, sure...∨Say, Fitcher, you seem to have a way with words... There are many in Greenhill∠that know my face."},{"id":1005010004,"text":"Then I guess we have to go through with it...
