I won't forget."},{"id":1005010011,"text":"Wha...? ♂⑤? Well, okay... But I would have∠liked Beth better."},{"id":1005010012,"text":"And next is..."},{"id":1005010013,"text":"All right, that's everyone, so let's get this over with."},{"id":1005010014,"text":"Oh no it's not! You need a name too, Flik."},{"id":1005010015,"text":"Bluto."},{"id":1005010016,"text":"Blue Lightning."},{"id":1005010017,"text":"Schtolteheim Reinbach III."},{"id":1005010018,"text":"Oh, that one's really great! Let's go with that!"},{"id":1005010019,"text":"Um, on second thought...∨I'm fine as is. Let's go, ♂㈱! I mean...∨Let's go, ♂④!"},{"id":1005010020,"text":"The commander has ordered that only those with official∠business may enter Greenhill at this time."},{"id":1005010021,"text":"Well, it just so happens we do have business here..."},{"id":1005010022,"text":"Let me see... Prospective students? Ahh, so they're here∠to enroll in the Academy?"},{"id":1005010023,"text":"Yeah, we got our papers like three years ago but, well, you∠know how it is with the war and all. We got slapped with the∠mother of all delays, at any rate.∨These kids came all the way from Kanakan in the countryside,∠too."},{"id":1005010024,"text":"Right, so then who are you? You don't look like a teacher...∠And I'm guessing you aren't these kids' father either."},{"id":1005010025,"text":"What, are you kidding? Their parents hired me as a bodyguard∠to see that they get here safely."},{"id":1005010026,"text":"Well, your papers seem to be in order. You may enter. But∠remember: stay out of trouble!"},{"id":1005010027,"text":"Now then, what to do until we get our instructions...∠Oh yeah, maybe we should get you enrolled, for starters.∨And hey, don't get distracted."},{"id":1005010028,"text":"Who's gonna get distracted?? We're not complete children,∠you know!"},{"id":1005010029,"text":"Yeah, yeah, let's get moving."},{"id":1005010030,"text":"Hey! Back off, pervert!"},{"id":1005010031,"text":"You've got some mouth on you. Is that any way speak to∠someone whose foot you just stamped on?!"},{"id":1005010032,"text":"Hmph! Well then don't look at me like that.∠You deserved it!"},{"id":1005010033,"text":"Pipe down, little girl, or I won't be responsible for what∠I do, even if you ARE just a kid!"},{"id":1005010034,"text":"Oh, and what's that supposed to mean? ∠What're you gonna do, huh?"},{"id":1005010035,"text":"Uh, um, well..."},{"id":1005010036,"text":"What's going on over there?"},{"id":1005010037,"text":"Let's help her."},{"id":1005010038,"text":"I didn't see anything."},{"id":1005010039,"text":"Hey, we need to keep a low profile here."},{"id":1005010040,"text":"That's the little brother I know! Never ignore a damsel in∠distress!"},{"id":1005010041,"text":"Whoa, don't egg him on! Hey, wait!"},{"id":1005010042,"text":"Huh? And who the hell are you?"},{"id":1005010043,"text":"No grown man is gonna harass a little girl while we're∠around!"},{"id":1005010044,"text":"Harass? Who're you kidding? She's the one who started this—"},{"id":1005010045,"text":"Have it your way. Teach him a lesson, ♂④."},{"id":1005010046,"text":"Agh, why won't anyone listen?! I've had enough of this! So∠now what, you're gonna fight me, kid? What'd you say your∠name was? ♂④?"},{"id":1005010047,"text":"Stop right there. Picking on children like this is pathetic."},{"id":1005010048,"text":"What?! Are you mocking a Highland soldier? I hope you're∠prepared for what's coming to you!"},{"id":1005010049,"text":"You hope I'm prepared?∨You're the one who needs to be prepared, friend. Are you∠really ready to lose your head over this?"},{"id":1005010050,"text":"Ulp...∨Hmph, fine. It was a bit ungracious of me. I'll let you∠off the hook just this once."},{"id":1005010051,"text":"Smart move.∨All right, let's go, ♂㈱... I mean...∠♂④, ♂⑤."},{"id":1005010052,"text":"Huh?∨Oh..."},{"id":1005010053,"text":"What?! No way! C'mon, ♂㈱, you're not gonna∠help? What type of man are you?"},{"id":1005010054,"text":"If we get caught here, it's all over. Leave it be, Nanami,∠we need to go."},{"id":1005010055,"text":"Wait, you can't just run off!"},{"id":1005010056,"text":"Like I care! My big brother here'll mop the street with you!"},{"id":1005010057,"text":"H-Hey, hold on, who's your—"},{"id":1005010058,"text":"Oh, so now it's you I gotta fight?"},{"id":1005010059,"text":"You little..."},{"id":1005010060,"text":"Yeah! And he's gonna slice you to pieces!"},{"id":1005010061,"text":"Hah! Nice bluff. I'd like to see him try with that lame,∠dull-as-a-letter-opener blade he has there."},{"id":1005010062,"text":"Grr!∨Hey, you wanna see if this blade really is dull or not?"},{"id":1005010063,"text":"Huh? I-I..."},{"id":1005010064,"text":"I'd be happy to test its edge on your neck."},{"id":1005010065,"text":"............∨Hmph.∨This is stupid! I've got no more time for this nonsense.∠Consider yourselves lucky today."},{"id":1005010066,"text":"Much appreciated."},{"id":1005010067,"text":"Come on, let's go, ♂㈱...I mean,∠♂④, ♂⑤."},{"id":1005010068,"text":"Looks like mister \"we gotta keep a low profile\" ended up∠taking center stage in the end, huh?"},{"id":1005010069,"text":"Shut up! Now come on and get moving!"},{"id":1005010071,"text":"Uh, ♂㈱... We're meant to be choosing fake∠names here."},{"id":1005010072,"text":"No, ♂㈱! You can't use my real name! Think of∠something else."},{"id":1005010073,"text":"Please choose names for the remaining party members."},{"id":1005010074,"text":"Oh my, new enrollees, at this time of year? How unusual.∠Now let me see..."},{"id":1005010075,"text":"They were held up a bit by the war."},{"id":1005010077,"text":"Well, it does seem your papers are in order.∨Welcome to New Leaf Academy. We are very happy to have∠you.∨Allow me to give you a tour of the campus. By the way..."},{"id":1005010078,"text":"Y-Yes?"},{"id":1005010079,"text":"These children...are they yours?"},{"id":1005010080,"text":"C'mon, get serious. I'm their escort, that's all!"},{"id":1005010081,"text":"I see... Of course. Now then, all students live in the∠dormitories at the west end of the campus.∨The first two weeks of schooling are orientation, during∠which time your attendant may stay at the lodging house east∠of here."},{"id":1005010082,"text":"Remember, students that prove to be problematic during∠orientation will be expelled, so be on your best behavior."},{"id":1005010083,"text":"I understand."},{"id":1005010084,"text":"Yes, ma'am!"},{"id":1005010085,"text":"Uh..."},{"id":1005010086,"text":"My, what fine replies. Well, let's begin the tour. Now if∠you'll just follow me..."},{"id":1005010087,"text":"Where's your self-confidence, children? There's no need to∠be so nervous.∨Please come along now and we'll get you acquainted."},{"id":1005010088,"text":"I-I guess we're a little nervous... This being our∠first time at a school and all."},{"id":1005010089,"text":"C'mon, hurry up or we'll be left behind."},{"id":1005010090,"text":"Down here we have the blacksmith, rune sage, and appraisal∠classrooms. You'll find trainees in each, so be sure to talk∠with them and hear what they have to say.∨Up on the second floor are the study halls. During∠orientation you will have free run of the campus as you∠decide upon what you wish to study."},{"id":1005010091,"text":"Do you understand?"},{"id":1005010092,"text":"Yes, ma'am."},{"id":1005010093,"text":"Yes, ma'am!"},{"id":1005010094,"text":"Yeah."},{"id":1005010095,"text":"Oh, Sir Shin."},{"id":1005010096,"text":"Hm?"},{"id":1005010097,"text":"These are some new students, and their escort."},{"id":1005010098,"text":"I see...∨If you will excuse me."},{"id":1005010099,"text":"Who's he?"},{"id":1005010100,"text":"He is the attendant of Lady Teresa, our acting mayor, but∠she's been missing since the recent fighting..."},{"id":1005010101,"text":"Missing, huh..."},{"id":1005010102,"text":"It's getting fairly late, so I suggest you get some rest∠after you've explored the school a bit. I'll send word to∠the dormitory of your arrival.∨Well then, everyone, I must be going. I trust you will all∠become fine students at our Academy!"},{"id":1005010103,"text":"All right, let's look around. We might be able to find some∠clues as to Teresa's whereabouts."},{"id":1005010104,"text":"Get ready... Omigosh he was sooo cool! It's as if he was,∠like, fighting just for me!∨You heard that right, fighting...just for me!∨Oh, I wish you could have been there!"},{"id":1005010105,"text":"Sounds to me like maybe you're getting the wrong impression∠again..."},{"id":1005010106,"text":"Don't be silly. If you could've seen the way he smiled at me∠with those sweet, gentle eyes, you would've... Ack!!!"},{"id":1005010107,"text":"J-Jeez... Don't yell like that!"},{"id":1005010108,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1005010109,"text":"Omigosh! It's him! This must be destiny!∨*sigh*∠It's like a dream, meeting you again... But why∠are you here?∨Ah! Did...did you come to see me?"},{"id":1005010110,"text":"Uh, who are you?"},{"id":1005010111,"text":"Oh, forgive me. My name is Nina.∨Um, and...and may I have my lord's name?"},{"id":1005010112,"text":"Wh-Whoa, now wait a—"},{"id":1005010113,"text":"See? See? This is him! I told you he was handsome, didn't I?"},{"id":1005010114,"text":"Uh, I guess..."},{"id":1005010115,"text":"Hey, c'mon, Flik, we gotta go."},{"id":1005010116,"text":"My lord is called Flik? What a wonderful name! If I may be∠so bold as to ask, whatever is my lord doing here?∨Y-You couldn't...really be here to see me?"},{"id":1005010117,"text":"Uh... We're just here to see the school..."},{"id":1005010118,"text":"Then please, let me be your guide! I know this school like∠the back of my hand. Shall we be off, then, Sir Flik?"},{"id":1005010119,"text":"W-Wait a second..."},{"id":1005010120,"text":"What...was that?"},{"id":1005010121,"text":"...Whew."},{"id":1005010122,"text":"What's the matter, Pilika?∨Hmm, she looks tired. Let's go to the dorms and rest,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1005010123,"text":"You must be the new students. Your rooms have been∠prepared.∨The boys' room is on the edge of the south wing on the 2nd∠floor, and the girls' room is right next to that. Don't mix∠them up."},{"id":1005010124,"text":"Ooh, ooh, let's go check them out!"},{"id":1005010125,"text":"Listen up, children. There is to be no horseplay in the∠dorms. Furthermore, while we have cleaned your rooms∠today, from now on you will be expected to tidy up after∠yourselves.∨Well then, we will notify you once it's time for supper, so∠get some rest until then."},{"id":1005010126,"text":"Yes, ma'am! Okay, let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010127,"text":"I guess these are our rooms. Do you want to rest?"},{"id":1005010128,"text":"Let's walk around a while."},{"id":1005010129,"text":"Yeah, I'm tired."},{"id":1005010130,"text":"Yeah, okay. Let's see if we can't find out where Teresa is."},{"id":1005010131,"text":"Good call. We'll relax until it's time to eat.∨Let's go, Pilika. We're in the room next door."},{"id":1005010132,"text":"Whew, that was delicious! If this is what cafeteria food∠tastes like, I might just have to become a real student∠here..."},{"id":1005010133,"text":"Oh, it's you guys. I see, so you've become students here.∠Sir Flik said that he was your escort?"},{"id":1005010134,"text":"Hey, you're the..."},{"id":1005010135,"text":"Wh-What?"},{"id":1005010136,"text":"Yep, no problem. We're okay. So...your name was Nanami,∠right?"},{"id":1005010137,"text":"We're okay?"},{"id":1005010138,"text":"Yes, because I'm clearly much prettier than you. I don't∠need to worry about you stealing Sir Flik away from me."},{"id":1005010140,"text":"I'm sure we'll be good friends, Nanami.∨Huh? Why are you looking at me like that?"},{"id":1005010141,"text":"Goood mooorning, ♂㈱! Get up!"},{"id":1005010142,"text":"C'mon, look alive!"},{"id":1005010143,"text":"*yawn*"},{"id":1005010144,"text":"Looks like Pilika's caught your sleepyhead syndrome,∠♂㈱. Come on, let's get the day started."},{"id":1005010145,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. Did you sleep well? Anyway, I don't∠have much time, so I'll keep this short.∨There's something going on with that Shin guy. I think he∠knows where Teresa is.∨I'll do some checking around on my end too, but you guys∠should track him down and see what you can get out of him.∨He may let his guard down since you're just kids.∠And another thing: don't be conspicuous! The Academy seems∠safe enough, but the city is crawling with Highland troops∠lording over the place.∨Well, see ya!"},{"id":1005010146,"text":"What's got him in such a rush?"},{"id":1005010147,"text":"*pant* *pant* *pant*∠That's weird, I swear I just saw him...∨Hey, Nanami! Have you seen Sir Flik?"},{"id":1005010148,"text":"Huh? Who, me? Yeah, Flik went that way..."},{"id":1005010149,"text":"Really? You wouldn't be lying to lead me away from my∠beloved Sir Flik, would you?∨Whatever. This way, then. And here I made him this∠delicious boxed lunch..."},{"id":1005010150,"text":"............∨Uh, yeah... Let's just go look for Shin, okay?"},{"id":1005010151,"text":"Good morning. Did you sleep well?∨By the way...will you be going into town? Please be careful∠if you do. There have been an awful lot of Highland soldiers∠wandering about since this morning.∨The Academy seems to be safe... It's been cleared by∠the commander from Highland.∨Why a person that employs such brutal tactics would leave∠the Academy alone is beyond me."},{"id":1005010152,"text":"P-Please, stop this... We've done nothing..."},{"id":1005010153,"text":"Quiet! We received information that Teresa's holed up in∠this building!"},{"id":1005010154,"text":"Th-That's...a lie! Who would say such a thing?"},{"id":1005010155,"text":"Hahahahaha! Our informant was a former soldier from∠Muse.∨To think he'd sell out an ally for a few coins. You people∠are pathetic!"},{"id":1005010156,"text":"*sob*∠In that...battle..."},{"id":1005010157,"text":"Waaah!!!"},{"id":1005010158,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1005010160,"text":"We've got to keep our heads down..."},{"id":1005010161,"text":"W-Wait, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1005010162,"text":"Yeah... Ah!"},{"id":1005010163,"text":"Are you going to stand there in a daze all day?! Keep∠giving us trouble and I'll happily burn this place to the∠ground!"},{"id":1005010164,"text":"No... Please..."},{"id":1005010165,"text":"Captain, what reason do you have to treat them like this?"},{"id":1005010166,"text":"Reason? Isn't it obvious? You aren't telling me where∠Teresa is hidden.∨You're bringing this on yourselves."},{"id":1005010167,"text":"When we surrendered, the Lord Commander of the Highland∠Army promised there would be no more violence."},{"id":1005010168,"text":"Yes, and if he hadn't made such a promise, we'd be torturing∠each and every one of you until you talked.∨I would still consider this peaceable if I were you."},{"id":1005010169,"text":"Damn..."},{"id":1005010170,"text":"All right, this bunch has turned out to be less∠than useless. Go and find the wench, quickly now.∨But let's not go setting any fires... Otherwise the∠\"Lord Commander\" might have some choice words for me."},{"id":1005010171,"text":"Forgive me, though I know my apologies mean little and less."},{"id":1005010172,"text":"It's all right. As long as Lady Teresa survives..."},{"id":1005010173,"text":"Would you listen to yourself?! It's that kind of talk that∠got people reporting on us! If it weren't for that∠incompetent mayor—"},{"id":1005010174,"text":"Would you stop? I'm sorry, please pay her no mind. W-Well,∠goodbye..."},{"id":1005010176,"text":"Ack, oh no! There he goes! We've got to follow him."},{"id":1005010177,"text":"That's weird... Where could he have gone?∨And that battle everyone's talking about... What do you∠think happened?"},{"id":1005010179,"text":"What should we do, ♂㈱? Looks like Pilika's∠getting tired. Wanna head back to the dorms?"},{"id":1005010180,"text":"Looks like we came up empty-handed. Wanna just rest until∠supper?"},{"id":1005010181,"text":"Let's keep looking a bit longer."},{"id":1005010182,"text":"Time for a snooze."},{"id":1005010183,"text":"Okay, we'll look around the school for Shin a little∠longer, then."},{"id":1005010184,"text":"See you in a little while, then, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010185,"text":"The food was great today too, huh? I had plenty of∠second helpings... I couldn't resist!∨You should eat more, ♂㈱. You're a growing boy."},{"id":1005010186,"text":"Oh, perfect timing. Hey, Nanami, can I ask you something?"},{"id":1005010187,"text":"Wh-What is it?"},{"id":1005010188,"text":"Um, do you know what Sir Flik likes to eat? I want to make∠him a really fantastic dinner."},{"id":1005010189,"text":"I-I'm not really sure, but... Um, maybe first start by∠getting some really healthy herbs?∨Then, I guess just put your heart into it. Even if you mess∠up, it's the thought that counts..."},{"id":1005010190,"text":"Hmm, that's not a bad idea. Thanks, Nanami. Ta-ta for now!"},{"id":1005010191,"text":"Oh, Nanami, I almost forgot... Don't make too much noise at∠night.∨If you start a pillow fight or something, you might catch∠the attention of the wandering ghost."},{"id":1005010192,"text":"W-Wandering ghost?!∨Th-There's a ghost here?"},{"id":1005010194,"text":"N-N-No w-w-way. Th-There's n-n-no s-s-such th-th-thing∠as g-g-ghosts...∨R-r-right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1005010195,"text":"Of course not."},{"id":1005010196,"text":"At the stroke of midnight..."},{"id":1005010197,"text":"R-R-Right! Of course th-there's no s-such thing.∨Come on, Pilika.∨Y-Y-You don't have to be s-s-scared. Big sis Nanami will∠let you s-s-sleep in her b-b-bed..."},{"id":1005010198,"text":"S-S-Stop it!! I-I-I'm not afraid of g-g-ghosts that∠d-d-don't even exist!!∨Come on, Pilika. Y-You don't have to b-b-be scared. Big sis∠Nanami will l-l-let you sleep in her b-b-bed."},{"id":1005010199,"text":"G-Good morning...∨♂㈱, did you sleep okay??"},{"id":1005010200,"text":"I bet you were too scared of the ghost to sleep, huh?"},{"id":1005010201,"text":"Wh-What? I was just having a bad dream!"},{"id":1005010202,"text":"Is that true, Pilika?"},{"id":1005010203,"text":"...You heard her."},{"id":1005010204,"text":"Grr..."},{"id":1005010205,"text":"I don't see Flik. Where could he be?"},{"id":1005010207,"text":"Uh, where is Flik?"},{"id":1005010208,"text":"It's nothing big, but..."},{"id":1005010209,"text":"I was looking for you..."},{"id":1005010210,"text":"Just a second! There's something I have to ask you first."},{"id":1005010211,"text":"I was actually looking for you too, so nice timing.∨Anyway, you go first."},{"id":1005010212,"text":"Oh, um, okay. Hey, so, um, Nina... Well, is it true?"},{"id":1005010213,"text":"Is what true?"},{"id":1005010214,"text":"Oh, do you mean...the wandering ghost?"},{"id":1005010215,"text":"Uh...y-yeah."},{"id":1005010216,"text":"Ahahahahahaha!∨No! You didn't really believe that old rumor, did you?"},{"id":1005010217,"text":"It's...not true?"},{"id":1005010218,"text":"Of course not.∨Oh, but a lot of kids have been seeing weird shadows and∠stuff at night lately... Maybe there's some truth to it∠after all."},{"id":1005010219,"text":"N-No way..."},{"id":1005010220,"text":"But more importantly... Nanami! How could you?! I thought∠you were my friend!"},{"id":1005010221,"text":"Huh? Wh-What?"},{"id":1005010222,"text":"Don't play dumb with me.∨I was hanging around Sir Flik's place yesterday, and...∠I overheard that he has someone he loves.∠Someone who's \"always with him.\""},{"id":1005010223,"text":"Wh-What do you mean? D-Don't tell me..."},{"id":1005010224,"text":"I won't give up! It's me versus you, Nanami!!!"},{"id":1005010225,"text":"Wha? Why? Really? I never thought—"},{"id":1005010226,"text":"Isn't this all just a misunderstanding?"},{"id":1005010228,"text":"Huh? So you think so?∨Aha! Is she...jealous?"},{"id":1005010229,"text":"How long are we gonna hang around here? We should be∠looking for Flik."},{"id":1005010230,"text":"Yo, sorry about that. Getting here without Nina spotting me∠took longer than expected.∨Huh? Is something the matter?"},{"id":1005010231,"text":"U-mm, Nina's..."},{"id":1005010232,"text":"............∨Oh, man... Why me? Don't worry, though, Nanami. I'm not∠interested in children."},{"id":1005010233,"text":"Thank goodness...∨Wait a second, \"children\"?"},{"id":1005010234,"text":"All right, let's head for town. I got instructions∠yesterday. We're to meet up with Fitcher."},{"id":1005010236,"text":"You! You're the one who ratted us out, I just know it!"},{"id":1005010237,"text":"Yeah, look at you slinking around all suspicious-like!"},{"id":1005010238,"text":"N-No! I'm no traitor..."},{"id":1005010239,"text":"You can't fool us. Your Muse accent is a dead giveaway!∠You're with those other bastards from Muse!"},{"id":1005010240,"text":"P-Please, stop! I had nothing to do with any of that!"},{"id":1005010241,"text":"Ulp, um, what should we do?"},{"id":1005010242,"text":"♂㈱, you guys wait here. I'll handle this."},{"id":1005010243,"text":"Hey, what's the fuss? Did this guy do something?"},{"id":1005010244,"text":"Hmph, never seen you around before. Get out of here,∠stranger."},{"id":1005010245,"text":"Well, yeah, I am a stranger here, so I don't know the whole∠situation, but...aren't Greenhill and Muse fighting on the∠same side?"},{"id":1005010246,"text":"Pssh, you don't know anything. If it weren't for those∠weasels from Muse, none of this would have happened.∨They stabbed us in the back, betrayed us to the enemy!∠And now we've got one of those bastards right here."},{"id":1005010247,"text":"Ah! Fl...I mean...kind traveler, please help me..."},{"id":1005010248,"text":"Hmm, a traitor, eh? Selling out one's allies certainly isn't∠the type of thing you let go unpunished."},{"id":1005010249,"text":"Yeah, exactly! Looks like ya understand after all."},{"id":1005010250,"text":"Oh no... Why me?"},{"id":1005010251,"text":"Hmm, for a crime so grave, a lynching would be letting him∠off too easy, so how about we just hack off his head?∨Here, I'll lend you my sword."},{"id":1005010252,"text":"Wha? I, uh..."},{"id":1005010253,"text":"C'mon, don't hold back. I thought you hated him. ∠Am I wrong?"},{"id":1005010254,"text":"Y-Yeah, but..."},{"id":1005010255,"text":"Then what about you?"},{"id":1005010256,"text":"I...I... No, I'm fine..."},{"id":1005010257,"text":"Hah, where's your backbone? Guess I'll just have to do it."},{"id":1005010258,"text":"Aiyee!!!"},{"id":1005010259,"text":"That was a nice performance."},{"id":1005010260,"text":"Ha! Their faces turned blue!"},{"id":1005010261,"text":"Hey, Fitcher, how long do you plan on staying like that?"},{"id":1005010262,"text":"Eep... P-Please, spare me...∨Huh? What's this?∨I...I'm alive?"},{"id":1005010263,"text":"I see... So you've found no trace of Teresa."},{"id":1005010264,"text":"No, but I'm almost certain she's hiding somewhere nearby."},{"id":1005010265,"text":"Well, ♂㈱, looks like it's back to gathering∠information at the Academy for us.∨Fitcher, you see what you can find out, too...∠But be more careful this time."},{"id":1005010267,"text":"*sigh*∠So looks like we've got no leads, huh."},{"id":1005010269,"text":"Ahh!!! Nanami, you're horrible! Are you standing between∠me and Sir Flik again?!"},{"id":1005010270,"text":"Uh, what?"},{"id":1005010271,"text":"I'll let you handle this, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010272,"text":"Nooo, wait, Sir Flik! Why do you run from true love?∠You needn't be so shy!"},{"id":1005010274,"text":"Whew...∨That really wore me out. Maybe it's best if we head back to∠our rooms, huh, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1005010275,"text":"It became clear that Highland was coming for Greenhill, and∠the entire city found itself pressed to prepare for battle."},{"id":1005010276,"text":"All of the soldiers from Muse taken captive by Highland were∠set free, and came to Greenhill.∨At first, everyone rejoiced, without knowing the true∠meaning of the soldiers' arrival..."},{"id":1005010277,"text":"Highland had returned the weapons and armor they∠confiscated from the Muse soldiers.∨While some were suspicious, most of the citizens assumed∠the Highland general wanted a fair fight.∨More than anything, the addition of the troops from Muse∠more than doubled our military might, and this was an∠invaluable boost of morale for our dejected citizens."},{"id":1005010278,"text":"Before long, the Highland Army appeared, and we all∠prepared for battle. However..."},{"id":1005010279,"text":"Once the Highland Army surrounded Greenhill,∠they made no move to attack."},{"id":1005010280,"text":"The soldiers from Muse may have doubled our forces,∠but quickly depleted our already meager food supply."},{"id":1005010281,"text":"Soon enough, the soldiers and the citizens were at odds∠over the dwindling provisions.∨The Greenhill citizens thought the food was for the entire∠city, but the Muse soldiers believed it was for those∠doing the fighting."},{"id":1005010282,"text":"And so..."},{"id":1005010283,"text":"The Muse soldiers rebelled and took the food storage by∠force, throwing the city into chaos.∨It seems obvious now that Highland must have given∠the Muse soldiers back their weapons for just this purpose."},{"id":1005010284,"text":"And then we...∨We...lost to the Highland Army∠without ever having even fought them."},{"id":1005010285,"text":"...And that is the whole of it. Former comrades-in-arms,∠killing each other over a few scraps of food.∨All that remained in us was distrust for each other.∨And I, as acting mayor of Greenhill, could not prevent∠any of it..."},{"id":1005010286,"text":"Forgive me...∨I can't help you, ♂㈱.∨Please, please...just go."},{"id":1005010287,"text":"Excuse me, but we need you to leave Greenhill as soon as∠possible.∨And...I'm not saying I distrust you, but if the Highland∠Army discovers Lady Teresa's whereabouts, I will cut you∠down."},{"id":1005010288,"text":"Quit it with the threats.∨Your name's Shin, right? What's your plan?∠You can't hide here forever."},{"id":1005010289,"text":"We must remain here for the time being. Then, once my lady∠has steeled herself..."},{"id":1005010290,"text":"Gosh, looks like all our work finding Teresa was for∠nothing."},{"id":1005010291,"text":"Yeah. A complete waste of time. ♂㈱, let's∠leave Greenhill tomorrow."},{"id":1005010292,"text":"Yeah, the Highland Army could find us at any time."},{"id":1005010293,"text":"So our time pretending to be students ends tomorrow, huh?"},{"id":1005010294,"text":"Whoa, this doesn't look good. Let's go check it out."},{"id":1005010295,"text":"Are you going to call it a day?"},{"id":1005010297,"text":"Good morning. You haven't selected any classes yet, so∠please spend the day touring the campus."},{"id":1005010298,"text":"You actually can't choose classes yet, you know."},{"id":1005010299,"text":"So, are you done sitting in on classes and looking around?"},{"id":1005010300,"text":"Ah, and have you spoken with the other students?"},{"id":1005010301,"text":"Oh, are you new students? This isn't where you enroll. For∠that, you'll need to go to the receptionist in the building∠at the center of campus."},{"id":1005010302,"text":"SE footsteps"},{"id":1005010303,"text":"Eep... P-Please, spare me....♂▼0∨Huh? What's this?♂▼1∨I...♂▼2I'm alive?♂▼3"},{"id":1005010304,"text":"Morning, ♂㈱. So today we say bye to this∠school, huh. It was fun...kind of. And the food was∠delicious."},{"id":1005010305,"text":"Oh well. If we keep hanging∠around here we'll get caught."},{"id":1005010307,"text":"Make sure you didn't forget anything. We won't be back∠here anytime soon, you know."},{"id":1005010308,"text":"I'm ready."},{"id":1005010309,"text":"Wait a minute."},{"id":1005010310,"text":"Well, hurry up with whatever it is you have to do."},{"id":1005010311,"text":"Did you have to go buy a souvenir or something? It's time we∠get on the road, huh?"},{"id":1005010312,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1005010313,"text":"Wait just a little longer."},{"id":1005010314,"text":"Um, are you sure you don't want to say bye to that girl∠Nina? She really seemed to like you."},{"id":1005010315,"text":"Hah, that's real funny. But...now that you mention it, I∠haven't seen her since this morning.∨Not like it's any of my business, though. C'mon, let's get∠moving."},{"id":1005010316,"text":"Wait, what's this?"},{"id":1005010317,"text":"What the..."},{"id":1005010318,"text":"All right, listen up! This is an official proclamation from∠Luca Blight, Prince of Highland!∨20,000 potch and the right of Highland citizenship will be∠awarded to whomever captures Teresa, former acting mayor∠of Greenhill!"},{"id":1005010319,"text":"Liar!"},{"id":1005010320,"text":"That's right! How can we trust a nation that's already∠broken their promises?!"},{"id":1005010321,"text":"Yeah! Yeah!"},{"id":1005010322,"text":"A cash reward and immunity... It's only a matter of time∠before someone comes forward."},{"id":1005010323,"text":"What is it, Pilika?"},{"id":1005010324,"text":"...N-No! It can't be!"},{"id":1005010325,"text":"Such insolence! You're saying you can't trust me?"},{"id":1005010326,"text":"Citizens of Greenhill, please listen to what I have to say.∨The parties responsible for yesterday's illegal∠interrogations have been brought forth, and are already∠being punished."},{"id":1005010327,"text":"Grr..."},{"id":1005010328,"text":"This is a formal offer from Prince Luca Blight of Highland.∠I swear on my own life that our promises will be kept."},{"id":1005010329,"text":"Really?"},{"id":1005010330,"text":"There is, however, one condition. Teresa must be delivered∠alive. No reward will be given for a corpse."},{"id":1005010331,"text":"2-20,000 potch..."},{"id":1005010332,"text":"Wh-Why? Why?! What is Jowy doing here?"},{"id":1005010333,"text":"Ah! Pilika!"},{"id":1005010334,"text":"Hey! Wait!!!∨This is why I can't stand kids!"},{"id":1005010335,"text":"We have to go get her!"},{"id":1005010336,"text":"We can't be found out!"},{"id":1005010337,"text":"Okay, let's go!"},{"id":1005010338,"text":"What the? Who's this little girl?"},{"id":1005010339,"text":"Hm? It's you!"},{"id":1005010340,"text":"Y-You..."},{"id":1005010341,"text":"Jowy... Why..."},{"id":1005010344,"text":"H-Hey! Get them! They're—"},{"id":1005010345,"text":"Hey, you people! Capture them! Spies! They're all spies!∠There will be rewards if you catch them!"},{"id":1005010346,"text":"But—"},{"id":1005010349,"text":"Ah! Ah! Ah!!!"},{"id":1005010350,"text":"Wh-Why? Why are you here?"},{"id":1005010352,"text":"H-Hey! Get them! They're—"},{"id":1005010354,"text":"D-Dammit! Get them, now! Out of the way, you fools!"},{"id":1005010355,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1005010356,"text":"That's the leader of the ♂② Army, isn't it?∠The one that defeated Kiba at Two River."},{"id":1005010357,"text":"Shouldn't we be going after them, Commander?"},{"id":1005010358,"text":"Rowd will take care of it. We'll leave it to him."},{"id":1005010360,"text":"Teresa though... Not even what you said earlier will∠save her life."},{"id":1005010361,"text":"...No, I suppose not."},{"id":1005010362,"text":"Over there!"},{"id":1005010363,"text":"Damn!"},{"id":1005010364,"text":"This is bad. There's bound to be tons of Highland soldiers∠at the gate."},{"id":1005010365,"text":"What about the secret path by Teresa's shack?"},{"id":1005010366,"text":"Good thinking. In light of this development, we've got to∠take Teresa with us, even if it means forcing her to go. As∠if we would ever believe a promise from the Highland Army!"},{"id":1005010367,"text":"Looks like we managed to lose them."},{"id":1005010368,"text":"What's the matter, Nanami?"},{"id":1005010369,"text":"Wh-Why? Why would Jowy..."},{"id":1005010370,"text":"The \"clever individual\" that commander Fitcher mentioned...∠It must've been Jowy.∨I just can't believe it, though. Jowy, an officer in the∠Highland Army?"},{"id":1005010372,"text":"...So come on! You've got to run and—"},{"id":1005010373,"text":"Oh, Sir Flik, what are you doing here? Hey, does this mean∠you've been following me?"},{"id":1005010374,"text":"Wait, how did you know of this place?!"},{"id":1005010375,"text":"Nina has been helping us. Whenever we needed supplies,∠she would be the one to get them for us.∠I am afraid I stand out too much."},{"id":1005010376,"text":"So, Sir Flik, what brings you here?"},{"id":1005010377,"text":"We came to get Lady Teresa and make our escape.∠The situation has changed. I hate to say this, but if you∠refuse this time, we're going to have to use force..."},{"id":1005010378,"text":"Nina has already informed me of what is happening."},{"id":1005010379,"text":"So then let's just get out of here! If we stay here∠we'll be found in no time."},{"id":1005010380,"text":"No... I will not run. I will not be the cause of more∠suffering for my people.∨Once they have captured me, Highland's oppression of∠Greenhill will end. That is all I can do for my city now."},{"id":1005010381,"text":"B-But... Wait a minute..."},{"id":1005010382,"text":"Now, ♂㈱, if you will excuse me. I am...sorry∠I could not be of any help to you."},{"id":1005010383,"text":"Wait! Do you really think we can let you do that? I'm sorry,∠but—"},{"id":1005010384,"text":"If you interfere, I will take my own life."},{"id":1005010385,"text":"Dammit..."},{"id":1005010386,"text":"My lady, I shall accompany you."},{"id":1005010387,"text":"Then... Please bear witness to my final moments."},{"id":1005010389,"text":"Why is she so intent on dying? Without life there's nothing!"},{"id":1005010390,"text":"No... I won't let her die!!!∠Lady Teresa, she...she did so much, fought so hard for us!∨We all knew the food storages were low! And yet, even then...∠she didn't abandon the soldiers from Muse!∨I can't stand by and watch someone with such a kind heart∠die!!!"},{"id":1005010391,"text":"Hey!"},{"id":1005010392,"text":"There...there may be something we can do. Let's hurry,∠♂㈱!"},{"id":1005010393,"text":"So, finally decided to turn yourself in, eh? How good of you∠to do so of your own accord. And so polite too. Hahahaha!"},{"id":1005010395,"text":"All right, seize them!"},{"id":1005010396,"text":"What's this? You mean to interfere?"},{"id":1005010397,"text":"You will never lay your filthy hands on Lady Teresa."},{"id":1005010398,"text":"Shin, what do you think you're doing? Please, stop. After∠all...∨The House of Wisemail is no more, so I am no longer acting∠mayor. You have no reason to do this."},{"id":1005010400,"text":"I don't know what's going on and I don't care if they∠resist. Take them by force!"},{"id":1005010401,"text":"We gotta do something, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1005010402,"text":"Let's go help!"},{"id":1005010403,"text":"But..."},{"id":1005010404,"text":"Heh, what a coward."},{"id":1005010405,"text":"What are you saying, ♂㈱?! I joined the∠♂② Army because I looked up to you!"},{"id":1005010406,"text":"C'mon, do something. This isn't like you, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010407,"text":"Yeah!"},{"id":1005010408,"text":"Aha, so the fools return! Perfect timing! Take them all!!!"},{"id":1005010409,"text":"No... Please, stop fighting."},{"id":1005010410,"text":"Are you crazy?!"},{"id":1005010411,"text":"I beg of you... I...I don't want to be responsible for any∠more trouble."},{"id":1005010412,"text":"What're you talking about?! Trouble? Trouble for who?!"},{"id":1005010413,"text":"Wh-What the?! You..."},{"id":1005010414,"text":"Get out of my way!"},{"id":1005010415,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1005010416,"text":"Nina..."},{"id":1005010417,"text":"No! You can't let them take you!"},{"id":1005010418,"text":"But once they have me, everyone will be—"},{"id":1005010419,"text":"You think that'll make us happy?! Lady Teresa, please∠believe in us the same way we believed in you, fought for∠you...∨We...We all suffered from that battle, because we lost,∠because we led Greenhill to defeat with our own hands!∨And now, if we let you hand yourself over to the∠Highland Army, the citizens of Greenhill will suffer again!∨Even if we lose this battle, this city... There is something∠more important that we must not lose!!!∨Please, Lady Teresa, don't make us lose that too..."},{"id":1005010420,"text":"Everyone, protect Lady Teresa!!!"},{"id":1005010421,"text":"Protect our mayor!!!"},{"id":1005010422,"text":"You all really..."},{"id":1005010423,"text":"Yeah! The people of Greenhill took us in... Let's return∠the favor! Don't sully the name of Muse any further!"},{"id":1005010424,"text":"D-Damn you..."},{"id":1005010425,"text":"Lady Teresa, you are the one and only mayor of Greenhill.∠Please, get yourself to safety!"},{"id":1005010426,"text":"Yes... And someday, please come back to retake this city!!!"},{"id":1005010427,"text":"............∨Thank you... I-I'm not worthy of all this..."},{"id":1005010428,"text":"What are you talking about? We believe in you! Never∠forget that!"},{"id":1005010429,"text":"I understand. And...you have my word.∨I will take back Greenhill for you. I will walk its streets∠again. I will feel this breeze upon my skin again...and∠my lips will once again call this town's name!∨So please wait for me. I will return!"},{"id":1005010430,"text":"Of course!"},{"id":1005010431,"text":"Yeah! Come back and chase the Highland Army out!"},{"id":1005010432,"text":"Here comes their main force! Run!!!"},{"id":1005010433,"text":"Okay, everyone, let's buy them some time!"},{"id":1005010434,"text":"Citizens of Greenhill!∨I promise... I promise I will return!!!"},{"id":1005010435,"text":"What is it, Pilika?♂▼0∨...N-No! That's a lie... It has to be!"},{"id":1005010436,"text":"They're probably creating some sort of diversion, but it∠won't last long... Hurry, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1005010437,"text":"Please..."},{"id":1005010438,"text":"I'll go ahead and clear the way."},{"id":1005010439,"text":"Shin!"},{"id":1005010440,"text":"Godspeed, my lady."},{"id":1005010441,"text":"Come now, are you in that much of a hurry?"},{"id":1005010442,"text":"Hmph! They were able to slow us down without even any∠proper weapons. But I'm afraid this is as far as you go.∠You can't escape."},{"id":1005010443,"text":"Hey! No fair! You're awful!"},{"id":1005010444,"text":"What are you talking about? Do you know how much trouble∠you've caused me? This time I'm sending you to the∠gallows."},{"id":1005010445,"text":"Shin!!!"},{"id":1005010446,"text":"Fear not, I will not let them pass, my lady."},{"id":1005010447,"text":"I will not allow this! If you die..."},{"id":1005010448,"text":"My loyalty lies not with the mayor of Greenhill, nor with the∠House of Wisemail...∨...but with you, Lady Teresa."},{"id":1005010449,"text":"Don't start with this now...?!"},{"id":1005010450,"text":"I'll take care of her. I swear on the name of my blade that∠I'll keep her safe!"},{"id":1005010451,"text":"Thank you..."},{"id":1005010452,"text":"Let's go, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1005010453,"text":"H-Hey! They're getting away! After them, now!!!"},{"id":1005010454,"text":"I cannot let you do that. By my blade, Tarantula, and the∠skills ingrained within me...you shall not pass!"},{"id":1005010455,"text":"*pant* *pant*∠Looks like we got away..."},{"id":1005010457,"text":"Pilika!"},{"id":1005010458,"text":"Jowy..."},{"id":1005010459,"text":"♂㈱... Nanami..."},{"id":1005010460,"text":"Jowy, why?"},{"id":1005010463,"text":"What do you mean?"},{"id":1005010464,"text":"The victor in this war is already decided. Anything you do∠now is in vain. You will only be prolonging the suffering."},{"id":1005010465,"text":"Shut your mouth! Are you saying we should just bow down to∠Luca Blight?!"},{"id":1005010466,"text":"I will not allow Luca to have his way with Highland or the∠City-States."},{"id":1005010467,"text":"Th-Then—"},{"id":1005010468,"text":"You don't need to fight, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010469,"text":"I can't just run away."},{"id":1005010472,"text":"*sniff*∠Waah... Jo..."},{"id":1005010474,"text":"W-Waaaaaaaah!!!"},{"id":1005010475,"text":".........∨♂㈱, you should start running."},{"id":1005010476,"text":"Pursuers... ♂㈱, run!"},{"id":1005010477,"text":"Jowy... What is this? This has to be a lie! I don't∠believe it!∨Jowy, my Jowy, our Jowy... He'd never follow orders from∠Luca Blight! It's all a lie!"},{"id":1005010478,"text":"Let's go, Nanami."},{"id":1005010480,"text":"Now, Nanami!"},{"id":1005010481,"text":"No, no, no!!! I won't go!!! We're finally here with Jowy∠again!!!"},{"id":1005010482,"text":"Hey, come with us, Jowy! Yeah, that's it! C'mon, say∠something, ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1005010483,"text":"We'll drag you along if we have to..."},{"id":1005010484,"text":"Captain Rowd! I found them!! This way!!!"},{"id":1005010485,"text":"Damn it! Come on, Nanami, now!"},{"id":1005010486,"text":"Go on, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010487,"text":"Farewell, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010490,"text":"What are you doing, ♂㈱?! We have to run for∠it, now!"},{"id":1005010491,"text":"Looks like we made it, but we can't rest easy just yet.∠Let's hurry to ♂① Castle, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010492,"text":"Someday... Someday, I promise..."},{"id":1005010493,"text":"Well, well, if it isn't the \"Lord Commander.\"∠Say, did you see a few rats come running this way?∠Surely they passed through here."},{"id":1005010494,"text":"I haven't seen anything."},{"id":1005010495,"text":"Ohhh, I see. And here one of my men swore he saw them take∠this very path! Commander or not, you're still nothing∠but a new recruit to me.∨Prince Luca himself asked me to keep an eye on you, did you∠know that?∨What do you suppose he'd say if I gave him this little piece∠of information?"},{"id":1005010497,"text":"Now step aside, would you?"},{"id":1005010498,"text":"Wait, Rowd."},{"id":1005010499,"text":"We were here, too, and nobody suspicious came through."},{"id":1005010500,"text":"Wh-What are you saying?"},{"id":1005010501,"text":"We'd hate to see you make a false report out of jealousy∠because a former subordinate is now your commanding∠officer."},{"id":1005010502,"text":"That's right, we're witnesses."},{"id":1005010503,"text":"Grr..."},{"id":1005010504,"text":"You know, there's still quite a riot going on in Greenhill.∠Shouldn't you get yourself down there and stop it?"},{"id":1005010505,"text":"...Damn it all!∠Hey, let's go!!!"},{"id":1005010506,"text":"Why?"},{"id":1005010507,"text":"Because we love Highland. It's a wonderful country."},{"id":1005010508,"text":"We can't stand idly by and let it be destroyed. The only∠thing Luca Blight will bring about is ruin...and that is∠not our intention."},{"id":1005010509,"text":"Who wants to be left with nothing but∠scorched earth after the war is over?"},{"id":1005010510,"text":"Jowy Atreides, Commander of the 4th Army of the∠Kingdom of Highland, we pledge our loyalty to you."},{"id":1005010511,"text":"We know your goal. Please, use us to that end."},{"id":1005010512,"text":"Culgan, Seed..."},{"id":1005010513,"text":"Your brave decision will not be in vain.∨Thank you."},{"id":1005010514,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, things aren't going well.∠Greenhill's defenses have proven much stronger than we∠anticipated.∨We've tried to batter down the gates, but there has been∠little progress since the Highland soldiers in the ramparts∠rain arrows down on our men whenever they approach."},{"id":1005010515,"text":"If we don't execute this carefully, the Highland soldiers∠will finish us off before the monsters do."},{"id":1005010516,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, there are many secret passages∠leading in and out of Greenhill left over from wars of old.∨The passage we took while escaping from Greenhill is one of∠them. Through this passage, a small group should be able to∠sneak inside the city and open the gate from the inside∠without attracting attention.∨I will show you the way."},{"id":1005010517,"text":"My lady, that is too dangerous!"},{"id":1005010518,"text":"Shin, I am acting mayor of Greenhill. If I don't fight for∠my people, who will?∨I am going."},{"id":1005010519,"text":"Commander, please take me with you as well."},{"id":1005010520,"text":"Sure."},{"id":1005010521,"text":"Nope."},{"id":1005010522,"text":"Thank you."},{"id":1005010523,"text":"Shin, please wait here...and have faith in ♂㈱∠and I!"},{"id":1005010524,"text":"...I understand. Please be careful."},{"id":1005010525,"text":"Now, please select the rest of your party."},{"id":1005010526,"text":"We can get to the forest passage through here. Let's hurry,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1005010527,"text":"I've been waiting for you, ♂㈱. And you,∠woman. You must be Teresa. I will claim both of your heads,∠here and now!"},{"id":1005010528,"text":"Wh-Who are you?"},{"id":1005010529,"text":"I am the daughter of Kinua, chieftain of the Karaya Tribe.∠Lucia is my name!"},{"id":1005010530,"text":"Damn..."},{"id":1005010531,"text":"Why do you think of us as enemies?"},{"id":1005010532,"text":"Listen to yourself, daughter of Greenhill! I never thought∠I'd hear such words from you!"},{"id":1005010533,"text":"What do you mean?"},{"id":1005010535,"text":"My father did that...?"},{"id":1005010538,"text":"I am defeated. I cannot stop you."},{"id":1005010539,"text":".........∨Let's hurry..."},{"id":1005010540,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please be on guard."},{"id":1005010541,"text":"You are ♂㈱... Bearer of a True Rune... An∠accursed child...∨The cause of my hatred... The cause of my nightmares...∨My servant... I call you forth from your dark realm to∠erase this boy from the world!"},{"id":1005010542,"text":"It's a monster!"},{"id":1005010543,"text":"All right! The monster is gone!"},{"id":1005010544,"text":"Look, the Highland soldiers are running away!"},{"id":1005010545,"text":"Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1005010546,"text":"My power is again inadequate... ♂㈱... Bearer∠of a True Rune...∨You will not find it easy to extinguish the flames of war..."},{"id":1005010547,"text":"Who was that...?"},{"id":1005010548,"text":"Well done, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1005010549,"text":"Lady Teresa, you've finally come back to us..."},{"id":1005010550,"text":"Yes..."},{"id":1005010551,"text":"Hey, look! Lady Teresa kept her promise, just like I said∠she would!"},{"id":1005010552,"text":"Of course she did!"},{"id":1005010553,"text":"Lady Teresa is back! Greenhill is back to normal!"},{"id":1005010554,"text":"Lady Teresa!!!"},{"id":1005010555,"text":"Everyone... Thank you. Thank you for enduring for so∠long. I promise I will never let anything like this happen∠ever again."},{"id":1005010556,"text":"Commander, I bring word from Master Shu. He requests that∠you return to ♂① Castle as soon as possible."},{"id":1005010557,"text":"I don't know what this is about, but it seems urgent.∠For now, we'll leave a unit of troops here to protect∠Greenhill.∨Commander, let's return to the castle."},{"id":1005010558,"text":"Commander, you have arrived. Things aren't going well. ∠Greenhill's defenses have proven much stronger than we∠anticipated.∨We've tried to batter down the gates, but there has been∠little progress since the Highland soldiers in the ramparts∠rain arrows down on our men whenever they approach."},{"id":1005010559,"text":"This city is incredibly hard to attack head-on precisely∠because of those gates. That must be why Jowy chose the∠tactics he did.∨However, we don't have time for a leisurely siege."},{"id":1005010570,"text":"Oh, will you be staying with us today? As you wish."},{"id":1005010571,"text":"Welcome. What are you looking for?"},{"id":1005010573,"text":"Teresa's supposed to be hiding in this inn somewhere. We'll∠tear up the floorboards to find her if we have to, hahahaha!"},{"id":1005010574,"text":"Hm? What's up? Can I help you, lad? Oh, you want to know∠what I'm doing?∨Well, I'm a sculptor, but at the moment I'm fresh out of∠good ideas..."},{"id":1005010575,"text":"Hey, how's it going? Me? I'm fine like always! In fact, I∠came up with a great idea.∨Okay... Clay, clay... Uh-oh, am I out?"},{"id":1005010576,"text":"Now what do I do? Looks like I used up all my clay..."},{"id":1005010577,"text":"Hm? You want some clay? Well, there's plenty of it∠around."},{"id":1005010578,"text":"Here, this oughta be enough. Take it."},{"id":1005010579,"text":"Received some clay."},{"id":1005010580,"text":"Huh? What's up? You brought me some clay? Wow, that's∠really thoughtful. Thanks.∨...Say, is there anything I can do for you in return?"},{"id":1005010582,"text":"Not really."},{"id":1005010583,"text":"Join? Join what?"},{"id":1005010584,"text":"Hmmm, the ♂② Army, huh?◎2 Okay, I'll do it. I∠don't know how much help I'll be to you, but I'll join your∠cause."},{"id":1005010585,"text":"Nice to be working with you, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1005010586,"text":"I see. Well, catch ya later."},{"id":1005010587,"text":"Oh, it's you? What's up?"},{"id":1005010588,"text":"Hehe, good morning, ♂④."},{"id":1005010589,"text":"Oh, hello, it's been a while, ♂㈱! I sure was∠surprised to hear that you were the leader of the∠♂② Army."},{"id":1005010590,"text":"Hehe, good morning, ♂④. What is it? Is there∠something I can help you with?"},{"id":1005010591,"text":"Uh, about that man named Shin..."},{"id":1005010592,"text":"Um, is school really difficult?"},{"id":1005010593,"text":"You sure are beautiful."},{"id":1005010594,"text":"Hmm. I wouldn't call it easy, but there are worse places to∠be. Or at least, that's how it is right now."},{"id":1005010595,"text":"Oh, well, thank you, even if it is just flattery."},{"id":1005010596,"text":"You mustn't use the same line twice when flattering someone,∠understand?"},{"id":1005010597,"text":"You want to know about Sir Shin? Why, whatever for?"},{"id":1005010598,"text":"We're searching for Teresa..."},{"id":1005010599,"text":"Oh, uh, no reason..."},{"id":1005010600,"text":"Well, if he was going out with you, then..."},{"id":1005010601,"text":"Oh my, are you sure you should be telling me this? Hehehe, I∠knew you all were up to something.∨That person named Flik has been nosing around quite a bit..."},{"id":1005010602,"text":"Oh, what's wrong? Hehehe, I knew you all were up to∠something.∨That person named Flik has been nosing around quite a bit..."},{"id":1005010603,"text":"Heehee, don't be silly. There's nothing between Shin and I.∨Besides, he already has Lady Teresa, teehee."},{"id":1005010604,"text":"The truth is, we're actually..."},{"id":1005010605,"text":"No! We're just regular..."},{"id":1005010606,"text":"Oh, I see. We'll leave it at that. Good luck, then, hehe."},{"id":1005010607,"text":"The ♂② Army... I see.∨Please, find Lady Teresa. I know she's alive somewhere.∠Best of luck to you.∨I'll do whatever I can to help... I promise."},{"id":1005010608,"text":"Hard at work? Don't worry, I'm on your side."},{"id":1005010609,"text":"Hello, ♂㈱. What, are you surprised? I promised∠to help you, didn't I? That means you have to do your best∠too."},{"id":1005010610,"text":"Oh, hello, ♂㈱. It's been a while. So you're∠the leader of the ♂② Army...∨If you'd only told me before, I could have helped you..."},{"id":1005010611,"text":"You can help now by joining us."},{"id":1005010612,"text":"That's right."},{"id":1005010613,"text":"Oh, really? Well, you were the ones who saved Lady Teresa,∠so... Okay, I'll join."},{"id":1005010614,"text":"I'll just get my things to ♂① Castle then."},{"id":1005010615,"text":"Indeed."},{"id":1005010616,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱. What's is it? Oh, uh, sorry... Did you need something?"},{"id":1005010627,"text":"Your training is incomplete! Hmm... I'd say you'd have to∠practice running away about ♂③ more times to beat me."},{"id":1005010630,"text":"Seriously, what is up with that idiot Pico? \"You're the only∠one for me...the only girl to ever capture my heart\"? What a∠load of garbage!"},{"id":1005010631,"text":"So?! Explain yourself! Just who is this \"Annallee,\" huh?!"},{"id":1005010632,"text":"N-No, Mairie, you've got it all wrong. Listen, Annallee is∠very important to me, but—"},{"id":1005010633,"text":"Grr... You're terrible, the absolute worst! And here you∠were telling me, \"I love you,\" and \"You're the only one\" the∠entire time!"},{"id":1005010634,"text":"Look, I'm telling you, Annallee is like a sister to me—"},{"id":1005010635,"text":"You're sick! Sick!! Sick!!! You love her like a \"sister,\"∠huh?!"},{"id":1005010636,"text":"Y-Yeah, and that's why—"},{"id":1005010637,"text":"Um, did you say \"Annallee\"?"},{"id":1005010639,"text":"I don't want to hear any excuses!"},{"id":1005010640,"text":"It's not an excuse. I've known Annallee since I was—"},{"id":1005010641,"text":"So, you've been with her a long time and kept her a secret∠from me?!"},{"id":1005010642,"text":"N-No... I mean, come on, even my parents know her—"},{"id":1005010643,"text":"You've taken her home to your parents?! You're awful!∠Awful!! Awful!!!"},{"id":1005010644,"text":"Y-You've got it all wrong, Mairie..."},{"id":1005010645,"text":"You know Annallee? Where is she? Is she all right?!"},{"id":1005010646,"text":"Not so fast, Pico! You're talking to me, not him!"},{"id":1005010647,"text":"I see, thank heavens she's okay! I couldn't sleep at∠night thinking about her being alone."},{"id":1005010648,"text":"Um, hello?! We're having a conversation!"},{"id":1005010649,"text":"Forgive me, Mairie. I haven't lied to you. However,∠Annallee is very important to me.∨You're a strong girl. You'll be able to live without me."},{"id":1005010650,"text":"W-Wait a minute..."},{"id":1005010651,"text":"So, where's ♂① Castle?◎7∨Got it, thanks."},{"id":1005010652,"text":"I'm on my way, Annallee!"},{"id":1005010653,"text":"Waaah..."},{"id":1005010654,"text":"What do you want?! You're friends with that awful cheat,∠Pico, aren't you! Hmph!!!"},{"id":1005010655,"text":"Welcome to Greenhill, city of learning! I can't wait!"},{"id":1005010658,"text":"Daddy is off work today, and he promised to play with me!∠Yippee!"},{"id":1005010659,"text":"I'm a clerk at the mayor's office, but I decided to take the∠day off so I could be with my daughter. It's true!"},{"id":1005010663,"text":"Wow... I hope I get to own a huge mansion like this∠someday."},{"id":1005010664,"text":"Hey, boy, are you a student at the Academy? Do you know a∠girl named Nina? She left her stuff in my shop again..."},{"id":1005010665,"text":"Lady Teresa may be young, but she's doing the best she can.∠If only there was something we could do to return the favor."},{"id":1005010666,"text":"A while ago, this really fast guy with really long ears and∠a really big nose came by here! He was a lot of fun!"},{"id":1005010667,"text":"Are you going to the Academy? Emilia at the reception desk∠there, well, her smarts are only outmatched by her beauty.∠She's all that I could ever hope to be..."},{"id":1005010677,"text":"☆0∠          Barrel of Fine Wine"},{"id":1005010678,"text":"☆0∠  Barrel Stuffed with Mega Medicine"},{"id":1005010680,"text":"☆0∠             Barrel of Pears"},{"id":1005010681,"text":"☆0∠                 Dahlias"},{"id":1005010686,"text":"☆0∠             Inn Signboard"},{"id":1005010688,"text":"☆0∠         General Store's Sign"},{"id":1005010776,"text":"Huh? Run along∠now."},{"id":1005010877,"text":"First, Muse falls to Luca Blight and now people are saying∠that Lord Alec is dead... I never knew griffins were so huge!"},{"id":1005020315,"text":"It's kinda lonely without my big brother around.◎2 Well, I∠guess he'll be back when the war's over."},{"id":1005020353,"text":"I wonder if young Tony is doing well..."},{"id":1005020354,"text":"■"},{"id":1005020355,"text":"I heard Muse lost to some kingdom called Highland? You know, by Teresa's!"},{"id":1005060573,"text":"What about Teresa's hidden path?"},{"id":1005060574,"text":"Want to try the secret path from yesterday?"},{"id":1005060575,"text":"Mu?"},{"id":1005060580,"text":"Let's escape through that secret path!"},{"id":1005060581,"text":"We should be fine if we take the path by that shack."},{"id":1005060585,"text":"Hey, it's too late for that. We must act now!"},{"id":1005060589,"text":"What? This isn't like you, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005060590,"text":"You okay, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1005060591,"text":"♂㈱! Let's not overdo it, though, okay?"},{"id":1005070217,"text":"Right? Are you excited too, Pilika?"},{"id":1005070218,"text":"You think so too, ♂㈱?∨.............∨Wait, are you implying something?"},{"id":1005070219,"text":"Pilika, are you looking forward to supper too?"},{"id":1005070220,"text":"Ugh, and I can't stand spinach..."},{"id":1005070221,"text":"It's okay. I ate it all like a big girl."},{"id":1005070222,"text":"Aha! There you are, Nanami!"},{"id":1005070223,"text":"You outplayed me this afternoon, but our duel is just∠beginning."},{"id":1005070224,"text":"...D-Duel?"},{"id":1005070225,"text":"Why are you so obsessed with Flik, anyway?"},{"id":1005070226,"text":"Um, I think you've got it all wrong..."},{"id":1005070227,"text":"Eh? It's destiny.∨On that day, at that hour...I felt the hand of destiny upon∠me when Sir Flik fought in my honor.∨*sigh*∠I knew in that moment that he was the one for me..."},{"id":1005070228,"text":"Huh? What?"},{"id":1005070229,"text":"All wrong?∨...Ah, I get it! You're interested in me!∨Well, I'm sorry.∨My heart belongs to another. He is brave, strong, kind, and∠resolute...yet still looks so young when he smiles."},{"id":1005070231,"text":"Well then, good night!"},{"id":1005070233,"text":"W-W-We're okay! Don't leave us here!"},{"id":1005070241,"text":"Ulp!"},{"id":1005070242,"text":"Nope, you aren't leaving us. We're coming too."},{"id":1005070243,"text":"!!!"},{"id":1005070244,"text":"What? What? What's happening?!∨L-Let's go b-b-back! ♂㈱, we're leaving!∠C'mon, hurry! Hurry!!!"},{"id":1005070249,"text":"Was that really a ghost? Something's fishy here. What is this?"},{"id":1005070251,"text":"I think it's safe to say a ghost wouldn't need anything∠like this."},{"id":1005070252,"text":"Ah! There it is! All right! Now that I know it's not a∠ghost, it's mine. Time for some payback for scaring me!"},{"id":1005070254,"text":"Listen, once I give the signal, we'll all rush in and grab∠it."},{"id":1005070255,"text":"Weren't you completely terrified a second ago?"},{"id":1005070256,"text":"Forget about that. Now get ready and...∨Go!!!"},{"id":1005070257,"text":"Agh!!!"},{"id":1005070259,"text":"You won't get away from us!"},{"id":1005070260,"text":"Oooh, you, you... Who is it, anyway?!"},{"id":1005070261,"text":"Cut it out! All of you!!"},{"id":1005070262,"text":"Hey, it's Flik."},{"id":1005070263,"text":"Uh, wait, what?∨Oh, I get it! You've been wandering around night after night∠like a ghost. But why would you do that?"},{"id":1005070264,"text":"Who's been acting like a ghost?! I've been tailing that guy∠Shin. There's something really suspicious about him.∨He's a slippery one...though that's to be expected since∠the Highland troops also have their eyes on him.∨I figured he's got to be doing whatever he does at night,∠so I've been watching and waiting...and I just spotted∠him! I tailed him all the way here—"},{"id":1005070265,"text":"...And then we caught you."},{"id":1005070266,"text":"Dammit..."},{"id":1005070267,"text":"Okay, let's go. It should be just up ahead...I think."},{"id":1005070268,"text":"He's gotta be over there."},{"id":1005070269,"text":"Looks like a dead end."},{"id":1005070270,"text":"Huh? N-No way... Could it really be...a g-g-ghost?"},{"id":1005070271,"text":"Of course not. There's got to be some kind of mechanism∠somewhere. Let's search for it, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005070272,"text":"!!!"},{"id":1005070273,"text":"♂㈱, you're so smart! That's my little brother."},{"id":1005070274,"text":"Hey, let's go."},{"id":1005070275,"text":"What's that? Looks pretty suspicious to me..."},{"id":1005070276,"text":"It's gotta be the ghost's haunted shack!"},{"id":1005070277,"text":"Oh, come on."},{"id":1005070278,"text":"Anyway, let's check it out."},{"id":1005070279,"text":"I knew we'd be discovered eventually... However, my lady∠requires a bit more time here."},{"id":1005070280,"text":"Hey, wait, we're—"},{"id":1005070281,"text":"Don't waste your breath."},{"id":1005070282,"text":"You're finished, ghost!"},{"id":1005070283,"text":"We're on your side."},{"id":1005070284,"text":"Yeah!"},{"id":1005070286,"text":"Calm down, ♂㈱."},{"id":1005070287,"text":"Let's stow the jokes for now, okay?"},{"id":1005070288,"text":"I cannot consider you allies, as your identities remain∠shrouded.∨Forgive me, but I cannot let you leave here alive."},{"id":1005070289,"text":"Damn, you're a stubborn one! Are you after a fight?∨You'll find us very different from those Highland∠soldiers."},{"id":1005070290,"text":"With my blade Tarantula in hand, I have nothing to∠fear...from anyone."},{"id":1005070291,"text":"If we're talking about reasons not to lose, we have 'em∠too, buddy!"},{"id":1005070292,"text":"N-No..."},{"id":1005070293,"text":"*sniffle*∨Waaaaaaaaaaaaahhh!"},{"id":1005070294,"text":"A child... Why?"},{"id":1005070295,"text":"Shin... Please, that's enough."},{"id":1005070296,"text":"My lady... But these people..."},{"id":1005070297,"text":"There...there has been enough fighting. I beg you, Shin...∠Please stop."},{"id":1005070298,"text":"Now hold on. We haven't come to capture you. I'm Flik of∠the ♂② Army. And this is our commander,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1005070299,"text":"The ♂② Army..."},{"id":1005070300,"text":"I shall take your word, that you are truly from the∠♂② Army."},{"id":1005070301,"text":"My lady..."},{"id":1005070302,"text":"If they were members of the Highland Army,∠they wouldn't need to go to such lengths to lie, Shin.∨♂㈱, why did you sneak past the Highland Army,∠just to see me?"},{"id":1005070303,"text":"We've come to save you."},{"id":1005070305,"text":"Well..."},{"id":1005070306,"text":"Actually..."},{"id":1005070307,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. What's wrong?"},{"id":1005070308,"text":"What is it? Do you get tongue-tied talking to beautiful∠women?"},{"id":1005070310,"text":"Look, look, even Pilika's saying \"Go for it.\""},{"id":1005070311,"text":"You came to...save me? Why?"},{"id":1005070313,"text":"My help? No, what you seek is Greenhill's help..."},{"id":1005070314,"text":"Forgive me, ♂㈱, but I'm afraid I cannot∠help you."},{"id":1005070315,"text":"Can I ask why?"},{"id":1005070317,"text":"I abandoned my citizens and fled here alone... I no longer∠have the right to call myself acting mayor of Greenhill.∨And...I don't want anything like that battle to happen∠ever again..."},{"id":1005070318,"text":"Wait, where do you think you're going, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1005070320,"text":"Uh, um, ♂㈱?∨Y-You don't think...the g-ghost could have∠gone into our rooms, do you?"},{"id":1005070321,"text":"S-So, everything looks normal, then? We're okay?∨.........∨Yeah, we're okay. What was that, anyway?"},{"id":1005070322,"text":"Oh, we keep the doors locked tight at night. But more∠importantly, you kids need to get to bed."},{"id":1005070495,"text":"Commander, we've been waiting for you."},{"id":1005070496,"text":"I will now explain our strategy for taking Rockaxe Castle.∨Lord Ridley, Lord Hauser, and Lady Teresa will assemble∠their units and deploy immediately.∨When the enemy appears,∠I want you all to respond, but to slowly fall back,∠and in doing so draw the enemy away from the castle."},{"id":1005070497,"text":"Understood."},{"id":1005070498,"text":"Hmm."},{"id":1005070499,"text":"Yes, sir."},{"id":1005070500,"text":"When the enemy takes the bait, Commander ♂㈱∠will lead a small force into Rockaxe Castle."},{"id":1005070501,"text":"And just how is he supposed to do that?"},{"id":1005070502,"text":"During the last battle, some of the former Matilda Knights∠entered the castle posing as Gordeau's men.∨On our signal, they will open the gates from within."},{"id":1005070503,"text":"And then? And then?"},{"id":1005070504,"text":"Commander ♂㈱ will enter the castle, ascend∠to the top floor, burn down the enemy flag found there, and∠replace it with one of ours."},{"id":1005070505,"text":"What's burning a single flag going to do?"},{"id":1005070506,"text":"The Highland Army has over-extended themselves. They took∠the Knightdom by force, but their control over it is∠fragile at best.∨The knights will likely lose the will to fight if they think∠the castle has been taken. This would then turn the tide of∠battle in our favor."},{"id":1005070507,"text":"And if we fail?"},{"id":1005070508,"text":"Then Ridley, Hauser, and Teresa will have nowhere to run,∠and the units they command will be slaughtered.∨The rest of the ♂② Army likely won't outlast∠them by much.∨Commander, everything is riding upon you. Please select the∠team to join your infiltration of Rockaxe Castle."},{"id":1005070509,"text":"You're gonna take me, right?"},{"id":1005070511,"text":"No, it's too dangerous."},{"id":1005070512,"text":"No, no way! You can't say that!"},{"id":1005070513,"text":"I can't believe you said that! Now listen to your big∠sister."},{"id":1005070514,"text":"No use saying that. I'm coming with you no matter what,∠because I'm the one that is going to protect you, ∠♂㈱."},{"id":1005070515,"text":"Of course! Let's go."},{"id":1005070519,"text":"Give me a minute..."},{"id":1005070520,"text":"We're counting on you, Commander. Here, it's yours."},{"id":1005070529,"text":"Okay, good luck out there."},{"id":1005070530,"text":"I see. I'm ready whenever you are."},{"id":1005070558,"text":"Is everything in order, Commander?"},{"id":1005070559,"text":"Have you completed your preparations?"},{"id":1005070560,"text":"Commander, please do take care."},{"id":1005070561,"text":"I wish you luck..."},{"id":1005070562,"text":"We're counting on you, Commander."},{"id":1005070563,"text":"Commander, are you ready to begin?"},{"id":1005070564,"text":"♂㈱, thank you for liberating Greenhill. Even though this place may hold painful∠memories, it's still our home, don't you agree?"},{"id":1006020040,"text":"What is it, Commander ♂⑩?"},{"id":1006020041,"text":"I've never seen you like this, Commander ♂⑩.∠During the war, you were always so gallant, and when you∠came to Banner you looked somewhat sad.∨I've never seen you so at peace. Varkas is waiting for us at the castle, so let's be∠off.∨I'll accompany you as far as the village."},{"id":1006020044,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱. Ko is back to normal, so∠let's go to the castle!"},{"id":1006020045,"text":"Ko, are you all better now?"},{"id":1006020046,"text":"Hey, sis! Yeah, I'm okay now. They made me drink some∠gross medicine though."},{"id":1006020047,"text":"Hey, guess what I heard!∨You're really General ♂㈱, huh? And∠he's General ♂⑩!∨Wow, awesome! I get to meet two heroes at once!"},{"id":1006020048,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'll escort you to the border.∠Are you ready?"},{"id":1006020051,"text":"Then I'll wait here for you."},{"id":1006020052,"text":"Are you ready to depart?"},{"id":1006020053,"text":"Very well."},{"id":1006020054,"text":"Why, hello, ♂㈱. Have you come to visit?"},{"id":1006020055,"text":"Make yourself at home."},{"id":1006020056,"text":"Please, fight with us."},{"id":1006020057,"text":"Hey, how are you?"},{"id":1006020058,"text":"Good luck, Young commander! But please, do try to come home∠before sundown, won't you?"},{"id":1006020059,"text":"We're great! Just fine, aren't we, Young commander? It's good∠to be back in the house we lived in for so many years with∠Master Teo."},{"id":1006020060,"text":"Good afternoon. Oh, you... You're the boy who came to see∠President Lepant... ♂㈱, right?"},{"id":1006020061,"text":"Are you still here? Shouldn't you be going back soon?∠You've got lots to do, don't you?"},{"id":1006020062,"text":"Yes... Will you come with us?"},{"id":1006020063,"text":"I guess so..."},{"id":1006020064,"text":"Good luck, then. I think it's about time for me to get back∠to completing my quest too."},{"id":1006020065,"text":"Come with you... You mean, join your army? I'm afraid I∠can't. I have no intention of joining a losing battle.∠You'd be better off trying someone else.∨Besides, I'm searching for the Sindar... Never mind. That∠part has nothing to do with you."},{"id":1006020066,"text":"Come with you...? As in join the ♂② Army? The∠question is...are you going to win?"},{"id":1006020067,"text":"Fine... Rumors tell of Sindar ruins near the city of∠Muse.∨And the goddess of victory does indeed seem to be∠smiling down upon you."},{"id":1006020068,"text":"How should we do this? Want me to join your party right∠now?"},{"id":1006020070,"text":"Head to the castle."},{"id":1006020071,"text":"Okay, I'll do that. I know the way."},{"id":1006020072,"text":"Come with you...? As in join your army? But I'm—"},{"id":1006020073,"text":"You're the same as ever, Lorelai. Always thinking of∠what benefits you most. The way to the Sindar will never∠open to someone so self-serving."},{"id":1006020074,"text":"Killey?! I thought you went to the Queendom of Falena!"},{"id":1006020075,"text":"Oh, I was there, alright...thanks to your \"tip.\" And what∠a tip it was.∨I didn't find any Sindar ruins, but I did find a squad of∠guards ready to throw me straight into a stinking cell."},{"id":1006020076,"text":"Hmph. That was pretty foolish. But what can you do about it∠now? How unfortunate for you."},{"id":1006020077,"text":"Oh, I wouldn't say that..."},{"id":1006020078,"text":"What?! Did you find something?"},{"id":1006020079,"text":"Maybe I did. Not like I need to tell you."},{"id":1006020080,"text":"Hey, that was my tip, my information!"},{"id":1006020081,"text":"I'm part of the ♂② Army at the moment.∨One more person won't make a huge difference, but we are∠looking for more recruits."},{"id":1006020082,"text":"Grr... That's a dirty move!"},{"id":1006020083,"text":"You're one to talk."},{"id":1006020084,"text":"Fine, you win. But first..."},{"id":1006020085,"text":"Hmm, not bad... You seem pretty tough, kid.∠Seems your eyes are as sharp as ever, Killey.∨Okay, ♂㈱, I'll join your cause. The goddess of∠victory does indeed seem to be smiling down on you."},{"id":1006020086,"text":"Welcome! We have tons of unique, exotic wares from as far∠north as Harmonia and the Nameless Lands, and as far south∠as Kanakan! Please take a look-see!"},{"id":1006020087,"text":"Welcome to Gordon's Mercantile, lad! Huh? Did you want to∠talk to me about something?"},{"id":1006020088,"text":"I've come to trade."},{"id":1006020090,"text":"Ah yes, of course, of course, excuse me. Let's get straight∠to it."},{"id":1006020091,"text":"Join? Join what? I'm going to need to know more."},{"id":1006020092,"text":"Naturally. I see, lad...I mean, Commander.∨It just so happens I've been thinking about leaving this∠store to my son and opening a new one. Not to mention that∠I heard that Shu, the famous trader, is in Jowston...∨I'd be happy to cut a deal with you, but first I'd like to∠see if your business sense is up to snuff.∨If you can make 50,000 potch through trading alone, I'll∠gladly join you."},{"id":1006020093,"text":"Salutations, Commander ♂㈱! You've got ♂③∠potch left until you hit 50,000!"},{"id":1006020094,"text":"Greetings, Commander ♂㈱! The day has finally∠come.∨As promised, I accept that you have a real head for trade,∠and will leave this store to my son. Looking forward to∠doing business with you!"},{"id":1006020095,"text":"Coates! Coates!!!"},{"id":1006020096,"text":"Yes, father!"},{"id":1006020097,"text":"I'm going to work with Commander ♂㈱. That∠means Gordon's Mercantile is in your hands! Don't disgrace∠the family name!"},{"id":1006020098,"text":"Of course, father, leave it to me!"},{"id":1006020099,"text":"Well then, I'll leave right away for ♂①∠Castle."},{"id":1006020100,"text":"Welcome. Oh, it's you, ♂㈱! So, how's my dad∠doing?"},{"id":1006020101,"text":"Did you come here from Jowston? You've come a long way.∠Welcome. This is Gregminster, capital of the Toran Republic."},{"id":1006020102,"text":"The Toran Republic was founded three years ago when we∠defeated the Scarlet Moon Empire. It was a hard-fought war,∠but just look how beautiful our city is now!"},{"id":1006020103,"text":"This building used to be the mansion of the late General∠Teo."},{"id":1006020104,"text":"General Teo's boy became a very fine, upstanding young man."},{"id":1006020105,"text":"We owe this peaceful life and splendid city we have now to∠Commander ♂⑩, the hero who saved us when he∠was just a boy."},{"id":1006020106,"text":"This beautiful city, Gregminster, was built by the very∠last emperor, Barbarossa."},{"id":1006020107,"text":"I hear there's civil war in the City-States of Jowston.∠Serves them right, if you ask me."},{"id":1006020108,"text":"President Lepant is a wonderful man. He's protected us from∠the City-States ever since the Liberation War ended."},{"id":1006020109,"text":"This is the home of the Flower General, Lord Milich.
