Are you getting nervous too?"},{"id":1006040012,"text":"Hahaha, ♂㈱. My old man may look scary, but I∠promise he doesn't bite."},{"id":1006040013,"text":"P-Please, Commander."},{"id":1006040014,"text":"............∨When this land was the domain of the Scarlet Moon Empire,∠we fought the City-States numerous times.∨Even after the founding of the Toran Republic, we fought off∠incursions from Tinto and South Window, who were seeking∠to take advantage of our internal discord.∨And despite all this, you seek to form an alliance with such∠a long-standing foe?"},{"id":1006040015,"text":"Luca Blight, the king of Highland, seeks to rip apart and∠devour the City-States of Jowston. If he should succeed,∠the Toran Republic will surely be his next target."},{"id":1006040016,"text":"I must admit, this Luca fellow certainly does seem to have∠an unquenchable thirst for battle and bloodshed."},{"id":1006040017,"text":"As a citizen of South Window, I fought against the Republic∠in service to Lord Granmeyer, and thus naturally find it∠difficult to come here asking for your aid.∨But in his hate, Luca Blight seeks nothing less than the∠destruction of the City-States and all who live within them.∨I will do anything for the people of South Window. So∠please, I beg of you, consider our request."},{"id":1006040018,"text":"............∨♂㈱, why do you continue to fight? I would like∠to hear your reasons."},{"id":1006040019,"text":"To defeat Luca Blight."},{"id":1006040020,"text":"To put an end to this war."},{"id":1006040021,"text":"I don't know."},{"id":1006040022,"text":"Yes, it is foolish to seek a reason in war."},{"id":1006040023,"text":"Hmm...∨You are much like him.∨I may be the president of the Toran Republic, but there's a∠young man who is more fitting for the role.∨He led tens of thousands of soldiers into battle and∠finally brought peace to our land.∨I see the same glimmer in your eyes that I did in his. You,∠too, represent the hopes and dreams of all those who follow∠your cause."},{"id":1006040024,"text":"Tesla, how many men can we deploy immediately?"},{"id":1006040025,"text":"Um, yes, sir... Counting the Capital Guards and the Border∠Patrol, about 5,000 men, sir."},{"id":1006040026,"text":"Then there's the matter of who will lead them..."},{"id":1006040027,"text":"General Valeria is currently in the capital to deliver a∠report from Pannu Yakuta Castle."},{"id":1006040028,"text":"Kasumi, the Vice-Chief of Rokkaku, is also here for military∠training exercises.∨Either would make a trustworthy leader for our men."},{"id":1006040029,"text":"Good. Summon them both at once."},{"id":1006040030,"text":"Yes, sir."},{"id":1006040032,"text":"Valeria here, reporting as ordered."},{"id":1006040033,"text":"You summoned me, President Lepant?"},{"id":1006040034,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, allow me to introduce Valeria,∠one of our Republic's Six Great Generals.∨Her skill with a sword is unrivaled."},{"id":1006040035,"text":"I am Valeria. It is an honor to meet you, Commander∠♂㈱."},{"id":1006040036,"text":"And here we have Kasumi, Vice-Chief of the hidden ninja∠hamlet of Rokkaku."},{"id":1006040037,"text":"Pleased to meet you. My name is Kasumi."},{"id":1006040038,"text":"Both have my implicit trust. Please have one of them∠accompany you. I am sure whomever you choose will serve∠you well."},{"id":1006040039,"text":"Heheheh, what a couple of babes, am I right? So, what's it∠gonna be? Who ya gonna pick?"},{"id":1006040040,"text":"Valeria, please."},{"id":1006040041,"text":"Kasumi, please."},{"id":1006040042,"text":"Uh, please wait a moment..."},{"id":1006040043,"text":"What, can't decide? Oh brother, sounds like someone needs a∠peek at my secret notes."},{"id":1006040044,"text":"Read Valeria's notes."},{"id":1006040045,"text":"Read Kasumi's notes."},{"id":1006040047,"text":"The existence of Luca Blight is a serious threat to the∠Toran Republic. We're counting on you, Valeria."},{"id":1006040048,"text":"I understand, sir. ◎3∠Commander ♂㈱, it appears I shall be in service∠to the ♂② Army for the time being.∨I look forward to working with you."},{"id":1006040049,"text":"You know what to do, Kasumi."},{"id":1006040050,"text":"Yes, I understand, President Lepant. Commander∠♂㈱, I shall do my best to assist you and the∠♂② Army."},{"id":1006040051,"text":"Good for you, ♂㈱. That ought to give you a∠fighting chance. Well, best of luck.∨Huh? Me? I'm gonna stay here. I'm out of play money and∠besides, I just hate fighting..."},{"id":1006040052,"text":"Huh? What's wrong, Dad?"},{"id":1006040053,"text":"Ow! Hey, what gives?!"},{"id":1006040054,"text":"I have a favor to ask of you, ♂㈱. Take my∠idiot son with you.∨He's not worth much, but maybe you can make a man out of∠him."},{"id":1006040055,"text":"H-Hey, wait a minute..."},{"id":1006040056,"text":"Fool! I sent you into the world to learn its ways, and all∠you did was waste your time and money on frivolities!∨Learn from ♂㈱'s example and end your childish∠behavior. And don't come back until you do!"},{"id":1006040057,"text":"B-But..."},{"id":1006040058,"text":"He's all yours now."},{"id":1006040059,"text":"Let's go, Commander. Given the situation, I don't think∠we have much time to spare."},{"id":1006040060,"text":"Let's go, Commander. We don't have much time."},{"id":1006040061,"text":"Sheena, that means you too!"},{"id":1006040122,"text":"What is it?! If we don't hurry up, we'll lose the bandits!∠We must move quickly!"},{"id":1006040123,"text":"I beg you! Please, please save Ko!"},{"id":1006040124,"text":"Guess the bandits are going out of business too..."},{"id":1006040125,"text":"C'mon, hurry up, let's go!"},{"id":1006040126,"text":"When you're ready, just talk to Captain Varkas."},{"id":1006040127,"text":"I-I am under a lot of stress!"},{"id":1006040128,"text":"Huh? You...have the same name as the Young commander!∠♂㈱... This just feels odd."},{"id":1006040129,"text":"Huh?∠You have the same name as Commander ♂⑩.∠Do lots of great people have the same names, I wonder?"},{"id":1006040130,"text":"Why did this have to happen to us?"},{"id":1006040131,"text":"Ko... I'd go save him if I could, but..."},{"id":1006040132,"text":"If not for this war..."},{"id":1006040133,"text":"Nothing like this has ever happened before."},{"id":1006040134,"text":"What are we supposed to do?"},{"id":1006040135,"text":"Ko, are you feeling better?"},{"id":1006040136,"text":"Yeah, I'm okay now, mister. They made me drink some really∠gross medicine, though."},{"id":1006040137,"text":"What's up? Oh! I get it, my sister wouldn't let you pass,∠huh?∨Hey, mister...do you want to meet General∠♂㈱ that bad?"},{"id":1006040139,"text":"Please! I beg of you! Please save Ko!!! Otherwise, the∠bandits will—"},{"id":1006040140,"text":"The monster that made off with Ko concerns me. Let's hurry,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1006040141,"text":"Ko was taken by a monster... Please, Commander∠♂㈱, I beg of you. Save Ko!"},{"id":1006040142,"text":"This isn't good... We've got to get Ko to Doctor Liukan in∠Gregminster fast!"},{"id":1006040143,"text":"In Gregminster... Doctor Liukan is in Gregminster! He should∠be able to save Ko!∨Sir ♂⑩! Commander ♂㈱! Please∠save Ko! Please!!!"},{"id":1006040144,"text":"Sir Glenshiel, co-commander of the Capital Guard, is just∠so cool and handsome."},{"id":1006040145,"text":"A guy named Kanaan was just arrested for fraud, right here∠in the capital city."},{"id":1006040146,"text":"President Lepant would like you to have this. Please, take∠it."},{"id":1006040147,"text":"All of this belongs to the Republican Army. *sigh* I can∠never get 'em shiny enough for Master Kai, our martial arts∠instructor."},{"id":1006040148,"text":"This room is devoted to the hero of the Liberation War,∠Commander ♂⑩.∨After the war was won, the commander departed for parts∠unknown."},{"id":1006040149,"text":"President Lepant's wife, Eileen, is a very kind person.∠She's even kind to me. I'm ever so grateful."},{"id":1006040150,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please be sure to see our fair∠city as well."},{"id":1006040151,"text":"Teehee, isn't Sir Alen, co-commander of the Capital∠Guard, just the dreamiest?"},{"id":1006040152,"text":"I've come as a messenger for General Kasim Hazil, who is∠safeguarding our northern border."},{"id":1006040153,"text":"President Lepant is very wise. He has governed our young∠country most wonderfully."},{"id":1006040154,"text":"That Copper Hammer was made by the famed blacksmith∠Mose."},{"id":1006040155,"text":"The room beyond is the heart of all Gregminster."},{"id":1006040156,"text":"Please make yourself comfortable, Commander∠♂㈱."},{"id":1006040157,"text":"Forgive me, Commander ♂㈱, but you may only∠enter here at special times."},{"id":1006040158,"text":"You acquired 100 potch!"},{"id":1006040245,"text":"☆0∠       The Hero's Clothes∠             (Replica)"},{"id":1006040246,"text":"☆0∠              ♂⑩∠  Leader of the Liberation Army"},{"id":1006040247,"text":"☆0∠           Gleaming Armor"},{"id":1006040249,"text":"☆0∠   Gorgeous Flower Arrangement"},{"id":1006040251,"text":"☆0∠    \"Birth of the Toran Republic\""},{"id":1006040254,"text":"☆0∠       Row of Polished Shields"},{"id":1006040255,"text":"☆0∠             Breastplate"},{"id":1006040256,"text":"☆0∠    Rows and Rows of Spears"},{"id":1006040258,"text":"☆0∠           Gleaming Armor◎6∠What's this?"},{"id":1006040259,"text":"☆0∠  \"History of the Scarlet Moon Empire\""},{"id":1006040260,"text":"☆0∠     \"Toran Republic Census List\""},{"id":1006040262,"text":"Damn it, where did that jerk go? His legs must be as quick∠as his hands..."},{"id":1006040263,"text":"Yikes, that was close! Think I'll go hide out with Viktor∠until she simmers down."},{"id":1006040264,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we've been looking for you!∠Where have you been?"},{"id":1006040265,"text":"Hahaha, even ♂㈱ needs some time for himself∠now and then. After all, he's still a growin' boy."},{"id":1006040266,"text":"I ask that you remember your responsibilities as leader of∠the ♂② Army, Commander. If you must leave the∠castle, please take every precaution to ensure your safety.∨As it is now, our army is a delicate thing that would fall∠apart without your presence.∨With that out of the way, let's move on to today's briefing.∠Please begin, Apple."},{"id":1006040267,"text":"The ♂② Army now commands nearly 25,000∠soldiers, which is roughly equal to the size of one of∠Highland's Armies. The enemy has four armies in total, of∠which the 1st, 3rd, and 4th are deployed against us.∨The 3rd Army under Kiba lost 2/3 of its forces in∠yesterday's battle, but Highland's remaining forces could∠easily overwhelm this castle in a coordinated assault."},{"id":1006040268,"text":"So basically we've become a big enough nuisance that they're∠really going try to stamp us out for good."},{"id":1006040269,"text":"Tinto is fortifying its borders, but won't reveal its∠intentions. We've sent a number of messengers, but have∠received no response thus far."},{"id":1006040271,"text":"So Greenhill is in Highland's clutches, Matilda is the same∠as before, and Tinto is givin' us the cold shoulder.∨There's no one else to turn to, so this could be it, huh..."},{"id":1006040272,"text":"We're running out of time. Now that he is king, Luca Blight∠will order the attack as soon as he returns to the front."},{"id":1006040274,"text":"Well, how about we ask my old man?"},{"id":1006040275,"text":"What're you doing here?!"},{"id":1006040276,"text":"Hey, Apple, how've you been? Mmm... You look more∠womanly every time I see you."},{"id":1006040277,"text":"And who might you be?"},{"id":1006040278,"text":"Well, let's just say that I'm an old friend of Apple's."},{"id":1006040279,"text":"S-Stop talking nonsense!"},{"id":1006040280,"text":"Hahaha, still playin' hard to get, eh, Apple?"},{"id":1006040281,"text":"We're in the middle of an important meeting. You and she∠can reminisce when we're finished. Now please leave∠immediately."},{"id":1006040282,"text":"H-Hey, hold on a minute! Just hear me out. My father is..."},{"id":1006040283,"text":"General Ridley, please wait a moment."},{"id":1006040284,"text":"This is serious business. We hardly need the help of some∠trespassing rapscallion's old man."},{"id":1006040285,"text":"Now wait a minute! Get your hands off me!"},{"id":1006040286,"text":"My dad's the president of the Toran Republic!"},{"id":1006040287,"text":"What nonsense is this?"},{"id":1006040288,"text":"No, please wait. That part at least is true... He really is∠the son of President Lepant...despite how he acts."},{"id":1006040290,"text":"Hey, Viktor, Flik! Long time no see."},{"id":1006040291,"text":"Hey, Viktor, Flik! Long time no see. I've heard all about∠you guys from my dad and Apple."},{"id":1006040292,"text":"What's the Toran Republic?"},{"id":1006040293,"text":"To the south of the City-States once existed the mighty∠Scarlet Moon Empire, a foe we have crossed swords with∠many times over the years.∨The Toran Republic is the new nation that arose when the∠last emperor, Barbarossa, was toppled.∨Though Toran's first president is a man by the name of∠Lepant, I have heard that the seat was initially meant for∠♂⑩, the hero who vanquished Barbarossa."},{"id":1006040294,"text":"Hmm. Allying with the Toran Republic certainly isn't a∠bad idea."},{"id":1006040295,"text":"I-It's a terrible idea! The Scarlet Moon Empire may have∠changed its name, but they're still the enemy of all the∠City-States. How can you think of cooperating with such∠a vile nation?"},{"id":1006040296,"text":"Listen, the Scarlet Moon Empire is gone. We're the Toran∠Republic now."},{"id":1006040297,"text":"The Toran Republic is not the Scarlet Moon Empire of old,∠much as our ♂② Army is not that of the∠City-States. I can think of no reason for us not to form∠an alliance with them.∨What do you think, Commander?"},{"id":1006040298,"text":"An alliance it is."},{"id":1006040299,"text":"Let's consider our other options."},{"id":1006040300,"text":"A wise decision! The City-States should be able to settle∠this without any outside help."},{"id":1006040301,"text":"However, we do not have any other viable options."},{"id":1006040302,"text":"Commander, this may be our only hope. Let's seek an alliance∠with the Toran Republic."},{"id":1006040303,"text":"I'm all for it too, but how're we gonna get to Toran? I came∠to Highland by boat, but please don't tell me you're∠thinking of crossing the badlands to the south of here.∨No person in their right mind would attempt that."},{"id":1006040304,"text":"Is that so? I musta crossed 'em at least three times now."},{"id":1006040305,"text":"Yeah, and I almost died each time."},{"id":1006040306,"text":"Freed, surely you know a way?"},{"id":1006040307,"text":"Well, yes... There is a way to reach the Toran Republic from∠Radat, the town just east of South Window."},{"id":1006040308,"text":"Okay, it's settled then."},{"id":1006040309,"text":"Forgive me, but I simply can't do it."},{"id":1006040310,"text":"Oh, get over it! You can't live in the past forever.∠Without their help, South Window itself could be destroyed!"},{"id":1006040311,"text":"...Alright.∨Commander ♂㈱, I will accompany you as a∠guide. Let us depart for Radat."},{"id":1006040312,"text":"I'll go too. Things will go smoother that way, eh?"},{"id":1006040313,"text":"Please, Commander ♂㈱, we're in desperate need∠of allies. You must forge an alliance with the Toran∠Republic."},{"id":1006040314,"text":"I must beg a favor from you, Commander ♂㈱.∨Before we go to Radat, can we stop in South Window? Well,∠it's just a selfish request, not an absolute necessity,∠but still, please."},{"id":1006040315,"text":"Now, please accept this, ♂㈱, as a token of∠friendship between the ♂② Army and the Toran∠Republic."},{"id":1006040316,"text":"This is the Blinking Mirror, one of our national treasures.∠It was used in the Liberation War, but now I suspect∠that you have more need of it than we do.∨With this mirror you can return to your castle whenever you∠wish.∨In the absence of its rightful owner, I respectfully lend∠this mirror to the ♂② Army. Please accept it."},{"id":1006040317,"text":"You received the Blinking Mirror."},{"id":1006050001,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, if we take the mountain path∠from this village, we'll arrive in the Toran Republic."},{"id":1006050002,"text":"Hey, who are you? Where do you think you're going?"},{"id":1006050003,"text":"We are on our way to the Toran Republic."},{"id":1006050004,"text":"Then it seems we have a problem. I am Varkas, captain of the∠Border Patrol. I cannot allow outsiders to pass through∠here.∨On what business do you seek to enter Toran?"},{"id":1006050005,"text":"Chill out, Varkas.∨This is ♂㈱, the leader of∠the ♂② Army. He just needs to see my dad."},{"id":1006050006,"text":"I understand the situation. But I can't let citizens of the∠City-States freely enter the Republic.∨Allow me to escort you to Gregminster, the capital of the∠Toran Republic."},{"id":1006050007,"text":"Really? That works for me. How about it, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1006050009,"text":"That won't do at all."},{"id":1006050010,"text":"Then come along this way."},{"id":1006050011,"text":"Thanks, Varkas."},{"id":1006050012,"text":"Yes, well, I'm sure President Lepant will be quite \"thrilled\"∠to see you too."},{"id":1006050013,"text":"Then I'll have to ask you to leave."},{"id":1006050014,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. ∠Have you changed your mind?"},{"id":1006050015,"text":"Yeah."},{"id":1006050016,"text":"No."},{"id":1006050017,"text":"Thank you very much, Captain Varkas. We can handle it∠ourselves from here."},{"id":1006050018,"text":"Please be careful. If we lose one of our Six Great Generals,∠it will hurt the reputation of the Republic."},{"id":1006050019,"text":"Indeed. Well then, let us hurry, Commander."},{"id":1006050020,"text":"Thank you very much, Captain Varkas. We'll be fine on our∠own from here."},{"id":1006050021,"text":"I understand. Please be careful."},{"id":1006050022,"text":"I will, thank you. Well, let's hurry, Commander."},{"id":1006050023,"text":"Hey, hey, look at me! Cool, huh? My mom made this! I'm the∠big hero General ♂㈱! He's the hero who took∠care of those Highland dogs!∨Hey, wait... Oh, I get it, you like General ♂㈱∠too, huh?∨Hey, hey, mister, have you ever actually seen him in person?"},{"id":1006050025,"text":"Ah, wait a second. You can't go any further.∨He needs his rest, so...I'd rather he just get lots of peace∠and quiet for now. So please, don't go any further."},{"id":1006050026,"text":"Hey, wanna hear somethin' cool? There's this guy that's∠been staying at our inn, and all he does is fish in the pond∠back there.∨He says his name's \"♂⑩,\" but I was thinking...∠what if he's really General ♂㈱?!"},{"id":1006050027,"text":"Hey, wanna hear somethin' cool? There's this guy that's∠been staying at our inn, and all he does is fish in the pond∠back there.∨I snuck a peek at the guest register, and it said∠♂⑩! Can you believe it?! He's the general who∠beat Luca Blight, General ♂㈱!"},{"id":1006050028,"text":"What's up? Aha! I get it, that guy with the scar on his∠cheek told you to go away, huh?∨Hey, mister...do you want to meet General ♂㈱∠that bad?"},{"id":1006050029,"text":"Yeah."},{"id":1006050030,"text":"Huh? Not really..."},{"id":1006050031,"text":"C'mon, don't be scared. He looks like a lot like you,∠actually."},{"id":1006050032,"text":"I knew it! You wanna meet General ♂㈱, right?"},{"id":1006050033,"text":"Okay then, how's this? I'll run up the hill and yell,∠\"Help!\"∨I'm pretty sure that guy with the scar on his cheek will∠freak out and come running. Then that'll be your chance to∠go see ♂㈱!∨I'll sneak back into my house while you're there. Oh yeah, ∠I live in the inn over there."},{"id":1006050034,"text":"Okay then, how's this? I'll run up the hill and yell,∠\"Help!!!\"∨I'm pretty sure my sister Ellie will freak out and come∠running. When she's gone, go see ♂㈱!∨I'll sneak back into my house, of course. Oh yeah, I live∠in the inn over there."},{"id":1006050035,"text":"Ah, I'm sorry, but if you could just wait a little bit∠longer..."},{"id":1006050036,"text":"Oh, um, please wait a moment. I beg your pardon, but you∠can't come this way right now. I hope you don't mi—"},{"id":1006050037,"text":"Help!!! Somebody, anybody!!! Hey, I mean you over there,∠mister! Help!!!"},{"id":1006050038,"text":"Wh-What's that? Wait, that voice... Is it the boy from the∠inn?"},{"id":1006050039,"text":"How many times do I have to tell you? You mustn't bother∠him."},{"id":1006050040,"text":"Ah, wait a second. You can't go any further.∨He needs his rest, so...I'd rather he just get lots of peace∠and quiet for now. So please, don't—"},{"id":1006050041,"text":"Help!!! Somebody, anybody!!! Ellie!!! Help!!!"},{"id":1006050042,"text":"Oh! Oh no! That voice... Is that Ko?!"},{"id":1006050043,"text":"Can you come with me for a moment?"},{"id":1006050044,"text":"You're—"},{"id":1006050045,"text":"Y-Young commander! I've been looking everywhere for you!∠Something terrible has happened!!!"},{"id":1006050046,"text":"Ah! Sir ♂⑩! Please, save Ko!!!"},{"id":1006050047,"text":"Y-Young commander! It's an emergency! Please, come this way!"},{"id":1006050048,"text":"Sir ♂⑩! Please, I beg you. Help us!∠Ko is...! He's...!"},{"id":1006050049,"text":"I told him... I told him never to go up into the hills..."},{"id":1006050050,"text":"With this war dragging on, even the mountain bandits can't∠make a livin'. Guess maybe they turned to kidnappin' now..."},{"id":1006050051,"text":"N-No, please..."},{"id":1006050052,"text":"Are you sure about that?"},{"id":1006050053,"text":"We have to save him..."},{"id":1006050054,"text":"O-Of course! I saw it with my own eyes!"},{"id":1006050055,"text":"Yes! I saw it with my own eyes!"},{"id":1006050056,"text":"Young commander, we must help! Snatching children for money is∠unthinkable! Unforgivable!!!"},{"id":1006050057,"text":"Please, Commander ♂⑩, save Ko!"},{"id":1006050058,"text":"Young commander...∨Ted and his grandfather both gave their lives to protect∠the Soul Eater.∨I can't believe the rune itself is evil. So please, Young∠Master, let's go."},{"id":1006050059,"text":"I beg you, Sir ♂⑩. I...I know who you are.∠You're the hero from the war.∨I got separated from my father and Ko during the war with∠the Scarlet Moon Empire.∨But then I met a woman named Marie who looked after me∠and let me work at her inn.∨So, I, too, fought in that war.∨To you, I'm probably just one of your many followers, but∠to me, you're very, very important.∨So I beg of you. Please...∠Please save Ko."},{"id":1006050060,"text":"Okay, let's go!"},{"id":1006050061,"text":"I-I..."},{"id":1006050062,"text":"Young commander! As always, I will be joining you! Surely∠that's okay, right? Um..."},{"id":1006050063,"text":"Ah, ♂㈱, is it? It's okay if I join you,∠isn't it?"},{"id":1006050064,"text":"Ah, ♂㈱, is it? Wait... How odd that you have∠the same name as the young commander.∨It's okay if I join you, though, right, ♂㈱?∠Oh dear, this is going to take some getting used to..."},{"id":1006050065,"text":"Me too! I'm coming too!"},{"id":1006050066,"text":"You can't be serious, Ellie, you're no—"},{"id":1006050067,"text":"It's all right, father. I may not look it, but I've fought∠alongside Sir ♂⑩ before.∨It's okay, isn't it? Um..."},{"id":1006050068,"text":"Let's see...♂㈱, is it? It's okay with you if∠I come along, right?"},{"id":1006050069,"text":"Let's see...♂㈱, is it? What? You have the same∠name as Sir ♂⑩...∨Do lots of great people have the same name, I wonder?∠Anyway...it's okay with you if I come along, right?"},{"id":1006050070,"text":"Young commander, ♂㈱! If we don't hurry up,∠we'll lose the bandits' trail!"},{"id":1006050071,"text":"Please, Sir ♂⑩, ♂㈱! If we don't∠hurry, we'll lose the bandits' trail! Please... We∠must save Ko!"},{"id":1006050072,"text":"Let's hurry, Young commander! We don't know what the bandits∠might have planned!"},{"id":1006050073,"text":"Hurry, Sir ♂⑩! We have to save Ko!"},{"id":1006050074,"text":"You can't be serious, Ellie, you're no—"},{"id":1006050075,"text":"It's all right, father. I may not look it, but I've fought∠alongside Sir ♂⑩ before.∨Isn't that right?"},{"id":1006050076,"text":"Heh! Who the hell're you chumps?! Don't tell me, yer here∠for this little snotnose, ain'tcha?"},{"id":1006050077,"text":"We beg you, release the child!"},{"id":1006050078,"text":"I beg you, please release Ko!"},{"id":1006050079,"text":"Heh! If you think I'm just gonna say, \"Why yes, here he is,\"∠and give 'im back, you idiots must be dumber than you look!"},{"id":1006050080,"text":"You might regret those words, sir."},{"id":1006050081,"text":"Are you sure about that? You're gonna regret saying those∠things a whooole lot in second!"},{"id":1006050082,"text":"Regret? Hahaha, and how ya gonna make us do that? Hm?∠Don't tell me you mean those fools behind you?"},{"id":1006050083,"text":"So, you decided to come after all!"},{"id":1006050084,"text":"Oh, you came!"},{"id":1006050085,"text":"Wait a second... Don't tell me all you saps are here to get∠the kid back, too?"},{"id":1006050086,"text":"Let Ko go!!!"},{"id":1006050087,"text":"I didn't say that."},{"id":1006050088,"text":"Heh! Get a load of this! A kid askin' for a kid. Hahahaha!"},{"id":1006050089,"text":"Huh? Then run along home, runt! I think I hear yer mommy∠callin' to say it's nap time! Wahahahahaha!"},{"id":1006050090,"text":"Huh? Hey, you guys are supposed to laugh too."},{"id":1006050091,"text":"Uh, B-Boss? That guy, he's..."},{"id":1006050092,"text":"What? Your friend or somethin'?"},{"id":1006050093,"text":"N-No, Boss, it's not that. He's..."},{"id":1006050094,"text":"N-Now that ya mention it... I think I've seen that other∠guy too..."},{"id":1006050095,"text":"What? Am I missing somethin'? Are they famous? All I see is∠a couple of brats in need of a lesson. Who're you sayin'∠they are?"},{"id":1006050096,"text":"This kid... He's the leader of the ♂② Army..."},{"id":1006050097,"text":"Huh? The ♂② Army... Wait, you mean the∠guys that took out Luca Blight?!"},{"id":1006050098,"text":"A-And the other guy was the leader of the Liberation Army∠that founded the Toran Republic..."},{"id":1006050099,"text":"Liberation Army... You mean the ones who took down the∠Scarlet Moon Empire?!"},{"id":1006050100,"text":"Y-Ya gotta be kiddin' me..."},{"id":1006050101,"text":"B-Boss..."},{"id":1006050102,"text":"E-Enough quiverin' in your boots, you slackjaws! Get 'em!!!"},{"id":1006050103,"text":"B-But..."},{"id":1006050104,"text":"Eeeyaaahhh!!!"},{"id":1006050105,"text":"We don't stand a chance!!!"},{"id":1006050106,"text":"Well, I think you're certainly beginning to regret your∠words now. Hand Ko over to us immediately."},{"id":1006050107,"text":"Ha, starting to regret all that tough talk earlier? Get moving."},{"id":1007010008,"text":"Yeah, yeah."},{"id":1007010009,"text":"Good morning, people of Tinto, and most especially to you,∠Lord Gustav.∨This gorgeous weather has me in a positively jubilant mood."},{"id":1007010010,"text":"So it really was you, Neclord!!!"},{"id":1007010011,"text":"Dear me, aren't you the stubborn one."},{"id":1007010012,"text":"Bastard! Why've you joined forces with the Highland Army?!"},{"id":1007010013,"text":"Joined forces? With the Highland Army? No, no, it has∠nothing to do with that.∨I simply thought how nice it would be to create my very own∠kingdom nestled here in the mountains.∨On that note, Lord Gustav, citizens of Tinto, I'd like to∠ask that you all leave now. Or of course you may stay and∠become my loyal zombie subjects."},{"id":1007010014,"text":"You think I'm going to let you make our city into a kingdom∠of zombies?!"},{"id":1007010015,"text":"Oh come now, let's not be unreasonable. I was hoping to∠avoid overpopulating my undead realm, but if you insist on∠pressing the issue I suppose I have no choice.∨A frontal assault it is, hahahahahahahaha!"},{"id":1007010016,"text":"Stop there!!!"},{"id":1007010017,"text":"Dammit! Hey, you men! Don't let them leave here alive! Er,∠they're already dead, so...∨Bah, whatever! Just hack them to pieces!!!"},{"id":1007010018,"text":"Yes, sir!"},{"id":1007010019,"text":"Psh! Like a bunch of zombies can beat us!"},{"id":1007010020,"text":"Lord Jess?! What is the meaning of this?"},{"id":1007010021,"text":"We're making an assault. The zombies are controlled by∠Neclord's magic. Defeat him and we destroy the whole horde."},{"id":1007010022,"text":"So you know where Neclord's holed up?!"},{"id":1007010023,"text":"Of course. We have dispatched spies throughout the land for∠some time now to help rebuild our army.∨Many of these agents were caught by Highland∠and lost their lives, but they were all∠fighting for Muse nevertheless.∨One of them discovered the location of Neclord's lair."},{"id":1007010024,"text":"And what if they got it wrong?"},{"id":1007010025,"text":"A brave, loyal soldier of Muse risked death to deliver∠this information to us. There is no way it can be wrong!"},{"id":1007010026,"text":"Idiot! You're gonna stake your lives on that?!"},{"id":1007010027,"text":"Hauser. Give the signal to deploy."},{"id":1007010028,"text":"All troops, move out. Neclord is our sole target!"},{"id":1007010029,"text":"Lord Hauser. Surely, you, a great general of Muse, must know∠that this strategy is a risky gambit."},{"id":1007010030,"text":"I do. But the orders must be obeyed."},{"id":1007010031,"text":"Why be so rigid, Lord Hauser?"},{"id":1007010032,"text":"I am a soldier of Muse. Lady Anabelle is no longer alive,∠and according to Muse law, Lord Jess is the acting mayor∠until her replacement is chosen.∨As long as Muse still exists, so do its laws. A soldier∠should not act on personal feelings.∨Soldiers risk their lives in battle, so law is the only∠reason I will ever act as a soldier."},{"id":1007010033,"text":"Even if that leads to the loss of your own life?"},{"id":1007010034,"text":"Correct."},{"id":1007010035,"text":"That was rash of Lord Jess..."},{"id":1007010036,"text":"An army of 5,000 will not be able to break through∠Neclord's forces. Given the situation, we must take the∠field as well."},{"id":1007010037,"text":"But what if Jess was misinformed?"},{"id":1007010038,"text":"If Lord Jess is defeated, Neclord will have 5,000 new∠zombie recruits.∨Such an outcome would spell our doom, so we have no choice∠but to join Lord Jess in his plan."},{"id":1007010039,"text":"We cannot simply allow Lord Hauser to march off to his death∠either."},{"id":1007010040,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we will lead the army and go∠after Lord Jess. You stay here and protect Tinto.∨Viktor, please see to the Commander's safety."},{"id":1007010041,"text":"Do you have a death wish or somethin'?"},{"id":1007010042,"text":"I don't want to die, but if we leave the Muse soldiers to their ∠fates, it will be a fatal blow for the ♂② Army."},{"id":1007010043,"text":"Hear that, Koyu? We're goin' too!"},{"id":1007010044,"text":"You got it, Boss!"},{"id":1007010045,"text":"Hey, c'mon, what happened? What's wrong?"},{"id":1007010046,"text":"Apparently a mine tunnel collapsed. A few people went∠inside to see what happened, but none of them ever came∠back. Maybe there was gas too?"},{"id":1007010047,"text":"None of them came back... Sounds fishy to me. Let's go check∠it out, ♂㈱."},{"id":1007010048,"text":"N-No! ◎2No, no, no!!!"},{"id":1007010049,"text":"Gotta go. Gotta go. C'mon, ♂㈱.∨Huh? ♂㈱?"},{"id":1007010050,"text":"♂㈱! ♂㈱! ∠What's wrong, ♂㈱?!"},{"id":1007010051,"text":"♂㈱! It's okay! You'll be fine! I'll protect you!!!"},{"id":1007010052,"text":"Phew, we're finally above ground."},{"id":1007010053,"text":"It's great we made it this far, but where the hell is∠Neclord?"},{"id":1007010054,"text":"Knowing him, he'll have set up roost in the best spot in the∠city. Let's track him down, but take care not to get caught∠by any of his undead minions while we're at it."},{"id":1007010055,"text":"He's in here, I think. I can feel the power of the Moon∠Rune..."},{"id":1007010056,"text":"Father!!!"},{"id":1007010057,"text":"Lilly, you're safe!!!"},{"id":1007010058,"text":"I was so scared..."},{"id":1007010059,"text":"Marlowe, what are you doing here?"},{"id":1007010060,"text":"This person is a knight who came to save me."},{"id":1007010061,"text":"What?"},{"id":1007010062,"text":"Ah, Lo Wen, you're alright!!!"},{"id":1007010063,"text":"No thanks to you, idiot!!! Koyu came to help, but you were∠probably loafing around somewhere!"},{"id":1007010065,"text":"Commander ♂㈱!"},{"id":1007010066,"text":"♂㈱, you're unharmed. Lord Jess rallied the ∠remaining soldiers from Muse, so we were able∠to exterminate the rest of the zombies."},{"id":1007010067,"text":"♂㈱... You defeated Neclord and freed Tinto.∨Why? Why would you do that?"},{"id":1007010068,"text":"I don't want to run away anymore."},{"id":1007010070,"text":"I see."},{"id":1007010071,"text":"I...see."},{"id":1007010072,"text":"Hauser, I lost a lot of soldiers due to my own poor∠judgment. Lady Anabelle's last request was for Muse and the∠City-States to be safeguarded.∨But I have realized I can't handle that responsibility.∠Thus, I'm stepping down as acting mayor of Muse City.∨Under Muse law, the next acting mayor will be Fitcher.∨I hear that he is in the ♂② Army now. You∠should join the ♂② Army, too."},{"id":1007010073,"text":"And what of you, Lord Jess?"},{"id":1007010074,"text":"I can't stay here."},{"id":1007010075,"text":"Lord Jess. Let me say this to you as a friend who fought∠by your side. You, too, should take up arms under the banner∠of the ♂② Army.∨Commander ♂㈱ and you have been pursuing the∠same goal. You shouldn't part ways for such foolish reasons."},{"id":1007010076,"text":"Let's fight...together."},{"id":1007010077,"text":"...I won't fight alongside him."},{"id":1007010079,"text":"Well, I'll be leaving then."},{"id":1007010080,"text":"...Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1007010081,"text":"Let me ask you one thing. Think back...∨Lady Anabelle liked you a lot. She was happy that Genkaku's∠son had stepped forth.∨Are you sure you're not betraying her faith in you?"},{"id":1007010082,"text":"I'm not betraying anything."},{"id":1007010083,"text":"I can't tell you that."},{"id":1007010085,"text":"I believed in Lady Anabelle and to this very day have been∠fighting for Muse and the City-States.∨Thus...I may have misdirected my anger at losing her∠towards you.∨Now that Lady Anabelle is gone, I have to live by my own∠conscience, perhaps.∨Commander ♂㈱, I'm sorry for any disrespect I∠may have shown. Will you let me fight with you?"},{"id":1007010086,"text":"Lord Jess."},{"id":1007010087,"text":"I see..."},{"id":1007010088,"text":"W-Wait. You see, ♂㈱ fought the Highland Army∠for everyone. That much at least is really true!"},{"id":1007010092,"text":"Father!!!"},{"id":1007010095,"text":"Ah, Miss Lilly, it's so good to see you're safe."},{"id":1007010096,"text":"Hey, Lo Wen, you're alive!"},{"id":1007010097,"text":"Sister Lo Wen!"},{"id":1007010098,"text":"You two idiots, what are you doing?! You're a disgrace to∠Mt. Lampdragon!"},{"id":1007010099,"text":"S-Sorry..."},{"id":1007010100,"text":"How odd. According to the letter, it's this way. And yet...∠Oh, Jeane..."},{"id":1007010101,"text":"Strange... Everyone I ask says they've never heard of such a∠castle. Can any keep be so small that it's completely∠unknown?"},{"id":1007010102,"text":"Oh, who might you be? I'm Raura. I stopped by my friend∠Jeane's home, but couldn't find her... We are in Two River∠City, aren't we?"},{"id":1007010103,"text":"If you're looking for Jeane, she's at our castle."},{"id":1007010104,"text":"Actually, this isn't Two River..."},{"id":1007010105,"text":"I dunno."},{"id":1007010106,"text":"Oh, you know Jeane? I'm her friend Raura. I came here∠because Jeane wanted me to perform the secret art of∠scroll-making."},{"id":1007010107,"text":"Dear me... You're the leader of the ♂② Army?∠That must mean Jeane is at ♂① Castle.∨Can you tell me where it is?"},{"id":1007010108,"text":"I see... Thank you. I've marked it on the map, so I should∠be okay. Sorry, but it seems I'll be troubling you for a∠bit, heehee."},{"id":1007010109,"text":"Now, let's see, according to this map..."},{"id":1007010110,"text":"Thank you for being so helpful. Seriously, though... Where∠did I make a wrong turn?"},{"id":1007010111,"text":"I'm at a complete loss... How did I end up back here again?"},{"id":1007010112,"text":"Well, it figures. It was never going to be that easy, was it?"},{"id":1007010113,"text":"Well, I give up. I went right to where the map says too..."},{"id":1007010114,"text":"Yes? You're the leader of the ♂② Army?∨If you're looking for the boss, I mean the mayor, he's in∠the big building up above here."},{"id":1007010115,"text":"Best steer clear of the mine, kid. They're jam-packed with∠dangers that'll leave you dead as a doornail."},{"id":1007010116,"text":"This your first time in Tinto?∠It's basically a mine with a city attached, so we got∠plenty of stuff here that you can't find anywhere else."},{"id":1007010117,"text":"They say the bandits of the Lampdragon Mountain got wiped∠out. Not like we care, though."},{"id":1007010118,"text":"What you looking at, sonny? Never seen one of these before?∠It takes the dirt we don't need and carries it away."},{"id":1007010119,"text":"A strange-looking woman named Raura came up to me and∠asked where Two River is.∨But when I told her, she went in the exact opposite∠direction."},{"id":1007010120,"text":"You can see way into the distance if you stand here. Tinto's∠surrounded by mountains, but to us it's our lovely∠hometown."},{"id":1007010121,"text":"If you're lookin' for the mayor, he's here in the Guild∠Hall."},{"id":1007010122,"text":"This contraption was made by some crackpot named Adlai∠a few years back. It's pretty dangerous, so I'd stay back if I∠were you."},{"id":1007010123,"text":"Only members of the Miner's Guild can enter the mountain.∠This ain't no place for kids."},{"id":1007010124,"text":"We mainly get iron from this mine, but every so often∠we get a smidgen of silver too."},{"id":1007010125,"text":"Boss Gustav is a gruff guy who's only nice to his daughter∠and mining tools, so if you don't treat either of 'em right∠you're liable to get a real thrashing."},{"id":1007010126,"text":"This church was built to pray for safety within the mine,∠but the kinda people working here... Well, let's just say∠they don't use it much."},{"id":1007010127,"text":"I-I sure hope everything will be okay..."},{"id":1007010128,"text":"It's gonna take more than a bunch of walking stiffs to beat∠us."},{"id":1007010129,"text":"Alright, time to get to work. We have a new tunnel to dig∠today, so that means we need to get started bright and∠early."},{"id":1007010134,"text":"Good morning."},{"id":1007010136,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, it's dangerous outside. Let's∠put all our effort into protecting this place.∨I'll look after things here, so please patrol the city!"},{"id":1007010137,"text":"W-Wait a minute, ♂㈱. Everyone's waiting∠downstairs. C'mon, let's hurry."},{"id":1007010160,"text":"☆0∠             Iron Bucket"},{"id":1007010164,"text":"☆0∠         Bucket with a Hole"},{"id":1007010166,"text":"☆0∠    Hand Cart for Hauling Ore"},{"id":1007010170,"text":"☆0∠    Hand Cart for Hauling Ore∠      The wheels are broken."},{"id":1007010171,"text":"☆0∠  Hand Cart Leaned Against Something"},{"id":1007010176,"text":"☆0∠    Barrel of Medicinal Herbs"},{"id":1007010178,"text":"☆0∠             Barrel of Ore"},{"id":1007010179,"text":"☆0∠         Worn-Out Shovel"},{"id":1007010181,"text":"☆0∠      Shovel for Digging Ore"},{"id":1007010183,"text":"☆0∠            Two Shovels"},{"id":1007010184,"text":"☆0∠         Discarded Shovel"},{"id":1007010187,"text":"☆0∠            Two Pickaxes"},{"id":1007010188,"text":"☆0∠               Pickaxe"},{"id":1007010189,"text":"☆0∠   Set of Tools for Mining Ore"},{"id":1007010191,"text":"☆0∠       Pot Filled with Water"},{"id":1007010192,"text":"☆0∠               Dirty Pot"},{"id":1007010194,"text":"☆0∠  Pot of Water for Washing Hands"},{"id":1007010198,"text":"☆0∠              Pot of Ore"},{"id":1007010203,"text":"☆0∠             Coiled Rope"},{"id":1007010205,"text":"☆0∠          Discarded Rope"},{"id":1007010206,"text":"☆0∠         Hand Cart of Ore"},{"id":1007010209,"text":"☆0∠         Hand Cart of Ore◎5∨What's this shiny thing?"},{"id":1007010211,"text":"☆0∠          Mine Tool Shed∠          It's locked."},{"id":1007010221,"text":"Who the hell is that nasty creep?"},{"id":1007010224,"text":"Heh, any monster that slow ain't gonna be a problem."},{"id":1007010226,"text":"That woman Raura is back again."},{"id":1007010228,"text":"This is the hall of the Miner's Guild. Boss Gustav is the∠guildmaster."},{"id":1007020001,"text":"Viktor, you go first."},{"id":1007020002,"text":"What gives?! You expecting trouble?"},{"id":1007020003,"text":"Hmph, I sensed something was off. That Neclord and his∠boorish traps."},{"id":1007020004,"text":"Y-You nasty old..."},{"id":1007020005,"text":"Oh, please. You survived, didn't you?"},{"id":1007020006,"text":"Grr... Dammit."},{"id":1007020007,"text":"Okay, let's keep moving. There's no use defying Lady Sierra."},{"id":1007020008,"text":"Hey, nope! No way! You aren't allowed past this point!"},{"id":1007020009,"text":"Are you guys crazy? It's way too dangerous in there. In∠fact, we were just makin' a run for it ourselves. So go on,∠get outta here!"},{"id":1007020010,"text":"Are you thick-headed or something? I told you to run! I∠swear, who's so curious that they'd want to explore a death∠trap like this?"},{"id":1007020014,"text":"GFRAW GFRAWRRRR, GFRAWRRRRR..."},{"id":1007020015,"text":"Use an orb."},{"id":1007020016,"text":"Don't use an orb."},{"id":1007020017,"text":"GRRRROOAAANNN!!!"},{"id":1007020018,"text":"GFRAAWWWWW..."},{"id":1007020022,"text":"GRRROOOAAANNN... RRRRR, GFARRRRRRR."},{"id":1007020025,"text":"GRRRROOAAANNN!!!"},{"id":1007020026,"text":"GRRROOANN!!!"},{"id":1007020027,"text":"Hahahahaha, my name is Mazus! I am a great sorcerer,∠unmatched by any in my generation. That's right.∨What am I doing here?∠I suppose you wouldn't be able to understand.∠I am letting my thoughts flow in this dark, pure cave.∨This is the path to true mystical might."},{"id":1007020028,"text":"Sorry. I'm not taking any apprentices at the moment."},{"id":1007020030,"text":"I wish you good luck."},{"id":1007020031,"text":"As do I to you, my fellow wielder of great power."},{"id":1007020032,"text":"Hmm... ◎5 The ♂② Army, eh...∨Not just yet. That time has not arrived. I shall remain here∠meditating for now."},{"id":1007020033,"text":"Hmm... ◎5 The ♂② Army, eh...∨I hear that my archrival, Crowley, has ventured into the∠world once more. Perhaps the time has come.∨Most of all, I'd like a place to test my abilities. So be∠it, ♂㈱. The great sorcerer Mazus is henceforth∠your ally!∨You should be thankful!!!"},{"id":1007020034,"text":"Now then, it has been some time since I dabbled in worldly∠affairs. I believe some practice is in order."},{"id":1007030001,"text":"Don't worry, ♂㈱. You're okay, you're okay.∠Come on, come on, open your eyes."},{"id":1007030002,"text":"Hm? Looks like he's awake."},{"id":1007030003,"text":"Really? Really?"},{"id":1007030004,"text":"What a relief..."},{"id":1007030005,"text":"Where am I?"},{"id":1007030007,"text":"What's wrong? Are you still in a daze?"},{"id":1007030008,"text":"This is the village of Crom, south of Tinto."},{"id":1007030009,"text":"You were asleep for two whole days."},{"id":1007030010,"text":"Your safety is more important than anything, Commander∠♂㈱, but Tinto has fallen into the filthy∠clutches of Neclord."},{"id":1007030011,"text":"The troops we sent out took a real beating. Sounds like∠Klaus and Ridley managed to get out with their skins intact,∠but no one knows where Jess and Hauser are."},{"id":1007030012,"text":"My daughter, Lilly, is also missing... Dammit..."},{"id":1007030013,"text":"Long time no see, Viktor. I haven't seen you in a while∠either, ♂㈱."},{"id":1007030014,"text":"Well, if it isn't Kahn. You after Neclord, too?"},{"id":1007030015,"text":"Well, something like that. I'm after a way to seal Neclord's∠\"soul,\" to put it precisely."},{"id":1007030016,"text":"Seal his soul?"},{"id":1007030017,"text":"Yes. I've learned that even if I make a barrier and you∠destroy his body with the Celestial Sword, Neclord will∠likely regenerate unless his soul is properly contained."},{"id":1007030018,"text":"So, what's the trick?"},{"id":1007030019,"text":"Well... It's not so much a \"trick\" as a person. Someone who∠has the power to do it. This person is also after Neclord,∠and is in Tigermouth Village now.∨I was trailing them, but when I heard that Tinto had fallen∠to Neclord, I came here instead thinking I might find you."},{"id":1007030020,"text":"Alright, sounds like our first order of business is goin' to∠see this person with the power we need."},{"id":1007030021,"text":"Agreed. However... This individual is known to be quite...∠\"difficult,\" so in order to speak with them, try not to∠anger them.∨Tigermouth Village is a short distance south of here."},{"id":1007030022,"text":"♂㈱, as long as Neclord's here, the zombies are∠just gonna keep gettin' back up no matter how many times∠we cut 'em down.∨Let's go see this person Kahn is talkin' about."},{"id":1007030024,"text":"They say Tinto has been overrun by vampires and zombies!∠You're one of them, aren't you?!"},{"id":1007030025,"text":"Yeah! She has to be! What are you doing here, anyway?!∠You spend the whole day holed up in your room at the inn!"},{"id":1007030027,"text":"Hey! Why don't you say something?!"},{"id":1007030028,"text":"Hey, let's just slow down a minute here. What's all the fuss∠about?"},{"id":1007030029,"text":"Get out of here! This hussy is one of them!!!"},{"id":1007030030,"text":"Hm?! Hussy?"},{"id":1007030031,"text":"Yeah! That's right!! This pale wench is way too suspicious!"},{"id":1007030032,"text":"...Pale wench?"},{"id":1007030033,"text":"Stop it already, you're being petty. This little girl..."},{"id":1007030034,"text":"Little girl?"},{"id":1007030035,"text":"Who do you think I am?! In my eyes, the lot of you are∠nothing more than mewling babes!"},{"id":1007030037,"text":"All this yammering has disturbed my sleep. And now∠you will pay..."},{"id":1007030038,"text":"Y-Yikes!!!"},{"id":1007030039,"text":"*yawn*∠Honestly, I'm short enough on sleep as it is..."},{"id":1007030040,"text":"K-Kahn, is she the one?"},{"id":1007030041,"text":"Yes, that's right."},{"id":1007030042,"text":"Lady Sierra, I presume?"},{"id":1007030043,"text":"And who might you gentlemen be? I'm growing drowsy, so if∠you need something, be quick about it."},{"id":1007030044,"text":"I am one of the Marley Clan that has been pursuing Neclord."},{"id":1007030045,"text":"Aha, a vampire hunter.∠You humans have awfully curious hobbies."},{"id":1007030046,"text":"Lady Sierra, I believe you, too, are hunting Neclord, are∠you not?"},{"id":1007030047,"text":"True, as I must retrieve the Moon Rune that he stole.∠We cannot join forces, though.∠Humans only get in the way."},{"id":1007030048,"text":"You're one to talk, vampire."},{"id":1007030049,"text":"You're the Celestial Sword! Why are you here?!"},{"id":1007030050,"text":"Eh, call it a relationship I can't get out of.∠Still, it surprises me to find you in a human village.∠I figured you'd removed yourself from social affairs."},{"id":1007030051,"text":"I'll hear none of that from you, who has taken the guise of∠a sword wielded by human hands."},{"id":1007030052,"text":"Lady Sierra, please, lend us your strength."},{"id":1007030053,"text":"Hmm...∨Very well, I'll test you. And if I find you capable, I'll∠take you with me."},{"id":1007030054,"text":".........∨What's your call, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1007030055,"text":"Let's do it."},{"id":1007030057,"text":"I'll be waiting here, so hurry about your business."},{"id":1007030058,"text":"*big yawn*"},{"id":1007030059,"text":"Weren't you going to wait?!"},{"id":1007030060,"text":"Well, you were taking too long. Are you ready now?"},{"id":1007030061,"text":"Quickly now, attack me."},{"id":1007030062,"text":"Oho, such a brave child."},{"id":1007030063,"text":"My, not bad for a human. What's your name?∠♂㈱?∨Very well, I'll make you first among my servants."},{"id":1007030064,"text":"Oh, th-thanks..."},{"id":1007030065,"text":"Don't mock me."},{"id":1007030066,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please stay calm."},{"id":1007030067,"text":"Ohohoho, now then, take me to Neclord."},{"id":1007030068,"text":"Hmph...∨Anyway, let's get back to Crom Village."},{"id":1007030069,"text":"You made it back, Commander."},{"id":1007030071,"text":"Who is this?"},{"id":1007030072,"text":"Oh yeah, this is..."},{"id":1007030073,"text":"My name is Sierra. I was traveling, a lone woman on the∠road, when these gentle souls assisted me as I was set upon∠by ruffians."},{"id":1007030074,"text":"Oh, that...that must have been terrible."},{"id":1007030075,"text":"It was. Are you a friend of my benefactors? What is your∠name?"},{"id":1007030076,"text":"Y-Yes, I am Klaus..."},{"id":1007030077,"text":"My, what a nice name."},{"id":1007030078,"text":"W-Well, I have to compile a report for Master Shu, so if you∠will excuse me..."},{"id":1007030079,"text":"Hahaha... How adorable."},{"id":1007030080,"text":"Stop seducing our bright young minds."},{"id":1007030081,"text":"Well, anyways, I have grown weary. Sleep calls."},{"id":1007030082,"text":"I believe I'll get some rest too."},{"id":1007030083,"text":"Okay, good night, ♂㈱."},{"id":1007030084,"text":"Yes, ♂㈱? What do you want?"},{"id":1007030085,"text":"Why are you after Neclord, Sierra?"},{"id":1007030087,"text":"How to explain...∨The land we call home is far removed from human∠habitation. We are a race cursed by the Moon Rune. ∠Your kind calls us \"vampires.\"∨But we do not always thirst for human blood. So long as we∠do not seek magical power,∨the nocturnal essence gathered by the Moon Rune is enough∠to sustain us."},{"id":1007030088,"text":"But then someone did the forbidden. Neclord.∠He stole the Moon Rune, which belonged to our entire∠village, for his own selfish purposes.∨Those left in the village had only two choices: attack∠humans and drink their blood, or wait quietly for death...∨Though several chose to become vampires...∠most simply wasted away."},{"id":1007030089,"text":"It was heartbreaking, watching my children wither away∠like that.∨I came to despise my cursed self, for I am the \"Beginning\" ∠and thus cannot die..."},{"id":1007030090,"text":"I must reclaim the Moon Rune. I cannot let that fiend run∠free any longer... Ending him will not bring back∠the souls that were lost, but still..."},{"id":1007030091,"text":"Now, that should sate you. Go on and get some rest."},{"id":1007030092,"text":"Run along. Don't disturb my sleep any longer."},{"id":1007030093,"text":"Then leave quickly. Don't disturb my sleep."},{"id":1007030094,"text":"Is something wrong, Commander? It's quite∠late already."},{"id":1007030095,"text":"Why are you hunting Neclord?"},{"id":1007030097,"text":"Well, let's see... Perhaps to avenge my father...and∠grandfather?∨No, it's not just that anymore. Destroying Neclord has∠become the reason for my existence."},{"id":1007030098,"text":"I've spent half my life pursuing him.∨All people struggle to find value in their own lives. Then∠one day the answer comes.∨The day I destroy Neclord is going to be that day for me."},{"id":1007030099,"text":"Does that answer your question, Commander?"},{"id":1007030100,"text":"It's not good to stay up so late."},{"id":1007030101,"text":"Good night, then, Commander."},{"id":1007030102,"text":"Good morning! Okay, let's get out there and work hard today!"},{"id":1007030103,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. We got big trouble."},{"id":1007030105,"text":"My sweet Lilly and..."},{"id":1007030106,"text":"...My sister, Lo Wen, has been taken by that dirty Neclord."},{"id":1007030107,"text":"My servant, Marlowe, saw two people being taken away.∨The fool got himself left behind and had to wait for a∠chance to escape yesterday. And that's when he saw them..."},{"id":1007030108,"text":"In any case, we gotta act fast because there's no tellin'∠what Neclord's got planned."},{"id":1007030109,"text":"It's because you are all being a pack of sluggards.∠I'd ask that you all remember your duties as∠my servants."},{"id":1007030110,"text":"G-Good morning, Sierra."},{"id":1007030111,"text":"Oh, hello. Good morning, Klaus.∨Um... I'm a bit thirsty. Could you give me something to∠drink?"},{"id":1007030112,"text":"Huh? Y-Yes, of course..."},{"id":1007030114,"text":"Viktor, Sierra, ♂㈱. It's about time we put∠an end to this. Let's sneak into Tinto, where Neclord has∠made his lair."},{"id":1007030115,"text":"Indeed. I slept quite well, so I'm in fine form."},{"id":1007030116,"text":"Okay, but what's our plan? Neclord's got the whole damn city∠hemmed in with zombies."},{"id":1007030117,"text":"In that case, there's a cave east of this village. A wall in∠one of our mining tunnels collapsed before and created an∠opening that connects the tunnel and this cave. It should∠still be there."},{"id":1007030118,"text":"Let's hop to it, ♂㈱. This time we're really∠gonna smash that rotten bloodsucker!"},{"id":1007030119,"text":"Now, let us be off, ♂㈱."},{"id":1007030120,"text":"Huh? The water?"},{"id":1007030121,"text":"Hey, you there! Halt!!!"},{"id":1007030122,"text":"No way! They already found us?!"},{"id":1007030123,"text":"You're spies!"},{"id":1007030124,"text":"What? We're spies?!"},{"id":1007030125,"text":"Don't play innocent with me. Everyone's saying Tinto fell∠because of spies disguised as Muse soldiers!"},{"id":1007030126,"text":"Tinto fell?! No! That can't be true!"},{"id":1007030127,"text":"In any case, let's get you tied up to go see the chief!"},{"id":1007030128,"text":"Say, what's all this commotion?"},{"id":1007030129,"text":"We caught these suspicious characters sneaking about."},{"id":1007030130,"text":"Hey! Commander ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1007030131,"text":"Commander! You're alright!◎1∠What the hell're you boneheads thinkin'?! This here is the∠leader of the ♂② Army!"},{"id":1007030132,"text":"What?! Oh no...∨W-We're so sorry!!!"},{"id":1007030133,"text":"Please accept our apologies. As you can see we're quite a∠remote village, so please forgive our ignorance."},{"id":1007030134,"text":"Commander, we heard that Tinto had suffered a surprise∠attack and were worried, but leave it to you to∠survive!∨I wonder if Viktor and Klaus will be here soon too.∨Who, me? I survived because I'd left Tinto to deliver a∠message for Klaus."},{"id":1007030135,"text":"Huh? Oh? Ah... Yeah."},{"id":1007030136,"text":"Oh! That's right, how rude of me. You guys must be really∠tired.∠Hey Chief, Commander ♂㈱ can use the room I∠was using, can't he?∨It's the biggest room they have, so it's wasted on me.∠This way!"},{"id":1007030137,"text":"Here we are. Nah, we're simple mountain bandits, so comfy∠places like this don't really suit us. Go ahead and use it."},{"id":1007030138,"text":"I don't know... I feel bad. We should sneak out once∠it's night."},{"id":1007030139,"text":"Okay, I think it's time. Remember, try not to make any∠sound walking."},{"id":1007030140,"text":"Marlowe! Is that you?! What happened?"},{"id":1007030141,"text":"Ah, yes. I'm fine. Just a little winded since I had to run."},{"id":1007030142,"text":"Heh, that's why I'm always sayin' you need to work out! The∠only thing a guy can really count on when things get∠dicey is his muscles, see."},{"id":1007030143,"text":"Yes, you're right. You're amazing, Koyu."},{"id":1007030144,"text":"By the way, I'm amazed that you managed to escape!"},{"id":1007030145,"text":"Oh, yes. When the zombies showed up in Tinto, I hid in a∠cabinet and managed to avoid being found.∨Then once it was dark out, I snuck out through one of the∠mine tunnels. Thankfully I had memorized a map of the∠mines and was able to get back aboveground."},{"id":1007030146,"text":"Sounds like you lucked out. Guess those books you're always∠talking about came in handy after all."},{"id":1007030147,"text":"...But when I peeked out of the cabinet...I saw something."},{"id":1007030148,"text":"What?"},{"id":1007030149,"text":"Gustav's daughter Lilly and your sister Lo Wen being taken∠away by Neclord."},{"id":1007030150,"text":"What?! Lo Wen was captured?"},{"id":1007030151,"text":"Hmm... ∠Sounds like running away won't be an option for now. ∠We're both still pretty exhausted, so how about we rest∠tonight?"},{"id":1007030152,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. Oops! Were we being too∠noisy? Sorry 'bout that.∨Actually, this guy Marlowe here just made it to this village∠after escaping Tinto.∨He's three years older than me, but all he does is read∠books, so nobody in Tinto will give him the time of day.∠That's why I was there hangin' out with him."},{"id":1007030153,"text":"Commander, are you alright? Viktor was all in a worry∠looking for you, but I see there was nothing to fear.∨It takes more than a few measly zombies to slay a hero, eh? "},{"id":1007030154,"text":"Okay, we'll get out of here first thing in the morning."},{"id":1007030155,"text":"Ugh, this is terrible. I overslept. What happened? Maybe∠being a sleepyhead is contagious.∨Hey, c'mon, get up, ♂㈱."},{"id":1007030156,"text":"Huh? N-No way! Why are they here?!"},{"id":1007030157,"text":"Let's fight."},{"id":1007030159,"text":"Yeah, good call. We have to save the villagers! Grandpa did∠always used to say that martial arts is to be used in∠defense of something."},{"id":1007030160,"text":"Okay, let's go that way next, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1007030161,"text":"*pant* *pant* There's no end to them."},{"id":1007030162,"text":"Commander!!! Are you alright?!"},{"id":1007030163,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, almost all of the villagers have∠escaped. We should flee from this place too."},{"id":1007030164,"text":"Commander, you gotta run for it! I'll hold 'em off here."},{"id":1007030165,"text":"I-I'll fight too, Koyu. Helping Commander ♂㈱,∠it feels like a story out of a book. I'll...do my best."},{"id":1007030166,"text":"Hah, don't go gettin' in over your head and slowing the∠rest of us down. Now, hurry, Commander."},{"id":1007030167,"text":".........∨I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry."},{"id":1007030168,"text":"I-I guess it is a tad bit scary."},{"id":1007030169,"text":"C'mon, I'm right here. Come get a piece of the youngest of∠the Lampdragon Trio!!!"},{"id":1007030170,"text":"Yeah. Let's go!"},{"id":1007030171,"text":"E-Eek, h-help!!!"},{"id":1007030172,"text":"Wait! Let's help!"},{"id":1007030173,"text":"Let's hurry and get out of here!"},{"id":1007030174,"text":"Okay!!!"},{"id":1007030175,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1007030176,"text":"Eek!!!"},{"id":1007030177,"text":"...Urgh!"},{"id":1007030178,"text":"Whoa, whoa! Wh-What do we do now?!"},{"id":1007030179,"text":"Commander, what are you doing here?! We'll stall the enemy,∠so you need to get out of here fast!!!"},{"id":1007030180,"text":"Huh? But—"},{"id":1007030181,"text":"The fight will still go on even if we die here, but who's∠gonna get rid of Neclord and the Highland Army if you die,∠Commander?!"},{"id":1007030183,"text":"Hah, don't go gettin' in over your head and slowing the rest of ∠us down. Now, hurry, Commander."},{"id":1007030187,"text":"Hey, took ya long enough, ♂㈱. A few days later∠and we woulda have left without ya. Glad ya made it here in∠time, though."},{"id":1007030188,"text":"We're sor—"},{"id":1007030189,"text":"I bet you're beat, ♂㈱! Right?! What say we∠take it easy today, huh? Sounds great, right?!∨You get lotsa rest too, Nanami! We got plenty of fightin' to∠do tomorrow! Wahahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1007030190,"text":"Something is...strange. Viktor barely even gave us a chance∠to speak between all his calls for a bath, dinner, and∠drinks, and now it's already night time.∨But maybe it is better to get some rest. Sleep well,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1007030191,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱."},{"id":1007030192,"text":"Don't feel bad about Ridley. He was a military man, a∠warrior. And warriors die in battle all the time.∨If you're gonna shed tears for Ridley, you're gonna have to∠cry for all the soldiers who have died so far.∨Right now you need to look toward the future. You can save∠the tears for later."},{"id":1007030193,"text":"Another thing, the only ones who know you ran off should be∠me, Klaus, Shu, Flik, and Apple.∨I found the note Nanami left, and I'm also the one who clued∠Shu in and got him to convince ya to come back.∨We haven't said a word to anyone else, so don't you go∠sayin' anything, either. You're the leader of the∠♂② Army, got it?"},{"id":1007030194,"text":"Okay, everything's ready!"},{"id":1007030195,"text":"Wait a minute, please. Um, a rope ladder, lantern, and...∠Oh yeah, can't forget to lock this up."},{"id":1007030196,"text":"Hey, we're going out to battle here. At least try to do it∠with some gusto!"},{"id":1007030197,"text":"U-Uh, yeah. Hey, Koyu, will things really be okay?∨I wonder if I can really be like the knights I read about∠in books..."},{"id":1007030198,"text":"Hey, you just leave that to me! \"All you need is courage in∠your heart and hope in your eyes!\"∨It was you who told me that, remember?"},{"id":1007030199,"text":"Y-Yeah, that's right, but I got that from a story..."},{"id":1007030200,"text":"Look, let's head out before we're spotted! Hang on, Sister∠Lo Wen, I'm coming to save you!"},{"id":1007030201,"text":"Oh... Okay, my turn."},{"id":1007030202,"text":"Lord Gustav, I swear that I will return Miss Lilly to you∠safely.∨Ooh, I've always wanted to say something like that."},{"id":1007030203,"text":"...Let's get moving."},{"id":1007030204,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱! Viktor says it's time to∠head out. We're going to defeat Neclord!"},{"id":1007030205,"text":"There you are, ♂㈱! Once Kahn and Sierra get∠here, we'll hit the road right away."},{"id":1007030206,"text":"I'm ready, but Sierra is..."},{"id":1007030207,"text":"Ah, everyone is here. I am most pleased. It would seem you∠are all beginning to realize your place as my retainers."},{"id":1007030208,"text":"Good morning, Sierra."},{"id":1007030211,"text":"Now, let us be off."},{"id":1007030212,"text":"Wh-Who is she?!"},{"id":1007030213,"text":"Oh, just an old vampire hag..."},{"id":1007030214,"text":"Watch your tongue, Viktor!"},{"id":1007030215,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Lady Sierra is here to help us∠vanquish Neclord. Now, as for how we're going to infiltrate∠Tinto..."},{"id":1007030216,"text":"In that case, there's a cave east of this village. A wall in∠one of our mining tunnels collapsed before and created an∠opening that connects the tunnel and this cave. It should∠still be there."},{"id":1007030217,"text":"In any case, the plan is to sneak into Tinto, demolish∠Neclord, and save Gustav's daughter Lilly and Koyu's sister∠Lo Wen, who have both been captured by the bastard.∨Once their master's gone, the zombies should self-destruct∠on their own."},{"id":1007030218,"text":"Klaus and I will march on Tinto when the time is right.∠Please bring my daughter home safely, Commander."},{"id":1007030219,"text":"Alright, let's move out!"},{"id":1007030231,"text":"Welcome! Soup is our specialty. You can try it at dinner."},{"id":1007030232,"text":"*yawn* Welcome..."},{"id":1007030233,"text":"Step right up, a good trader never rests! All the best∠merchandise will get bought up if they do!"},{"id":1007030235,"text":"Dear me, a visitor? How unusual. As it happens, I was once a∠pretty well-known window maker."},{"id":1007030236,"text":"Oh, a visitor so deep in the mountains? As it happens, I was∠once a pretty well-known window maker.∨Why, if I had a Window Set, I could show you my skill∠right now."},{"id":1007030237,"text":"Oh, a visitor so deep in the mountains? It∠sure does bring back memories..."},{"id":1007030238,"text":"Say, would you be willing to part with this Window Set?∠I'm just feeling a little nostalgic."},{"id":1007030239,"text":"Okay, but join us in exchange."},{"id":1007030240,"text":"Okay, but it'll be 10,000 potch."},{"id":1007030241,"text":"Okay, but it'll be 1,000,000 potch."},{"id":1007030242,"text":"Join you?
