What a surprise.∨Very well then, I'd be happy to help you."},{"id":1007030244,"text":"Now then... I guess it's time to dust off these skills of∠mine."},{"id":1007030245,"text":"Is that right? Well then..."},{"id":1007030246,"text":"Wait, please join us after all."},{"id":1007030247,"text":"Yep, 10,000 potch, please."},{"id":1007030248,"text":"You acquired 10,000 potch."},{"id":1007030249,"text":"Thanks, young fella. I have a great toy now."},{"id":1007030250,"text":"Hey there, young man. How are you doing?"},{"id":1007030251,"text":"Oh, well... I see how it is. Guess I'll just give up on the∠idea."},{"id":1007030253,"text":"Please join us after all."},{"id":1007030254,"text":"I guess 10,000 potch is alright."},{"id":1007030255,"text":"Say, where're you from? Highland? Well, you must be tired∠after coming all this way."},{"id":1007030256,"text":"I work in Tinto, but I'm visiting home now. I'm trying to∠be good to my parents."},{"id":1007030257,"text":"This village survives by trading goods from the mines of∠Tinto for items from the Grasslands west of here."},{"id":1007030258,"text":"Tinto is surrounded by mountains, so not even the Highland∠Army would have an easy time attacking the city."},{"id":1007030259,"text":"Muse, South Window, and now Greenhill... What city will∠fall next?"},{"id":1007030260,"text":"The invasion of the Toran Republic three years ago would've∠succeeded if those wimps from South Window hadn't∠chickened out and run away."},{"id":1007030261,"text":"Tinto City is straight northeast of Crom. There is a mine∠entrance to the east as well, but only members of the∠Miner's Guild are allowed to enter."},{"id":1007030262,"text":"One time we snuck into the mine to the east and heard∠a loud snort! There must be a monster in there."},{"id":1007030263,"text":"I used to be a miner long ago, too, but after being trapped∠in a cave-in, I couldn't bring myself to go back into∠the mountain."},{"id":1007030264,"text":"Grrr..."},{"id":1007030272,"text":"☆0∠      Barrel of Rain Water"},{"id":1007030273,"text":"☆0∠     Barrel of Holly Berries∠       They're moving slightly..."},{"id":1007030274,"text":"☆0∠        Barrel of Rubbish"},{"id":1007030278,"text":"☆0∠               Trailer"},{"id":1007030280,"text":"☆0∠   Rope for Bundling Firewood"},{"id":1007030281,"text":"☆0∠     Pail for Scooping Water"},{"id":1007030291,"text":"☆0∠      Firewood for Heating"},{"id":1007030293,"text":"☆0∠          Piled Baskets"},{"id":1007030294,"text":"☆0∠   Basket for Holding Goods"},{"id":1007030295,"text":"☆0∠     Basket of Holly Berries"},{"id":1007030298,"text":"☆0∠         Box of Cabbage"},{"id":1007030322,"text":"Where did you come from? Highland? Better keep that quiet.∠Lotsa folks around here hate that place."},{"id":1007030323,"text":"Hey! Is it true that Tinto got taken over by monsters?!"},{"id":1007030325,"text":"What? How could those dumb monsters take Tinto from us?"},{"id":1007030326,"text":"Will the zombies come to our village some day, too? If that∠happens..."},{"id":1007030328,"text":"Tinto City is straight northeast of Crom. There is a mine∠entrance to the east as well."},{"id":1007030329,"text":"I went to check again recently and there was another sound.∠But this time it was kind of sad..."},{"id":1007030330,"text":"I hope the guys in the mountains are okay..."},{"id":1007030339,"text":"Now we can finally return to Tinto."},{"id":1007030341,"text":"Even though it was temporary, having Tinto taken from us∠was humiliating."},{"id":1007030342,"text":"The monsters may be gone, but it's no time to rest easy."},{"id":1007030345,"text":"I was caught sneaking into the mine and got yelled at."},{"id":1007030346,"text":"It looks like everyone's okay. That's a relief."},{"id":1007030355,"text":"■"},{"id":1007030357,"text":"After what they did to Muse, I hope every last one of those∠Highland dogs get wiped out."},{"id":1007030358,"text":"They say that King Jowy is a diabolical fiend. Please don't∠lose to someone like that."},{"id":1007030361,"text":"■"},{"id":1007030362,"text":"I don't want to live in the mountains anymore. I'll start a∠new life here."},{"id":1007030373,"text":"I think Tinto should preserve its independence."},{"id":1007030374,"text":"I feel so relieved now that the war is over."},{"id":1007030375,"text":"The last thing in the world I want is to be part of the∠same country as those cowards from South Window."},{"id":1007030386,"text":"Hm, a strong body is the foundation of any great fighter.∠And the foundation of a great body is eating great food."},{"id":1007030387,"text":"Oh! Master! Master!!!"},{"id":1007030388,"text":"Hm? Wakaba? You're not neglecting your training, are you?"},{"id":1007030389,"text":"No, sir!!! Uh, um... M-Master?"},{"id":1007030390,"text":"Hey, where did that jerk go?! Who the hell eats that much∠then just runs off claiming they don't have any money?!"},{"id":1007030392,"text":"Oh! Master! Master!!!"},{"id":1007030393,"text":"Wakaba, I see your training has progressed."},{"id":1007030394,"text":"Y-Yes, sir! As you said, Master, I learn something new every∠day! By the way, Master, just before you were..."},{"id":1007030395,"text":"Well, the legs are the foundation of all martial arts.∠Strengthening them is the most fundamental of all training."},{"id":1007030396,"text":"Wow! That's great! Amazing!"},{"id":1007030397,"text":"Hmph, of course it is..."},{"id":1007030399,"text":"Be silent, Wakaba!"},{"id":1007030400,"text":"Master..."},{"id":1007030401,"text":"I can see that you also lack training in stealth. But tell∠me, Wakaba, who is that with you?"},{"id":1007030402,"text":"Huh? Oh, that's right!"},{"id":1007030403,"text":"I'll introduce you. This is the leader of the ∠♂② Army! He's called ♂㈱ and he∠uses tonfa! He's really strong!"},{"id":1007030405,"text":"Ack! M-Master!!! ♂●-♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1007030406,"text":"Whew... Even I, the great Long Chan-Chan, could not∠find an opening to attack.∨You have found a worthy teacher and trained well, Wakaba!∠Who is this man?"},{"id":1007030407,"text":"I told you before! The leader of the ♂②∠Army,  ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1007030408,"text":"What?! Did you say the ♂② Army?"},{"id":1007030409,"text":"I just said that about a hundred times already!"},{"id":1007030410,"text":"Aye, I see.∠♂㈱, I, Long Chan-Chan, will lend you my aid. ∠I do believe it is time I used my martial art skills for the good ∠of the world."},{"id":1007030411,"text":"Wakaba! Where is the ♂② Army's castle?!"},{"id":1007030412,"text":"It's ♂① Castle. You've already been there∠once!"},{"id":1007030413,"text":"Oh, that's right. Well, Wakaba, you would do well to learn∠from ♂㈱.∨Perhaps he can teach some of Genkaku's way of fighting. I'm∠off to the castle. Understood?"},{"id":1007030415,"text":"But Master... Shouldn't you pay for your meal?!"},{"id":1007030416,"text":"Urk... Yes, of course. I was just testing your∠memory."},{"id":1007030417,"text":"It's 120 potch a night per person."},{"id":1007030436,"text":"Buy while it's cheap."},{"id":1007030440,"text":"Come back soon!"},{"id":1007040001,"text":"Heheh, first, let's get past that guard station. Just∠leave it to me."},{"id":1007040002,"text":"Past this point is Tinto territory. There's an order out∠not to let anyone pass. I can't let you through."},{"id":1007040003,"text":"Come on, gimme a break, Kokto. You're not forgetting how∠I lent you money when your mom was pregnant, are you?"},{"id":1007040004,"text":"Oh, Koyu! It's been a long time! I still can't thank you∠enough for back then."},{"id":1007040005,"text":"Hey, I need your help. This is my guest. Listen, I'm not∠sayin' you need to neglect your job.∨It's just I know it's tough to be here all day, isn't it?∠How about taking a little break?"},{"id":1007040006,"text":"Well, I suppose I could use a bathroom break..."},{"id":1007040007,"text":"Let's move, Commander. I'm worried about the others."},{"id":1007040008,"text":"The right path will take you to our territory. Go straight∠and you'll get to Tinto, but we don't have time for any∠extra stops right now."},{"id":1007040009,"text":"Ah! No!!! No way! This can't be real...!"},{"id":1007040010,"text":"Well, if it isn't Koyu."},{"id":1007040011,"text":"Brother Gijimu... How?"},{"id":1007040012,"text":"It was a disgrace, I tell ya. Just when we thought we still∠had a while before they attacked, suddenly this huge horde∠of 'em was on top of us.∨And if that wasn't bad enough, we could see some of our own∠mixed in the swarm.∨We couldn't bear to put our axes to 'em...so instead we set∠fire to the fort and destroyed the paths and bridges as we∠fled so they couldn't follow."},{"id":1007040013,"text":"By the way, where's Sister Lo Wen?"},{"id":1007040014,"text":"Sorry, but everyone was scatterin' all over the place to∠escape and I sorta lost track of her. But I wouldn't worry∠cuz she ain't that easy to kill."},{"id":1007040015,"text":"So, where're you headed now?"},{"id":1007040016,"text":"We can't take this lyin' down, and it looks like the zombies∠are heading toward Tinto, so as much as I don't like the∠idea, I think we're gonna team up with Gustav in the city to∠fight them off."},{"id":1007040017,"text":"Sorry, Commander. Guess you came all this way for nothing..."},{"id":1007040018,"text":"Wait, this is Commander ♂㈱?"},{"id":1007040019,"text":"Glad to meet you. I'm Gijimu, the tight-fisted boss of these∠bandits. Sorry to bring you all this way for nothin'.∨We're planning to go to Tinto, so why not join us?∨I doubt they'll trust anything we bandits have to say.∨But I'm sure even Gustav will hear out the guy who defeated∠the evil Luca."},{"id":1007040020,"text":"Let's go to Tinto, ♂㈱. No point in turnin'∠back now. Besides, this is a great opportunity for us.∨The people of Tinto can't turn away from the war if they see∠it right up in their own faces like this.∨If things go well, you can get them to fight on our side."},{"id":1007040021,"text":"Thanks. Koyu, you take Commander ♂㈱ to Tinto.∠I'll try and round up some more of the guys and come along∠after."},{"id":1007040022,"text":"Gotcha. Let's head straight to Tinto, Commander."},{"id":1007040023,"text":"What the hell are you doing?! Don't tell me you're thinking∠of running away!∨We may have lost Tinto, but Lord Gustav,∠Lord Jess, and Commander ♂㈱, leader of the∠♂② Army are...∨They are all fighting hard to take the city back! And here∠you are trying to flee like cowards?!"},{"id":1007040024,"text":"M-Monsters!!!"},{"id":1007040025,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1007040026,"text":"Wh-What should we do? We can make it out if we∠run now..."},{"id":1007040027,"text":"We can't just let this happen."},{"id":1007040028,"text":"It's over. Let's get out of here."},{"id":1007040029,"text":"Yeah! Let's go!!!"},{"id":1007040030,"text":"Alright, let's get 'em, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1007040031,"text":"Are you okay, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1007040032,"text":"...You're right. Let's go."},{"id":1007040033,"text":"I can still keep going."},{"id":1007040034,"text":"I think this might be hopeless..."},{"id":1007040035,"text":"Aaagh!!!"},{"id":1007040036,"text":"...Here they come!"},{"id":1007040037,"text":"Phew, there's no end to them."},{"id":1007040038,"text":"...At this rate it's only a matter of time before they get∠us. We need to go..."},{"id":1007040039,"text":"No, not yet!"},{"id":1007040040,"text":"Aaargh!"},{"id":1007040041,"text":"I-It's over..."},{"id":1007040042,"text":"...Urgh!"},{"id":1007040043,"text":"It's hopeless, ♂㈱! We have to escape!!!"},{"id":1007040044,"text":"...You're right."},{"id":1007040045,"text":"Come on, hurry, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1007040046,"text":"No... Not yet!!!"},{"id":1007040047,"text":"...Let's get out of here."},{"id":1007040048,"text":"Damn..."},{"id":1007040049,"text":"There's nothing more we can do! They got everyone else!"},{"id":1007040050,"text":"We're getting out of here, now! Listen to your older sister!"},{"id":1007040051,"text":"Huh? O-Okay."},{"id":1007040052,"text":"Something isn't right... Don't tell me it's..."},{"id":1007040053,"text":"I-I knew it! Oh no... Is this it for us?"},{"id":1007040054,"text":"Huh? What the... What was that?!"},{"id":1007040055,"text":"B-But I guess we're safe at least.∨Let's go, ♂㈱. ◎3∨Huh? ◎2∨♂㈱?!"},{"id":1007040056,"text":"♂㈱! Are you okay? Hey, c'mon, say something!"},{"id":1007040057,"text":"What happened? Hey, are you okay? Please tell me you are!"},{"id":1007040058,"text":"You're okay. Everything will fine, ♂㈱.∨I'll take care of you, so don't you worry!"},{"id":1007040059,"text":"Let's go. Hold on tight!!!"},{"id":1007040060,"text":"*huff* *huff* *huff* *huff*"},{"id":1007040061,"text":"Are you okay, Nanami?"},{"id":1007040062,"text":"I'll take over for you."},{"id":1007040063,"text":"No! ♂㈱ is my responsibility! I promised∠Grandpa Genkaku. I...I..."},{"id":1007040064,"text":"N-No..."},{"id":1007040065,"text":"This is starting to get bad, ruff."},{"id":1007040066,"text":"Damn, is this where it ends?"},{"id":1007040067,"text":"No! No! No! No! Nooo!!!"},{"id":1007040068,"text":"Out of the way."},{"id":1007040069,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1007040070,"text":"Oh good, you're awake. What a huge, huge relief.∨That man over there helped us. We have to say thank you."},{"id":1007040071,"text":"No, ♂㈱. He helped us, so we have to thank him."},{"id":1007040072,"text":"Came to, did you, boy? No need to thank me."},{"id":1007040073,"text":"Thank you very much."},{"id":1007040074,"text":"Why did you help us?"},{"id":1007040075,"text":"I said you didn't need to thank me, but that's very∠conscientious of you all the same.∨By the way, where are you planning to go, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1007040076,"text":"I just realized it had been some time since I drew steel,∠that's all.∨By the way, where are you planning to go, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1007040077,"text":"H-How do you know his name?"},{"id":1007040078,"text":"How do I know? Because you were yelling it for all the world∠to hear."},{"id":1007040080,"text":"Should the leader of the ♂② Army really be∠standing around in a place like this?"},{"id":1007040082,"text":"I'm not their leader anymore."},{"id":1007040083,"text":"Oh, I see. In that case, you'd better escape quickly. This∠will be a battlefield again soon enough."},{"id":1007040084,"text":"Aren't you going to stop me?"},{"id":1007040085,"text":"True. We'll be on our way."},{"id":1007040086,"text":"Why would I do that? You made your choice, boy. It's none of∠my business.∨What's that look for?∨............"},{"id":1007040087,"text":"I've seen many things in many places. There was a woman I∠thought I had pledged my all to, and friends I considered∠irreplaceable. My life was built on true meaning and∠promises."},{"id":1007040088,"text":"But here's the thing, boy. With the passage of time, all∠things drift away like clouds in the sky. It may seem like∠there's nothing else now, but you don't have to let yourself∠be trapped.∨Don't let your feelings of obligation hold you back, boy.∠Just follow the path you feel is right.∨Well, you'd best get going soon. You don't have the time to∠be standing here talking with me all day, now do you?"},{"id":1007040089,"text":"What? Weren't you going to leave?"},{"id":1007040090,"text":"Well, take care, boy."},{"id":1007040092,"text":"Not sure what to do, boy? Okay... What do you feel like∠doing right now?"},{"id":1007040093,"text":"Should I go back and fight?"},{"id":1007040094,"text":"I'm going someplace where there's no fighting."},{"id":1007040095,"text":"If that's what you want, then that's the right choice.∠There's a certain kind of purity to war.∨But don't be consumed by that. When the fighting's over,∠you have to go back to the same old boring, mundane life.∠When that time comes, you need to make sure you don't∠forget that there's a place for you to return to.∨Anyway, keep moving forward. The answer is not something∠that's given to you, it's something you create."},{"id":1007040097,"text":"I see, a place with no fighting, eh.∨Well, there's the Scarlet Moon Empire, or wait is it Toran∠now? If you keep going even further south, you'll reach the∠Island Nations.∨Then to the west there's the Grasslands, and to the north is∠the Holy Kingdom of Harmonia, though I don't recommend∠going there. If you're taking a ship, there's even the ∠Queendom of Falena.∨The world is as big as you want it to be.∨Well, boy, you'd better hurry. Life isn't as long as you'd∠imagine."},{"id":1007040099,"text":"Let's go, ♂㈱. If we go south from here..."},{"id":1007040100,"text":"♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1007040101,"text":"...Are you awake now?"},{"id":1007040102,"text":"♂㈱... Should we...go back? With things in∠this state, we can't go anywhere..."},{"id":1007040104,"text":"I'm sorry. I... It was selfish of me to say that.∨To throw everything and everyone away and just run... It was∠selfish, wasn't it..."},{"id":1007040105,"text":"Wh-What?! More zombies?"},{"id":1007040106,"text":"Come and try me if you want, but you'll never get your hands∠on ♂㈱."},{"id":1007040107,"text":"Ack, don't surprise me like that! I almost killed you by∠mistake!"},{"id":1007040108,"text":"Flik... And Shu and Apple..."},{"id":1007040109,"text":"Commander ♂㈱. Hasn't this gone far enough?∠Surely you know by now.∨There are so many people who need you...∨Please, come back to the ♂② Army."},{"id":1007040110,"text":"Okay, I understand."},{"id":1007040111,"text":"No, I won't go back!"},{"id":1007040112,"text":"You've seen what happened to the people that lived in all∠those villages.∨And you can still say you're leaving? What about the people∠who believed in you?"},{"id":1007040113,"text":"But still... I..."},{"id":1007040114,"text":"How can you say that?! Because of you... Because of you,∠Ridley was..."},{"id":1007040115,"text":"Wh-What happened to Ridley?"},{"id":1007040116,"text":"General Ridley died in battle.◎1∨It happened the morning after you fled, Commander∠♂㈱. Neclord made a surprise attack on Tinto.∨As the citizens were running around trying to escape,∠Viktor, Klaus, and the General fought on trying to find you.∨Then, during that battle..."},{"id":1007040117,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I've had it with lords. ∠I'll take the penalty for that.∨But I want you to think of that pain as the pain of the people ∠who believed in you.∨I'll say it once more.∠Please come back to the ♂② Army."},{"id":1007040118,"text":"I...just can't."},{"id":1007040120,"text":"♂㈱... I'm sorry.∨You fought, lost Jowy, saw so many people die...∨I just felt that you seemed to be hurting so badly.∨But I...I only ended up causing you more pain.∨I'm so, so sorry. Despite my oath to Grandpa...despite∠being your older sister...I failed you.∨Don't worry about me anymore. Do what you want."},{"id":1007040121,"text":"Viktor and the others are hatching a plan to dig into Tinto∠back at Crom Village.∨If you have the will to fight again, if you have the will to∠lead the ♂② Army again, please come back."},{"id":1007040122,"text":"Wait, Shu, are you leaving?"},{"id":1007040123,"text":"The rest is up to ♂㈱ to decide. It doesn't∠matter whether we're here or not."},{"id":1007040124,"text":"Yeah... Guess you're right."},{"id":1007040125,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1007040126,"text":"This is as far as Gengen and his men can go, too."},{"id":1007040127,"text":"I have faith in you, Commander."},{"id":1007040128,"text":"♂㈱... Do whatever you want. I'll be by your∠side wherever you go...always keeping you safe."},{"id":1007040129,"text":"If we step past here, there's no going back, understand?"},{"id":1007040130,"text":"No...I can't."},{"id":1007040131,"text":"I know that."},{"id":1007040132,"text":"Yeah... Okay, let's go. There are places where there's no∠fighting, places where you can live a normal life.∨That's also a way to live..."},{"id":1007040133,"text":"Are you still unsure?"},{"id":1007040134,"text":"It happened the morning after you fled, Commander. Neclord∠made a surprise attack on Tinto.∨As the citizens were running around trying to escape,∠Viktor, Klaus, and the General fought on trying to find you.∨Then, during that battle...Lord Ridley perished. He was a∠superb general..."},{"id":1007040135,"text":"Ridley... He..."},{"id":1007040136,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I just hit you. ∠I'll accept the penalty for that. ∨But I don't want you to forget that pain. Please don't forget ∠that there are people who believe in you. "},{"id":1007040137,"text":"♂㈱, please come back. Viktor and the others∠are hatching a plan to dig into Tinto at Crom Village. If we∠hurry, we'll make it in time.∨The battle isn't over yet."},{"id":1007040138,"text":"Let's go, ♂㈱. We'll go with you to Crom."},{"id":1007040139,"text":"I'm so sorry ♂㈱. ◎0How could that happen to∠Ridley..."},{"id":1007040143,"text":"Hello there, boy. What am I doing? Hmm, how do I put it...∠I'm deciding what sky to seek out next.∨The real question is, what are you doing in a place like∠this? Don't you have things to do, ♂㈱ of the∠♂② Army?"},{"id":1007040144,"text":"Hahahaha, what? Are you worried about me?"},{"id":1007040145,"text":"Hello, boy. It seems you've decided to go back. That's∠okay too. One's own choice is always best."},{"id":1007040146,"text":"Now, go. You have things to do, right?"},{"id":1007040147,"text":"Hello, boy. What is it? You look like you have something on∠your mind."},{"id":1007040148,"text":"Who are you?"},{"id":1007040149,"text":"...Why do you say that?"},{"id":1007040150,"text":"Oh, sorry. My name is Georg Prime. Just think of me as a∠traveling warrior, and you must be the leader of the ∠♂② army?"},{"id":1007040151,"text":"Hahahahahaha, if you lead the ♂② Army, it∠makes sense you'd have plenty to worry about, eh? Or am I∠wrong?"},{"id":1007040152,"text":"So how's it going, boy? Fighting's tough?∨Well, it's not supposed to be fun, now is it? Hey, would you∠be interested in hiring me? Not to blow my own horn here,∠but I'm strong. What do you say?"},{"id":1007040153,"text":"Really?"},{"id":1007040154,"text":"I can't pay any money..."},{"id":1007040155,"text":"No, that's okay."},{"id":1007040156,"text":"Yes, really. And in return, I'd like you to promise me∠something."},{"id":1007040157,"text":"Until this war ends, my sword is yours. The ♂② Army? You're all being deceived!"},{"id":1007080084,"text":"Hey! What the hell's that supposed to mean?!"},{"id":1007080085,"text":"He's not on our side! He's an agent for Highland, the source∠of all our misery.∨Oh, he may say he's leader of the ♂② Army, but∠there's no telling what he's plotting!"},{"id":1007080086,"text":"Dammit, Jess! Got any proof to back up those accusations?!∠You don't know the hardships ♂㈱ has been∠through!"},{"id":1007080087,"text":"Y-Yeah! It's not like we're doing any of this because we∠like it..."},{"id":1007080088,"text":"You want proof? I have proof. I saw him!!!∨When Muse fell, he was in the room where Lady Anabelle lay∠murdered!!!∨He's the one who killed her!!!"},{"id":1007080091,"text":"Enough with the fool talk. How could you even think that?!∠♂㈱ was trying to help her."},{"id":1007080092,"text":"♂㈱! Can you explain?!"},{"id":1007080094,"text":"It was Jowy..."},{"id":1007080095,"text":"See?! It's like I told you—"},{"id":1007080096,"text":"Trying to pin the guilt on your friend, eh? Some great∠leader you are!"},{"id":1007080097,"text":"Lord Jess, what I say next I say as a general of Two River.∠I will not have you insult our leader further."},{"id":1007080098,"text":"Hmph... I'm leaving."},{"id":1007080099,"text":"Have your equipment ready so we're prepared to fight at any∠time."},{"id":1007080100,"text":"As you wish."},{"id":1007080102,"text":"Wh-What?! You want to fight us?"},{"id":1007080103,"text":"No, I don't want to fight.∨But remember this, ♂㈱: I don't trust you.∠There's the matter of Anabelle, and besides that...∨...the City-States should be saved by their own people.∠That is my firm belief."},{"id":1007080104,"text":"What a jerk. Bleeeh!"},{"id":1007080105,"text":"Don't take it to heart, ♂㈱. Lord Jess...is∠fighting hard too. The important thing is to get our∠strategy for facing Neclord down pat."},{"id":1007080106,"text":"You're right."},{"id":1007080107,"text":"No, I'm still upset."},{"id":1007080108,"text":"Let's continue our discussion then. If Neclord attacks..."},{"id":1007080109,"text":"Does what Lord Jess said bother you?"},{"id":1007080110,"text":"Shall we continue our discussion?"},{"id":1007080111,"text":"Sure."},{"id":1007080112,"text":"No."},{"id":1007080113,"text":"Discussion?"},{"id":1007080114,"text":"Let's get on with our discussion. If Neclord attacks..."},{"id":1007080115,"text":"Are you still troubled by Lord Jess?"},{"id":1007080116,"text":"The discussion of how to protect Tinto from Neclord."},{"id":1007080117,"text":"Whew, it sure got dark out. Funny how after all that∠talking, nothing really got decided..."},{"id":1007080118,"text":"Well, Commander ♂㈱, I recommend getting∠some rest."},{"id":1007080119,"text":"I say we take Klaus's suggestion and get some sleep."},{"id":1007080120,"text":"Huh? Who are you?"},{"id":1007080121,"text":"I'm Nanami. You're little Lilly, aren't you?"},{"id":1007080122,"text":"No. I'm not little Lilly, I'm just Lilly. I'm not a kid."},{"id":1007080123,"text":"Oh, I see. What are you doing, Lilly?"},{"id":1007080124,"text":"I'm trying to find my father. Where did he go?"},{"id":1007080125,"text":"Oh, do you like your father, Lilly?"},{"id":1007080126,"text":"Yes! I love him! My father is very strong. I'm going to∠go look for him now."},{"id":1007080127,"text":"...Hmph, she reminds me of Pilika. I wonder how she's doing.∠Well, I guess she's safe since she's with Jowy...∨Hey, ♂㈱...◎1∨No, forget about it."},{"id":1007080131,"text":"Okay, I'll come wake you up in the morning. Good night."},{"id":1007080132,"text":"Wake up, ♂㈱."},{"id":1007080133,"text":"It has been some time, ♂㈱. I see you've∠grown much stronger. And your eyes sadder...∨The future I see changes easily, and sometimes slips through∠my grasp.∨The Bright Shield Rune upon your right hand and the Black∠Sword Rune that Jowy bears call out to each other.∨It is a crossing of destinies...∨But, ♂㈱, the fates of many people and their∠hearts are gathered around you. Never forget that."},{"id":1007080134,"text":"Still awake, ♂㈱?∨.........∨It's awfully quiet. I never knew it could be so quiet at∠night. All we've been doing is fighting, I guess..."},{"id":1007080135,"text":"Hey, what do you think of what Jess said? Where do we∠belong?∨Everyone treated us well enough in Highland, but they were∠always distant somehow... It seemed strange at the time,∠but now I think I understand why.∨It's still hard to believe that Grandpa Genkaku was a∠hero of the City-States though...∨Then we were driven out of Highland and forced to come here∠to Jowston. But when you think about it, we really don't∠belong here either..."},{"id":1007080136,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱...∨..........∨No, never mind."},{"id":1007080137,"text":"No, I guess I'll say it after all.∨♂㈱, let's stop this fighting.∨There's no reason for you to keep doing all this. We∠fight, we get hurt, we wield weapons, we kill people, all∠for no real purpose."},{"id":1007080138,"text":"Why? Why, ♂㈱? There are others more suited for∠the job! Viktor, Flik, Shu, General Ridley, Freed..."},{"id":1007080139,"text":"There's no reason for you to fight, ♂㈱. If∠we keep going on like this, if things keep going as they∠are, you and Jowy will..."},{"id":1007080140,"text":"They need me."},{"id":1007080142,"text":"But, but, why does it have to be you? We're both just kids.∨If it weren't for this war, you and Jowy could've finished∠service in the Youth Brigade and gone to a school like the∠one in Greenhill.∨All without the fear that you might die∠tomorrow.∨I hate it, hate it, hate it! What happens if you die,∠♂㈱?∨Grandpa Genkaku is gone, Jowy is∠gone, and yet, and yet..."},{"id":1007080143,"text":"I'm sorry."},{"id":1007080144,"text":"Maybe you're right..."},{"id":1007080145,"text":"*sniff*∨............"},{"id":1007080147,"text":"Bleeeh! Hahahaha. Hey, did I get ya? Did I? I was kidding.∨You're right, ♂㈱. You are needed. And you're∠strong enough to accept that responsibility, too.∠Your big sister is proud of you.∨Well, we have an early day tomorrow. Just thinking of∠having to be in a meeting first thing in the∠morning makes me sick, though.∨Now then, let's get back to our rooms and rest. Let's go."},{"id":1007080150,"text":"No, I just can't do it."},{"id":1007080151,"text":"Really? Really??? Okay.∨Let's go. Things will be okay.∨We'll have to leave Jowy behind, but...but someday we'll∠come for him. We absolutely, absolutely will!"},{"id":1007080152,"text":".........∨Y-Yeah, I guess you can't. Yeah...yeah. I knew that..."},{"id":1007080154,"text":"Bleeeh! Hahahaha. Hey, did I get ya? Did I? I was kidding.∨You're right. Just thinking of∠having to be in a meeting first thing in the∠morning makes me sick, though.∨Now then, let's get back to our rooms and rest. Let's go."},{"id":1007080157,"text":"No...I guess I can't after all."},{"id":1007080158,"text":"R-Really? Are you sure?∨But, but, but... Really?!∨Okay, things will be alright. No.∠We absolutely have to come back for Jowy."},{"id":1007080159,"text":"Why? Why? It's such a nice idea..."},{"id":1007080160,"text":"Y-Yeah, I know... I knew all along.∨Sorry. I'm really, really sorry."},{"id":1007080162,"text":"Bleeeh! Hahahaha. Hey, did I get ya? Did I? I was kidding.∨You're right. Get nice∠and warm and go to sleep, okay?"},{"id":1007080163,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱! C'mon, up and at 'em. ∠You have to be sharp."},{"id":1007080164,"text":"Hey, you're early today. Now we just need Jess and Hauser."},{"id":1007080166,"text":"Lord Gustav, there's trouble! It's Lord Jess!!!"},{"id":1007080167,"text":"Stop all that shouting! Now, explain!"},{"id":1007080168,"text":"Lord Jess is sending his soldiers out to battle."},{"id":1007080169,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1007080195,"text":"Dammit. All we can do now is hope that Jess' intel∠is correct."},{"id":1007080199,"text":"Ack! Isn't that..."},{"id":1007080200,"text":"Y-You're Neclord!◎1 Or at least I think you are. What're you∠doing here?!"},{"id":1007080201,"text":"There are a number of mine tunnels beneath Tinto. I used one∠of those to reach this place.∨That boy Jess or whatever was assembling remnants of the∠Muse Army, so I mixed in a few spies.∨You'd be surprised how persuasive threats and a little money∠can be. Further proof that humans are disgusting creatures.∠It is only as corpses that their true merit emerges."},{"id":1007080202,"text":"Wait, what?! That means... Oh no!!!"},{"id":1007080203,"text":"You must be ♂㈱, leader of the ♂②∠Army. I shall do you the blessing of adding you to my own∠legion of zombies."},{"id":1007080204,"text":"That's not gonna happen!!!"},{"id":1007080205,"text":"You fight well. But I have no time to waste now, lest∠my presence attracts notice.∨I will show you the power of my rune. This magic∠requires the blood of 100 people, so be thankful for this∠rare opportunity."},{"id":1007080206,"text":"O Moon Rune, I bestow upon you the blood and lives of 100∠people. Go forth, Blue Moon Curse. Strike down my foes!!!"},{"id":1007080207,"text":"We gotta get out of here, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1007080208,"text":"It's too late. The living cannot escape this curse."},{"id":1007080209,"text":"No! No!!!"},{"id":1007080210,"text":"Wh-What?! My curse was repelled!∨Is this the power of a True Rune?!"},{"id":1007080211,"text":"Now's our chance, ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1007080212,"text":"Don't let them escape!"},{"id":1007080217,"text":"Okay, let's go!"},{"id":1007080218,"text":"Oh, just a minute."},{"id":1007080219,"text":"Okay, we haven't left anything behind. Alright, let's go."},{"id":1007080220,"text":"Oh! Wait a minute!"},{"id":1007080221,"text":"Having them hunting for us because they thought we∠went missing wouldn't be good. Let's leave a note."},{"id":1007080222,"text":"Okay, that ought to do it. Hmm... ◎2And then..."},{"id":1007080223,"text":"Let's leave this here. The next leader of the∠♂② Army should have this since we won't be∠needing it."},{"id":1007080224,"text":"You left the Blinking Mirror."},{"id":1007080225,"text":"Okay, now it's really time to head out."},{"id":1007080226,"text":"What's wrong? We don't need that anymore, do we?"},{"id":1007080227,"text":"Where to, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1007080228,"text":"I'm sorry. Please, let us pass. Come on, please?"},{"id":1007080230,"text":"Grr... Then I'll have to use force!"},{"id":1007080233,"text":"Yeah, Gengen will protect ♂㈱ and Nanami!"},{"id":1007080234,"text":"Oh, thanks."},{"id":1007080245,"text":"You've had a long journey. Please get some rest."},{"id":1007080246,"text":"Welcome. We have everything you could need in a mine."},{"id":1007080247,"text":"It doesn't matter how talented you are if your equipment is∠in poor shape."},{"id":1007080248,"text":"Hi there, welcome. Please choose wisely..."},{"id":1007080249,"text":"Good day. My name is Alberto. I used to live in Muse City,∠but we were all driven out by the Highland Army.∨My friends and I got separated in the chaos."},{"id":1007080250,"text":"Now I have a part-time job at this armor shore.∨Manual labor is fine and all, but I really don't want to∠lose the sensitivity in my fingers."},{"id":1007080251,"text":"I played in a band back in Muse. We were all great friends,∠but now everyone's scattered to the winds."},{"id":1007080252,"text":"Oh, it's you. Long time no see. I've saved some money, so I∠figured it's about time I go look for Annallee and Pico."},{"id":1007080253,"text":"If you're looking for Annallee..."},{"id":1007080254,"text":"Yeah, good luck."},{"id":1007080255,"text":"Huh..."},{"id":1007080256,"text":"So they're both safe. Thanks. What a coincidence that we∠met."},{"id":1007080257,"text":"Alright, I'll also... Was it ♂① Castle? I'll∠go join them there.∨It's been a long time since the three of us were together."},{"id":1007080258,"text":"Thanks. I'm sure I can find them."},{"id":1007080259,"text":"Hey... Long time no see. I couldn't find them. I sure hope∠Annallee and Pico are safe..."},{"id":1007080260,"text":"Um..."},{"id":1007080261,"text":"Hang in there."},{"id":1007080262,"text":"Yeah... That's right, I can't give up. Those two are like∠family to me."},{"id":1007080263,"text":"Huh? What? Oh, don't worry. I haven't given up."},{"id":1007080264,"text":"Oh, hello. My name is Alberto. I used to live in Muse City,∠but we were driven out by the Highland Army.∨I managed to struggle this far and got a job here. Manual∠labor is fine and all, but I don't want to lose the∠sensitivity in my fingers.∨I've finally saved some money, though, so I think I'll go∠look for my friends. Their names are Annallee and Pico. We∠used to play in a band together."},{"id":1007080279,"text":"Hey, it must have been tough coming all this way. You∠deserve a rest."},{"id":1007080281,"text":"Here you go. The men from the mine eat like horses, which∠works out to my benefit too, hahahaha."},{"id":1007080282,"text":"Gustav is the head of the Miner's Guild. He's actually the∠mayor, which has a more impressive ring to it."},{"id":1007080283,"text":"Hey, come on in. Now listen up. A man has to eat well and∠work hard and become strong. Got it?"},{"id":1007080284,"text":"Did you meet father? As soon as he sees a young person he∠starts giving lectures."},{"id":1007080285,"text":"Magic scrolls? What are we supposed to do with them? It's∠scary, I tell you."},{"id":1007080286,"text":"The fighting is still going on, so we're really busy, too."},{"id":1007080287,"text":"Stay away from the fire, kid. You don't wanna get crisped."},{"id":1007080288,"text":"Thanks to the ore we get from the mine, they make good∠weapons and armor for us here."},{"id":1007080289,"text":"Looks like Alberto is looking for a person named Annallee.∠I hear they got separated..."},{"id":1007080290,"text":"Alberto is really good with his hands. He's almost better∠at cooking than I am."},{"id":1007080291,"text":"Ho there, look at this. This is one of my best works yet.∠Here, I'll give this blueprint to you."},{"id":1007080292,"text":"Grandpa used to be a famous engineer a long time ago."},{"id":1007080293,"text":"Hahaha! I'm an engineer without peer! The works of the old∠man next door are like a child's play compared to mine!∨To prove it to you, I'll give you this. Amazing, isn't it?"},{"id":1007080294,"text":"This is the Guild Hall, where all the important meetings are∠held. It also happens to be Gustav's house."},{"id":1007080295,"text":"Miss Lilly is quite picky..."},{"id":1007080296,"text":"I'm in charge of guild finances. Things are tough at the∠moment because all this fighting doesn't make us any money."},{"id":1007080297,"text":"Give the plans to a skilled sculptor.∠Simply having it done on paper is enough satisfaction∠for me."},{"id":1007080298,"text":"Ah, what a pity. Well, please pick it up another time∠next time you have business here."},{"id":1007080299,"text":"It makes me happy to think of it being useful to someone."},{"id":1007080300,"text":"Give those plans to a good sculptor somewhere. I'm sure they∠will prove useful."},{"id":1007080301,"text":"What? You don't need them? Don't tell me you're on the side∠of that old man next door, too!"},{"id":1007080302,"text":"How about it?! Much better than whatever that old hack∠next door makes, right?"},{"id":1007080303,"text":"♂㈱, here's a little token of friendship from∠all of us in the Miner's Guild. It's not much, but please∠take it."},{"id":1007080304,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please make good use of that∠orb."},{"id":1007080305,"text":"Oh, you can't take it today. Well then, I'll keep it here∠for you."},{"id":1007080306,"text":"If we join forces with the ♂② Army, there'll∠be nothing for us to fear."},{"id":1007080309,"text":"Getting here is quite a journey, Commander ♂㈱.∠We welcome you."},{"id":1007080310,"text":"They call you Commander ♂㈱, right? That's what∠Marlowe said."},{"id":1007080315,"text":"Those monsters... Could they be connected in some way with∠the Highland Army?"},{"id":1007080316,"text":"What in the world is happening?"},{"id":1007080317,"text":"Monsters? It can't be..."},{"id":1007080318,"text":"Let's go see for ourselves, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1007080319,"text":"Lord Jess respected Lady Anabelle... But that was going too∠far."},{"id":1007080321,"text":"Heh, who does that stuffed shirt think he is?!"},{"id":1007080322,"text":"Just goes to show how lame a lot of the city folk are."},{"id":1007080323,"text":"Um...is that scary person going to come back again?"},{"id":1007080324,"text":"Damn, that Jess is such a hot-headed idiot..."},{"id":1007080325,"text":"*thunderous snoring*"},{"id":1007080326,"text":"The door is locked."},{"id":1007080327,"text":"You must be tired after braving those trails.∠Please, get some rest."},{"id":1007080330,"text":"☆0∠             Empty Chest"},{"id":1007080335,"text":"☆0∠  Earthware Pot Filled with Water"},{"id":1007080337,"text":"☆0∠        Mining History Book"},{"id":1007080338,"text":"☆0∠  Easy-to-Read Book for Bed Time"},{"id":1007080339,"text":"☆0∠  Bookshelf with Various Books"},{"id":1007080343,"text":"☆0∠    \"The Lives of the Heroes\""},{"id":1007080344,"text":"☆0∠   Bookshelf of Music Scores"},{"id":1007080345,"text":"☆0∠   \"Rules of the Mining Guild\""},{"id":1007080348,"text":"☆0∠     Basket of Holly Berries"},{"id":1007080350,"text":"☆0∠         Basket of Fruit"},{"id":1007080352,"text":"☆0∠       Crate of Cabbage◎6∠What's that?◎6 A bug."},{"id":1007080353,"text":"☆0∠            Box of Coal"},{"id":1007080354,"text":"☆0∠         Drawer of Tools"},{"id":1007080359,"text":"☆0∠            Fine Piano"},{"id":1007080364,"text":"Peh! Damned monsters..."},{"id":1007080374,"text":"I wonder if Albert will come back once he finds Annallee..."},{"id":1007080375,"text":"I should have had Albert teach me some cooking..."},{"id":1007080379,"text":"Are you alright, young lady? Keep up the good work!"},{"id":1007080406,"text":"That scary guy may come back, so maybe I'll invest in one of∠those Magic Scrolls..."},{"id":1007080415,"text":"I'm so glad the young lady is safe. Thank you so much for∠helping her, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1007080416,"text":"Maybe I'll make one of Miss Lilly's favorites today."},{"id":1007080417,"text":"Phew... Somehow we managed to stay in the black again this∠month."},{"id":1007080430,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you can count on Tinto's aid."},{"id":1007080431,"text":"I was scared, but Marlowe made me feel better, so I'm okay∠now."},{"id":1007080436,"text":"Ah, now it's finally over."},{"id":1007080445,"text":"I hope the weapons and armor we make here are useful for∠the ♂② Army..."},{"id":1007080451,"text":"We will have peace soon. Please, stick it out a little∠longer. We're all relying on you, Commander∠♂㈱."},{"id":1007080452,"text":"Miss Lilly is going to have to learn to eat her carrots∠soon."},{"id":1007080466,"text":"Just one last effort, ♂㈱. We'll take care of the∠weapons and armor just like before."},{"id":1007080467,"text":"Good luck, mister."},{"id":1007080475,"text":"What will Gustav do? Will he really join the∠♂② Republic?"},{"id":1007080477,"text":"Lead our new nation well, ♂㈱."},{"id":1007080479,"text":"Now that the fighting is over, maybe our work will slow∠down a bit, too..."},{"id":1007080487,"text":"Thank you. Oh, thank you, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1007080489,"text":"We have to make lots and lots of money from now on. You're still pissed?∨Gonna try to catch me?∨Haha! Fat chance!"},{"id":1008010019,"text":"You think I'm cornered?∨Don't make me laugh! Unlike you, I can do this—"},{"id":1008010020,"text":"Heheh! These wings aren't just for show, ya know. Granny∠told me not to use 'em, but, well, to hell with that!∨See ya!"},{"id":1008010021,"text":"For the crime of desertion while on a reconnaissance∠mission to South Window,∨and then compounding the crime with a lie about bringing∠back the person who defeated the Highland Army,∨you, Fitcher, are hereby sentenced to 100 lashes."},{"id":1008010022,"text":"B-B-But it's true I tell you! Commander ♂㈱∠will be here any minute now!∨Please, just wait a little longer, General Ridley!"},{"id":1008010023,"text":"No.∨Though quick-of-tongue and deceitful, I know you as a man∠who gets the job done."},{"id":1008010024,"text":"Th-Then why..."},{"id":1008010025,"text":"Because the rules are the rules, and the law must not be∠swayed by sentiment. Prepare to receive what you have∠earned, Fitcher."},{"id":1008010026,"text":"No, no, please, I'm begging you! Go easy on me..."},{"id":1008010027,"text":"That wouldn't be much of a punishment then, would it?∠Now, cease this begging."},{"id":1008010028,"text":"Wait! Stop!"},{"id":1008010030,"text":"Oh, Commander! You're just in the nick of time!"},{"id":1008010031,"text":"This is the hero who defeated the Highland Army!!!"},{"id":1008010032,"text":"Could it be...?"},{"id":1008010033,"text":"This young boy?"},{"id":1008010034,"text":"Impossible... He beat the Highland Army?"},{"id":1008010035,"text":"Are you truly ♂㈱, leader of the∠♂② Army?"},{"id":1008010036,"text":"See? He's here, just like I kept telling you he would be!"},{"id":1008010037,"text":"Excuse me, but we have no proof that you are who you say∠you are."},{"id":1008010038,"text":"Of course I'm me!"},{"id":1008010039,"text":"Well you see..."},{"id":1008010040,"text":"So you say, but..."},{"id":1008010041,"text":"Is something the matter?"},{"id":1008010042,"text":"His right hand! He has the same rune on his right hand as∠the hero, Genkaku, once did... The Bright Shield Rune.∠That should be proof enough!"},{"id":1008010043,"text":"Genkaku..."},{"id":1008010044,"text":"But Master Genkaku went to Highland..."},{"id":1008010045,"text":"May I see your hand?"},{"id":1008010046,"text":"This is indeed the Bright Shield Rune.∠Very well, please come this way.∠I'd like you to meet Lord Makai, the leader of our city."},{"id":1008010047,"text":"Thanks for saving me, ♂㈱. ∠Well, please go on in...∨Huh? How did I know about the rune? ∠Haha, you underestimate me. Now, let's head inside."},{"id":1008010048,"text":"Ohnohnoohnoohno..."},{"id":1008010049,"text":"Yikes, that was scary. But General Ridley was holding back.∠Sure, the cracks were loud and he said all those things, but∠it hardly hurt at all."},{"id":1008010050,"text":"Commander ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1008010051,"text":"Did you make a side trip along the way? Thanks to you, I was∠nearly killed.∨Huh? Well...no, that may be exaggerating things a tad, but∠still...∨More importantly, hurry along and meet Lord Makai. I've got∠a feeling we don't have much time left."},{"id":1008010052,"text":"Ah, you must be Commander ♂㈱. It is a pleasure∠to meet you. I am Makai, the plenipotentiary of Two River∠City."},{"id":1008010053,"text":"Pleased to meet you."},{"id":1008010054,"text":"What's a \"plenipotentiary\"?"},{"id":1008010055,"text":"Quite young to be a leader, aren't you? I'm the youngest∠leader in the City-States, but you make me feel old.∨Still, a hero's blood runs in your veins. Ah, forgive me. I∠forgot you were not related by blood. Or at least that is∠what Fitcher tells me."},{"id":1008010056,"text":"It's the official title of the leader appointed by the three∠assembly houses, but let's not worry over that now.∨You certainly are young, aren't you? Still, you have the∠blood of a hero in you veins.∨But no, I forgot, you were not related by blood. Or at∠least that is what Fitcher tells me."},{"id":1008010057,"text":"Haha, ♂㈱ is the leader of the ♂②∠Army, the very army that gave the Highlanders a real∠trouncing.∨As Fitcher is my name, you have my word on it!"},{"id":1008010058,"text":"If he is indeed Commander ♂㈱, he is likely∠embarrassed to have any sort of personal guarantee from you."},{"id":1008010059,"text":"Hahaha, too true.∠Forgive me, Commander."},{"id":1008010060,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Two River welcomes you and∠the ♂② Army to our city.∨Let us fight side-by-side to drive Luca Blight and his ilk∠from our lands.∨Incidentally, ♂㈱, I hear you were involved in∠some sort of incident upon arriving here in Two River?"},{"id":1008010061,"text":"Yes, I was pickpocketed..."},{"id":1008010062,"text":"There's no need to concern yourself."},{"id":1008010063,"text":"It must be those diminutive cretins! They sully the proud∠reputation of our fair city. You have our deepest apologies."},{"id":1008010064,"text":"The Winged Horde has been a source of much trouble.∨Originally, they lived in the mountains of Tinto, but in∠my grandfather's day, about 80 years ago, they began to∠settle here...∨They've been officially recognized as Two River citizens by∠our three houses of congress, but...∨Well, there's no point in talking about it now, I suppose.∨We have made a reservation for you at the Green Leaf Inn,∠so please rest there tonight. We can discuss business∠tomorrow."},{"id":1008010065,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I presume? Lord Makai told∠me to expect you. Your room is on the 2nd floor at the end."},{"id":1008010066,"text":"Huh? That's odd... It says here ♂㈱ has∠already gone up to their room and had their meal..."},{"id":1008010067,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, is there someone staying with∠you?"},{"id":1008010068,"text":"Haha, so we meet again. I asked Granny to read that letter∠of introduction or whatever for me.∨Are you really the leader of the ♂② Army?"},{"id":1008010069,"text":"Yeah, that's right."},{"id":1008010070,"text":"Oh, really...∨......"},{"id":1008010071,"text":"Sorry, I don't believe you, so I'm outta here. Oh, by the∠way, I went ahead and ate up your dinner for you!"},{"id":1008010072,"text":"I don't have to answer that."},{"id":1008010073,"text":"So that's how it's gonna be, huh? You're just like all the∠others, thinkin' you're too good to talk to us.∨Is it because we got wings?∨Anyway, thanks for dinner at least. See ya!"},{"id":1008010074,"text":"Commander! Commander ♂㈱!!!∠I have terrible news! Please come with me."},{"id":1008010075,"text":"Lord Makai and General Ridley are fighting! Something about∠a Highland spy... Ah, we have to get to the assembly hall∠quickly!"},{"id":1008010076,"text":"General Ridley, you are sorely mistaken!∠We would never plot against you like that!"},{"id":1008010077,"text":"I don't know whether it's the whole truth or not, but we∠can no longer afford to fight side by side with you humans."},{"id":1008010079,"text":"What happened?"},{"id":1008010080,"text":"Lord Makai, General Ridley, Commander ♂㈱ is∠here. Please calm yourselves."},{"id":1008010081,"text":"I didn't notice you arrive, ♂㈱. But I'm afraid∠I must excuse myself. My people need to prepare for the∠impending attack."},{"id":1008010082,"text":"Ah, ♂㈱. I'm sure you have already allied∠yourself with the other humans.∨I will excuse myself now, my people need to prepare for the∠impending attack."},{"id":1008010083,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'm ashamed that you had to∠witness such an embarrassing spectacle.∨The good general showed up first thing this morning and∠accused me of being a traitor.∨He now refuses to fight alongside humans and says he will  ∠face the Highland Army alone with only his Kobold forces.∨This is a real predicament...∨But why would he say that when we have reports that∠the Highland Army is drawing near?∨♂㈱, will you go speak to General Ridley and∠find out what happened? If all of Two River isn't united in∠this, we have no hope against Highland."},{"id":1008010084,"text":"There's no way I can do it."},{"id":1008010086,"text":"Please ♂㈱, I have no one else to ask."},{"id":1008010087,"text":"Commander, there is no way that Two River can help the∠♂② Army, let alone survive, unless we can fix∠this."},{"id":1008010088,"text":"Please, ♂㈱. As leader of the ♂②∠Army, won't you please lend us a hand?"},{"id":1008010089,"text":"Thank you. You can find General Ridley in..."},{"id":1008010090,"text":"Oh, don't worry about that, I'll show him the way.∨Let's go, Commander, we haven't much time."},{"id":1008010091,"text":"You must have permission to enter the assembly hall."},{"id":1008010092,"text":"No one without permission is allowed to enter."},{"id":1008010093,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, unless it's an urgent matter, I∠must ask that you leave."},{"id":1008010094,"text":"My apologies, but you cannot enter. There is a meeting in∠progress."},{"id":1008010095,"text":"Ah, we've been waiting for you. Please go inside."},{"id":1008010096,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please enter."},{"id":1008010097,"text":"Commander, I'll come to get you in the morning.∠Until then, please have something to eat and relax."},{"id":1008010098,"text":"Commander, the Green Leaf Inn is just east of here near∠the river. Their food is absolutely incredible."},{"id":1008010099,"text":"You think you can catch me?!"},{"id":1008010100,"text":"Ha! I know every inch of this city!"},{"id":1008010101,"text":"Why so slow? Maybe you should just give up."},{"id":1008010102,"text":"I'm sorry, I'm sorry!"},{"id":1008010103,"text":"I said I'm sorry already!"},{"id":1008010104,"text":"If you got that much in your wallet, you must have more at∠home, eh? You won't even miss it."},{"id":1008010105,"text":"You must be tired from your voyage. Please rest today."},{"id":1008010106,"text":"You would do well to have as few dealings as possible with∠those conniving winged pests."},{"id":1008010107,"text":"Why in the world would General Ridley say such things?"},{"id":1008010108,"text":"Is that the...Bright Shield Rune?"},{"id":1008010109,"text":"Master Genkaku..."},{"id":1008010110,"text":"You're the leader of the ♂② Army?"},{"id":1008010111,"text":"Master Genkaku..."},{"id":1008010112,"text":"Commander, something smells fishy...∨Why would Ridley have a change of heart with the Highland∠Army breathing down our necks? If my hunch is right, ∠we don't have much time.∨We've got to hurry. Ridley is in the Kobold district on the∠other side of the river to the west."},{"id":1008010113,"text":"You aren't allowed in here. General Ridley's orders, ruff!"},{"id":1008010114,"text":"But we desperately need to speak to the General..."},{"id":1008010115,"text":"That's your problem, ruff!"},{"id":1008010116,"text":"This isn't going to work. Looks like we're on our own here.∠What do we do, Commander?"},{"id":1008010117,"text":"Haha! Humans are such slowpokes. Bye-bye!"},{"id":1008010118,"text":"Oh!∨Commander ♂㈱! Did he get your wallet? Wait...∠M-My wallet..."},{"id":1008010119,"text":"Ack! He got mine too!"},{"id":1008010120,"text":"Hurry, we've got to catch him! It's my wallet that's on the∠line this time!"},{"id":1008010121,"text":"Ha, we have you cornered! And you can't fly away from here,∠either. Now be a good boy and give me back my wallet."},{"id":1008010122,"text":"What a joke! I know everything there is to know about this∠city! You'll never catch me!"},{"id":1008010123,"text":"Ciao! Be seeyin' ya!"},{"id":1008010124,"text":"No! There's a passageway?! Oh, my poor wallet..."},{"id":1008010125,"text":"Let's go after him, Commander. This is a∠matter of life and death!"},{"id":1008010126,"text":"Huh? Where are we?"},{"id":1008010127,"text":"What? Who's there?!"},{"id":1008010128,"text":"Ah, Commander ♂㈱ and Fitcher. What is your∠business here?"},{"id":1008010129,"text":"Huh? Well, you see..."},{"id":1008010130,"text":"We're chasing a thief."},{"id":1008010132,"text":"Ah! N-No, no, that's not it..."},{"id":1008010133,"text":"Yes!!! No, I mean, we came to speak with you, General.∠Please hear us out."},{"id":1008010134,"text":"Even you came, Lord ♂㈱... "},{"id":1008010135,"text":"Very well. I shall trust you, ♂㈱.∨Late last night one of our patrols spotted a suspicious∠character. They gave chase, but unfortunately whoever it was∠eluded them.∨However, they did find a secret communique∠dropped by the intruder as they fled.∨The contents of the message proved most unfortunate."},{"id":1008010136,"text":"What did it say?"},{"id":1008010137,"text":"It was a secret pact between Lord Makai and General Kiba∠of Highland. Did you not know of this, Fitcher?"},{"id":1008010138,"text":"No, I haven't heard a thing. Remember, I'm still new here."},{"id":1008010139,"text":"True enough. The secret pact was a peace agreement between∠Two River City and Highland."},{"id":1008010140,"text":"That's great news. Even if it is just a formality, extra∠time is always welcome. For us and for them."},{"id":1008010141,"text":"There is nothing great about it! A condition of the treaty∠grants possession of the Kobold District to those Highland∠scum!!!"},{"id":1008010142,"text":"That's ridiculous! Lord Makai would never agree to terms∠like that."},{"id":1008010143,"text":"All I know is that I can no longer trust humans. I have∠nothing more to say. Now leave before I strike off your∠heads."},{"id":1008010145,"text":"This is exactly what the enemy wants!"},{"id":1008010146,"text":"You're right, Commander. We don't have time to argue right∠now. Let's be going."},{"id":1008010147,"text":"You may be right. But if the communique is to be believed,∠I cannot afford to be idle.∨I have a duty to protect my people.∠Just as your duty is to protect the ♂② Army."},{"id":1008010148,"text":"Let's go back, Commander. We don't have time to argue."},{"id":1008010149,"text":"Strange... This is all too strange. If this is part of the∠enemy's plan, then we're in big trouble.∨We've got to do something..."},{"id":1008010150,"text":"Well then, we look forward to a favorable response."},{"id":1008010151,"text":"I will consider all you have told me."},{"id":1008010152,"text":"I knew I could count on the plenipotentiary of Two River to∠be sensible. After all, we don't want any further bloodshed∠either.∨Now if you will excuse us, we must be going."},{"id":1008010153,"text":"Father, please wait a moment."},{"id":1008010154,"text":"You're Commander ♂㈱, leader of the∠♂② Army, are you not?∨My name is Klaus, tactician for the 3rd Royal Highland∠Company under General Kiba. It is a pleasure to meet you.∨As a fellow soldier, I salute you and wish you luck.∠I look forward to facing you on the field of battle soon.∠Until then, farewell."},{"id":1008010155,"text":"Sorry to keep you waiting."},{"id":1008010156,"text":"So that's ♂㈱, the man who defeated Solon∠Jhee..."},{"id":1008010157,"text":"Yes, I think we can expect him to be a challenging opponent.∠I cannot wait."},{"id":1008010158,"text":"Lord Makai, who was that?"},{"id":1008010159,"text":"Oh, that was General Kiba of the Highland Army. He came to∠Two River to offer a peace treaty."},{"id":1008010160,"text":"A peace treaty?! But..."},{"id":1008010161,"text":"Hey, you stupid humans!"},{"id":1008010162,"text":"Stupid, stupid, stupid! It's an enemy plot! If you believe∠them, you're as dumb as you look!"},{"id":1008010163,"text":"Who in the hell are you?!"},{"id":1008010164,"text":"You Wingers are so full of it!"},{"id":1008010165,"text":"Shut up! You're the ones who are full of it!"},{"id":1008010166,"text":"You're nothing but a bunch of freeloaders! Like you have any∠right to talk about city affairs!"},{"id":1008010167,"text":"Psh, have it your way!"},{"id":1008010168,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Fitcher, did you speak with∠General Ridley?"},{"id":1008010169,"text":"Yes, about that..."},{"id":1008010170,"text":"Let's adjourn in the assembly hall.∠We can't discuss this here."},{"id":1008010171,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, how did it go?"},{"id":1008010172,"text":"Well..."},{"id":1008010173,"text":"Hmm, I see... I'm afraid I have no knowledge of that.∨In any case, we don't have to worry about that now.∠General Kiba just came to offer a peace treaty."},{"id":1008010174,"text":"It's a trick! The Highland Army wants to destroy the City-∠States. They're not really interested in reaching any sort∠of accord."},{"id":1008010175,"text":"Don't be silly. If that were true, why would General Kiba∠risk his life by coming to Two River himself?"},{"id":1008010176,"text":"In order to prove the Kobolds' suspicions, of course.∨Once General Ridley learns that you met with Kiba,∠he'll be all the more mistrustful of humans."},{"id":1008010177,"text":"Oh come now! This is a great chance that we musn't pass up.∠The Kobolds doubt us and the Wingers will be of no help∠either.∨Given the position we're in, we should be grateful to sign∠this treaty and buy ourselves some time."},{"id":1008010178,"text":"Fitcher, you may leave.∨Commander ♂㈱, thank you for everything you've∠done so far. Tomorrow I'll meet General Kiba again to sign∠the peace treaty.∨Unfortunately, it seems I won't be able to assist the∠♂② Army as we discussed. Please forgive me."},{"id":1008010179,"text":"Lord Makai..."},{"id":1008010180,"text":"Commander, it's no good. We can't protect Two River such∠as we are. What else can we..."},{"id":1008010182,"text":"Hey, my wallet!"},{"id":1008010183,"text":"♂㈱! Granny wants to meet you.∨There, I delivered the message!"},{"id":1008010184,"text":"Commander, what do we do? Divided, we don't stand∠a chance even if the reinforcements do arrive in time."},{"id":1008010186,"text":"Reinforcements?"},{"id":1008010187,"text":"Should we go see General Ridley again?"},{"id":1008010188,"text":"Or make another attempt to convince Lord Makai?"},{"id":1008010189,"text":"Either way, running away isn't an option. Not this time..."},{"id":1008010190,"text":"Huh?∨Oh..."},{"id":1008010191,"text":"Forgive me, Commander. I...had a bad feeling about this,∠so I took the liberty of sending a letter to Master Shu∠requesting aid.∨I figured he would understand the situation and send∠reinforcements quickly. I'm sorry I didn't tell you.∨Sometimes these hunches of mine prove wrong and just cause∠more trouble, but this time it looks like I was right..."},{"id":1008010192,"text":"You're late, ♂㈱. Granny's house is this way."},{"id":1008010193,"text":"You are Commander ♂㈱, yes? I am Susu, Great∠Wing of the Winged Horde. A leader, as you would put it.∨Please, come inside."},{"id":1008010194,"text":"First, let me humbly apologize for my grandson. He will be∠punished and will return what he has stolen.∨Commander ♂㈱...∨Could you please show me your right hand?"},{"id":1008010195,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1008010196,"text":"No way, lady."},{"id":1008010197,"text":"The Bright Shield Rune...∨This is the second time in my life I've beheld it. The first∠was when I saw it shining from afar on the hand of Master∠Genkaku."},{"id":1008010198,"text":"Long ago, we lived in the forests of Tinto.∨But then we were driven away. Tinto's famed mines were dug∠on the lands we once called home.∨It was Master Genkaku who invited us to come to this new∠haven.∨But after his good name was sullied by Jowston, our troubles∠and mistreatment by humans began once again."},{"id":1008010199,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... Please, use your power. Use it∠to save us, to save Two River, to save the City-States.∨As you bear the rune and have been acknowledged by it, I∠know you are capable of this.∨Just as Master Genkaku was before you..."},{"id":1008010200,"text":"We have talked long and dusk draws near.∨♂㈱, I pray that bad fortune will not find its∠way to your door..."},{"id":1008010201,"text":"I see...∨Well, it is a special thing, so it should not be shown∠lightly, yes.∨Once before, I beheld it shining from afar on the hand of∠Master Genkaku."},{"id":1008010202,"text":"♂㈱! It sounds like Granny has a lot of faith∠in you!∨But I don't! You're the son of some old hero, huh? So what!∠That doesn't change anything.∨And I'm not returning your wallet either!!!"},{"id":1008010203,"text":"We may be too late.∠Tonight could be our last chance to escape...∨No, as long as there's hope,∠I'll keep fighting for it."},{"id":1008010204,"text":"General Kiba, what is the meaning of this? Were we not meant∠to sign a treaty today?"},{"id":1008010205,"text":"Lord Makai, a leader really shouldn't be so gullible."},{"id":1008010206,"text":"Wh-What?! You mean to break your word?"},{"id":1008010207,"text":"Damn it all, ♂㈱ was right...∨I am the plenipotentiary here, and I will not allow you to∠defile Two River, even if it means my death!"},{"id":1008010208,"text":"Too late! All forces, charge!!!"},{"id":1008010209,"text":"W-We're in serious trouble, Commander... There's no sign∠of the ♂② Army yet either..."},{"id":1008010210,"text":"Aaargh!!"},{"id":1008010211,"text":"Wh-What should we do? ∠If we don't come up with something...◎4∠No, we still have a chance. Let's go talk to General Ridley∠again!"},{"id":1008010212,"text":"We have to hold them here!"},{"id":1008010213,"text":"Okay, let's hurry!"},{"id":1008010214,"text":"Charge!!!"},{"id":1008010215,"text":"Eeek!!! Here they come again!"},{"id":1008010216,"text":"It's no good. Let's go talk to General Ridley again..."},{"id":1008010217,"text":"Get them!"},{"id":1008010218,"text":"Commander, please do something!!!"},{"id":1008010219,"text":"Commander, we've got to hurry!"},{"id":1008010220,"text":"Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1008010221,"text":"General Ridley, what are you doing?! Open your eyes! ∠How can you still say there's a secret pact?!"},{"id":1008010222,"text":"It could all be a ruse. Besides, it is already too late..."},{"id":1008010223,"text":"Are you saying you won't defend Two River?"},{"id":1008010225,"text":"Commander, please say something."},{"id":1008010226,"text":"But..."},{"id":1008010227,"text":"What the..."},{"id":1008010228,"text":"General Ridley! Can't you see that?"},{"id":1008010229,"text":"It is my duty to protect Kobold lives..."},{"id":1008010231,"text":"So you won't fight to save this city?"},{"id":1008010232,"text":"I don't know what to do..."},{"id":1008010233,"text":"But...it is too late..."},{"id":1008010234,"text":"General Ridley!!!"},{"id":1008010235,"text":"This city?"},{"id":1008010236,"text":"That's right. This city. You don't care if it is lost?"},{"id":1008010237,"text":"General. I want to fight. We all love this city."},{"id":1008010238,"text":"Yeah, we want to fight. We can't let the Winged Horde show∠us up, woof!"},{"id":1008010239,"text":"......∨Forgive me, I accept full responsibility for my inaction.∠We may not make it,∠but we shall fight for all we are worth!"},{"id":1008010240,"text":"Yeah!!! Let's go!!! Get them!!! Arooo!!!"},{"id":1008010241,"text":"Damn! How many of them are there?! They just keep∠coming!!!"},{"id":1008010242,"text":"It looks like just us and the Winged Horde aren't∠enough..."},{"id":1008010243,"text":"Do not forget about us!!!"},{"id":1008010244,"text":"General Ridley..."},{"id":1008010245,"text":"Lord Makai, child of the Winged Horde...∨I was wrong. I shouldn't have fixated on trifling details.∨For the honor of the kobolds and the love of Two River, we∠must protect this city!!!"},{"id":1008010246,"text":"General Ridley...∨Commander ♂㈱... Thank you both."},{"id":1008010247,"text":"Lord Makai!!! It's no good. Thanks to the Kobolds, we have∠nowhere to run. At this rate, we'll be slaughtered."},{"id":1008010248,"text":"...Is this where Two River, our homeland, falls to Highland?"},{"id":1008010249,"text":"Not yet! Get 'em, fellas!!!"},{"id":1008010250,"text":"Wh-What the..."},{"id":1008010251,"text":"Don't give up the fight, human! We're gonna protect this∠place together!!!"},{"id":1008010252,"text":"But why are you defending the city?"},{"id":1008010253,"text":"You still don't get it, huh? Okay, listen up! This city is∠ours too!∨You don't think so? Well I was born here! I was raised here!∠I like this city—no, I love this city!∨Why shouldn't I want to protect it?"},{"id":1008010255,"text":"Heh! Gimme a break! You go around actin' so big, and now∠here you are ready to give up just as the fight's gettin'∠started!∨You don't know what it means to love this city! We'll keep∠her safe, even if we gotta do it all by ourselves!!!"},{"id":1008010256,"text":"...Yes. Yes, maybe you're right."},{"id":1008010257,"text":"Yes, from your point of view we may be outsiders.∨But if we all love this city, we should have no problem∠fighting together."},{"id":1008010258,"text":"But, as things stand..."},{"id":1008010259,"text":"We haven't lost yet, Lord Makai."},{"id":1008010260,"text":"There's always hope. Always."},{"id":1008010261,"text":"That's exactly right, Commander ♂㈱. We haven't∠lost yet."},{"id":1008010262,"text":"Indeed, ♂㈱. Your words give us courage."},{"id":1008010264,"text":"Lord Makai, Commander ♂㈱, ∠youth of the Winged Horde...∨I was wrong.∠I shouldn't have fixated on insignificant details.∨For the honor of the Kobolds and the love of Two River,∠we must protect this city!!!"},{"id":1008010265,"text":"Get them! Everyone attack!!!"},{"id":1008010266,"text":"That's right! Protect the city!!!"},{"id":1008010267,"text":"The Kobolds have joined them... But they missed their∠chance to turn the tide. They're ours now! Crush them!!!"},{"id":1008010268,"text":"Commander! Is it really okay?"},{"id":1008010269,"text":"If we leave this land, where would we go? We must all keep her safe!"},{"id":1008010272,"text":"Stubborn bastards..."},{"id":1008010273,"text":"Father."},{"id":1008010274,"text":"What is it, Klaus?"},{"id":1008010275,"text":"We're out of time.∠The ♂② Army has appeared at our rear.∠Also, it seems an army of volunteers from Kobold Village∠is approaching from the south.∨Our gambit has failed. We must not underestimate this."},{"id":1008010278,"text":"...You are right.∨Now, give the order for all troops to withdraw at once.∠Klaus, you have the command."},{"id":1008010279,"text":"Yes, Father."},{"id":1008010280,"text":"Look everyone!!! They're running away!!!"},{"id":1008010281,"text":"It looks like the ♂② Army came,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1008010282,"text":"Good riddance! We saved our city!!! Commander ♂㈱, please wake up."},{"id":1008010285,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1008010287,"text":"What happened? After the battle ended, you just passed∠out.∨But I can imagine you were exhausted. Are you feeling∠rested up now? If you're able, please go see Lord Makai.∠Master Shu is there too."},{"id":1008010288,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we've been expecting you. ∠Are you feeling better?"},{"id":1008010289,"text":"Long time no see, ♂㈱. Look at you, hoggin' all∠the glory! There wasn't anything left for us to do, haha."},{"id":1008010290,"text":"No, without your reinforcements, the Highland Army would∠not have withdrawn as they did. As for the volunteer army∠from Kobold Village... Was that your doing, Master Shu?"},{"id":1008010291,"text":"All I did was tell them the situation. It was your∠reputation, General, that prompted all those volunteers∠to join the battle."},{"id":1008010292,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, somehow we were able to∠defend Two River.∨But the Highland Army still hasn't withdrawn from Jowston∠territory.∨Let us continue this fight together. With your help, I truly∠think we can win this war."},{"id":1008010293,"text":"Whenever the need arises, you can count on our full support!"},{"id":1008010294,"text":"Oh, and, Fitcher? You're fired."},{"id":1008010295,"text":"What?! B-But, Lord Makai. I fought too! Well, I didn't fight∠in that sense, but..."},{"id":1008010296,"text":"Yes, I know very well how hard you worked. I'm firing you∠for a different reason."},{"id":1008010297,"text":"Come again?"},{"id":1008010298,"text":"Master Shu asked if I would lend him your services. He needs∠your skills to help reunite the City-States.∨You'll be of greater help working for the ♂②∠Army than you would here in Two River."},{"id":1008010299,"text":"Huh? Oh, well, I see.∨In that case, it's a pleasure to be working for you, Master∠Shu."},{"id":1008010300,"text":"Yes, I'm going to get a lot of use out of that smart mouth∠of yours."},{"id":1008010301,"text":"Well, let's head home, ♂㈱. This is a nice city∠and all, but we have lots of work to do."},{"id":1008010302,"text":"Well, I'll organize the troops and get back to∠♂① Castle.∨You can return by boat, Commander. I'm sure Tai Ho is sick∠of waiting by now."},{"id":1008010304,"text":"Now, if you'll excuse me."},{"id":1008010305,"text":"Shall we take our leave as well, Commander?"},{"id":1008010306,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱, you leaving already?"},{"id":1008010307,"text":"Yes."},{"id":1008010308,"text":"Maybe."},{"id":1008010309,"text":"Hey, hey, ♂㈱. No, I mean great leader of the∠♂② Army.∨Can you take me with you?"},{"id":1008010310,"text":"Damn, that's cold! Okay, let's go."},{"id":1008010315,"text":"Oh yeah, here. You can have this back, since we're on the∠same side now."},{"id":1008010316,"text":"A-And what about my wallet?"},{"id":1008010317,"text":"Oh, that? I already spent it all."},{"id":1008010318,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1008010319,"text":"Oh come on, it's not like there was much in there."},{"id":1008010320,"text":"Stop right there, you dirty little urchin!!!"},{"id":1008010321,"text":"Thanks, boss.∨Here's your wallet, as promised."},{"id":1008010322,"text":"What?! I think his∠intentions are good...∨...and besides that, he's got my wallet too..."},{"id":1008010324,"text":"C'mon, no need to be such a grump. This war will∠end quicker if I'm out there with you than if I'm here∠protecting this place.∨Don't ya think?"},{"id":1008010326,"text":"True, yeah."},{"id":1008010327,"text":"Hmm, I'm not so sure..."},{"id":1008010328,"text":"Thanks, boss!∨Okay, let's go!!!"},{"id":1008010329,"text":"You're a stubborn one. I said you can't pass, ruff!"},{"id":1008010330,"text":"There is no way you're getting past here, ruff!"},{"id":1008010331,"text":"He's actually becoming more stubborn..."},{"id":1008010332,"text":"The Highland Army is nearby, so you cannot leave at this∠time."},{"id":1008010333,"text":"No one is allowed to leave while the Highland Army is∠outside the gates."},{"id":1008010334,"text":"The Highland Army is out there, so you can't leave Two∠River at this time. Please seek lodging at the Green Leaf∠Inn."},{"id":1008010335,"text":"Oh, will Mister Fitcher be staying with you today?"},{"id":1008010336,"text":"■"},{"id":1008010337,"text":"We've got to go see General Ridley now!"},{"id":1008010338,"text":"No human is ever gonna catch me!"},{"id":1008010344,"text":""},{"id":1008010346,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you should go to the assembly∠hall and meet Lord Makai.∨Master Shu is there as well."},{"id":1008010347,"text":"General Ridley isn't back yet, so I can't let you in, ruff."},{"id":1008010348,"text":"We're sorry we misjudged you humans, but you still can't∠come in, ruff."},{"id":1008010349,"text":"Huh?! Please take a look at our wares."},{"id":1008010363,"text":"Like they say, everyone needs quality runes."},{"id":1008010364,"text":"Hehehe, welcome..."},{"id":1008010365,"text":"Welcome..."},{"id":1008010367,"text":"Yuri"},{"id":1008010368,"text":"Huh? I'll do whatever you say!!!"},{"id":1008010390,"text":"Okay. Good boy, Chaco."},{"id":1008010391,"text":"*wheeze* *wheeze*"},{"id":1008010392,"text":"Chaco, who is this?"},{"id":1008010393,"text":"Wh-What the?!"},{"id":1008010394,"text":"My name is Sid. I thought you left town!"},{"id":1008010396,"text":"Left town? Oh yeah, that was a lie. I just didn't want∠anyone to find me. I like it better down here."},{"id":1008010397,"text":"What?! We had a going away party for you! Gave you presents∠and everything!"},{"id":1008010398,"text":"Yeah, I really appreciated those. Yep, they were very nice∠presents. I felt kinda bad though...for about a second."},{"id":1008010399,"text":"A-A second?! You really need to get your act..."},{"id":1008010400,"text":"What's that, Chaco? I need to get my act together? You sure∠you wanna talk to me that way? Huh, Chaaacooo?"},{"id":1008010401,"text":"Quit it!!! Please stop! Damn, no... You told me so many∠scary stories when I was little that I caught a fever for a∠week and almost died!∨Even now when you start up like that, it makes the flesh on∠my back crawl!!"},{"id":1008010402,"text":"So anyway, Chaco, what are you doing with yourself now?"},{"id":1008010403,"text":"Hmph, like I'm gonna tell you..."},{"id":1008010404,"text":"Chaaacooo!!! I'm gonna eat you alive..."},{"id":1008010405,"text":"Aaah!!! Okay, okay, I'll tell you. I'm a member of the∠♂② Army led by ♂㈱ here."},{"id":1008010406,"text":"Hmm... The ♂② Army, eh? Okay, I've decided.∠I'll go with you!!!"},{"id":1008010407,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1008010408,"text":"I'm getting bored of this place. Besides, I can't let my∠little brother get hurt, can I?"},{"id":1008010409,"text":"Liar! You're just gonna mess with me again! If anyone's∠gonna hurt me, it'll probably be you!!!"},{"id":1008010410,"text":"Oh, Chaaacooo..."},{"id":1008010411,"text":"Eeep..."},{"id":1008010412,"text":"So it looks like I'll be joining you too. Good to meet you,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1008010413,"text":"Well, see you back at the castle."},{"id":1008010414,"text":"Aaah, no! No!!! Please stay away!"},{"id":1008010415,"text":"Hahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1008010416,"text":"Nooo... This is a nightmare..."},{"id":1008010417,"text":"Whew, please hear my tale! I came all the way from Zexen,∠far to the west, because I heard I could open a shop here.∨But they already have an armorer and there's no room for∠another... *sigh* Whatever am I to do?∨Just when I thought I had finally taken my glorious first∠step towards being a real armorer..."},{"id":1008010418,"text":"Oh, it's you... All is without hope for me..."},{"id":1008010419,"text":"Hey, come to our castle."},{"id":1008010420,"text":"I really feel for you..."},{"id":1008010421,"text":"Woe is me..."},{"id":1008010422,"text":"Castle? You have a castle?! Who...who are you?"},{"id":1008010423,"text":"I see... Remarkable. A castle at such a young age...◎2 So do∠you mean to say it's okay if I open a shop in your∠castle?∨H-How much do I have to pay you?"},{"id":1008010424,"text":"You don't have to pay me."},{"id":1008010425,"text":"30,000 potch."},{"id":1008010426,"text":"300,000 potch sounds about right."},{"id":1008010427,"text":"R-Really?! You're too kind! This must be divine providence!∠Fortune truly shines upon me today!"},{"id":1008010428,"text":"Well, let's go without delay! I'm so excited, I want to go∠to ♂① Castle right now before you change your∠mind!"},{"id":1008010429,"text":"Um, 30,000 potch? I see..."},{"id":1008010430,"text":"I'll do it! I don't have it all right now, but I promise∠I'll earn the rest!∨So please reserve the space for me until then, okay!"},{"id":1008010431,"text":"Never fear! I absolutely, positively will get the 30,000∠potch and open my shop!"},{"id":1008010432,"text":"I've been waiting for you, ♂㈱! Over here. This∠way!"},{"id":1008010433,"text":"Here's your 30,000 potch, as promised. You can count it if∠you want."},{"id":1008010434,"text":"You acquired 30,000 potch."},{"id":1008010435,"text":"Ahh, now I can open the shop of my dreams!!!"},{"id":1008010436,"text":"Okay, let's delay no further! I can't wait! Hurry, hurry, we∠must be off to my shop!!!"},{"id":1008010437,"text":"U-Um, 300,000 potch, eh... Th-That's quite a sum. I-I don't∠have that kind of money now, but..."},{"id":1008010438,"text":"Okay, I'll do it! For my dream, I'll do it! I'll get the∠money!!!∨So until then, please save the space for me, okay!"},{"id":1008010439,"text":"Never fear! I absolutely, positively will get the 300,000∠potch and open my shop!"},{"id":1008010441,"text":"Here's your 300,000 potch, as promised. You can count it if∠you want."},{"id":1008010442,"text":"You acquired 300,000 potch."},{"id":1008010443,"text":"Now I can open the shop of my dreams!!! It was hard to get∠all that money, but that makes this all the more meaningful∠now!!!"},{"id":1008010445,"text":"You want somethin' from me?! Huh?!"},{"id":1008010446,"text":"What! I'm almost startin' to think you're∠worthy of my trust...but you still have a little way to go."},{"id":1008010456,"text":"Heh, fine. You're all right in my book. Anyways, I'm off to∠♂① Castle."},{"id":1008010462,"text":"Heeheehee, welcome..."},{"id":1008010463,"text":"Heehee, it's been a long time, ♂㈱... This is∠my...real profession."},{"id":1008010466,"text":"Heeheehee, welcome..."},{"id":1008010467,"text":"Uh, um, err, will you, um, join us?"},{"id":1008010468,"text":"Um, err, I'd like some, uh, runes..."},{"id":1008010469,"text":"Heehee, I'd love to... They're always stealing things and causing a∠ruckus."},{"id":1008010476,"text":"We've got folks from three races here in Two River: humans,∠kobolds, and the Winged Horde.◎3 Not that they get along∠very well, mind you..."},{"id":1008010477,"text":"The girl at the rune shop is just filling in for the owner,∠Jeane, while she's in Greenhill."},{"id":1008010478,"text":"My friend Chaco plays with me all the time. I really like∠him, but my Mom tells me to stay away from him..."},{"id":1008010479,"text":"Hello..."},{"id":1008010480,"text":"The den of the Winged Horde is just ahead, so you'd better∠keep your eyes on your wallet. How awful of them!"},{"id":1008010514,"text":"Jeane the rune sage is such an amazing woman. I'd like to∠know her better..."},{"id":1008010517,"text":"The den of the Winged Horde is just ahead. We actually won!"},{"id":1008010522,"text":""},{"id":1008010523,"text":"The Highland Army is really gone!!!"},{"id":1008010524,"text":"Guess I might've been wrong about those winged folk..."},{"id":1008010525,"text":"It looks like Jeane's gone again. Yay!"},{"id":1008010528,"text":"Guess even the Winged Horde see this city as their home..."},{"id":1008010533,"text":""},{"id":1008010534,"text":"Well, I guess nothing is going to stop those children of the∠Winged Horde from stealing if the war didn't..."},{"id":1008010535,"text":"We've got folks from three races here in Two River: humans,∠kobolds, and the Winged Horde. Amazingly, they all seem to∠be getting along somewhat well now."},{"id":1008010536,"text":""},{"id":1008010537,"text":"I wonder if Chaco will come back to play with me again..."},{"id":1008010543,"text":"Welcome, Commander ♂㈱.
