I welcome the new nation with open arms!"},{"id":1008010555,"text":""},{"id":1008010556,"text":"Finally, the war is really, truly over..."},{"id":1008010557,"text":"We've got folks from three races here in Two River: humans,∠Kobolds, and the Winged Horde. I think the days of racial∠strife may be over for good now."},{"id":1008010558,"text":""},{"id":1008010559,"text":"Will Chaco come home now?"},{"id":1008020001,"text":"Let's see, Two River City is just west of here... Or wait,∠was it south? No, no, it is west. Yeah, I'm sure it's to the∠west of here. You'll know it when you see it, since it's∠directly on the river.∨I'll run on ahead and make the arrangements. Oh, wait just∠a moment."},{"id":1008020002,"text":"Here, I wrote you a letter of introduction. Security is∠bound to be tight since there's no telling when Highland∠will make their move.∨Show this to the guards and they should let you into the∠assembly hall. Well then, I'll see you there."},{"id":1008020003,"text":"You acquired a Letter of Introduction."},{"id":1008020004,"text":"Bein' on dry land for too long gives me the spins, so I'll∠hang out by the boat until you get back."},{"id":1008020005,"text":"Welp, I'll leave the rest to you. Havin' a gangster like me∠in tow won't do much to earn their trust."},{"id":1008020006,"text":"Good grief, are you a man or a mouse? If you want to become∠a real warrior quickly, this is the only way!"},{"id":1008020007,"text":"But Tengaar, this is much too dangerous..."},{"id":1008020008,"text":"Oh, we'll be fine! You're a warrior from Warriors' Village.∠You mustn't show fear."},{"id":1008020009,"text":"It's not that. I'm worried for you..."},{"id":1008020010,"text":"Well, you'll just have to protect me, then. Right?"},{"id":1008020011,"text":"Y-Yes, but—"},{"id":1008020012,"text":"Huh? Ahhh!!! Flik! Viktor! You're alive?! But how? I thought∠you were killed!"},{"id":1008020013,"text":"Nah, it was just a little mix-up."},{"id":1008020014,"text":"Oh no, don't you try and play it off like it was nothing!∠Everyone thinks we're dead because of your \"little mix-up\"!"},{"id":1008020015,"text":"Flik! Viktor! You're alive! I'm so glad..."},{"id":1008020016,"text":"Yeah, sorry 'bout that. Well, good luck!"},{"id":1008020020,"text":"So, Flik, when will you be coming home to the village?"},{"id":1008020021,"text":"Huh? Oh, I, uh..."},{"id":1008020022,"text":"Shh, Hix! He still hasn't completed the journey for his own∠Manhood Ceremony yet. You can't just go asking about∠sensitive topics like that!"},{"id":1008020024,"text":"Wahahahaha! Looks like he struck a nerve."},{"id":1008020025,"text":"Anyway, Hix, we'd better go. We're headed to Kobold Village,∠so we should get there quick if we follow the road south.∠Snap to it, Hix. Ahhh!!! Flik! But how?! You were alive this whole time?"},{"id":1008020031,"text":"Damn that Viktor...◎3 Everyone thinks I'm dead because of him."},{"id":1008020032,"text":"Flik, you're alive! I'm so glad!"},{"id":1008020033,"text":"Hey, don't get all mushy on me. More importantly, Hix, are∠you on your journey for your Manhood Ceremony?"},{"id":1008020038,"text":"Shh, Hix! He still hasn't completed the journey for his∠own Manhood Ceremony yet. You can't just go asking about∠sensitive topics like that!"},{"id":1008020039,"text":"...Gimme a break."},{"id":1008020043,"text":"They haven't changed a bit."},{"id":1008020044,"text":"Huh? Is that really you, Viktor?! You're alive! But what∠happened?"},{"id":1008020045,"text":"Eh, it was just a little mix-up. It'll take more than that∠to make me kick the bucket."},{"id":1008020046,"text":"It's such a relief that you're alive! Did Flik survive too?"},{"id":1008020047,"text":"Yeah, he's still kicking. She is gone."},{"id":1008030075,"text":"Where did she go?!"},{"id":1008030076,"text":"Probably to the Unicorn Woods... If you take all three∠items deep into the woods and face the unicorn, you should∠be able to reclaim her from the beast."},{"id":1008030077,"text":"Face the unicorn in the forest..."},{"id":1008030078,"text":"I've spoken with the guards at the entrance to the forest.∠But beware, young warrior, those woods are full of fearsome∠monsters.∨Know also that if you are not a noble warrior, the∠unicorn will take your life.∨Think carefully on this before you proceed."},{"id":1008030079,"text":"...........∨I'll be okay... I must save Tengaar. She's all that matters.∨Let's finish this, ♂㈱."},{"id":1008030080,"text":"T-Tengaar?"},{"id":1008030081,"text":"Wow, you made it all the way here! Good job. You ran around∠all over the place and traversed these woods all for my∠sake...∨You're already a great warrior in my eyes."},{"id":1008030082,"text":"Good job? Wait..."},{"id":1008030083,"text":"Did you fake this whole thing?!"},{"id":1008030084,"text":"How...how could you be so selfish?"},{"id":1008030085,"text":"I'm sorry, Hix."},{"id":1008030086,"text":"It's all because I heard you were from Warriors' Village.∠Clift the Crusader, who founded the Warriors' Village, is a∠legend even here among my people.∨Hoping to be of service to a fledgling warrior from that∠very same village, I offered to assist this young lady."},{"id":1008030087,"text":"Then, then...what about the blue stone, the red flower, and∠the green bell?"},{"id":1008030088,"text":"Hohoho. Why, I had the villagers pitch in by placing those∠items about.∨I haven't heard anyone speak of the Test of the Unicorn since∠I was a child. It's just an old fairy tale from bygone∠years."},{"id":1008030089,"text":"That will not do, O Chief of the Kobold Village..."},{"id":1008030090,"text":"Wha?!"},{"id":1008030091,"text":"A-A...u-u-unicorn!!!"},{"id":1008030092,"text":"A-Aaah!!!"},{"id":1008030093,"text":"Yikes!!! It's the unicorn!!!"},{"id":1008030094,"text":"W-We'll be eaten alive!!!"},{"id":1008030095,"text":"Art thou a maiden?"},{"id":1008030096,"text":"Wh-What if I am?"},{"id":1008030097,"text":"Then I shall take thee from here..."},{"id":1008030098,"text":"Y-You can't! Tengaar is..."},{"id":1008030099,"text":"Wilst thou persist?"},{"id":1008030100,"text":"Ulp..."},{"id":1008030101,"text":"Wilst thou try to stop me?"},{"id":1008030102,"text":"Hix!!!"},{"id":1008030103,"text":"............∨I...I probably can't win, and I probably won't ever be a∠warrior...∨But...but I will protect Tengaar!!! I have sworn it! On this∠sword!!!"},{"id":1008030104,"text":"Noble warrior, pure-hearted maiden, I wish thee both good∠fortune..."},{"id":1008030105,"text":"Well, that was quite a surprise."},{"id":1008030106,"text":"I never thought the unicorn would actually appear."},{"id":1008030107,"text":"Heehee, but you did it, Hix! You've been acknowledged as a∠warrior by the unicorn!"},{"id":1008030108,"text":"Yeah... And now we can go back to the village."},{"id":1008030109,"text":"Are you serious? After all the help ♂㈱ gave∠you, the least we can do is return the favor."},{"id":1008030110,"text":"Huh? Uh, what?"},{"id":1008030111,"text":"What I'm getting at is that Hix and I... Well... How about∠we join you?"},{"id":1008030113,"text":"Uh..."},{"id":1008030114,"text":"What? But..."},{"id":1008030115,"text":"C'mon, Hix. Get it together."},{"id":1008030116,"text":"See, ♂㈱ said it's okay too!"},{"id":1008030117,"text":"I know, it's just..."},{"id":1008030119,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I, Tengaar, and the warrior Hix∠will join the ♂② Army as representatives of∠the Warriors' Village.∨Thank you for having us."},{"id":1008030120,"text":"I-It's an honor, Commander."},{"id":1008030121,"text":"Well, Commander, we'll go ahead to ♂① Castle. ∠C'mon, we're leaving."},{"id":1008030122,"text":"W-Wait for me, Tengaar!"},{"id":1008030123,"text":"Next up is the red flower! Let's go to the Cave of the Wind!"},{"id":1008030124,"text":"All that's left is the green bell! We need to make our way∠to Two River and get it!"},{"id":1008030125,"text":"I-I guess we have to go to the Unicorn Woods... Tengaar∠needs me."},{"id":1008030128,"text":"Oh, the blue stone is in South Window's general store...I∠think."},{"id":1008030129,"text":"Let's see... Oh, oh yes, the red flower is in the Cave of∠the Wind south of ♂① Castle."},{"id":1008030130,"text":"Where was it again... Oh yes, that's right! The green bell∠is underneath Two River."},{"id":1008030131,"text":"That girl must be in the Unicorn Woods..."},{"id":1008030142,"text":"50 potch per per person, ♂③ potch total. Same∠price for humans and kobolds."},{"id":1008030143,"text":"Goodnight..."},{"id":1008030145,"text":"See ya!"},{"id":1008030146,"text":"Hello! Rise and shine! Oh, and don't∠worry, we have items for humans too."},{"id":1008030149,"text":"Okay, will there be anything else?"},{"id":1008030156,"text":"Can't equip that, sorry."},{"id":1008030157,"text":"See you again! Bye! Bye! Bye!"},{"id":1008030159,"text":"...What's that strange noise? A voice?"},{"id":1008030163,"text":"Who hast summoned me? Was it thee, maiden?"},{"id":1008030164,"text":"M-Maiden... In the name of the Spirits, let us make a∠pact..."},{"id":1008030167,"text":"Say yes."},{"id":1008030168,"text":"Say no."},{"id":1008030169,"text":"Thanks, ♂㈱. I'm sorry, but the answer is no."},{"id":1008030170,"text":"So be it. I egress once more to the shadowed glades..."},{"id":1008030171,"text":"I-I... Uh, okay...∠Um, y-yes, please."},{"id":1008030172,"text":"And so it shall be done... By the ancient pact, I pledge my∠might as a member of the White Conclave to this holy∠maiden..."},{"id":1008030173,"text":"My strength, in service to thee..."},{"id":1008030174,"text":"Wh-What was that all about? What do you think he meant,∠♂㈱?"},{"id":1008030177,"text":"Is something wrong?"},{"id":1008030178,"text":"I apologize... The mistake was mine own. Farewell..."},{"id":1008030179,"text":"What?! What the hell does that mean? What a rude creature...∠Next time he won't get away so easily!!!"},{"id":1008030180,"text":"I'm in trouble... Big, big trouble..."},{"id":1008030181,"text":"I'm in trouble... Big, big trouble... What am I gonna do?"},{"id":1008030183,"text":"Not my problem."},{"id":1008030184,"text":"Aw... *sniffle*"},{"id":1008030185,"text":"Oh, um... I ran all this way with Granddaddy's sheep, see?∨But then the sheep... Really? Thank you, mister!"},{"id":1008030190,"text":"The sheep ran that way. *sniffle* I'll wait right here. Now there are just two left."},{"id":1008030194,"text":"Wow, you're the best, mister! There's just one more!"},{"id":1008030195,"text":"Yay! You're the coolest! The sheep went into the woods∠because they were hungry...∨I don't know where Granddaddy is, and I need to take the∠sheep somewhere safe..."},{"id":1008030199,"text":"Take them to my place."},{"id":1008030201,"text":"R-Really?! Got any idea what they say?"},{"id":1008030207,"text":"Whatcha tradin'?"},{"id":1008030208,"text":"Buy all ya can!"},{"id":1008030209,"text":"Okay, thanks."},{"id":1008030211,"text":"How many ya sellin'?"},{"id":1008030212,"text":"If you see any crystal balls, buy some for me. I'm gonna∠hold you to it."},{"id":1008030213,"text":"This is Kobold Village, where each and every one of us is∠happy."},{"id":1008030214,"text":"The chief's house is the big one in the back of town."},{"id":1008030215,"text":"Hoho! Where'd the little girl with the lost sheep go? Maybe∠she found them all?"},{"id":1008030220,"text":"Crystal balls are very pretty. I hope everyone can enjoy∠them as much as I do."},{"id":1008030221,"text":"You mustn't go to the forest. The big, white, scary,∠hideous monster will eat you alive."},{"id":1008030222,"text":"Heheheh. I sure am cool and stylish. Ain't that the truth."},{"id":1008030223,"text":"Yeah, this is the chief's house. I'm just keeping watch∠here."},{"id":1008030224,"text":"Greetings, visitors. You must try it out."},{"id":1008030225,"text":"I, like, totally want to join the ♂② Army!∠But I'm kinda scared of having to fight."},{"id":1008030226,"text":"Good day. I wonder∠what school's like..."},{"id":1008030230,"text":"Grandpa sleeps all day, but if you want, I can talk with∠you."},{"id":1008030231,"text":"My grandchildren are such wonderful kids. All of them.∠Wonderful, wonderful kids."},{"id":1008030232,"text":"I hope it's almost time to eat..."},{"id":1008030233,"text":"Butter! Butter! Butter!!! Bread tastes better with butter!"},{"id":1008030234,"text":"No, jam. Jam! It's always been jam since the beginning of∠time. Jam and only jam."},{"id":1008030235,"text":"It's so lonely eating by myself. I wonder how I can get a∠bride... Maybe if I ask the chief..."},{"id":1008030236,"text":""},{"id":1008030237,"text":""},{"id":1008030238,"text":""},{"id":1008030239,"text":"Hello there, fine guests! Welcome to the Kobold Inn. So, like, I come to play here.∠It's really cool."},{"id":1008030241,"text":"I'm gonna have some tea and return to my guard post. I have∠to be alert when I'm on watch... "},{"id":1008030250,"text":"Collars only look good on us Kobolds. It's true."},{"id":1008030251,"text":"Did you try the meat pie? How did it taste?"},{"id":1008030252,"text":"Oh, welcome. We're∠mobilizing our forces, but what do you intend to do?"},{"id":1009010037,"text":"I'll be watching."},{"id":1009010039,"text":"Huh? Wha? You mean me?!"},{"id":1009010040,"text":"Well then, we'd best be off. We haven't much time."},{"id":1009010041,"text":"Then I'll wait right here. Please hurry."},{"id":1009010042,"text":"Commander, you don't have many troops to spare, so you'd∠best not overextend yourself.∨Especially since you have a lady to watch over."},{"id":1009010044,"text":"Then I bid you farewell here. I haven't much time."},{"id":1009010046,"text":"Aye, sir..."},{"id":1009010048,"text":"Calm yourself, Miklotov. What do you expect to accomplish∠by charging into enemy territory alone?"},{"id":1009010049,"text":"You fail to understand!∨I have to see with my own eyes. I have to see what those∠Highland villains are doing in Muse! Do not try to stop me,∠Camus."},{"id":1009010050,"text":"I see. I will not interfere then."},{"id":1009010051,"text":"What to do... Rushing off to Muse on his own is madness.∨Commander ♂㈱, I cannot leave this castle. I ∠must stay behind to respond to Lord Gordeau's capricious∠commands.∨You can reach Muse through the border crossing southeast of∠here. I beg of you... Please protect Miklotov."},{"id":1009010052,"text":"Please wait, Sir Miklotov! It's suicide to go to Muse alone."},{"id":1009010053,"text":"Don't worry, I'll be careful. I have to see what's happening∠in Muse for myself. I will return soon!"},{"id":1009010054,"text":"B-But—"},{"id":1009010055,"text":"The rest is in your hands!"},{"id":1009010056,"text":"So you've returned, Miklotov! I am glad that you are safe."},{"id":1009010057,"text":"Yes. I met Commander ♂㈱ on the way, and we∠traveled together. But never mind that, where is Lord∠Gordeau?"},{"id":1009010058,"text":"Did something happen? It's not like you to be so imperious."},{"id":1009010059,"text":"Oh yes, something very much happened! Well, I only learned∠fragments of the story, but those Highland dogs are doing∠something truly vile!"},{"id":1009010060,"text":"Simmer down. A knight should know how to control his∠temper."},{"id":1009010061,"text":"But I cannot!∨Please step aside, Camus! This emotion cannot be controlled!"},{"id":1009010062,"text":"Huh. What's gotten into him?"},{"id":1009010063,"text":"Explain yourself, Miklotov."},{"id":1009010064,"text":"Lord Gordeau, I have a request. Please let me lead the∠Knights, or even just my own Blue Knights, in an attack on∠Muse."},{"id":1009010065,"text":"Are you mad? Why would we ever do something so ludicrous?∠The Highland Army has shown they have no desire to fight us,∠yet you suggest we go pick a quarrel with them?"},{"id":1009010066,"text":"The Highland Army gathered all the people of Muse and the∠nearby villages, then sacrificed them in some bizarre ritual!∠They were massacred!∨We can't go on pretending to not see what's happening!∠What of our honor as knights?!"},{"id":1009010067,"text":"I do not know what you saw, but we Knights have the∠responsibility of governing this land. We cannot endanger∠its people."},{"id":1009010068,"text":"There is no guarantee that Highland will leave us be for∠long. No, once the other City-States have fallen, I am∠certain that Luca Blight will bare his fangs at us next!"},{"id":1009010069,"text":"That is enough out of you! This \"massacre\" you're babbling∠about, did you actually see it with your own eyes?"},{"id":1009010070,"text":"N-No, but it is a fact that they hunted down all the∠refugees..."},{"id":1009010071,"text":"Silence! You speak of \"knight's honor\"?∨Did you not pledge an undying oath of loyalty to me, the∠leader of the Knights of Matilda, by the emblem upon your∠chest?∨Is breaking that pledge part of a \"knight's honor\"?"},{"id":1009010072,"text":"Urk..."},{"id":1009010073,"text":"I did...swear an oath on this emblem. That is indeed my∠honor as a knight."},{"id":1009010074,"text":"Good, then let it remain that way. Now if you're finished∠with this foolishness, get out of my sight!"},{"id":1009010075,"text":"Breaking an oath...breaking an oath of loyalty once given is∠the greatest shame a knight can commit.∨But..."},{"id":1009010076,"text":"I... I...∨I am a human first and a knight second!!! I don't∠need any titles! I will gladly wear this shame!∨But I cannot allow this to stand! I will never look idly on∠while lives are being extinguished so needlessly!"},{"id":1009010077,"text":"Y-You dare to break your solemn oath?!"},{"id":1009010078,"text":"Miklotov, get ahold of yourself. Hold steady."},{"id":1009010079,"text":"You're here just in time, Camus. Arrest this man! Throw him∠in the dungeon."},{"id":1009010080,"text":"Arrest Miklotov? I could never do that."},{"id":1009010081,"text":"What are you..."},{"id":1009010082,"text":"I guess I have broken my oath as well.∠There is no reason for me now to listen to your orders."},{"id":1009010083,"text":"Camus..."},{"id":1009010084,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please allow Miklotov and I to∠join the ♂② Army. The lowest ranks are fine.∨We may no longer be knights, but we still possess our hearts∠and our swords. Surely they will aid you."},{"id":1009010085,"text":"T-Traitors! Y-You can't just leave! You, guards, seize them∠all!!!"},{"id":1009010086,"text":"Quickly, now! That's an order!!!"},{"id":1009010088,"text":"Sir Camus, Sir Miklotov, please let me accompany you.∠I want to fight by your sides."},{"id":1009010089,"text":"Wh-What are you..."},{"id":1009010090,"text":"Sir Miklotov, please take me too."},{"id":1009010091,"text":"You fools! So you've turned a handful of knights against me!∠What do you think that will accomplish?!"},{"id":1009010092,"text":"I am sorry, everyone... Commander ♂㈱, we∠cannot remain here any longer."},{"id":1009010093,"text":"Let's escape the city before Gordeau summons his soldiers."},{"id":1009010094,"text":"Miklotov, you go with Commander ♂㈱. I'll talk∠with some of the other knights and catch up to you.∠I should be able to convince a few more to join us...∨Although, it does not sit well with me to council them∠towards treason..."},{"id":1009010095,"text":"Be careful."},{"id":1009010096,"text":"Don't worry, I'll be along soon."},{"id":1009010097,"text":"Now, we must hurry. Gordeau has likely already sealed the∠Muse border, so let's escape through Greenhill."},{"id":1009010098,"text":"Add Miklotov to your party."},{"id":1009010099,"text":"Add Miklotov to convoy."},{"id":1009010100,"text":"We managed to make it back..."},{"id":1009010101,"text":"Yes, but the people of Muse... ∠Commander ♂㈱, I'm certain Lord Gordeau∠will understand when we inform him of the incidents.∨I swear Luca Blight will fall by my own two hands."},{"id":1009010102,"text":"Hurry, ♂㈱! Now the Knightdom of Matilda∠will join our side for sure!"},{"id":1009010103,"text":"Tsk... Persistent bastards."},{"id":1009010104,"text":"But if we can diminish their ranks now, we can gain an∠advantage over them."},{"id":1009010105,"text":"Okay, let's go! No dragging your heels, Matilda Knights!"},{"id":1009010106,"text":"Now, give the signal."},{"id":1009010107,"text":"Now, get in there and distract the enemy as much as you can."},{"id":1009010108,"text":"Okay!"},{"id":1009010109,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, there isn't much time left. If∠the enemy returns before the flag is destroyed, the∠♂② Army's fate is sealed.∨We'll follow when it's safe, Commander, but please find the∠flag as quickly as possible!"},{"id":1009010110,"text":"Yeah, we know. Don't you worry about a thing. Nanami's here∠to make sure everything works out just fine. Okay, move out!∠Let's go!"},{"id":1009010111,"text":"There's been a message from General Kiba!"},{"id":1009010112,"text":"Read it."},{"id":1009010113,"text":"A-Aye, sir. General Kiba engaged Leon Silverberg's forces∠east of Muse, and then..."},{"id":1009010114,"text":"...during the battle, General Kiba was mortally wounded..."},{"id":1009010115,"text":"I see..."},{"id":1009010116,"text":"Father..."},{"id":1009010117,"text":"Anyway, we have to get to the top of the castle. I wonder∠which way we should go, though... Oh well, we'll figure it∠out. Let's just keep moving."},{"id":1009010118,"text":"*pant* *pant* ∠It wasn't easy, but we made it.∠Well, let's get this over with!"},{"id":1009010119,"text":"What are you looking for, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1009010121,"text":"♂㈱, Nanami... I don't know what you're doing∠here, but I won't let you pass."},{"id":1009010122,"text":"J-Jowy! No, don't do this!"},{"id":1009010123,"text":"It seems we must fight."},{"id":1009010124,"text":"I don't want to fight you."},{"id":1009010125,"text":"♂㈱! What are you saying?! No! You can't mean∠that!!!∨Why? Why must you and Jowy fight?!"},{"id":1009010126,"text":"Yeah! Why? Why?! Why do you two have to fight?!"},{"id":1009010127,"text":"Because it's fate...◎0 That's got to be the answer.∨♂㈱, there are many people who are counting on∠you. To the ♂② Army, you represent hope∠itself...∨But I, too...I have people who need me. People who believe∠in me."},{"id":1009010128,"text":"No, no way! That's not true!!! I don't believe in destiny!∠Grandpa Genkaku didn't either! It's just a big lie!!!∨I can't believe that's why...why the ♂② Army∠needs to fight Highland...∨Why ♂㈱ and Jowy have to fight..."},{"id":1009010129,"text":"This land, our home... It's not big enough for both∠Highland and the City-States...∨That fact is what led to all this fighting, all this∠sadness. Those doubts formed in my mind the day of the∠meeting between the City-States on Jowston Hill.∨I saw the Alliance, established so its members could∠co-exist in peace, was itself a maelstrom of discord,∠jealousy, and antagonism.∨I will establish a single, mighty nation in this land, one∠that has nothing to do with Highland or the City-States.∨A powerful, undivided nation, born of force and wielding∠force. That's the one and only way to free this land from∠war."},{"id":1009010130,"text":"But...we still don't need to fight."},{"id":1009010132,"text":"The time for talk is over. Now we have to settle this..."},{"id":1009010133,"text":"No..."},{"id":1009010134,"text":"Bwahaha! What good fortune to walk in and find the two of∠you fighting. Now I can kill you both and take this land∠for Matilda!∨I can take everything! Okay men, aim carefully...◎2 Fire!!!"},{"id":1009010136,"text":"Look out!"},{"id":1009010137,"text":"Just like Grandpa Genkaku showed me!!! His secret∠technique..."},{"id":1009010138,"text":"Nanami!!!"},{"id":1009010140,"text":"Ah... I-I messed it up... But...I'm...okay..."},{"id":1009010141,"text":"You missed. Well, I guess that is alright.∠I'll send these kids to the gallows with my own blade!"},{"id":1009010142,"text":"Bastard..."},{"id":1009010143,"text":"Urgh..."},{"id":1009010144,"text":"Nanami... Are you okay?"},{"id":1009010145,"text":"I-I'm so happy...to finally see...the gentle face...of the∠old Jowy...again...∨I'm...okay... I'll be okay... S-So don't...fight..."},{"id":1009010147,"text":"Nanami...◎1 I'm sorry.∨♂㈱... Take care of her for me."},{"id":1009010148,"text":"♂●-♂㈱..."},{"id":1009010149,"text":"U-Um, I... I'll...I'll be...okay...∨But please...just...once... Call me...\"Big Sister\"..."},{"id":1009010150,"text":"Big Sister..."},{"id":1009010152,"text":"Th-Thank you... I feel...better now..."},{"id":1009010153,"text":"Ha...haha... Those...almost sound like...like last...∠words..."},{"id":1009010154,"text":"Hey...◎1♂㈱... You...and me...◎2and...Genkaku...∨We're not...related by blood... ◎1But...we...◎2really were...a∠family...◎1weren't we...∨I'm glad...◎1I got to be...◎2Genkaku's child...◎2 And I'm∠glad...I got to be...◎1your big sister...∨And...I'm glad...◎2I was...Jowy's friend...∨And I'm glad...◎1we...were all...◎4together..."},{"id":1009010155,"text":"Commander... What happened?!"},{"id":1009010156,"text":"You lot! Destroy the flag!"},{"id":1009010157,"text":"Yes, sir!"},{"id":1009010158,"text":"You two! Get a doctor! Hurry!!!"},{"id":1009010159,"text":"And you! Summon Dr. Huan! Now!!!"},{"id":1009010160,"text":"Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1009010162,"text":"...She's still breathing. We have to get her to∠♂① Castle. If we can treat her wounds quickly∠enough, then maybe we have a chance...∨But there are too many enemy soldiers outside..."},{"id":1009010163,"text":"The Highland Army is withdrawing!"},{"id":1009010165,"text":"Really? Th-Thank goodness. Let's hurry back to∠♂① Castle!"},{"id":1009010166,"text":"...Prepare a message. Send the armies of Two River and∠Tinto back home.∨We can't leave those borders empty any longer."},{"id":1009010167,"text":"We'll be there soon."},{"id":1009010168,"text":"Over here! Don't let them get away!!!"},{"id":1009010169,"text":"More pursuers, huh? Okay, we'll hold 'em here!∠♂㈱, Nanami, you go on ahead!"},{"id":1009010170,"text":"O-Okay, got it. Come on, ♂㈱! Take care,∠everyone!!!"},{"id":1009010171,"text":"You too!"},{"id":1009010172,"text":"It's a bit...too quiet. Let's hurry, ♂㈱."},{"id":1009010173,"text":"♂㈱, that's the wrong way!!!"},{"id":1009010174,"text":"O-Okay, I understand. Be careful... ◎3 Let's go,∠♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1009010175,"text":"We'll draw away the enemies on the front line, so please∠advance while they're distracted!"},{"id":1009010177,"text":"I wish you luck in battle."},{"id":1009010179,"text":"It would be unwise to go any further."},{"id":1009010180,"text":"No, no way! That's not true!!! I don't believe in destiny!∠♂▼0Grandpa Genkaku didn't either! It's all just a big lie!!!∨♂▼1I can't believe that's why...why the ♂② Army∠needs to fight Highland...∨♂▼2Why ♂㈱ and Jowy have to fight..."},{"id":1009010181,"text":"This land, our home... It's not big enough for both∠Highland and the City-States...∨♂▼3That is what led to all this fighting, all this∠sadness. A question formed in my mind the day of the∠meeting on Jowston Hill.∨The Alliance, established so its members could∠co-exist in peace, was itself a mixture of discord,∠jealousy, and antagonism.∨I will establish a single, mighty nation in this land, one∠nothing to do with Highland or the City-States.∨A powerful, undivided nation, born of force and wielding∠force. That's the one and only way of forever freeing this∠land from war."},{"id":1009010182,"text":"Nanami, I'm sorry...∨♂▼0♂㈱... Look after her for me."},{"id":1009010214,"text":"Welcome! Come on in!"},{"id":1009010215,"text":"Hey, welcome to our shop. Medicine is more important than∠armor, don't you agree?"},{"id":1009010216,"text":"...Good day."},{"id":1009010217,"text":"Whatever your needs, you'd be wise to get yourself a good∠set of armor first."},{"id":1009010218,"text":"Come in, come in! This is the best appraisal shop in all of∠Rockaxe."},{"id":1009010219,"text":"Welcome! Now that things have settled down a bit, I can∠finally devote myself to my business."},{"id":1009010220,"text":"Welcome, friend. It's a little noisy here what with all the∠traders, but I can guarantee you'll find the food to your∠liking."},{"id":1009010221,"text":"So good to see you. Have you perchance come across anything∠interesting?"},{"id":1009010222,"text":"Hey there. Where are you from, sir? The Grasslands? No?∠Highland! Don't hear that too often!"},{"id":1009010223,"text":"Come on in. What can I do for you?"},{"id":1009010224,"text":"Hey, do you know a tall woman with blonde hair?"},{"id":1009010225,"text":"Uh, um..."},{"id":1009010226,"text":"Do you know her?"},{"id":1009010227,"text":"I'm not sure I'd put it that way, but..."},{"id":1009010228,"text":"That's right, some woman I'd never seen before came in∠here. She had a great butt on her, lemme tell ya. Anyway,∠when I tried to chat her up, that's when things got bad..."},{"id":1009010229,"text":"Yeah, she just suddenly kicked us to the ground, whipped out∠this magic thingamajig and blew off my beautiful mustache!∠No way I'd forget that!"},{"id":1009010230,"text":"And do you remember where she went?"},{"id":1009010231,"text":"Yeah, I remember, I remember! Lessee..."},{"id":1009010232,"text":"Uh, I think it was..."},{"id":1009010233,"text":"Am I gonna have to blow off the other half of your mustache?"},{"id":1009010234,"text":"Sorry... It's just that it happened so long ago.∨If you had come ♂③ or so days ago, I probably would have∠remembered..."},{"id":1009010235,"text":"I see..."},{"id":1009010236,"text":"We're all out of clues. If only we had gotten here sooner."},{"id":1009010237,"text":"Hey, do you know a woman named Elza? Tall, with blonde∠hair?"},{"id":1009010247,"text":"No, hold up, I got it! I remember now... It was, uh...∠Radat Town, I think?"},{"id":1009010248,"text":"So, he said she went to Radat, near South Window City."},{"id":1009010249,"text":"Radat... I'll get her this time."},{"id":1009010250,"text":"Let's go back to Radat, ♂㈱."},{"id":1009010252,"text":"I enjoy watching this town from here. It doesn't look like∠it ever changes, but it does, bit by bit, and I love seeing∠this."},{"id":1009010253,"text":"How goes the war with Highland? It seems the Knightdom∠doesn't intend to join in..."},{"id":1009010254,"text":"We've lost contact with both Muse and Greenhill. Who knows∠what will happen next..."},{"id":1009010255,"text":"They say there's a secret passage linking this town to the∠castle. It's probably there just in case enemies ever∠invade..."},{"id":1009010256,"text":"Sir Miklotov is the captain of us Blue Knights. But I've∠heard he hasn't been seeing eye to eye with Lord Gordeau∠these days..."},{"id":1009010257,"text":"Southeast of here is Highway Village. Heading further in∠that direction and then passing through the border to Muse∠is a popular trade route."},{"id":1009010258,"text":"When will this war come to an end? If it were to spread to∠Matilda..."},{"id":1009010259,"text":"I hate not knowing what tomorrow will bring."},{"id":1009010260,"text":"Welcome, friend. Since the Muse checkpoint closed, we∠haven't had a lot of traders visiting us."},{"id":1009010261,"text":"Just when is the Knightdom planning to join the battle∠against Highland? Why, there's even talk that they may even∠have a secret treaty with them..."},{"id":1009010262,"text":"The Knightdom is very strong. I'm going to be a Red Knight."},{"id":1009010263,"text":"I heard the ♂② Army is at war with∠Highland... I wonder why the Knightdom isn't helping?"},{"id":1009010264,"text":""},{"id":1009010265,"text":"My husband and my father are rivals, but I just can't see∠why a general store and an armorer have to compete..."},{"id":1009010266,"text":"Moving stuff for both the armorer and the general store all∠by myself is pretty rough, but the pay makes up for it."},{"id":1009010267,"text":"I wanna study runes at Greenhill! Then I can stick 'em on∠people just like sis does!"},{"id":1009010268,"text":"Our daughter is studying runes at the Academy in Greenhill,∠so we've been terribly worried since it fell to Highland."},{"id":1009010269,"text":"Dad is troubled about something..."},{"id":1009010270,"text":"My husband... Lately he doesn't talk even when he comes∠home. I think it has something to do with Lord Gordeau..."},{"id":1009010271,"text":"Our Knightdom exists to protect the City-States. and yet∠they won't let us fight, even with Muse and Greenhill fallen∠into Highland hands..."},{"id":1009010272,"text":"Captain Camus is the kind of man who would never show it,∠but I bet he's longing to fight Highland."},{"id":1009010273,"text":"The Knighthood was established to protect the City-States∠with help from Muse. I think now is the time to repay that∠debt..."},{"id":1009010274,"text":"While we're able to eke out a living on supplies brought∠in from the Grasslands for now, I can't see this war with∠Highland ending anytime soon..."},{"id":1009010275,"text":"Grandpa is upset because the Knightdom won't fight∠Highland, but I'd rather not get entangled in that war."},{"id":1009010282,"text":"Are you a visitor here? The inn is just ahead on this∠road. Are you really just visiting? If you're lying,∠they'll cut you down."},{"id":1009010283,"text":"This town is full of knights, so it's the only safe place∠around."},{"id":1009010284,"text":"The proprietor here usually goes out to buy his stock∠himself, but he's had to sideline that for the time being."},{"id":1009010285,"text":"We want to fight Highland as much as the rest, but our∠commander's orders are absolute. That is the vow we take as∠knights."},{"id":1009010286,"text":"Lord Gordeau has a plan, and it is our duty as knights∠to obey it."},{"id":1009010291,"text":"The market for antiques is so strong here in Rockaxe, so the∠appraisers get a lot of business."},{"id":1009010292,"text":"After what happened to Muse and Greenhill, can we really∠rely on the ♂② Army?"},{"id":1009010293,"text":"Sir Camus and Sir Miklotov are very kind to us, but the∠commander... I cannot stand him."},{"id":1009010294,"text":"Have you been to Highway Village southeast of here? They∠also have a trading post."},{"id":1009010295,"text":"Yep, the market for antiques is certainly the most lively∠one in these parts."},{"id":1009010296,"text":"Knights are always buying antiques and such as status∠symbols, so the prices can get quite high."},{"id":1009010297,"text":"Books are heavy but they're worth the effort to haul here∠since they sell for so much."},{"id":1009010298,"text":"Only idiots lug around books. I deal in pearls. You need∠funds to buy them, but they're light and compact."},{"id":1009010299,"text":"Oh, are you a trader too? You sure don't look it."},{"id":1009010300,"text":"Everyone here collects antiques, but red peppers also sell∠for really high prices."},{"id":1009010311,"text":"The knights here are usually gentlemen, but a bit too∠naive. Sir Camus is different though..."},{"id":1009010312,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you are most welcome here.∠Lord Gordeau awaits inside."},{"id":1009010313,"text":"Welcome to our home, Rockaxe. We knights receive you with∠open arms."},{"id":1009010322,"text":"Sir Miklotov is very driven, and sometimes acts without∠thought of the consequences. Personally, I think that's a∠virtue."},{"id":1009010323,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, how did it go? If you have some∠spare time, why not explore Rockaxe a bit?"},{"id":1009010324,"text":"Have you met Lord Gordeau yet?"},{"id":1009010325,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, if I may be blunt, we all want∠to fight Highland. But..."},{"id":1009010326,"text":"To a knight, the orders of one's lord are absolute. That's∠what makes us knights."},{"id":1009010327,"text":"The commander has his reasons, we have to believe that or..."},{"id":1009010328,"text":""},{"id":1009010352,"text":"☆0∠        Barrel Full of Fruit"},{"id":1009010355,"text":"☆0∠      Cart Piled with Cargo"},{"id":1009010357,"text":"☆0∠       Barrel Full of Plants "},{"id":1009010358,"text":"☆0∠          Basket of
