I hate to leave you two going off alone, but, well,∠please be very careful!!!"},{"id":1009080313,"text":"Godspeed, and return to us safely!"},{"id":1009080315,"text":"Brrrooaarrr!!!"},{"id":1009080316,"text":"Screeeee!!!"},{"id":1009080317,"text":"Please stay alert..."},{"id":1009080318,"text":"Look after yourselves."},{"id":1009080319,"text":"Don't do anything foolish..."},{"id":1009080320,"text":"♂㈱! Get back to us safe!"},{"id":1009080321,"text":"♂㈱, Nanami! You guys be careful!"},{"id":1009080322,"text":"Heheheheh... Be careful, be very careful..."},{"id":1009080323,"text":"Please be careful..."},{"id":1009080324,"text":"Be careful, you guys!"},{"id":1009080326,"text":"Make sure you come back to us!"},{"id":1009080327,"text":"Keep your wits about you!"},{"id":1009080330,"text":"My dear friends, all I ask is that you be careful."},{"id":1009080331,"text":"It is such pain to part with a friend... So please be∠careful!"},{"id":1009080332,"text":"Be careful!!!"},{"id":1009080333,"text":"Tread lightly!"},{"id":1009080334,"text":"Please be careful!"},{"id":1009080336,"text":"Watch your backs!"},{"id":1009080337,"text":"Bro, you better come back to me alive, ya hear!"},{"id":1009080338,"text":"Hrumph..."},{"id":1009080339,"text":"Please return swiftly and safely!"},{"id":1009080340,"text":"Bllararaaargle..."},{"id":1009080341,"text":"MUMUMUUU!!!"},{"id":1009080345,"text":"KOROOOAAARN!!!"},{"id":1009080346,"text":"Be careful, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1009110001,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, are you also going to Muse?∨I must beg of you... Will you let me accompany you?∨I must cross the border, but the guards know my face, thus∠I'm too conspicuous alone."},{"id":1009110003,"text":"Please..."},{"id":1009110004,"text":"I must go to Muse and see for myself what the Highland Army∠is up to!"},{"id":1009110005,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please let me accompany you."},{"id":1009110006,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1009110007,"text":"Thank you. I swear on my honor as a knight that I will not∠forget this."},{"id":1009110008,"text":"If we cross the border and head south, we should be able∠to see Muse shortly. Let's go, Commander!"},{"id":1009110009,"text":"Are you going to Muse? It's very dangerous, what with the∠refugee hunt that's going on now."},{"id":1009110010,"text":"Wait... You're Sir Miklotov!"},{"id":1009110011,"text":"Of all the cursed..."},{"id":1009110012,"text":"Pass by force."},{"id":1009110013,"text":"Do not resist."},{"id":1009110014,"text":"Sir Miklotov, we have a message for you from Sir Camus.∨It states: \"Don't get in over your head.\" You must be on∠some sort of secret mission, so please be careful."},{"id":1009110015,"text":"Camus...∨Let's keep moving, Commander."},{"id":1009110016,"text":"Sir Miklotov, I'm glad you were able to make it back safely!∨After the incident, Lord Gordeau immediately ordered∠us to close the border and not let anyone pass.∠We were quite concerned for you."},{"id":1009110017,"text":"I am sorry to have worried you."},{"id":1009110018,"text":"Under orders from Lord Gordeau, none may pass."},{"id":1009110019,"text":"The Knightdom of Matilda lies beyond this point, but you∠cannot pass just now."},{"id":1009110020,"text":"Sorry but there is talk of war in the air, so we can't let∠just anyone pass."},{"id":1009110021,"text":"There have been many hunts for refugees these days, so you'd∠best be on your guard."},{"id":1009110022,"text":"There's rumors that those caught by the Highland Army are∠never seen again, so please do take all due caution."},{"id":1009110023,"text":"I'm glad to see you safe. Citizens of the nearby villages∠speak of some terrifying sight in Muse, so we've been∠concerned."},{"id":1009110024,"text":"Sir Camus is worried too. Please hurry back to Rockaxe∠Castle."},{"id":1009110025,"text":"Be careful, the Muse region is still under Highland control."},{"id":1009110026,"text":"Good day, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1009110027,"text":"It's finally time to settle the score with Highland."},{"id":1009110028,"text":"We heard that a new nation was born. I have faith that the∠day will come when the Knights, too, can rise once again."},{"id":1009110029,"text":"Once Highland is defeated, there may not be much need for∠us Knights, I suppose."},{"id":1009120001,"text":"Sorry, but I'm in a hurry!"},{"id":1009120002,"text":"What is it? I'm waiting for someone. Sorry."},{"id":1009120003,"text":"There you are, Sir Humphrey! Say, would you like to go∠outside and get some sunshine?"},{"id":1009120004,"text":"No... This is fine.∨Sorry, we've stayed here for so long."},{"id":1009120005,"text":"No, don't be silly! You've paid for your lodgings in full,∠and I know the war's a problem for all travelers.∨Was it Harmonia that you were heading to, Sir Humphrey?∠I know the roads that way are closed because of the war..."},{"id":1009120006,"text":"Yeah..."},{"id":1009120007,"text":"It's great to see you again, Sir Humphrey. I never thought∠we'd be reunited at a place like this."},{"id":1009120009,"text":"You're as quiet as ever, I see. But I'm glad you haven't∠changed."},{"id":1009120011,"text":"Welcome! If it's all right, maybe you'd like to chat with∠Sir Humphrey a bit?"},{"id":1009120013,"text":"You're late. Where have you been?"},{"id":1009120014,"text":"Sorry 'bout that. My mom caught me and made me help∠with the chores."},{"id":1009120015,"text":"Chores... ◎3I see."},{"id":1009120016,"text":"Hey Futch, you were a Dragon Knight, right?"},{"id":1009120017,"text":"Huh? Uh, yeah... Ninth Rank, though, so I was just an∠apprentice."},{"id":1009120018,"text":"Yeah, but...you've flown, right? Up in the sky! On a dragon!"},{"id":1009120019,"text":"Are you kidding?! I was born in Dragon's Den. I've spent∠more time in the skies than on the ground!"},{"id":1009120020,"text":"Wow, really? Really?! That's awesome!!!"},{"id":1009120021,"text":"It's true. Look, here's the proof."},{"id":1009120022,"text":"Is this...a dragon scale? Whoa... That's so cool! Hey, can I∠borrow it for a bit? I wanna show it to my mom!"},{"id":1009120023,"text":"Yeah, sure. But it means a lot to me, so don't lose it."},{"id":1009120024,"text":"I'll be super careful! Wow, it must feel great to fly...∠You're so lucky, Futch!"},{"id":1009120025,"text":"But, well...my dragon Black... He died. He died protecting∠me...∨A Dragon Knight without a dragon is nothing. Now I can't go∠back to the Dragon's Den anymore, and I can't fly..."},{"id":1009120026,"text":"............∨B-But wait! Aren't you and Humphrey on a quest to find a∠new dragon?"},{"id":1009120027,"text":"Y-Yeah..."},{"id":1009120028,"text":"So some day, some day soon, you'll get another dragon, and∠you'll be a Dragon Knight again!∨Futch, when that day comes, when you're a Dragon Knight∠again, will you let me fly with you?"},{"id":1009120029,"text":"If I become a Dragon Knight again... Yeah.∨If...if I get a new Dragon, Kent, you'll be the first∠person I give a ride to.∨I'll come flying over the mountains and land right in∠front of your house to pick you up!"},{"id":1009120030,"text":"Really?! Do you promise? It's a promise, right, Futch?"},{"id":1009120031,"text":"Y-Yeah... It's a promise..."},{"id":1009120033,"text":"So, uh... Where are you from?"},{"id":1009120034,"text":"Weather sure is nice today, huh?"},{"id":1009120037,"text":"Uh-huh..."},{"id":1009120039,"text":"Where are you headed?"},{"id":1009120040,"text":"That's a really big sword."},{"id":1009120042,"text":"Harmonia..."},{"id":1009120045,"text":"Why Harmonia?"},{"id":1009120046,"text":"To look for dragons..."},{"id":1009120047,"text":"Think it'll be nice out tomorrow?"},{"id":1009120051,"text":"Goodness me, look at the two of you chatting up a storm.∠Say, would you like to stay here the night?"},{"id":1009120052,"text":"Sir Humphrey said he enjoyed talking to you, and to∠express his gratitude, he paid for your lodgings tonight."},{"id":1009120053,"text":"Thank you for last night."},{"id":1009120055,"text":"It was nothing..."},{"id":1009120058,"text":"Really?! Are you sure?"},{"id":1009120059,"text":"Of course I'm sure! A lie has never passed these lips!∨My friend said he heard a dragon's roar at Rakutei Mountain,∠yep, the same one waaay up north of here.∨And my wife's little brother said he saw a dragon's shadow∠in the clouds!"},{"id":1009120060,"text":"Really? Really?! Awesome! I have to go see for myself!!!"},{"id":1009120061,"text":"Hold on, son! I dunno what's got ya so worked up, but ya∠gotta be careful! That place is also rotten with monsters!∨Welp, there he goes..."},{"id":1009120062,"text":"Did you not leave already...?"},{"id":1009120063,"text":"There's something I'm worried about..."},{"id":1009120064,"text":"Yeah... I'll be going now."},{"id":1009120066,"text":"Where did Kent get off to? He isn't at home, either...∨Ah, guess we'll have to wait 'til tomorrow."},{"id":1009120067,"text":"You're staying another night? My, it looks like you've∠taken to our little village. Rest well!"},{"id":1009120068,"text":"We've got trouble! Kent... It's Kent! His mom says he never∠came home last night!"},{"id":1009120069,"text":"He's not the type of boy to run away from home."},{"id":1009120071,"text":"Um, that guy there was talking to him..."},{"id":1009120073,"text":"You know something..."},{"id":1009120074,"text":"It was just a rumor..."},{"id":1009120075,"text":"A rumor?"},{"id":1009120076,"text":"Kent just couldn't stop talking about dragons, so I told him∠someone saw one at Rakutei Mountain..."},{"id":1009120077,"text":"Rakutei Mountain... But that area is crawling with dreadful∠creatures! Why would he..."},{"id":1009120078,"text":"This is my fault. I told Kent about how I lost Black... I∠promised him a ride on a dragon... And now he's in danger."},{"id":1009120081,"text":"You want to save your friend, right?"},{"id":1009120082,"text":"O-Of course!!!"},{"id":1009120083,"text":"I'll come along to pay you back for the lodging."},{"id":1009120085,"text":"Huh? Who are you?"},{"id":1009120086,"text":"This is Mister ♂㈱, Sir Humphrey's new friend."},{"id":1009120087,"text":"Sir Humphrey has friends?"},{"id":1009120088,"text":"Thanks for your help, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1009120089,"text":"We'd better hurry."},{"id":1009120091,"text":"Let's move swiftly..."},{"id":1009120093,"text":"Rakutei Mountain is north of this village. Don't get lost."},{"id":1009120094,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, do you have need of our help∠now?"},{"id":1009120095,"text":"I do. Will you lend me a hand?"},{"id":1009120096,"text":"No..."},{"id":1009120097,"text":"Of course. For you, Commander, I will gladly wield this∠sword again."},{"id":1009120098,"text":"I, Futch, Former Ninth Rank Dragon Knight, will fight by∠your side."},{"id":1009120100,"text":"What? Aw, c'mon."},{"id":1009120101,"text":"Fight hard, Futch!"},{"id":1009120102,"text":"Don't worry about me, Kent. Hey, the next time we meet,∠I'm sure I'll be a Dragon Knight again."},{"id":1009120103,"text":"Really?! Don't forget your promise, then!"},{"id":1009120104,"text":"I won't!"},{"id":1009120106,"text":"Oh no, I almost forgot! Here's Black's scale. Thanks for∠letting me borrow it."},{"id":1009120107,"text":"No, you hold onto it. As a token of my promise."},{"id":1009120108,"text":"Really? Are you sure? Wow! I...I'll treasure it! And I'll∠look forward to the day you come with your dragon!"},{"id":1009120109,"text":"You do that! I swear that I will return as a Dragon Knight!"},{"id":1009120110,"text":"Let's go..."},{"id":1009120111,"text":"Okay. Be seeing you, Kent!"},{"id":1009120112,"text":"Yeah. Bye, Futch!"},{"id":1009120124,"text":"Where are you going? The Muse checkpoint? Oh, hey, I've∠been there. With my dad! Umm... It's southeast of here."},{"id":1009120125,"text":"Highway Village here is where traders stop on their way∠from the Grasslands to Muse. Maybe you ought to have a peek∠at the trade post too?"},{"id":1009120126,"text":"The Knights are cowards! Why won't they even lift a finger∠to help Muse? I hear talk that Highland's even hunting down∠all the people that escaped from the city."},{"id":1009120127,"text":"They say that monsters sometimes come down from Rakutei ∠Mountain up north past Rockaxe Castle. Why, even just the ∠other day..."},{"id":1009120128,"text":"Hey, hey, have you seen Kent?"},{"id":1009120129,"text":"Where is Rockaxe Castle? Northwest of here? Is that right?"},{"id":1009120130,"text":"Lately, there haven't been many traders coming through to∠Muse. I haven't the faintest idea what's going on."},{"id":1009120131,"text":"I heard that guy Futch staying at the inn used to be a∠Dragon Knight. Are there actually knights that ride dragons?∠It hardly seems real..."},{"id":1009120132,"text":"If you don't transport it quickly, milk becomes cheese all∠by itself..."},{"id":1009120143,"text":"Sir Miklotov passed through here earlier, and ever since my∠son won't stop talking about joining the Knights..."},{"id":1009120144,"text":"Occasionally the Knights accept recruits even from us∠common folk."},{"id":1009120145,"text":"Guess what Sir Miklotov told me! He said I should come be∠a knight when I grow up! And I totally will!"},{"id":1009120146,"text":"That Kent has been goofing off and playing when he should∠be delivering the milk... I need to give him a good∠scolding."},{"id":1009120147,"text":"It's tough work transporting milk to Rockaxe. But Kent∠gets it done."},{"id":1009120148,"text":"It looks like Kent made a new friend. A Dragon Knight, he∠said. Did he mean a Matilda Knight?"},{"id":1009120149,"text":"I had planned to go to Muse and start a new business, but I∠don't dare head that direction now..."},{"id":1009120150,"text":"Sir Humphrey sure is quiet. But not in a cold sort of∠way... My guess is that he's just shy."},{"id":1009120151,"text":"There's a library in Harmonia's Crystal Valley called the∠One Temple. Many people make the journey there to seek the∠vast wealth of knowledge it has gathered."},{"id":1009120152,"text":"While I travel, I like to visit the Kobold villages in each∠land. There's one in the southern part of the City-States,∠and even one in Toran."},{"id":1009120153,"text":""},{"id":1009120154,"text":"My father is a member of the honorable Red Knights. But∠lately he hasn't been able to come home..."},{"id":1009120155,"text":"Father's been away for a long time, has something happened∠to the Knights?"},{"id":1009120156,"text":"My, my, who are you fellows? You're so young, but you seem∠so troubled. It's written on your faces."},{"id":1009120157,"text":"Hey, how's it going? All the antiques end up in Rockaxe, so∠they're not a profitable choice."},{"id":1009120158,"text":"Grandma says when I grow up, I'll be a great man. She∠said it's written on my face."},{"id":1009120159,"text":"This is a knight's home. I take care of the cleaning while∠he's away."},{"id":1009120160,"text":"The candles here are cheap, of good quality, and very∠popular."},{"id":1009120161,"text":"My father said he'd pay anything for traditional clothing."},{"id":1009120162,"text":"There seems to be a mayonnaise shortage to the north. We∠sell out almost as soon as we get any in."},{"id":1009120163,"text":"If ya wanna make a lotta money quick, gold bars are still∠the only way to go. I hear ya can get 'em cheap in Tinto."},{"id":1009120164,"text":"I have a friend who's a Dragon Knight. It's true!"},{"id":1009120170,"text":"☆0∠             Sage Plant"},{"id":1009120171,"text":"☆0∠         Barrel of Cheese"},{"id":1009120172,"text":"☆0∠      Cart Loaded with Milk"},{"id":1009120173,"text":"☆0∠              Milk Can"},{"id":1009120174,"text":"☆0∠            Baled Straw"},{"id":1009120175,"text":"☆0∠          Bed of Petunias"},{"id":1009120176,"text":"☆0∠          Bed of Hornwort"},{"id":1009120186,"text":"☆0∠             Empty Can"},{"id":1009120221,"text":"☆0∠  Shelf with Shoulder Pads and Emblems"},{"id":1009120222,"text":"☆0∠       Box Full of Medicine"},{"id":1009120230,"text":"☆0∠         \"Antique Catalog\""},{"id":1009120231,"text":"☆0∠           Sample Antique"},{"id":1009120233,"text":"☆0∠  Shelf Full of Everyday Items"},{"id":1009120234,"text":"☆0∠       \"New Trading Routes\""},{"id":1009120253,"text":"That Futch fellow who stayed at the inn really is a Dragon∠Knight. I saw him with a little dragon in tow!"},{"id":1009120268,"text":"Where did that Kent run off to? I shouldn't have spoken∠to him so harshly..."},{"id":1009120269,"text":"*sob* Kent... Kent... Where did you go?"},{"id":1009120270,"text":"*sniffle* Why hasn't he come back?"},{"id":1009120272,"text":"I wonder if Sir Humphrey has left for Crystal Valley."},{"id":1009120275,"text":""},{"id":1009120286,"text":""},{"id":1009120294,"text":"Can ya believe the Knights actually surrendered to Highland?∠Talk about pathetic."},{"id":1009120298,"text":"I heard everyone in Muse was butchered for some horrific∠ritual. If it weren't for the ♂② Army, Matilda∠may have met the same fate..."},{"id":1009120299,"text":""},{"id":1009120311,"text":"The Knights are no more. My son is so disappointed..."},{"id":1009120312,"text":"The Knights are gone..."},{"id":1009120313,"text":"I...wanted to join the Knights... Those ♂②∠Army jerks..."},{"id":1009120314,"text":"Kent doesn't shirk his milk delivery job so much anymore."},{"id":1009120315,"text":"Kent still keeps talking about his friend Futch."},{"id":1009120316,"text":"Kent showed me his most prized possession! He said it's a∠dragon scale. How cool!"},{"id":1009120318,"text":""},{"id":1009120321,"text":""},{"id":1009120322,"text":"My father fell in the last battle as well..."},{"id":1009120323,"text":"Why? If only the ♂② Army had never come..."},{"id":1009120332,"text":"Futch is gonna come riding here on a dragon one day. And∠when he does, he's gonna let me ride it! I can't wait!"},{"id":1009120340,"text":"A new nation is coming into being, and we will be a part of∠it. The ♂② Republic... I hope it's a fair,∠good land. "},{"id":1009120344,"text":"Highland is no more, so I suppose the wars are too."},{"id":1009120345,"text":""},{"id":1009120358,"text":"I've heard the Knights might be re-established."},{"id":1009120359,"text":"Captain Miklotov will surely, surely come back to us now!"},{"id":1009120364,"text":""},{"id":1009120367,"text":""},{"id":1009120384,"text":"Oh yeah, if you want to, go ahead and take this with you."},{"id":1009120385,"text":"I-I've carefully raised this beautiful calf. Won't you∠buy it for 7,000 potch?"},{"id":1009120387,"text":"I don't want it."},{"id":1009120388,"text":"Th-Thank you very much."},{"id":1009120389,"text":"Oh, okay..."},{"id":1009120390,"text":"U-Um, it looks like you don't have enough money..."},{"id":1009120391,"text":"Mom will be so happy..."},{"id":1009120392,"text":"I-I've carefully raised this beautiful calf. Won't you∠buy it for 5,000 potch?"},{"id":1009120393,"text":"My sister will be so happy..."},{"id":1009120394,"text":"I'm tired, so let's save it for later."},{"id":1009120416,"text":"It's 100 potch per person, so ♂③ potch all together."},{"id":1009120417,"text":"Goodnight. We hope you sleep soundly until morning."},{"id":1009120420,"text":"Good morning. I trust it wasn't too noisy?"},{"id":1009120422,"text":"Okay then, my appraisal fee is 200 potch per item."},{"id":1009120423,"text":"Anything else you want me to appraise?"},{"id":1009120425,"text":"Hmm, this is a..."},{"id":1009120431,"text":"Come back if you find something good. See you later."},{"id":1009120432,"text":"What can I do for you?"},{"id":1009120433,"text":"Anything else?"},{"id":1009120442,"text":"I recommend cheap candles and musk from the Grasslands."},{"id":1009120443,"text":"Oh, will that be all?"},{"id":1009120444,"text":"All of our products are of great quality."},{"id":1009120445,"text":"Buy as much as you can."},{"id":1009120446,"text":"Okay, thanks!"},{"id":1009120451,"text":"If ya find any traditional clothing or gold bars, bring 'em∠my way. I think they'll fetch a good price in the∠Grasslands."},{"id":1009130002,"text":"What should we do? At this rate, Kent might be..."},{"id":1009130004,"text":"I'll go too."},{"id":1009130005,"text":"Look, I have to be somewhere..."},{"id":1009130006,"text":"Thanks, Commander ♂㈱, I see signs of monsters∠on this mountain..."},{"id":1009130007,"text":"Let's go, Sir Humphrey. Kent may be in trouble."},{"id":1009130008,"text":"Where did he go? If we don't hurry..."},{"id":1009130009,"text":"Okay, let's move."},{"id":1009130010,"text":"Hold on a second."},{"id":1009130012,"text":"S-Sorry to keep you waiting."},{"id":1009130017,"text":"Commander, please be careful. I sense monsters hiding∠everywhere."},{"id":1009130018,"text":"Hold on, Kent. We're coming to save you!"},{"id":1009130019,"text":"This mist..."},{"id":1009130020,"text":"What the heck?! We'll never make it now! If we∠don't move fast Kent may end up..."},{"id":1009130021,"text":"This is some kind of magic..."},{"id":1009130022,"text":"What should we do?"},{"id":1009130023,"text":"Black... Please help me, Black!"},{"id":1009130024,"text":"The mist! The mist is receding! Did you do that, Commander?"},{"id":1009130025,"text":"A rune's power, eh? Let's keep moving..."},{"id":1009130026,"text":"Be careful... We could be attacked at any time..."},{"id":1009130027,"text":"Kent! I see him over there!"},{"id":1009130028,"text":"Wait..."},{"id":1009130029,"text":"Sir Humphrey, why are you—"},{"id":1009130030,"text":"It's coming. I think it wants food."},{"id":1009130031,"text":"You came to save me, Futch?"},{"id":1009130032,"text":"You should've known better, Kent. There's no dragons here.∠There never were. That rumor was complete nonsense."},{"id":1009130033,"text":"But what if it wasn't? Besides, if I had a friend who was a∠Dragon Knight, I could brag to everyone!"},{"id":1009130034,"text":"That's not a good—"},{"id":1009130035,"text":"And I heard it! The dragon roar everyone else talked about!∠It's real! And it's just above here. That's why I came all∠this way!∨Well, until I tripped and twisted my ankle."},{"id":1009130036,"text":"But it's better now. There, ya see?"},{"id":1009130037,"text":"How did you manage to get here?"},{"id":1009130038,"text":"Let's hurry back."},{"id":1009130039,"text":"Look, it's Black's scale, the charm Futch gave to me! When∠I prayed to it, the mist lifted.∨So there must be a dragon here!"},{"id":1009130040,"text":"Black's scale... That explains earlier.∨But what's important is that you're safe. Let's go home."},{"id":1009130041,"text":"I agree, Commander ♂㈱. Come on, Kent."},{"id":1009130042,"text":"No, Futch!!! I said I heard a dragon's roar! Last night,∠there was the sound of wings beating super loud and then a∠roar that could split stone!∨It was just ahead! There might be a dragon right there!∠Let's go see, Futch!"},{"id":1009130043,"text":"Don't be stupid. There's no way a dragon could be here!∨And even if there is..."},{"id":1009130044,"text":"But what if there is?"},{"id":1009130045,"text":"I still don't—"},{"id":1009130046,"text":"Let's go see...∨Commander ♂㈱, will you join us a bit longer?"},{"id":1009130047,"text":"There's no dragon here..."},{"id":1009130048,"text":"C'mon, hurry up, Futch!"},{"id":1009130049,"text":"No, not that way. I heard the roar from above!"},{"id":1009130050,"text":"Th-That's..."},{"id":1009130051,"text":"I knew it. It's an egg! A dragon egg! It has to be!!!"},{"id":1009130052,"text":"But they only lay their eggs at Dragon's Den..."},{"id":1009130053,"text":"Then what's that? There's no other egg that looks like∠that! With this, you can be a real Dragon Knight again!!!"},{"id":1009130054,"text":"A dragon egg..."},{"id":1009130055,"text":"Commander Joshua of the Dragon Knights spoke of this to me∠once...∨Though dragons normally only lay eggs in the Dragon's Den,∠every so often a \"wild dragon\" appears...∨If we could find out why, we could probably obtain new∠dragons.∨I was headed to the One Temple in Crystal Valley to try∠to learn more.◎1 But I never expected to find answers in a∠place like this..."},{"id":1009130056,"text":"Quickly, come over here Futch. C'mon!"},{"id":1009130058,"text":"Look at it, Futch! It's your new dragon!"},{"id":1009130059,"text":"No!!!"},{"id":1009130060,"text":"I-I...I don't need a dragon! Sir Humphrey, Commander∠♂⑩, and you, Kent...∨You've all been so nice and concerned about me, hoping to∠help me become a Dragon Knight again, that I couldn't bring∠myself to tell you...∨I don't want to ride any dragon besides Black! He was the∠only one for me..."},{"id":1009130061,"text":"I-I...I don't need a dragon! Sir Humphrey, Commander∠Joshua, and even you, Kent...∨You've all been so nice and concerned about me, hoping to∠help me become a Dragon Knight again that I couldn't bring∠myself to tell you...∨I don't want to ride any dragon besides Black! He was the∠only one for me....."},{"id":1009130062,"text":"Then if you have no need for the egg or the beast asleep∠inside, I'll use my sword to destroy it."},{"id":1009130063,"text":"Why?!"},{"id":1009130064,"text":"Maybe it's for the best..."},{"id":1009130065,"text":"Yeah! Why would you ever do that?!"},{"id":1009130066,"text":"Why?! After all we went through to find it!"},{"id":1009130067,"text":"Dragon pups are weak creatures. With no mother or knight to∠care for it, this pup will waste away and die.∨And if it were to live, without a master it would be no more∠than a monster that terrorizes humans."},{"id":1009130068,"text":"See, Futch?! That's why you need to care for it! Stop him!!!"},{"id":1009130070,"text":"Stop him Futch! C'mon!"},{"id":1009130071,"text":"C'mon, mister! You gotta do something! It's a dragon egg,∠after all we went through..."},{"id":1009130072,"text":"Wait, Sir Humphrey!"},{"id":1009130073,"text":"I-Is this a dragon? It's so little... Futch?"},{"id":1009130075,"text":"I've never seen such a small dragon, nor heard of one that∠it is white."},{"id":1009130076,"text":"But it's still a dragon, right? Yeah, it has to be! Don't∠you think so, Futch?"},{"id":1009130077,"text":"But...I don't want..."},{"id":1009130078,"text":"Then why stop me?"},{"id":1009130080,"text":"Taking a new dragon isn't a betrayal. It's touching that∠your heart mourns Black's death, and there is no need to let∠go of those memories.∨But it is also no reason to close off your future."},{"id":1009130082,"text":"Futch..."},{"id":1009130083,"text":"...There's nothing to be afraid of. Come here."},{"id":1009130084,"text":"From this day forth, you are \"Bright.\""},{"id":1009130085,"text":"Thank you, Commander. I would like to repay you someday.∠If we can ever be of assistance, you have but to ask."},{"id":1009130086,"text":"Will you fight alongside us?"},{"id":1009130088,"text":"Of course. For you, I will gladly wield this sword again."},{"id":1009130090,"text":"Then we'll head back to town. We'll be there for a while,∠so if you need our help, come visit us there."},{"id":1009130091,"text":"I'll be waiting too, Commander!"},{"id":1010010001,"text":"All that remains is to take L'Renouille, ♂㈱."},{"id":1010010002,"text":"This is the end of the road... Make sure you pick your final∠team carefully."},{"id":1010010003,"text":"Godspeed, ♂㈱... Everyone's hopes are hanging∠on you...∨Also...make sure you come back safe. Please. There's still a∠lot left for you to do."},{"id":1010010004,"text":"♂㈱... Our army has been vanquished, but our∠spirit has not!∨You will not pass here... For our fallen warriors! For the∠Karaya! And for the King!!!"},{"id":1010010005,"text":"Why? Why can't we win? Are we not in the right?"},{"id":1010010006,"text":"...It's been a long time, Lucia."},{"id":1010010007,"text":"You! The daughter of Greenhill! Why are you here?! Have you∠come to mock me?"},{"id":1010010008,"text":"I haven't forgotten my promise. I will investigate the truth∠of what you said...about my father murdering your own.∨What about you? Do you still wish to die, even though I've∠made this promise?"},{"id":1010010009,"text":"What promise?"},{"id":1010010010,"text":"As acting mayor of Greenhill, it is my duty to seek out the∠truth and enact justice.∠Even if it means damaging my father's reputation.∨Don't you wish to seek the truth for yourself too?"},{"id":1010010012,"text":"You!!!"},{"id":1010010013,"text":"It's okay, Shin."},{"id":1010010014,"text":"Why don't you try to run?!"},{"id":1010010015,"text":"Because I know you...∨You wouldn't hurt an unarmed opponent."},{"id":1010010016,"text":"............∨Teresa... Why do you have such faith in people?"},{"id":1010010017,"text":"I have faith in you. That's all."},{"id":1010010018,"text":"......∨Go, ♂㈱... This is your fight now. All that∠remains to me is to watch events unfold."},{"id":1010010019,"text":"So you've come this far...∨It seems our efforts to prevent the Bright Shield Rune and∠the Dark Sword Rune from meeting in battle were for naught.∨Genkaku and I... All we were able to do was prolong things a∠little bit longer."},{"id":1010010020,"text":"Stand aside!"},{"id":1010010022,"text":"That I cannot do. I am sworn to defend this king, and as a∠general, I will not neglect this oath."},{"id":1010010023,"text":"Do not falter, son of Genkaku. Come, strike me down if you∠can."},{"id":1010010024,"text":"My duel with Genkaku... It continues here..."},{"id":1010010025,"text":"Ungh...∨Boy... Genkaku's son... What is your name?"},{"id":1010010026,"text":"I am called ♂㈱."},{"id":1010010028,"text":"♂㈱... I must apologize to all of you.∨25 years ago, Genkaku and I sealed our two runes.∨The Bright Shield Rune and the Dark Sword Rune were once∠a single rune... The power of their true form, the Rune of∠Beginning, is that to rule over conflict.∨However...in order to wield that power, to obtain the Rune∠of Beginning, you must first..."},{"id":1010010029,"text":"♂㈱, you are a strong young man. But Genkaku∠and I were weak... Forgive us for our weakness, the suffering ∠we caused you..."},{"id":1010010030,"text":"...I've no right to ask your name.∨No, I must to apologize to all of you.∨25 years ago, Genkaku and I sealed our two runes.∨The Bright Shield Rune and the Dark Sword Rune were once∠a single rune... The power of their true form, the Rune of∠Beginning, is that to rule over conflict.∨However...in order to wield that power, to obtain the Rune∠of Beginning, you must first..."},{"id":1010010031,"text":"You are a strong young man.∠But Genkaku and I were weak... Forgive us for our weakness∠and the suffering we caused you..."},{"id":1010010032,"text":"Go, boy..."},{"id":1010010033,"text":"Genkaku... Now I can finally rest..."},{"id":1010010034,"text":"♂㈱, the personal chambers of the Blight Family∠lay beyond here... They are no place for intruders like you."},{"id":1010010035,"text":"This is all that's left of our country, all that's left of∠our pride. We won't let you trample on it!"},{"id":1010010036,"text":"I'll use force if I must."},{"id":1010010037,"text":"Get out of the way."},{"id":1010010038,"text":"Yeah, well you're welcome to try! Go ahead and be like Luca∠Blight, just hacking apart everything in your path!!!"},{"id":1010010039,"text":"Prepare yourself, ♂㈱."},{"id":1010010040,"text":"Ha, don't be stupid! As if it would ever play out like that!"},{"id":1010010041,"text":"Has the commander of the ♂② Army truly∠come all this way just to turn coward here at the end?"},{"id":1010010043,"text":"♂㈱, it is your duty to fight us!"},{"id":1010010044,"text":"This didn't have to happen..."},{"id":1010010046,"text":"Is it really...so strange, ♂㈱? That we should∠fight?"},{"id":1010010047,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... Just as you are the hope of∠the ♂② Army...∨...King Jowy is ours.∨He rid us of Luca Blight. And we hoped he would lead∠Highland to a better future... That is all."},{"id":1010010048,"text":"Go on... We don't...have the strength left...to fight."},{"id":1010010049,"text":"Culgan... It was fun... All the plans we made for this∠country...for the future... We fought so hard."},{"id":1010010050,"text":"Indeed... It is a fine thing to meet our destiny...alongside∠our kingdom..."},{"id":1010010051,"text":"♂㈱... Though the outcome is not as I intended,∠I must admit I'm impressed you made it here, that you∠emerged victorious.∨Well, this is the end... The Beast Rune, the incarnation of∠hatred that is Luca Blight's legacy, lays here before you.∨I can no longer maintain the seals on this materialization.∠It has already unleashed its thirst for blood on the citizens∠of Muse.∨If unleashed, this beast would ravage the land until all∠has returned to nothingness, just as Luca Blight wished.∨This is your final trial, ♂㈱...∠Are you up to the task?"},{"id":1010010052,"text":"...Is this the throne room?"},{"id":1010010053,"text":"So then Jowy Blight should be here..."},{"id":1010010054,"text":"It must've been that monster! This place is collapsing!"},{"id":1010010055,"text":"Let's hurry it up then, ♂㈱."},{"id":1010010057,"text":"No, we've got to find Jowy!"},{"id":1010010058,"text":"It would be stupid of us to lose our lives here."},{"id":1010010059,"text":"What are you saying?! We've made it too far for you to die∠here! You're the leader of the ♂② Army!!!"},{"id":1010010060,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... Could he have..."},{"id":1010010061,"text":"Don't say that, even as a joke!"},{"id":1010010062,"text":"He'll make it out, I know it. He can't die...∠He's going to bring peace to this land...∠There's no way he would die."},{"id":1010010063,"text":"Look!"},{"id":1010010064,"text":"♂㈱!"},{"id":1010010065,"text":"♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1010010066,"text":"♂●-♂●-♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1010010067,"text":"I was worried about ya, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1010010068,"text":"Welcome back, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1010010069,"text":"That's the ♂㈱ I know! You've got more good∠luck than ya need!"},{"id":1010010070,"text":"♂㈱! Oh, I'm so happy to see you!"},{"id":1010010071,"text":"You did it... You really came back, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1010010072,"text":"Yay! Yahoo!"},{"id":1010010075,"text":"Just a little bit more. Good luck, ♂㈱."},{"id":1010010076,"text":"Take this place and we win."},{"id":1010010077,"text":"This is the final push. Let's do this, ♂㈱."},{"id":1010010078,"text":"Commander, the rest is in your hands."},{"id":1010010079,"text":"Commander, our hopes rest in you. Godspeed."},{"id":1010010080,"text":"♂㈱, the hopes of the Kobolds are in your∠capable hands."},{"id":1010010081,"text":"Heheh, so this is L'Renouille... Talk about huge."},{"id":1010010082,"text":"♂㈱, be careful..."},{"id":1010020058,"text":"☆0∠        Barrel of Salted Meat"},{"id":1010020062,"text":"☆0∠     Shelves Lined with Armor"},{"id":1010020073,"text":"Go, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1010020074,"text":"♂㈱, please be careful. We are all waiting∠for you..."},{"id":1010020075,"text":"Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1010050003,"text":"☆0∠       Map Spread on a Table"},{"id":1010070062,"text":"☆0∠  The Journeyman Orb is shining.∠      Your fatigue is lifted."},{"id":1010080001,"text":"In the name of the ruler, who bears the Circle Rune, and∠the guardian, who holds the Beast Rune...∨...we hereby accept a shining, new flame into the Blight∠family.∨Jowy Blight, Jillia Blight, we are here to record the vows∠made between you this day."},{"id":1010080002,"text":"By my body and my soul, as a guardian, as a knight, and as∠a subject...∨...I do here pledge to serve Jillia Blight."},{"id":1010080004,"text":"Is something the matter?"},{"id":1010080005,"text":".........∨By my body, and my soul, as successor of the Blight∠family lineage, I take you, Jowy Blight, as my husband.∨Furthermore, I confer upon you the title of King of∠Highland and I pledge to serve you for the rest of my natural∠days."},{"id":1010080006,"text":"I pray that you both find happiness as you walk this new∠path in life together."},{"id":1010080007,"text":"Happiness on this new path, eh..."},{"id":1010090001,"text":"What's wrong, Jowy?"},{"id":1010090002,"text":"...Pilika."},{"id":1010090003,"text":"Pilika... This is...where we say goodbye."},{"id":1010090004,"text":"I know."},{"id":1010090005,"text":"But you'll be back soon. Just like always, right?"},{"id":1010090006,"text":"......◎2Pilika, this will likely be the last time you see me.∠It's goodbye forever."},{"id":1010090008,"text":"But...◎1 No..."},{"id":1010090009,"text":"No, no!◎1 NO!!! I don't want you to go away! I don't wanna∠be alone!!!"},{"id":1010090010,"text":"Pilika, listen to me...∨You're going to grow up and meet lots of people. And you're∠going to lose a lot of people too.∨That's why you mustn't forget, Pilika. Enjoy the moments you∠have together, and don't feel sad about the goodbyes. Okay?"},{"id":1010090013,"text":"◎0Pilika..."},{"id":1010090014,"text":"Okay...◎1 I understand.◎3 But, but, but...can I ask just one∠favor?"},{"id":1010090015,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1010090016,"text":"Can you pick me up and hold me like my daddy used to?◎1∠Just once, please."},{"id":1010090017,"text":"...◎1Sure."},{"id":1010090018,"text":"My daddy... He used to hold me like this.∠Just...like...this..."},{"id":1010090019,"text":"Thank you, Pilika..."},{"id":1010090020,"text":"You asked for me?"},{"id":1010090021,"text":"Come in."},{"id":1010090022,"text":"I have a favor to ask, Jillia."},{"id":1010090023,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1010090024,"text":"Seed and Culgan are buying us some time, but this castle∠will soon fall. And when that happens, so too will the∠Kingdom of Highland.∨Before that happens, I want you to take Pilika and∠flee to Harmonia.∨I've prepared a nice, secluded home for the two of you∠there. I've given all the details to the servants.∨I want you to live there, not as a member of the Blight∠Family, but under a new name..."},{"id":1010090025,"text":"...◎2As you wish.◎1 So...is it really over?"},{"id":1010090026,"text":"I'm afraid so..."},{"id":1010090027,"text":"In that case, farewell.∨Come along, Pilika..."},{"id":1010090028,"text":"Jillia...◎0 I'm sorry."},{"id":1010090029,"text":"Why do you say that?! Why are you apologizing?"},{"id":1010090030,"text":"...Jillia?"},{"id":1010090031,"text":"You think I didn't know? How you used me, what you did to∠my brother and father, what you sought? I knew all of it!∨But even then, even then...I always loved you for your∠heart, your dreams, your goals! Why do you apologize to me∠now?∨You did what you believed was right, you don't need to∠apologize for that.∨That is the kind of man I married.∠The kind of man that I loved..."},{"id":1010090033,"text":"If I were to die...would you shed tears for me?"},{"id":1010090034,"text":"Please live...◎1Jillia."},{"id":1010090035,"text":"This is...◎0our final goodbye..."},{"id":1010090036,"text":"Jillia..."},{"id":1010090037,"text":"Goodbye...◎1Jowy."},{"id":1010090038,"text":"Goodbye...◎2Jillia."},{"id":1010100001,"text":"Whew, I feel sort of relieved to be back here. I guess it's∠because this place is kinda turning into home, huh?"},{"id":1010100002,"text":"Commander ♂㈱. Though we weren't able to form∠an alliance with the Matilda Knights, we did gain many new∠recruits.∨However, the Highland Army isn't just sitting idly by∠watching all of this. They're going to come at us again∠sooner or later.∨Allow yourself a brief rest today... For tomorrow, the∠fight begins again."},{"id":1010100003,"text":"More fighting tomorrow?∨Well, let's just forget that for now and follow Shu's∠advice. I'm sure Pilika must've missed you a lot while you∠were gone, ♂㈱."},{"id":1010100004,"text":"We're home, Pilika. Were you a good girl?"},{"id":1010100005,"text":"...!"},{"id":1010100006,"text":"Heehee...∨Hey, ♂㈱...Pilika was hoping that, just one∠more time, maybe one day we could..."},{"id":1010100007,"text":"...Huh? Oh, uh, never mind! Nighty-night, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1010100008,"text":"An interesting idea, but what about the expeditionary∠force? It's not as if the entire army is loyal to me.∨Kiba and his son in particular support only the crown.∨Fumble and our entire strategy for the City-States could∠come apart at the seams."},{"id":1010100009,"text":"I've got a plan to handle that."},{"id":1010100010,"text":"Hmph, you've really thought this whole thing through.∠When did you get so clever?"},{"id":1010100011,"text":"I wouldn't call it clever, per se, but if I couldn't figure∠out at least that much, I'd bring shame to the name∠Silverberg."},{"id":1010100012,"text":"I know you... You served as a military strategist in the∠Scarlet Moon Empire alongside Mathiu Silverberg. Why are∠you here?"},{"id":1010100013,"text":"Those in my profession fall by the wayside in times of∠peace. It is only when war looms that people remember we∠exist."},{"id":1010100014,"text":"Hmph, have it your way.◎4 Well, I leave the rest to you, my∠dear brother-in-law,◎2 bwahahahahaha!"},{"id":1010100016,"text":"Okay, leave it to me. Here goes...∨Yah!"},{"id":1010100017,"text":"Huh? It won't work. Something must be blocking me. Should∠I try again?"},{"id":1010100018,"text":"This is bad, really bad! Everyone's gathered in the hall."},{"id":1010100019,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we've received a report that∠seems to indicate the Highland Army has appeared in Radat."},{"id":1010100020,"text":"\"Seems to\"? Has it been captured?"},{"id":1010100021,"text":"Unfortunately we don't know that, but if they can occupy the∠town before the next report comes in, they're a formidable∠foe indeed."},{"id":1010100022,"text":"This doesn't sound like Solon Jhee. My guess is that we're∠dealing with the 3rd Army led by General Kiba and his son."},{"id":1010100023,"text":"Well, we aren't gonna get anywhere just gabbin' about it.∠Whaddaya say, ♂㈱, wanna go check things out∠with me?"},{"id":1010100024,"text":"What are you saying, Viktor! You can't ask the Commander to∠do something so dangerous!"},{"id":1010100025,"text":"Aw, c'mon, don't be such a worry wart. I'll be right there∠with him. It'll be good exercise. Besides, even∠♂㈱ needs a change of pace every once in a∠while."},{"id":1010100026,"text":"Jillia... Are you certain this is what you want?"},{"id":1010100027,"text":"Yes. I will have him as my husband."},{"id":1010100028,"text":"Very well. I concede then."},{"id":1010100029,"text":"Princess Jillia, this way please... The Knight's Oath is∠something between the knight, his king, and a single∠witness only."},{"id":1010100030,"text":"I understand."},{"id":1010100031,"text":"Heh..."},{"id":1010100032,"text":"I hereby recognize you, my faithful subject Jowy Atreides,∠as a knight in service to the Kingdom of Highland."},{"id":1010100033,"text":"And I, Jowy Atreides, do hereby swear my eternal loyalty to∠King Agares Blight of Highland with this offering of my own∠blood."},{"id":1010100034,"text":"As witness, I will test the \"wine of fealty.\""},{"id":1010100035,"text":"Delicious..."},{"id":1010100036,"text":"Accept my blood as mark of my oath."},{"id":1010100037,"text":"Sir Jowy Atreides, your blood is now added to my own."},{"id":1010100038,"text":"Now, as a loyal knight in service of Highland and the∠Blight Royal Family, I do bid you...you..."},{"id":1010100039,"text":"King Agares!!!"},{"id":1010100040,"text":"Urk, th-this is..."},{"id":1010100041,"text":"Call the royal physician!!!"},{"id":1010100042,"text":"Heh... Heheh...∨Bwahahahahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1010100043,"text":"Luca, you... This is poison... S-So, you really were∠plotting my death... But how did you..."},{"id":1010100044,"text":"Hmph, believe me, it wasn't easy given how distrustful∠you are. You don't even take so much as a sip of water∠without having tested it first.∨But now I've finally managed to rid myself of the last∠weight around my neck."},{"id":1010100045,"text":"Y-You would...kill your own father...?"},{"id":1010100046,"text":"Ha!∨You old fool! You dare call yourself my \"father\"?!"},{"id":1010100047,"text":"You couldn't protect your own wife! You're a traitor who∠made peace with a country of filthy criminals!"},{"id":1010100048,"text":"Wh-What are you saying?"},{"id":1010100049,"text":"Where were you when my mother was being violated?!∠Who was it that fled to save his own life?!∨Who sat trembling upon the throne while the Royal Guards∠finally came to rescue Mother and I?!"},{"id":1010100050,"text":".........∨But enough. This is your sentence, old man. The sentence of∠death.∨All that remains is to scour the unclean ones from the face∠of this world. Filth must be purified, you see."},{"id":1010100051,"text":"S-Stop... S-Sara wouldn't..."},{"id":1010100052,"text":"You...have no right to utter that name."},{"id":1010100053,"text":"Well done, Jowy Atreides. This makes you the last knight to∠swear fealty to Agares...∨...and the first to break this said oath with him.◎2 ∠Bwahahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1010100054,"text":"Unh..."},{"id":1010100055,"text":"I must say, though, that was a brilliant idea. Drinking∠antitoxin and then poisoning your own blood..."},{"id":1010100056,"text":"Father!!! Open your eyes, Father!!!"},{"id":1010100057,"text":"Don't bother... He should be dead by now."},{"id":1010100058,"text":"L-Luca! Did you do this?!"},{"id":1010100059,"text":"Why do you cry, Jillia? That man wasn't even your father!!!∠Bwahahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1010100060,"text":"*sob*"},{"id":1010130001,"text":"We'll be in South Window in a few days. Our best strategy∠would be to capture Radat and South Window first, before∠then taking ♂① Castle."},{"id":1010130002,"text":"Hmph, why waste the time? Strike at the rats in their nest∠and we can end this in one fell swoop."},{"id":1010130003,"text":"Your Grace is the King of Highland, and kings have their own∠ways of making war. It shall be done."},{"id":1010130004,"text":"Allow us to be your vanguard."},{"id":1010130005,"text":"Hmph... Do as you wish."},{"id":1010130006,"text":"I shall accompany you as well. After the long journey from∠Harmonia, my soldiers are itching for something to do."},{"id":1010130007,"text":"Look what we have here. A dog who's been abandoned by his∠pack."},{"id":1010130008,"text":"If it is my life weighed against the survival of the∠♂② Army, it was the logical choice."},{"id":1010130009,"text":"Oh, spare me. Sooner or later, I'll see the ♂②∠Army crushed before my very eyes.∨♂㈱ will bow down before me like the lowly∠mongrel he is."},{"id":1010130010,"text":"The ♂② Army won't be defeated! Commander∠♂㈱ will never be beaten by the likes of you!!!"},{"id":1010130011,"text":"Hah! Take him away! I'll see his head mounted on the wall∠right next to ♂㈱'s!!!"},{"id":1010130012,"text":"Now, after Radat comes South Window, correct?"},{"id":1010130013,"text":"Only a fool would allow a surrounded enemy to escape."},{"id":1010130014,"text":"Forgive me, Your Grace."},{"id":1010130015,"text":"Hmph.◎1 After Radat, comes South Window. And then?"},{"id":1010130016,"text":"There is no need for strategy with this many troops. The∠next battle will be an all-out confrontation with the allied∠forces, so may your blade drink its fill. With our new∠general, we have nothing to fear."},{"id":1010130017,"text":"That man? He seems capable, but I'm curious as to where you∠found him?"},{"id":1010130018,"text":"We've crossed paths before. I knew he was talented, so∠I summoned him in hopes that he may be of use to you, Your∠Grace."},{"id":1010130019,"text":"I don't care about breeding. A sword doesn't need a fine∠lineage, it just needs to be sharp."},{"id":1010130020,"text":"Hmph, so you actually managed to take Greenhill.∠That means you're not all talk. I like that."},{"id":1010130021,"text":"Thank you, my lord."},{"id":1010130022,"text":"Well, I'll keep my word as well. Tell me what you want."},{"id":1010130023,"text":"Yes, my lord.∨............∨I wish for your sister, Princess Jillia, to be my wife..."},{"id":1010130024,"text":"Jillia?∨Bwahahahahaha! Why you cheeky little mouse!∨You've got brass, I'll give you that. Maybe I should remove∠your head from your shoulders with this blade?"},{"id":1010130025,"text":"I know that my lord is not a man who gives his∠word lightly.∨Besides...I have an idea."},{"id":1010130026,"text":"An idea? Out with it, then. But know that if I don't like∠it, I really will lop off your head this time."},{"id":1010130027,"text":"I'm afraid this isn't the place, my lord... If you catch my∠meaning."},{"id":1010130028,"text":"Yes, yes, I understand. Come to my quarters later and tell∠me this \"idea\" of yours. They're all gone...∠Nobody who even remembers them...∨But even so, this is the place where my heart always∠returned."},{"id":1010170097,"text":"Poor Clive... Born in the Guild, raised in the Guild...∠Pretty sad, don't you think, boy?∨Kelley too...◎1 ♂▼5Hand me Sturm..."},{"id":1010170098,"text":"Sturm... The only gun in the world with a spirit inside...∨The Guild chose Kelley to inherit this gun, not me.∨But then Sturm itself chose me... The Guild could not go∠against the gun's wishes, and the only way to settle it was∠with a duel..."},{"id":1010170100,"text":"Stern and Mond were the guns prepared for the day of the∠duel. And just like today, only Stern was loaded with∠bullets.◎2∨Kelley knew that... And so, he chose Mond..."},{"id":1010170101,"text":"The Guild... That can't be."},{"id":1010170102,"text":"I deeply regretted shooting Kelley...∨And running away from the Guild alive... ♂▼0So thank you,∠Clive... ♂▼1Now, my soul can return home..."},{"id":1010170103,"text":"Elza..."},{"id":1010170104,"text":"Ha... Hahahahahahaha!!! You're...much too soft, boy.♂▼2You∠didn't really believe that sob story, did you?"},{"id":1010170105,"text":"What is this?!"},{"id":1010170106,"text":"Go back to the guild, boy. It's the only place for you.∠That, at least, I won't take from you."},{"id":1010170107,"text":"Clive, take care of Sturm. You're its keeper now.∨Goodbye gunslinger...◎1 Farewell forever..."},{"id":1010170108,"text":"N-No... ♂▼3Elza! Elza!!!"},{"id":1010170109,"text":"Twas an honor, boy... But now...◎1 You can't...◎2 ∠♂▼4You can't catch me no more..."},{"id":1010170110,"text":"♂㈱... My duty as executioner is over. I think∠I'll eventually return to the Guild...∨But for the time being, I'll stay with the ♂②∠Army, if you'll have me.∨I'm not quite ready to leave this land yet..."},{"id":1010170111,"text":"What does that mean, a new country? ∠Does that mean Highland is no more?"},{"id":1010170114,"text":"Those Jowston bastards are going to massacre us... I just∠know it."},{"id":1010170115,"text":"Are scary people really coming to kill us?"},{"id":1010170117,"text":"Our country has been trampled upon by the Jowston Army..∠What will I do now?"},{"id":1010170132,"text":"O ye who seek a new path,∠let us put you to a test."},{"id":1010170133,"text":"・・・"},{"id":1010170136,"text":"A new path?"},{"id":1010170137,"text":"■"},{"id":1010170140,"text":"What new path?"},{"id":1010170141,"text":"■"},{"id":1010170145,"text":"・・・"},{"id":1010170146,"text":"Very well.∠Time does not pass for me.∠I can wait as long as I wish."},{"id":1010170147,"text":"・・・"},{"id":1010170150,"text":"■"},{"id":1010170153,"text":"■"},{"id":1010170154,"text":"You think I cannot assist you?∠As you like. Find your own way."},{"id":1010170156,"text":"・・・"},{"id":1010170157,"text":"■"},{"id":1010170158,"text":"And so, I shall open a new path for you…"},{"id":1010170160,"text":"I see, giving up."},{"id":1010170161,"text":"Are you afraid? Young man…∠That may be the wisest choice you'll make…"},{"id":1010170162,"text":"It's 70 potch per person, so your total is ♂③ potch."},{"id":1010170168,"text":"So, what do you want me to appraise?"},{"id":1010170170,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1010170171,"text":"This is a..."},{"id":1010170173,"text":"Okay, see you later."},{"id":1010170174,"text":"Come on in, we have a great selection."},{"id":1010170189,"text":"Who do you want it on?"},{"id":1010170190,"text":"Where do you want it?"},{"id":1010190001,"text":"Attention, soldiers of Highland! We may have lost the∠Knightdom, but we are far from defeated!"},{"id":1010190002,"text":"We're still stronger than them! The outcome of the war is∠not yet decided!!!"},{"id":1010190003,"text":"Before you is a rune, a rune bestowed by the Holy Kingdom of∠Harmonia. This is a rune that has been passed on for∠generations within the Blight Family, one of the 27 True∠Runes.∨Swear your oath, O King of Highland, before the Beast Rune, ∠ruler of destruction and protection."},{"id":1010190004,"text":"In the name of the Highland Kingdom and the Blight Royal∠Family, I beg thee for victory...∨O Beast Rune, I sacrifice to you the blood of she who is∠dearest to me... My wife...Jillia Blight!!!"},{"id":1010190005,"text":"The path of victory is the only path! We pray for victory!!!"},{"id":1010190006,"text":"Now is the time to fight. If we lose this, we lose the∠Kingdom of Highland!!!"},{"id":1010190007,"text":"Dispose of the replica for me..."},{"id":1010190008,"text":"How was the workmanship?"},{"id":1010190009,"text":"They did a very good job.∨Too good..."},{"id":1010240006,"text":""},{"id":1010240010,"text":""},{"id":1010240019,"text":""},{"id":1010240022,"text":""},{"id":1010240026,"text":""},{"id":1011010001,"text":"Mumuuu!"},{"id":1011010002,"text":"I've really come to love this castle. I love the way it's∠become home to the hopes of so many..."},{"id":1011010003,"text":"Awoooo..."},{"id":1011010004,"text":"Having so many people around gets me itching to perform.∠Hey, wanna do the knife throw again?"},{"id":1011010005,"text":"I...guess this is what it's like to have a home, huh."},{"id":1011010006,"text":"Hey ♂㈱, how ya doin'?"},{"id":1011010007,"text":"Welp, guess I might as well go bug Apple for a bit."},{"id":1011010008,"text":"Well if it ain't the boss. All these happy days with a full∠belly kinda freak me out."},{"id":1011010009,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱! It's nice outside! Gengen loves∠it outside! It feels good."},{"id":1011010010,"text":"Captain Gengen really loves the outdoors. It's cause it∠feels good on his fur."},{"id":1011010012,"text":"Shiro was a little grumpy at first, but it seems like he's∠starting to come around to life in a castle."},{"id":1011010014,"text":"All these new people showing up lately has get me thinking∠maybe I should come up with a new attraction for our show.∠Got any ideas?"},{"id":1011010015,"text":"This is the first time we've ever been in one place for so∠long..."},{"id":1011010016,"text":"Hey ♂㈱, you good?"},{"id":1011010018,"text":"Heya, boss. Man, I gotta tell ya, this place of yours sure∠knows how to keep a fella's belly full. It's like I died and∠went to heaven."},{"id":1011010021,"text":"Oh, hello ♂㈱. We've lived in the forest for so∠long that being around all these people is taking some∠getting used to."},{"id":1011010022,"text":"Grrr..."},{"id":1011010023,"text":"Hey ♂㈱. What're we up to? Oh, just having a∠meeting about what type of show to do..."},{"id":1011010024,"text":"Hehe, you should look in on my sister once in a while.∠I think she misses you..."},{"id":1011010025,"text":"Hiya, ♂㈱! How are you?"},{"id":1011010029,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, what the soldiers here lack in∠training, they more than make up for in fighting spirit.∠It is most reassuring to see."},{"id":1011010031,"text":"My sword arm is starting to get a little rusty..."},{"id":1011010032,"text":"Oh, hello there, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011010289,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I bear bad tidings. The Matilda∠Knights have surrendered to Highland."},{"id":1011010290,"text":"What?! So while we were retaking Greenhill..."},{"id":1011010291,"text":"Yes. While our forces were busy in Greenhill, Highland sent∠two-thirds of their army to invade Matilda."},{"id":1011010292,"text":"But Jowy, Culgan, and Seed were all there at the Muse∠border. When did it happen?"},{"id":1011010293,"text":"The generals were just a decoy while the soldiers headed∠for Matilda. A clever ploy. "},{"id":1011010294,"text":"Leon Silverberg led the Highland Army alone to Matilda,∠where Gordeau then offered a peaceful resolution."},{"id":1011010295,"text":"Officially, the Knightdom will retain its autonomy in return∠for cooperating with Highland, but in effect they've become∠puppets of Highland without even putting up a fight."},{"id":1011010296,"text":"Curse Gordeau! Is he truly so hellbent on sullying the honor∠of the Knights?!"},{"id":1011010298,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Shu, I suggest that we attack∠Muse immediately. The majority of Highland's forces are in∠Matilda, and even if they do make it back in time, they'll∠be exhausted from the march."},{"id":1011010299,"text":"You're right. To Muse we go."},{"id":1011010300,"text":"Let me think about it."},{"id":1011010301,"text":"What do you think, Shu?"},{"id":1011010302,"text":"I know you're tired from these successive battles, but you∠must decide quickly. At times, even a moment's delay can∠spell the end of an army."},{"id":1011010303,"text":"Have you made up your mind?"},{"id":1011010304,"text":"...◎3Hmm... I think it's worth a try."},{"id":1011010305,"text":"Shu..."},{"id":1011010307,"text":"♂㈱ will have the overall command, with General∠Hauser as his second. The primary strategist will be Apple,∠with Klaus serving a support role. You will all relocate to∠Greenhill.∨The city will make a good base from which to launch our∠attack on Muse.∨General Kiba and I will stay here. After all, if this place∠falls, the ♂② Army will be left with nowhere∠to return."},{"id":1011010308,"text":"Apple. Every lie contains truth, and every truth contains a∠lie... Remember that."},{"id":1011010309,"text":"I-I will..."},{"id":1011010310,"text":"*sigh* How much longer is this war gonna drag on?"},{"id":1011010311,"text":"Hahahahaha! Gettin' sick of it?"},{"id":1011010312,"text":"I guess so. But I've got to see it through to the end and∠see what kind of solution these people will arrive at."},{"id":1011010313,"text":"Yep. That's the fun part."},{"id":1011010410,"text":"☆0∠           Polished Vase"},{"id":1011010411,"text":"☆0∠        High-Quality Vase"},{"id":1011010415,"text":"☆0∠            Laundry Tub"},{"id":1011010416,"text":"☆0∠           Bottle of Soap"},{"id":1011010418,"text":"H-Hey, go somewhere else!"},{"id":1011010419,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱. I was∠so scared when you just passed out like that.∨But you've been resting in bed and drinking my soup for a∠whole week now, so you must be feeling better, right?∨Apple said that the Highland Army has withdrawn, too.◎2 Does∠that mean that this war is finally over?"},{"id":1011010420,"text":"Looks like there won't be any fighting for awhile, and if∠Apple and the others do their part, the war might even be∠over soon.∨Hey, I know, ♂㈱. Wouldn't it be nice to have a look around South∠Window and Kuskus?"},{"id":1011010421,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you're safe. Awful!∠Don't expect me to ever forgive you!"},{"id":1011010425,"text":"I'm not asking for your forgiveness."},{"id":1011010426,"text":"Grrr..."},{"id":1011010427,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you can hate me if you like.∨I only ask that you remember you are needed. If it means∠your safety, I will gladly suffer any disgrace."},{"id":1011010428,"text":"Ah, so this is ♂① Castle, eh? Magnificent."},{"id":1011010429,"text":"♂㈱, let's go see Shu and the others in the∠great hall."},{"id":1011010430,"text":"Sorry, but the waves are just too high. Have no fear, no suspicious∠folks will get through here on my watch."},{"id":1011010437,"text":"Well, looks like it's almost time for drills. Master Shu∠sure can be strict..."},{"id":1011010438,"text":"I'll never let anyone take ♂① Castle from us.∠That's why I'm working my hardest!"},{"id":1011010439,"text":"Commander, are you doing another inspection today?"},{"id":1011010440,"text":"It's a lot livelier around here than it used to be, eh,∠Commander?"},{"id":1011010441,"text":"There's nowhere I feel safer than ♂① Castle,∠home of the ♂② Army."},{"id":1011010442,"text":"This place is more like ♂① City than∠♂① Castle these days, huh?"},{"id":1011010443,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. She works at∠the tavern now."},{"id":1011010453,"text":"*woof*"},{"id":1011010454,"text":"*meow*"},{"id":1011010455,"text":"*grrr*"},{"id":1011010459,"text":"There are lots more people living in the castle now."},{"id":1011010461,"text":"I'm so happy. I finally made some friends!"},{"id":1011010462,"text":"I used to live in Coronet, but my mom and me ran away and∠came here. My dad..."},{"id":1011010468,"text":"I escaped here from Muse. Mu!"},{"id":1011010477,"text":"Looks like this is where our war ends, eh, Shiro?"},{"id":1011010478,"text":"Awooooo!!!"},{"id":1011010479,"text":"You're askin' what we're gonna do now? And thus the journey continues."},{"id":1011010507,"text":"My mission here is completed, so I'll be returning to Toran∠with the soldiers. Thank you for everything."},{"id":1011010508,"text":"Mumu... Mu."},{"id":1011010509,"text":"People come and go, but life flows on... That doesn't take∠away the sadness though..."},{"id":1011010511,"text":"Dammit...◎2 I'm sorry...◎1I wish I had something to∠say to make you feel better..."},{"id":1011010512,"text":"If you want to cry, then cry. I'm here for you. But you∠can't stay sad forever..."},{"id":1011010513,"text":"Waaah! Waaah! Nanami... Waaah!"},{"id":1011010515,"text":"Hang in there, boss."},{"id":1011010516,"text":"Don't be sad, ♂㈱! Be happy! Happy! Happy!!!"},{"id":1011010517,"text":"*sniffle* *sob*"},{"id":1011010536,"text":"Commander, you have my deepest apologies. Though I no∠longer served him, I still feel responsible for Lord∠Gordeau's actions..."},{"id":1011010537,"text":"It's sad when someone dies. You must believe that."},{"id":1011010546,"text":"Hey, what's up? Wanna go to Leona's with me?"},{"id":1011010547,"text":"Sorry, I'm at a real loss here..."},{"id":1011010548,"text":"♂㈱... It's okay, Gengen will... Gengen will..."},{"id":1011010568,"text":"Commander, you must stay strong."},{"id":1011010570,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1011010572,"text":"Mumumuuu!!!"},{"id":1011010573,"text":"We won, didn't we, ♂㈱! I'm glad you weren't hurt,∠either."},{"id":1011010604,"text":"Mumu!!!"},{"id":1011010605,"text":"Let's fight, ♂㈱. For everyone...and for∠ourselves too."},{"id":1011010607,"text":"Don't you worry. You've overcome every hurdle that's come∠your way so far, and you'll overcome this one too. I just∠know it."},{"id":1011010608,"text":"Well, I'm afraid not even my cards can predict the outcome∠of this battle..."},{"id":1011010609,"text":"It's okay. Bolgan protect ♂㈱. Captain Gengen is with you!"},{"id":1011010613,"text":"Gabocha will work hard right beside Gengen!"},{"id":1011010632,"text":"Now we'll show you the true power of the Blue Knights!!!"},{"id":1011010633,"text":"I have no stake in this battle, but fight I will..."},{"id":1011010634,"text":"Luca Blight has taken so many innocent lives... Yippee!!!"},{"id":1011010651,"text":"Mama said we're gonna go and look for Papa. I didn't, I∠swear I didn't!!!"},{"id":1011010684,"text":"People have been fearful for a long time, so now they're∠extra cheerful after their fear has been removed."},{"id":1011010686,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we won... "},{"id":1011010733,"text":"...◎3I don't want to run anymore."},{"id":1011010734,"text":"*sniffle*"},{"id":1011010736,"text":"*grrrrrr*"},{"id":1011010737,"text":"*honk*"},{"id":1011010759,"text":"♂㈱, this is ♂①."},{"id":1011010760,"text":"It's small right now cuz there aren't many people, but∠it's gonna get bigger, just you wait."},{"id":1011010761,"text":"Anyway, let's go out for a walk."},{"id":1011010762,"text":"There's nothing to see outside."},{"id":1011010763,"text":"It's too dangerous to take a boat out with waves as∠choppy as this."},{"id":1011020001,"text":"Oh, good day, Commander. I was just thinking it's about time I∠invest in some new armor..."},{"id":1011020130,"text":"Sure, armor needs to be sturdy, but it's also important that∠it looks good. That's how I see it at least."},{"id":1011020131,"text":"We're getting lotsa foot traffic these days, includin' some∠sketchy folks. So, hiring some security is the best answer."},{"id":1011020132,"text":"Mister Hans asked me to help with the cleaning. Apparently∠he's too busy with sales to get around to it himself."},{"id":1011020133,"text":"Hey ♂㈱. What do you think? Does this look∠like a good spot for an armor store?"},{"id":1011020134,"text":"Ahh, what a nice, cozy place."},{"id":1011020135,"text":"Commander ♂㈱. Eh? Why, I do quite like∠antiques and curios, yes."},{"id":1011020136,"text":"Yippee! Yay! A big space to play!"},{"id":1011020137,"text":"This is our spot! We found it first!"},{"id":1011020138,"text":"I'm Master Tessai's new apprentice. Thanks for having me at∠your castle."},{"id":1011020139,"text":"I came to have my weapon honed, but now I'm starting to∠think that a custom-made suit of armor would be nice too..."},{"id":1011020140,"text":"I heard that Master Tessai was here, so I came...but I∠guess maybe he's in Kuskus..."},{"id":1011020141,"text":"Phew... Time to take a breather. This place is a lot bigger∠than the mercenary fort, so it's easier to sneak off and...∠Uh-oh!"},{"id":1011020142,"text":"Lady Raura... She's wonderful. There's something almost∠mystical about her..."},{"id":1011020143,"text":"*sigh* That Raura is the most beautiful woman in the entire∠castle."},{"id":1011020144,"text":"Heehee, no one else knows about it, but you can get the best∠view from here. Deheheh..."},{"id":1011020145,"text":"Hello there, Commander. What a perfect day for doing the∠laundry."},{"id":1011020146,"text":"I'm ♂㈱, Commander of the ♂②∠Army!"},{"id":1011020147,"text":"Um, I'm...Blue Lightning Flik! Stay back or I'll slice you up!"},{"id":1011020148,"text":"I'm Viktor the Bear! I'll beat all of you!"},{"id":1011020149,"text":"I'm the flying hero, Chaco! No one can catch me!"},{"id":1011020150,"text":"I'm Teresa, mayor of Greenhill. Um, where is Shin?"},{"id":1011020151,"text":"Hurray! Hurray! I'm Captain Gengen!"},{"id":1011020152,"text":"Whew... I'm so busy lately my head is spinning."},{"id":1011020153,"text":"Hmm, well if it's fur ya got, ya should take it and sell it∠in South Window."},{"id":1011020154,"text":"Ugh, I wish everyone would quit throwing their trash in∠there..."},{"id":1011020155,"text":"Oh, why hello there, Commander. What a fine young man∠you are. This is gonna make a great story for my grandchild."},{"id":1011020156,"text":"Holly berries? I'd take 'em to Crom if I was you."},{"id":1011020158,"text":"There has to be some place that has soy sauce on the∠cheap..."},{"id":1011020159,"text":"*yawn* Whew, I'm so drowsy..."},{"id":1011020160,"text":"Pearls, pearls... Well, I guess Rockaxe is still your best∠bet for those..."},{"id":1011020161,"text":"Antiques sell for a pretty potch up in Rockaxe."},{"id":1011020162,"text":"You really gotta watch those market prices like a hawk..."},{"id":1011020168,"text":"This is my store, and I plan on doing business here as∠always."},{"id":1011020169,"text":"Well, guess it's about time I found somethin' pricey to∠pilfer..."},{"id":1011020170,"text":"What am I going to do now? Hmm, good question..."},{"id":1011020171,"text":"Hahahaha! There's plenty of other fast guys out there, so∠I'm gonna go look for 'em."},{"id":1011020172,"text":"Seems it's time I resumed my own journey."},{"id":1011020180,"text":"■"},{"id":1011020181,"text":"I think it's time for me to return to the Nameless Lands.∠Perhaps I'll find them this time..."},{"id":1011020182,"text":"I suppose I should go check in on my son soon..."},{"id":1011020183,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'm terribly sorry for your∠loss..."},{"id":1011020184,"text":"Heya, bro... Wanna grab a drink?"},{"id":1011020185,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1011020186,"text":"♂㈱... Not even I can outrun death..."},{"id":1011020187,"text":"We all have to face this at some point... Feel sad about∠having to part ways, but don't feel sad about death."},{"id":1011020189,"text":"W-Welcome to my shopp..."},{"id":1011020195,"text":"♂㈱...◎5 I know how you feel..."},{"id":1011020196,"text":"Not even my skills can help here..."},{"id":1011020197,"text":"Oh, hey there, Commander..."},{"id":1011020198,"text":"Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011020199,"text":"C'mon, bro...everything will work out."},{"id":1011020202,"text":"Situations like these are pretty much a flip of the coin..."},{"id":1011020204,"text":"Good day..."},{"id":1011020210,"text":"Raura or Jeane... If I had to choose one I'd be in a real∠fix. You get me, right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011020213,"text":"I salute you, Commander. If you can beat even Luca Blight,∠then your capability is beyond question."},{"id":1011020214,"text":"Hey, bro! Glad to see ya back in one piece. I always knew∠ya'd come out on top, though, wahahahaha!"},{"id":1011020216,"text":"I didn't get a chance to show off my fleet footwork, but∠congrats all these same."},{"id":1011020217,"text":"Well done on the victory, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011020225,"text":"Man, that Jeane... Talk about a knockout."},{"id":1011020227,"text":"I swear, a man can't get ahold of enough salt what with the∠fightin' these days."},{"id":1011020228,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. Please, don't refrain from∠buying any equipment you may need..."},{"id":1011020229,"text":"Lessee, what can I make off with now..."},{"id":1011020231,"text":"Don't you worry, ♂㈱. If things get too bad,∠I'll make sure you get outta there safely."},{"id":1011020232,"text":"Don't you dare lose out there, ♂㈱. As if∠you could with me on your side."},{"id":1011020240,"text":"I feel like Raura's eyes are gonna swallow me up whenever I∠stare into them... She's so gorgeous."},{"id":1011020243,"text":"This place... It will always be a vital part of this castle,∠of this city."},{"id":1011020244,"text":"The war may be over, but there is still plenty left to do."},{"id":1011020245,"text":"Fortune favors the prepared, as they say."},{"id":1011020246,"text":"Now just being a soldier isn't really gonna cut it with the∠ladies..."},{"id":1011020247,"text":"It sounds like Mister Hans is gonna close this store soon..."},{"id":1011020248,"text":"Well, suppose it's back to job-hunting for me..."},{"id":1011020249,"text":"Never did get that armor store started like I'd hoped..."},{"id":1011020250,"text":"Just getting more and more forgetful..."},{"id":1011020251,"text":"I'm thinking of becoming Lebrante's apprentice."},{"id":1011020254,"text":"I think I'll follow Master Tessai."},{"id":1011020255,"text":"I have an idea to quit soldiering and become a farmer. I∠always wanted to grow things."},{"id":1011020257,"text":"Whew, so happy that I don't have to worry about skipping∠work like this anymore..."},{"id":1011020261,"text":"I wanna keep living in ♂① Castle forever..."},{"id":1011020262,"text":"I'm ♂㈱ the hero!"},{"id":1011020268,"text":"The war's over, but we're still as busy as ever."},{"id":1011020271,"text":"It's high time I went to see my grandchild's sweet face∠again."},{"id":1011020273,"text":"Antlers, eh? I hear you can find 'em in Forest Village once∠in a blue moon..."},{"id":1011020275,"text":"*yawn* I'm half asleep here..."},{"id":1011020278,"text":"You know, at some point I gotta admit I got no head for this∠trading stuff."},{"id":1011020285,"text":"Whew... I was honestly scared for a while there."},{"id":1011020286,"text":"One look at my armor ought to let you know just how rough∠the fighting was out there."},{"id":1011020291,"text":"Good job making it back from that..."},{"id":1011020292,"text":"I'm so, so glad we won."},{"id":1011020296,"text":"Well, I made it back somehow..."},{"id":1011020298,"text":"Phew... Maybe if I practiced just a tad harder..."},{"id":1011020302,"text":"The castle is safe thanks to you, Commander!"},{"id":1011020303,"text":"Yay!!! We won! We won!!!"},{"id":1011020309,"text":"That's our Commander!!! You're the best!!!"},{"id":1011020312,"text":"We applaud you, Commander! Everyone is elated."},{"id":1011020326,"text":"Luca Blight will NOT be getting his despicable hands on this∠castle! Isn't that right, Commander!"},{"id":1011020327,"text":"The next battle is the decisive one, so we must make every∠preparation possible..."},{"id":1011020332,"text":"I wish you luck in the upcoming battle, Commander."},{"id":1011020333,"text":"If you should fail, all of these beautiful antiques will be∠reduced to ash..."},{"id":1011020337,"text":"I want to make sure I don't have any regrets coming out of∠this battle."},{"id":1011020339,"text":"Huh? Oh, don't worry. I'm the type who gets stronger once∠everything is on the line."},{"id":1011020341,"text":"*sigh* Raura and Jeane have this community divided between∠the two of them..."},{"id":1011020344,"text":"Luca Blight ain't gonna beat us!"},{"id":1011020350,"text":"I'm not so sure we can win this next battle..."},{"id":1011020353,"text":"Commander, I know you can do it. You're a hero who makes∠the impossible, possible."},{"id":1011020357,"text":"*yawn* Wonder if they got enough salt down there in South∠Window..."},{"id":1011020366,"text":"Huh? You wanna see the map? Fine, let me unroll it for you."},{"id":1011020367,"text":"Welcome, Commander. What can I do for you this fine day?"},{"id":1011020368,"text":"Is there anything else I can appraise for you?"},{"id":1011020370,"text":"Hmm, this is a..."},{"id":1011020371,"text":"It is done."},{"id":1011020372,"text":"Please come back if you find something of interest."},{"id":1011020373,"text":"So, what'll it be? We got everything here."},{"id":1011020380,"text":"Hope to see you again, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011030001,"text":"This is a most impressive dojo."},{"id":1011030002,"text":"I'm...in training. Must...sharpen...my mind...and senses."},{"id":1011030003,"text":"H-Hey, I'm only helping you guys because Lord Hanzo ordered∠me to, got it?"},{"id":1011030004,"text":"A body without training is without meaning!"},{"id":1011030005,"text":"Oh hey there, ♂㈱! Master's training can be∠tough, but I don't mind because I love the exercise!"},{"id":1011030006,"text":"Master Shu asked me to run the soldiers through drills."},{"id":1011030007,"text":"Master Shu asked me to run the soldiers through drills,∠so here I am."},{"id":1011030008,"text":"Oh come now, a girl can't sit around drinking forever if she∠wants to keep her skills sharp."},{"id":1011030009,"text":"These soldiers may be green, but their will to fight is∠strong."},{"id":1011030010,"text":"Oho, look at them go!"},{"id":1011030011,"text":"Uh, what? Training isn't my..."},{"id":1011030012,"text":"Ugh, Hix never misses a chance to get out of training. Can∠you say something to him too, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011030014,"text":"☆0∠           Practice Shields"},{"id":1011030015,"text":"☆0∠          Sword on Display"},{"id":1011030016,"text":"☆0∠          Practice Weapons"},{"id":1011030024,"text":"Training is tough, yes, but I'm doing my best, sir!!!"},{"id":1011030025,"text":"Oof, I'm gonna feel this later..."},{"id":1011030026,"text":"Hah! Hah! Yaaah!!!"},{"id":1011030027,"text":"I was so impressed by Tsai's skills that I'm trying out to∠be a spearman."},{"id":1011030028,"text":"I'd like to be an archer under Lady Teresa... That's my∠dream anyway."},{"id":1011030029,"text":"It's the infantry all the way for me. I wanna be on Viktor's∠team!"},{"id":1011030030,"text":"Ruff! Ruff! Awooo!!!"},{"id":1011030031,"text":"I think Captain Gengen's the best! I wanna be like him!"},{"id":1011030032,"text":"This is hard work, but we're kobolds so we don't mind!!!"},{"id":1011030033,"text":"*huff* *huff* Damn, this is hard..."},{"id":1011030034,"text":"We came all the way here to protect our home, Two River!"},{"id":1011030035,"text":"Zzz... Ack!!!"},{"id":1011030036,"text":"This, too, is training..."},{"id":1011030037,"text":"Inside the appraiser in Rockaxe..."},{"id":1011030038,"text":"In front of the blacksmith in Tinto..."},{"id":1011030039,"text":"In a basket in Lakewest..."},{"id":1011030045,"text":"Our mission is at an end, so we shall be taking our leave."},{"id":1011030046,"text":"It is time I found my next challenge..."},{"id":1011030047,"text":"Actually...I kinda like it here now."},{"id":1011030048,"text":"Indeed, it is time we were back on the path... The path that∠has no end, the path of conflict."},{"id":1011030049,"text":"As the Master says, the path of training is the path of∠conflict!"},{"id":1011030050,"text":"I must return to Toran soon."},{"id":1011030051,"text":"My assignment here is done, so I'd better be getting back to∠the Toran Republic."},{"id":1011030052,"text":"I think it's time for me to settle up with you-know-who."},{"id":1011030053,"text":"I will be returning to Matilda with Camus. Our home has∠need of the Knights now more than ever."},{"id":1011030054,"text":"■"},{"id":1011030055,"text":"I have to get back to my journey soon."},{"id":1011030056,"text":"Just when is Hix going to finish his rite of passage?"},{"id":1011030057,"text":"Such a tragedy..."},{"id":1011030058,"text":"I-I'm...in training. M-Must sharpen...my mind and senses..."},{"id":1011030059,"text":"Damn, that nice girl..."},{"id":1011030060,"text":"Want to...work out?"},{"id":1011030061,"text":"Don't lose heart, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011030062,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱... Why? Why does this∠always have to happen?"},{"id":1011030063,"text":"Do not weep, Commander. Such behavior is not befitting∠the leader of the ♂② Army."},{"id":1011030065,"text":"Forgive me, Commander. Though I no longer serve the∠Knights, I still feel responsible for the actions of Lord∠Gordeau..."},{"id":1011030066,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you must rally your spirit...∠Though, I understand how difficult it may be to do so..."},{"id":1011030067,"text":"*sniff* Why? Why, why..."},{"id":1011030068,"text":"I can't believe we'll never see Nanami again..."},{"id":1011030069,"text":"Commander... I hope that our defenses will be sufficient."},{"id":1011030071,"text":"C-Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011030078,"text":"Stand firm, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011030079,"text":"♂㈱, are...are you sure everything will be∠okay?"},{"id":1011030081,"text":"Master Shu certainly demanded a lot, but I guess it all∠worked out in the end since we won, eh Commander∠♂㈱?"},{"id":1011030083,"text":"Heh, that was nothing. Guess not even war is all people make∠it out to be."},{"id":1011030085,"text":"Oh, congratulations, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1011030086,"text":"I guess we won, but there are lots of people who won't be∠coming home..."},{"id":1011030087,"text":"We survivors owe it to the fallen to send them off with∠honor."},{"id":1011030093,"text":"We of Rokkaku will stand resolute beside you."},{"id":1011030095,"text":"Luca Blight, huh... Whatever."},{"id":1011030098,"text":"Master Shu asked me to train the troops, so...I don't want∠any of them to be killed."},{"id":1011030099,"text":"A battle with Luca Blight... I wonder how many will∠live to see the next day."},{"id":1011030105,"text":"There's no relaxing for any of us just yet!"},{"id":1011030106,"text":"I think maybe he can ease it up a bit..."},{"id":1011030109,"text":"Is it true that Lady Teresa is going back to Greenhill?"},{"id":1011030115,"text":"Yeah! We won! We won!!!"},{"id":1011030126,"text":"I'm so glad all those drills paid off!"},{"id":1011030136,"text":"Did you see the fury of the Winged Horde?!"},{"id":1011030147,"text":"No, sir! Luca Blight is never going to beat us!"},{"id":1011030157,"text":"It'll take more than Luca Blight to scare the Winged Horde!"},{"id":1011030168,"text":"Hmm, there's really only so much I can do training by myself∠like this. Where could the master be?"},{"id":1011030171,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱... It'll be okay... I'm sure it will."},{"id":1011030172,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011030173,"text":"Great work, ♂㈱. Well, I suppose I'll get back∠on the road again to continue my training."},{"id":1011040001,"text":"Hmm, not bad, I gotta say. This'll do nicely."},{"id":1011040002,"text":"Aha, here to lose the shirt off your back, huh?"},{"id":1011040003,"text":"Oh, Commander. I'm helping out Dr. Huan today."},{"id":1011040004,"text":"No time to rest. And when a doctor's busy, that means∠things aren't going well."},{"id":1011040005,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, sir! May luck be with us!"},{"id":1011040006,"text":"You got some business with ol' Richmond here?"},{"id":1011040007,"text":"I'm so happy I can spend time with my husband."},{"id":1011040008,"text":"What is it, deary? Do you have a question for Granny?"},{"id":1011040009,"text":"This life is what we mercenaries are made for."},{"id":1011040010,"text":"I, um...I'm generally not too fond of these places..."},{"id":1011040011,"text":"Hahahahaha!
