These greenhorns have nothing on me."},{"id":1011040012,"text":"Ah, Commander ♂㈱. Do you have need of me?"},{"id":1011040013,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I am prepared to fight with my∠all for the ♂② Army, and for you."},{"id":1011040014,"text":"The soldiers here are in high spirits."},{"id":1011040015,"text":"I find surroundings such as this most relaxing."},{"id":1011040016,"text":"Hello, Commander. Are you well?"},{"id":1011040017,"text":"Oh, what can I do for you today, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011040018,"text":"Hello...Commander."},{"id":1011040019,"text":"Hey, Commander, what's up? Hahaha! What's wrong? ∠Not used to being called that?"},{"id":1011040020,"text":"Aw, c'mon, really? I gotta share a room with him?"},{"id":1011040021,"text":"Ah, ♂㈱! Just the person I need. Say, um, have∠you seen Sir Flik?"},{"id":1011040022,"text":"Hello there, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011040023,"text":"Oh, hi ♂㈱. Hix just doesn't seem interested∠in practicing his swordsmanship! Ugh! The frustration!"},{"id":1011040024,"text":"Whew... It's so relaxing here."},{"id":1011040025,"text":"Just when is Father ever planning on seeing Mother?"},{"id":1011040026,"text":"Ahh, I love the smell, the feel of battle. Life has worse to∠offer."},{"id":1011040029,"text":"How's it going, ♂㈱? You've turned into quite∠a leader, I have to say."},{"id":1011040030,"text":"Hmm, guess I may as well go grab myself a drink..."},{"id":1011040031,"text":"Ah, ♂㈱! Just the person I need. Say, um, have∠you seen Sir Flik?"},{"id":1011040035,"text":"Black would be such a huge help if he were here now..."},{"id":1011040106,"text":"Where... Am I...alive?"},{"id":1011040107,"text":"You're quite lucky, Clive. What do you call these bits of∠metal? \"Bullets\"? Either way, they only hit you in the∠shoulder and leg, otherwise you wouldn't be here with us."},{"id":1011040108,"text":".........∨A knight-class Gunner missed? Impossible..."},{"id":1011040110,"text":"☆0∠       Lots of Tools and Meds"},{"id":1011040111,"text":"☆0∠          Filled with water."},{"id":1011040112,"text":"☆0∠      Tools for Making Medicine"},{"id":1011040113,"text":"☆0∠        Basket Filled with Tools"},{"id":1011040118,"text":"☆0∠          Decorative Armor"},{"id":1011040119,"text":"☆0∠     Table with Armor Laid Out"},{"id":1011040120,"text":"☆0∠         Rules of Knighthood"},{"id":1011040123,"text":"☆0∠           It's half-way read."},{"id":1011040124,"text":"☆0∠    Tools for Maintaining Spears"},{"id":1011040125,"text":"☆0∠      Spear Under Maintenance"},{"id":1011040126,"text":"☆0∠         Plant with Big Leaves"},{"id":1011040127,"text":"☆0∠         The Latest Strategies"},{"id":1011040128,"text":"☆0∠              Rows of Armor"},{"id":1011040130,"text":"☆0∠        Vigorously-Tended Plant"},{"id":1011040133,"text":"☆0∠            Table with Drinks"},{"id":1011040134,"text":"☆0∠              Leather Armor"},{"id":1011040135,"text":"Hah! Dammit..."},{"id":1011040136,"text":"Oh, Commander. I don't know... Lately I just haven't∠been feeling well..."},{"id":1011040137,"text":"We'll fight here for all the people of the village. They∠must be avenged..."},{"id":1011040138,"text":"Yeowch..."},{"id":1011040139,"text":"On patrol again, sir? Nothing unusual to report here."},{"id":1011040140,"text":"Just you watch! I'll take out the whole Highland Army by∠myself!!! Man, I would be so famous..."},{"id":1011040141,"text":"Kobold warriors are brave and bold. They never flee from∠battle."},{"id":1011040142,"text":"Some of these guys are wounded, but I'm not worried 'cause∠Doctor Huan's around."},{"id":1011040143,"text":"Unh...◎2 Oh, Commander ♂㈱. D-Don't worry about∠me. I'll be fine."},{"id":1011040144,"text":"Sleeping is part of a soldier's job. We Kobolds∠are very good at that too."},{"id":1011040145,"text":"What? Never seen wings like these before?"},{"id":1011040146,"text":"Master Shu ordered security tightened... Was everyone making∠too much noise?"},{"id":1011040147,"text":"Wingers, kobolds and humans fighting together, side by side∠for a single purpose. It's a blessed thing to behold."},{"id":1011040148,"text":"We Blue Knights and our leader, Sir Miklotov, pledge our∠loyalty to you, Commander."},{"id":1011040149,"text":"Finally, we can wield our swords in the service of∠something we believe."},{"id":1011040150,"text":"We Red Knights and our leader, Sir Camus, shall fight for∠you, Commander."},{"id":1011040151,"text":"With the might of the Red and Blue Knights combined, the∠♂② Army cannot lose."},{"id":1011040152,"text":"I agree with the sentiments of Sir Miklotov. Commander,∠my life and sword are yours."},{"id":1011040153,"text":"Oh, uh, hello, Mister Leader, sir. Just you wait and see,∠I'm going to make this into a room to be proud of."},{"id":1011040154,"text":"For the ♂② Army!!!"},{"id":1011040155,"text":"How could a guy not be motivated by all this?"},{"id":1011040156,"text":"That's right... Leave that wall there, and then put in a new∠floor..."},{"id":1011040163,"text":"Well, I reckon we should be off too. Going where the wind∠blows, we are."},{"id":1011040164,"text":"Hahaha, I love this place. Lotsa rubes to rip off."},{"id":1011040165,"text":"I'll keep working with Dr. Huan."},{"id":1011040166,"text":"I think I'll stay here a little longer. It looks like my∠services are still needed."},{"id":1011040167,"text":"I promised Yoshino that I would go back to Radat when my∠work here was done."},{"id":1011040168,"text":"Guess it's time to consider my next move."},{"id":1011040169,"text":"My husband promised he'd come back to Radat. ∠I'm so happy I can hardly speak..."},{"id":1011040170,"text":"What is it, sonny? Granny doesn't have any more interesting∠stories to tell."},{"id":1011040171,"text":"We mercenaries are going to have to look for work somewhere∠else now, huh."},{"id":1011040172,"text":"Hmm, what should I do now?"},{"id":1011040173,"text":"■"},{"id":1011040174,"text":"There's still much left to be done."},{"id":1011040175,"text":"The war may be over, but our work is not."},{"id":1011040176,"text":"I think I will return to Matilda with Camus. Our homeland∠needs the Knights more than ever."},{"id":1011040178,"text":"I haven't thought about what I'm going to do after I get∠back to Matilda."},{"id":1011040179,"text":"I'm going to go back to Greenhill. The people there are∠waiting for me."},{"id":1011040181,"text":"The things that are important to you... Don't ever forget∠them."},{"id":1011040182,"text":"That bastard Neclord's dead for keeps, so I'm not really∠sure what I'm gonna do now..."},{"id":1011040183,"text":"I wonder what Sir Flik's plans are now? Me? Oh, you know,∠heeheehee..."},{"id":1011040184,"text":"We're going to continue our journey."},{"id":1011040185,"text":"I've got to make Hix into a real man..."},{"id":1011040187,"text":"I'll drag my father home with me if I have to..."},{"id":1011040188,"text":"Which way am I headed? Whichever way the wind blows..."},{"id":1011040196,"text":"......"},{"id":1011040197,"text":"I've decided to go to Crystal Valley with Sir Humphrey.∠Maybe I'll learn something there."},{"id":1011040198,"text":"At times like this, I like to just go out on my boat, feel∠the waves roll under me, and empty my mind."},{"id":1011040199,"text":"Hey, you wanna gamble at a time like this?◎2 Nah, of course∠I'm game. Yeah, let 'em roll!"},{"id":1011040200,"text":"♂㈱... Dr. Huan did everything he could..."},{"id":1011040201,"text":"I'm so sorry..."},{"id":1011040202,"text":"Urgh... Commander, I-I...don't know what to say..."},{"id":1011040203,"text":"G-Got work for me?"},{"id":1011040206,"text":"Death is the one constant thing in life..."},{"id":1011040208,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you must be strong..."},{"id":1011040213,"text":"Nanami was...a lady like no other."},{"id":1011040214,"text":"There's nothing I can do to ease your pain... I-I'm∠sorry..."},{"id":1011040217,"text":"♂㈱... Don't think too much. You can't∠have booze, so just drink something warm and get some sleep."},{"id":1011040218,"text":"No! But she... There must be some mistake..."},{"id":1011040222,"text":"I-I wasn't that close to Nanami, but still..."},{"id":1011040223,"text":"Life is full of tragedies. You can't run away from them.∠You just have to accept them and move on. Understand?"},{"id":1011040231,"text":"...This part is always sad."},{"id":1011040232,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... Losing Black was sad enough,∠but this is..."},{"id":1011040234,"text":"Oh, hey... You wanna play?"},{"id":1011040236,"text":"■"},{"id":1011040241,"text":"Is it all right that I'm not by your side, my lord?"},{"id":1011040248,"text":"All we can do now is pray..."},{"id":1011040251,"text":"(No one should be here.)"},{"id":1011040253,"text":"...It'll be okay. Everything will be okay."},{"id":1011040258,"text":"Listen, boy... Even if things don't work out the way you∠hoped, you have to accept it. Understand?"},{"id":1011040266,"text":".............∠.............∠............."},{"id":1011040268,"text":"Y'know, that Luca Blight wasn't as tough as he was cracked∠up to be."},{"id":1011040270,"text":"It looks like we've got lots of wounded... Lots of dead too."},{"id":1011040271,"text":"Whew, this part is always the hardest... Although I suppose∠it is unbecoming of me as a doctor to say that."},{"id":1011040272,"text":"*sigh* Maybe now Lord Granmeyer can rest in peace..."},{"id":1011040273,"text":"There's some stuff even your pal Richmond here doesn't know,∠kid."},{"id":1011040274,"text":"I'm so relieved my husband wasn't injured..."},{"id":1011040276,"text":"None of the other battles compared to that last one."},{"id":1011040277,"text":"Places like this are a little...◎2 Well, you know."},{"id":1011040279,"text":"Ah, Commander ♂㈱. Do you have need of me?"},{"id":1011040281,"text":"Everyone gave their all, that we might triumph."},{"id":1011040283,"text":"How do you find the taste of victory?"},{"id":1011040284,"text":"We won, despite it all... Thank heavens."},{"id":1011040286,"text":"With that creep Luca crushed, we can finally hold our heads∠high again."},{"id":1011040287,"text":"Hahaha, I lived up to my word."},{"id":1011040291,"text":"Ahh, it's relaxing here."},{"id":1011040293,"text":"Well, that's just how battles go sometimes."},{"id":1011040303,"text":"Luca Blight, eh? Is he really that much of a tough customer?"},{"id":1011040306,"text":"Not again... We'd better get plenty of medicine prepared."},{"id":1011040307,"text":"Commander ♂㈱! We must defeat Highland, we∠absolutely must!!!"},{"id":1011040309,"text":"As long as I have my husband by my side..."},{"id":1011040311,"text":"It'll be an honor to fight against the dreaded Luca Blight."},{"id":1011040312,"text":"Everyone... They're uneasy and tense. Commander∠♂㈱, please give them some encouraging words."},{"id":1011040314,"text":"We will not be beaten! Not by Highland, and not by Luca∠Blight!"},{"id":1011040316,"text":"We shall strike the enemy with everything we can muster!"},{"id":1011040318,"text":"One must always remain cool in a fight. This battle is no∠different."},{"id":1011040319,"text":"Another battle so soon? No, no, I'm ready."},{"id":1011040320,"text":"My lady's life is all that matters..."},{"id":1011040321,"text":"Well, I plan on doing all that I can."},{"id":1011040322,"text":"No point in gettin' cold feet now."},{"id":1011040338,"text":"I'm going back to my village. Sure, there's nothin' there∠anymore, but it's still my home."},{"id":1011040339,"text":"Oh, hello there, Commander."},{"id":1011040348,"text":"I will always treasure the memory of what we achieved here∠together..."},{"id":1011040350,"text":"We congratulate you on ending the war."},{"id":1011040351,"text":"I wonder what Sir Camus is planning..."},{"id":1011040352,"text":"We Red Knights will follow our commander, Sir Camus."},{"id":1011040354,"text":"Sorry about that... Looks like I was a bit late."},{"id":1011040357,"text":"Well, no need to rush things..."},{"id":1011040364,"text":"*sniff* Commander ♂㈱...∠Vengeance, at long, long, last..."},{"id":1011040378,"text":"We've got the power of the Red and the Blue Knights on our∠side. Of course we'll win."},{"id":1011040390,"text":"This time... This time we'll have our revenge."},{"id":1011040391,"text":"I'm almost shaking too hard to talk here..."},{"id":1011040393,"text":"I'm gonna go right out there and lop off Luca Blight's head!∠I'm gonna do it! Just you watch! "},{"id":1011040398,"text":"Hahaha! I like this whole army thing. When we're out there∠fightin' shoulder-to-shoulder, it don't matter if we're∠wingers or humans."},{"id":1011040401,"text":"It will take more than Luca Blight to make us quail."},{"id":1011040402,"text":"Now is the time to show everyone the valor of the Knights."},{"id":1011040409,"text":"If this all gets burnt down before we finish..."},{"id":1011040416,"text":"Whoa, you serious? I'm not so sure this is the best time to∠be rollin' dice."},{"id":1011040417,"text":"Fishing? Get serious, will ya... How 'bout going to check in∠on your sister instead?"},{"id":1011040418,"text":"☆0∠               Telescope◎2∠      It's hard to see anything..."},{"id":1011040419,"text":"Hey there, ♂㈱, good to see ya. Uh, I'm fine∠here. Ya got more important things to worry about than moles∠right now."},{"id":1011040420,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I...I!!! Waaah... *sniffle*"},{"id":1011040421,"text":"Yo, what's up? An investigation? Sorry, kiddo, but Shu asked∠not to... Oops, almost said too much there."},{"id":1011040422,"text":"Huh? Ya need somethin'? A bath? Sorry, but it ain't hot yet.∠Dammit, me, cryin' too hard to see?"},{"id":1011040423,"text":"Hello there, ♂㈱... Dance?◎3 Forgive me, but∠I don't feel up to it now, and besides you really need to∠go to her..."},{"id":1011040424,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱, good day. A song?◎3 ∠I'm sorry, but I can't help you right now..."},{"id":1011040425,"text":"Just a few inches more and... If she was really aiming,∠then she's an incredible shot."},{"id":1011050001,"text":"Damn it all! Please, don't let her die..."},{"id":1011050003,"text":"Aw, it'll be fine. She's not one to croak easily."},{"id":1011050004,"text":"Eilie!!!"},{"id":1011050005,"text":"I'm sorry, ♂㈱, I didn't mean to be..."},{"id":1011050006,"text":"It sounds like he's finished."},{"id":1011050007,"text":"So how'd it go?! She's okay, right?!"},{"id":1011050009,"text":"She must be."},{"id":1011050010,"text":"She okay, she okay!"},{"id":1011050011,"text":"Forgive me, but my skills...were insufficient..."},{"id":1011050012,"text":"What?! No!!! You call yourself a doctor?!"},{"id":1011050013,"text":"Stop it, Flik. All you're doing now is takin' your anger out∠on him. That won't change anything."},{"id":1011050014,"text":"I know that! I know, but still!!! It's just too unfair∠for ♂㈱...∨Damn! First Kiba and now Nanami...∨We fought so hard together! Scratched out victory together!∠And now it just ends here like this?!"},{"id":1011050016,"text":"Dammit..."},{"id":1011050018,"text":"Master Shu..."},{"id":1011050020,"text":"Can I speak with you...inside?"},{"id":1011050021,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱. Hey, c'mon, get up!!!∨Lord Makai from Two River and Mayor Gustav from Tinto,∠and everyone else are all waiting for you in the great∠hall.∨No dragging your feet! The war may be over, but there are∠still lots of things to be done.∨You've got a whole new nation to build, right?"},{"id":1011050022,"text":"We've been awaiting you, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011050023,"text":"I commend you, Commander ♂㈱. Now we can∠leave behind this long, long history of conflict."},{"id":1011050024,"text":"Well, at least now there's one less enemy threatening∠the soil of the City-States."},{"id":1011050025,"text":"But we still don't have true peace in these lands. ∠That is why we are here before you today with a request, ∠Commander."},{"id":1011050026,"text":"So long as the Holy Kingdom of Harmonia exists to the∠north, stability here will remain uncertain.∨Furthermore, the City-States once fell to Luca Blight∠because no trust existed between us. What this land needs∠is a single, undivided nation."},{"id":1011050027,"text":"Thus, we ask that you found the ♂② Republic∠here and serve as its leader.∨Master Shu has already brought this matter before each of∠the City-States and obtained our consent."},{"id":1011050028,"text":"The idea was voted on and approved unanimously∠by the Three Houses of Parliament in Two River, as well."},{"id":1011050029,"text":"If it means a stronger nation, we have no objections either."},{"id":1011050030,"text":"The Knightdom of Matilda is no more, but we will follow∠your orders in this matter, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011050031,"text":"I agree with Miklotov."},{"id":1011050032,"text":"Luca Blight may have robbed Muse of much of its strength,∠but we still haven't lost our pride as the center of the∠Alliance.∨As acting mayor of Muse City, ∠I also intend to follow your will in this, Commander."},{"id":1011050033,"text":"Mayor Anabelle is no longer with us, and in accordance with∠the wishes of Lord Jess, I now sit as acting mayor of Muse.∨I believe that Lady Anabelle and Lord Jess, too, would agree∠that it is in our best interest to follow Commander∠♂㈱ in this."},{"id":1011050034,"text":"Once a consensus is reached, I am certain the army∠of Muse City will follow you as well, Commander∠♂㈱."},{"id":1011050037,"text":"I can't do it."},{"id":1011050038,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... We thank you."},{"id":1011050039,"text":"We hereby announce the birth of the ♂②∠Republic. May it bring unwavering peace to these lands from∠this day, this hour, to eternity!∨And to this end, we swear to serve Commander∠♂㈱ with pride and fidelity!!!"},{"id":1011050040,"text":"Is something wrong, Commander?"},{"id":1011050041,"text":"There's no reason to hesitate, ♂㈱. Everyone∠here believes in you."},{"id":1011050042,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you can do it. Please instill∠a new order on this land."},{"id":1011050043,"text":"So where will you go, ♂㈱?!"},{"id":1011050044,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, everyone wants you to lead this∠nation. Please, heed their wishes."},{"id":1011050045,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. Where do you think you're going?"},{"id":1011050046,"text":"Look, there is a great power within you.◎1 And I don't mean∠that rune on your hand either.∨You've shouldered the hopes of many people, and you have a∠duty to carry them through to the end.∨And that goes for all those who died in this war too..."},{"id":1011050047,"text":"Leave it, Flik. He needs to do this..."},{"id":1011050048,"text":"But I just want ya to remember one thing, ♂㈱.∠You've always got a home to come back to here."},{"id":1011050058,"text":"Master Shu..."},{"id":1011050059,"text":"Doctor Huan... What is this?"},{"id":1011050060,"text":"Doctor... What is this?"},{"id":1011050061,"text":"I'm sorry... I put him up to it."},{"id":1011050062,"text":"I'm sorry... I put him up to it."},{"id":1011050063,"text":"And I suppose you have a good reason for doing this?"},{"id":1011050064,"text":"Yes...∨I-I'm thinking about going my separate way∠from ♂㈱ for a while."},{"id":1011050065,"text":"...That will sadden him greatly."},{"id":1011050066,"text":"I know that, I do... But I can't take any more of this, of∠♂㈱ and Jowy fighting...∨I can't bear to see ♂㈱ in pain either...∨When the arrows flew at us, ♂㈱ tried to shield∠me with his body, and that's when I understood...∨♂㈱ shouldn't be doing such things."},{"id":1011050067,"text":"True, a leader can't behave like that."},{"id":1011050068,"text":"That's...that's why I'm going to let you have him all to∠yourselves for a while."},{"id":1011050069,"text":"And what will you do in the meantime?"},{"id":1011050070,"text":"I'll go back to Grandpa Genkaku's house. I think it'll be∠safe enough if people don't figure out that I'm back.∨Besides...it would be so sad if he had no home to return to∠once this is all over, don't you think?∨Finally, I have a favor to ask.∠If, and when the time for him to come home does arrive,∠I want you to tell ♂㈱ about this conversation∠we had."},{"id":1011050071,"text":"Why ask me of all people to do this?"},{"id":1011050072,"text":"Because, knowing you, you'll \"never\" tell him until it's∠absolutely necessary..."},{"id":1011050073,"text":"Yes, you're right about that...◎1 Very well, I'll do it."},{"id":1011050262,"text":""},{"id":1011050443,"text":"It's gonna be okay, ♂㈱. Just keep it together."},{"id":1011050444,"text":"♂㈱... Don't worry... She's very tough..."},{"id":1011050446,"text":"*sniffle* *sob*"},{"id":1011050447,"text":"♂㈱... All we can do is wait..."},{"id":1011060001,"text":"Hey, there ya are. Get on inside and have a long, hot soak."},{"id":1011060002,"text":"Alrighty... Who's purse is next?"},{"id":1011060003,"text":"♂㈱, I see you are doing the rounds again."},{"id":1011060004,"text":"Ah, I see you are doing the rounds again, Commander."},{"id":1011060005,"text":"Good day, Commander. This is quite the stout fortress,∠I have to say. Assailing it will be no easy feat."},{"id":1011060006,"text":"Greetings, Commander. Where are you headed?"},{"id":1011060007,"text":"Ah, Commander. Can I assist you with something?"},{"id":1011060008,"text":"Hello there, sir!!! I'll make you the tastiest, most mouth-∠watering meal you've ever had!"},{"id":1011060009,"text":"Hmm, this...isn't really to my liking."},{"id":1011060010,"text":"Hoo boy, I can't get enough of this. It's too good! Stickin'∠with you was the best choice I ever made, boss."},{"id":1011060011,"text":"All that lives needs to consume other life. That is the∠truth of things."},{"id":1011060012,"text":"Wow, this is good stuff. Keep it coming!"},{"id":1011060013,"text":"Hmm, maybe I should let Bonaparte have some too..."},{"id":1011060014,"text":"The smells here do a number on my nose..."},{"id":1011060015,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, my abilities are at your∠disposal for the time being."},{"id":1011060016,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. What brings you here?"},{"id":1011060017,"text":"Hey, excuse me? Wasn't Flik here just a second ago?"},{"id":1011060018,"text":"You come here too, huh. So what's up?"},{"id":1011060019,"text":"☆0∠      Bread, Salad, and an Omelet"},{"id":1011060020,"text":"☆0∠  Pizza, Corn Soup, and Steamed Chicken"},{"id":1011060021,"text":"☆0∠  Toast, Bacon and Eggs"},{"id":1011060022,"text":"☆0∠    Green Salad and Grilled fish"},{"id":1011060023,"text":"☆0∠      Beefsteak and Corn Pottage"},{"id":1011060024,"text":"☆0∠          Egg Salad and Wine"},{"id":1011060025,"text":"☆0∠          Basket of Tomatoes"},{"id":1011060029,"text":"☆0∠              Cooking Wine"},{"id":1011060030,"text":"☆0∠                    Beef∠             Looks good..."},{"id":1011060031,"text":"☆0∠       Cabbages and Tomatoes"},{"id":1011060032,"text":"☆0∠       Shelf with Cooking Utensils"},{"id":1011060033,"text":"Huh? Um, what?"},{"id":1011060034,"text":"I just love the terrace here. It's my favorite spot. It∠really puts me at peace."},{"id":1011060035,"text":"Whew, just take a nice, long bath and get yourself \"toasty.\"∠Not only is it relaxing, but it also feels like it helps∠soothe any old, lingering wounds."},{"id":1011060036,"text":"Nothing like a hot bath to wash away all the sweat after a∠day of training. Whew..."},{"id":1011060037,"text":"There's a nice open yard just past here."},{"id":1011060038,"text":"Come play in the yard!"},{"id":1011060039,"text":"Hell yeah, it's bath time! I'm sticky with sweat."},{"id":1011060040,"text":"My mom is always yellin' at me to help out, so I ran up here∠to get away from her."},{"id":1011060041,"text":"Heehee, it's easy to avoid being found in a castle this big.∠Maybe I'll chat a bit longer before heading back..."},{"id":1011060042,"text":"*sniff* *sniff* Something smells good... Where is it coming∠from? I have to find it!"},{"id":1011060043,"text":"Word of this restaurant has spread to all the nearby∠villages. I personally came all the way from South Window."},{"id":1011060044,"text":"Yes, sir! Come right inside! Eat as much as you want!∠Our Best sellers are : Salad & Cheese cake "},{"id":1011060045,"text":"We can't keep our customers waiting, can we?"},{"id":1011060046,"text":"Whew, busy, busy, busy! Let's see, roast duck... Wait, was∠that right?"},{"id":1011060047,"text":"Tralalalala... I love it when we have a full house∠like this."},{"id":1011060048,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱, we were just talking about∠you... What were we saying? Heeheehee..."},{"id":1011060049,"text":"Mm-mm, this is deeelish! I'm gonna need more!"},{"id":1011060050,"text":"Mmm... Even their bread is well-made..."},{"id":1011060051,"text":"...◎1Oh! I'm sorry! The food is all so good that I just kinda ∠spaced out."},{"id":1011060052,"text":"That ♂㈱... He's so young and yet he's the∠leader of ♂② army. He's incredible..."},{"id":1011060053,"text":"*sniff* *sniff* Why not make a restaurant here? You'd make∠lots of money, and have a full belly."},{"id":1011060061,"text":"Hey, don't be shy! Go on inside!!!"},{"id":1011060063,"text":"We'll be returning to Two River. After all, we cannot remain∠here forever."},{"id":1011060064,"text":"The kobold forces must return to Two River at some point.∠After all, we cannot stay here indefinitely."},{"id":1011060065,"text":"■"},{"id":1011060066,"text":"I'll be making my way back to Highland. Though the kingdom∠is no more, its people's lives must go on..."},{"id":1011060067,"text":"The war may be over, but we still have a great many things∠left to do."},{"id":1011060068,"text":"Hello there, sir! I'm staying here and so is my restaurant!"},{"id":1011060069,"text":"It's about time..."},{"id":1011060070,"text":"Well, I think I've about paid off what I owed ya,∠so I s'pose I'll be movin' on..."},{"id":1011060075,"text":"The fighting has ended, but the real work has just begun."},{"id":1011060076,"text":"Don't lose sight of what matters most to you,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1011060077,"text":"Hellooo? Sir Flik, where are yooou?"},{"id":1011060078,"text":"Good question... What AM I gonna do now?"},{"id":1011060079,"text":"A nice hot bath is all I can give ya, but go on in and∠enjoy."},{"id":1011060083,"text":"■"},{"id":1011060084,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... I never thought this would∠happen..."},{"id":1011060086,"text":"Hello there, sir!!! Eat some of my food. You will feel∠better!!!◎2 I'm afraid that is all I can do..."},{"id":1011060089,"text":"♂㈱, it is natural for man to die, just as it∠is natural for him to weep at his mortality."},{"id":1011060090,"text":"♂㈱, if only I had been there..."},{"id":1011060094,"text":"♂㈱...◎3 Damn it all..."},{"id":1011060095,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011060096,"text":"Look, don't dwell on it now. Ya can't have booze,∠but why not grab somethin' warm to drink?"},{"id":1011060097,"text":"Hey there. Wanna go in?"},{"id":1011060104,"text":"Hello, sir! I will make some healthy chicken soup for∠Nanami to have when she wakes up!!!"},{"id":1011060115,"text":"Ey, there he is! I heard that last battle got pretty nasty.∠Go on, get in there and let all that stress and sweat flow∠right off ya."},{"id":1011060151,"text":"I just love the laundry area you can get to from the∠terrace. The breeze from the lake feels so refreshing."},{"id":1011060153,"text":"As long as we got this bath here, I'm not goin' anywhere."},{"id":1011060154,"text":"There's a field for crops and even a pasture through here.∠Just those supply us with almost all of the food we need."},{"id":1011060155,"text":"In the garden is veggies. In the pasture is fuzzy sheep."},{"id":1011060157,"text":"I'm waiting here until the clothes dry. Where did I wash∠'em? Just go outside through that center door."},{"id":1011060158,"text":"I help out with the laundry, but I prefer to stay here and∠talk..."},{"id":1011060161,"text":"I just love working here."},{"id":1011060169,"text":"That Commander ♂㈱ is amazing. He's a hero in∠the truest sense of the word."},{"id":1011060177,"text":"The terrace beyond here is my favorite place. I love to∠stay out there and smell the great scents coming from the∠restaurant."},{"id":1011060179,"text":"Whew, I am sooo grateful to be able to soak in this bath∠again..."},{"id":1011060180,"text":"There's lotsa cute little sheep in the pasture up ahead."},{"id":1011060181,"text":"I wanna go play in the pasture!"},{"id":1011060187,"text":"Come on, Commander, it's time to celebrate! Order everything∠you want!"},{"id":1011060195,"text":"Bravo, Commander ♂㈱! We were just chatting∠about your heroic deeds."},{"id":1011060203,"text":"I just love this terrace, restaurant, and the laundry area∠right outside here. The breeze from the lake feels amazing."},{"id":1011060205,"text":"We whupped Highland's filthy hides, so now it's time to go∠wash our own in the bath! Let's do this!!!"},{"id":1011060206,"text":"I'm hoping maybe they'll give me a few veggies from the∠garden just past here."},{"id":1011060207,"text":"Let's go play in the fields!"},{"id":1011060213,"text":"Everyone fights best on a full belly, Commander!"},{"id":1011060221,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. Go do your best out there."},{"id":1011070001,"text":"Hey, it's ♂㈱ and Apple. How was it? Were ya∠able to talk to this \"great strategist\" fella?"},{"id":1011070002,"text":"Shu promised to help us. He should be here soon."},{"id":1011070003,"text":"Guess the rest is in his hands then. Gotta wonder, though...∠Can we really rely on a guy who got tossed out by his own∠teacher?"},{"id":1011070004,"text":"If you don't have faith in my abilities, then I suggest you∠leave at once."},{"id":1011070005,"text":"Shu! That was fast."},{"id":1011070006,"text":"Something else came up aside from my other errands, so I had∠to push my horses hard. I went through three steeds on∠the way here.∨Hey, big guy. Are you Viktor?"},{"id":1011070007,"text":"Yeah, I am, but..."},{"id":1011070008,"text":"Listen carefully. Do as I say and act according to my plan,∠and we will rout the Highland forces with ease.∨But if you don't put your trust in me,∠it will be you who are the losers today.∨If you want to win, don't question me again.∠If you can't do that, I'll consider you an obstacle∠that needs to be removed."},{"id":1011070009,"text":"...◎4Hey, Apple, I'm startin' to see why this guy got∠thrown out..."},{"id":1011070010,"text":"And you, blue guy, you must be Flik. How many soldiers do∠we have?"},{"id":1011070011,"text":"And now I'm \"blue guy\"? Sheesh...∨Anyway, if we count the women, children, and elderly∠volunteers along with the former troops out of Muse and∠South Window, we have about 2,000 bodies, plus one∠crumbling keep.∨The Highland Army, on the other hand, has swelled its ranks∠to 20,000 after absorbing South Window's military when the∠city surrendered.∨So it's safe to say they've got us outmatched."},{"id":1011070012,"text":"I have a plan.∨If I recall, this castle played a pivotal role in turning∠back one of the Scarlet Moon Empire's many incursions.∨We also have 2,000 brave souls willing to fight despite∠knowing the unfavorable odds against them."},{"id":1011070013,"text":"Our foes may be 20,000 strong, but not long has passed∠since they seized South Window. They will need to man∠garrisons throughout the region in order to quell uprisings.∨So in reality, they have only 10,000 soldiers to move as∠they please. Furthermore, one-third of these men are former∠soldiers of the South Window Army.∨Under the right conditions,∠we should be able to get them to join our side.∨If we can manage that, we will have a force of 5,000 to face∠7,000. I'd say that certainly puts victory in reach."},{"id":1011070014,"text":"Heh, what a hustler... Listenin' to you makes me think∠we can actually win this.∠So, what exactly is this plan?"},{"id":1011070016,"text":"Yes, sir."},{"id":1011070017,"text":"Infiltrate the Highland Army and spread word that all the∠South Window soldiers will be executed when the war is over."},{"id":1011070018,"text":"Understood!"},{"id":1011070019,"text":"Everyone else will stay here and defend the castle.∠We've got to buy some time."},{"id":1011070020,"text":"So what then? No reinforcements are comin', and I don't∠think Freed spreadin' rumors is gonna be enough to convince∠the South Window soldiers to switch sides."},{"id":1011070021,"text":"The enemy will undoubtedly try to surround this castle.∠We'll have a small force slip around the main body of their∠army and attack Solon Jhee's unit from behind.∨Striking directly at the enemy's general will shake their∠troops and provide the catalyst we need to ensure the South∠Window conscripts turn on them."},{"id":1011070022,"text":"Hold up a sec. This is a peninsula. How're we supposed to∠sneak around 'em if they have us surrounded?"},{"id":1011070023,"text":"The Highland Army has only been in land battles. They have∠no experience on the water. For Solon Jhee, the lake is just∠an obstacle.∨To us, however, this same lake is like a spacious plain∠with an excellent view. I've already been around to the∠neighboring villages to procure a few ships for our use."},{"id":1011070024,"text":"You're quite the thorough planner. I'm actually starting to∠really like our chances now."},{"id":1011070025,"text":"Woohoo! We gonna win! We gonna win!"},{"id":1011070026,"text":"Alright, I'm game."},{"id":1011070027,"text":"So who's going to attack Solon Jhee's unit? I guess either∠me or Viktor should be the—"},{"id":1011070028,"text":"No, I've got someone else in mind for that role."},{"id":1011070029,"text":"♂㈱, I'd like you to do it."},{"id":1011070030,"text":"That's an awful lot to ask..."},{"id":1011070031,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1011070032,"text":"W-Wait, stop right there! What is this?!∨All this stuff you're talking about sounds difficult enough,∠but now you're saying ♂㈱ needs to do the most∠dangerous part?"},{"id":1011070033,"text":"Hey, what's this garbage?! Why does ♂㈱ have to∠do it?"},{"id":1011070034,"text":"There is a reason it must be him."},{"id":1011070035,"text":"♂㈱, if you don't accept this task, then the∠entire strategy is meaningless. We may as well just quietly∠surrender to Highland.∨I'll give you some time. Think carefully."},{"id":1011070036,"text":"You have in your hand the key to stopping Highland∠and Luca Blight. We all need you.∨Well, everyone, there is no time to delay. Freed, I'll write∠down what you need to say to the South Window soldiers∠to convince them to switch sides, so—"},{"id":1011070037,"text":"Aye, sir! For the memory of Lord Granmeyer! For the people∠of South Window! I, Freed, will fight with every fiber of∠my being!"},{"id":1011070038,"text":"Um... Okay, we're counting on you.∨Viktor, Flik, Tsai, see what you can do to bolster∠the castle's defenses.∠Apple, I want you to handpick 300 soldiers from our army∠of 2,000. That will be ♂㈱'s unit."},{"id":1011070039,"text":"Yes, sir!"},{"id":1011070040,"text":"I'd really like to win for once..."},{"id":1011070041,"text":"Don't jinx it."},{"id":1011070042,"text":"Well, there's no time. If we lose this battle, there won't∠be another chance. We need to be well-prepared!"},{"id":1011070043,"text":"Oh...I'm sorry. I didn't mean to wake you. It's just that∠you slept so late, I started to...∨Well, you must have been very tired. You've been through a∠lot lately. But..."},{"id":1011070044,"text":"How did it come to this?∨Why are you... Anyway, that Shu guy, I still don't think∠we can trust him.∨But...for now I guess we have no choice but to fight.∠It'll be okay. I'll be here to protect you.∨Now, let's go. It's almost time for the battle to begin..."},{"id":1011070045,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. Did ya sleep well? This next battle∠is ridin' on you."},{"id":1011070046,"text":"The Highland Army has arrived. It appears they're trying to∠surround the castle."},{"id":1011070047,"text":"Okay, it's time. Viktor, Flik, are you ready?"},{"id":1011070048,"text":"Leave it to us."},{"id":1011070049,"text":"We'll keep this place safe."},{"id":1011070050,"text":"What about you, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070052,"text":"Don't worry. I'm ready."},{"id":1011070053,"text":"Hurry, then. We don't have much time."},{"id":1011070054,"text":"Okay, commence the plan."},{"id":1011070056,"text":"Good luck, ♂㈱, good luck."},{"id":1011070057,"text":"May fortune be with you, ♂㈱. Just...don't do∠anything reckless."},{"id":1011070058,"text":"Yeah! Commander ♂㈱ is back!!!"},{"id":1011070059,"text":"You did it, ♂㈱! You really did it!"},{"id":1011070061,"text":"Bolgan glad. Pilika was worried too. But ♂㈱∠is just fine. Bolgan glad."},{"id":1011070062,"text":"Come on now, everyone is waiting in the hall."},{"id":1011070063,"text":"You're famous, ♂㈱. You've become everyone's∠hero in a single stroke!"},{"id":1011070064,"text":"Wahahaha, and he should be! This young fella was the key∠player in runnin' off those Highland jerks!"},{"id":1011070065,"text":"Everyone's talking about you outside too. They're calling∠you \"the herald of victory.\""},{"id":1011070066,"text":"We managed to win this battle. But we've already lost Lady∠Anabelle, and Muse itself is under Highland rule.∨The Jowston Alliance has come undone; its remaining∠members are all too clearly on course to be destroyed∠one-by-one.∨North Window, too, will eventually face the hammer of∠Highland's main force, Luca Blight's White Wolf Guard.∨And when this day comes, we won't be able to contend with∠such an attack if we remain as we are now. We have but one∠option: gather more strength here, where we stand now."},{"id":1011070067,"text":"You're saying we should make this place into a base from∠which we can oppose the Highland Army?"},{"id":1011070068,"text":"Exactly. We already have the perfect receptacle for the∠people needed to do so: this castle.∨Now all we need is the power to bring these people together,∠to show them the way. We need a leader."},{"id":1011070069,"text":"Shu, are you sayin' you're gonna be that leader?"},{"id":1011070070,"text":"No, I'm afraid I must excuse myself from that role. For all∠my tactical genius, I lack what it truly takes to lead and∠inspire others."},{"id":1011070071,"text":"So what, are we going to appeal to one the mayors of the∠remaining city-states? I can't imagine any of them wanting∠to lead us, much less even help."},{"id":1011070072,"text":"No, the most suitable leader already stands among us."},{"id":1011070073,"text":"♂㈱—no, Commander ♂㈱.∨You are the one to lead the new army of the alliance.∠Please, show us the path to victory."},{"id":1011070074,"text":"Now just hold it right here. Why? Why ♂㈱?∠This is crazy! Explain why it has to be him."},{"id":1011070075,"text":"...Is it the name Genkaku, Shu?"},{"id":1011070076,"text":"By Genkaku, do you mean THE Genkaku?"},{"id":1011070077,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you are the son of the hero∠Genkaku, who was driven from the City-States 30 years ago.∨Upon your right hand is the very same Bright Shield Rune∠that Genkaku bore before you.∨And on this day you have defeated General Solon Jhee of∠Highland. Many people look to you for hope now.∨But most importantly of all, I have seen a brilliance in∠you. The kind of brilliance that this age needs. You must∠lead the Alliance Army."},{"id":1011070078,"text":"...I accept."},{"id":1011070079,"text":"That's a great deal to ask..."},{"id":1011070080,"text":"W-Wait a minute, ♂㈱, are you sure? Maybe...∠Maybe you should give it some more thought."},{"id":1011070081,"text":"Luca Blight has to be stopped..."},{"id":1011070082,"text":"Th-That's true...but why you? Is there some reason you have∠to do it? Even though it will put you in even more danger?"},{"id":1011070083,"text":"It's just, if there's something I can do to help..."},{"id":1011070085,"text":"It isn't right to lay all that pressure on ♂㈱∠at once. Give him some time to think it over. 'Sides, I got∠somethin' I want to talk to him about.∨Somethin' that Anabelle didn't have time to tell him..."},{"id":1011070086,"text":"...Commander ♂㈱, consider all that I have said∠carefully.∨Then, when you've made your decision, please come back∠here. I have faith in you."},{"id":1011070087,"text":"♂㈱, Nanami, swing by the tavern later.∠I'll tell ya about Genkaku."},{"id":1011070088,"text":"Yeah! Why does it have to be ♂㈱?!"},{"id":1011070089,"text":"We need your power to defeat the Mad Prince, Luca Blight,∠and to restore peace to this land."},{"id":1011070090,"text":"You say \"my power,\" but..."},{"id":1011070091,"text":"Yeah! That's right! What do you mean by \"his power\"?"},{"id":1011070092,"text":"The power to gather people. A nature that brings together∠the hearts of many. Commander ♂㈱, you possess∠these qualities.∨Many people look to you as a great source of hope. They∠look at you and see a bright future.∨They will gather. They will gather for their country, for∠their friends, for the blood that has spilled...and they∠will gather for you, ♂㈱. That is your power."},{"id":1011070093,"text":"That \"power\"..."},{"id":1011070095,"text":"Hey, what are you gonna do?∨I guess you can't make such a big decision so easily, huh...∨Hey, ♂㈱, do you really want that kind of∠power?∨...Oh, forget about it. I'll stop there. You don't need me∠making you second guess yourself...∨So what do you say? Should we go meet Viktor in the tavern?∠I'd sure like to hear about Grandpa Genkaku.∨Or maybe you'd like to call it a night? Your big decision∠can wait until the morning, I'm sure."},{"id":1011070096,"text":"You must be tired too. Should we go to sleep?"},{"id":1011070097,"text":"No, I'm not tired yet."},{"id":1011070098,"text":"Yeah, it's been a long day..."},{"id":1011070099,"text":"Okay. I guess you want to hear about Grandpa Genkaku too.∠Let's go see Viktor."},{"id":1011070100,"text":"Okay... Well, goodnight.∨I wanna see you waking up looking bright and chipper∠tomorrow, got it?"},{"id":1011070101,"text":"Hey, there ya are. Haha, don't just stand there all awkward,∠come join me. Lessee, I guess you kids can't drink yet, huh?"},{"id":1011070102,"text":"We came here because you said you'd tell us about Grandpa∠Genkaku."},{"id":1011070103,"text":"Hey, slow down. What's the rush? Anyway, this is a bit of a∠long story, and not a very happy one either, just so we're∠clear.∨So whaddaya think, ♂㈱? Still wanna hear it?"},{"id":1011070104,"text":"Yes, I still want to hear it."},{"id":1011070105,"text":"Actually, forget about it."},{"id":1011070106,"text":"Whaaa? Really? C'mon, we're already here!"},{"id":1011070107,"text":"I get it... This is all stuff that happened ages ago and∠has nothin' to do with who you are now.∨You aren't \"Genkaku's boy,\" you're your own individual∠person named ♂㈱.∨Don't ever forget that."},{"id":1011070108,"text":"Huh? What's up? Changed your mind?"},{"id":1011070109,"text":"Okay, but get ready. It's a long story."},{"id":1011070110,"text":"Anyways, I guess in the end livin' a quiet life with you two∠meant more to Genkaku than goin' back to the City-States to∠clear his name."},{"id":1011070111,"text":"Zzz..."},{"id":1011070112,"text":"Hey, wait a...◎3 Ah well, she musta been tired. Anyhow, that∠was the type of life your \"grandpa\" led.∨Alright, it's pretty late. You should carry Nanami off∠to bed."},{"id":1011070113,"text":"Hey, wait a...◎3 Ah well, she musta been tired. Anyhow, that∠was the type of life your grandpa led.∨But you aren't \"Genkaku's boy,\" you're your own individual∠person named ♂㈱.∨Don't ever forget that. Alright, it's pretty late. You∠should carry Nanami off to bed."},{"id":1011070114,"text":"You two are good kids. I think I sort of understand how∠Genkaku musta felt about you."},{"id":1011070115,"text":"Good morning! Did you sleep well?"},{"id":1011070116,"text":"...Have you made up your mind?"},{"id":1011070117,"text":"If you think I can do all those things..."},{"id":1011070119,"text":"♂㈱, if that's what you've decided, then that's∠all that matters. I'll give ya all the fight I got in me,∠if that's what it takes to beat that bastard Luca."},{"id":1011070120,"text":"We'll be counting on you, ♂㈱. On the power∠you have in you."},{"id":1011070121,"text":"I know it's not much, ♂㈱, but I'll help out∠too."},{"id":1011070122,"text":"I-I'll work my hardest too! For South Window, for the late∠Lord Granmeyer, and for all who have suffered at the hands∠of Highland!"},{"id":1011070123,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I, too, shall serve you with all∠the teachings and tricks I learned at the feet of my∠master. I also promise you that we shall triumph."},{"id":1011070124,"text":"Me too... I may not be very able, but what abilities I do∠have are yours."},{"id":1011070125,"text":"Wahahahaha. C'mon guys, this ain't a funeral. We just got our∠new leader, guys! We gotta celebrate properly!!!"},{"id":1011070126,"text":"Whoa!"},{"id":1011070127,"text":"Huh? Huh? Wh-Who're you?"},{"id":1011070128,"text":"I am Leknaat.∠The Keeper of the Gate Rune.∠The Watcher of the Great Balance."},{"id":1011070129,"text":"♂㈱, inheritor of the Bright Shield Rune...∠The time for the Stars of Destiny to gather together∠is almost upon us once more.∨I hereby bestow upon you the Tablet of Promise.∠Upon it will appear the names of your followers,∠the source of your strength."},{"id":1011070130,"text":"I'm Lady Leknaat's pupil, Luc. And this is the Tablet of∠Promise. You should be grateful that she's given you this.∨I'll also bless you with my presence. Not that I really want∠to, but that's what Lady Leknaat has ordered."},{"id":1011070131,"text":"My eyes catch faint glimpses of the future, and yours is∠interwoven with the destinies of many.∨Your friend...the inheritor of the Dark Sword Rune... I see∠him in your fate as well. You both have hard roads ahead.∨And yet, you must always look towards the future...∠♂㈱."},{"id":1011070132,"text":"So. It's Viktor and Flik. You're still alive?"},{"id":1011070133,"text":"Y-You little..."},{"id":1011070134,"text":"I-Is this person a friend of yours?"},{"id":1011070135,"text":"Yeah, kinda. We fought together once before."},{"id":1011070136,"text":"Bah, whatever. We'll have a real party next time!"},{"id":1011070137,"text":"If Luca Blight's strength comes from on high, then so, too,∠does your own power. We cannot hope to win without you."},{"id":1011070138,"text":"Please. There is no one else up to the task. Do you still∠refuse even knowing this?"},{"id":1011070139,"text":"No one besides you can do it. Please think it over a little∠more. And if you do decide to be our leader, please come∠back to us here."},{"id":1011070140,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please lead us."},{"id":1011070141,"text":"I also believe we need a leader to win this war. With you in∠that position, we could do great things."},{"id":1011070142,"text":"I, too, think you have those talents, and so I ask you as∠well. Please, accept the role of leader."},{"id":1011070144,"text":"♂㈱, it's good to be needed. And there are so∠many, many people who need you."},{"id":1011070145,"text":"Why not give it a shot, ♂㈱? Just accept for∠now, and if it isn't what you want then you can always quit.∠No one will blame you."},{"id":1011070146,"text":"Uh-huh."},{"id":1011070147,"text":"It looks like my little sister wants you to be leader too."},{"id":1011070148,"text":"Rina!!!"},{"id":1011070150,"text":"What's the harm in it, ♂㈱? Even if you say∠yes, you can always change your mind later if it gets to be∠too much."},{"id":1011070151,"text":"Yeah! And take it from me, I know you got it in ya, kiddo!"},{"id":1011070153,"text":"......∨I..."},{"id":1011070155,"text":"I would like to congratulate you as well."},{"id":1011070156,"text":"Dr. Huan!"},{"id":1011070157,"text":"You're safe! I'm so happy to see you."},{"id":1011070158,"text":"I'm sorry I had you so worried."},{"id":1011070159,"text":"Wow, everyone is okay!!! Oh, ♂㈱! I heard a∠rumor in South Window... You became a real hero!!!∨Is Captain Gengen a hero now too?"},{"id":1011070160,"text":"Dr. Huan, how did you survive Muse?"},{"id":1011070161,"text":"Well, I was helped out by a kind soldier and managed to make∠my way here."},{"id":1011070162,"text":"Welcome, Dr. Huan. The soldiers will be delighted to know we∠have the most esteemed healer in all of Muse City among us."},{"id":1011070163,"text":"Your words are too kind. I can only hope that my small∠knowledge of medicine will be of some help."},{"id":1011070164,"text":"♂㈱, thank you for having me. I will try to∠make myself useful to the people of this castle."},{"id":1011070165,"text":"Oh, that's right. What's the name of this castle anyway?"},{"id":1011070166,"text":"Hm? Say, the kid's right. \"North Window Castle\" ain't gonna∠work since \"North Window\" is the name of a village that no∠longer exists."},{"id":1011070167,"text":"What say we have Commander ♂㈱ come up∠with a new name?"},{"id":1011070168,"text":"Yeah! How about it, ♂㈱? Can you think of∠anything good?"},{"id":1011070169,"text":"Hey, ♂① Castle! That's a great name!!!"},{"id":1011070170,"text":"Yeah, I like it too."},{"id":1011070171,"text":"Hehehe, you'd like anything he thought of..."},{"id":1011070172,"text":"Shut up, Sis!!!"},{"id":1011070173,"text":"So this is our home, ♂① Castle!"},{"id":1011070174,"text":"♂① Castle! ♂① Castle!"},{"id":1011070175,"text":"♂① Castle..."},{"id":1011070176,"text":"Well, I guess it's okay if it's the name our leader chose."},{"id":1011070177,"text":"Great. Now that we got the castle named, how about that∠party..."},{"id":1011070178,"text":"Rise and shine! C'mon, get up! Up!!! You're the leader of∠the Alliance Army now, so you gotta get it together."},{"id":1011070179,"text":"Hmmm, this should be it... Umm, excuse me. Is this North∠Window?∨My guide ditched me on the way here, you see."},{"id":1011070180,"text":"You're way off."},{"id":1011070181,"text":"It is."},{"id":1011070182,"text":"Huh? That's odd... What'll I do now? Anyway, thanks for your∠help."},{"id":1011070183,"text":"Um... Are you absolutely SURE that this isn't North Window?"},{"id":1011070184,"text":"Thank you. You see, I heard a rumor that a great hero here∠defeated the Highland Army.∨So I hurried here to see for myself. ∠Have you ever seen this hero? What's he like?"},{"id":1011070185,"text":"He is unbelievably cool."},{"id":1011070186,"text":"Eh, he's nothing special."},{"id":1011070187,"text":"The hero is me."},{"id":1011070188,"text":"Wow, I can see he has some fans. Maybe he can help me after∠all...∨Oops, well I shouldn't be dawdling here. Back to work!∠I must ask for an audience right away. Thanks for your help!"},{"id":1011070189,"text":"Yes, I guess that's the nature of rumors, but I still want∠to meet him anyway. Be seeing you."},{"id":1011070190,"text":"Oh, YOU'RE the hero! Of course! I am SUCH a dolt for not∠realizing that.∨Heheh, well, nice joking around with you, kid, but I have∠work to do. I must get an audience with the real hero.∠See you later."},{"id":1011070191,"text":"Ah, your timing is excellent. May I present Commander∠♂㈱, leader of the ♂② Army."},{"id":1011070192,"text":"What?! This boy is the...∨Oh, um, I beg your pardon, my lord. How careless of me to∠not catch on to this sooner, hahahaha.∨My name is Fitcher. I used to work for Lady Anabelle in∠Muse up until that terrible incident happened while I was∠away from the city.∨Now I'm in the employ of Two River City."},{"id":1011070193,"text":"So what brings you here today, Mister Fitcher?"},{"id":1011070194,"text":"I heard that you were assembling an army to fight against∠Highland, so I came to see it with my own eyes.∨I am quite shocked...er, I mean, pleasantly surprised to∠see that you were able to defeat Solon Jhee with only what∠you have here."},{"id":1011070195,"text":"Sorry to disappoint ya."},{"id":1011070196,"text":"No, no, that isn't what I meant at all... It's just that it∠must have been practically a miracle."},{"id":1011070197,"text":"Aw, shut up!"},{"id":1011070198,"text":"I decided that I simply had to meet the leader behind it∠all, and so here I am before you now."},{"id":1011070199,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please come to Two River.∨We must form an alliance and forge a new, centralized force∠capable of opposing the Highland Army."},{"id":1011070200,"text":"Is this a formal request from Two River City?"},{"id":1011070201,"text":"Let me speak frankly.∨So far, I'm working on my own initiative."},{"id":1011070202,"text":"Wait a minute. Your own initiative? You have that kind of∠authority?"},{"id":1011070203,"text":"No, officially I'm only in the area to assess the situation∠in South Window.∨Although I know we're going to need each other to stand up∠to Highland."},{"id":1011070204,"text":"What do you think, ♂㈱? Are you gonna trust∠this guy?"},{"id":1011070205,"text":"No, I don't think so."},{"id":1011070206,"text":"Let's go to Two River."},{"id":1011070207,"text":"Ah, don't worry. Just leave everything to me. I'll make the∠necessary arrangements in Two River City."},{"id":1011070208,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I suggest we accept his offer.∠We need all the help we can get right now."},{"id":1011070209,"text":"Yeah, don't sweat it. The Highland Army hasn't made a move∠on Two River yet, and if anything does happen, we'll∠be there in a flash."},{"id":1011070210,"text":"Great, great! I'll get started on the preparations∠immediately.∨But, um... There is one slight problem..."},{"id":1011070212,"text":"Oh, well, it's just that the bridges between South Window∠and Two River City were all destroyed by Highland,∠so I came here by boat.∨But once the fighting began, all the boatmen and guides∠fled... Which forces me to ask, can I use one of your∠boats?"},{"id":1011070213,"text":"You sneaky rat, don't tell me that's the whole reason you∠came here..."},{"id":1011070214,"text":"P-Perish the thought!"},{"id":1011070215,"text":"A boat, eh? We can supply one, but we'll need a talented∠sailor to make it all the way to Two River City."},{"id":1011070216,"text":"I can't think of any of our crew who's up to the trip.∠Guess our first order of business is trackin' down someone∠who knows their way around boats."},{"id":1011070217,"text":"Hey, where were you, ♂㈱? Hm? Who's this guy?"},{"id":1011070218,"text":"Whoa, now, I'm not just some random guy. ∠The name's Amada, and I came here all the way from∠Radat because ♂㈱ asked me to, got it?"},{"id":1011070219,"text":"The boat is down below. Please take care of∠the Commander."},{"id":1011070220,"text":"Hey, down on the southern islands where I'm from, everybody∠spends their whole lives on boats from cradle to grave.∠Don't you worry, he's in good hands."},{"id":1011070221,"text":"Then let us be off, Commander.∨Sir Amada, first head west on the lake until you spot the∠town of Lakewest.∨We'll dock there and then make the rest of the trip to Two∠River City on foot."},{"id":1011070222,"text":"Godspeed, Commander.∨The better things go with Two River City,∠the more secure ♂① Castle will become."},{"id":1011070223,"text":"Say, that's a fine boat ya got there. Guess that strategist∠fella musta found her, huh.∨Anyways, you're safe in my hands. There ain't any place on ∠the water I can't get ya."},{"id":1011070224,"text":"Well, if it isn't Tai Ho! Long time no see. What brings you∠to this part of the world?"},{"id":1011070225,"text":"Hey, it's good to see your face again, you good-for-nothin',∠you. Just so happens the rivers 'round here are like my∠back yard.∨Anyhow, I see ya still like stickin' that thick neck of∠yours into trouble."},{"id":1011070226,"text":"Yeah, well, seems I'm not the only one."},{"id":1011070227,"text":"Ha, got me there. A quiet life is a life wasted, I say."},{"id":1011070228,"text":"Well, take good care of the Commander, got it?"},{"id":1011070229,"text":"The boat is down below."},{"id":1011070230,"text":"Leave it to me. I've yet to meet my match on the open water."},{"id":1011070231,"text":"Then let us be off, Commander.∠Sir Tai Ho, first head west on the lake until you spot the∠town of Lakewest after a short while.∨We'll dock there and then make the rest of the trip to Two∠River City on foot."},{"id":1011070232,"text":"Oho, that's a mighty fine boat there. Alright, what say we∠get to sailin', ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070233,"text":"Okay, now decide who else will be in your party."},{"id":1011070234,"text":"Excellent work, Commander ♂㈱.∠And you must be Lady Teresa. Welcome to ♂①∠Castle."},{"id":1011070235,"text":"I am, and thank you. But I would like to be alone right∠now. I need some time to think."},{"id":1011070236,"text":"My lady."},{"id":1011070237,"text":"Shin! You're safe!"},{"id":1011070238,"text":"We were able to escape together while the city was in an∠uproar. Luckily Greenhill has many secret paths."},{"id":1011070239,"text":"You're alive... Oh, thank goodness."},{"id":1011070240,"text":"Fitcher, I'm impressed! Getting Shin out of there was quite∠an accomplishment."},{"id":1011070241,"text":"Oh, it wasn't just Shin I helped..."},{"id":1011070242,"text":"Sir Flik!!!"},{"id":1011070244,"text":"Sir Flik! I thought that by coming here, I might be a∠nuisance to you...∨But...but, I couldn't help it. I simply have to be by your∠side!∨You're my destiny... That's why I followed you here. I'm not∠a nuisance to you...right?∨Oh, that reminds me...I made dinner for you! Hurry, hurry!∠Your soup is getting cold!"},{"id":1011070245,"text":".........∨Please rest well today, Commander."},{"id":1011070246,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱. Can't you sleep?∠Come on, back to bed. What if you get sick?"},{"id":1011070247,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱.∨There's another meeting today, so Viktor and Shu are already∠waiting for you in the great hall."},{"id":1011070248,"text":"Good day, Commander ♂㈱. It seems everyone∠is here."},{"id":1011070249,"text":"I don't see Flik."},{"id":1011070250,"text":"Sorry. I got held up."},{"id":1011070251,"text":"Where were ya? Flirtin' with little Nina?"},{"id":1011070252,"text":"This ain't no joke! I'm not flirting with her!∨She took my bandana and washed it! It took me all morning∠to find it, dammit!"},{"id":1011070253,"text":"Wahahahaha! Man, you guys're practically married!"},{"id":1011070254,"text":"You'll pay for that, Viktor. But more importantly,∠Shu, what's this meeting about?"},{"id":1011070255,"text":"Are you ready, Commander?∨Well then, I'll begin. Of the five Cities and one Knightdom∠in the Jowston Alliance, South Window has been razed,∨while Muse and Greenhill are under enemy control. Somehow∠we've managed to protect Two River, but Tinto is still∠shutting itself inside its own domain.∨Thus, I believe we should forge ties with the only alliance∠member left, the Knightdom of Matilda.∨Their military is on par with that of Muse, so if we're∠able to join forces with them, we'll be able to attack the∠enemy on two fronts.∨Don't you agree, Commander?"},{"id":1011070256,"text":"Yeah."},{"id":1011070258,"text":"Greenhill is still occupied by Highland, so we'll need to∠travel to Matilda in small groups so as to avoid detection.∨Commander ♂㈱, please decide who you wish to∠accompany you."},{"id":1011070259,"text":"The Knights of Matilda have been notified of our plans.∠Please head north of Greenhill and use the hidden path∠through the forest.∨There should be an escort awaiting you once you arrive in∠Matilda."},{"id":1011070260,"text":"Be very careful, Commander ♂㈱. Your life is∠not just your own now."},{"id":1011070261,"text":"Hey, hey, I hear you're going north this time. You are∠planning on taking me with you, right?"},{"id":1011070262,"text":"Wouldn't have it any other way."},{"id":1011070263,"text":"No, it's too dangerous."},{"id":1011070264,"text":"I knew it."},{"id":1011070265,"text":"Yay!!!"},{"id":1011070266,"text":"Wait, what? No, no way! Don't say that..."},{"id":1011070267,"text":"What do you mean, \"too dangerous\"? That's exactly why you∠need your big sister there to look out for you!"},{"id":1011070268,"text":"What? Huh? Okay, you know what, I don't care what you say,∠I'm coming along whether you like it or not."},{"id":1011070294,"text":"So, you made it back, eh? Well, that's good at least.∠Everyone's gathered in the hall."},{"id":1011070295,"text":"Oh, I'm so relieved. You came back safely. Everyone's∠waiting in the big hall."},{"id":1011070297,"text":"Hm? What is it? Were you waiting for ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070298,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'm glad to see you have∠returned safely."},{"id":1011070299,"text":"Of course he did, what with me watchin' his back and all.∠Anyway, we learned who we're up against. It's Kiba and his∠son, Klaus."},{"id":1011070300,"text":"The 3rd Army of the Highland Kingdom. But judging by their∠numbers, it looks like part of the 4th Army is with them∠too."},{"id":1011070301,"text":"Either way, these guys are real bad news. Takin' over Radat∠in such a short time is no mean feat."},{"id":1011070302,"text":"So it really is General Kiba..."},{"id":1011070303,"text":"This doesn't change anything. If they attack head-on,∠we'll meet them head-on.∨We'll teach them that we're no longer the same foe they∠faced in terms of both number of generals and quality of∠soldiers."},{"id":1011070304,"text":"So you're saying we can finally fight them on equal footing?"},{"id":1011070305,"text":"No big strategies for us this time?"},{"id":1011070306,"text":"Are you worried, Viktor? We don't need a strategy for this∠battle.∨Commander ♂㈱, please give the signal for our∠forces to deploy."},{"id":1011070307,"text":"Okay, let's move out."},{"id":1011070308,"text":"Wait a minute."},{"id":1011070309,"text":"Please hurry. We mustn't miss this chance."},{"id":1011070310,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, if you would..."},{"id":1011070311,"text":"Give the troops their orders."},{"id":1011070312,"text":"What was General Ridley thinking?!"},{"id":1011070313,"text":"The faults of the Jowston Army rears its head again..."},{"id":1011070314,"text":"Heh, so much for all his big talk! Guess he got scared and∠ran for it, huh?"},{"id":1011070315,"text":"Without help from Two River, we can't match Kiba's∠strength..."},{"id":1011070316,"text":"......∨This is no time to criticize General Ridley. We need a∠strategy to defeat Kiba. Go get some rest, everyone. What∠comes next is my job.∨You should rest too, Commander."},{"id":1011070317,"text":"Hey, are you okay? I heard you took a beating out there.∨But hey, as long as we win in the end, right? So perk up.∠Anyway, you should get some sleep. See ya!"},{"id":1011070318,"text":"Okay, everyone's here. Well, Mister Strategist, have you∠come up with a plan?"},{"id":1011070319,"text":"Apple, explain the situation."},{"id":1011070320,"text":"The Highland Army has left South Window and is marching∠on our castle. It looks like a frontal assault, just as before."},{"id":1011070321,"text":"Quite the single-minded guy, our Kiba."},{"id":1011070322,"text":"Half of our army will remain here as a main force led by∠Commander ♂㈱.∨The other half will be divided into four units led by∠Viktor, Flik, Tsai, and Camus. These units will lie in wait∠along the right and left sides to surround Kiba once he∠charges straight through the middle."},{"id":1011070323,"text":"Even if Kiba does ignore the ambush and plunges in headlong,∠will we really be able to hold him off with our divided,∠already-smaller army?"},{"id":1011070324,"text":"Kiba and his son won't be able to defeat my plan."},{"id":1011070325,"text":"Talk about confidence. Well, here's to hopin' this ain't a∠big mistake."},{"id":1011070326,"text":"There is nothing more to explain. Commander∠♂㈱, if all is ready, please give the signal∠to deploy."},{"id":1011070329,"text":"Please hurry."},{"id":1011070330,"text":"Let's go!"},{"id":1011070331,"text":"Judging by your face, you must have won."},{"id":1011070332,"text":"Pilika is happy. Bolgan also happy."},{"id":1011070333,"text":"You're okay..."},{"id":1011070334,"text":"Are you okay? You're not hurt? Your stomach doesn't ache?"},{"id":1011070335,"text":"Seems everything's okay..."},{"id":1011070336,"text":"I've brought the enemy leaders. This is Kiba, and this is∠Klaus."},{"id":1011070337,"text":"Gotta hand it to 'em, they gave us trouble right up to the∠end."},{"id":1011070338,"text":"You haven't earned the right to call me by my name, fools.∠Kill me and be done with it."},{"id":1011070339,"text":"General Kiba is a great commander, and his son, Klaus, has a∠fine mind for tactics.∨I suggest we free them and accept them into our ranks."},{"id":1011070340,"text":"General Kiba, join forces with us. We need you."},{"id":1011070341,"text":"Cut off their heads at once."},{"id":1011070342,"text":"That will not do, Commander. The ♂② Army∠cannot grow stronger by wasting such brilliance."},{"id":1011070343,"text":"Commander, this is no time for jests. It is not becoming of∠a leader such as yourself."},{"id":1011070344,"text":"Stop, ♂㈱. That's not like you at all..."},{"id":1011070345,"text":"I refuse. I owe allegiance to Agares Blight, King of∠Highland. To join forces with the enemy would sully my good∠name."},{"id":1011070346,"text":"I agree with my father. I couldn't think of raising my∠sword against my homeland of Highland."},{"id":1011070347,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I ask that you stop. My oath to∠King Agares was not made lightly."},{"id":1011070349,"text":"We've received a letter from the Highland Army!"},{"id":1011070350,"text":"What? Read it."},{"id":1011070351,"text":"A-At once, sir.∨\"His Grace, King Luca Blight of Highland, offers you great∠praise for your performance on the field of battle.∨We eagerly await our next encounter. Signed, Leon∠Silverberg.\"∨That's all it says."},{"id":1011070352,"text":"............∨Klaus, what do you make of that message?"},{"id":1011070353,"text":"Tch...∨Th-That King Agares has been...assassinated by Prince Luca."},{"id":1011070354,"text":"Wh-What?! Klaus! Don't be absurd!"},{"id":1011070355,"text":"Princess Jillia's betrothal, the death of King Agares, the∠actions of the 4th Army... I can't think of any other reason∠for it all."},{"id":1011070357,"text":"Luca Blight does not seek a victory for Highland. No, what∠he wants is the life of every last soul in the City-States.∨It is a terrifying hunger that will consume not just the∠Jowston Alliance, but Highland as well.∨General Kiba, we ask for your help in stopping Luca Blight."},{"id":1011070360,"text":"...So be it.∨Commander ♂㈱, it is a warrior's shame to∠change masters, but I shall accept it nevertheless.∨Please allow me to fight alongside you."},{"id":1011070361,"text":"It seems I was no match for you, Commander∠♂㈱.∨My abilities alone were never enough to defeat you and your∠impressive collection of comrades.∨But from this day forward, I am yours to command as well.∠Please use my humble skills as you see best."},{"id":1011070362,"text":"Still, Leon Silverberg... Am I the one who drew him into∠this conflict?"},{"id":1011070365,"text":"We'll be in the great hall. I'm sure you're exhausted,∠Commander, but please make your way there first."},{"id":1011070366,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, your safe return is a welcome∠sight. It would seem you were successful in negotiating an∠alliance with the Toran Republic."},{"id":1011070367,"text":"I'm Valeria, a general in the army of the Toran Republic.∨President Lepant has ordered me to assist you to the best∠of my ability. I look forward to fighting alongside you all."},{"id":1011070368,"text":"My name is Kasumi, vice-chieftain of Rokkaku Hamlet.∠President Lepant has ordered me to assist you to the best∠of my ability. I hope I can be of service."},{"id":1011070369,"text":"We're countin' on you."},{"id":1011070370,"text":"This is great. Feels like our chances just got a lot better."},{"id":1011070371,"text":"I wouldn't be so sure. Our reports indicate that the main∠force of the Highland Army has already left Muse and is∠on the way here.∨Luca Blight's 1st Army and Jowy Atreides' 3rd Army, plus∠the 4th Army, which is made up of survivors from General∠Kiba's former army and reinforcements from Harmonia.∨That's a total of 50,000 troops bearing down on us."},{"id":1011070372,"text":"50,000..."},{"id":1011070373,"text":"Calling for reinforcements from Harmonia... It seems that∠Luca is planning to finish this in one decisive stroke."},{"id":1011070374,"text":"Friendly nation or no, any help from Harmonia always comes∠at a steep price..."},{"id":1011070375,"text":"And as for our side, even with the men who joined alongside∠General Kiba and the reinforcements from Toran, we still∠have less than 20,000 soldiers."},{"id":1011070376,"text":"So they got us outnumbered more than two-to-one..."},{"id":1011070377,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you still look tired. Get some∠rest. We'll finish this discussion tomorrow."},{"id":1011070378,"text":"All this worryin' won't help things anyway."},{"id":1011070379,"text":"Oh, what's the matter, ♂㈱? As tired as you∠were, I thought you already went to sleep."},{"id":1011070381,"text":"♂㈱...◎2 How did we end up like this?∨When it was just the three of us—you, me, and Grandpa∠Genkaku—living in Kyaro...∨I couldn't have imagined any of this happening."},{"id":1011070382,"text":"Grandpa Genkaku was the hero of the City-States... And now∠you're the leader of the ♂② Army. It's...like∠some kind of bad dream.∨Now I guess we really do have to fight against him, fight∠against Jowy..."},{"id":1011070383,"text":"...!!!"},{"id":1011070384,"text":"Ah! Oh, uh, it's nothing, Pilika. It's okay.∨It's really okay... I'm sure it'll work out fine."},{"id":1011070385,"text":"♂㈱, you need to get to sleep. Yeah...yeah,∠that's right. Everyone needs you, and that's why...∨That's why you have to stay warm and get your rest."},{"id":1011070386,"text":"Huh, is that you, ♂㈱? What's the matter?∠Shouldn't you be asleep?"},{"id":1011070387,"text":"Looks like someone's wish came true, eh?"},{"id":1011070388,"text":"Sis! What's that supposed to mean?!"},{"id":1011070389,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱! Long time no talk."},{"id":1011070390,"text":"True, it has been nothing but fight, fight, fight lately.∠It seems long ago that we first met you and Jowy."},{"id":1011070391,"text":"♂㈱...◎2 Is it going to be...hard for you to∠go up against Jowy?"},{"id":1011070393,"text":"...Jowy betrayed all of us."},{"id":1011070394,"text":"...I'm sorry.∨I know you're the leader of the ♂② Army and∠Jowy is a Highland general.∨But you shouldn't let that cloud your judgment, I think."},{"id":1011070395,"text":"I guess I understand...∨I know you're the leader of the ♂② Army and∠Jowy is a Highland general.∨But you shouldn't let that cloud your judgment, I think."},{"id":1011070396,"text":"I like ♂㈱ AND Jowy."},{"id":1011070397,"text":"Hehe, I agree. I'll never forget the fun we had traveling∠with you two."},{"id":1011070398,"text":"Yeah...∨Wandering performers like us are strangers everywhere we∠go. But it felt nice to be friends on the road with you∠guys, if only for a little bit... I mean it."},{"id":1011070399,"text":"♂㈱, you've become a fine man. You were a tad∠helpless, but now you're so strong and bold..."},{"id":1011070400,"text":"Uh, uh, hey ♂㈱, shouldn't you be getting to∠sleep soon? You must be tired."},{"id":1011070401,"text":"Oh yes. If it's rest he wants, he can always join me right∠here..."},{"id":1011070402,"text":"Sis!!!"},{"id":1011070403,"text":"It's just a joke. Don't worry, I won't steal him away from∠you."},{"id":1011070404,"text":"SIS!!!"},{"id":1011070405,"text":"Hahahahaha!"},{"id":1011070406,"text":"Who's there?∨Oh, Commander ♂㈱. How rare of you to visit at∠this hour. Please, come in."},{"id":1011070407,"text":"So what brings you here? Uneasy about the battle, perhaps?∠Or maybe it's your friend that is troubling you?"},{"id":1011070408,"text":"Can we really win?"},{"id":1011070409,"text":"Do I really have to fight Jowy?"},{"id":1011070410,"text":"Oh, nothing in particular."},{"id":1011070411,"text":"Of course we can win. Our army is much greater than before∠in terms of both numbers and quality.∨We have Generals Ridley and Kiba, both first-rate leaders of∠soldiers on the field of battle. We have slews of peerless∠warriors like Viktor, Flik, and Tsai, not to mention the∠valiant knights who follow Miklotov and Camus.∨We mustn't forget the two brilliant if as-of-yet young∠strategists we have in Apple and Klaus, and the information∠that Fitcher can provide is a rare gift indeed.∨But most importantly of all, we have me.∨Surely you can't say we have no chance after hearing all∠that? Still, there is just one more thing that would all but∠cinch it for us..."},{"id":1011070412,"text":"And that is?"},{"id":1011070414,"text":"Why, Commander ♂㈱, your desire to win, of∠course. That is what we need.∨You're the leader of the ♂② Army, the bastion∠of hope that all of our soldiers wager their hearts upon. ∠If you don't believe we can win, then who will?"},{"id":1011070415,"text":"Now, it would be best if you returned to your room. Staying∠properly rested is also part of your duty."},{"id":1011070416,"text":"...◎6Commander ♂㈱, the ♂② Army∠follows your lead.∨Our many soldiers see hope in your bearing, a bright future∠in your eyes.∨Think about what that means. Know that, at times, history∠demands we sacrifice our feelings."},{"id":1011070418,"text":"In that case, you should get back to your room. It's also∠your duty to get some rest."},{"id":1011070419,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱. Sorry about what I said∠yesterday. I guess...now really is the time to fight.∨Just...be careful, okay?"},{"id":1011070420,"text":"Morning, ♂㈱. So it's finally time for the∠big showdown. We can't afford to lose this, so let's give it∠all we've got."},{"id":1011070421,"text":"Commander, I've come to escort you to the meeting.∨I heard a little from Shu, but what are you conflicted∠about?∨I know this won't be easy for you, but war never is...∠That's what I learned from Master Mathiu.∨For now, just focus on defeating Luca Blight and the∠Highland Army."},{"id":1011070422,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the Highland Army has∠appeared in Radat as predicted. General Ridley set out with∠a unit of Kobolds to ascertain the enemy's numbers."},{"id":1011070423,"text":"The odds have been against us in almost every battle so far,∠but this one looks to be the toughest."},{"id":1011070424,"text":"If we lose here, Two River will surely fall to the Highland∠Army. And if that happens, the fate of the Jowston∠Alliance is sealed. We all know what that means..."},{"id":1011070425,"text":"I don't even wanna think about it. Luca Blight really lives∠up to the name \"Mad Prince\"...er, I guess \"Mad King\" now."},{"id":1011070426,"text":"Report! General Ridley's forces have been ambushed and∠surrounded by the enemy. At this rate, they will be wiped∠out.∨Please send reinforcements at once!"},{"id":1011070427,"text":"What?! General Ridley, ambushed?"},{"id":1011070428,"text":"I didn't think the Highland Army had anyone of that caliber∠left."},{"id":1011070429,"text":"It must be Leon Silverberg..."},{"id":1011070430,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we need to mobilize∠reinforcements immediately. We cannot afford to lose General∠Ridley."},{"id":1011070431,"text":"Give me a moment."},{"id":1011070432,"text":"Alright. Let's move out immediately."},{"id":1011070433,"text":"Please hurry. This is a race against time."},{"id":1011070434,"text":"Okay, prepare to deploy!!!"},{"id":1011070435,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please accept my deepest∠apologies. The enemy's trap caught me completely by∠surprise."},{"id":1011070436,"text":"I'm just glad you're safe."},{"id":1011070437,"text":"Yeah, for sure."},{"id":1011070438,"text":"Th-Thank you, Commander. I won't forget your actions on my∠behalf."},{"id":1011070439,"text":"...I vow to one day redeem myself in your eyes."},{"id":1011070440,"text":"Winning or losing is a matter of luck and timing. But forget∠that now, what I want is information about our foes."},{"id":1011070441,"text":"Highland has already occupied Radat Town. Predictably, their∠next target looks to be South Window.∨They have 55,000 troops. Luca Blight leads the 1st Army,∠Jowy Atreides leads the 2nd, but it looks like a new general∠is leading the 4th.∨Also, the Harmonian forces are being led by Sasarai, a∠bishop from the Holy Kingdom."},{"id":1011070442,"text":"...Sasarai?"},{"id":1011070443,"text":"He and I are acquainted. Leave him to me."},{"id":1011070444,"text":"Damn... ◎0They got Ridley..."},{"id":1011070445,"text":"All we can do is pray for his safety."},{"id":1011070446,"text":"The Highland Army has already occupied Radat, and now∠they're approaching South Window.◎1 But the enemy force∠isn't just Highlanders. There are also soldiers from another∠country accompanying them."},{"id":1011070447,"text":"That'll be Sasarai of Harmonia. I know him well. Let me take∠care of him."},{"id":1011070448,"text":"What do you mean by that?"},{"id":1011070449,"text":"I don't have to tell you that."},{"id":1011070451,"text":"Simmer down, shoutin' at kids ain't a good look."},{"id":1011070452,"text":"That's right. Any real adult would be ashamed to lose their∠temper like that."},{"id":1011070453,"text":"Dammit! I hate that little snot!"},{"id":1011070454,"text":"If they're aiming for South Window, they will likely come at∠us head-on. They have three times our numbers, so they don't∠have any need for tricks.∨Speaking of which, what is our strategy?"},{"id":1011070455,"text":"If it's a strategy you're looking for, I've already got one. ∠I'll explain tomorrow. For now, let the soldiers rest."},{"id":1011070456,"text":"Hey, we've been waitin' for ya, ♂㈱. Can't start∠anything without our leader, now can we?"},{"id":1011070457,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, allow me to explain our∠strategy."},{"id":1011070458,"text":"Yes, I am quite eager to hear this winning tactic."},{"id":1011070459,"text":"Defeating an army of 50,000 with our meager 20,000 is simply∠impossible."},{"id":1011070460,"text":"Hey, c'mon, that's no way to talk..."},{"id":1011070461,"text":"Just let me finish. There is a way to win without beating∠their army. We will have but one goal: to take the head of∠Luca Blight."},{"id":1011070462,"text":"If we can slay King Luca, the throne will pass to Princess∠Jillia. She should prove much more tractable to discussions∠of peace."},{"id":1011070463,"text":"Here's the plan.∨Commander ♂㈱, Teresa, Flik, Viktor, Valeria,∠and Luc will wait with their troops at designated ambush∠positions.∨General Kiba will strike∠Highland's main unit, free Lord Ridley, and then challenge∠Luca Blight to single combat."},{"id":1011070464,"text":"Here's the plan.∨Commander ♂㈱, Teresa, Flik, Viktor, Kasumi,∠and Luc will wait with their troops at designated ambush∠positions.∨General Kiba will strike∠Highland's main unit, free Lord Ridley, and then challenge∠Luca Blight to single combat."},{"id":1011070465,"text":"Here's the plan.∨Commander ♂㈱, Teresa, Flik, Viktor, Valeria,∠and Luc will wait with their troops at designated ambush∠positions.∨General Kiba will strike∠Highland's main unit and then challenge Luca Blight to∠single combat."},{"id":1011070466,"text":"Here's the plan.∨Commander ♂㈱, Teresa, Flik, Viktor, Kasumi,∠and Luc will wait with their troops at designated ambush∠positions.∨General Kiba will strike∠Highland's main unit and then challenge Luca Blight to∠single combat."},{"id":1011070467,"text":"I don't know if I am capable of defeating King Luca..."},{"id":1011070468,"text":"You don't have to. When Luca appears, I want you to pretend∠to retreat and draw them into our ambush.∨We can't defeat 50,000 soldiers, but if we can surround∠their commander with our force of 20,000, victory is ours."},{"id":1011070469,"text":"I get it. You figure Luca Blight will go after General Kiba∠like a bat out of hell, eh."},{"id":1011070470,"text":"Father, please be careful."},{"id":1011070471,"text":"I will."},{"id":1011070472,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, if you're ready, please give the∠signal to deploy."},{"id":1011070473,"text":"I'm not quite ready..."},{"id":1011070474,"text":"Okay, let's move out."},{"id":1011070475,"text":"As soon as you're prepared, please give the signal to∠deploy."},{"id":1011070476,"text":"General Kiba, we're counting on you. Also..."},{"id":1011070477,"text":"Apple, summon Chaco."},{"id":1011070478,"text":"Apple, summon Chaco and Sasuke."},{"id":1011070479,"text":"Apple, summon Chaco and Mondo."},{"id":1011070480,"text":"Apple, summon Sasuke and Mondo."},{"id":1011070481,"text":"Whew, we finally finished treatin' the wounded.
