There∠weren't as many casualties as I was expectin'..."},{"id":1011070483,"text":"...But it was still pretty rough."},{"id":1011070484,"text":"Luc, your magic heavily damaged those Harmonian soldiers. If∠you could do that again the next battle..."},{"id":1011070485,"text":"Not going to happen. That particular magic really exhausts∠me, so I can't do it again for a while.∨Besides, I hate breaking a sweat."},{"id":1011070486,"text":"But..."},{"id":1011070487,"text":"I did my duty. Also, if he weren't here, it would all be∠futile..."},{"id":1011070488,"text":"I still cannot believe your plan failed, Master Shu... What∠are we to do now?"},{"id":1011070490,"text":"Damn... Is he some kind of monster?"},{"id":1011070491,"text":"We're in trouble, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011070492,"text":"We're just not yet strong enough..."},{"id":1011070494,"text":"Luca Blight... A fearsome man indeed."},{"id":1011070496,"text":"General Ridley!!!"},{"id":1011070497,"text":"General Ridley! You're alive!"},{"id":1011070498,"text":"We managed a narrow escape thanks to their help."},{"id":1011070499,"text":"Heheh! I saved the day! Bet you're real glad I joined up∠up with ya now, eh?"},{"id":1011070500,"text":"Heheh! So? I'm pretty awesome, huh?"},{"id":1011070501,"text":"Psh, says the one who screwed up and almost got us caught."},{"id":1011070503,"text":"You were indeed of help. Having wings must be quite useful."},{"id":1011070504,"text":"We were able to complete Master Shu's orders."},{"id":1011070505,"text":"With the two of us, it couldn't have been easier."},{"id":1011070506,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, forgive me. It was careless of∠me to fall into the enemy's trap."},{"id":1011070508,"text":"Well, you're right about that."},{"id":1011070511,"text":"I'm so glad you're okay, Ridley."},{"id":1011070512,"text":"Commander, is Master Shu in the great hall? I bear a message∠for him from someone."},{"id":1011070513,"text":"Ridley, you're alive! How the hell did ya get here?!"},{"id":1011070514,"text":"Master Shu sent help for me, so I was able to slip away in∠the chaos of the battle. But I also had aid from another∠source..."},{"id":1011070515,"text":"Another source?"},{"id":1011070516,"text":"Master Shu, I have a message from Leon Silverberg,∠strategist of the Highland Army."},{"id":1011070517,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I presume?"},{"id":1011070518,"text":"H-Hey! Wh-Who're you?!"},{"id":1011070519,"text":"I do believe this is the first time we have met in person,∠Commander. My name is Leon Silverberg. I'm currently in the∠employ of the Highland Army as a strategist."},{"id":1011070520,"text":"Wh-Wh-Whaaat?! Why would you come here then?"},{"id":1011070521,"text":"Blending in among soldiers in flight after a defeat is all∠too simple."},{"id":1011070522,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please deliver a message for me.∠Give this letter to Shu."},{"id":1011070523,"text":"You took the letter."},{"id":1011070524,"text":"Now if you'll excuse me, I must not linger here."},{"id":1011070525,"text":"N-Not so fast!!!"},{"id":1011070526,"text":"I wish you good fortune...Commander ♂㈱!"},{"id":1011070527,"text":"He's gone... What should we do? Should we give the letter to∠Shu?"},{"id":1011070528,"text":"Is something the matter, Commander ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070529,"text":"Um, this old guy named Leon left a letter for you."},{"id":1011070530,"text":"Leon... As in Leon Silverberg?"},{"id":1011070531,"text":"Do you know him? He said he was a strategist for the∠Highland Army."},{"id":1011070532,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, may I see this letter?"},{"id":1011070533,"text":"You handed over the letter."},{"id":1011070535,"text":"Shu..."},{"id":1011070536,"text":"Tonight...Luca Blight will lead a raid under the cover of∠darkness. This will likely be our last chance.∨Deploy all the troops, set an ambush for Luca Blight, and∠kill him."},{"id":1011070537,"text":"A night raid?! But why would the enemy strategist...∠Could it be a trap?"},{"id":1011070538,"text":"It may very well be. However, I can't imagine them resorting∠to such a ruse when the odds are so strongly in their favor.∨Also...∨Commander ♂㈱, please make a decision."},{"id":1011070539,"text":"Okay, let's deploy."},{"id":1011070540,"text":"...Let me think about it."},{"id":1011070541,"text":"We have no hope of victory if we miss this chance. Please∠hurry, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011070542,"text":"Understood. Now, we'll position our troops in the forest∠near ♂① Castle. When Luca Blight's unit∠appears, we'll block off all the exits.∨Then we strike with the strongest fighters we can muster.∠Commander, create a unit you think capable of putting an∠end to Luca Blight."},{"id":1011070543,"text":"Now, select your own party members."},{"id":1011070544,"text":"Prepare to mobilize at once!"},{"id":1011070546,"text":"If Master Shu says this is the way, then it must be."},{"id":1011070547,"text":"Staking it all on this is our only option."},{"id":1011070548,"text":"Okay, move out, but don't use torches. I want our eyes∠adjusted to the dark as much as possible. But leave the∠castle's torches lit."},{"id":1011070628,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱, you...you worried about me?∨I'm okay! No problem! I'm always fine!!!"},{"id":1011070630,"text":"I...think that maybe Pilika is happier back with Jowy. She∠really missed him..."},{"id":1011070631,"text":"Hey, outta the way! I'm in a hurry!!! Dammit, I don't got∠time for this!∨Hey, anybody know where he is? That guy ♂㈱ is∠here, isn't he?! I gotta see him!!!"},{"id":1011070632,"text":"You! It's you, right? That ♂㈱ guy. You got the∠red duds just like I heard, and you're the right age and∠size too. It's gotta be you, right?"},{"id":1011070633,"text":"Yes, you're right."},{"id":1011070634,"text":"No way."},{"id":1011070635,"text":"Don't try to hide it. You're already famous around here. You∠really are ♂㈱, right?"},{"id":1011070636,"text":"Hey, you aren't tryin' to play me for a fool just because∠I'm a little rough around the edges, are ya? You really are∠♂㈱, I mean, Commander ♂㈱, aren't∠ya?"},{"id":1011070637,"text":"Damn, wrong guy. I give up!"},{"id":1011070638,"text":"I'm still not convinced. Show me your right hand. I heard∠that ♂㈱ has a Shield Rune on his right hand."},{"id":1011070639,"text":"Sure."},{"id":1011070640,"text":"No way."},{"id":1011070642,"text":"Well, that is a rune.∨.........∨But is it really the Shield Rune? I've never seen it so I∠don't know... ◎2 Nah, you must be ♂㈱. Right?!"},{"id":1011070643,"text":"See what I mean! You not wantin' to show me means you∠really are ♂㈱, aren't you?"},{"id":1011070644,"text":"Really? What luck. Now I can help my brothers.∨Hey ♂㈱, I got a favor to ask... Oops!"},{"id":1011070645,"text":"See what I mean? I was right. Great, now we can help my∠brothers.∨Hey ♂㈱, I got a favor to ask... Oops!"},{"id":1011070646,"text":"Ugh, dammit, after all the times they told me. Right,∠manners, I gotta remember my manners."},{"id":1011070647,"text":"I... No, me... No, Myself...∨Man, what a pain. I am Koyu, youngest of the Lampdragon∠Bandits based in a stronghold north of Tinto.∨O Great Commander ♂㈱, I have journeyed here∠to deliver a request.∨Please, please help my siblings. I beg of you."},{"id":1011070648,"text":"And what is it you want Commander ♂㈱ to do?"},{"id":1011070649,"text":"Let me tell you. We are the Lampdragon Trio. Lessee,∠there's my brother, Gijimu, my sister, Lo Wen, and then me.∨We were living a carefree life north of Tinto until the∠Highland Army or Imperial Army or Whatever Army took over∠and started makin' a mess of our turf.∨We weren't gonna take that sittin' down, so we went to try∠and drive 'em out. And sure enough they ran for it, because∠we're the terrifying Lampdragon Bandits, see?"},{"id":1011070650,"text":"Just when we thought we'd driven those jerks out, these∠other weirdos jumped us.∨What the hell were those things? They had pasty faces like∠corpses, except they were attackin' us. They didn't die∠when we cut 'em nor even make a peep like it hurt!"},{"id":1011070651,"text":"Hey, you're talkin' about zombies!"},{"id":1011070652,"text":"Yeah, Marlowe said somethin' like that too. Anyway, we're in∠a real fix.∨That's why I came here. I, Koyu, humbly bow my head and ask∠for your help. Uh, lessee...∨I journeyed here to deliver this request to you, O Great∠Commander ♂㈱.∨Please, please help my family. I beg of you."},{"id":1011070653,"text":"Zombies, huh... It's gotta be Neclord."},{"id":1011070654,"text":"Neclord made zombie soldiers during the Gate Rune War in∠the Scarlet Moon Empire too, so you're probably right."},{"id":1011070655,"text":"Mister Strategist, we need to check on this. I can't believe∠Neclord would be aimin' for just a hunk of bandit turf up in∠the mountains."},{"id":1011070656,"text":"His goal must be Tinto."},{"id":1011070657,"text":"But we can't send our troops out recklessly. It's dangerous∠to send a large force into the mountains."},{"id":1011070658,"text":"Nah, ♂㈱ and me ought to be enough. Right,∠♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070660,"text":"I'm not so sure..."},{"id":1011070661,"text":"Please, I beg of you. Help my brothers. At this rate, our∠fort's gonna get overrun."},{"id":1011070662,"text":"I'm askin' you too, ♂㈱. If Neclord is really∠trying to pull somethin', we can't let it go."},{"id":1011070663,"text":"Please, please. Uh, how did it go again... Oh yeah.∨I journeyed here to deliver this request to you, O Great∠Commander ♂㈱.∨Please, please help my family. I beg of you."},{"id":1011070664,"text":"What a relief! When everyone hears that the great Commander∠♂㈱ is on the way, they're gonna be real∠fired up.∨I'll take you to our stronghold. First, let's go southwest∠of Lakewest to the village of Drakemouth."},{"id":1011070665,"text":"Alright, let's do this, ♂㈱. Time to kill us a∠vampire."},{"id":1011070666,"text":"Shu, aren't you going to stop them?"},{"id":1011070667,"text":"If I thought ♂㈱ was the type of person who∠would stop just because I told him to, there would be no∠meaning in my presence here.∨That's not to say I'm happy about him marching off into∠danger, though."},{"id":1011070668,"text":"♂㈱! ♂㈱! You're not thinking of∠leaving me behind, are you?∨I know you're going off to fight that old creep Neclord or∠whatever he's called. I am absolutely, definitely going∠with you, okay?"},{"id":1011070669,"text":"Huh? Of course I was planning to take you."},{"id":1011070670,"text":"No."},{"id":1011070671,"text":"Oh, come on, why not? You're so mean!"},{"id":1011070672,"text":"I'm not being mean, you can't go because it's dangerous."},{"id":1011070673,"text":"Oh, whatever! All the martial arts Grandpa Genkaku taught∠me aren't just for show, you know!∨And don't go forgetting that you've never managed to beat∠me during practice either!"},{"id":1011070674,"text":"That's not what I meant..."},{"id":1011070675,"text":"Then what? C'mon, I'll be way more useful than that stinky∠bear guy over there."},{"id":1011070676,"text":"\"Stinky bear guy\"...? Hey, what'd I do?!"},{"id":1011070677,"text":"Alright! Big sis is coming with, so you've got nothing to∠worry about, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1011070678,"text":"B-Big sis? Are you telling me she's supposed to be the older∠sibling?"},{"id":1011070680,"text":"Is something wrong? Weren't you headed to Mt. Lampdragon?"},{"id":1011070681,"text":"Well, actually..."},{"id":1011070682,"text":"I understand. If what you say is true, Viktor, this could be∠our chance. We will have the troops ready so they can move∠out as soon as we receive word.∨Commander ♂㈱, please hurry to Tinto. If that∠city falls, then Two River and the ♂② Army∠will be in grave danger."},{"id":1011070683,"text":"You can count on us. Let's hurry, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011070684,"text":"Welcome back. Shu's waiting for you upstairs. I think he's∠come up with a plan. He's got that look on his face again."},{"id":1011070685,"text":"We have already received word. Mayor Gustav of Tinto has∠made an official offer for an alliance."},{"id":1011070687,"text":"Who's that? I've never seen him before."},{"id":1011070688,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I am Boris. When I heard that∠my father, Ridley, fell in battle, I came right away.∨My father's great wish was to save Two River and the∠City-States. As his son, I intend to carry on this wish in∠his stead.∨Please, allow me to join the ♂② Army and fight∠alongside you."},{"id":1011070689,"text":"Hmm, his father's last wish... What a dutiful son."},{"id":1011070690,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the ♂② Army has∠reached the point where it can face Highland on equal∠terms.∨Up to this point we've merely been reacting to our foe's∠movements, but now it is time to make some of our own."},{"id":1011070691,"text":"Huh? You mean we're gonna go on the attack?"},{"id":1011070692,"text":"Well, you could say that. According to Apple's intelligence,∠the Highland Army is amassing in Muse.∨We don't know their intentions, but this is as good a∠chance as any to take back Greenhill."},{"id":1011070693,"text":"A new general by the name of Yuber has been stationed in∠Greenhill. Yuber has turned up several times in the past∠in locations embroiled by war.∨No one knows anything about this man, and in fact there are∠some who say he is not a man at all."},{"id":1011070694,"text":"What do you say, ♂㈱? Win this and you'll be an∠even bigger stud who's gonna have every girl served up∠to him on a platter.∨Hey, maybe you could make me vice-general? Even just the∠title would be fine. I AM a representative of the Toran∠Republic and all."},{"id":1011070695,"text":"Okay. Let's go to Greenhill."},{"id":1011070696,"text":"Okay...but no vice-general."},{"id":1011070697,"text":"I need to think this over a bit more..."},{"id":1011070698,"text":"Very well, I will issue the orders to the troops.∠Commander, I suggest you rest up before the battle.∨I heard that you collapsed in Tinto. Remember that your∠health must always come first."},{"id":1011070700,"text":"It is wise to be careful, but please do not let this chance∠slip through our grasp.∨Now, Commander, you must be tired. Please get some rest.∨I heard you collapsed in Tinto. Remember that your health∠must always come first."},{"id":1011070701,"text":"Well, I'm gonna go take a walk. Maybe I'll stop in on∠Eilie, or maybe Leona or Apple, or even Nan—Ah!∨Uh, well, see ya. Don't stay up too late."},{"id":1011070702,"text":"Are you ♂㈱, leader of the ♂②∠Army?"},{"id":1011070704,"text":"Who are you?!"},{"id":1011070705,"text":"Prepare to die!!!"},{"id":1011070706,"text":"The dead need no answers!!!"},{"id":1011070707,"text":"Ungh... I was wrong...to think you just a child..."},{"id":1011070708,"text":"♂㈱! What's wrong?!"},{"id":1011070709,"text":"Huh? Who are you?"},{"id":1011070710,"text":"Tsk, I've been noticed..."},{"id":1011070711,"text":"Of course you were, makin' all that ruckus!"},{"id":1011070712,"text":"Why did you try to kill me?"},{"id":1011070714,"text":".........∨I merely thought that if your life ended, so too would this∠foolish war..."},{"id":1011070715,"text":"Damn! Have I made it this far only to...∨How long will you keep fighting this pointless war,∠♂㈱?!"},{"id":1011070716,"text":"Watch your mouth!"},{"id":1011070717,"text":"Do with me as you will. I failed what I set out to do, so∠there's no point in living."},{"id":1011070718,"text":"No point in living?! Don't be stupid!"},{"id":1011070719,"text":"Let her go."},{"id":1011070720,"text":"Throw her in a cell."},{"id":1011070722,"text":"............∨Bah, lucky little sneak..."},{"id":1011070723,"text":"You will receive no thanks from me. My only goal...is your∠head."},{"id":1011070724,"text":"You sure that was the right call, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070726,"text":"Alright, move it! This way!"},{"id":1011070727,"text":"I'm just glad you're still with us, ♂㈱. Still,∠I can't believe the enemy managed to strike at us right in∠our own home..."},{"id":1011070728,"text":"Commander, last night must have been trying. ∠About the assailant we had in custody..."},{"id":1011070729,"text":"Well...that's the thing. She broke out of her cell sometime∠during the night."},{"id":1011070730,"text":"This won't do at all. Tighten our security measures at once.∨Commander ♂㈱, preparations are complete for∠the liberation of Greenhill. Our forces will be divided in two∠this time.∨General Hauser, Viktor, and Flik will go to the∠Muse-Greenhill border to slow down any enemy forces∠coming from Muse.∨Meanwhile, General Kiba and Klaus will attack and liberate∠Greenhill.∨Apple will stay here and coordinate communications∠between the two armies.∨If you're ready, Commander, give the order to deploy."},{"id":1011070733,"text":"Whenever you're ready, Commander."},{"id":1011070734,"text":"Are you ready, Commander?"},{"id":1011070735,"text":"Very well, Commander. Please select the army you wish to∠accompany."},{"id":1011070736,"text":"I'll go with Viktor's unit."},{"id":1011070737,"text":"I'll go with General Kiba."},{"id":1011070738,"text":"I'll wait here."},{"id":1011070739,"text":"Now, let us begin, Commander."},{"id":1011070740,"text":"Time to show these scoundrels a thing or two, eh, General∠Ridley?"},{"id":1011070741,"text":"Hahahahaha, well just try not to fall behind, old man!"},{"id":1011070742,"text":"What?! \"Old\"? I'll have you know I'm still plenty young...∠at heart! Hahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1011070743,"text":"Time to show these scoundrels a thing or two, eh, General∠Boris? I expect no less from you than I would from your∠father."},{"id":1011070744,"text":"Of course! For my father's soul, and for the City-States,∠I stake my life on this battle!"},{"id":1011070745,"text":"Listen, tomorrow is big fight! Time for Kobolds to fight∠hard and show how brave we are!!!"},{"id":1011070746,"text":"Yes, Captain Gengen!!!"},{"id":1011070747,"text":"But everybody stay close to Gengen! If you get in trouble,∠Gengen will protect you!"},{"id":1011070748,"text":"Captain Gengen..."},{"id":1011070749,"text":"Gengen is a great soldier! Great soldiers take care of∠themselves! Everyone wake up early tomorrow!!!"},{"id":1011070750,"text":"Yes, Captain!!!"},{"id":1011070751,"text":"Okay, Gengen sleep lots too!!! And protect everybody!!!∠Sleep lots, and protect everybody!!!"},{"id":1011070752,"text":"Hey, if it isn't ♂㈱. Don't usually see you up∠this late. What's up? Makin' the rounds? You don't seem the∠type that worries too much to sleep."},{"id":1011070753,"text":"Y'know, ♂㈱, you're really somethin'. At first∠I had my doubts that a little guy like you could protect us.∨But you've become a great leader.∨We know that fighting for you is the same thing as keepin'∠our city safe.∨I know none of this is easy, but hang in there."},{"id":1011070754,"text":"Dear, is there going to be a major battle tomorrow?"},{"id":1011070755,"text":"Yes, I'm afraid so. But we've been victorious up to this∠point, so I know we can win tomorrow too.∨After all, we have Commander ♂㈱ on our side."},{"id":1011070756,"text":"You're right. When I first saw him, he looked like just a∠little boy, but look at the great leader he's become."},{"id":1011070757,"text":"Indeed!"},{"id":1011070758,"text":"Dear, I hope that we have a strong, healthy son who is∠just like him."},{"id":1011070759,"text":"Huh? W-Wait, my love..."},{"id":1011070760,"text":"Oh, Commander. We were just talking about you."},{"id":1011070761,"text":"C-Commander ♂㈱! Wh-What brings you here? ∠A-Are you keeping watch?"},{"id":1011070762,"text":"Dad, when are you going to go back to Mom?"},{"id":1011070763,"text":"Um, well... Now is not the time. We still have a war to∠fight. Maybe after that..."},{"id":1011070764,"text":"But why? It's war, Dad. No matter how strong you are..."},{"id":1011070765,"text":"That's true. I might lose my life. One never knows."},{"id":1011070766,"text":"So then why?!"},{"id":1011070767,"text":"Listen, honey, all I ever did was make your mother sad.∠And I never, ever want to do that again.∨Tomo, if I were to die in battle, tell your mother that you∠couldn't find me, okay?"},{"id":1011070768,"text":"Dad...∨That's...that's not fair..."},{"id":1011070769,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. You should get some rest∠soon. I'll be heading off to bed, too, once I finish this∠spear."},{"id":1011070770,"text":"Hey, sis, once this war is over, I think it's time we moved∠on..."},{"id":1011070771,"text":"Yes, I suppose life on the road suits us best. Wandering∠performers such as ourselves aren't meant to stay in any one∠place for too long."},{"id":1011070772,"text":"Yeah..."},{"id":1011070773,"text":"It's okay. It's okay."},{"id":1011070775,"text":"♂㈱ can become performer too. Eilie throw∠knives again, and everyone happy!"},{"id":1011070776,"text":"Bolgan! Don't you start this too!"},{"id":1011070777,"text":"Oh, uh... Hey, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011070778,"text":"Why, ♂㈱, good evening. What's wrong? Feeling∠lonely?"},{"id":1011070779,"text":"♂㈱! ♂㈱! Travel! Travel!"},{"id":1011070780,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱, what is it? We're closed."},{"id":1011070781,"text":"Hehe, no, stop right there. I'll make you something good.∠There won't be any alcohol in it, though."},{"id":1011070782,"text":"Hehehe, so how'd you like my famous lemon tea? Now you'll∠sleep like a baby."},{"id":1011070783,"text":"I-I'm so worried..."},{"id":1011070784,"text":"Thank you."},{"id":1011070785,"text":".........∨♂㈱, you've been so strong up to this∠point. We all know how hard it's been for you.∨All you need to do is tough it out a little bit longer. And∠if you still feel sad along the way, come talk to me.∨I'll try and ease your worries, just a bit.∠But remember, ♂㈱, you're almost through this."},{"id":1011070786,"text":"Living up to everybody's expectations isn't easy, I know,∠but it's a good thing to be trusted by so many people.∨♂㈱..."},{"id":1011070787,"text":"Hehehe, but, I told you we're closed. Quit burning the∠midnight oil and get yourself to bed."},{"id":1011070788,"text":"I'm glad to see you safe, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011070789,"text":"But this is a disaster! We couldn't recapture Muse...∠Does this not mean we're out of options?"},{"id":1011070791,"text":"Eh, it'll work out somehow. Maybe we'll come up with a good∠idea tomorrow. Anyway, don't worry about it for now,∠♂㈱. Just go get some grub and sleep."},{"id":1011070792,"text":"That's your answer to everything."},{"id":1011070793,"text":"You wanted to see me, Master Shu?"},{"id":1011070794,"text":"General Kiba... I have a great favor to ask of you."},{"id":1011070795,"text":"...◎2I'm listening."},{"id":1011070796,"text":"The next battle will be the one to truly determine the∠outcome of this war. If we hope to win, we're going to have∠to make a hefty gambit."},{"id":1011070797,"text":"It will indeed be a grueling battle..."},{"id":1011070798,"text":"Highland and the ♂② Army continue to glare at∠each other across the divide of the great lake.∨And although the Matilda Knightdom has surrendered, the∠region is still unstable enough that the Highland Army can't∠afford to leave it unoccupied."},{"id":1011070799,"text":"You mean to say that attempting to liberate Matilda as∠things stand now is a lost cause?◎1 Then how do you suggest∠we remedy this?"},{"id":1011070800,"text":"I want you to take a regiment and attack Viktor's old fort∠east of Muse. Even if Highland does realize it's a decoy,∠they'll still be forced to divide their forces and send∠troops to stop you.∨And given that east of Muse is right on the doorstep of∠Highland's own land, they will likely dispatch Leon∠Silverberg to do it."},{"id":1011070802,"text":"Master Shu, I have already died once with my defeat, so I do∠not fear death.∨But when I see how Commander ♂㈱ wins over∠the hearts of others to fight through this war...∨I find myself believing in miracles, unbecoming of a general∠as that may be."},{"id":1011070803,"text":"I don't need your regiment, Master Shu. The soldiers who∠followed me when I defected from Highland will suffice."},{"id":1011070804,"text":"Forgive me...General Kiba."},{"id":1011070805,"text":"It is not like you to bow.∨All I ask in return is that you take care of my son, Klaus.∠Under your tutelage, I am certain he will become a brilliant∠strategist."},{"id":1011070806,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, our strategy is determined. ∠This fight will be the true decisive battle between the∠♂② Army and Highland.∨So many forces have come together in the name of war, and∠we are approaching a breaking point. The side that wins will∠take everything, while the loser forfeits all.∨The respective existences of the City-States and Highland∠hang in the balance.∨You have two choices.∨One is to do nothing and accept defeat. This path is easy,∠but it is one of servitude.∨The other is to fight, and attain victory for all.∠This is a thorny path, but it leads to triumph."},{"id":1011070807,"text":"I await the decision you make, Commander."},{"id":1011070808,"text":"We will fight."},{"id":1011070809,"text":"I can't... Not yet."},{"id":1011070810,"text":"Understood. I will gather everyone in the hall."},{"id":1011070811,"text":"All those who joined the ♂② Army have their∠own reasons for fighting...but don't forget that they share∠a common faith in you.∨Speak to me once you have made up your mind."},{"id":1011070812,"text":"Have you made your decision, Commander?"},{"id":1011070813,"text":"Listen carefully, everyone. Now that Highland has taken∠Matilda, their army numbers 55,000 men with the addition of∠the Knights. In contrast, our own forces number only 25,000."},{"id":1011070814,"text":"So they're going to crush us if we meet them head-on."},{"id":1011070815,"text":"So we split our forces in two. General Kiba will lead∠one unit and head east of Muse.∨As this is right at the throat of the Highland Kingdom, our∠foes will have no choice but to divide their own forces to∠intercept him.∨That is when the rest of our army will attack Matilda."},{"id":1011070816,"text":"But that still leaves it at like 30,000 versus 20,000..."},{"id":1011070817,"text":"This is a gamble. A great gamble, with everything at stake.∠A gamble we cannot win if we do not wager our own lives.∠This will be our most fierce battle yet, no doubt about that.∨If there are any here among you unwilling to die this day,∠I ask that you take your leave. You have my word that you∠will not be held accountable, and no one will blame you."},{"id":1011070818,"text":"No point startin' to worry about staying alive now, eh?"},{"id":1011070819,"text":"No way I can back out of this. A certain someone would never∠let me live it down."},{"id":1011070820,"text":"Yes, any craftsman would be ashamed to begin a job∠and leave it unfinished."},{"id":1011070821,"text":"Then let's go! We will show them the might of the Kobolds!"},{"id":1011070822,"text":"We came this far, might as well see it through."},{"id":1011070823,"text":"You always say stuff like that..."},{"id":1011070824,"text":"I will fight! For everyone, and for myself."},{"id":1011070825,"text":"Uh, um, I..."},{"id":1011070826,"text":"Are you serious?! We've come too far to run away! Isn't that∠right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070827,"text":"True, we have known ♂㈱ for a long time.∠We must give him our all now."},{"id":1011070828,"text":"Time to fight, ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1011070829,"text":"No human doofuses are gonna beat the Winged Horde,∠♂㈱!"},{"id":1011070830,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, on my honor as a Kobold and∠citizen of Two River City, I will safeguard you!"},{"id":1011070831,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I will stake my honor on this∠battle! If my father Ridley were here, I'm sure he'd say the∠same thing."},{"id":1011070832,"text":"It is a soldier's duty to follow orders."},{"id":1011070833,"text":"Commander, I have already given my life to you. Use it as∠you please, hahahahahahahahaha!"},{"id":1011070834,"text":"Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011070835,"text":"♂㈱..."},{"id":1011070836,"text":"Let's do it, ♂㈱! It'll be okay. I promise.∠We'll win. I know it."},{"id":1011070837,"text":"Everyone, lend me your swords!"},{"id":1011070838,"text":"Hell yeah! As if you needed to ask!"},{"id":1011070839,"text":"♂㈱... ∠You have assembled many comrades around you...∨The Bright Shield Rune upon your right hand and the Black∠Sword Rune Jowy bears are the two aspects that comprise∠the Rune of Beginning.∨This rune possesses the power to judge war. It is∠an uncompromising power, that exerts hard justice.∠You have proven yourself capable of wielding it properly."},{"id":1011070840,"text":"The 108 Stars of Destiny have gathered before you, the∠bearer of the Bright Shield Rune. This is proof of your∠worthiness.∨Thus, the seal on the Bright Shield Rune may now be broken.∠♂㈱, hold forth your right hand."},{"id":1011070841,"text":"May the will of the 108 Stars come together...to grant∠♂㈱ renewed power."},{"id":1011070842,"text":"You may now use the final ability of your rune.∨♂㈱, may you go forth with glory upon your∠path..."},{"id":1011070843,"text":"Now, we must prepare swiftly. Everything is riding on this∠battle. Make sure to leave no regrets behind!!!"},{"id":1011070844,"text":"♂㈱, wake up! It looks like General Kiba's∠unit is getting ready to leave! C'mon, let's go! We∠have to see them off."},{"id":1011070845,"text":"We've made it a long way, Commander ♂㈱.∠We must not let victory elude us now.∨Well then, I must bid you farewell.∨Good luck to all of you."},{"id":1011070846,"text":"Very best of luck to you, too, Father..."},{"id":1011070847,"text":"Klaus, serve Commander ♂㈱ with honor."},{"id":1011070848,"text":"I will..."},{"id":1011070849,"text":"I've always been proud of you, my son."},{"id":1011070850,"text":"No, Father... The honor was all mine."},{"id":1011070851,"text":"There they go... We can win this, I know it."},{"id":1011070852,"text":"Yes. We can win this battle. No, we must win it.∨Well, Master Shu is likely waiting... Let's go to the meeting∠room."},{"id":1011070853,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, preparations are complete.∠Let us first go through Greenhill and then on to Matilda."},{"id":1011070854,"text":"Let's move out."},{"id":1011070855,"text":"Wait. Give me a minute..."},{"id":1011070856,"text":"C'mon, ♂㈱, we're all fired up and ready to go∠here!"},{"id":1011070857,"text":"Are you ready, Commander ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070858,"text":"Let's go! Victory will be ours!!!"},{"id":1011070859,"text":"Yeah!!! Charge!!!"},{"id":1011070860,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the Highland Army has left∠Muse and withdrawn to their own territory.∨They likely realized that they couldn't repel attacks from∠both Greenhill and Matilda at the same time.∨One thing is certain, however: as soon as they regroup their∠forces, they will go on the offensive again.∨As your strategist, I urge you to take the fight to them.∠Now is the time to invade Highland and eliminate the root∠of this entire conflict."},{"id":1011070861,"text":"The root of this conflict?"},{"id":1011070863,"text":"The Highland Kingdom and the City-States of Jowston have∠both grown too large...∨The Holy Kingdom of Harmonia lies to the north, the Toran∠Republic is to the south, the vast ocean unfurls to the∠east, and the desolate Grasslands are to our west.∨We've had no choice but to fight to survive in this land.∠History has proven that.∨Human wisdom has its limits."},{"id":1011070864,"text":"Are you having doubts, Commander ♂㈱? ∠You, too, must know why we have to fight...∨The Highland Kingdom and the City-States of Jowston have∠both grown too large...∨The Holy Kingdom of Harmonia lies to the north, the Toran∠Republic is to the south, the vast ocean unfurls to the∠east, and the desolate Grasslands are to our west.∨We've had no choice but to fight to survive in this land.∠History has proven that.∨Human wisdom has its limits."},{"id":1011070865,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please give us the order to∠invade Highland."},{"id":1011070866,"text":"Very well..."},{"id":1011070868,"text":"I can't..."},{"id":1011070869,"text":"...Have you made your decision? I trust that you, as our∠leader, the one so many have chosen to follow, will make the∠right choice."},{"id":1011070870,"text":"......∨I'm certain you are finding this a difficult decision to∠make. Sadness is a poison that threatens to break the soul∠at times, after all.∨So for now we will wait, wait until you find your answer..."},{"id":1011070871,"text":"Thank you, Commander. We will begin preparations at once."},{"id":1011070873,"text":"Hey... Are you okay?"},{"id":1011070874,"text":"Don't scare us like that! Freed looked like he was about to∠have a heart attack."},{"id":1011070875,"text":"That's not true! I-I was just surprised that Commander∠♂㈱ collapsed..."},{"id":1011070876,"text":"We're just about to take the fight to Highland territory,∠♂㈱, so we need you to hold it together.∨Just a little longer and this whole war will be over..."},{"id":1011070877,"text":"That's right. If we beat Highland, the war will be at an∠end. We have to believe this."},{"id":1011070878,"text":"Well, we got lots of preparing to do on our end, so you go∠and rest up, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011070879,"text":"Don't pressure yourself too much. A smile suits you much∠better."},{"id":1011070881,"text":"What is it, Apple?"},{"id":1011070882,"text":"When I came up with the plan to attack Muse...you knew that∠it was going to fail, didn't you?"},{"id":1011070883,"text":"Yeah.∨I gave it a fifty-fifty chance at best."},{"id":1011070884,"text":"So then, why..."},{"id":1011070885,"text":"Well, the way I saw it, if we won, fine. If we lost, I∠hoped it would disguise my true plans and trick them into∠thinking we lost our nerve.∨Also, I figured between you and Klaus, even if we lost, the∠damage would be minimal."},{"id":1011070886,"text":"............∨Shu... I-I... Isn't there anything at all that I can do to∠help you?"},{"id":1011070888,"text":"...I'm sorry. I'll be going now."},{"id":1011070889,"text":"Apple."},{"id":1011070890,"text":"Yes?"},{"id":1011070891,"text":"There are 3 cards on that table there."},{"id":1011070893,"text":"Would you take one of them for me?"},{"id":1011070895,"text":"What does it say?"},{"id":1011070896,"text":"Fire... Nothing else."},{"id":1011070897,"text":"............∨I see... You may go now, Apple."},{"id":1011070898,"text":"Okay... Good night."},{"id":1011070899,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... Tomorrow we fight. ∠You should get some rest now."},{"id":1011070900,"text":"Hey! Hey! Get up!"},{"id":1011070901,"text":"Wakey, wakey!"},{"id":1011070902,"text":"Well, you two are certainly lively this morning. Everyone is∠gathered in the great hall, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011070903,"text":"Fight hard out there, ♂㈱! I will too! We gotta∠win this!!!"},{"id":1011070904,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the troops are ready. Our goal∠is Highland's capital city of L'Renouille.∨Please give the order to deploy."},{"id":1011070905,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1011070906,"text":"I need some time..."},{"id":1011070907,"text":"Please hurry, Commander."},{"id":1011070908,"text":"With this one battle, we can finally put an end to this∠long, tragic war!"},{"id":1011070909,"text":"Yeah! Time to finish this damn thing!"},{"id":1011070910,"text":"By my sword, we will win!"},{"id":1011070911,"text":"On my name...I say VICTORY!!!"},{"id":1011070912,"text":"For the honor of the Knights! We shall be victorious!"},{"id":1011070913,"text":"This victory will belong to all people everywhere!"},{"id":1011070914,"text":"That's right! It's for everyone! Heheheh, I guess?"},{"id":1011070915,"text":"Let us be off! To L'Renouille!"},{"id":1011070928,"text":"This room is kinda small, or was Grandpa Genkaku's house∠too big because it was a dojo? Anyway, this is the best∠room it looks like."},{"id":1011070929,"text":"Are you in need of something, Commander?"},{"id":1011070930,"text":"How are you today, Commander?"},{"id":1011070931,"text":"I, Ridley, will give my all for you, Commander, for the∠♂② Army, and most importantly for all the∠people of Two River!"},{"id":1011070932,"text":"I pledge to give my all for you, Commander, for the∠the ♂② Army, and most importantly for all the∠people of Two River!"},{"id":1011070933,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the leader of a defeated army∠is without life, and so I dedicate this life I already lost∠to your service."},{"id":1011070934,"text":"Well, I'd better go take care of my spear."},{"id":1011070935,"text":"*yawn* I grow drowsy. Everyone please leave the room."},{"id":1011070936,"text":"Yes, Commander? Would you like to rearrange your forces?"},{"id":1011070937,"text":"I suppose I can live with this. And you don't even have to∠sleep on the floor."},{"id":1011070938,"text":"There must be a cute girl around here somewhere. Think I'll∠go take a look..."},{"id":1011070940,"text":"Hey, bro, isn't this ♂① Castle, where the∠real ♂㈱ is? I don't think this is such a good∠idea..."},{"id":1011070941,"text":"W-Wait, no way... You mean you're the real ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011070942,"text":"Ha, ahahaha... H-Hey, bro we're friends, right? Ahahaha..."},{"id":1011070964,"text":"☆0∠       Shelf Full of Difficult Books"},{"id":1011070969,"text":"☆0∠               Ascidum Plant"},{"id":1011070985,"text":"☆0∠             Suggestion Box∠            Take a peek?"},{"id":1011070986,"text":"Commander, perhaps you should rest..."},{"id":1011070987,"text":"Doing an inspection, eh, Commander?"},{"id":1011070988,"text":"Zzz...◎6☆0 Ack! Uh, um, uh, a-absolutely nothing suspicious∠to report, Commander, sir!"},{"id":1011070989,"text":"Don't worry. I haven't seen anyone prowling about."},{"id":1011070990,"text":"Please rest easy, Commander. We're guarding you, so there's∠nothing to fear."},{"id":1011070991,"text":"Yah!"},{"id":1011070992,"text":"Huh? Something's blocking me. It won't work."},{"id":1011070993,"text":"Zzz...◎3 Sorry, I messed up again...◎5 Zzz..."},{"id":1011070994,"text":"I see you are making the rounds, Commander. Please leave∠this part to me and go get some rest!"},{"id":1011070995,"text":"Commander. Master Shu has ordered me to stand guard here."},{"id":1011070996,"text":"Please relax, sir. I assure you that no intruders will get∠past here again."},{"id":1011070997,"text":"They use stone tiles for flooring, right? There's dust in∠the cracks..."},{"id":1011070998,"text":"So many famed people gather in the great hall above. Makes∠me nervous just thinking about it..."},{"id":1011070999,"text":"It's a shame not to put the stage in there to use..."},{"id":1011071000,"text":"Commander, you're on patrol, I see. The barracks are just∠past here."},{"id":1011071001,"text":"Whew... Guess I had a little too much to drink. Maybe I'll∠just go take a break in the hall..."},{"id":1011071006,"text":"■"},{"id":1011071007,"text":"Now, what shape will this nation take..."},{"id":1011071008,"text":"I'll be making my way back to Highland. Though the kingdom∠is no more, its people's lives must go on..."},{"id":1011071009,"text":"We kobolds will be returning to Two River. We can't remain∠here forever, after all."},{"id":1011071010,"text":"We kobolds will be returning to Two River. We can't stay∠here forever."},{"id":1011071011,"text":""},{"id":1011071012,"text":"Hmm, what should I do now?"},{"id":1011071013,"text":"Well... It's time for me to sleep. Don't interrupt me."},{"id":1011071014,"text":"That's...not necessary anymore."},{"id":1011071015,"text":"■"},{"id":1011071016,"text":"Well, I'm just about down to my last potch, so I'd better∠head back to the old man. If I hit my mom up, she usually∠gives me at least a little something."},{"id":1011071024,"text":"Hmm... You mortals have your own sadness, just as we∠immortals do our own."},{"id":1011071025,"text":"Let me guess...you want to reorganize your forces?"},{"id":1011071033,"text":"Commander, we don't know yet. But you must believe."},{"id":1011071034,"text":"All we can do is wait, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011071038,"text":"Don't worry so much. A healthy girl like her won't die so∠easily, right? Yaaaaaay!!!"},{"id":1011090109,"text":"It's the happy dance of ♂① Castle's funniest∠and furriest duo...Gengen and Gabocha!"},{"id":1011090116,"text":"Oh, my sweet Karen..."},{"id":1011090117,"text":"My heart is racing for some reason..."},{"id":1011090118,"text":"*sigh* Now I can die happy..."},{"id":1011090120,"text":"K-Karen..."},{"id":1011090121,"text":"Karen is so very beautiful... *sigh*"},{"id":1011090122,"text":"B-But I wanna watch..."},{"id":1011090123,"text":"Look at the way this old lech is staring at her..."},{"id":1011090124,"text":"Yippee!!! Hooray!!!"},{"id":1011090141,"text":"Please enjoy the enchanting song of Lady Annallee."},{"id":1011090142,"text":"Everyone is nervous before getting on stage, so please∠keep quiet."},{"id":1011090184,"text":"Wait, Gengen and his friend are dancing now, so please∠don't go on the stage."},{"id":1011100657,"text":"Hey, Commander, I'd say that was a resounding success!"},{"id":1011100658,"text":"Hey, are you okay? You sure you're not hurt? You got caught∠up in the middle of the fighting over there too, right?"},{"id":1011100659,"text":"Of course, because I was there!"},{"id":1011100660,"text":"Well, as long as you're all right, everything's fine."},{"id":1011100661,"text":"There's never a dull moment with you, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011100663,"text":"Hey, looks like she was worried about ya too. You're quite∠the popular guy, ♂㈱, wahahahahaha!"},{"id":1011100664,"text":"Well done, Commander ♂㈱. Gaining Two River as∠an ally is a big step forward, but I'm afraid we have no∠time to rejoice."},{"id":1011100665,"text":"Did somethin' happen, Mister Strategist?"},{"id":1011100666,"text":"The Commander must be tired, so I'll explain the situation∠tomorrow. Get some rest for now.∨We'll meet again in the hall tomorrow morning."},{"id":1011100667,"text":"Bah, wish he'd just tell it to us straight out..."},{"id":1011100669,"text":"So what's this \"bad news\" you mentioned yesterday?"},{"id":1011100670,"text":"Greenhill has fallen to the Kingdom of Highland."},{"id":1011100671,"text":"Not again..."},{"id":1011100672,"text":"So they couldn't hold out, eh... Still, I'm surprised∠Highland was able to take Greenhill when they already had∠so many troops committed to Two River."},{"id":1011100673,"text":"They apparently captured Greenhill with a mere 5,000 men."},{"id":1011100674,"text":"Hold up, this is a joke, right?! Greenhill's gotta have∠at least 7,000 soldiers of its own...∨You're sayin' they couldn't fight off a force of only 5,000?"},{"id":1011100675,"text":"I have no idea what tactics they used, but they must have∠been brilliant...∨Their commander has apparently succeeded Solon Jhee as∠leader of Highland's 4th Army, which means we have yet∠another foe we cannot take lightly."},{"id":1011100676,"text":"So what's the plan? We can't just sit back and watch."},{"id":1011100677,"text":"Even with the help of the Two River forces, the∠♂② Army doesn't have enough manpower to∠retake Greenhill yet, unfortunately."},{"id":1011100678,"text":"So we're just giving up?"},{"id":1011100679,"text":"It appears we have to. However, we will at least get Teresa,∠the acting mayor of Greenhill, to safety."},{"id":1011100680,"text":"Teresa? When did a pragmatist like you start takin' risks∠for highborn ladies?"},{"id":1011100681,"text":"The true mayor of Greenhill, Alec Wisemail, has been∠seriously ill for many years. Therefore, it is Teresa who∠has been handling the city's affairs in his stead.∨In this capacity, she has gained immense popularity, and∠has become something of an icon among Greenhill's∠citizens.∨If we can get Teresa out of Greenhill, we can expect the∠cooperation of the populace when the time comes to retake∠the city.∨Likewise, it will simply create more problems for us if the∠Highland Army is able to keep her under their thumb."},{"id":1011100682,"text":"Got it, so this Teresa lady is in a bit of a hostage∠situation.∨So how exactly are we gonna get her out?"},{"id":1011100683,"text":"Greenhill is essentially a college town where students from∠lands all over the continent go to study. I can't imagine∠the Highland Army's occupation will stop that.∨So, the Commander and a few others will pose as students to∠infiltrate the city and smuggle Teresa out.∨As for how to get in...Fitcher, I'll leave that to you."},{"id":1011100684,"text":"What?! M-Me, sir?∨W-Well, I suppose it's possible. I do have a lot of friends∠in Greenhill, so I'll work something out...∨Whew, you certainly are quite the taskmaster... You could at∠least let me get a little rest first..."},{"id":1011100685,"text":"Alright!!! Let's go get 'em!"},{"id":1011100686,"text":"Hold on, who said you could come?"},{"id":1011100687,"text":"...!!!"},{"id":1011100688,"text":"Aw man, not you too..."},{"id":1011100689,"text":"Hoo boy... Guess it doesn't matter how many come, since∠you'll all be playing the part of students.∨Also, having children like her along will give the soldiers∠less cause to suspect you."},{"id":1011100690,"text":"Flik, I want you to accompany the Commander."},{"id":1011100691,"text":"Me?"},{"id":1011100692,"text":"You will be their bodyguard...and for all outward∠appearances, their leader."},{"id":1011100693,"text":"Me, their leader?"},{"id":1011100694,"text":"Yay! It's Teacher Flik!!!"},{"id":1011100695,"text":"*sigh*∠Please don't call me that..."},{"id":1011100696,"text":"Now Commander ♂㈱, please select the rest of∠your party. However, please choose only those of an∠appropriate age for school.∨Also, once you enter Greenhill, you will not be able to∠change your roster, so please choose carefully."},{"id":1011100697,"text":"Okay then, I'll leave for Greenhill at once. I'll be waiting∠in front of the city gates after all the preparations are∠complete."},{"id":1011100698,"text":"Greenhill is north of Two River, Commander ♂㈱.∠Please be careful."},{"id":1011101069,"text":"Yay, you did it! That's our Commander!"},{"id":1011101070,"text":"Nice job, ♂㈱! You're really terrific, heheh!"},{"id":1011101071,"text":"You beat those Highland bums!"},{"id":1011101072,"text":"!!!"},{"id":1011101073,"text":"Great job, ♂㈱! Great job!!!"},{"id":1011101074,"text":"Pilika, sweetie, we won. ♂㈱ won for us."},{"id":1011101075,"text":"♂㈱! Wh-What's wrong?!"},{"id":1011101076,"text":"♂㈱! Hey, ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1011101077,"text":"Let me take a look."},{"id":1011101078,"text":"Whew, he's okay. It looks like he just fainted. He must be∠exhausted. Carry him to his room."},{"id":1011101079,"text":"Okay, Bolgan do it."},{"id":1011101081,"text":"Good morning, Commander ♂㈱. Are you feeling∠better?∨We may have defeated Luca Blight, but we can't relax yet.∠Please be on guard."},{"id":1011101082,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. Feeling better? A lot has happened∠recently, so it's good to rest up while you can."},{"id":1011101083,"text":"Ya gave us quite the scare back there, ♂㈱.∠Nanami and Eilie turned white as ghosts when ya keeled over."},{"id":1011101084,"text":"Good morning, Commander. It was your power that allowed∠us to defeat Luca Blight. I'm afraid I haven't been of any help∠yet..."},{"id":1011101085,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you displayed great prowess in∠the last battle. I am deeply impressed.∨I would like to raise my son to be as brave as you."},{"id":1011101089,"text":"C-Culgan!!!"},{"id":1011101090,"text":"Damn! Get away from ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":1011101091,"text":"You misunderstand. I've come to negotiate a peace agreement,∠that is all."},{"id":1011101092,"text":"A peace agreement?"},{"id":1011101093,"text":"Yes, Luca Blight is no more, and the current King of∠Highland, Jowy Blight, wishes only to end this terrible∠war."},{"id":1011101094,"text":"Did you say that Jowy has become King of Highland?"},{"id":1011101095,"text":"We seek a peace treaty between the Highland Kingdom and∠the City-States of Jowston.∨While such an agreement should be signed with the mayor∠of Muse as it is the capital of your alliance, this is not∠possible now.∨It is for this reason that I formally request Commander∠♂㈱ and Lady Teresa, the acting mayor of∠Greenhill, join us in Muse."},{"id":1011101096,"text":"This is a letter from His Grace, Jowy Blight. Please accept∠it in good faith."},{"id":1011101097,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, His Grace longs only for peace.∠Please, come to Muse City. Now then, I bid you farewell."},{"id":1011101098,"text":"Come to Muse to sign a peace treaty, eh... What do you guys∠think?"},{"id":1011101099,"text":"A trap is certainly not out of the question."},{"id":1011101100,"text":"H-Hey, Jowy isn't like that."},{"id":1011101101,"text":"This is a great opportunity if the offer is genuine. The∠loss of Luca Blight has weakened Highland, so we may even∠be able to sign a treaty with very favorable terms."},{"id":1011101102,"text":"But what if this is a trap and we lose the Commander? What∠will become of us then?!∨First of all, I have no faith in the ability of Highlanders∠to hold true to their word!∨Do not forget that this entire war started when they broke∠the previous armistice!∨With Luca Blight gone, we can take Muse and Greenhill back∠from Highland by force!!!"},{"id":1011101103,"text":"Everyone, calm down. Why don't we ask Commander∠♂㈱ his opinion?"},{"id":1011101104,"text":"Commander, if you say you're going to Muse, then I will∠follow your lead. Please decide."},{"id":1011101105,"text":"I'm going to Muse."},{"id":1011101107,"text":"It seems you are still undecided. Well, we have time, so∠please think it over carefully."},{"id":1011101108,"text":"Have you reached a decision?"},{"id":1011101109,"text":"Very well, Commander, as acting mayor of Greenhill, I shall∠accompany you. Let us depart for Muse at once."},{"id":1011101110,"text":".....∨Please bring Chaco here. He may be of some help in a worst∠case scenario."},{"id":1011101111,"text":"Okay, let's go!!!"},{"id":1011101112,"text":"Well then, safe journey, Commander."},{"id":1011101114,"text":"Good luck, ♂㈱. Good luck."},{"id":1011101115,"text":"Don't you worry about a thing. ♂㈱ here has the∠bravest warrior in the Winged Horde with him. Just leave∠everything to me.∨Haha, right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011101116,"text":"Hmph... I'm here too, y'know."},{"id":1011101117,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, to reach Muse we must first∠take a boat to Coronet Town on the north shore."},{"id":1011101119,"text":"Viktor, Flik... I have a favor to ask."},{"id":1011101120,"text":"...Lemme guess, it's somethin' awful."},{"id":1011101121,"text":"Yes, well, such things are my job."},{"id":1011101122,"text":"Okay, Commander, we're here.∨Just like Shu said, there weren't many soldiers east of∠Muse, but it was still dangerous.∨Well, I'm gonna go settle in. I could use a nice, long bath."},{"id":1011101123,"text":"I'm hungry."},{"id":1011101131,"text":"Remember, Jowy Blight has Leon Silverberg as his strategist.∠You mustn't let your guard down."},{"id":1011101190,"text":"The Tinto forces plus the remnants of the Muse Army that∠Jess organized number about 7,000 men."},{"id":1011101203,"text":"What?! That stinks! Guess you wanna hog all the glory for∠yourself, huh?!"},{"id":1011101234,"text":"This won't do at all. Tighten our security measures at once.∨Commander ♂㈱, preparations are complete for∠the liberation of Greenhill. Our forces will be divided∠in two this time.∨General Hauser, Viktor and Flik will go to the∠Muse-Greenhill border to slow down any enemy forces∠coming from Muse.∨Meanwhile, General Kiba and Klaus will attack and liberate∠Greenhill.∨Apple will stay here and coordinate communications∠between the two armies.∨If you're ready, Commander, give the order to deploy."},{"id":1011101249,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, last night must have been awful∠for you."},{"id":1011101250,"text":"Then I shall accompany General Kiba. Apple, you stay here∠with Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101251,"text":"Understood."},{"id":1011101252,"text":"It gets pretty lonely around here with everyone gone, huh?"},{"id":1011101253,"text":"♂㈱, reports from the battlefield will be∠arriving soon. Please stay here and wait for them."},{"id":1011101254,"text":"Report! General Hauser has encountered hostile forces from∠Muse."},{"id":1011101255,"text":"Report! The army from Muse appears to be led by King Jowy∠Blight along with Generals Culgan and Seed.∨They have already engaged General Hauser's troops."},{"id":1011101256,"text":"Don't pursue too far. We've got to buy time."},{"id":1011101257,"text":"Crush them!"},{"id":1011101258,"text":"What should we do, Apple?"},{"id":1011101259,"text":"Understood."},{"id":1011101260,"text":"Jowy..."},{"id":1011101261,"text":"General Hauser's men will stand their ground, and prevent∠the enemy's reinforcements from reaching Greenhill."},{"id":1011101262,"text":"♂㈱! Do you not remember the plan?"},{"id":1011101263,"text":"Yeah, yeah! What if Jowy gets hurt?"},{"id":1011101264,"text":"That's not what I meant."},{"id":1011101265,"text":"Understood..."},{"id":1011101266,"text":"Do you mean to put everyone's lives in danger?"},{"id":1011101267,"text":"General Hauser's part in this is to prevent Highland∠reinforcements from reaching Greenhill. If the enemy∠advances, fall back. If they retreat, push them hard and∠buy some more time."},{"id":1011101269,"text":"Report! General Kiba's unit has engaged the Highland defense∠forces."},{"id":1011101270,"text":"Proceed with caution..."},{"id":1011101271,"text":"What are you waiting for? Take them out now!"},{"id":1011101273,"text":"General Hauser is holding back the reinforcements, so∠there's no reason to be impatient."},{"id":1011101274,"text":"The battle has only just begun. Let's not overextend∠ourselves without first knowing what we're up against."},{"id":1011101275,"text":"♂㈱!"},{"id":1011101276,"text":"Yeah, yeah! Get 'em!!!"},{"id":1011101279,"text":"Well, I guess they'll be okay if Shu is with them..."},{"id":1011101280,"text":"We need to figure out the enemy, so it's best to exercise∠caution here. Shu is with them, though, so they should be ∠all right."},{"id":1011101282,"text":"Report! I have word from General Hauser's unit. Highland has∠deployed new units, which continue to fall back and seem to∠have no intention of fighting.∨We await your orders."},{"id":1011101283,"text":"Don't take the bait."},{"id":1011101284,"text":"Attack!!!"},{"id":1011101286,"text":"Aye, sir!"},{"id":1011101287,"text":"Hmm... They might be planning something. We are up against∠Jowy Blight, after all."},{"id":1011101289,"text":"Wait a moment, ♂㈱. ∠The enemy might be planning something. ∠We should proceed with caution here."},{"id":1011101290,"text":"♂㈱! The purpose of General Hauser's unit is∠to stall the enemy. A reckless order will put soldiers'∠lives in danger."},{"id":1011101291,"text":"Understood..."},{"id":1011101293,"text":"♂㈱!!! War is not a game! Think of the soldiers∠you're giving these reckless orders to!"},{"id":1011101294,"text":"I see. Well then..."},{"id":1011101295,"text":"Understood..."},{"id":1011101296,"text":"It's strange, almost like the enemy is trying to buy time∠as well... The best move here is to leave this up to General∠Hauser's judgment."},{"id":1011101298,"text":"Report! I have word from Master Shu in General Kiba's unit:∨\"The enemy forces are being led by Yuber, general of∠Highland's 4th Army, and Lucia, chief of the Karaya Tribe.∠This battle is ours.\"∨That is all."},{"id":1011101299,"text":"Heh, that sounds like Shu, all right."},{"id":1011101300,"text":"Report! ∠General Hauser has turned away the Highland Army and∠prevented reinforcements from reaching Greenhill."},{"id":1011101301,"text":"I expected no less from General Hauser. Maybe you should∠have gone with him, ♂㈱. You could have learned∠a great deal from the experience."},{"id":1011101303,"text":"That's experience I don't need."},{"id":1011101304,"text":"100 lashes for Hauser."},{"id":1011101305,"text":"Indeed."},{"id":1011101306,"text":"Oh...∨I guess you're right... I'm sorry."},{"id":1011101307,"text":"The leader of an army must not say such things, even in∠jest!"},{"id":1011101308,"text":"Report! General Hauser's unit drove the Highland forces∠back, but Sir Viktor's unit gave chase and was surrounded.∨General Hauser himself led the charge to save them, but∠during the fray ♂④ was slain..."},{"id":1011101310,"text":"This is war. I don't intend to blame you for any deaths that∠occur as a part of it.∨It's just...regrettable I couldn't prevent them, that's all."},{"id":1011101311,"text":"Report! A message from Master Shu:∨\"The Highland army has retreated to Greenhill, please come∠at once, Commander ♂㈱.\"∨That is all."},{"id":1011101312,"text":"What could be happening there? ♂㈱, let's∠depart for Greenhill at once."},{"id":1011101313,"text":"♂㈱, where did you go at such an important time∠as this? That is no way for a leader to behave."},{"id":1011101314,"text":"Report! A message from Master Shu:∨\"The Highland army has withdrawn from Greenhill, please ∠come at once, Commander ♂㈱.\"∨That is all."},{"id":1011101469,"text":"Next, select the party members of the first unit. They will∠spearhead the attack."},{"id":1011101470,"text":"Finally, select the party members of the second unit. Their∠role will be to herd Luca towards your own unit."},{"id":1011101471,"text":"Now, please choose the rest of your party."},{"id":1011101472,"text":"A boat, huh? I did hear that Tai Ho was in this neck of the∠woods recently..."},{"id":1011101473,"text":"Hmm, yeah, we just need a guy with the right skills..."},{"id":1011101474,"text":"Commander, why not ask that man Amada from before?"},{"id":1011101475,"text":"P-Please, Commander ♂㈱. If I don't get back to∠Two River..."},{"id":1011101476,"text":"Perhaps you should check the nearby villages for someone∠with a boat. There's Kuskus to the east, or maybe Radat..."},{"id":1011101477,"text":"Finally decided to show up, huh?"},{"id":1011101478,"text":"Alright, let's hear this \"bad news.\""},{"id":1011101479,"text":"Good morning, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101480,"text":"*yawn* Did you sleep well last night?"},{"id":1011101481,"text":"Morning, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101482,"text":"*yawn*"},{"id":1011101483,"text":"Well, good luck out there, ♂㈱. You too, Flik."},{"id":1011101484,"text":"You can find Greenhill by going northwest from Two River."},{"id":1011101485,"text":"Be safe, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101486,"text":"Matilda, huh... Remember what happened during the battle∠for Muse."},{"id":1011101487,"text":"Well, let's give it all we got."},{"id":1011101488,"text":"You can reach Matilda via the forest path north of∠Greenhill."},{"id":1011101489,"text":"Commander, please take the forest path north of Greenhill∠to reach the domain of the Matilda Knights."},{"id":1011101490,"text":"Take good care, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101491,"text":"Gordeau is... Well, he is what he is."},{"id":1011101492,"text":"Don't get caught, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101493,"text":"Radat is east of South Window. Proceed with caution."},{"id":1011101494,"text":"Look after yourself, Commander."},{"id":1011101495,"text":"It seems we must fight again..."},{"id":1011101496,"text":"Wow, I'm at a real loss here. What now?"},{"id":1011101497,"text":"Well, we gotta do it."},{"id":1011101498,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, General Kiba's troops seem∠almost unbeatable..."},{"id":1011101499,"text":"We cannot afford to lose here..."},{"id":1011101500,"text":"We're really in trouble now..."},{"id":1011101501,"text":"Kiba... A worthy opponent indeed."},{"id":1011101502,"text":"Dammit..."},{"id":1011101503,"text":"But why would Ridley do that?"},{"id":1011101505,"text":"Why..."},{"id":1011101506,"text":"W-Well, it's okay. Everything will work out, Commander∠♂㈱."},{"id":1011101507,"text":"Please...go to your room and rest."},{"id":1011101509,"text":"Blast! We could've won too..."},{"id":1011101510,"text":"I can't believe it. Not General Ridley..."},{"id":1011101511,"text":"But how did..."},{"id":1011101512,"text":"We have to win this time."},{"id":1011101513,"text":"This is gonna be one hell of a fight."},{"id":1011101514,"text":"Let's put our faith in Shu, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101515,"text":"What will become of our alliance if we fail?"},{"id":1011101516,"text":"C-Come on, Commander, we fight on."},{"id":1011101518,"text":"On my honor as a knight, I shall fight as long as there is∠breath in my body."},{"id":1011101519,"text":"Let victory be ours this day, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101520,"text":"We're gonna fight with everything we got too."},{"id":1011101521,"text":"Worrying never helps anything, after all."},{"id":1011101522,"text":"You can trust the Toran Republic. I give you my word."},{"id":1011101523,"text":"The president of the Toran Republic, Lepant, is a good man."},{"id":1011101524,"text":"Commander, I'm in favor of forming an alliance."},{"id":1011101525,"text":"The Toran Republic... I wonder what's it like there."},{"id":1011101526,"text":"It may not go as easy as we think..."},{"id":1011101527,"text":"The more friends the better, I always say."},{"id":1011101528,"text":"I'm against an alliance with them. Their name may have∠changed, but they're still the Scarlet Moon Empire."},{"id":1011101529,"text":"I-I still have my misgivings..."},{"id":1011101530,"text":"Don't be so on edge, it'll be fine, I tell ya."},{"id":1011101533,"text":"Commander, you can reach Toran by boat from Radat Town."},{"id":1011101535,"text":"All we can do is leave this in your capable hands and await∠your return."},{"id":1011101536,"text":"Best of luck to ya, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101537,"text":"Allies with the Scarlet Moon Empire? Pshaw..."},{"id":1011101538,"text":"Radat is east of South Window, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101539,"text":"Hurry it up, ♂㈱."},{"id":1011101540,"text":"Aw man, not Ridley..."},{"id":1011101541,"text":"Commander, if we don't act quickly, General Ridley will..."},{"id":1011101544,"text":"So we're up against Luca Blight..."},{"id":1011101545,"text":"Facing Lord Luca, are we..."},{"id":1011101546,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, time is of the essence."},{"id":1011101547,"text":"Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011101548,"text":"Looks like it's do or die."},{"id":1011101549,"text":"Well, victory is just a matter of lucky timing..."},{"id":1011101551,"text":"Luca Blight is a terrifying foe, but if we falter now, there∠will be no tomorrow for us."},{"id":1011101552,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, is everything okay?"},{"id":1011101553,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, our vengeance is at hand!"},{"id":1011101554,"text":"Lord Luca..."},{"id":1011101555,"text":"The extent of Lord Luca's power is unfathomable. I know∠not..."},{"id":1011101556,"text":"I'll fight with all my strength, Commander."},{"id":1011101557,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I will do Toran proud with my∠actions on the battlefield."},{"id":1011101558,"text":"Hey, just leave him to me."},{"id":1011101559,"text":"What is it, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011101560,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1011101561,"text":"We're out of schemes..."},{"id":1011101562,"text":"Commander ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011101563,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... We lack the numbers to battle∠Luca Blight..."},{"id":1011101565,"text":"Is there nothing we can do?"},{"id":1011101567,"text":"What do we do, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011101568,"text":"♂㈱, I know, it's Jowy, but..."},{"id":1011101571,"text":"I wouldn't put my trust in a treaty with them..."},{"id":1011101572,"text":"Jowy... I'll just wait..."},{"id":1011150041,"text":"Do what you want...◎2 Time...it changes people's hearts.∠It'll change yours too. You'll understand someday."},{"id":1011150042,"text":"No! That will never happen!!!"},{"id":1011150043,"text":"Okay... Well, be seeing you."},{"id":1011150044,"text":"Time changes people's hearts, huh?"},{"id":1011150045,"text":"Yes, thank you, Commander, I'm okay now."},{"id":1011150047,"text":""},{"id":1011150049,"text":"Screee..."},{"id":1011150050,"text":""},{"id":1011150053,"text":""},{"id":1011150058,"text":"Screeeeee!!!"},{"id":1011161070,"text":"Bwa! How did I end up here?"},{"id":1011170119,"text":"Huh? What the? Where am I?"},{"id":1011170131,"text":"Now this is a real problem... Arf."},{"id":1011180013,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. ∠Wanna rope climb for a while?"},{"id":1011180015,"text":"☆0∠         Laundry Basket"},{"id":1011180019,"text":"☆0∠            Laundry Tub"},{"id":1011180021,"text":"☆0∠             Water Pail∠    Do they carry water up from below with this?"},{"id":1011180026,"text":"That Kasumi, I think she's still got a thing for∠♂⑩..."},{"id":1011180031,"text":"Hey, that Teresa sure is a fine lady. If it weren't for that∠Shin guy, I'd...◎4∨...◎1Sorry, ♂㈱. I thought maybe I could take∠your mind off Nanami for a bit...∨Looks like I failed though..."},{"id":1011180032,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱... Are you okay?"},{"id":1011180034,"text":"...Hmph, enough with the moping already. You're a man,∠right?◎2 Psh."},{"id":1011180036,"text":"Anita is kinda like Valeria. No, run faster than the wind. That's my∠goal in life."},{"id":1011190006,"text":"Mumuuu..."},{"id":1011190007,"text":"Oh! What a little cutie! I'll raise it up big and strong."},{"id":1011190008,"text":"I'm counting on it."},{"id":1011190009,"text":"No, don't worry about it."},{"id":1011190010,"text":"Yeah, I'll take real good care of 'em. Don't you worry!"},{"id":1011190011,"text":"Aww... Well, maybe later then."},{"id":1011190012,"text":"Yeah, They're all doin' fine."},{"id":1011190013,"text":"Commander, did ya bring some seedlings for the garden?"},{"id":1011190015,"text":"No, I didn't"},{"id":1011190016,"text":"Leave it to me. I'll make sure they grow nice and big."},{"id":1011190017,"text":"Oh, okay? Well, I'm not goin' anywhere, so come on back if∠ya got somethin' ya want me to plant."},{"id":1011190018,"text":"I love to play here. It's so nice and open."},{"id":1011190019,"text":"Hohohoho, with the wide open sky and the lake, I reckon this∠here is the most beautiful place in all the City-States."},{"id":1011190020,"text":"Hurray!!! Yuzu said I could ride on a sheep next time!!!"},{"id":1011190024,"text":"I gotta go find Grandpa..."},{"id":1011190025,"text":"I'll stay here and tend the fields as long as you'll have∠me, Commander."},{"id":1011190030,"text":"♂㈱... It makes me sad to sell the critters∠I raise, but that's just life.∨Can't have life without death. That's what my Grandpa said.∠Do you get it?"},{"id":1011190031,"text":"When I'm diggin' in the dirt like this all the sad stuff and∠bad stuff that's buggin' me just fades away. Wanna give it∠a shot?"},{"id":1011190052,"text":"Have no fear, ♂㈱. If the going gets too rough,∠I'll use these fast feet of mine to whisk you guys right out∠of harm's way."},{"id":1011190054,"text":"Aww, my favorite place to play is all crowded now..."},{"id":1011190056,"text":"When's Yuzu gonna let me ride the sheep?
