I'm not sure how I feel about that though..."},{"id":1011190061,"text":"Those sheep are so noisy..."},{"id":1011190062,"text":"Yuzu..."},{"id":1011190066,"text":"Mr. Tony said he'll give us all tomatoes when they get big.∠I can't wait! I can't wait!"},{"id":1011190068,"text":"When is Yuzu gonna let me ride that sheep?"},{"id":1011190072,"text":"Though I had heard the rumors, I didn't think I'd actually∠find you here, Hai Yo!"},{"id":1011190073,"text":"Wh-What the... Who are you anyway?"},{"id":1011190074,"text":"My name is Yu Kum, and I am traveling the world on a quest∠of culinary mastery!∨Hai Yo, I challenge you to a cooking contest! And no contest∠is complete without risk! Thus, I wager my family's recipe!∠Do you accept?"},{"id":1011190075,"text":"What should I do, Commander?"},{"id":1011190076,"text":"Good luck, Hai Yo!"},{"id":1011190078,"text":"Where did you go? What should I do?"},{"id":1011190079,"text":"I would expect no less from the leader of the ∠♂② Army! Now, Hai Yo, let the contest begin!!!"},{"id":1011190080,"text":"Guess I've got no choice..."},{"id":1011190081,"text":"Hmm, your reputation is well deserved, Hai Yo. You're as∠great a chef as they say."},{"id":1011190082,"text":"Here, this is my family recipe. You beat me fair and square,∠so it's yours now."},{"id":1011190083,"text":"You received the Tomato Soup Recipe."},{"id":1011190084,"text":"Thank you!"},{"id":1011190085,"text":"Farewell, Hai Yo! I look forward to the day we meet again!∠Hahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1011190086,"text":"Hahahahaha! Is the best you can do, Hai Yo? In that case,∠farewell! Hahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1011190087,"text":"Damn... I hate losing!"},{"id":1011190088,"text":"I am Goetsu, a student of the path of epicurean∠enlightenment. I heard the esteemed Hai Yo was here, and∠thus I now stand before you."},{"id":1011190089,"text":"Esteemed? I don't think I'm esteemed."},{"id":1011190090,"text":"Do not be so modest. Please, allow me to face you in a∠contest of culinary skill."},{"id":1011190091,"text":"What should I do, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011190092,"text":"Don't lose, Hai Yo!"},{"id":1011190094,"text":"Where did you go? Hurry up and decide!"},{"id":1011190095,"text":"I am honored. Now, Hai Yo, let the contest begin!"},{"id":1011190096,"text":"Your reputation is well deserved, Hai Yo! I am defeated."},{"id":1011190097,"text":"That's not true. Your cooking was terrific!"},{"id":1011190098,"text":"Not at all. The victory was yours all along. Please, take∠this as promised."},{"id":1011190099,"text":"You received the Buttered Clams Recipe."},{"id":1011190100,"text":"Well, goodbye. I hope that our paths cross again!"},{"id":1011190101,"text":"You are a worthy opponent indeed, Hai Yo, to give I, Goetsu,∠such a hard-fought battle..."},{"id":1011190102,"text":"No, you were very good too."},{"id":1011190104,"text":"Eheheheheheheh..."},{"id":1011190105,"text":"What? You want to have a cooking contest too?"},{"id":1011190106,"text":"A contest? Yes...I suppose that will do. Hai Yo... Defeat me∠and this cake recipe is yours..."},{"id":1011190107,"text":"What should I do, Commander?"},{"id":1011190108,"text":"Just a minute."},{"id":1011190109,"text":"Show him how good you are."},{"id":1011190111,"text":"Okay! A contest it is!"},{"id":1011190113,"text":"Hehehehehe..."},{"id":1011190114,"text":"What's so funny?!"},{"id":1011190115,"text":"Hey, something isn't right! Grab him!"},{"id":1011190116,"text":"N-No... N-No, don't do it!!!"},{"id":1011190117,"text":"Hehehe... Hiding here...won't help you...Hai Yo. The Clan∠has...already... Urk..."},{"id":1011190118,"text":"He...poisoned himself."},{"id":1011190119,"text":"But just who the hell was he? And what's this \"Clan\"?"},{"id":1011190120,"text":"What was that all about, Hai Yo?"},{"id":1011190123,"text":"Hehehehe, so this is where you've been hiding..."},{"id":1011190124,"text":"What do you mean? Wait... No way!"},{"id":1011190125,"text":"Bwahahaha! Consider this a warning!∨Mark my words! The Clan will never forgive you! Hahahaha!"},{"id":1011190126,"text":"Wh-Who the hell was that? And what's this \"Clan\"?"},{"id":1011190130,"text":"Hey, what did you do? What did you do to Barbara?"},{"id":1011190131,"text":"Hahaha! That is Sleeping Maiden, a poison extracted from∠10 species of spiders found only in the Nameless Lands north∠of Zexen.∨If she doesn't receive the antidote within 30 minutes, she∠will die! Now, Hai Yo, return that which you stole from us!"},{"id":1011190132,"text":"Ur... I-I can't do that!"},{"id":1011190133,"text":"What are you saying, Hai Yo?! Barbara's life is in danger!!!"},{"id":1011190134,"text":"Ohhhh, I know, but I-I just can't!"},{"id":1011190135,"text":"Finding it difficult to part with, are you? Very well, here's∠what we will do—you and I will face each other in a contest!∨Win and the antidote is yours. I will also give you a recipe∠in accordance with Clan rules.∨But if I should win...you must give me that which I ask for!∠Do you accept the challenge?"},{"id":1011190136,"text":"Ulp... What should I do, Commander?"},{"id":1011190137,"text":"Don't move!"},{"id":1011190138,"text":"Help Barbara, Hai Yo!"},{"id":1011190139,"text":"Where did you go? We have to hurry!"},{"id":1011190140,"text":"Where did you go, ♂㈱?! Damn! Barbara!∠BARBARA!!!"},{"id":1011190141,"text":"Oh no... It's my fault! It's all my fault!"},{"id":1011190142,"text":"Okay, I'll do it. I accept your challenge, Ryuki!"},{"id":1011190143,"text":"Well said, Hai Yo! By the code of the Black Dragon Clan,∠let this contest begin!"},{"id":1011190144,"text":"W-Well done, Hai Yo... I see now why you were made one of∠the Four Lords of the Black Dragon Cooking Clan."},{"id":1011190146,"text":"Urgh, now, as promised..."},{"id":1011190147,"text":"You received the poison antidote."},{"id":1011190148,"text":"You received the Pasta Recipe."},{"id":1011190149,"text":"You may have beaten me, but remember this! Until you∠return that which you took, the Clan will hunt you to∠the ends of the world!"},{"id":1011190150,"text":"Ah!!!"},{"id":1011190151,"text":"He...he took his own life. But what did he mean \"hunt\"?"},{"id":1011190152,"text":"I...am fully prepared for that."},{"id":1011190153,"text":"Hahahahaha! You lose, Hai Yo! Now hand over what I seek, as∠you swore you would!"},{"id":1011190154,"text":"Ulp... I've got no choice..."},{"id":1011190155,"text":"You gave him what he wanted."},{"id":1011190156,"text":"Hahahahaha! Now that I've got this, my business∠with you is finished! Farewell!"},{"id":1011190157,"text":"Stop!!! We can't let you leave!!!"},{"id":1011190158,"text":"Oh, yes... The antidote, eh? Well, I got what I came for, so∠here, take it."},{"id":1011190159,"text":"You received the antidote."},{"id":1011190160,"text":"Farewell, Hai Yo! Hahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1011190161,"text":"Hey, is that you, Bashok? How have you been?"},{"id":1011190162,"text":"...Hai Yo."},{"id":1011190163,"text":"What's wrong? You seem unhappy."},{"id":1011190164,"text":"Hai Yo... I want to have a cook-off with you."},{"id":1011190165,"text":"Bashok... What are you saying?"},{"id":1011190166,"text":"Hai Yo! I challenge you to a cook-off! I want that which you∠stole...the Moon Bird Recipe!!!"},{"id":1011190167,"text":"B-But why?! You and I are friends!∠♂㈱, what should I do?"},{"id":1011190168,"text":"Accept the challenge!"},{"id":1011190170,"text":"Hey, where are you going?"},{"id":1011190171,"text":"Commander, where did you go? Hurry and∠decide!"},{"id":1011190172,"text":"Oh, okay. I'll do it."},{"id":1011190173,"text":"Urk, as I thought, I am no match for you..."},{"id":1011190174,"text":"Why, Bashok? Why are you acting as an agent for the Clan?"},{"id":1011190175,"text":"F-Forgive me, Hai Yo. My daughter, Mamie... She's terribly,∠terribly ill. I need money for the doctors.∨It is much more than I could ever earn in my lifetime.∠So you see, I had no choice...∨The Black Dragon Clan said they would give me the money∠if I recovered the Moon Bird Recipe..."},{"id":1011190176,"text":"Bashok..."},{"id":1011190177,"text":"Hahaha, what a fool you are! You actually believed me?"},{"id":1011190178,"text":"Y-You're that woman from before!"},{"id":1011190179,"text":"Gyokuran! So it was you..."},{"id":1011190180,"text":"Haha, don't be angry, Hai Yo. I thought you would be happy∠to see one of your fellow Four Lords of the Black Dragon∠Clan."},{"id":1011190181,"text":"Y-You're the one who—"},{"id":1011190182,"text":"Do not presume to speak with me, you useless oaf! The fate∠of your daughter means nothing to me!"},{"id":1011190183,"text":"D-Damn you..."},{"id":1011190184,"text":"Be seeing you, Hai Yo! I just stopped by to say hello today,∠but next time you're mine, hahahahahaha!"},{"id":1011190186,"text":"I am sorry, Hai Yo. I was a fool. Even to save my daughter,∠I should never have done such a thing to my dear friend..."},{"id":1011190187,"text":"I forgive you. But what about your daughter?"},{"id":1011190188,"text":"Don't worry, Hai Yo. I'll figure something out. Mamie∠wouldn't be happy if I used dirty money to help her.∨So, do not concern yourself with me. Instead, please watch∠out for yourself. The Clan is deadly serious."},{"id":1011190189,"text":"I'm not afraid. I've got lots of wonderful friends here!"},{"id":1011190190,"text":"Yes, I can see that. Anyway, please take this, Hai Yo. I∠hope it will be of some use to you."},{"id":1011190191,"text":"You received the Fried Rice Recipe."},{"id":1011190192,"text":"Well, goodbye, Hai Yo!"},{"id":1011190193,"text":"I-I am sorry... What I do, I do for Mamie, my daughter.∠Forgive me, Hai Yo..."},{"id":1011190194,"text":"You lost the Moon Bird Recipe."},{"id":1011190195,"text":"Oh no, Bashok... Don't do that!"},{"id":1011190196,"text":"I want him now! Bring that little sneak, Hai Yo, here right∠now!!!"},{"id":1011190197,"text":"Who are you?"},{"id":1011190198,"text":"Are you Hai Yo?! I challenge you!!!"},{"id":1011190199,"text":"Why? Who are you anyway?"},{"id":1011190200,"text":"Shut your mouth! I'm here to take revenge for my older∠brother, Ryuki!"},{"id":1011190201,"text":"Oh no... What should I do, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011190202,"text":"Hey, calm down, okay?"},{"id":1011190203,"text":"Send him packing, Hai Yo!"},{"id":1011190204,"text":"That's awful! How can you leave me like this?"},{"id":1011190205,"text":"I would expect no less from you, ♂㈱!∠Okay, let's begin!!!"},{"id":1011190206,"text":"Grrr... I see now why my brother couldn't defeat you. I-I...∠I suppose I never even stood a chance..."},{"id":1011190207,"text":"Wait! This is stupid! Don't throw your life away!"},{"id":1011190208,"text":"Bah! M-My brother and I were both born into the Black∠Dragon Clan and raised within it.∨There is nowhere for us to go."},{"id":1011190209,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... I'm sorry. He took his own∠life..."},{"id":1011190210,"text":"No... Why? Why?!"},{"id":1011190211,"text":"And...he dropped this."},{"id":1011190212,"text":"You received the Gratin Recipe."},{"id":1011190213,"text":"Shun Min, why must I still fight?!"},{"id":1011190214,"text":"I won't do it! I won't cook ever again!"},{"id":1011190215,"text":"I did it! I won!!! I defeated someone my brother couldn't∠beat!"},{"id":1011190216,"text":"O-Oh no..."},{"id":1011190217,"text":"Keep your promise! Give me the Moon Bird Recipe!!!"},{"id":1011190219,"text":"Well, this is goodbye, Hai Yo! Hahahahahaha!"},{"id":1011190220,"text":"I'm sorry! Forgive me! I couldn't keep my promise, Shun Min!"},{"id":1011190221,"text":"Hai Yo, get a hold of yourself. You've got to make a new∠menu or this restaurant is done for..."},{"id":1011190222,"text":"That's right, Hai Yo. I don't know what happened, but we're∠all counting on you."},{"id":1011190223,"text":"No! I can't cook after something like that happened!"},{"id":1011190224,"text":"D-Don't say such things..."},{"id":1011190225,"text":"I'm giving up cooking!!!"},{"id":1011190226,"text":"Hahahahaha! Such whimpering suggests you lack seasoning,∠Hai Yo!"},{"id":1011190227,"text":"I drop in to see my old friend after all this time, only to∠hear you say you're quitting cooking?"},{"id":1011190228,"text":"If you're going to call it quits over something like this,∠then you are nothing but a novice!"},{"id":1011190229,"text":"It's no good! I don't care about the Moon Bird Recipe∠anymore!"},{"id":1011190230,"text":"Nonsense, Hai Yo! What of Shun Min, who risked her life∠to steal that recipe away before placing it in your care?∨Think of her, and why she chose you to safeguard it! Surely∠you are not so blind as to miss the meaning behind this?"},{"id":1011190231,"text":"Shun Min..."},{"id":1011190232,"text":"Come, Hai Yo! Face me in a duel of kitchen skills! Commander∠♂㈱, if you would be so kind as to lend us your∠castle!"},{"id":1011190233,"text":"Um, wait just a minute."},{"id":1011190234,"text":"Yes, of course."},{"id":1011190235,"text":"May we proceed, Commander?"},{"id":1011190236,"text":"Well, Hai Yo? Do you still intend to forsake cooking?"},{"id":1011190237,"text":"Antonio! That was the most fun I've ever had in a cook-off!∨I was wrong! No matter how hard it gets, I'll defend the∠Moon Bird Recipe!"},{"id":1011190238,"text":"Well said, my friend! That's the Great Chef Hai Yo that∠I know and respect!"},{"id":1011190239,"text":"How disappointing! I thought for sure you'd be a blubbering∠mess, hardly capable of lifting a ladle in defiance, but here∠I find you back to your old self. I underestimated you."},{"id":1011190240,"text":"Wh-What do you mean, Gyokuran?! Wait, those brothers... ∠You did that?"},{"id":1011190241,"text":"Yeah, well, I thought maybe I'd get some results if I told∠them they're dead to us if they didn't beat you, and look∠what happened...∨Hahaha, I came THIS close to getting you to hand over the∠Moon Bird Recipe yourself. Oh well."},{"id":1011190242,"text":"Th-That's too much, Gyokuran! Face me in a cook-off,∠right here, right now!"},{"id":1011190243,"text":"Hehehe, as you wish. I accept your challenge. But I'm not∠quite prepared today, so I'll see you next time.∨Until then, you had best study your cookbooks carefully."},{"id":1011190244,"text":"That will be a hard battle, Hai Yo."},{"id":1011190245,"text":"You're right! But don't worry! I won't fail!!!"},{"id":1011190246,"text":"That's the spirit! Hai Yo, I want you to have this."},{"id":1011190247,"text":"You received the Ramen Recipe."},{"id":1011190248,"text":"Best of luck to you, Hai Yo!"},{"id":1011190250,"text":"So, the day has come. Knowing it was on the way doesn't make∠it any easier! Ai ya!"},{"id":1011190251,"text":"Bah! It makes me sick to think a grubby rat like you was∠once a fellow member of the Four Lords!"},{"id":1011190252,"text":"But why, Gyokuran? You're one of the Four Lords, so you have∠to know what the Moon Bird Recipe is, right?"},{"id":1011190253,"text":"Of course I do, Hai Yo. And I know Lord Jinkai's intentions∠for it too."},{"id":1011190254,"text":"Th-Then why?"},{"id":1011190255,"text":"Silence!!! Enough of this prattle! It's time for the∠cook-off! You and I have no other business than that!"},{"id":1011190256,"text":"U-Ulp..."},{"id":1011190257,"text":"Hey, wait a minute."},{"id":1011190258,"text":"Give it your all, Hai Yo."},{"id":1011190259,"text":"H-Hey... Where are you going?"},{"id":1011190260,"text":"Are you ready yet, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1011190261,"text":"Ulp, I guess I've got no choice."},{"id":1011190262,"text":"Hai Yo! This is bad! Your recipes! They've been stolen!!!"},{"id":1011190263,"text":"What?! What do you mean?!"},{"id":1011190264,"text":"Hehehehe...∨Prepare yourself, for you face Gyokuran, or as you know me,∠Suzaku of the Black Dragon Clan! Now, to the kitchen with∠you!"},{"id":1011190265,"text":"How could you stoop to stealing my recipes?!"},{"id":1011190266,"text":"Gah! Now Lord Jinkai's \"Dragon Plan\" will fail...∨Why?! Why, Hai Yo? Why were you able to win without your∠recipes?"},{"id":1011190268,"text":"I-I don't understand! Our techniques were equal! How did∠you..."},{"id":1011190269,"text":"You're wrong, Gyokuran! Cooking is about more than just∠technique!"},{"id":1011190270,"text":"Wh-What do you mean?"},{"id":1011190271,"text":"When I first came here, I was only looking for a place to∠hide out for a bit. But after I started cooking for these∠nice people, I realized something.∨I realized that I could help these brave folk by serving∠them good food...that I could ease their burdens just a∠little bit.∨Cooking isn't about technique! It's about caring and∠giving! That's why I can make do without my recipes!!!"},{"id":1011190273,"text":"I... It seems I forgot the most important part of cooking...∠Something a chef must always remember..."},{"id":1011190274,"text":"Where are you going?"},{"id":1011190275,"text":"Now that I've lost, I can no longer go back to the Clan.∠I'll wander these lands and ponder my defeat.∨Yes, I think that is fitting. A journey to relearn my trade.∠Forgive me, Hai Yo. Here, take back your recipes."},{"id":1011190276,"text":"I'll leave this with you as well... It's all I can offer∠you, my former comrade-in-training."},{"id":1011190277,"text":"You received the Fried Pork Cutlet Recipe."},{"id":1011190278,"text":"Gyokuran..."},{"id":1011190279,"text":"Hah! The contest is decided, and now the recipe is mine!!!"},{"id":1011190281,"text":"Hahahahaha! Lord Jinkai's Dragon Plan is complete!!!∠Hahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1011190282,"text":"Nooo..."},{"id":1011190283,"text":"Hey! Is there no one here?"},{"id":1011190284,"text":"Y-Yes, sir, I'm terribly sorry. Are you here to eat?"},{"id":1011190285,"text":"No, I know the chef here. I want to see him. Tell him Retso∠is here."},{"id":1011190286,"text":"Oh, you're a friend of Hai Yo? Please wait a minute."},{"id":1011190287,"text":"Hey, hurry it up. You can't keep your friend waiting!"},{"id":1011190288,"text":"*pant* *pant* That was rough! I came running all the way∠from the garden!"},{"id":1011190289,"text":"It has been a while, Seiryu. Oh, I forgot, you call yourself∠\"Hai Yo\" these days."},{"id":1011190290,"text":"Retso..."},{"id":1011190291,"text":"I think you know the reason why I'm here."},{"id":1011190292,"text":"To challenge me...to a cook-off."},{"id":1011190293,"text":"Correct. There can be no debate between chefs such as you∠and I. For us, truth is only found on a plate, resolution,∠only on a dining table."},{"id":1011190294,"text":"I knew this day would come. I knew you and I would one day∠cross spatulas."},{"id":1011190295,"text":"Wait, I've got to get ready."},{"id":1011190296,"text":"He looks like a tough opponent, Hai Yo."},{"id":1011190297,"text":"Have you made your preparations?"},{"id":1011190298,"text":"I've always admired and respected him as a truly great∠chef..."},{"id":1011190299,"text":"Too bad, Hai Yo, but it seems that you're still no match∠for my cooking skills."},{"id":1011190301,"text":"W-Wait, Retso! You can't give the Moon Bird Recipe to∠Jinkai! Listen to what I have to say!"},{"id":1011190302,"text":"Why should I? You killed my daughter Shun Min and stole∠the secrets of the Black Dragon Cooking Clan for yourself! ∠I have no reason to listen to the likes of you!"},{"id":1011190303,"text":"N-No, you've got it wrong!"},{"id":1011190304,"text":"Bald-faced insolence. Spare me your idiocy. Not a single∠word that passes your lips bears even a grain of truth in∠my ears."},{"id":1011190305,"text":"Wait a second, mister! Why won't you at least listen to what∠Hai Yo has to say?!"},{"id":1011190306,"text":"That's right, why not?"},{"id":1011190307,"text":"Yeah, that's just plain rude! You've been accusing him∠without even giving him a chance to explain!"},{"id":1011190308,"text":"E-Everyone..."},{"id":1011190310,"text":"...Very well, Hai Yo. Speak quickly."},{"id":1011190311,"text":"R-Retso... Jinkai is planning to use that recipe to carry∠out a horrible plan!∨Shun Min... Shun Min learned of this and then, Jinkai, he...∠But, but before she died, she entrusted the recipe to me.∨She gave her life to stop him! That, that's why you∠mustn't—"},{"id":1011190312,"text":"No, Hai Yo. I don't believe that Jinkai is that kind of man."},{"id":1011190313,"text":"Retso..."},{"id":1011190314,"text":"But on the other hand, I don't think everything you say is∠a lie either.∨I'll give you a chance, Hai Yo. Before I return to Lord∠Jinkai, I'll come back here once more.∨Until then, Hai Yo, try and see if you can become a better∠chef than I!"},{"id":1011190315,"text":"A better chef than Retso? That's impossible..."},{"id":1011190316,"text":"I've got to beat Retso... But I don't know if I can."},{"id":1011190317,"text":"Don't worry, Hai Yo. I know that you can win next time,∠so cheer up."},{"id":1011190318,"text":"Hai Yo! Someone that looks like a chef is here to see you!"},{"id":1011190319,"text":"Huh? He's here so soon?! But I'm not ready!"},{"id":1011190320,"text":"Pardon me, but might you be Hai Yo?"},{"id":1011190321,"text":"Who are you? Were you sent by the Clan?"},{"id":1011190322,"text":"\"Clan\"? No, no, I was not. Antonio asked me to come here and∠help you hone your craft.∨My name is Lester. I once fought beside Antonio."},{"id":1011190323,"text":"You're a friend of Antonio? And you're here to help me∠train?"},{"id":1011190324,"text":"Correct, and I'd like to get to it straight away. But first,∠I must assess your abilities. And so...a cook-off it is."},{"id":1011190325,"text":"Um, hold on for a bit."},{"id":1011190326,"text":"Hai Yo, it's time to train!"},{"id":1011190327,"text":"So you're back, eh? Let's get started."},{"id":1011190328,"text":"Hahaha, I can see that Antonio taught you a great deal.∠You're very good."},{"id":1011190329,"text":"No, not at all! You were holding back!"},{"id":1011190330,"text":"Oh? And why do you say that?"},{"id":1011190331,"text":"It was obvious from the way you were moving!"},{"id":1011190332,"text":"Well then, do you remember how Retso moved as he cooked?"},{"id":1011190333,"text":"Wait...∨I-It couldn't be... I can't believe it!"},{"id":1011190334,"text":"And so you understand at last. Your eyes may be open, but∠you cannot see the truth if your heart is clouded.∨You are already more than strong enough to defeat Retso.∨This is a gift from my heart. I pray that it will be of use.∠Farewell then, my friend. Perhaps we may meet again."},{"id":1011190335,"text":"You received the Sushi Recipe."},{"id":1011190336,"text":"R-Retso couldn't have..."},{"id":1011190337,"text":"You really are a friend of Antonio. I have lost..."},{"id":1011190338,"text":"No, that is not true. I have simply lived a tad longer than∠you have, that is all. However..."},{"id":1011190339,"text":"However?"},{"id":1011190340,"text":"There is a cloud in your heart... Let's call it kindness. It∠prevents you from seeing the truth."},{"id":1011190341,"text":"Clouded? The truth? You don't mean... I can't believe it!"},{"id":1011190342,"text":"Seeing the truth can be painful at times. But with your∠strength, you'll be fine. You can beat Retso.∨This is a gift from my heart. I pray that it will be of use.∠Farewell then, my friend. Perhaps we may meet again."},{"id":1011190344,"text":"L-Lester, is that really true?"},{"id":1011190346,"text":"You have my word, this culinary contest will settle it all.∠Now, prepare yourself, Hai Yo, or should I say, Seiryu!"},{"id":1011190347,"text":"Retso... I can't fight you!"},{"id":1011190348,"text":"Coward! Have you lost your nerve?!"},{"id":1011190349,"text":"I saw the way you use your wok and cleaver and I figured it∠out! \"Hypnosis\"! How could you use such a trick?!"},{"id":1011190350,"text":"Hypnosis? What does he mean?"},{"id":1011190351,"text":"I've heard of this before. There's a secret technique where∠a chef can use the sound of the wok, the glint of their∠knife, and deft, almost dancing moving to place others under∠a spell to convince them the food they make is flawless.∨I didn't believe it was actually real, though..."},{"id":1011190353,"text":"But why, Retso? Why did you have to cheat like that?"},{"id":1011190354,"text":"Hai Yo..."},{"id":1011190355,"text":"You must know what Jinkai is planning! How can you help∠him?"},{"id":1011190356,"text":"Yes, I do know. As it happens, Jinkai and I conceived of∠the Dragon Plan together."},{"id":1011190357,"text":"B-But why?"},{"id":1011190358,"text":"We had a dream, a dream that our art might receive the∠understanding it was rightfully due. You must understand∠the happiness this would bring a chef.∨But when Shun Min learned that the plan was merely meant∠to fulfill Jinkai's lust for power, she, she...was killed."},{"id":1011190359,"text":"Please, Hai Yo. Face me in a cook-off. No tricks this time.∨I beg you, help me see which was truly correct, Shun Min's∠concerns, or Jinkai's ideals."},{"id":1011190360,"text":"Of course I will.∠Commander, is this okay?"},{"id":1011190361,"text":"S-Sorry, I need some time."},{"id":1011190362,"text":"Let's give him the cook-off of his life!"},{"id":1011190363,"text":"You are ready, right?"},{"id":1011190364,"text":"Let us begin, Hai Yo!!!"},{"id":1011190365,"text":"...It is as I thought. One who stooped to tricks such as I,∠could never prevail."},{"id":1011190366,"text":"My daughter, Shun Min...was right to believe in you.∨I'm giving this back to you. And now I have a favor of my∠own to ask. Please, defend this recipe with your very life."},{"id":1011190367,"text":"You received the Moon Bird Recipe."},{"id":1011190368,"text":"I want you to have this as well. It is a secret creation of∠my own."},{"id":1011190369,"text":"You received the Sashimi Combo Recipe."},{"id":1011190370,"text":"Bah! You disappoint me, Retso! I didn't think you so faint∠of heart."},{"id":1011190371,"text":"Urgh, I knew it. I'm no match for you!"},{"id":1011190372,"text":"Hai Yo...∨Perhaps in the end, I can't..."},{"id":1011190373,"text":"What are you doing, Retso?! Aren't you going to return the∠Moon Bird Recipe?"},{"id":1011190374,"text":"I-It really is you!!!"},{"id":1011190375,"text":"Jinkai!!!"},{"id":1011190376,"text":"I never thought I would have to take matters into my own∠hands... Hai Yo, give me the recipe. It serves no purpose in∠your possession.∨But in my hands it is a powerful tool! A tool to bring∠happiness to all the chefs of the world!!!"},{"id":1011190377,"text":"No, that's a lie! You're wrong, Jinkai!"},{"id":1011190378,"text":"Ignorant fool! So be it, a duel it is. Hai Yo, you will face∠me in a cook-off!!!"},{"id":1011190379,"text":"Gladly! Commander, this is the final foe! We must face him!"},{"id":1011190380,"text":"I-I'm kinda nervous..."},{"id":1011190381,"text":"End this, Hai Yo!!!"},{"id":1011190382,"text":"You have to hurry!"},{"id":1011190383,"text":"Are you ready yet, Commander?"},{"id":1011190384,"text":"Okay, Jinkai! Let's finish this!∨As the Seiryu, I will use all of my strength to stop you!"},{"id":1011190385,"text":"And I, Jinkai of Genbu, will crush you with my ultimate∠recipe, the Chinese Banquet!!!"},{"id":1011190386,"text":"WHAAAT?! How? How could I lose?! It's not possible!∠Especially not to a worm like you, Hai Yo!!!"},{"id":1011190387,"text":"I didn't do it alone.∨Antonio, Lester, Bashok, Retso, ♂㈱, they all∠gave me words of encouragement.∨But most of all...most of all, it was Shun Min who gave me∠the power and the courage to defeat you!"},{"id":1011190388,"text":"A-Absurd... I'd never give the Moon Bird Recipe to a fool∠like you! Never! Never!!! NEVER!!!"},{"id":1011190389,"text":"The Moon Bird Recipe... Shun Min sacrificed her life for∠it, and chefs want it for their own...∨Well, here's what I think of it!"},{"id":1011190390,"text":"He tore the recipe to pieces!"},{"id":1011190391,"text":"What have you done?! Th-That...that recipe was passed from∠chef to chef for generations..."},{"id":1011190392,"text":"Cooking is not for making people sad! I don't need some∠dumb recipe to make food that brings happiness to people!"},{"id":1011190393,"text":"Jinkai, let's stop this.∨Both you and I walked the path of the chef. But somewhere∠along the line, we lost sight of what's important."},{"id":1011190394,"text":"Retso..."},{"id":1011190395,"text":"Let's start again, from the beginning. Only this time we∠will be true chefs, who do not rely upon secret recipes..."},{"id":1011190396,"text":"...◎2Hai Yo, I accept defeat. I have lived thinking I was∠fighting to make chefs of the world happy.∨But I was wrong. There can be no happiness for us if those∠who eat our food are not happy first..."},{"id":1011190397,"text":"Now go forth, Hai Yo. I look forward to seeing you light the∠way for us all! Hahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1011190398,"text":"Shun Min... I kept my promise!◎1 Even if you are gone∠forever..."},{"id":1011190399,"text":"Aha! So this is where you've been, Hai Yo! You've got a∠restaurant full of hungry customers waiting!"},{"id":1011190400,"text":"Sorry about that! Ai ya! I'm on my way!"},{"id":1011190401,"text":"Thank you!"},{"id":1011190402,"text":"Well, back to work..."},{"id":1011190403,"text":"Hahahahahaha!!! You will now both bear witness to the∠execution of my Dragon Plan! Bwahahahaha!!!"},{"id":1011190408,"text":"Shun Min, I failed you..."},{"id":1011190420,"text":"Waitress"},{"id":1011190421,"text":"And another thing: go and see a fellow in Gregminster by the∠name of Gremio. Time to be gettin' off to work, I∠guess."},{"id":1011190429,"text":"Baaaaa..."},{"id":1011190430,"text":"*munch* *munch*"},{"id":1011190431,"text":"......"},{"id":1011190432,"text":"Nnn..."},{"id":1011190434,"text":"*chomp* *chomp*"},{"id":1011190435,"text":"*bock* *bock* *bock*"},{"id":1011190436,"text":"*cocka-a-doodle-DOOOOOOO*"},{"id":1011190437,"text":"*bock* *bock* *bock* *BACAW*"},{"id":1011190438,"text":"*oink* *oink*"},{"id":1011190439,"text":"*snuffle*"},{"id":1011190440,"text":"*snort* *snort*"},{"id":1011190441,"text":"*moooooo*"},{"id":1011190442,"text":"*mmoooooooo*"},{"id":1011190444,"text":"*woof* *woof*"},{"id":1011200001,"text":"Don't worry! Leave it to me!"},{"id":1011200002,"text":"If you want good food, you need a professional to cook it!∠That's why I'm here to help!"},{"id":1011200003,"text":"I know who you are! I'll be back!"},{"id":1011200013,"text":"You again!"},{"id":1011200014,"text":"See? I told you I'd be back!"},{"id":1011200015,"text":"I really, really want to cook here!"},{"id":1011200016,"text":"I'm back just like I promised! Now let me join your group!"},{"id":1011200017,"text":"Hey, enough already!"},{"id":1011200019,"text":"Alright alright."},{"id":1011200020,"text":"Get out of here!!!"},{"id":1011200024,"text":"See? This will be a terrible battle, I just know it."},{"id":1011200140,"text":"I swear on my wings that I will go out there and fight with∠my all."},{"id":1011210001,"text":"With these wings, I can fly all the way down to the ground∠from here."},{"id":1011210002,"text":"...◎7Eeheeheeheehee!!!"},{"id":1011210003,"text":"I used to be a Dragon Knight, and back in those days I would∠fly way, way higher than this."},{"id":1011210005,"text":"Hey, look, feel this here. That was just a scratch!"},{"id":2000010099,"text":"Ungh... B-Brother... Sister..."},{"id":2000010100,"text":"You've got a long ways to go if ya think you can kill me!"},{"id":2000010101,"text":"I'm Lo Wen of Mt. Lampdragon! Remember me!!!"},{"id":2000010102,"text":"Damn it all..."},{"id":2000010103,"text":"Unf! You damn insect!!!"},{"id":2000010104,"text":"No! This cannot be!!!"},{"id":2000010105,"text":"A-Absurd! How could this happen to me?"},{"id":2000010106,"text":"You little cretins!!!"},{"id":2000010107,"text":"Aw, come on! I'm not through fightin' yet!!!"},{"id":2000010108,"text":"Damn you..."},{"id":2000010109,"text":"Perhaps I should have taken this more seriously..."},{"id":2000010110,"text":"I have only myself to blame..."},{"id":2000010111,"text":"I guess...this is the end..."},{"id":2000010112,"text":"I can still go on..."},{"id":2000010113,"text":"R-Run away! Hurry! Retreat!!!"},{"id":2000010115,"text":"Damn, for the future of the Karaya!"},{"id":2000010116,"text":"Your Grace..."},{"id":2000010117,"text":"Lord Hikusaak's soldiers must not be wasted. Please retreat."},{"id":2000010118,"text":"Ngh..."},{"id":2000010119,"text":"Damn you all! My Knights..."},{"id":2000010120,"text":"B-But how..."},{"id":2000010121,"text":"I owe you nothing more. Farewell."},{"id":2000010122,"text":"How dare you!"},{"id":2000010123,"text":"You surprise me. Full retreat!"},{"id":2000010124,"text":"I am beaten..."},{"id":2000010125,"text":"We must hold...L'Renouille..."},{"id":2000010126,"text":"Messenger"},{"id":2000010127,"text":"Report!"},{"id":2000010128,"text":"s unit"},{"id":2000010129,"text":"was attacked by the enemy!"},{"id":2000010130,"text":"Report..."},{"id":2000010131,"text":"The lord"},{"id":2000010132,"text":"has perished in combat."},{"id":2000010133,"text":"Report."},{"id":2000010134,"text":"was wounded."},{"id":2000010135,"text":"Report! Oulan saved "},{"id":2000010136,"text":"The lord"},{"id":2000010137,"text":"from death on the battlefield!"},{"id":2000010138,"text":"A contract is a contract, and I always earn my pay."},{"id":2000010140,"text":"Soon, we'll be able to see their fort. I bet they're in∠there shivering like little mice.∨Listen, we must finish this before Prince Luca arrives!"},{"id":2000010141,"text":"So reckless. I only hope it doesn't cost him in the end..."},{"id":2000010142,"text":"Well, I can get why he'd want to wrap this up before Prince∠Luca gets here. That way he gets to hog all the credit for∠himself. Isn't that right, Culgan?!"},{"id":2000010143,"text":"I have no intention of attacking frivolously. It's∠inefficient. I act only when necessary and to the extent∠needed. That is enough."},{"id":2000010144,"text":"Sounds boring to me! Why even wield a sword then!"},{"id":2000010145,"text":"The enemy has underestimated us. We must strike now!"},{"id":2000010146,"text":"You heard the lady! Let's get 'em!!!"},{"id":2000010147,"text":"Tsk, don't get too fired up or you're gonna get burned."},{"id":2000010148,"text":"Here goes nothing!"},{"id":2000010149,"text":"Let's get out there, ♂㈱."},{"id":2000010150,"text":"A surprise attack, eh? Let's rout these mercenary scum!"},{"id":2000010151,"text":"These Fire Spears definitely pack a punch."},{"id":2000010152,"text":"See? Ya should thank me for swipin' 'em."},{"id":2000010153,"text":"In your dreams."},{"id":2000010154,"text":"Urk! ♂㈱, you alright?◎3 We'd better play it∠safe here."},{"id":2000010155,"text":"Miserable fleas! Blast it all, we need to withdraw and∠regroup! Retreat!"},{"id":2000010156,"text":"Yeah, we won!!! All thanks to these lovely Fire Spears!"},{"id":2000010157,"text":"Good work out there, ♂㈱!"},{"id":2000010158,"text":"I'm Kiba, general of Highland's 3rd Army. I fight today for∠the honor of His Grace, Agares Blight, King of Highland."},{"id":2000010159,"text":"And I'm Solon Jhee, general of Highland's 2nd Army! To∠repay you for that humiliation you dealt me earlier, this∠time I will slay every last one of you!"},{"id":2000010160,"text":"Nobody leave the fort, understand? Our only concern now is∠defending this place."},{"id":2000010161,"text":"Here they come!"},{"id":2000010162,"text":"The Fire Spears! Dammit, they're not workin' anymore. This∠may be it for us!"},{"id":2000010163,"text":"Bah, the Spears won't help us anymore. Guess we'll have to∠rely on our own grit now."},{"id":2000010164,"text":"Seems we pushed the Fire Spears too hard. They won't be of∠any use to us like this."},{"id":2000010165,"text":"It's no good, ♂㈱. The Fire Spears have given∠out on us."},{"id":2000010167,"text":"I can't believe it...◎3 How could such a large army pass∠through the forest?"},{"id":2000010168,"text":"The fools! Follow me! We'll smash them to pieces!!!"},{"id":2000010169,"text":"Hurry! Strike while the iron is hot!"},{"id":2000010170,"text":"Heh, Flik must've been hungry for a good fight!"},{"id":2000010171,"text":"What are those weapons they've got?! Don't get too close!"},{"id":2000010172,"text":"Fire Spears... But why would they have such things?"},{"id":2000010173,"text":"Dammit! No!!!"},{"id":2000010174,"text":"Damn! This can't be..."},{"id":2000010175,"text":"N-No... It's all my fault..."},{"id":2000010176,"text":"Bwahahahahaha!!! The halfwits! Destroy them all!!!"},{"id":2000010183,"text":"Look! There's Muse!"},{"id":2000010184,"text":"Feels like years since I was here last."},{"id":2000010185,"text":"It's strange that we haven't met any enemy resistance yet.∠Don't drop your guard."},{"id":2000010186,"text":"I place my faith in you, Lady Lucia."},{"id":2000010187,"text":"Your Grace, I swear on my name that we will cleanse∠ourselves of the stain of defeat!∨Listen, my warriors! Remember the oath you have sworn! The∠survival of our tribe depends upon it!"},{"id":2000010188,"text":"Attack! The Karaya must not suffer another defeat!!!"},{"id":2000010189,"text":"Your Grace, preparations are complete. We can withdraw∠at any time."},{"id":2000010190,"text":"Not yet... Give the signal for Lucia's forces to retreat."},{"id":2000010191,"text":"But then we risk losing this chance for victory."},{"id":2000010192,"text":"They're just a bunch of tribesmen from the frontier. If they∠can buy us some time, then why not use 'em?"},{"id":2000010193,"text":"Give the signal, now!"},{"id":2000010194,"text":"Casting aside the greater good for the smaller is not the∠way to forceful domination. Lady Lucia understood this when∠she stepped onto the battlefield."},{"id":2000010195,"text":"...You're right. Let's withdraw."},{"id":2000010197,"text":"Chief! The Highlanders are fleeing!"},{"id":2000010198,"text":"I know that! If we can gain them a few extra moments to do∠so, that will be enough."},{"id":2000010199,"text":"Heh, just when we thought you were a little girl, you show∠us some steel to rival that of your own father. We're with∠you all the way!"},{"id":2000010200,"text":"Listen to me! I forbid you from dying here! Fight now for∠the future of the Karaya!!!"},{"id":2000010201,"text":"We'll take care of things here, Lady Lucia! You must escape!"},{"id":2000010202,"text":"...I'm sorry, Beecham."},{"id":2000010203,"text":"I can see the Highland Army's vanguard."},{"id":2000010204,"text":"It's that oaf Viktor again! This time, his head is mine!"},{"id":2000010205,"text":"Stay calm. Remember, all we're here to do is slow 'em down."},{"id":2000010206,"text":"If we can take down Solon Jhee's unit or buy enough time,∠they should retreat."},{"id":2000010207,"text":"I am Miklotov, Captain of the Blue Knights of Matilda. I'm∠here to assist Sir Viktor of Muse."},{"id":2000010208,"text":"Your fate is sealed. Surrender, or die here like dogs."},{"id":2000010209,"text":"Quite the confident one, aren't we? I'm afraid I must∠decline both of those choices."},{"id":2000010210,"text":"Miklotov, orders from Lord Gordeau. We're to call back our∠men and withdraw at once."},{"id":2000010211,"text":"What are you saying, Camus?! Are we Knights to turn tail∠before the enemy and flee?"},{"id":2000010212,"text":"It's a knight's duty to follow the orders of his liege∠lord. Have you forgotten your oath?"},{"id":2000010213,"text":"What the hell are they doing?! Aren't they going to defend∠Muse?"},{"id":2000010214,"text":"I smell someone tryin' to make an underhanded bargain.∠Guess they forgot it'll be their necks on the line next if∠Muse falls..."},{"id":2000010216,"text":"Tsk, consider today my present to you, for tomorrow your∠pig heads will be decorating the castle gates!"},{"id":2000010217,"text":"Try it, if you've got the stones."},{"id":2000010218,"text":"We...actually managed to keep them in check."},{"id":2000010219,"text":"So this is it, huh..."},{"id":2000010220,"text":"Hey, Flik, see anyone you recognize?"},{"id":2000010221,"text":"Is that Gilbert? I can't believe he's working for Highland."},{"id":2000010222,"text":"Do you know him? If only there was some way to get him to∠switch sides..."},{"id":2000010223,"text":"Gilbert! Since when are you buddies with Highland?"},{"id":2000010225,"text":"You make me sick! I know you're in it for the money, but∠these bastards sacked Toto and Ryube! They murder women∠and children!!!"},{"id":2000010226,"text":"What do want from me?!"},{"id":2000010227,"text":"Is that you, Gilbert?! How can you fight for Highland?"},{"id":2000010229,"text":"Are you okay with villages like Toto and Ryube bein' burnt∠to ash, with women and children being cut down like∠animals? Is that the type of man you are now?"},{"id":2000010230,"text":"No, that's not..."},{"id":2000010232,"text":"You're gettin' sloppy!"},{"id":2000010233,"text":"Worthless little... Grrr..."},{"id":2000010234,"text":"C'mon, Gilbert. Come join the good guys.∨I know a proud guy like you can't be happy seein' the way∠Luca Blight wages war."},{"id":2000010235,"text":"Maybe...◎5this is how it was meant to be..."},{"id":2000010236,"text":"Fine, I'll do it."},{"id":2000010237,"text":"General Jhee! The mercenaries!"},{"id":2000010238,"text":"Gilbert!!! You dare betray us?!"},{"id":2000010239,"text":"Yeah, sorry 'bout that. I'll send you a refund later."},{"id":2000010240,"text":"Well, I thought you'd be holed up in your castle trembling∠like a leaf, but it seems you were brave enough to show∠your face after all. Good man."},{"id":2000010241,"text":"Father, don't underestimate him. He came out because he,∠too, has confidence in his strength."},{"id":2000010242,"text":"I wouldn't have it any other way. I love a good challenge.∠Otherwise this can grow tedious."},{"id":2000010243,"text":"Listen up, you grunts. Don't think you can slack off with me∠just because I'm a stand-in, are we clear?∨All right, now that we have that out of the way, hold your∠positions. The 3rd Army will take the lead."},{"id":2000010244,"text":"Heheh, finally a fight on equal footing!"},{"id":2000010245,"text":"Hmph, just don't let it go to your head."},{"id":2000010247,"text":"I knew we should never have allied with the humans. We∠needn't risk the lives of our comrades in a conflict such∠as this.∨Order all forces to retreat."},{"id":2000010248,"text":"Huh? Y-Yes, General, arf!"},{"id":2000010249,"text":"What is the meaning of this?!"},{"id":2000010250,"text":"Ohhh, what have we here? A quarrel among friends? Hahaha,∠what a bunch of buffoons! Now then, it's our turn! All∠forces, charge!!!"},{"id":2000010251,"text":"It's no good! We'll never hold 'em back without Ridley!"},{"id":2000010252,"text":"It's only a matter of time now..."},{"id":2000010253,"text":"We've got no choice... Commander ♂㈱, order∠our troops to withdraw."},{"id":2000010254,"text":"What was that back there?! Dammit! We could have won this∠battle!"},{"id":2000010255,"text":"As if we will let you escape so easily!"},{"id":2000010256,"text":"Do not pursue them too far, Father. I recommend we regroup∠for now."},{"id":2000010257,"text":"Viktor, Flik, Tsai, and Camus have finished their∠preparations."},{"id":2000010258,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, remain where you are so we can∠draw Kiba in."},{"id":2000010259,"text":"This ♂㈱ is a brave young man indeed. Twice he∠has dared to face us. He is truly the son of Genkaku.∨Without Ridley, it seems they have little chance, but...∠What do you think, Klaus?"},{"id":2000010260,"text":"This is obviously an ambush. They likely have two units each∠on the right and left that will surround us once we're close∠enough."},{"id":2000010261,"text":"Then perhaps we, too, should divide our forces to enclose∠them from either side?"},{"id":2000010262,"text":"The enemy strategist, Shu, has underestimated us. ∠He believes we haven't caught onto his trap and that our∠forces will fall into disarray when it is sprung. ∠This is a golden opportunity for us.∨Even when the ambushers appear, tell our men to ignore∠them and strike directly at the heart of their main force. ∠Defeat ♂㈱ and our foes will crumble."},{"id":2000010263,"text":"Hm, we shall do as you say. Relay the orders to the men.∠Tell them to strike like the wind!"},{"id":2000010264,"text":"Okay, we're going to hang back and watch for a bit. Mess∠this up and it might hurt my career, too."},{"id":2000010266,"text":"Shu, isn't it still too early?"},{"id":2000010267,"text":"It's fine. Give the signal!"},{"id":2000010268,"text":"That's our cue! Charge!"},{"id":2000010269,"text":"By my sword, Uriah, I'll cleave our foes in two!"},{"id":2000010270,"text":"So it was an ambush after all. Advance, pay them no mind!∠Target their main unit!!!"},{"id":2000010271,"text":"The enemy isn't panicking. We cannot hope to hold them off!"},{"id":2000010273,"text":"They're beginning to falter! Victory is in sight! With me!!!"},{"id":2000010274,"text":"Bah, it's just like I thought! ♂㈱'s gonna get∠swamped..."},{"id":2000010275,"text":"Now, crush them all!!!"},{"id":2000010276,"text":"Break them up! Protect ♂㈱!!!"},{"id":2000010277,"text":"The time is right. All troops, take up arms and advance.∠Don't let a single Highland soldier escape!"},{"id":2000010278,"text":"Lord Klaus, a hostile force has appeared behind us!"},{"id":2000010279,"text":"What?!"},{"id":2000010280,"text":"I don't understand! Why are there soldiers from Two River?!"},{"id":2000010281,"text":"The plan worked. I'll leave the rest to you, Apple."},{"id":2000010282,"text":"Y-Yes, sir."},{"id":2000010283,"text":"Grr... So Ridley deserting was part of their plan all along.∨Send word to Rowd in the 4th Army! At this rate we'll lose∠any hope of escape!!!"},{"id":2000010284,"text":"We're being torn to pieces here! What in the blazes is the 4th∠Army doing?!"},{"id":2000010285,"text":"L-Lord Rowd, General Kiba is surrounded! He needs assistance∠immediately..."},{"id":2000010286,"text":"Uh... I see. Let's wait a moment longer. Haste makes waste,∠you know."},{"id":2000010287,"text":"Ah, here we are."},{"id":2000010288,"text":"I bring orders from His Grace, Luca Blight, King of Highland.∠You would be well advised to follow them immediately."},{"id":2000010289,"text":"Y-Yes, I will...∨Alright, full retreat, now!"},{"id":2000010290,"text":"But what about General Kiba?"},{"id":2000010291,"text":"Hold your tongue! These are orders from King Luca himself!∠Do you mean to disobey them?"},{"id":2000010292,"text":"N-No, sir, I would never presume to..."},{"id":2000010293,"text":"Mathiu's student, eh? It seems he has grown much since∠then..."},{"id":2000010294,"text":"The 4th Army retreating! I-I can't believe my eyes...∨Damn them to hell! Is this to be our fate?!"},{"id":2000010295,"text":"Father, forgive me. I have no way out of this for us."},{"id":2000010296,"text":"They've lost their will to fight. Accept the surrender of∠any who offer it. Take Kiba and Klaus into custody as well."},{"id":2000010297,"text":"Master Shu, I have a question regarding our troop∠deployment. May I speak freely?"},{"id":2000010298,"text":"Go ahead, General Ridley."},{"id":2000010299,"text":"Why is it that only the Kobold unit is being placed so far∠out in front?"},{"id":2000010300,"text":"Decisions on where to deploy our troops are mine to make,∠and I expect you to follow them, General."},{"id":2000010301,"text":"How careless of me... It's an ambush!"},{"id":2000010302,"text":"It looks as if our trap worked. There aren't many of them,∠so there's no need to rush. We can apply a little finesse as∠we dispose of them."},{"id":2000010303,"text":"Finesse, huh? You make it sound like we're cooking here."},{"id":2000010304,"text":"Grr, I have to hold out for reinforcements..."},{"id":2000010305,"text":"Hey there, Ridley, old boy. Looks like you're in a bit of a∠bind. Need some help?"},{"id":2000010306,"text":"You can dispense with the banal humor. Just move quickly!"},{"id":2000010307,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we can't afford to lose General∠Ridley. We need to withdraw as soon as you free the kobolds∠from the trap."},{"id":2000010308,"text":"What is this? I...sense something.◎2 It makes my skin crawl."},{"id":2000010309,"text":"So... It really is him."},{"id":2000010310,"text":"Long time no see—or wait, I guess maybe it's, \"Nice to meet∠you,\" huh?"},{"id":2000010311,"text":"Wh-Who are you?!"},{"id":2000010312,"text":"Who am I? Now that's a cold thing to ask, especially when∠we are more alike than anyone else alive.∨Alike...and yet in the same sense we couldn't be any more∠different."},{"id":2000010313,"text":"Is something wrong, Master Sasarai?"},{"id":2000010314,"text":"Ungh... I feel ill. Retreat."},{"id":2000010316,"text":"J-Jowy... Why?"},{"id":2000010317,"text":"Don't be so careless, ♂㈱. The leader of the∠♂② Army shouldn't expose himself to an enemy∠like this."},{"id":2000010318,"text":"W-Wait..."},{"id":2000010319,"text":"Seed, Culgan, the rest is in your hands."},{"id":2000010320,"text":"Leave it to us."},{"id":2000010321,"text":"Yeah! Time for some real fun!!!"},{"id":2000010322,"text":"Don't over-commit yourselves."},{"id":2000010323,"text":"Get your act together! THIS is how you fight!"},{"id":2000010324,"text":"I never thought the leader of the ♂② Army∠would turn out to be you, boy!"},{"id":2000010325,"text":"Pull back our forces! We must protect the Commander!!!"},{"id":2000010327,"text":"Forgive me, General Ridley."},{"id":2000010328,"text":"I am most grateful for the timely rescue."},{"id":2000010329,"text":"We couldn't just let you die here, now could we?"},{"id":2000010330,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, let's sound the retreat."},{"id":2000010331,"text":"Tsk, they're gettin' away!"},{"id":2000010332,"text":"We have been ordered not to pursue."},{"id":2000010333,"text":"I know that. Alright, we're pulling back too!"},{"id":2000010334,"text":"They fled, eh? No matter. Their heads will decorate every∠corner of this land soon enough."},{"id":2000010335,"text":"All units report preparations complete."},{"id":2000010336,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, until General Kiba appears,∠please have your forces hold their position."},{"id":2000010337,"text":"Traitor!!! You joined the enemy and raise your sword against∠me! You spit on the royal name of the Blight Family! And for∠that, I will strike your head off here and now!"},{"id":2000010338,"text":"You, who murdered King Agares, no, your own father, dare to∠speak to me of treachery?!◎1 Don't make me laugh!◎2☆0 You∠are but a petulant child!!!"},{"id":2000010339,"text":"I'll kill you for that!!!"},{"id":2000010340,"text":"Okay, give the signal! Commander, your target is Luca∠Blight."},{"id":2000010341,"text":"We won't accept your tyranny any longer."},{"id":2000010342,"text":"This is the end Luca Blight! Your death is at hand!"},{"id":2000010343,"text":"This time I'll have your head!"},{"id":2000010344,"text":"I'm Valeria, one of the Six Great Generals of the Toran∠Republic!"},{"id":2000010345,"text":"President Lepant ordered me to lead a company of volunteers∠to support you and the ♂② Army!"},{"id":2000010346,"text":"Time to return the favor for the previous battle!"},{"id":2000010347,"text":"So, this is the ♂② Army...◎5∨☆0Bwahahahahaha!!! Is this really the best you could do?!∠If you think you can take my head with such a pathetic band∠of fools, you are more than welcome to try!!!"},{"id":2000010348,"text":"Bwahahahahaha!!! You can gather together a million maggots,∠but they'll still just be maggots!"},{"id":2000010349,"text":"I'd like to see you wretches even ∠make a single scratch on me! ∠Bwahahahahahaha!!!"},{"id":2000010350,"text":"Blood! Blood!! How I thirst for blood!!! I'll kill every∠last one of you pigs!!!"},{"id":2000010351,"text":"I have arrived, Your Grace."},{"id":2000010352,"text":"You're late! What were you doing?!"},{"id":2000010353,"text":"Forgive me, Your Grace. There was some trouble with the∠main force."},{"id":2000010354,"text":"I'm here to assist, Your Grace."},{"id":2000010355,"text":"Perhaps it's time for me to fulfill my promise."},{"id":2000010356,"text":"Hey, we meet again."},{"id":2000010357,"text":"You again! Who are you?! How are we connected?!"},{"id":2000010358,"text":"I can't tell you that now, though you'll find out one of∠these days, whether you want to or not. But more∠importantly..."},{"id":2000010359,"text":"Wh-What are you—"},{"id":2000010360,"text":"O True Wind Rune, call forth the power of the air and∠spirits..."},{"id":2000010361,"text":"...What is this?"},{"id":2000010362,"text":"Become a blade that cleaves the earth! Shred my foes!!!"},{"id":2000010363,"text":"No! O True—"},{"id":2000010364,"text":"Whew, that fulfills my promise, but he got away. How∠annoying."},{"id":2000010365,"text":"Give up, Luca Blight. You can't get away."},{"id":2000010366,"text":"Heheh...◎1∨Bwahahahahaha! No matter how many rats you throw at ∠me, it will never be enough!"},{"id":2000010368,"text":"Aaagh!"},{"id":2000010369,"text":"D-Damn!"},{"id":2000010370,"text":"Eekkk!!!"},{"id":2000010371,"text":"What?! On his own?!"},{"id":2000010372,"text":"Urgh! I knew it..."},{"id":2000010373,"text":"How?!"},{"id":2000010374,"text":"Eek, he's a monster!"},{"id":2000010375,"text":"Unh, no..."},{"id":2000010376,"text":"It...it can't be!!!"},{"id":2000010377,"text":"Waaah!!!"},{"id":2000010378,"text":"Did you simpletons actually think you could take my head?∨I want you to remember this, ♂㈱! ∠Remember that filth such as you can never even put a mark∠on Luca Blight!"},{"id":2000010379,"text":"Grr, not even my carefully-laid plans were enough to stop∠the fiend!∨I didn't want to believe that sheer martial might could∠overcome the mind, but now I'm not so sure...∨Commander ♂㈱, the risk here is too great. We∠need to retreat."},{"id":2000010380,"text":"Damn, he eluded us... We can do no more here, Commander∠♂㈱. Time to withdraw our forces!"},{"id":2000010381,"text":"We took too much time... Highland reinforcements will arrive∠eventually. We're withdrawing, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":2000010382,"text":"We're too late..."},{"id":2000010383,"text":"General Ridley..."},{"id":2000010384,"text":"Our efforts were in vain. We need to withdraw the troops at∠once. Surely you agree, Commander ♂㈱?"},{"id":2000010385,"text":"Good, they're just rats in a trap now. Crush them, you hear?◎1∠Don't let a single one of them escape!"},{"id":2000010386,"text":"Our forces are spread a bit too thin. If they should happen∠to flank us..."},{"id":2000010387,"text":"Flank us? The only thing to our rear is the open fields of∠South Window! Don't worry, just get them!!!"},{"id":2000010388,"text":"This oughta be fun. That old weakling in South Window gave∠up without a fight, so the boredom was killin' me."},{"id":2000010389,"text":"Listen up, we need to keep leadin' these jerks on until∠♂㈱ and his team can slip around behind 'em.∠Hang tight, everybody!"},{"id":2000010390,"text":"♂㈱, you have only one target: Solon Jhee's∠unit. You can ignore all the others."},{"id":2000010391,"text":"What the hell is this?!"},{"id":2000010392,"text":"E-Enemies to our rear, sir..."},{"id":2000010393,"text":"Impossible... Where did they come from?"},{"id":2000010394,"text":"Eep, we've been surrounded!"},{"id":2000010395,"text":"Psh, they can try their stupid tricks. Call back the front∠lines. We'll pluck this thorn in our behind."},{"id":2000010396,"text":"H-Hey, look at that!"},{"id":2000010397,"text":"The Highland Army... They're being beaten?"},{"id":2000010398,"text":"Can you see that, everyone? ♂㈱'s unit is∠attacking Solon Jhee's!"},{"id":2000010399,"text":"R-Really? Solon Jhee is under attack?"},{"id":2000010400,"text":"♂㈱, now that is a young man who could lead us∠to victory. It's our chance to fight back."},{"id":2000010401,"text":"Victory..."},{"id":2000010402,"text":"That's right! Now is the time to rise up for the people of∠South Window, for the memory of Lord Granmeyer!"},{"id":2000010403,"text":"Yeah! This is our chance!"},{"id":2000010404,"text":"Destroy the Highland Army!!!"},{"id":2000010405,"text":"The situation has turned ugly. We'd better retreat before∠we're surrounded. Let's go, Seed!"},{"id":2000010406,"text":"Tsk, looks like we lost. But that's what happens when your∠commander's a complete dunce."},{"id":2000010407,"text":"I-Impudent dogs! You would leave me?!"},{"id":2000010408,"text":"General Jhee, we have to go. Otherwise it will be they who∠surround us..."},{"id":2000010409,"text":"I know that, you fool! Retreat! Full retreat!!!"},{"id":2000010410,"text":"W-We did it! We won! We won!∨We won, ♂㈱! They're running away!"},{"id":2000010412,"text":"Yeah..."},{"id":2000010413,"text":"♂㈱, the plan was a success. Now hurry back∠home."},{"id":2000010414,"text":"Everyone spread out and support each other! We need to∠strengthen our defenses."},{"id":2000010415,"text":"We gotta buy some time."},{"id":2000010416,"text":"I see them! It's the ♂② Army!"},{"id":2000010417,"text":"Just as expected. Culgan, Seed, I trust you can handle this."},{"id":2000010418,"text":"Yes, my liege!"},{"id":2000010419,"text":"We shall see it done."},{"id":2000010421,"text":"All right, give the signal!"},{"id":2000010423,"text":"Finally, we're up! Let's do this! Rip their guts out!!!"},{"id":2000010424,"text":"Okay, the next signal! Time for our unit to fall back!"},{"id":2000010425,"text":"There's the signal. Move out...but be careful."},{"id":2000010426,"text":"Yes, they're falling back!"},{"id":2000010427,"text":"Give the signal to retreat."},{"id":2000010428,"text":"Huh, that was kind of a let-down."},{"id":2000010429,"text":"They're not rallying their troops?"},{"id":2000010430,"text":"Something isn't right..."},{"id":2000010431,"text":"...You've done well to make it this far."},{"id":2000010432,"text":"King Jowy Blight has promised to recognize the lands of the∠Karaya if we are victorious here.∨Now we fight, for the peace of our home, and for our honor∠as warriors!"},{"id":2000010433,"text":"Get out there, you grunts! Don't let her outdo you!"},{"id":2000010434,"text":"Hmm..."},{"id":2000010436,"text":"That must be them."},{"id":2000010438,"text":"We're almost to the Matilda border... Keep going!!!"},{"id":2000010439,"text":"Yes, we should be safe now."},{"id":2000010440,"text":"Ha! And so the trap springs. Don't let a single one of these∠rats get away! Kill any that resist and send the rest back∠to Muse in chains!"},{"id":2000010441,"text":"We were so close..."},{"id":2000010442,"text":"H-Help us! They'll kill us if we go back!"},{"id":2000010443,"text":"Lord Gordeau! We have to save them!"},{"id":2000010444,"text":"We will do no such thing. Hold your position, Miklotov."},{"id":2000010445,"text":"What are you saying?! They're being slaughtered before our∠very eyes! It is an affront to the name of the Knights to∠sit idly by in the face of such depravity!"},{"id":2000010446,"text":"It's happening outside of our territory. We have no right∠to intervene. More importantly, we must bolster our∠defenses.∨Let no one past the border, refugee or otherwise."},{"id":2000010447,"text":"Y-You would order us to watch them die?! ◎0 I can't... I∠won't..."},{"id":2000010448,"text":"Are you saying you intend to disobey your lord? Have you no∠loyalty as a knight, Miklotov?"},{"id":2000010449,"text":"Miklotov."},{"id":2000010450,"text":"Commander ♂㈱...∨I-I..."},{"id":2000010451,"text":"♂㈱, he meant to say that you should pull out∠of this fight.∨Please, we don't want a battle."},{"id":2000010452,"text":"Hm? Who the hell are you? More swine looking to die?"},{"id":2000010453,"text":"We meet again, Commander ♂㈱. But now is not∠the time for us to fight."},{"id":2000010454,"text":"I-It's no use... We'll all be killed..."},{"id":2000010455,"text":"P-Please, no... Anywhere but Muse..."},{"id":2000010456,"text":"It seems they've lost the will to resist. Round up the pigs!"},{"id":2000010457,"text":"Come, Camus, Miklotov. We're leaving too."},{"id":2000010459,"text":"Miklotov..."},{"id":2000010461,"text":"Matilda is just ahead."},{"id":2000010462,"text":"If the enemy is going to show up, this would be the place..."},{"id":2000010463,"text":"Just as I thought. Leon Silverberg isn't here."},{"id":2000010464,"text":"So it was a decoy... Troops, surround them and attack!∠If we can rout the ♂② Army here, this war is∠as good as won."},{"id":2000010465,"text":"Aha, here they are! Look at 'em all squirming around!∠They must be out in full force... Mobilize and crush them∠like the vermin they are!"},{"id":2000010466,"text":"Advance and encircle the enemy!"},{"id":2000010467,"text":"Advance, Knights! Earn Highland's gratitude now and it will∠be to our advantage later."},{"id":2000010468,"text":"Give Culgan's unit the signal."},{"id":2000010469,"text":"All troops, charge! Divide and slaughter!"},{"id":2000010470,"text":"More enemies have appeared! This doesn't look good for us..."},{"id":2000010471,"text":"I anticipated this. Time to give our own signal."},{"id":2000010472,"text":"It's time! Attack!!!"},{"id":2000010473,"text":"Go! GOOO!!!"},{"id":2000010474,"text":"What?! There's more of them?"},{"id":2000010475,"text":"We've been outsmarted... Still, no need to let our thirst∠for victory drive us into a trap. Have Culgan retreat before∠he gets surrounded. We'll pull back our troops as well."},{"id":2000010476,"text":"That's the signal... Retreat!!!"},{"id":2000010477,"text":"L-Look!!! Our castle!!!"},{"id":2000010478,"text":"Behold! Rockaxe has fallen!!!"},{"id":2000010479,"text":"Knights of Matilda!!! Shake off the yoke of Highland∠oppression and reclaim your honor!"},{"id":2000010480,"text":"The fools... Even without the Knights, the ♂②∠Army is nothing to us."},{"id":2000010481,"text":"Seed, Culgan, make a full retreat!"},{"id":2000010482,"text":"What?! Are you serious? We're so close..."},{"id":2000010483,"text":"Do it, now."},{"id":2000010485,"text":"According to reports, ♂㈱ circled to the right∠and Hauser to the left flank."},{"id":2000010491,"text":"But if Shu's unit is a decoy..."},{"id":2000010499,"text":"I see it. L'Renouille!"},{"id":2000010500,"text":"We'll be up against Seed, Culgan, Yuber, and Lucia... As∠well as Highland's 2nd Army, the Royal Guards, led by Han∠Cunningham."},{"id":2000010501,"text":"Han... Never thought I'd meet one of the heroes of∠yesteryear. I'd rather not rough up an old man if I can∠avoid it, but if he insists on standin' in our way, he's∠goin' down!"},{"id":2000010502,"text":"You think we're gonna let you rats spread your stink over∠our kingdom?"},{"id":2000010503,"text":"There will be no stalemates here, only victory or defeat.◎2∠That is all that remains..."},{"id":2000010504,"text":"Listen up! Don't you dare bring shame on Lady Lucia, Chief∠of the Karaya!"},{"id":2000010505,"text":"This is the last stand, Your Grace..."},{"id":2000010506,"text":"The Bright Shield Rune... So that must be Genkaku's boy."},{"id":2000010507,"text":"Seems like this is about it...∠Though I did not expect it to end this quickly..."},{"id":2000010508,"text":"Yuber! You spineless worm!!!"},{"id":2000010509,"text":"He was only ever a general-for-hire. I never expected him to∠risk his life to protect this kingdom."},{"id":2000010510,"text":"Highland... Our beloved home..."},{"id":2000010511,"text":"No! Highland cannot lose! I won't allow it! I'll defend this∠kingdom even if I have to do it all by myself!!!"},{"id":2000010512,"text":"Just as we were so long ago...we are powerless to resist the∠tides of history..."},{"id":2000010513,"text":"So, L'Renouille has finally..."},{"id":2000010514,"text":"We did it! We did it!!!"},{"id":2000010515,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, take your unit into the city.∠The final battle will take place within its walls."},{"id":2000010516,"text":"Attack"},{"id":2000010517,"text":"Wait"},{"id":2000010519,"text":"These are instructions on∠special abilities."},{"id":2000010520,"text":""},{"id":2000010521,"text":"End Turn"},{"id":2000010522,"text":"Leave it to Apple"},{"id":2000010523,"text":"Go back"},{"id":2000010526,"text":"The turn will end. ,"text":""},{"id":2000110009,"text":""},{"id":2000110010,"text":""},{"id":2000110011,"text":""},{"id":2000110520,"text":""},{"id":2000110542,"text":""},{"id":2000120007,"text":""},{"id":2000120008,"text":""},{"id":2000120009,"text":""},{"id":2000120010,"text":""},{"id":2000120011,"text":""},{"id":2000120520,"text":""},{"id":2000120542,"text":""},{"id":2000130007,"text":""},{"id":2000130008,"text":""},{"id":2000130009,"text":""},{"id":2000130010,"text":""},{"id":2000130011,"text":""},{"id":2000130520,"text":""},{"id":2000130542,"text":""},{"id":2000140007,"text":""},{"id":2000140008,"text":""},{"id":2000140009,"text":""},{"id":2000140010,"text":""},{"id":2000140011,"text":""},{"id":2000140520,"text":""},{"id":2000140542,"text":""},{"id":2000150007,"text":""},{"id":2000150008,"text":""},{"id":2000150009,"text":""},{"id":2000150010,"text":""},{"id":2000150011,"text":""},{"id":2000150520,"text":""},{"id":2000150542,"text":""},{"id":2000160007,"text":""},{"id":2000160008,"text":""},{"id":2000160009,"text":""},{"id":2000160010,"text":""},{"id":2000160011,"text":""},{"id":2000160520,"text":""},{"id":2000160542,"text":""},{"id":1004060103,"text":"Would
